1.content: What's the main character's gender?
1.title: IT BEGINS

11.content: Is he the first to gain?
11.title: Male

choices: He doesn't change just yet (spurt/slow gain).
1111.content:
I always found my plantation to be the best spot for research; so distant, discrete, and overall relaxing. The company also found it appealing; not eye-catching. Standing on the porch, I sighed as I looked at the golden fields across the road and the strip of forest bordering the horizon beneath the rich blue sky. Not a single house or shop for miles.

Walking back into the house, I skipped down the stairs leading into the basement, which also happened to be my office. Working in the research facility actually didn't leave me with some elaborate laboratory in my house, just a desk and a computer.

However, a metal briefcase laid on my desk, its sleek appearance contrary to the homely basement.

I sat myself down and looked at the case with anticipation, eventually reaching into a drawer and pulling out a tape recorder.

"Recording Number 1, June 13, 200X. Project is Barry-8, an additive supplement for commercial retail. Desired outcome is a healthy, non-lethal desire for the subjected food. Test has been successful on 8 lab rats, and human test is about to go underway. Test subject is Hank Forrest, Age 30, Height 6'1", Weight 176 lb. Test has not commenced. About to treat a meal with Barry-8 and monitor results. End tape."

Clicking it off, I sighed as I looked at the brief case. I couldn't believe I was the one they'd chosen. You'd think they'd get some guy in contract, but no.

Alas, there's always gotta be a test subject, I suppose.

Reaching into the mini fridge, I pulled out a plate wrapped in cellophane. Peeling it revealed a slice of cake on a paper plate.

With a gulp, I flicked open the briefcase and revealed two vials, each filled with clear liquid. After uncorking one, I brought it under my nose and gave a small whiff. It had no noticeable smell.

Hovering the open tube over the vial, I let some of the liquid trickle onto the cake. It seeped into the sponge cake, acting exactly as water would. Once it'd set in, I sliced off a bite with my fork.

"Well, down the hatch…" I announced as I brought the fork into my mouth.
1111.title: Story 1

11111.content:
My eyes widened as my tongue was met with an explosion of flavor. The stuff tasted amazing! Far more results than the lab rats had proven.

Of course, the cake was destroyed in two large bites, which I’d tried to savor the taste out of as much as possible. I’d even licked the plate clean of every last crumb.

“Tests results are positive!” I chuckled into the recorder. “Cake has shown incredible taste and satisfaction while eating. Shall stand by to monitor further results.”

I set the recorder down and silently sat back in the chair, awaiting more results. Five minutes went by with nothing coming up, and I started thinking back to the cake. It tasted so good, and I was almost disappointed that I’d eaten it all in an instant. A growl from my stomach extenuated that feeling as I realized how hungry I felt.

“Hmm…” I hummed curiously as I glanced over at the test canister. “…maybe I could try testing on other kinds of foods…”

I didn’t bother getting out of my chair as I leaned forward and creaked open the door, pulling out a sandwich wrapped in cellophane. After ripping off the plastic, I reopened the canister and dribbled more of the stuff on, a bit more generous this time.

“Testing of sandwich shall begin.” I announced into the recorder before leaning back and biting in. letting out a contented sigh as that same explosion of flavor came back. Even after I’d stuffed down the sandwich, it’d still left me with an apetite.

“Testing on apple shall begin…” I informed the recorder as I leaned forward and pulled out an apple, which I treated as before and chowed down.

The next several minutes went by in a flavor safari as I continued to raid the fridge of its contents and wolfed it down with the additive. Halfway in I’d long forgotten about testing as I just stuffed myself and let the recorder gather dust.

I didn’t notice the mini fridge’s dwindling contents until it was almost empty, save for a 2-liter bottle of soda. After lifting the bottle out, I picked up the canister and saw that it was down to half of its original contents. A somewhat mischievous smile crept across my face as I screwed open the bottle and poured in the last of the additive.

Bringing the bottle to my lips, my eyes widened and I let out a laugh as I chugged down the cool, and recently infinitely delicious beverage. I didn’t lift the bottle from my lips as I gulped it all down for a minute straight until the bottle was empty, which clattered on the ground as it fell from my mouth and I let out a belch.

“*UUUUUUUUURRAAAAAAAARRRRRPPPPP…* Heh, scuse me. Any way…” But my smile faded my hand fell onto my lap, which I felt a soft mass resting on. Looking down, I stared in shock.

My stomach had fattened to the size of a beach ball, my shirt stretching as the bottom half lay exposed up to my naval. My legs had also blimped up as well, now filling the seat and pushing out through the arm rests.

“Woah…” A whispered to myself, still registering what I was seeing.
11111.title: He's instantly addicted!

111113.content:
"Greetings, oh corpulent one!"

Without any chance to get a grip on things, I spun around in shock and let out a startled yelp as I saw a potato the size of a cat floating in the room.

"WHAT…THE…FU…"

"I am Lord Solanumus, king of the planet tuberosa! As per our species migration, we've taken it upon ourselves to nominate you as our new planet!"

I began to open my mouth to speak, but the potato apparently saw its chance and launched itself straight at my face, shoving itself into my mouth as I let out a yelp of shock. I grabbed at the potato and tried to pull it out, but it proved itself too strong for me when my mouth stretched painfully as it pushed itself through, a huge bulge running down my neck as it traveled down my throat and landed in my stomach.

Gasping for breath and absolutely horrified by what just happened, I placed a hand on my fattened belly only to, sure enough, feel a magic potato-sized lump inside. However, it began to find room as I began to fatten out, my stomach inflating like a giant water balloon and passing over my widening legs. In addition, the back of the chair crept down my back as I grew taller. At my monstrous size, the chair understandably crumpled under my expanded rear end and threw me onto my ass as I gasped for breath.

My stomach was the size of a giant exercise ball, pushing my ham-like legs apart and barely covered by my rope-like shirt. I had to five feet tall while seated.

"I apologize for the intrusion, human!" A muffled voice from within my belly announced. "But do not fear, my subjects shall be much easier to ingest!"

"GET OUT OF MY BODY, YOU OVERSIZED FARM CROP!!!" I bellowed, but several small "poof!"s from behind me signified the presence of five equally large potatoes, all of which seemed to notice the king-sized human on the ground and shot themselves straight at me.
111113.title: Potatoes.

1111132.content:
I put a hand over my mouth as one of the potatoes tried to force itself into me, putting quite the fight. Slowly, and with considerable labor, I braced my feet on the ground and managed to stand myself up, but my tree-trunk legs buckled under my immense weight.

However, the potato managed to zoom around my head and jab me in the back of my neck, causing me to let out a yelp of pain.

"YA-MMMPH!!!" My eyes widened as the potato forced itself into my mouth and managed to worm itself halfway through, escaping my attempts to pry it out as it went down my throat. Once it was in, my legs blew up to balloon-like proportions, causing me to land backwards and land on my ass with a horrendously loud BOOM!

"PLEASE, STOP!" I begged, only for another potato to force itself in my mouth, the other one right on its tail as one by one I was forced to choke down each. As I expanded, my arms began to hang uselessly at my sides, dangling in the air as the biceps grew too huge for them to bend. At seven feet while seated and growing, I could see less and less of the room as my monstrous gut grew so huge that it began to reach the wall ahead of me.

On top of that, several "poof!"s burst about as one by one more potatoes began appearing in the room, each one ready to cram itself into my face. As hard as I tried to reach forward and defend myself, my blob-like arms put up no fight as the potatoes worked their way into my face and I swallowed them whole. My belly started bending the wall away from me and my head pressing against the ceiling, the potatoes pausing as the ceiling gave way to the pressure as my head burst through.

As I gasped for breath, I could see the living room around me. My head protruded from the ground on a small mound of fat and chins, and I could feel the entire room beneath me filled in by my obscene size. However, a swarm of the potatoes floated in through a door to the basement, and I obviously couldn't fight back as they shot into my mouth and fattened me like a hot air balloon. The floor around me began to swell as pressure beneath built up from my inflating body, and cracks appeared in the hole my head was in until the floor was finally torn apart by my body. My globular belly began to fill up the room as I gained with more speed, the walls breaking away as I grew outward.

Soon enough my head reached the other ceiling and broke through, and my fat tore through the floor of my bedroom with much more ease than before.

From outside, the house seemed to swell out as the windows broke out and soft fat seeped through, but the stretched foundation finally gave way and broke apart as a globular blob of flesh tore the house apart from inside.

"….ugh…" I groaned sickly, barely aware of what happened. As my eyes cleared up, I was horrified to see the blue sky above me. Looking to my sides, my arms by that point were mountains of fat that my hands stood out from, and the only part of my legs that I could feel were my feet, the remainder of my limbs lost in borderline spheres of fat. I couldn't see past my dozens of chins, but I could certainly feel my stomach, which was now larger than house I'd just burst through.
1111132.title: I don't get up...

11112.content:
There was no really discernible taste. Te cake tasted normal, but no desired changes were present. I took a few more bites out of the cake, and sure enough, nothing. It wasn't even soggy. Thankfully, I wasn't choking to death on the ground, but nothing to record.

"No immediate change." I scribbled into a notepad before slipping it into my pocket and standing up. I always thought that the best way to endure research was to briefly forget there even was an experiment, taking breaks between monitoring to notice changes more easily. Heading for the TV room, I plopped myself in an armchair and flipped the TV on.

Okay, the laboratory didn't enforce it, but I'd found it rather invigorating.

It was an hour or so of watching until my watch beeped, indicating a monitoring section. I grabbed my pen and pad from my pocket and narrated as I wrote.

"Mental state: No pain, sickness, or discomfort detectable. No changes in mood or sudden agitations. Physical state…" I looked down at myself for observations, but dropped my pen and pad to the floor in surprise.

My once-average midsection was beginning to form a potbelly, sticking out a few inches more than usual.

"…The hell? Is this bloating?" I gave my stomach a poke, getting a feel of how soft it now felt. However, I could suddenly feel a faint rumble coming from within, and I yelped in shock as it suddenly began to bloat out again, expanding a few more inches.

I sat there in stunned silence before standing myself up with unfamiliar difficulty and heading down the hall. Upon opening the bathroom door and flipping on the lights, I could see myself in the mirror. Sure enough, I'd become fairly plump, my one baggy t-shirt now gripping at my rounded belly, large enough that a sliver of flesh was visible on the bottom of my shirt. In addition, I could feel that my pants now felt less roomy.

"What…the…hell…" I poked at my arm, which now bore a soft paunch. I also gently slapped my belly, which sent a ripple throughout. Waddling (to my misery) up to the bathroom scale, the wheel spun out of control as I stepped my engorged girth upon it, the reading slowly halting on 256.

"…This isn't happening." I whispered to myself. "This…this is all some kind of dream, and soon enough, I'll wake up and this will all be…" But a louder rumble interrupted me as my belly grew even larger and my jeans became skintight, the scale jumping to 341.

"…oh boy."

The steps leading down to the basement began to bow under my newfound weight. I lumberedd for the phone on my desk and hastily dialed the lab, four dial tones beeping until an automated tone came through.

"You've reaches FESPA laboratories, we're sorry to say tha-"

"DAMNIT!" I hollered as I slammed the phone down, but began to feel my stomach growl again as I heard my jeans begin to rip around my big, blobby legs, and my belly growing so large that my shirt covered a third of it as it contained my suddenly existent "breasts". A telltale cracking noise from beneath me appeared as my chair buckled under my insta-fat.

"I…gotta…DO SOMETHING!" I uttered as I thrashed myself to stand up, my body continuing to grow in a stream. I had to weigh well over 400 pounds and still growing. After finally getting on my feet, I lifted my obscene bulk and stood tall, but fell still as I looked above me.

The basement was somewhat small; only a foot from my head. It'd never caused me any problems before, but at that moment, I could just notice that I stood a few inches closer.

I was growing in height as well.

As if in response to my discovery, my stomach let out a vicious grumble as it again started to expand, growing so large as to begin to tear at my shirt as it became like a rope around my torso, and my pants formed more larger tears. I put my fattening arms around my stomach, which pushed away as it began to stick out further and further from me. This time around, I could see myself inch closer and closer to the ceiling. By that point, I must've looked like a head on top of a spherical balloon of obese flesh.

But another feeling erupted within me, my eyes becoming pinpricks and I moaned as my gigantic stomach let out a huge rumble, overwhelmed by a feeling of intense...
11112.title: He doesn't change just yet (spurt/slow gain).

11113.content:
I slowly awoke laid out on the floor. As the world came back, I cringed at the white light around me.

Sitting up, I could see the lab I was in. The lab's walls were solid white, and the lighting was so strong that I couldn't tell how far away the walls were, or even what shape they were.

Looking down, I could see that my entire body save for my head was in a sleek rubber suit. It was completely smooth, and didn't have any distinguishing lumps or folds as it wrapped around my body.

Suddenly, a crackling noise from above appeared and turned to a voice.

"Hello, Mr Jacobs. I trust you're awake?"
11113.title: Alternate scenario.

choices: At a gradual, very slow pace.
111132.content:
"Yeah, I'm awake." I calmly replied as I stood myself up. I never expected the lab to look so ethereal.

"Do you feel physically or mentally composed?"

"Yeah, I'm fine."

"Excellent. Let's get down to business. You're familiar with the experiment at hand, right?"

"Yeah."

"If you'll look onto your shoulder, you should see a little square with some numbers on it."

Sure enough, on my shoulder was a small rectangle made of red lines, the black center filled with numbers. The first two rows I could recognize as 6'1" and 167 pounds.

"The numbers represent your current stats, changing in accordance with your body. It details your, height, weight, and heart rate. As the experiment goes on, we'd like you to describe each of those stats."

"Got it."

"Is there any more briefing you'll require?"

"I think I'm fine."

"Very well, then. The experiment shall hereby commence."

A few seconds later, a whirring noise came from the center of the room as a hatch opened, a small table rising from within. As I approached it, I could see a metal dome on top, as if a baked turkey was beneath. Lifting it away revealed a glass bottle filled with clear fluid.

"Alright, Jacobs, please consume the bottle's entire contents. Be sure to fill us in on any change you feel occurring inside of you."

"Got it…" I replied as I uncorked the bottle cautiously brought it to my lips. It didn't have much of a smell, but almost somewhat of a lemony flavor.

Upon finishing the liquid off, I began to realize how full I felt. I didn't feel sick or any pain, but the small bottle left me feeling as though I'd eaten a huge meal. My stomach even bore a faint bulge.

"I feel full…but aside from that, nothing."

"Any changes in stats?"

"Nothing yet…" I replied as I glanced at my shoulder. However, my eyes widened as the numbers began to change, and I began to gain...
111132.title: "Yeah, I'm awake."

1111322.content:
The weight reading on my shoulder began to rise, and I looked down to see that my bloated stomach was continuing to puff out.

"I-I'm getting bigger!"

"Bigger? How so?"

"Fatter! I'm at…187 pounds, and still growing!"

The black suit didn't feel any tighter as my body began to expand into it. As my belly began to grow over my belt zone, I rubbed at it and felt that it was indeed fat inside.

"Reading?"

"201 pounds, no other change!" I answered fearfully. I knew what I was signing up for, but I'd never expected it to be this fast.

"Alright, try running around! Monitor mobility!"

I began to run, which obviously felt much more difficult given my heavier body. On top of that, I was still growing fatter, gaining a jiggle with each increasingly straining step.

When I stopped, my belly had grown larger than a beach ball, and my arms and legs had thickened out as well. It was save to say I'd entered the definition of "fat".

"Current stats?"

"Weight is…328 pounds!" I replied, somewhat despaired by my now deceased lean build.

"Keep going, Jacobs! We don't need crocodile tears now!"

I could feel my widening legs began to struggle to remain straight under my expanding girth, and turning my head to see the reading was somewhat of a chore given my blobby neck. I'd reached 365 pounds in but a few seconds, soon going on 395…then 430…then 478.

More and more I started to look like a fat blob of black tar, my obese stomach climbing over my knees as it bulged out almost three feet from me. Reaching around it was hard given its engorged width and my inflated arms. My legs also started to strain to keep my obese body upright.

"Weight is 567 pounds!" I hollered out, but was surprised as a bubbling noise from within my stomach caused it to visible ripple, and I suddenly...
1111322.title: At a steady, fast speed.

11113221.content:
I gasped as I noticeably began to fatten up quicker. Looking at my shoulder, I was horrified to notice not only had my gain increased, but my height was increasing inch by inch.

"I…I'M GETTING TALLER!"

"How tall?"

"6'4", 612 pounds!" I uttered, barely trying to contain fear. I was desperately hoping that it would pass, that it was just a temporary side effect, but sure enough I'd reached over seven feet in height, and the black rubber of my suit touched the ground as my globular stomach became so grotesquely large that it passed my legs and reached the floor, allowing me to stand supported on my tree-trunk like legs.

"7'5, 1342 pounds!" I hollered, but the readings were increasing much faster than I could describe them. "No, 8'1, 1732 pounds!"

I began feeling at my behemoth of a stomach as it pushed out further and further from my back. It felt incredibly supple and squishy, emphasizing the gigantic blob I was becoming. My arms reached less of my body at my biceps bloated incredibly large, preventing me from folding them in.

"9'2, 3319 pounds! No, 9'11, 3734 pounds! Wait…"

"You're doing fine, Jacobs! Keep at it!"

"W-What's happening? When does this end?"

"We'll find out once we get as far as we can! Try testing mobility!"

Looking fearfully at my shoulder, I saw that I was growing past ten feet, officially making me the tallest person in history. I struggled to lift my balloon-like leg forward around my stomach, succeeding in moving forward a few feet as my stomach. After another few increasingly laboring steps, I managed to trudge forward several more feet.

"Walking is possible…but extremely difficult! Weight reading is…" I turned my head to look at the small reading on my incredibly swollen arm. "12'4", 7327 pounds!"

"Excellent work, Jacobs!"

I struggled to stay upright as the exhaustion of the "workout" I'd endured overcame me and I swayed back, failing to maintain balance as I fell backwards and landed on my gigantic butt with an incredibly loud WHAM!!!

"Don't be sitting around, Jacobs! We've got work to do!"

"I'm…TRYING!!!" I uttered through gritted teeth as I tried to heave my monstrous body forward, but to no avail as my ass never left the ground. My body still continued to gain weight, and the suit I wore still managed to stretch around my behemoth stomach as I blew up into a gigantic fat ball. My blobby legs were pushed apart to accommodate my stomach's immense size, and I watched fearfully as I noticed the ground stretch further away.

However, my belly let out an insanely loud rumble that gave it a generous shake, sweat dripping down as I...
11113221.title: ...began growing in height.

choices: My slow weight gain/growth spurt starts up again.
My weight gain/growth spurt suddenly speeds up very quickly.
1112.content:
I was but a normal sized anthropomorphic animated 5'10 213 LBS 27 year old cream fur colored golden retriever who goes by the name of Whopper, who one day visited a cold stone creamery parlor in New York City, and purchased a vanilla milkshake having already went outside to drink it little realizing what was about to happen next.

Soon enough, i finished my milkshake and felt pretty content until my slow weight gain/growth spurt started until it suddenly stopped and then i quickly realized i was now a 7' tall 600 LBS being.
1112.title: Story 2

1113.content:
Once the final nail was pounded into the door, I glanced uneasily at the clock on the fireplace. 11:54, only six minutes left to go. Thankfully, all the windows and doors had been properly boarded up, but the idea of what'd I'd become still chilled me to the bone.

The cabin was may miles away from the nearest town, and I'd made sure to make myself as alone as possible. I had no idea how strong I'd become, or whether or not the entire place was barricaded enough to prevent me from escaping. That's what made it scary; not knowing whether or not I could control what would happen.

Nonetheless, I did all that I could. Every singly possible exit in the home was locked, chained, and boarded tight, so much that a fly could't get in. The only door I'd left open was for the basement, which I filled with food as a second precaution.

Anything the least bit appetizing that I could get my hands on I bought in massive bulk, filling the food with shelves upon shelves of food, so much that any living thing attempting to eat it all would at least die in one sitting.

I'd hoped it would all serve to distract me until morning, or at least make me so fat as to render me immobile.

As I peered in a teeny slit in one of the board windows, I gulped as I saw a cloud drift across the sky, exposing the full moon. The clock behind me chimed midnight, a sound that now filled me with dread.

…and then it started happening.

A very tingly feeling began growing in my chest, which slowly spread across my torso and caused me to double over with a groan. I slowly but visibly began to grow bigger as the bones in my body began to stretch, the clothes I wore growing tight as my muscles expanded.

The nausea in my system slowly ebbed away into a hunger the likes of which I'd never felt before, my human nature reforming into primal instinct as my for became that of...
1113.title: Story 3

choices: There's going to be a drastic change as the blood changes Jason into an anthro?!
There's going to be a subtle change over time?
11133.content:
In this world there's humans and anthros living peacefully together. The anthro-humans live along side the regular humans but there are key differences. The first one is that anthro-humans tend to be bigger, most averaging around eight feet tall, some up to twelve feet tall. They're bigger and stronger, but they tend to cap off at the intellectual level of a 16 year old human. So you see a lot of anthro-humans working in the trades, as bouncers, as shelf loaders, farmers and more. You would never see an anthro-human doing your taxes. The anthro-humans tend to live outside of big cities and more in rural areas where there is more room to stretch.
All the anthro-humans in this world are ground mammal based so there are no bird, lizards or whale anthro-humans, but there are skeleton remains of them.
There is also now human and anthro-human hybrids after centuries of keeping the two separate. In the last thirty years the societies have started to come together more. There were transitions, a few harsh. The NFL fell to pieces because who would want to watch a few scrawny humans play football when you can watch monsters of bears, bulls, dogs, gorillas and even rino humans play? Oh and don't even get me started on on the porn industry. Human guys have been going in for penis enlargement surgery just to try to complete with some of the anthro-human guys.


That brings us to Jason, our main character. He's a regular mid 20 something guy, 5'9" and about 130 pounds, brown hair and some fuzz on his chin. He just got into a car crash and got a few nasty bruises and cuts. He lost enough blood to require a blood transfusion..

Jason felt like he had been hit by a bus or that 10 foot tall bear that plays for the Chicago Bears. Everything a he'd. His neck and back were sorry and he felt like he was tied down.
He slowly opened his eyes and the ringing in his ears let in the sounds of an hospital room and two arguing people in front of him.
"...well how was I suppose to know?" came one muffled voice.
"The 'H' on the request," said the other man," Who knows what will happen to this kid."
"Well the kid has a unique need and we didn't have any human blood of his kind in," came the first voice, either a technician or a nurse.
"Shit.. well we will have to see if he reacts to it or not," said the second man, likely the doctor.
Then it hit Jason, he had received some anthro-human blood! What's going to happen?!
11133.title: A Donation of Blood

111331.content:
“...ACK?!”

The pained shriek that Jason tried to emit couldn’t even start off as a breath, his chest occupied by a burning, tingling pain that kept him from taking any air in to help him alert the two doctors leaving his wing, their bickering keeping them from noticing his vitals peaking. His heart pounded at the inside of his rib cage as the alien blood traveled to the last points of his feet and fingers, the stinging sensation coursing out through all his muscles and seizing him of any control, leaving him hot, sweaty, and paralyzed from getting himself any aid.

Tears streaming from his eyes, Jason opened one enough to stare down at his own body, and whimpered at the sight of something about him under the blankts visibly changing, even with their covers. He could see what little pectorals he might’ve owned before developing into two thick slabs of muscle, bulking up enough to audibly stretch the chest of his garbs, and he could feel the sleeves digging into his shoulders as his biceps expanded with the muscle mass gained from a lifetime spent lifting and eating red meat. Even his legs were growing; not just in sinewy bulk, but with a considerable spurt in height as well, his entire frame surging upwards over half a foot in seconds, and accelerated to put a full one on top of that, as well.

With his shoulders widening close to the width of the bed, his heavy legs shifting around uncomfortably for room, Jason watched in fascination as the tingling pain muted over to but a stinging numbness. The bed creaked beneath the extra few hundred pounds of mass resting on top, but he managed a smile as his garbs shrank to conform around his ballooning body and loudly shred around his arms, barely requiring a flex to expand several inches beyond what his sleeves could contain. He opened up his collar to see the results up close, excited to see the results...

...only for his smile to plummet at a field of thick hair spouting from his chest like uncut grass. Even worse, his view of his brilliantly chiseled six-pack only lasted for a few seconds before any definition to his abdomen disappeared.

Feeling at his swelling middle, Jason was horrified to realize how soft it was, giving barely any hint to the strength lying underneath; the growth of his muscles slowed down to a crawl, but the bed still groaned and flexed underneath him as his weight skyrocketed, his stomach rapidly inflating under his garbs before shredding through the front like a giant, fleshy yoga ball, its skin displaying a haggard amount of hair spreading down from the chest and around the naval, shrouding him in what was due to become a coat of fur. Those solid pectorals he’d been ogling blossomed into a feminine set of man-breasts that snapped apart what little of the garbs lay clothed on his body. His arms and legs ballooned by several times their newfound girths as his body gained in fat twice the mass he’d gained in muscle, then double that, before his super-sized buttocks poured through guardrails to his bed and tore them from the frame, the mechanics in the bed finally giving with a sickening crunch beneath his evergrowing tonnage.

In some vain attempt to keep its relentless expansion contained, Jason grasped his stomach with his hands and pushed down, fighting a losing battle as his stomach continued to rise, foot by foot. By that point it was completely covered in fur, and the excessive hair was traveling down his arms and legs. It was invisible beneath all his blubber, but in the back of his head he could feel the hair growth twisting around the joints and bones of his skeleton into more animalistic anatomies as it spread past, and his eyes fluttered as his IQ dropped by a few dozen points, shedding off a majority of his college education. S large as his gut was becoming, he was wracked by how empty it was; he needed to EAT.

As the fur covered his plumpened hands and fingers, their fattened digits transformed into that of his donors, all that remained was his head, the fur pausing in its growth before coating what remained of his humanity in one foul swoop, completely transforming his face into that of...
111331.title: There's going to be a drastic change as the...

11212.content:
Attack of the 50 ft fatty animated anthro.

Brief overview:

An experiment at a laboratory goes horribly wrong and transforms a person into that of a fat giant animated furry. All the while his appetite for food increases hundredfold while looking for food to devour. Soon the world will be ruled by a huge, yet massive fat giant animated furry.

Our protagonist is your basic schmo or schmuck who has yet to grow, but however this will change very quickly in the blink of an eye.

You may choose to follow this or start a new story.
11212.title: Alternate scenario

112121.content:
"Alright, Mr. Franks, if you just sing here we'll be all set."

I quickly swirled my signature across the dotted line on the sheet of paper.

I was both scared and excited at the same time. On one hand, being the test subject in a research laboratory could easily be a turnoff for anybody wanting to come home with the same number of arms. On another hand, though, fifty bucks an hour just for testing blenders.

"I just want to know again…nothing here's gonna mutate me or kill me, right?"

"Mr. Franks, the user is always the top priority here at alva industries. None of our finest employees would even dream of putting a life at risk."

"You sure? What am I gonna be testing?"

"The culinary section. Just testing to see if our products work in your grip, maybe even taste-test stuff they'd made."

"Huh…that sounds nice. When do I begin again?"

"In ten minutes."

"Ten minutes!? But-"

"Section 42B, don't be late!"

Although I had a lot more words to argue with, I ran out of the office, not wanting to be late for my new job.

…..


The testing room was blindingly simple; just a room the size of a classroom with plain white walls, save for a window that looked like a black strip on the white scenery.

"Alright, Mr. Franks, how're you feeling today?"

"Fine, I guess…"

"Great, now we're gonna send in our first project; the Alva Super Toastertm."

A panel in the wall opened, allowing a man in a white hazmat suit to enter, much to my trepidation.

"Wait a minute…why's he wearing that thing?" I asked incredulously.

"The toaster's powered by a small dosage of radiation, whi-"

"RADIATION!!??

"A non-lethal dosage. The suit is merely a means of establishing a control."

Before I could rebut, the toaster's timer popped, and a piece of toast shot out.

"All you have to do is eat the toast, and tell us how you feel."

"Fuck that, I'm not eating radioactive!"

"It's non-lethal, Franks, no more than you'd find in a smoke detector! Not doing so is in violation of denying anything the industry deems safe and operational."

Non-lethal…on one hand I was ready to run out of the lab screaming for sanctuary, but on the other hand, cash at the expense of a contract.

The toast stood steaming in the toaster, waiting for my reply. With a shrug, I plucked it from the slot and took a few bites. It didn't taste any different from normal toast.

"How you feeling, Franks?"

"Fine, I guess. Nothing's really…" But I stopped as I felt my shirt stringing around my arms, becoming tighter. My legs also began to feel more cramped within my pants, as though they were shrinking.

The floor moving downward didn't support that claim.

"WHAT THE-!? I'M GROWING!!!"

"Any other changes?"

"I DON'T CARE ABOUT ANY OTHER CHANGES!!! WHAT'D YOU GUYS DO TO ME?"

Once my clothes grew skintight, just on the verge of ripping, my growth thankfully came to a halt at about eight feet tall. I was about to vent both my relief and fury upon the scientists when a loud rumble came from my stomach. Putting my hands on my abdomen, I jumped slightly as my stomach filled up quickly, as though the toast was expanding within me. My shirt and pants zipper were torn apart as my stomach inflated like a balloon, my sleeves and pants tearing as my arms and legs got fatter.

"WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON?! WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME!!?"

"Scientific process, Frank! All part of the future!"

I didn't bother to retort as my stomach fattened to the point where it draped over my knees, puffing out further and further. Soon enough it touched the ground, and by that point my obese body had grown so wide that I looked like some sort of fleshy balloon. My arms and legs were bulging like round globules of fat, hanging pathetically compared to my monster of a belly, which stuck out so far that it looked like an gigantic beach ball sitting in front of me.

"What ju…how could…but…" I stammered in horror. I tried to wrap my arms around my gargantuan gut, proving an impossible feat for me. But my insane transformation was taken to absurd levels as I felt something spread across my body, which turned out to be...
112121.title: Go with this story.

11213.content:
In the future, alien life is found on another planet in the form of strange, anthropomorphized animals. With a friendly first encounter, a program is set up to let an anthro live with a human for a certain amount of time to better acquaint their cultures.

It runs smoothly at first, but Earth's atmosphere yield an unusual effect on its visitors...
11213.title: The Merge

choices: …how about a different home and guy?
112131.content:
"So, did they get there yet?" Jamie asked.

"Not yet, but they should any minute now." I responded. Part of me was excited at the chance of meeting whoever it was, but at the same time a twinge of dread was pulling me back. I'd never been the best at meeting people, an being paired up with somebody from another species didn't help much. "…oh, god, I'm so nervous…"

"It's nothing to worry about, man. From what I hear, most Anthros are actually pretty friendly when you get to know them. Hell, me and Gina get along great!"

"Well, yeah, but at the same time you have to admit it's strange to let someone from another planet and species into your house!"

"Again, don't worry about it. Sure, it's weird for me to have to stock up on hay for Gina…and she does tend to chow down on everything in the fridge, but aside from that she's no different from having a person around."

"…I guess." I sighed.

"Just relax. You'll do great!"

"Thanks. Hey, Jamie, I gotta go. I want to make sure everything's all set up."

"See you later, man!"

"Alright, bye!"

After hanging up the phone I ran to the window, checking the streets for anything arriving. Aside from a few parked cars, outside, nothing was driving up to the house.

I ran upstairs and into the room next to mine, scanning it over to make sure it was clean. The bed was made, the mirror was cleaned, the drawers were emptied, and the TV and DVD player were all hooked up, even with the manual on top of the screen.

"Alright…seems good enough." I muttered to myself, walking around the bed. A black sock laid under the edge of the blanket, which I crouched down to pick up.

But on the floor I heard a car drive along the road and stop, sounding close to my house. I peeked over the edge of the windowsill to see a yellow taxi van parked in front of my house, the passenger door opening, and through it came...
112131.title: *The Odd Couple theme*

choices: "Can I get something to eat? I'm starving!"
1121311.content:
She was a bird with a slim body covered by smooth brown and white feathers, sporting a petite black beak in place of a nose and lips. She was dressed in blue jeans and a denim jacket on top of a striped top, her long hair banded in the back into a ponytail.

As she thanked the driver and opened the door to the back seat to get her bags, I ran down the steps to the front door, but hesitated before opening it.

"Alright. Just say hello, be polite an offer her bags. She's not gonna bite your head off, or anything!"

But just as I was about to open the door it was knocked, and upon pulling it open she looked surprised to see it do so.

"Wow, that was fast!" She chuckled.

"Heh, sorry about that. I just saw you guys coming through the window upstairs and ran down to see if you guys needed any help."

"Thanks. You're Stan by the way, right?"

"Yeah. And you're Amira?"

"Mm-hmm! I'd shake your hand right now, but I'm a little preoccupied at the moment." In her left hand were two suitcases, the other carrying a guitar case.

"Got any other bags? I can get them for you and show you the guest room."

"Thanks! I've got two in the taxi still."

I ran outside to the taxi and reached into the backseat, pulling out two bags on the seat furthest away and heading back into the house, the taxi driver shutting the door and driving off. Inside I motioned her to follow me up the steps, the creaking of both our footsteps filling the staircase.

"So, how's this look?" I asked as I lead her into the guest room, placing the bags on the floor away from her bed.

"Not bad!" She whistled, stepping to a corner of the room.

"So, anything I should immediately know about you before we get settled in?"

"Don't touch my guitar, alright?" She warned as she knelt down and snapped open its case. It had a smooth red finish with a long, black neck with silver knobs at the end. "Aside from that, we should do just fine."

"Don't worry, I promise I won't touch it!" I vowed. She took out a stand from the case and set it in the corner, but as she gently pulled out the guitar I noticed something seemed…off about her.

While bent down, her legs seemed to be a bit puffier, and her butt actually looked bigger as well, her jeans looking a bit tighter than I immediately noticed. After setting the guitar up she stood up with a tiny amount of difficulty, and I could see that her stomach seemed a bit bigger as well.

Huh…must've been the bags on her sides. I deduced. "So, Amira, anything I can get you right now?"
1121311.title: Anthro choice #1

112132.content:
A knock on the door got me away from my game as I rushed over quickly checking if my zipper was up "When did I have mustard?" I asked looking at an embarrassingly big mustard stain on my pants, I shrugged it off and opened my door, the my horror it looked like a woman in her thirties in a robe. Which I knew all to well why.

"Hail Plainsmen of the coil. I come asking for a favor." She said

"Uh yeah I-I don't have any money." I said but she laughed

"The convent doesn't need such things. We need a witness." She said

"A... witness. You're not breaking the law are you?" I asked

Once more she laughed "Not at all. The ritual requires an outside to observe in case we need testimony to the divines to show our deeds were preformed in truth." She said

"And you just need me to watch?" I asked

"Yep!" She said

"Alright." I shrugged and she clapped excitedly "Wonderful! Right this way." She said as she all but skipped back to the weird house down the street, I knew about their weird cult but they didn't really do anything. Just huddle around the house, do some chants here and there. Sometimes trying to sell weird looking cookies or something. I just ignored them for the most part. As she brought me in through the door I was at ill ease. While none of the women there were off putting... anymore than a bunch of smiling ladies in matching robes could be... the place was musty and every wall had a myriad of crazy symbols and patterns scrawled on them

"Soul Keeper, I have the witness." The one that brought me said to one of them with a special hood that had some kind of holy symbol made of gold perched on her hood

"Wonderful! Please stand right here." She said pointing to a definite eye with a pupil made of more crazy symbols swirling into an oval.

"Ebbing kindling, listen for we have our witness. The passing can now commence." The Soul keeper explained

"Toe nook!" They responded gingerly before bowing in unison.

"And now..." The Soul Keeper exclaimed, holding out a vial with something pink inside. Two other robed figures came in front of her with a brass cauldron filled with water. "It begins."

She uncorked the vial and dropped it into the cauldron, and immediately, a mushroom cloud of black smoke erupted out that rapidly filled the entire room, burning my eyes as it came down all around me. They didn't fight it off as the gas surrounded them all, but I barely had to breath to begin coughing, the rancid air quickly numbing my brain, and I slumped down in the floor, barely able to tell when my eyes were closed as the all the blackness became so strong, and soon it all overcame my brain...

----

After the police got my statement I shambled home. With being unconscious for so long, by some miracle I managed some sleep. But when I got up that morning the was another knock at the door when I opened it I was shocked to be looked down at from at least eight feet in height with a loving smile from some kind of white furred wolf-woman with bizarre bull horns, claw like finger nails, black eyes with grey pupils and a dragon tail covered in fur, I could tell because she was completely naked with some bizarre symbol burned on her left breast and a spike piercing on her left nipple "Hello, husband." She greeted sweetly before letting herself in, looking at her waddle I saw she had thick sea foam green hair hanging down to her giant butt in natural curls "Let me make you breakfast."

"H-Husband!? What are you!? Why are you in my house!? Ho-how is this happening I-" But my questions were halted by another giddy laugh

"Oh Husband you are so funny." I was floored as some purple tusked alligator woman of similar stature walked in but she also had feathered wings, her eyes glowed with an orange hue as well as stegosauri spikes along her back, she too had weird symbols along her body and her lips were much larger with blue lipstick

"You witnessed the passing so by the divine's law we are all your devote wives." She said pointing to my yard which was full of them, each one another crazy and huge creature that looked to have parts of other creatures added onto her each with a different set of strange symbols while some of them simply glowed an aura of differing colors

But emerging through them was a man in a jumpsuit "Paul Bennetty?" He asked

"Y-yeah." I said

"I'm here to repossess your TV." He said

"I-Oh shit. Look pal I'll pay it off my checks are off cause of the holidays." I said

"Yeah I'm real sorry pal but my boss wants it done." He said advancing before a cleaver fell just short of his shoes shearing the toe off and slicing the steel toe

"How dare you! Be gone insolent worm! Lest we cleave you to sunder!" Out of the lot of them a bunny girl with giant ears going down to her waist studded in uniform dangling above several fox tails and a snake tongue coming out of her mouth, holding a gigantic cleaver with eyes sobbing black tears on either side of the blade clutched in her hand

"Holy shit!" I yelled and the repoman was frozen as the rest of them seemed to crowd around him with horrifying demonic weapons appearing in their hands pointed at him.

"Husband, do you desire anything else?" The bunny asked innocently

"T-Time out! you can't threaten people like this!" I said trying to push my way through them. They instantly kneeled and the repoman started running before an iron hand grabbed him by the leg making him fall on his face, he turned over and started crying

"L-listen guy forget about this! I just want to see my family!" He pleaded

"Sorry!" I yelled to him "Let him go!" I said

"You don't want to punish him?" A tiger woman asked

"No! He's just doing his job! Let him go!" I said

"So wise, Husband." A shark girl said making the fist receded and the man ran away crying

"Huh... I'm probably going to jail." I said but all of them assembled around me pressing their amble weight against me in a comforting manner

"We will take the blame for you, Husband! We live for you!" The wolf lady said

"St-stop it! Okay so I doubt there's any way out of this so I'm making some ground rules. Don't attack people just because their not being nice. Also clothes! Please just put some clothes on!" I said "Why are you even these... animal people!?" I asked

"Oh we didn't choose these bodies. The passing transformed us to your desires." A pony girl said

That truly had me stumped...
112132.title: Oh snap. Here I go.

1122.content:
In the future, being fat has become almost a fashion trend, with a third of the population fattening themselves for their own exploits.

In addition, the process increases their size, growing to obese giants.

The main character is one who decides to leap on the bandwagon, which begins as he...
1122.title: Story 5

11222.content:
Stepping out of the bus, I could see that the resort looked almost exactly like it did in the flyer; a sleek, tall building surrounded by trees and glass domes. With luck, the service would be the same as foretold.

Many years ago, what'd started out as a freak lab experiment exploded into one of the most bizarre, albeit popular fashion trends in history. Contrary to the opinions of some on weight gain, people would begin fattening themselves up to monstrous weights. They'd even begin to increase their heights as well, growing into insanely obese giants ranging from eight to fifty feet tall.

It'd been an expensive process, however, only affordable towards the rich. I'd never constantly dreamed about it, being skinny as a rail, but a pretty big recent lottery winning gave me a chance to jump the bandwagon, and I decided to jump on with a shrug.

The main lounge was scarcely decorated, boasting a very sleek, futuristic style to the walls and furniture. I was surprised at how little fat people there were inside the lounge when the office doors nearby slid open, and my jaw slacked open in amazement.

Out of the office came the most massive woman I'd ever seen. She'd had to be at least eight feet tall, and almost as wide as she walked on two tree trunk legs trapped in black jeans beneath a jiggling, monstrous gut that stood out incredibly far and was halfway exposed by her shirt.

She seated her mammoth-sized rear on a seat behind the front desk and began typing away at a keyboard. Once I'd snapped out of my daze and began to approach her, I could see she was squeezed in a miraculously intact white dress shirt that left her monstrous breasts half exposed, her chin almost resting in her cleavage. For somebody of such massive proportions, she was also somewhat attractive, with a clean look and brown hair tied back in a bun.

She didn't notice me approach, but her head perked up as I pressed a buzzer on the desk.

"May I help you?" She politely inquired.

"Uh, yeah…I'm here for…the thing…" I stammered, and she giggled in response.

"Sure thing just gotta get the paperwork ready."

She began typing away at her keyboard, several sheets of paper scrolling out of her printer.

"Ready for the big life, huh?"

"Just seemed kind of interesting, I guess."

"Ah, a first-timer! They say first-timers have the most fun here."

Once ten sheets of paper were printed out, she handed me the stack along with a pen. Most of it ws personal information and payment methods, until I reached my desired height, which I put down as...
11222.title: …arrives at the fattening resort.

112222.content:
"Huge but not extreme huge, huh? Alright, then!" She replied as she stuffed the stack into a drawer in her desk. She reached for a microphone on her desk and started to speak.

"Sherry to the lounge, we have a 2A." Her voice resounded from the speakers as she spoke. After a few minutes, the double doors nearby parted, and I gasped at the behemoth that trudged in.

She almost didn't look like a human as much as she did chubby head on a huge balloon of fat, so huge that she was force to maneuver about on a gigantic wagon that allowed her to skid about on feet sprouting from her blobby legs. She had to be at least ten feet tall whilst seated, with a spherical, monstrous belly atop which two huge breasts lay. She was also dressed in an outfit similar to the other clerk's, but obviously larger to accommodate her leviathan girth.

"Is there a…James Dufrey here?" She chirped in a perky voice.

"Uh…here!" I announced as I approached the titanic woman, who glanced over her blobby shoulder to see me.

"Oh, hello, there! How're you doing?"

"I'm doing fine. You?"

"Just peachy. Ready to get settled in?"

"Sure. That was quick…"

"It's how we do things here. C'mon, follow me!" She began scooting her ludicrous bulk towards the doors, and I gave a nod to the clerk as she waved me goodbye.

She began leading me to my room, going through the assorted facilities of the resort on the way. Sure enough, I couldn't see a single thin person anywhere. Everyone was bloated and fattened to ridiculous proportions, some of which were the size and volumes of houses. Many were lounging about or stuffing themselves with food. Soon enough, I, too, would be going for the ride.

We reached a tower with enormous double doors before each room. Inside, my room had to be twenty feet tall, with a bed just as square.

"Woah…this place is huge!"

"The place makes the man, we always say. Anything else you need?"
112222.title: Twelve feet.

1122222.content:
"I'm getting ready for supper, if that's fine."

"It's more than fine! It's why you're here, after all." She laughed as she skidded for the door. "I'll go set out an order for you."

"Thank you!"

"No problem. Enjoy your stay!" She called back as she left the room.

A few minutes later the doors sprang back open and a huge, spherical woman trudged in. She was about seven feet tall with a belly hanging to the ground, and was pushing a cart in with a plate on top. It's contents surprised me; there was a burger about the size of my head, a literal bucket of fries, and a two-liter gallon of soda.

"Alright, here's your first supper here!" She cheerfully announced.

"Well, uh…thanks, but I don't know if I can finish this all!"

"There's actually stuff in there to increase your appetite. You'll see!"

After placing my plate on the dining table, she left with a wave. I looked down wearily at the plate as I sat myself down, having no idea how I was going to finish this all off.

Lifting the abnormally head burger to my lips, I took as large a bite as I could. My eyes widened as I was met with an amazing taste the likes of which I'd never eaten; it was probably the best I'd ever had! Any thought of not being able to finish dinner were long forgotten as I took a far more greedy bite, overwhelmed by the food's incredible taste…

…..


After chugging down the last of the soda, I threw the bottle behind me, a gurgle in my stomach traveling up my throat in the form of a huge belch.

"*UURRAAAARRRRPP…..yeah, that's nice…" I muttered to myself as I held at my distended stomach, which had bloated outward several inches to contain my dinner. None of it was left on the plates, all f which I'd solved down to the last crumb.

My food-induced stupor was interrupted by a buzzing on the intercom nearby, and I softly groaned as I lifted my food baby out of the seat and walked up to the wall.

"It's your bedtime, Mr. Dufrey."

"Got it. G'night."

"Have a good sleep, sir."

After dressing myself in some pajamas and washing myself for the night, I jumped into bed. It felt incredibly soft and comfortable, far better than any hotel I'd ever stayed in.

With a hand over my round, somewhat warm stomach, I drifted into sleep with a small smile.
1122222.title: "I'm getting kinda hungry."

11222222.content:
I gave a reluctant sigh as the alarm clock began going off, lazily reaching my heavy arm over to slam it shut. As I'd spent more time at the resort, the bed seemed to become more comfy with each night, given my softer body.

Regardless, I slowly rolled over and sat myself on the edge of the bed. I smiled as I looked down at my colossal stomach, which as of late completely covered my chubby lap. It still amazed me how quick this whole thing was happening.

After pushing myself off the bed, I waddled over to a wide scale near the wall, connected to a small monitor on the wall. After stepping onto the scale, red numbers spun wildly before settling on 349 pounds. A stripe of lines and numbers traveled up the wall, which I put my back against and held my thumb on the spot where my head reached.

"6'5"!" I announced a I stepped away, both and surprised. That was six inches since I'd came here!

I settled for a large pair of jeans and a t-shirt to wear, and a tone emanated from the door as I was stepping out of the dressing room.

"Room service!" The humongous woman who gave me my first meal here walked in, pushing a cart filled with plates of food. Licking my lips in anticipation, I sat in a wide chair as she laid out five plates piled with mouthwatering food.

"Will that be all, sir?"

"It'll do just fine!" I replied excitedly as I forked over a large bite of pancakes and chowed down, giving a satisfied sigh as I chewed away. The waitress gave a giggle before she pulled the cart away and left the room.

An hour or so passed as I indulged myself, stuffing down every last bite. My stomach was even rounder and bigger as I licked off the remaining syrup on each plate, the other ones barren dry.

"Man, that *urp* hit the spot!" I laughed with a hand on my bulging gut. With my meal done, I pushed myself out of my chair and waddled to the wardrobe and slipped on a warm hoodie. I hugged my belly as I put a hand in each pocket, and walked out the door en route for...
11222222.title: Two weeks later...

112222222.content:
Seeing as it was fairly early in the morning, the pool area was almost empty. The entire place was larger than a warehouse, with over a dozen pools and hundreds of hot tub areas from wall to wall. The largest pool had to be the size of a football field, which a house-sized woman was taking a swim in.

I came out of the changing room clad in a yellow pair of rubber swimtrunks, which were stretched snugly on my girth legs. My gut hung over the trunks and stuck out proudly, which I affectionately patted as I headed towards the water.

I decided to take a dip in...
112222222.title: 'the pool!

11223.title: Fat girlfriend?

112231.content:
Okay. Now how does this happen?

Mark of the Beast: the main character's girlfriend and/or wife in one way or another is transformed into a beast straight from mythological with massive growth and weight gain as a side effect.
112231.title: Seismic Spouse

1122311.content:
Welcome Bogies and Gargouilles. Presented below is one of several story lines in this path that will show WG, Growth and TF of a more mythical persuasion.

The Pegasus Ring

It begun in a mysterious shop, looking as if it was the domicile of a wizard and on the table in the middle of the room stood a minotaur’s skull covered in jewelry ready for sell. However, there was one in particular that is the center of our story. This ring was a pink diamond ring with two images of pegasi at the sides of the crystals. It let out a bright glow.

It is just as well, for at that time, a young man by the name of Ryan was walking into the store. He was planning to propose to his girlfriend later in the day, but all he needed was a ring. “Hello?” called Ryan as he walked in. Is anyone in here?” However, there was nobody at the main counter of the store. Ryan walked in and saw the pink diamond ring in the center of the table glow. He was immediately enticed by the pegasus ring and walked forward. “Amazing,” he said. “A diamond ring. It’s just April’s color. Horses are her favorite animal. She’ll love it.”

Ryan reached for the ring when suddenly the minotaur skull opened its mouth. “I advise you to seek another ring,” said the minotaur’s skull in a deep voice. “This is the enchanted king of pegasus.” Ryan was initially shocked, but figured that it was nothing more than mere ventriloquism and didn’t pay the skull any heed. “What is wrong with you?” he asked. “Whoever you are, this isn’t funny. Come and face your customer. I want to buy this ring for my girlfriend.” “This is no shop for the likes of you,” said the skull. “And once that ring finds a finger, there’s no turning back.”

Ryan let out a scoff. “That’s what I want. Find, if you’re gonna be that way, I’ll just assume the ring is free.” Ryan put the ring in his pocket and then walked away. The skull just made its eyes glow. “Nobody ever listens. Just promise that you’ll be happy with the results.” With that, the lights suddenly went off. It wasn’t long before Ryan and his girlfriend, April were having a picnic on the hill and looking up at the sunlight.

“It’s so beautiful,” said April as she looked up at the sunset. “The sunset.” “I can think of something more beautiful.” Said Ryan as he held his girlfriend’s shoulder. “Oh you.” Said April. As April giggled, Ryan smiled and reached into his pocket. Ryan handed April a bottle of coke and April was about to drink from it when she gasped and spotted the pegasus ring before letting out a smile. “Oh Ryan,” she said. “You little trickster.” Ryan let out a laugh. “So what’s you answer, my little pony?” He asked in a joking tune. April quickly slipped on the pegasus ring. “Yes,” she said. “Yes. I’ll marry you.”

As the young couple sealed it with a kiss, neither of them noticed the ring glowing or letting out an ominous neigh.
1122311.title: Mark of the Beast - Story 1

choices: She turns back to human form!
11223111.content:
The night had long fallen as they returned home, still laughing after their first night as fiancés. Ryan immediately headed for the living room and sat on the couch with a relaxed sigh, April joining him on the other end.

"So…" She began with a sigh. "...we got a date planned, or something?"

"I haven't got a ceremony planned straight-up, but I'm thinking next spring."

"Anyplace specific where you want it to be?"

"Eh, I'm not picky. Just as long as the ceremony's nice."

"Same here. Can I have the ring?"

"Sure, here." Ryan pulled the small box out of his pocket and gave it to her, who smiled at the sight of the bright-pink gem inside. The jewel seemed to glow purple as she slid it onto her finger, observing it at arms reach.

"It's so beautiful…where'd you find it?"

"Let's just say that life has a way of bringing you such treasured little wonders…"

"Aww, you dork…" She chuckled as she jabbed her elbow at him. "Wanna watch a DVD?"

"Sure, whatcha got?"

"Well, let's see…" she pushed herself off the couch with slight strain and walked to the shelves of cases, but stopped in the middle of the room to scratch at her face, groaning slightly.

"Sweetie, you alright?"

"It…It's my face, it's…" But she didn't as she covered her tingling face with her hands, which were pushed away by her nose and mouth as they stretched from her head and melded into a long, square snout. Her ears also stretched and grew into points, and the skin on her arm turned to a light brown as a soft pelt gradually formed along her body. From behind, Ryan only stared in stunned shock as a black, bushy tail sprouted from her back above her pants, and two appendages grew from her shoulders that stretched through her collar that formed wings as they sprouted long feathers.

Blinking her eyes, the itching now subsided, April turned around to face her spouse who returned with a look of horror. The only semblance she bore to herself was her messy black hair, along with the clothes she'd been wearing.

"I…" She softly began, breaking the stupor filling the room. "I feel…ugh…"

She held at her stomach as it began to expand, tightening her shirt until a button popped off and exposed the brown-furred flesh beneath. Her paunchy legs started to buckle under her newfound weight as her once slim body blew up bigger and further, pouring itself out of her clothes.

Ryan'd practically forgotten the entire english language as he watched her transformation happen before his eyes. Along with her spontaneous weight gain, she started growing taller as well, making him seem like a toothpick compared to her mammoth-like form. Her clothes miraculously stretched but did little to conceal as foot by foot and several hundreds of pounds of fat by the second filled her, sending her closer to the ceiling and filling up a good chunk of the room.

Finally she was forced to crouch as she came temptingly close to the ceiling, but her extreme size sent her falling back onto her ass with a massive WHUMP!!! Her growth seemed to hasten and sent her closer to the top of the room again, but thankfully came to a stop only inches away.

Any sign of the slim woman she used to be was absolutely gone. Her stomach was so large that it filled in all the space between her blimp-like legs, puffing out several feet beyond what were now hooves. Her shirt was strained so much that it only hung on by one button, wrapping around a small part of her gigantic breasts.

"Wh-wh-wha…" She began, hoping this was all a dream. "WHAT HAPPENED TO ME?!"

"I-I-I-I-I don't know!" Ryan stammered. "I just…but this…"

"WHERE'D YOU GET THAT RING?"

"I, uh…oh…" He nervously began. "I…I was at this weird store and they had all this weird magical stuff, I guess…and they had this ring out that I though was for free, and I just-"

"MAGICAL!? WHAT ARE…wait a minute...YOU GOT ME A FREE RING?!" She snarled, her wings flaring.

"I-I thought the guy was bluffing! I didn't-"

"WELL, LET'S GET RID OF THE THING!!!" She screeched as she grabbed the ring and yanked it off her pudgy finger.
11223111.title: Go with this Storyline

choices: Ryan Runs Back to the Store to Confront the Shopkeeper
112231112.content:
April removed the ring from her fat finger, but even after the ring had been removed, she was still a pegasus and looked in horror. "What?! I was certain that..." "The voice said that there was no turning back," said Ryan in horror. "Maybe that's what he meant?" "Wait," said the horse giantess who was now three times the height of her fiancé. "Who sold... nay... who gave you this ring."

Ryan looked up at the giant winged horse woman as she glared at him and crossed her arms. "Nobody did. I just took it and..." April was even more outraged upon hearing that. "You mean you gave me a stolen ring?! That's worse than a free ring!" Not even married yet and already Ryan was in the doghouse. April heard a snapping noise and looked back to see that her now couch-sized butt had swelled up and caused her pants and underwear to snap. April let out a frantic neigh and then watched as her shirt stretched out as the last button came off. Karmically, hitting Ryan in the forehead.

April saw that as her body was growing bigger and fatter, her wings were actually glowing with bright silver colored sparkles. She looked nervously but Ryan could only look in awe as he saw in front of him an equine ass big enough to crush a car. "Ryan!" yelled April as she continued to bulk up. "You do realize this means you're going to be married to a pegasus!"

"Don't panic," said Ryan. "I'll think of something." April heard a grumbling noise that knocked Ryan off of his feet before grabbing her bloated belly that looked big enough to hold two Buicks. "Well you better think of something fast. I'm starving. I feel like I could eat an entire forest." Ryan wasn't sure what to do. He had inadvertently turned the woman he loved into a sumo sized pegasus that was still getting bigger
112231112.title: There's No Going Back

choices: April was only slightly larger than before.
The house was no more, but April sure ain't.
1122311121.content:
"Listen, I'll tell you what I'm gonna do!" Ryan insisted. "I'm gonna go back into town, look for that shopkeeper, and find out what's going on!"

"Can you get some dinner on the way back?… maybe some hay?"

"I…uh…" Ryan didn't even bother answering before he walked out the room and ran for the front door.

…..

For whatever read, searching through town for the shop was like running around in a maze. Sure, he remembered every street that took him to the shop, but for whatever reason, all he could find in its place was an ice cream shop.

"Oh, god…what the hell's going on today?" He searched every shop in town, looking through the windows for the bizarre scenery he'd seen before. After over an hour he'd finally searched every shop in town, but it just wasn't there. None of it made any sense to him.

He was about to head home, disheartened and dreading having to face his transformed wife about this, when something in the corner of his eye caught his sight.

It was the same store. The awning, the window decorations, it was all there, but now in what he always saw as a hair salon.

Ryan didn't waste any time running in and up to the minotaur skull, fuming.

"Any problems with your purchase, sir?" The skull calmly asked, not without irony.

"WHAT THE HELL'D YOU DO TO MY FIANCE?!" Ryan bellowed. "Y-YOU TRANSFORMED HER!! INTO A PEGASUS!!!"

"Excuse me, sir, but I seem to perfectly remember you running in here and practically swiping it off the counter! Geez, I'd seen some eager folks in here, but you leaped right in before I could offer!"

"WHAT'S GOING ON HERE!? IS ANY OF THIS REAL?!!?"

"Oh, it's certainly real, sir! Probably more truthful than anything you mortals had ever known."

"W-What? What are you talking about?"

"Upon these walls lie the artifacts of the outer realms!" The skull answered ominously. "A world ruled by beings who look upon this world, possessing strength beyond anything you could comprehend! Strength, I might add, that you've just used as an engagement gift."

"Th-this is…" Ryan stammered, clutching his hair. "This is insane…I've gone insane."

"What, you want me to pinch you?"

"But what about that ring? What'd it do to her?"

"That ring was the heirloom of Vespa, a pretty powerful pegasus from the outer realms. When you gave it to your wife, Vespa's strength transposed onto her, and she's gonna get more powerful the bigger she gets. Hell, the outer realms limit its inhabitants abilities, so your wife may get even fatter and stronger than Vespa could ever get, or anything else there! Good for you!"

"But what can I do? How can I reverse this?"

"Sorry, buddy, you're on your own. She's pretty much the strongest being in the world right now, and she ain't stopping there. Tell you what, though, I'd stop for some burgers on the way there!"

"But-"

"Now if you'll excuse me, we're due to appear in Venice right now. Ciao!"

Before Ryan could respond, an invisible yanked him by his shirt collar and threw him out through the font door and onto the street. When he jumped onto his feet to ran back inside, he was only met with the local bakery.

"Oh, god…" He uttered in despair, walking down the path back home. What could he do now? His wife was becoming some obese demigod, growing larger by the minute. For all he knew, she could be the size of a mountain by now.

Once he made it back, he found that...
1122311121.title: The outer realms.

choices: April Hears Ryan and Spits Him Out
April Doesn't Hear Ryan and Swallows Him
11223111212.content:
Ryan gasped because the house appeared to be in ruins and there was a huge hole in the side of it. "Oh no." He said. Ryan ran in and looked for April. "April!?" he yelled. "April?" Ryan saw that in the middle of the floor was a large hoof print that was the size of a dining room table. "Don't tell me that she actually got bigger!?" yelled Ryan. Ryan then ran out into the street and yelled because he fell into another hoof print, one that looked like it was the size of a car. Ryan climbed out and realized that April was probably huge by now. From the looks of it, she would have to be the size of a house and weigh three times as much.

Ryan followed the trail of pegasus footprints and with each footprint getting bigger and bigger, he knew that he really screwed up. "That shopkeeper knew what he was talking about. She'll just keep getting bigger, fatter and stronger. I am so in trouble. When I tell April that there's no way to turn her back, she's going to be really mad. I'll be lucky if she kills me. But where is April? How could a giant obese winged horse just disappear." Ryan saw that the trail of footprints seemed to stop. Then Ryan yelled and slipped. He appeared to have tripped on one of April's feathers. It was the size of a tree and then Ryan gasped. "She couldn't have!"

Ryan immediately ran to the woodland area and climbed the tallest tree as she took out a pair of binoculars. "Don't tell me that she managed to fly away. How could a horse that huge and fat be even capable of flying. It's impossible. But then Ryan heard flapping and looked up to see something eclipsing the moon. It was April and she landed on the ground with a loud thump that shook the forest. Ryan looked in shock because April was now 150ft tall and was even fatter than she was before with a belly and ass that were both as wide as she was tall, a pair of H-cup (in scale) breasts and four large chins. Ryan also saw that the horse girl's wings had grown big enough to allow her to fly despite her massive bulk. She let out a loud neigh as Ryan looked up in pure shock at how large April had become.

"Where is Ryan?" asks April in a much deeper voice than before. "I hope he's not mad about me wrecking the house, but I got too big to fit in the house. Ryan then looks as april picks up and devours a tree. "And I hope he brings back something to eat, I feel like there's a blackhole inside of me." Ryan then gasped because April had picked up another tree; the tree that was in. "April!" yelled Ryan. "Don't!" But April doesn't hear Ryan and proceeds to toss the tree with her fiancé into her mouth. Ryan immediately rolls out of the way of April's car sized teeth as April continues to stuff her mouth with trees that she chews up. "April!" yells Ryan. "It's me! Spit me out! I'm in your mouth!"
11223111212.title: The Horse's Mouth

112231112122.content:
Unfortunately for Ryan, April couldn't hear his pleadings through her own large chewing as she continued to eat tree after tree. The lumber rolled into her mouth and pushed Ryan towards her esophagus. Ryan then let out a scream as he tried to climb the trees. He climbed tree after tree as each fragment fell down the black hole that was the pegasus woman's throat. The fat horse lady put one last tree into her mouth and it was a particularly large one that crushed the other trees already inside her mouth, including one that Ryan was climbing on. Ryan had no choice but to grab onto the branch of this large and tall tree.

"Oh come on!" yells Ryan. "She can't possibly still be stuffing her face!" Ryan then heard a snapping and grinding sound and saw that the trunk of the tree was being mangled by April's enormous teeth that were pulling the trunk of the tree in as the pieces fell down her throat. Ryan knew he was in a dangerous situation. He had to choose between being swallowed whole or being crushed by his equine fiancée's titanic choppers. Ryan climbed all the way to the end of the tree he was on just as the last branch came apart. "Oh no." Said the young man. Ryan let out a scream as he fell down into the esophagus.

On the outside, Ryan was barely visible as a small, pimple-like bulge going down April's throat as the pegasus woman held her wings up high and gave a deep gulp to swallow what little trees she had in her mouth. Inside, Ryan landed with a splash followed by several pieces of trees in April's stomach. He took a deep breath as he swam upwards and climbed atop the biggest pile of leaves and branches he could find. Ryan breathed in and out as he stood on top of the pile and then he looked around in shock. He was in April's belly. "I can't believe this," says Ryan. "First I give my fiancée a magic ring, then she gains more weight than 10 sumo wrestlers, turns into a Pegasus the size of a skyscraper and now... now she ate me. April! April!"

Ryan called up to April and even pounded the side of the giantess's belly, making barely noticeable bulges appear on the massive horse gut that was touching the ground. April was rubbing her stomach as she let out a sigh. "I never knew how tasty trees could be. One of those last ones had something on it that tasted particularly delicious. I wish I knew what it was so I can eat it again. But where is Ryan? I'm getting impatient waiting for him." Before April could grouse any further on where her boyfriend was, she felt her stomach growling again and grit her teeth. "Oh come on," she groans. "I can't still be hungry." April's stomach growled again and the horse lady gave a pout before turning her head and seeing the big city up again. She then licked her lips. "Maybe I could find something yummy there."

April flapped her wings, surprisingly lifting her enormous bulk off the ground as she makes her way towards the city.
112231112122.title: The Hungry Horse

11223112.content:
It all begun during what was supposed to be a harmless ski trip. Erza was waiting on top of the mountain for her boyfriend Ian. She adjusted her glasses and looked at her watch. “What is taking that blockhead?” she asked. The truth was that when it came to boyfriends, Erza lost the lottery. Ian fancied himself a monster hunter, albeit one who has yet to actually catch a monster. The fool had no interest in getting an actual job and believed that he could make a easy living if he actually managed to bag a monster. But all he managed to find trouble and this time would be no different.

Erza heard yelling and turned to see a familiar fool with a large black pompadour. He was running from the other guests of the lodge, mostly large men right before he tumbled. “Get him!” yelled one male skier. “Ian?” asked Erza. “What did you do now?” The bespectacled woman could only shake her head as she watched Ian get beaten up. Once the mob was done, Erza skied up to Ian. “Ian?” she asked as she helped her boyfriend up. “Again? What the hell were you doing now?” “Shows what you know, one of those goons was a yeti, I swear Erza.” “Why must you always be looking for creatures? We came here to relax.”

“You came here to relax Erza,” said Ian. “I came here to get bag a yeti.” Erza just shook her head. Ian wasn’t exactly what one would call the perfect boyfriend. In fact, even she couldn’t figure out what she saw in him.

“Ian,” Erza said as she and her boyfriend skied down the hill. “Yetis live in the Himalayas. This is Canada.” “Maybe that’s what yetis want you to think. You don’t know monsters.” Erza skied ahead and let out a sigh. None of Ian’s monster hunts ever ended well. One time he thought he bagged a kraken in a lake when it was just a child’s toy. She was seriously considering breaking up with him but for some strange reason, she always insisted on giving him a chance, despite the creature obsession.

But as she skied closer into the woods, Erza hit something and pratfalled into the snow. “Ow! What the…?” Erza then noticed something strange in the snow that looked somewhat petrified. She walked forward and lifted it up. “What kind of rock is this?” she asked. The “rock” was in the shape of some kind of hand that belonged to some kind of hominid creature.

Suddenly, Erza grunted in pain as the rock broke in her hands and enveloped her in a strange aura. As the aura cleared, the skier held her head and started to walk back towards the lodge, unaware that her hair was turning white.
11223112.title: Yeti 'Nother Creature Story

112231121.content:
Erza picked up her skies and started to walk back towards the lodge, knowing that Ian was probably going to get himself into more trouble without her to bail him out. As she was walking up the mountain, she grunted in pain and looked at her feet. "What is with these shoes?" the young woman asked. "I just bought these and they already feel too tight. What Erza didn't know was that it wasn't so much that the shoes were too tight, but that her feet were getting bigger.

In the main lodge, everybody was laughing at Ian as Ian gave a sour look. "What happened here?" asked Erza as she walked in. One man stopped laughing and turned to Erza. "You aren't gonna believe this. That idiot over there threw a net over some kids building a snowman because he thought that he found a yeti. Doesn't the moron know yetis only live in Asia, eh?" Erza shook her head. That was how it usually went with Ian. She was seriously considering dumping him.

But she was still his girlfriend and walked up to him. "Ian," she said. "I'm gonna put this as nicely as I can. You're not exactly cut out for monster hunting. Yetis are not only not indigenous to this area, but they're not real. Just try to enjoy the slopes. We're on vacation." Ian just let out a scoff. "And give up so soon? I'm gonna show those hyenas. One of these days, I will catch a monster." Suddenly Ian started to stare at Erza. "What's with the hair?"
