Erza raised her eyebrows above her glasses because she didn't know what he was talking about, let alone the fact that her hair had somehow completely turned as white as snow.

Her stomach had also started to bulge out as well, not that she noticed. "Are you putting on weight?" asked Ian. Insulted, Erza slapped Ian in the face and stomped off. Soon, she was back in the room they rented and was taking off her coat. "Jerk," she said. "First he ruins our vacation by hunting for stupid cryptids and then he has the nerve to call me fat. I have half a mind to find a new boyfriend and..." It was at this point that Erza looked into a mirror and gasped. She saw her hair was turning white and that she was getting large in the belly and from the looks of it, in the breasts and thighs as well. "What in the...?"

Erza grunted and then her white hair grew longer and started to extend to her arms, torso and legs, leaving only her gut, breasts, face, arms and legs uncovered by the thick white fur. She grunted as her skin then turned a grayish blue color and she started to grow bigger and her clothes started to tear. She was turning into a yeti, much to her horror and could see that she was growing at a rapid rate, she was already ten feet tall and by her estimate, it wouldn't be long until she was the size of King Kong. "This was supposed to be a simple vacation." The yeti groaned to herself.

Suddenly there was a knock on the door... but who was it?
112231121.title: The Next King Kong

1122311211.content:
"Honey, I think I left my net in there…"

"IAN, DON"T!!!"

But her pleas were too late as he opened the door and entered the room. The instant he was met with the sight of the monstrous, extremely obese snow beast in room, dozens of emotions seemed to flash across his face all at once. Alarm, astonishment, apprehension, horror, amazement, excitement, but most of all, determination.

"Ian…" Ezra softly began, not wanting to alarm him. "Ian, it's m-"

"YETI!!!"

Ian lunged across the room and grabbed his butterfly net, which he thrust over Ezra's head. However, the net was rendered useless quickly as she yanked it away from him and tossed it to the side.

"Ian, it's me, Ez-"

"AVAST YE, SNOW DEMON!!!"

With strength she'd never seen from him, he grabbed a chair from the desk next to him and hurled it at her, but it shattered into dozens of pieces against her mammoth-sized gut.

"Ian, stop! It's me, Ezra!"

"YOU'RE LIES SHAN'T DECEIVE ME, BEAST!!! WHERE'S MY GIRLFRIEND?!!?"

As Ezra attempted to cal my approached him, he resorted to hurling random objects at her in the vain hopes it would somehow slow her down. With each random appliance bouncing off of her, she grew more irritated.

"Ian…OW!!! IAN…GAH!!!" Finally, Ezra reached her boiling point and grabbed Ian by the shoulders, lifting him up to her face.

"FOR THE LOVE OF GOD, YOU IGNORAMUS, WOULD YOU CUT IT OUT WITH THE MONSTER HUNTING AND LISTEN TO ME!??!"

Dazed by Ezra's outburst, he stared at her in stunned silence.
1122311211.title: The astronomical snowman

choices: She Sees a News Report Responding to Ian's Yeti Post
11223112111.content:
As Ian was stunned, Erza dropped him on the ground and was worried to herself. “I really hope that I’ve gotten through to him. Ian is so thick-headed. After all, this is the same dimwit who tried to look for the Jersey Devil in Kansas and mistook an eel for the ogopogo.” It took Ian two minutes to process what the enormous yeti said to him and then gave a look of total surprise and even dropped his jaw. “It can’t be,” he said. “Erza, is that you?” Erza rolled her eyes. “Well,” she thought. “Maybe there is hope for him after all.” Erza then snorted before speaking.

“Of course it’s me, you idiot! Think before you act for just once in your life, Ian! We’re in North America! Yetis are indigenous to Asia! Wouldn’t that give you a clue that it wasn’t an ordinary yeti you were looking at? Do the research before you go out all willy-nilly.” Ian was stunned. He had not expected Erza to turn into a large yeti. “But how did you...?” Erza let out a sigh. “While you were busy making a fool of yourself, I found what looked like a fossilized hand, my guess is that it was a yeti’s hand and from the looks of it, it was magical.” Ian was now more confused than ever. “But you just said that yetis were from Asia. How did a yeti’s hand get here?” “I don’t ****ing know! Maybe somebody dropped it. Don’t ask me who.” Erza stomped her foot on the ground and accidentally cracked the floor before she blushed slightly.

Ian grabbed his hair and groaned. “This is just great. All the time I’ve been hunting cryptids and you turn into one. What gives?!” Erza then grabbed Ian by the back of the shirt with one hand and held him up. “You think I wanted this to happen?” asked the large yeti woman with a loud snort. Look at me. Look at these feet! Look at this girth!” Erza slapped her stomach before dropping her boyfriend on the ground. Ian looked up to see that Erza was 12ft tall and had to weigh 3 tons, especially in the stomach area. “I didn’t think mutations could be so fattening.” Erza looked down and glared at her boyfriend. “This isn’t a joke, Ian,” said the abominable snowman giantess. “Something tells me that I haven’t stopped getting bigger. And what’s worse, there are so many people out there who would freak out royally if they saw a rather huge yeti walking about.” Ian thought about that. “Yes,” he said. “It will be a problem. But don’t panic. Perhaps I can get you out of the lodge later and we can find some place to hide you until...” “Until what? A yeti as big as me isn’t the easiest creature to hide. Besides, what are you planning to do? Keep me locked up in an attic like a pyromaniac?”

Ian bit his lip nervously because he seriously had no idea where his and Erza’s plans were going and planning was not one of Ian’s specialties. “Well,” said the would-be monster hunter. “That’s a bridge we’ll jump off when we get there.” Erza shook her head and grabbed herself by the face. “I really wish that you had phrased that differently.” Before Erza could say another word, she heard a loud growling. Ian yelled and reached into his pocket for some kind of weapon before Erza stopped him. “Don’t get overheated, Ian. That was just my stomach. I’m starving. Big surprise. Getting turned into a 3 ton yeti gives you a monstrous appetite.” Erza even patted his stomach as it made a noise like an empty oil drum. “Ian,” said Erza. “There is no way that I could go out there in this condition. I’m going to need you to bring me back lunch.” “Don’t worry, Honey, I got it.” However, that’s when Ian realized something. “What do yetis eat?” “How the hell am I supposed to know? Yetis aren’t 100% concerned to exist, not counting me, so how could anyone possibly document the diet of a creature that’s so rarely seen? Just get me what I’d normally eat as a human.” Ian nodded his head. “Got it.”

But then Ian had a sudden flash of insight and then walked up to his girlfriend’s knee before he took out his cell phone. “What are you doing?” asked Erza. Ian positioned his cellphone because he was preparing to take a photograph of himself and Erza. “Those people out there think I’m some idiotic jerk. I’m going to show them while at the same time telling off those hecklers on EyePage. I’m going to show them that I at least found a real cryptid.” Erza gave a look of horror. “You numbskull! That’s the last thing we want.” “Don’t worry, Erza,” said Ian. “I’m not going to show them your face. I’m not stupid.” “That’s a matter of opinion.” Growled the yeti woman as she covered her face with one of her oversized hands. Once Ian took the photograph, he let out a grumble. "Oh, man," he said. "The sun was in my eye." Erza noticed the window was open and closed it so as not to allow anyone to see her in her mutated yeti form. "Please, Ian," said Erza. "Be careful. I still don't think taking that selfie is such a good idea." "Relax, Erza," said Ian. "With my luck, it's not like anybody would actually believe you were a real abominable snowman." Erza let out a roar. "Abominable snow woman? Seriously, do they think yeti is a male only species. Ian, please just get me some food. I need something in my stomach." "Alright, alright. I'm going." Ian was walking out of the room as Erza let out a sigh. "And while you're at it," she said. "Could you please get me an aspirin. This whole situation is giving me a headache."

Ian just left and Erza let out a sigh. “This is going to be a long, long, long trip.” The yeti laid down in the cabin’s bed, crushing it in the process to her embarrassment as she blew a snort of cold air. “Oh sure,” she said “As if this situation wasn’t bad enough. Maybe I’ll rent a movie from the cabin. That should put me in a better mood.” The yeti woman adjusted her glasses to get a good look at the movies but none of them seemed appealing. Vampire Monkey Circus? Oh no. Spiders on the Plain? Good grief. Bengal? What’s with all these films about carnivorous animals, is it monster movie week up here or something.” However, the last movie on the list was the one that irked the yeti woman and made her drop it. “Hopelessly Abominable?! Really, a movie about a killer yeti?! That is so offensive.” Erza looked at herself in the mirror and grunted. “Even if that wasn’t me, that doesn’t look like the face of a brutal beast. This sucks. Now I’m going to have to spend the rest of my life as a big hairy ape.” Erza pouted and then she grabbed a hold of her large stomach. “Guess I’ll have to forget about fitting into a size 6 ever again.” As Erza was lamenting the size of her belly, she heard a rather loud ripping noise that caught her by surprise before she let out a sigh. “And there go the pants.” The bespectacled ape giantess said to herself.

Meanwhile, out in the hallway, Ian was making his way towards the cafeteria when he spotted several snowboarders who spotted him and were laughing at him. "Well if it isn't the mighty monster hunter." "Finally realized that the yeti was on the other side of the planet?" "Hey, monster hunter, there's a werewolf in my granny's closet that you can go after." "What's next on the agenda, hunter? Are you going to go after the Mongolian Death Worm?" Ian was quickly getting annoyed with those he saw as mocking him. He knew that he had to get food for Erza, but his pride was overriding his common sense and he took out his cellphone. "Oh yeah? I'll have you know that I found an actual yeti!" "Yeti nothing," said one of the snowboarders. "That looks more like a giant llama if you ask me. You can do a lot with photoshop these days."

Ian grit his teeth but then he had an idea. "We'll see who'll be laughing last, you jerks. I may not have caught a cryptid, but I've at least found proof that one exists." Ian took out his computer and hooked his phone up to it so he could get a good look at the photograph of him next to Erza's leg. There was not enough of Erza's body to show it was her but still looked yeti enough for the photograph as Ian was starting to upload it onto the Internet. "Erza is probably going to kill me for this, but hey. What are they going to do. There's not enough of her showing to raise any eyebrows. That's what Ian thought as he put his yeti photo online.

 Erza at this time had resorted to watching the television without renting one of the movies that made her feel so uncomfortable. At this point she had grown to 20ft tall and her stomach had to be 27ft wide as her butt was 15ft wide and her breasts expanded to a D-Cup. The yeti giantess looked like she weighed 10 tons at the moment. As she sat on what used to be the bed, the yeti giantess’s stomach was rumbling and signaled that she was desperate for food. She grit her teeth because she was growing impatient with Ian. “What is taking Ian so long?” the abominable snow giantess thought to herself as she tapped her large feet and cracked the floorboards. “I’m starving here. If Ian doesn’t get me something to eat soon, I’m going to have to go outside and see if there’s something yummy out in the forest. That man has got to be as sucky a gatherer as he is a hunter."

Erza kept flipping through the channels when at that moment...
11223112111.title: Abominable Girlfriend

choices: A Team of Cryptozoologists Show up Looking for the Yeti
112231121112.content:
Erza came across a channel that had a news report on. The reporter was an Asian young man with a pair of heart-shaped sunglasses. "This just in. There is a yeti in the Canadian North." Erza gave a look of shock. "What!?" yelled the yeti woman. The reporter showed the photograph that Ian took of Erza's foot. "I'm as surprised as you are. While yetis are indigenous to Asia, one so-called hunter managed to locate an actual yeti. Judging by this very photograph, this yeti is bigger than usual." Erza could not believe her eyes. Ian put that photograph online and Erza grit her teeth.

"That idiot!" yelled the yeti woman to herself. "We have no idea what they'll do to me. What was he thinking?!" Erza leaned forward, crushing the bed with her big belly in the process. The reporter on the television continued to speak. "Is this yeti real or not. We've looked at several posts to see what everyone's thinking." The reporter showed the posts left on the Internet discussion boards.

"That's no yeti. It's probably just an albino gorilla." "Yetis aren't real." "Maybe Bigfoot and the yeti are the same thing?" "Are there different kinds of yetis." "I'd like to see this yeti in full." Erza grit her teeth in worry. She had no idea what the world would do if they found a real life yeti, something that she was. As she tapped her foot in worry, Erza managed to break a hole in the floor.

There was a tap at the door that startled Erza and made her yell. "Who's there?!" yelled the now very paranoid yeti girl. "Relax, Erza, it's just me." Said Ian on the other side. Erza let out a grunt. "Ian," she said. "Come in." Ian walked inside and was carrying a bushel of bananas. "Look," he said to his giant yeti girlfriend. "I have no idea what yetis actually eat, so I figured that since yetis were basically apes, these bananas would..." Ian looked up and saw the giantess yeti glaring down at him. "What?" asked Ian. "Don't tell me you don't like bananas."

Erza took the bananas and started to eat them like fries, pulling the peels out of her mouth as she stared down at her boyfriend. "You posted that photograph on the Internet!?" Ian gave a nervous look. "Those guys in the lodge were doubting my credentials as a hunter. I had to show them yetis exist. But hey, it's not like the photograph shows your face." Erza let out a scream and showed her ape-like teeth. "Do you have any idea what people will do with me!? I don't know either but nothing good! Worst case scenario, I'll be chained up like King Kong! How can you be so irresponsible."

Ian held his head down in guilt. "I'm sorry, Babe. I know I wasn't thinking straight, but hey, no worries. We're in the snowy mountains. The perfect place to hide a yeti. I can fix this." Erza let out a groan. "Every single time you fix something, all it does is get even more broken." Erza just keeps eating bananas as she wonders what to do when suddenly....
112231121112.title: Secret's Out

112231122.content:
“Slow down, Renee!” yelled Pat to his girlfriend who was eating pizza like a horde of locusts. Renee stopped and chewed on a large slice before she looked at her boyfriend. “Come on, Pat,” said Renee. “Don’t tell me you don’t enjoy pizza as much as the next guy.” Pat let out a sigh. “I do love pizza, yes. But I’m not the one eating like a duck.”

This was true, everyone in the restaurant stared at the girl who had managed to eat six plates worth of pizza. “I really don’t know where you’re putting it all.” Said Pat as he chuckled and shook his head. “And you wonder why our dates never make it to the movie.” Renee just shrugged her shoulders before biting on three slices at once.

Normally Pat would just deal with it but he looked at the sign on the pizzeria door. "Renaissance Pizza” it read. “Try Our Kappa Fossil Sushi - First to Finish one Whole Pie, Eats free for a month”. The idea of free pizza for a month appealed to a glutton like Renee and she was willing to try anything. The kappa fossil pizza had yet to arrive.

“I’m not sure if this is such a good idea, Renee,” said Pat. “After all, you don’t even know what that kappa fossil pizza is even made of.” Renee just shrugged her shoulders. “I’m sure they wouldn’t sell anything poisonous at a restaurant like this one. Don’t worry about it.” Renee finished her pizza crust as the waiter came by with the kappa fossil pizza. Pat took one look at it and was disgusted. It was a green pizza that had what appeared to be cucumber slices and strange scales in it.

“I must warn you,” said the waiter. “Nobody has ever managed to actually finish one slice of kappa fossil pizza.” Pat let out a scoff. “My girlfriend will eat anything,” he said. “She just won’t gain a pound.” “You heard him,” said Renee. “Bring it on!” The waiter laid down the pizza on the table and Renee licked her lips before picking up a slice. She bit into it and her eyes popped. “This isn’t like any pizza I’ve ever tasted. Heck, it’s not like anything I’ve ever tasted. I like it!” Renee shoved the slice down her mouth as the waiter looked in horror. Pat shook his head as his girlfriend downed the rest of the pizza and finished it off with a swig of soda.

Renee was quite proud of herself. “Looks like I’ve won your challenge. You’ll be seeing a lot of me here more often.” The waiter was more dumbfounded than anything. It wasn’t long before Pat and Renee left in triumph. “This time,” said Renee. “We should have enough cash for the movie.” “I still can’t believe you ate all that pizza, Renee,” said Pat. “You aren’t human.”

After the pizzeria closed, the waiter gulped. “I told the cook that recipe was not meant for the public, but I didn’t think anyone would be able to stomach it. I should have never stolen that recipe. But maybe it won’t do what it says it will do… will it?”

Little did Renee know, she was about to feel a whole lot green later and all the pounds she should’ve put on from her monstrous appetite would catch up to her.
112231122.title: Trouble on the Half Shell

1122311221.content:
After dinner, Renee and Pat went to a monster movie. On the screen was a strange reptilian monster with a skull like face rising out of the water as it let out an evil growl and drooled. Pat was shaking in his seat, not just because of the horror movie, but because Renee was doing what should not be possible. She had just about finished a large popcorn bucket, the kind that no human being should possibly be able to finish over the course of one movie.

"How can she eat so much after all that kappa fossil pizza?" thought Pat to himself. "She isn't human." What neither of them knew was that as the movie was going on, Renee's back started shifting and something appeared to be growing. Her stomach and breasts also appeared to be getting bigger as her skin was turning bright green. After the movie ended, Pat and Rene were walking away.

"Jeekers," said Renee as she heard her stomach growling. "I am famished." "You ate an entire pizza you didn't know anything about and that coliseum of popcorn and you're still famished?" asked Pat in disbelief. "That sounds excessive even for you." Renee let out a scoff as she failed to notice that she was now twelve feet tall and was getting fatter with every step. "Come on, I've got a fast metabolism. I know a sandwich shop nearby. It's gotta be better than that movie."

Pat rolled his eyes but then heard a rumbling noise and looked down to see it was coming from Renee's feet. Pat was more than a little surprised that his girlfriend had been turning green but then he gasped because her feet tore through her boots and revealed they were both clawed and webbed. "That entire plot," said Renee as her eyes turned blood red. "It was unbelievable. I mean, a river monster that could pass as a human being?" Renee's ears enlarged as a dome appeared on her forehead that was filled with water and her mouth elongated into a beak like that of an alligator snapping turtle. Renee even laughed as her clothes became to rip in the front, revealing strange scaly plates beneath. Finally, her shirt and coat ripped in her back as a giant gray shell covered in spikes appeared.

"I mean, monsters don't really exist, right?" asked the now twenty-foot tall and nine-ton kappa giantess, too busy laughing at the ridiculousness of the movie she saw to realize that she was not the petite human girl she was a few minutes ago. Pat looked in fear at the monster he was dating. "What was in that pizza?!" he thought to himself. Renee looked down in confusion at her smaller boyfriend. "What's the matter, Pat, you look like you've seen a ghost?"

Pat was dumbfounded. How did Renee not notice that she had turned into a enormous fat kappa who could effortlessly swallow him whole. Does he tell her now or should he wait until they get to the sandwich shop?
1122311221.title: Shell Shocked

11223112211.content:
Pat saw his now 20ft tall and 9 ton kappa girlfriend looking down at him and she knew something was bugging him. "Well?" asked Renee. "What's wrong." Pat knew there was no point in delaying the inevitable and let out a sigh. "Renee," he said. "I don't know how to tell you this, but look." Renee looked at her own hands and gasped for they had turned into scaly and webbed green claws. She gasped and then felt her back and felt the spikes on her shell before looking down to see what kind of monster she had become, unintentionally spilling some water from the dome in his head on top of her boyfriend.

"Oh my gosh Pat! What am I! I look like the Japanese turtle monster from the movies." "I think you're a kappa," said Pat. "You know, those turtle creatures of Japanese myth." "Well, that would explain my craving for fish and cucumbers," said Renee. "But how did I..." It was at this point that Pat realized the exact cause of the transformation. "That kappa fossil pizza you ate!" he yelled. "Something in that pizza must've caused you to mutate. Oh man, follow me! But don't let anyone see you! A twenty foot tall turtle is going to cause a panic."

Pat ran to the docks at the side of town as his mutated girlfriend followed behind him, getting bigger and fatter with every step until she was fifty feet tall. Pat reached the docks and gestured for the kappa giantess to get into the water. "Now stay here," said Pat. "I'll go talk to that waiter from the pizza parlor about what happened." "But what if I get hungry?" asked Renee knowing full well that being a giant monster hadn't helped her monstrous appetite. "Then catch a few fish," said Pat. "Just try not to cause any trouble.

With that Pat ran off to the pizza parlor to get to the bottom of this.
11223112211.title: Certified Turtle-fied

choices: Report of a Giant Kappa Attacking Fishing Boats
People Running as Renee was Coming Forward
112231122111.content:
Pat reached the pizza parlor just in time to see the waiter walking out and confronted him. "You!" he yelled. "Uh-oh." Said the waiter. "You know something about that kappa fossil pizza, don't you?" asked Pat. The waiter slapped himself in the face and let out a sigh. "I should've never done it. I'll explain everything. You see, that kappa fossil pizza was made of actual kappa fossils." "What?!" yelled Pat.

"I may be a waiter now," said the waiter. "But I tried to become a chef. But I was expelled in shame for looking at the black cookbook, a text my teacher strictly forbad anyone from reading. I stole the recipe for the kappa fossil pizza and gave it to the chef of this pizza parlor. It was only meant as a publicity stunt. I didn't expect anyone to actually be able to eat it. But your garbage disposal girlfriend proved me wrong, oh she proved me wrong and now we're in big trouble."

"Well thanks to your irresponsibility," said Pat. "Renee is a giant kappa and she's still getting bigger. You've got to tell me the antidote." The waiter grabbed the sides of his head. "There is no antidote. The only thing that could've possibly undo the effects of the kappa fossil pizza is an ingredient that no longer exists. I'm terribly sorry."

Pat let out a groan and had to walk back to the bay to break the news to April. The waiter let out a groan. "I wonder if it's too late to turn myself in?" he asked. "But who would believe this?" Pat was walking down the street and thought the situation with his kappa girlfriend couldn't get any worse when he passed by a TV store and saw
112231122111.title: This Title Isn't a Turtle Pun

1122311221111.content:
As Pat walked past the TV store, he saw that there was a news report that immediately caught his attention. "This is breaking news," said the anchorwoman on the television. "Not even an hour ago, a string of fishing boats were mysteriously capsized around the bay area." This report made Pat worry. "She wouldn't." He said in panic before the anchorwoman continued. "We've talked to one of the fishermen and he had this to say."

"It was horrible. Some sea monster came up from the deep and bit my boat and half and then it ate all the fish I caught. I thought it was going to eat me. It looked like a giant snapping turtle." Pat grabbed the sides of his head in horror. Renee's transformation amplified her horrifying appetite and that was quite a feat. "That idiot!" yelled Pat.

Immediately, Pat ran down to the bay where he saw what looked like a shark's skeleton floating towards the shore. "Oh no," said Pat. "What is Renee doing? I told that kappa to lay low. This is so not laying low. I've got to stop her before she gets the navy on her tail for this." Pat saw a rowboat and goat an idea.

The young man rowed his way out towards the sea, to the point where he could no longer see the docks. He held out a lantern as he looked for any sign of his obese kappa giantess girlfriend. "Renee!" he shouted. "Renee! How the heck does a snapping turtle the size of a skyscraper just disappear?" Suddenly there was a rumbling in the water and huge waves passing 10 feet tall came up. Pat tried to row his way away from the waves but had no luck and yelled as his rowboat was capsized and he fell into the water. As Pat was submerged, he looked in shock as a large shadowed figure rose up from beneath the waves. It had to be Renee and she was surfacing right under him.

As Renee rose from the water, Pat was scooped up into the dome on her head and as Pat surfaced in his girlfriend's dome head, he saw that the kappa's dome was bigger than the world's biggest swimming pool. As for Renee herself, she was now...
1122311221111.title: A Monster Appetite

choices: Continue Through Renee's P.O.V. as She Looks for Food
Continue Through Pat's P.O.V. in Renee's Belly
11223112211111.content:
Pat looked in pure shock because Renee was now 100ft tall and had gotten even fatter. The kappa giantess's stomach had expanded to 200ft wide and her ass was now 150ft wide. Her shell had to be the size of an island at this point and from the looks of it, she had four chins. But that wasn't all. Pat saw that Renee was carrying a large colossal squid in her mouth and was slowly devouring it. "You have got to be kidding me," said Pat. "She's still eating. The waters aren't safe for anything small enough to fit in her mouth."

Pat then watched as Renee tilted her head and swallowed the colossal squid right down before letting out a loud belch that forced Pat to cover his ears. The kappa giantess then rubbed her massive stomach as it seemed to be swelling even bigger. "Renee!" yelled Pat. "Renee! Down here!" However, Renee's head was so high up in the air that the kappa didn't seem to hear him. "Renee!" yelled Pat. "Look down into the water, you fat terrapin idiot! Do you have any idea how much trouble you caused!? A fisherman actually saw you!" But Renee was too busy belching and rubbing her stomach to pay any heed to Pat. Pat let out a groan. "You stupid turtle!" Pat swam up behind his titanic turtle girlfriend and then punched the terrapin on her massive booty. "Renee!" yelled Pat. "Listen to me!"

Suddenly the water begun to shift into waves and Pat found himself being carried out by riptide, created by Renee's moving body. Pat let out a yell as the turtle giantess looked down into the water. Pat saw Renee scanning the water as the kappa girl waved her tail and lowered her obese head. "I can't believe it," said Pat. "Did I finally get through to her? Maybe she's not so oblivious after all." Unfortunately for Pat, that wasn't it. The water was dark so Renee couldn't get a good look at her boyfriend. But from what she saw, she did something that made Pat extremely afraid. She opened her large jaws and licked her lips.

Pat gasped because he suddenly realized what was on Renee's kappa mind. "Oh no," said Pat. "She thinks I'm a fish! Renee, wait!" But it was too late, Renee thought Pat was a little fish in the water. A little fish that she wanted in her belly. Renee opened her jaws wide and Pat screamed as he swam for his life. Renee unfortunately was better built for the water and was swimming after Pat with her jaws opened wide. Pat let out a grunt to himself. "That gluttonous moron!" Pat thought to himself. "First she eats weird pizza that mutates her into a skyscraper sized kappa and now she thinks I'm nothing more than a tasty guppy. As soon as this is over, I'm going to break up with her!"

But then as Pat was swimming, he felt the water moving and saw that he was actually moving backwards as he paddled. Pat then turned and screamed because Renee was sucking him into her mouth. Before Pat could escape, he was sucked into his turtle girlfriend's awaiting beak before it snapped shut. Renee's tongue wrapped around Pat and assaulted him as he continued to scream. Finally, Renee held her head up into the air and gave a loud gulp as Pat traveled down her throat in a tiny screaming bulge on the kappa's obese neck. It wasn't long before Pat landed with a splash in Renee's ginormous stomach.

Outside, Renee patted her stomach a few times and let out an earth shattering burp. "What kind of fish was that?" asked the kappa giantess to herself as she licked her lips. "It tasted unusual and it seemed oddly shaped. Didn't taste like any fish I've ever had before. But it was sure delicious. I hope I find more of those tasty fish. I wonder when Pat's going to get back and find me. I'm starving." The kappa giantess then shrugged her shoulders and started to swim off.
11223112211111.title: Turtle Titan

112231122111112.content:
Inside Renee’s stomach, Pat was screaming as he desperately swam through the juices hoping not to be digested. Fortunately, there were several pieces of shipwrecks that Renee ate that were floating around and Pat climbed upon the wreckage before he panted heavily. It was there he looked around and couldn’t believe it. “This can’t be happening,” said Pat in absolute horror. “She ate me. Renee actually swallowed me. Well, she most likely didn’t see me but....” Pat stopped himself and then yelled as his scream echoed through Renee’s stomach. “That gluttonous idiot! Knowing Renee, she probably enjoyed my taste. Eaten by a kappa. Never thought it would end like this.” Pat grunted as one of his shoes fell into the stomach fluid and sank. Pat looked around to see several whale skeletons floating around in the digestive fluids. “Ugh,” said Pat as he held his nose. “It totally reeks to high heaven in here. What does she, eat everything in her path? Well that’s a stupid question. It’s Renee.”

Suddenly all of the stomach juices begun to shake and waves came up into the sky, forcing Pat to duck into the shipwreck’s cabin as the stomach fluids came down. Several of the whale skeletons sank right before Pat looked out to see hundreds of fish coming down, some of which landed on the deck. Pat let out a groan of absolute amazement. “I swear,” he said. “She would eat the moon if she could. I really hope that she doesn’t get that big though. I...” Suddenly, the entire ocean of digestive slime expanded as more and more fish came from the sky. Pat gasped and then ran out just as an octopus fell on his head and he groaned in disgust before shaking it off. Pat then screamed as a swordfish landed next to him and almost impaled him. Pat saw the stomach expanding and realized Renee had most likely just gotten bigger but since he was inside of her stomach and couldn’t get a look at his kappa girlfriend, he didn’t know exactly how much bigger she was.

At that time, Renee was 200ft tall and had a 150ft wide ass, 350ft stomach and E-cup breasts. Her shell had also gotten bigger to compensate and her hair appeared to have gotten longer. At that moment, the kappa giantess was shaking a fishing boat in the air in order to drop the contents into her mouth as the fisherman was hiding in the cabin and screaming. Once every last fish was dropped in, the turtle giantess licked the hull and then put the ship down in the water. She let out a sigh and shook her head as she continued to swim through through the water. “Those fish were yummy,” the giantess said to herself. “But
that other fish back there was much yummier. I wish I knew what it was." Suddenly, Renee stopped herself and then she let out a rather loud and thunderous belch.

This caused her stomach to shake up and Pat had to jump off of the shipwreck he was on as it sank and landed on the skeleton of a sperm whale that Renee had feaster on. Pat had to hold on his ears to make sure that Renee's burping didn't make him go deaf. "So crying out loud, Renee!" yelled Pat. "That was so loud that my ears are still ringing! You're gonna give me tinnitus!" Once the stomach stopped shaking, Pat let out a groan. "Well," he said. "It could've been worse. It could've come from the other end. I have got to get out of here."

Suddenly something dripped from up above. Pat stood up and saw that several tentacles were coming down from the esophagus. "What in the?!" Before Pat could even react, into the stomach dropped a colossal squid that Renee swallowed. "Oh no!" yelled Pat. "Oh geez! Oh no!" The squid rose out of the stomach juice and let out a hiss at Pat as Pat was clearly very afraid. "Nice giant squid," said Pat uneasily. "Good giant squid!" The squid let out a shriek and swung its tentacles as Pat had to jump from the whale skeleton he was on to the neck as it shattered to pieces. from the hooked tentacles of the monstrous squid. The squid let out another roar as it reached its tentacles out to try and grab Pat who was yelling as he tried to get away.

"You just had to eat a colossal squid didn't you, Renee?!" yelled Pat. "You gluttonous pig! You just have to eat everything in sight don’t you!? When I get out of here, you are so going on a diet!" Outside, Renee was feeling her stomach and groaned. "I forgot," said the turtle giantess. "Squid never agrees with me.” Renee let out another belch and her head was spinning. Inside of her stomach the squid was still chasing after Pat who was screaming before the squid sprayed out some ink. Pat slipped on the ink and was grabbed by the squid’s tentacles. The squid let out a shriek and Pat begun to sweat. The squid squeezed Pat tight and Pat struggled in the creature’s grip and before he noticed an anchor in a sinking ship. Pat grabbed the anchor and assaulted the squid with it to make it yell before the squid dropped Pat in the stomach fluid.

“I still can’t believe I’m not being digested,” thought Pat as he held his breath and tried to swim through the slime. “Maybe it just takes kappas longer to break down their food.” The squid was swimming after Pat but Pat found a submarine that Renee swallowed and swam inside of it. The squid wrapped all around the sub as Pat was looking around in surprise. “You have got to be kidding me,” said Pat. “A submarine? Where did she find a submarine. For that matter, why did she eat a submarine in the first place. This thing looks like it was left over from World War II.” The colossal squid continued to squeeze hold of the submarine as Pat begun to sweat and searched the submarine for weapons. "Come on!" he yelled. "Come on! Come on! Come on! There's gotta be something in here that can fight off a squid!" Pat was more than desperate to find something on the submarine because the squid was tearing into it with its long and hooked tentacles and sharp beak.

On the outside, Renee was continuing to stuff her face and had swallowed several oarfishes as if they were spaghetti and let out another belch. "I'm still hungry," she said. "And I wonder how Pat's doing back in the city. Maybe he's confronted the pizza parlor owner and found a way to turn me back to normal. If not, I hope he at least brings back pizza. I better move out of here. I'm getting sick of seafood and my stomach feels like a whirlpool." Renee burped again. "Ugh," she said. "That squid was definitely not the best thing I ever ate."

Back in the stomach of the titanic kappa beast, Pat was still searching the ship for any weapon that could dispatch a colossal squid. "Aha!" yelled Pat. "Ah!" The squid had almost broken through the hull of the submarine right before Pat pulled a switch and the submarine made a shrieking sound accompanied by very slow movement. The squid turned and looked in surprise because what Pat did was activate the torpedo launcher in the submarine. The squid loosened its grip but it was too late because Pat fired the torpedo and the squid had to hold onto it as it was sent barreling right through the stomach acid and destroyed several shipwrecks in the process. The colossal squid swam down to the bottom of the stomach just as the missile continued to move through Renee's stomach.

Renee was stomping through the ocean towards shore at the time when the torpedo hit the side of her stomach and forced her to hold her stomach in pain right as the torpedo exploded in her stomach. The kappa got on her knees and roared in pain before she let out a thunderous fart that blew several fish out of the water. Renee let out a roar of distress that turned into a moan and held her stomach and butt in pain. "Oh," she groaned. "Oh. Bad squid, definitely bad squid. I feel like I have to swallow a truckload of antacids. Bleh. It's not medicine I want. It's food. I wish I still had my cellphone so I could call that boyfriend of mine and ask him what's taking so long. Where is Pat anyway?"

Pat was still in Renee's stomach and he was panting as he was now safe from the colossal squid. "That girl definitely needs to lay off the seafood. Wait. What am I doing. I'm still in her stomach. There is no way I'm coming out the other side or being dissolved into Pat soup. Maybe I can use something she swallowed to my advantage and get her to cough me up." Pat looked at the controls of the submarine and then smirked. "Maybe if I fired another missile, it would irritate her stomach just enough to make her barf." Pat smirked and tried to fire another torpedo but all the torpedo launcher did was make a clicking sound. Pat tried again but heard the same sound. "Dammit!" he yelled. "You've got to be kidding me. Only one torpedo and I used it on the squid?! Crud. No need to panic, Pat. Maybe you can get this hunk of junk running. I hope.

But as Pat was trying to activate the controls of the submarine, all the control box did was blow smoke in his face as he coughed. "Crap! I should've known. This submarine has been lost in the ocean for decades and probably had its engine eroded by saltwater if my girlfriend's stomach acid didn't finish the job." Suddenly there was loud rumbling. "What now?" asked Pat.

Outside, people were screaming and running as Renee stomped into town. The colossal and hungry kappa was stomping the street to pieces as her belly was pushing down buildings and flattening cars under its hulk. Renee bent down and grabbed a fruit stand before throwing it into her mouth and then plucking out several small trees before chewing off all the foliage." Inside his girlfriend's belly, Pat noticed fruit scraps sinking into the ocean and moaned. "That idiot!" he yelled.

Pat exited the submarine and boarded a catamaran swallowed by the beast to see all manner of scrap falling into Renee's stomach and splashing into the water. Of course, things are only about to get worse because at that moment.
112231122111112.title: In the Kappa's Belly

1122311222.content:
It begun one day in Boston during a very rough traffic day. In a purple muscle car there was a young married couple stuck in the very same traffic. The driver, a young Chinese woman with purple hair was beeping her horn. “Move it jerks!” she yelled in the intense gridlock. Her husband was looking at her nervously. This tended to happen when they were caught in traffic.

“Amber,” said the young man to his wife. “I think there’s a school bus up ahead. Maybe that’s why…” “Shut it Dale!” yelled Amber. “It’s almost summer. That bus should be out of service at this time. Move it! At this rate we’ll be late for work. Geez, why did it have to be sixty degrees outside. I’m sweating like bacon.” Dale just rolled his eyes. He was used to this. He knew that Amber had a temper when he married her, but she wasn’t a mean person. She just let her emotions run her life.

Finally the traffic was moving and Amber started to drive through the slowly breaking gridlock. “Amber,” said Dale. “One of these days your temper is going to get you into trouble.” Amber just let out a scoff. “How so?” she asked. “Well, for one, you’re speeding.” Amber glared at her husband, causing him to cower back. “I for one do not feel like arguing with the postmaster. It’s a nightmare enough working at the post office without being late.”

As Amber sped down the road, she eventually came to a cross walk and didn’t see a middle aged looking women dressed like a teenager in a hoodie walking down the street. “Amber!” yelled Dale. “Look out!” Amber suddenly stopped as she looked in shock at the woman who could only flinch as she was nearly run over. Of course, as she stopped, Amber just had to give the woman an earful. “You stupid crone! Get off the road! I could’ve killed you!” The woman just let out a scoff. “I had the right of way, thank you. You would’ve noticed the stoplight if you…” “You criticizing my driving?!” yelled Amber. “My husband and I are gonna be late because of you. Get lost!”

The woman just stuck up her nose and walked across the road before the light turned green and Amber and Dale were on their way. “Something tells me you shouldn’t have done that, Dear.” Said Dale. Amber just scoffed.

Amber would’ve done well to have controlled her temper, because what she didn’t know was that that woman was in fact the legendary witch Circe and she gave an evil smirk. “That girl has the manners of a wild boar,” she said. “Which truth be told, isn’t that bad an idea. When I’m done with her, she’ll be the world’s biggest boar."
1122311222.title: Mean Wereboar on Wheels

11223112221.content:
It wasn't long before Amber and Dale were down the street towards the post office where both the husband and wife worked. Dale however, was feeling uneasy about his wife losing her temper at the woman from earlier. "Amber," he said. "Don't you think you were a little too hard on that woman?" Amber gave a glare. "It was her fault for not looking before crossing the freakin' street. Besides, she looked like a deadbeat. Someone her age shouldn't dress like that. Get a job, freak." Dale shook his head. He knew no good could come from this.

Once the couple reached the post office, Amber parked the car and when she was about to walk out, she grunted because she hit her head on the ceiling of the car, as if she had mysteriously gotten taller. Then she struggled to squeeze out of the car door, as if she had mysteriously gotten wider. This resulted in her struggle breaking the door off the car as Dale looked in surprise. "Cheap, defective, piece of junk!" yelled the hot-tempered woman as she stomped away. Dale was the only one who knew it at the time but as he saw Amber walking into the post office, he noticed that not only had her butt grown to be five feet wide, but she also appeared to sprout a pig's tail.

Dale took off his glasses to rub them but he was still concerned for his wife. Speaking of which, Amber met with the postmaster who wasn't pleased she was late. "You're late, Wu." "Well, sorry," said Amber sarcastically. "Traffic was a nightmare." What Amber didn't notice was that he ears had started to form to a point and her teeth started to turn into fangs. "Maybe if you weren't such a road hog," said the postmaster. "Your temper is out of control." Amber let out a scoff. "You're starting to sound like my husband." The postmaster nodded his head. "Well, you and your husband will be delivering the mail down Main Street today and this time, he's driving. You're already too fired up to be in driving condition."

The Asian woman rolled her eyes. "Whoop de foo," she said in a snarky tone. "Back on the road from hell." Dale let out a sigh and his wife had to follow him out back. "By the way, Amber," said the postmaster. "You might want to have somebody look at your teeth, they look like fangs." Amber let out a snort but failed to notice that in her mouth at the sides, size razor sharp tusks were forming.

As Amber and Dale were in the mail truck making their rounds, Amber had bloated to ten feet tall and now looked like she weighed a ton and was feeling herself in the stomach. "All that anger is eating you alive inside," said Dale to his wife. "And I'm pretty sure that that woman did something to you. Haven't you noticed that you've gotten a little... bigger." Amber growled at her husband as they arrived to deliver a package. "Watch it, Dale." She said as she stepped out. "The sooner we get this deliver done, the better."

As Amber was walking towards the door and knocked on it, she accidentally caused the door to crack. "Huh?" asked Amber. Suddenly Amber grunted and then she yelled as her fingers turned to claws. "Amber!" yelled Dale. Amber's stomach and thighs ballooned up before her feet turned into hooves and burst right through her boots. Then six tusks sprouted out of the side of her mouth as it stretched out into a snout and her nose turned into that of a pig. Amber let out a snort that evolved into a squealing roar of agony as she was turned into a wereboar the size of a...
11223112221.title: Pig Headed Giantess

112231122212.content:
The size of a house. As Amber's transformation into a wereboar was almost complete, she had become 60ft tall with an 85ft belly and ass that tore through her postal pants as well as a pair of D-cup breasts that reduced her shirt to a bra. Finally, her tusks grew sharper and her remaining teeth turned into razor sharp yellow fangs as her skin turned blood red and grew fur all over her body to match. Amber let out a squeal as she held her head and her curly tail stood out. "Oh my gosh!" yelled Dale. Amber just continued to squeal as she dropped the package and walked up to the address, smashing the porch beneath her foot just as the homeowner walked out.

The man looked up at the giant boar woman in a postal outfit and screamed as he stood back. Amber looked down to reveal that her eyes were now glowing bright red. "Go ahead and take a picture, asshole," she said. "It'll last longer. What's the matter? Never seen a mail woman before." The homeowner was muttering in fear before Amber lowered her head and snorted steam into his face. "Don't just stand there looking like a dipstick, sign the stupid clipboard for your stupid package whatever the mother of **** it's supposed to be." "Amber," said Dale. "Calm down." "Shut up, Dale!" The customer nervously signed for his package and then ran off screaming. Amber just gave a snort. "He's not even taking the stupid package. That is unspeakably rude." "Uh, Amber," said Dale. "I think you should be more concerned at the fact that you're a giant wereboar."

Amber looked at her reflection in the side of another building and let out an angry squeal. "As if I didn't have enough trouble today. Amber then sat right down, forcing Dale to move out of the way to avoid being squished with the mail truck underneath his porcine wife's meteor-sized ass. Amber was breathing in and out from her snout as she was fuming with rage. "Uh," said Dale. "Amber, honey. I think maybe that woman you were arguing with earlier must've been a witch. She probably cast a spell on you to turn you into a wereboar." "Gee," said Amber sarcastically. "Did you figure that out or did that mouth breather mother of yours help you with it?!" "You need to calm down, Amber," said Dale. "Maybe if you apologized to her than..." Amber just spat a loogie out that landed at her tiny husband's feet. "Is it my fault that that woman was such a hothead?! Forget it! I wasn't in the wrong, so I won't apologize!"

Dale shook his head. "You know, my mother didn't want me to marry you. She told me that you were a stubborn pig. I guess now she's right on both counts." Amber then grabbed Dale and squeezed him between her clawed fingers as he yelled in pain. "I SWEAR DALE, IF YOU DON'T SHUT UP AND STOP LECTURING ME RIGHT NOW, I WILL MAKE YOU INTO *****ING HOG FEED!" Dale figured that there was no reasoning with his giant obese pig of a wife and made a gesture that he was zipping his lip. As Amber let out a snort and got up to stomp away, the remains of the mail truck fell from their spot being plastered to her right butt cheek.

Amber was stepping through traffic and people were beeping their horns at the giant pig woman. "Move it, Ms. Piggy!" yelled one driver as he tried to ram her heel with his car. "Out of the way, road hog!" Amber was getting angrier and angrier. "Yeah! That's REAL smart! Arguing with the 60ft tall pig woman! Shut your traps, jerks!" Dale just let out a sigh. If this was how mad she was now, she would be hard to live with from now on. As soon as they got back to the post office she would no doubt get into another fight with the postmaster. Dale knew Amber's temper was horrid before but now that she was a pig the size of a kaiju, it would only get worse.

Where is Amber headed now?
112231122212.title: Pigzilla

choices: Amber Drops Dale Down Her Awaiting Throat
Amber Catches the Scent of Truffles and Lets Dale Go
1122311222122.content:
Suddenly, Amber stomped off the road and Dale looked in surprise. “Uh, Amber,” he said. “Honey. Where are you going? The post office is the other way.” Amber gave a snort. “To hell with the stupid postmaster,” she said. “He can’t tell me what to do. I’m getting something to eat. I’m starving.” The pig giantess stomped away as her husband was trying to hold onto her shoulder. “Amber,” he said. “Don’t you think that we should report back to the post office first. We’re still on the job. If we take too much time off, we might get fired.” “Oh goodness me,” said Amber sarcastically and rather rudely. “That’s way worse than being turned into a giant, magenta-skinned, tremendously obese wild boar!” Dale shook her head as Amber walked away and yelled because somebody crashed their motorcycle into the pig giantess’s heel. The young man in the motorcycle gasped and got off his vehicle as Amber turned her head and gave him a vicious glare. The pig let out an angry squeal and then she stomped on the motorcycle to shatter it to pieces. This only served to make her squeal in more pain because some of the metal got stuck in the bottom of her hoof. “Dammit!” yelled the giant pig. “I stubbed my ****ing toe!” Amber dragged her foot in pain as she moved away.

“You know,” said Dale. “Your temper got you into this mess and a bad temper plus a 60ft pig woman is a bad combination. Somebody might decide that you’re a threat.” Amber turned her head and glared at her husband as she showed him her long tusks and her enormous teeth that looked more like the teeth of a shark than a pig. “Listen here, Dale,” she said. “I am really not in the mood for your preaching. If you keep this up, you’ll be sleeping in my ass for five weeks!” Dale shook his head. “She’s more stubborn than ever,” thought Dale to himself. “If she gets too mad she might wreck the city. Man, why didn’t I listen to mom. She told me that marrying such a stubborn pig would give me nothing but grief.”

Eventually, Amber’s stomping took her to a cornfield and the pig giantess licked her lips and tusks. “Amber,” said Dale. “What are you doing?” “What the mother of **** does it look like, Dale? I told you I was hungry. It’s feeding time.” “Amber! This isn’t our property!” “Shut your trap, Dale! Besides, the crows don’t own this cornfield either. Now leave me alone before I decide to eat you.” Dale just slapped himself in the face and let out a moan. “This is going to be a long, long, long day.” Amber let out a squeal and opened her mouth wide as she was messily devouring corn anad maize and scattering corn kernels over her face as she swallowed corn cobs. Dale gagged in disgust as his porcine giantess of a wife continued to devour her meal. She even went so far as to devour a scarecrow that was in the cornfield as well. In seconds, there was a large patch of dirt where there once was corn and Amber let out a loud belch that knocked several partridges out of the sky. The pig lowered her head and then noticed the birds on the ground before she slurped them up with her tongue as well and then let out a smaller but still very loud belch that made Dale cover his ears.

“Geez!” yelled Dale. “Show some class, Amber! You very nearly gave me tinnitus! If that came out the other side, I’d keel over.” Dale then looked and saw the damage that his wife’s feast had done. “Ugh. What a mess. You know, the people who planted all that corn aren’t going to like this.” “Oh yeah?” asked the wereboar giantess. “What are they going to do against a 60ft tall pig woman.” “60ft tall?” asked Dale. “Uh, Amber.” Amber heard a ripping sound and then saw her ass and thighs had expanded and reduced her postal pants to a loincloth that was barely big enough to cover her heart-printed panties. At this point, the pig woman had actually gotten bigger. She was now 85ft tall with a 110ft tall stomach and ass. She also had a prominent triple chin. “Oh geez,” grunted Amber. “Look at how big I am now.” Dale was legitimately afraid now. His wife was still getting bigger and bigger. Who knew how big she would be when she finally stopped. “Amber,” said Dale. “You’re now a pig the size of Godzilla. Perhaps maybe we should find that witch and apologize.” “When I fly!” yelled Amber at her husband. Amber then heard a loud gurgling noise and looked down to see her stomach was still growling. "You have got to be kidding me?" asked Amber. "I just ate and you're telling me I'm still ****ing hungry! What more do you want from me! The pig snorted angrily and then walked away to try and find something else to satisfy her stomach.

Amber walked up towards the reservoir and stomped in as a security guard spotted her and let out a scream. "Amber?!" yelled Dale to his giant porcine wife. "What are you doing now!? This is the reservoir!" Amber paid her tiny husband no heed and then stuck out her large tongue to suck up the water. "Hey!" yelled the guard. "Stop that, you, you pig!" The guard shot at Amber but her obese neck deflected the bullet. Amber let out a grunt and then turned her head as her eyes glowed bright yellow and the ginormous wereboar gave the guard an angry glare. "Excuse me," said the pig titaness. "Do I shoot at you when you're taking a drink!? I happen to have an upset stomach and I would appreciate being uninterrupted here!" The guard stepped back as Amber continued with her drink. Dale could only look in embarrassment. "I'm really sorry about my wife's boorish behavior. Ugh. Poor choice of words." The guard looked in surprise. "Your wife?! What could you possibly see in such a big, fat, mean, ugly porker." Amber held out her sharp fingernails and was about to grab the guard when Dale pulled on her ear to make her squeal in pain. "Let him live, Amber! Let him live!" The guard ran off right before Amber grabbed Dale and squeezed him as he yelled in pain. "Don't! You! Ever! Pull! My! Ear! Again!" Dale shivered in fear as his obese pig giantess of a wife stared down at him.

Soon, Amber had half-emptied the reservoir and rubbed her stomach before she let out another thunderous belch and then there was another gurgling. Without warning, the were boar giantess let out an enormous planet-shattering fart that completely devastated a nearby brick wall. "Oh my gosh!" yelled Dale as he coughed and grabbed hold of his nose. "Amber! That is so nasty!" "Oh cry me a ****ing river," said Amber to her minuscule husband. "I'm a literal pig. What do you expect. Just be glad you weren't at ground zero or you'd be a charred up skeleton by now! Come on Dale, we're leaving to find something else to put in my big belly." Dale could not believe it. "Seriously, Amber? You can't still be hungry?" Amber gave a snort. "What do you want from me?! I think that when I got turned into a wereboar, I was also cursed with an insatiable hunger. Oh, I need food right now!" The boar giantess walked away again in search of food and as she walked away, she went into the mountain area and started to tear away and eat an entire mountain as Dale looked on in disbelief. He walked onto one of his wife's six long tusks and then he heard his cellphone ringing.

Dale gulped and learned all too well that the postmaster was on the phone. "Oh no," he said. "The postmaster. Uh, hello.” “Dale!” shouted the postmaster on the phone. “Where the hell are you?! We need you and your wife back at the post office. You’ve been gone an hour longer than you should’ve!” “Uh, something happened that we didn’t see coming, sir.” “Did you get into an accident.” “Uh, not exactly.” “Well, you had better return quick or you’re both fired.” Dale gave a gulp as the postmaster hung up. At that moment, Amber had finished devouring the mountain and let out a snort. “Big mouth. I am really getting tired of him pushing us around!” “Amber, calm down. After all, he is our boss.” Amber gave a snort. “Boss, boss, boss. Let’s see him try to pick on me now.” “At any rate,” said Dale. "He's right. We need to get back to the post office as soon as possible. We don't want to lose our jobs."

Dale's enormous wereboar wife just gave a snort. "Oh sure," she said sarcastically. "We don't want to lose that deadened backbreaking job that pays the garbageman even more than us. Besides, I'm in charge of this relationship and we are not going anywhere until I've had enough to eat." Dale was completely mortified. "You have got to be kidding me! You just razed an entire cornfield, half-emptied out a reservoir and right now you've finished off an entire mountain. How can you still be..." The pig giantess just gave an angry roar. "What do you want from me, you little twerp!? Do you think I like being this hungry all the time!? Do you think I like being a giant gluttonous wereboar! I need something in my belly right now or my stomach is going to tear me apart!"

Suddenly something occurred to the titanic pig and then she stared at Dale who looked in surprise at his monstrous wife. Amber just gave a deep squeal. "Uh, Amber," said Dale. "Are you feeling okay." Dale then gasped as Amber adjusted her gaze to him and then opened her mouth and licked her tusks. Dale was horrified because his wife's intentions were clear. "Amber," he said. "Please control yourself." Dale then grunted as the boar woman grabbed him by the shirt and lifted him in the air over her head. "Dale, Sweetie," said Amber. "Do you remember what the preacher said at our wedding? Love, honor and obey? Well, you can honor my decision to drop you in my mouth." Amber opened her mouth wide and Dale looked down in pure fear at the pit that led to his porcine wife's stomach. "Amber! Snap out of it! That's just the curse talking! I'm your husband for crying out loud! Please don't eat me!"

But Amber at this point was drooling as she prepared to swallow her husband and let out a snort as she awaited her tiny snack.
1122311222122.title: Eat Like a Pig

11223112221222.content:
Amber licked her lips as she looked up at Dale and held her husband over her mouth. Dale looked at the bottomless pit below and sweated heavily. “Amber,” he said. “If you do this, you’ll be a cannibal! If you eat me, you’ll only want more humans and that will attract the attention of the army. You’ll be seen as a threat to the populace.” “You always have to rattle on, don’t you Dale,” said Amber impatiently. “Love, honor and obey. If you do love me, you will honor my decision to eat you and obey me by falling down my throat.” Dale saw no way out of his impending doom and his wife was drooling heavily as she prepared to eat him. She licked her tusks as she was getting ready to cannibalize her husband.

But before the 85ft tall wereboar could drop her husband into her awaiting stomach, Amber’s pig snout twitched and she closed her mouth. Dale was sweating and Amber turned her head. “What is that delicious aroma?” Amber placed Dale on the ground and got on all fours as she held her monumental, bright, apple-colored, curly tailed ass in the air and her nose to the ground. “Oh yes,” said the pig giantess with a squeal “That smells delicious.” Dale raised an eye in confusion. “What could she...? Well, as long as it keep her from eating me.” Amber started to violently dig into the ground as she squealed and bit away at the dirt. “Aha!”

Under the dirt, Amber had discovered a bushel of truffles growing in the ground. “That’s it.” Dale looked in shock. “Oh my gosh,” he said. “I’ve never seen so many truffles in one place.” Amber smiled, licked her lips and then drooled. “Oh yes. And they’re going to another place. Namely, my belly.” Amber shoved her face into the ground and scooped up an entire mouthful of enormous truffles. The pig woman messily devoured the truffles when Dale realized something. “That’s right,” he said. “Pigs are used to search for truffles. Amber!”

Amber gave a snort and turned her attention to her husband. “Do you mind!? I’m eating over here! I could still eat you, you know!” Dale found himself with a front row seat to his wife’s massive teeth and that made him nervous. He narrowly avoided being inside her mouth and he sure as heck didn’t want to risk getting eaten. “All I’m saying,” said Dale. "You can find truffles. Truffles are valuable. We could make a fortune." Amber gave a snort. "I have a better idea! I eat these truffles and you shut up!"

There was then the sound of strange laughter. That woman who cast the spell on Amber had appeared before the couple. "So," he said. "How are you enjoying the curse?" Amber let out a growl. "You!" You yelled. "The jaywalker! Give me one good reason why I shouldn't swallow you whole!" Dale then realized something. "Amber!" he yelled. "Don't do anything rash! That woman is the one who turned you into a wereboar to begin with." Amber glared as she looked down at the woman who was smiling wickedly.

“Just who the hell do you think you are!?” yelled Amber. The woman gave a scoff. “Have you even read the Odyssey? My face is well known in Greek Mythology.” Dale gave a gasp. “You’re Circe aren’t you? The witch who turned sailors into pigs.” Circe let out a laugh. “Not always. I turned Odysseus’s men into the animals that best fit their personality. Your wife was so stubborn, rude and might I say, pig-headed that I decided to make her outside match her inside. But with a twist. Her bad temper and personality would cause her to expand as long as she’s a pig.” Amber let out a squeal and tried to step on Circe, but Circe quickly moved out of the way. Then, Amber felt her pants rip even more than they already had and saw that she seemed to have gotten slightly taller. She was now 100ft tall and her ass and belly had expanded to 150ft wide and her breasts had ballooned to H-cups in scale.

"See, what I mean," said Circe as Amber crushed several trees underneath her large hooves. "You'll be a giant pig for the rest of your life. But then again, you were a pig before I made it much more apparent." Circe then faded away as Amber growled. "Amber," said Dale. "If you keep acting up, you'll only get bigger and fatter. You need to calm down." The wereboar giantess continued to growl. "Hear me out!" yelled Dale standing up for himself. "Your bad attitude is only getting you in more and more trouble. But your nose for truffles has given me and idea. We're probably going to be fired from the post office, but if we could dig for and sell truffles, it might more than make up for it. Would you be willing to control that awful temper of yours for the sake of logic."

But is Amber willing to listen to reason?
11223112221222.title: Saved by the Truffles

11223112222.content:
Diego and Angela Riviera were meant for each other. She was a painter and he was a wax sculptor. They never fought and while Diego was prone to making poor decisions and not thinking things through, Angela never held it against him and could see the good in anyone’s heart.

There was just one problem with their relationship. Diego was saddened by the fact that he married a woman who was born blind. It didn’t bother Angela or affect her ability to paint the most visceral pictures this side of their town, it broke Diego’s heart that his wife couldn’t see the world in all its beauty. He wished that he could find some way to open her eyes.

That day, Diego was going into town to do some shopping. Angela’s birthday was coming up and while she’d be happy with anything he gave her, he wanted to give his wife the one thing that nobody could give her. The power to see.

As Diego was pondering what to do, he heard screaming and turned his head. “Holy frijoles!” he shouted as he saw an old man drowning in a nearby lake. Wasting no time, Diego dove in after the man and pulled him to safety. The man gave a gasp and sputtered before he saw the young man that saved him. “Gracias young man,” he said. “I owe you my life.” “No problemo,” said Diego. “I can’t ignore a dude in trouble. That’s my wife rubbing off on me.” “Oh?” asked the man. Diego gave a frown. “My wife, Angela, she’s the greatest. She’s turning 28 next week and…”

“You seem to be troubled young man,” said the old man. “What is wrong?” “Angela is the sweetest woman I’ve ever met. She’s put up with this idiot without so much as a complaint and she’s the best painter I’ve met. But, she’s blind. I’ve always wanted for her to be able to see. That’s what I’d like to give her, but I’m not sure how…” The old man stroked his beard.

“I think I might have something that is the answer to your prayers.” The man took out a strange red vial that had a had a horned face with one giant bulging eye on the front as Diego looked in confusion. “What is that?” he asked. “These are the tears of a cyclops, a legendary potion believed to give sight to the blind. Think of it as my gratitude to you for saving my life.”

The offer was too good to pass up and he wanted to give Angela the gift of sight, so he took the potion. “Thanks man! You’re a saint.” As Diego walked away with the cyclops tears, the old man suddenly remembered something. “Oh no,” he said. “Should I have told that young man about the side effects of the cyclops tears? For that matter, what were the side effects?"
11223112222.title: Cyclops Tears

choices: She Actually Likes Being a Cyclops
112231122221.content:
Unfortunately, Diego was going to learn that his good deed would come back to haunt him. On the night of Angela's birthday, after dinner, Diego showed his wife the potion, or more accurately told his blind wife what it was. "Cyclops tears?" asked the blind painter. "That's right Angie," said Diego. "Happy birthday. The man I saved told me that this potion will cure your blindness."

Angela was reluctantly to let her husband go through with it. "Come on, Baby," said Diego. "I want you to see how beautiful the world can be. You've been so good to me for years and you deserve to see. Just drink the tears and you can kiss your blindness good bye." Angela was reluctant but she could hear her husband's heartbeat and realized that he was being honest with her and could feel how sad he was about her condition. The blind woman smiled. "If it makes you happy, Honey."

Angela took the vial and drank the contents before she felt her head and Diego ran to her. "Angela!" he yelled. "What's wrong." Angela raised her head and looked in surprise but then smiled. "So that's the man I married?" she asked. "I picked a real handsome one." Diego smiled. The potion worked. Angela could see. "Well," said Angela to her husband. "I guess I don't need these sunglasses anymore."

However, as Angela took off her sunglasses, Diego gave a look of surprise at his wife's face. "Diego?" asked Angela. "What's wrong? You look a little pale." Diego couldn't believe it. Instead of two eyes under her glasses, Angela had only one eye, which was strange given how Diego distinctively remembered her having two eyes. "Aye Carumba." Said Diego. "Angela, whatever you do, don't look in the mirror. D'oh!"

Diego had completely forgotten that whenever you tell somebody not to look into the mirror, they do just that and Angela walked up to a mirror they had in the hallway and let out a scream as she saw she only had one eye. "All these years I've only had one eye?" she asked. "Diego. You could've told me early." "What?! Angela, you had two eyes just this morning and..." Suddenly Angela grunted as two horns grew on each side of her forehead and her skin turned bright red-orange and her fingers turned into claws. "Oh no." Said Diego. Angela was growing bigger both in high and weight. Her belly was expanding as well as her thighs and she was quickly starting to tower over her husband.

In no time at all, Diego looked up to see his wife turned into a fifteen foot tall, three ton cyclops. "What have I done!" yelled Diego. "I'm such an idiot! I tried to do something nice but I turned my wife into a cyclops. I should never have given her those cyclops tears. Idiot." Angela looked around and was speechless at the creature she had turned into.

The question is how would she react.
112231122221.title: The Price of Sight

1122311222212.content:
Diego was expecting Angela to be very mad at him for what happened, or at least freaked out that she had been mutated into a giant and quite heavyweight cyclops. However, the formerly blind woman just looked around at her new form and looked in the mirror as she tried to access her situation. She even blinked to confirm that she indeed had only one eye. “Angela,” said Diego. “I am very sorry about what just happened. I have got to be the worst...” However, Angela just let out a cheerful laugh and held her gut as the laughter got to her and she had to breathe in and out a few times. “Whatever do you have to be sorry for, Diego?” asked Angela. “This has got to be the best birthday present anyone’s ever given me.” Diego was surprised and dumbfounded at what his now colossal wife had just said just as she bent over to speak with him. “Are you telling me that you actually like being a Cyclops?” Angela bent down to speak with her husband and gave him a smile that seemed somewhat unnerving with her new and much sharper teeth. “Okay,” said Angela. “So maybe I’ve put on a ton or two. Maybe I’m a monster. But in the land of the blind, the one eyed woman is queen. I should be grateful to finally have one good eye. Hmm, I never noticed how handsome you were.”

The cyclops smiled down at her husband who smiled nervously. “I was seriously expecting her to be seriously pissed off,” thought Diego to himself. “But instead I find out that my wife enjoys being a cyclops. What exactly where in those cyclops tears?” Angela then kissed Diego and made him slightly uncomfortable but then Diego blushed. “Okay,” he thought. “Those sharp teeth are going to take some getting used to and one eye is definitely something that I’ll have to acquire a taste for. But she was blind when I married her so I guess things could be worse.” Angela then lifted up Diego who let out a grunt. “What?!” yelled Diego. “Angela? What are you doing, Honey.” Angela then held her husband like luggage and gave a smile as she took him upstairs. “It may be my birthday,” said the one-eyed behemoth. “But I’ve got a gift for you to thank you for this amazing new lease on life.” Diego immediately realized exactly what his wife had planned and was somewhat horrified. “Oh geez,” Diego said to himself. “This could get hairy.”

Once the two of them got upstairs, Angela proceeded to chain Diego up to the bed and had stripped him to his underwear. “I wonder if Odysseus ever had to deal with this?” asked Diego. Angela then proceeded to walk out of the closet and the 15ft tall cyclops was wearing a train conductor’s outfit complete with a cap. She stared hungrily at her husband with her one eye and gave an excited smile. “All aboard, Baby.” Said the cyclops amazon. Diego screamed in terror and then screamed in ecstasy right before his cyclops wife proceeded to destroy his body, hard. His screaming was so loud that the neighbors could hear it. “What are the Riviera’s doing up there?” asked one old woman. “It sounds like somebody is being sadistically tortured. “Angela!” yelled Diego. “Stop it! Oh, I don’t think I can take any more! How could something that hurts so bad feel so good!” Angela let out a giggle. “Come on, Baby. Take it like a man.” “Don’t stop now! Oh!” The female neighbor was absolutely horrified at what she was hearing.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - -

The very next morning, Diego was laying in bed in absolute pain with a smile plastered on his face. His chest was covered in scratch marks, no doubt from his cyclops of a wife playing a little too rough with him. “And I thought she was a terror in bed before,” said Diego. “Ugh. That man could’ve given me a potion to turn her into something a lot more gentle.” Diego then looked around in surprise because from the looks of it, Angela was nowhere in sight. “Angela?” he asked. “Angie? Where did? Oh!” Diego felt himself in absolute pain because he had yet to recover from the beating his wife inflicted on him last night in bed. He immediately grabbed his shirt and ran downstairs to find something strange. The door appeared to have been broken off of the hinges and there were large footprints wedged into the floor. No doubt they were made by Angela, but Diego noticed something rather strange about the footprints. Namely, he noticed that the footprints appeared to be deep and looked like Angela’s feet had gotten bigger. Diego turned his head and saw that the rug was missing as well. “It can’t be,” thought Diego. “Can it? I better check out the studio to see what’s up with Angela.

Diego noticed the car was still in the driveway (though given how Angela was currently too big to fit in the car, he couldn’t really be surprised), so he decided to drive to the studio where he and Angela created their sculptures and paintings respectively. As he was driving, he noticed more of Angela’s footprints in the ground and looked in shock. They did indeed seem to have gotten much bigger. “Oh my,” said Diego to himself. “Oh my. Oh my. Good grief.” Diego ran out into the studio and saw something that surprised him. His cyclops wife now stood 25ft high with a 30ft stomach and 15ft wide ass and D-Cup breasts. Her hair also seemed to have gotten long and from the looks of it, she was wearing the rug from the living room as an improvised skirt and was only wearing a bra as something else. The Cyclops was blissfully painting a large mural.

Diego took a look at his wife’s mural and saw that it was more brightly colored than her usual work, mainly because now she could see the colors she was painting. The painting mainly depicted numerous animals. In one corner appeared to be the Great Wall of China and there appeared to be a giant jellyfish riding piggyback on a rhinoceros who was jogging and standing on his hind legs. In another corner of the painting there was a wolfman riding in a buggy and dressed in a pilot’s outfit yelling at a yeti who passed by him in a zamboni. In another corner, there was a mummy selling zombie faces to a tapir dressed like a kindergartner and in the fourth corner there was a sea turtle and a chameleon that appeared to have robbed a bank filled with sea urchins. In the center of the painting, an enormous dragon was looking down at a devil and a gecko in the middle of a boxing match. Angela seemed very pleased at what she was painting. That was when she looked down and finally noticed her husband.

“Oh,” said Angela. “Hi, Diego. Sorry I got up early. I wanted to get an early start on painting, now that I can actually see my work. So, how does it look.” Diego took a look at Angela’s painting and smiled. “Baby,” he said. “That is hands down one of the best pieces of artwork I have ever seen." Angela bent down just so she could kiss her tiny husband and then let out a giggle. "Thanks, Babe," she said. "The sky's the limit. Now I must get to work on another painting." Diego was curious as to where Angela got a canvas so big but then he saw that the giant cyclops woman was actually using oversized billboards as canvases for her paintings and gasped. However, she was painting again and Diego didn’t like to stifle his wife’s creativity and shrugged his shoulders as he decided he needed to figure out how to make a wax sculpture that would be good enough to sell. That was when he spotted his wife and then he smiled as he went to work putting together a mold.

After half a day, Diego had managed to create a wax sculpture of Angela’s cyclops form painting at her canvas. “So?” asked Diego. “What do you think.” Angela gave a smile and nodded her head. “Very good. But do you think anybody will be interested in a wax sculpture of a cyclops.” “Why not?” asked Diego. “It’s modeled after the most beautiful cyclops that I know.” Angela let out a giggle and picked up her husband to give him a kiss, accidentally coating him in her saliva in the process right before he shivered. But then he gave a nervous laugh. "Well," he said. "In a few hours, I'll show the sculpture and your first painting from today to Don Blanco and we'll see how well he likes it." Angela gave a smile. "Oh," she said. "I'm sure that we won't have any problems.” That’s what Diego thought. As he later drove off to meet with the art dealer, he was beginning to realize something really painful. What would people think if they knew a giant cyclops was the artist. The sculptor could only hope for the best.

When Diego arrived at Don Blanco estate to sell him the painting and sculpture, the dealer looked quizzically at the sculpture of Angela, not realizing who it was the sculpture was supposed to represent. "I think we should be able to find a buyer for your wax cyclops, Diego. But what possessed you to create something like that in the first place." Diego hastily tried to think of an explanation and gave a rather nervous sounding laugh. "Well, you know how people make sculptures of Greek gods and heroes. I figured that there weren't enough statues of Greek monsters." "I see. Is that supposed to be a woman? Well, art is in the eye of...." Before Don Blanco could finish his sentence, he let out a gasp because he had noticed Angela's mural. "Is that your wife's painting?" "Uh," said Diego. "Yes."
