"It's unlike anything I've seen from her before. It's not like her to use such bright colors. Especially since she's blind." "Uh," said Diego. "Not anymore."

Of course, there was something about the mural that puzzled Don Blanco. "I've never actually met your wife," he said. "But from the looks of it, Angela had no more trouble creating such a large scale painting than she would a normal-sized painting. I'd like to meet this artist." Diego gave a gulp. "I got to warn you. You do not want to do that, Don Blanco. Let's just say she got a makeover that's... well, alarming." "Nonsense," said Don Blanco. "An artist should not be judged based on looks. I'd like to meet this mysterious painter if you don't mind."

Diego was sweating. He didn't know what to say about that proposition.
1122311222212.title: The Cyclops Who Paints

112231122222.content:
It all began at a carnival between two of the carnies. There was Daphne the acrobat and Atlas the strongman. The two of them were dating and practicing their routine. Atlas was effortlessly lifting two benches covered in cinderblocks while his girlfriend was walking a very thin tightrope. Atlas however had a tendency to get distracted by the young redhead on the rope to the point that he wasn’t paying attention to where he was swinging.

Rollo the dwarf walked in and it was only his short height that prevented him from getting whacked. “Hey, Atlas, quit gawking at Daphne. Mr. Burns isn’t going to like it if you keep getting distracted.” Daphne just gave a scoff. “Leave him alone, Rollo. He can’t help if he likes what he sees.” “What’s not to like?” asked Atlas. “Why did you come in here anyway, Rollo?” Rollo let out a gulp. “The new attraction that Mr. Burns bought has arrived and it’s making me nervous. He said it was a genuine weretiger.”

Atlas and Daphne both let out laughs. “That ringmaster has been pulling your leg. There’s no such thing as a real weretiger.” “I’m not sure about that,” said Rollo. “It doesn’t look like any species of tiger I’ve ever seen.” Daphne jumped down from the rope as Atlas put down his weights. “Alright, Chicken Little. We’ll see this so-called weretiger.”

The couple walked into the next tent and saw a tiger in a cage. It was a big bright pinkish red tiger with blood red stripes and appeared to have glowing eyes as it walked around in its cage. “Huh,” said Atlas. “Rollo might’ve had a point. That’s a strange looking pussycat.”

However, Daphne was unafraid and walked to the cage before turning to face her strongman boyfriend. “You’re starting to believe in Rollo’s pessimism, Sweetie,” said the acrobat. “This is just an ordinary tiger. The ringmaster got ripped… ow!” Without warning, the tiger bit Daphne on the rear and caused her to jump back. As the tiger roared, Atlas ran and banged on the cage to intimidate it. “You do that again and I’ll make you into a rug, you mangy cat! Daphne! Are you okay?”

Daphne grunted. “I’m fine. Like I said, somebody found a particularly irritable tiger and painted it before telling Mr. Burns it was a weretiger. Now let’s get away from that awful creature."

As Daphne was walking away, she didn’t notice her ass getting bigger and she also didn’t notice bright red stripes appearing on her body.
112231122222.title: Tiger Bomb

1122311222221.content:
It wasn't long before everyone in the circus was getting ready for the show. Of course, Daphne was having trouble getting her nylons on since her legs were somehow, much thicker. "Come on," groaned Daphne. "Come on! Fit dammit! You fit this morning." A woman dressed as an animal tamer walked by and noticed Daphne struggling. "It looks like you're putting on a little weight, Daphne. If you're not careful, we're going to have a new fat lady in the carnival. "Shut up, Jane. I'm just swollen because that alleged "weretiger" just bit me. It's all. Now, the show will be on in a few minutes."

It wasn't long before the show was about to commence and Mr. Burns, the ringmaster stepped up as he saw there was a full house. "Welcome one and all to the Cirque de Flame! I am Mr. Burns and I will be your ringmaster tonight! We have an astounding show tonight!" Everyone was cheering as the show was about to start.

"First up," said Mr. Burns. "Meet my son, Pyro! Our 16-year-old, fire-eater!" As usual, Pyro started the show and not only swallowed the flames off of a burning stick but he blew out several flames in the shape of roaring dragons as everyone cheered. All while the flame eater was entertaining the masses, Daphne had managed to get her costume on and it was beginning to rip as she growled and it appeared that there were stripes reaching up to her arms now. But she didn't think about that right now and had to climb up to the trapeze as her boyfriend, Atlas looked on.

"Next up!" yelled Mr. Burns. "It's Beauty and the Beast! Our animal tamer, Jane, and Tarzan the gorilla." Jane, the animal trainer was standing on the shoulders of Tarzan the gorilla as the ape rode a unicycle and both animal and trainer were juggling oranges. This got the crowd's attention as Daphne looked down and smiled. Soon it would be her turn to wow the crowd.

"And now," said Mr. Burns. "I give you, Atlas, the strongest man alive." Atlas was at the time balancing an elephant with one hand while spinning a piano on his other hand's index finger and quickly tapped at it to play music, just as everyone who looked on cheered. "And for the moment you've been waiting for," said Mr. Burns. "Dazzling Daphne, the acrobat and her catlike reflexes! And speaking of cats, after Daphne's performance, you will see a creature believed initially to only exist in the mind, a genuine were tiger. But for now, gave open Daphne."

Everyone cheered on as Daphne waved down and leapt into the air, grabbing a trapeze and swinging 180 degrees before she held her legs in a position to the letter D. All male eyes (even the married ones) were on her, but one quick glare from Atlas changed that before the strongman gave a smug smile and then looked up at his girlfriend as she leapt into the air and bounced off two poles before descending to the ground and landing on all fours. Not only did the crowd look in surprise, but so did the carnival staff. "That's strange," said Jane. "I didn't know she could..." "No," said Rollo the dwarf. "No one could do that. At least no human I've ever seen."

Suddenly Daphne begun to groan as red stripes surrounded her body and the crowd's gasped. She started to get bigger and heavier, growing past 15 feet and 3 tons as her outfit tore apart and she sprouted cat's ears and a tail. "Daphne?" asked Atlas. Daphne gave a nervous laugh and showed her teeth turned into fangs. "It's okay everyone," she said. "Remember, it's all part of the show, all part of the..." Daphne roared out that last line as she sprouted whiskers and her nose turned black like that of a cat.

"O...M..G." Said Mr. Burns in pure horror as he looked back and nearly fainted, requiring Pyro to catch him. "I thought the man who sold you the tiger was ripping us off." said the teenage flame eater. "Pyro, my boy," said Mr. Burns. "This is much worse."

Daphne let out a roar as her transformation into a beast was nearing its completion. Despite the danger, Atlas ran up to his girlfriend. "Daphne," he said. "What's wrong." But Daphne just roared at him as she begun to sprout fur.

She had transformed into...
1122311222221.title: Tiger on the Trapeze

11223112222212.content:
A white tiger. Daphne had fully transformed into a pure white tiger as her stripes turned pitch black and her formerly red hair turned pure silver. Daphne was now a 35ft tall white tiger and a rather obese one at that. Had she been human sized, she would weigh a ton as she now had a 50ft wide belly and butt and she stood on all fours. Her legs and arms were as thick as tree trunks and her breasts were now H-cups. The circus staff looked in horror as Daphne let out a loud roar. Atlas could not believe what his girlfriend had turned into.


“Oh my gosh,” thought Atlas to himself as Daphne was looking around. “That was a real weretiger after all. And its turned Daphne into a weretiger as well.” Daphne roared in absolute panic and feared the worst, but that’s when the tiger giantess was promptly caught by surprise. The entire crowd cheered as they spotted her. “So that’s the weretiger?” “She’s gorgeous!” “I wasn’t expecting a white tiger. Those are the most beautiful ones.” “The lady turned into a big tiger.” The circus staff was stunned. The crowd wasn’t afraid of Daphne’s transformation and instead thought it was part of the show. Mr. Burns even took out a cloth to wipe off his sweat and gave a nervous laugh that soon turned into a genuine laugh. “Behold, ladies and gentlemen and boys and girls of all ages,” said Mr. Burns. “The wonder of transformation. You have just witnessed beauty become the beast.” Daphne smiled nervously as the crowd cheered for her and she even let out a growling purr.


What nobody knew was that in the back, the pink weretiger that bit Daphne, as it was walking around in its cage, it underwent a transformation itself, the pink weretiger let out a roar that evolved into a laugh before it started to bloat as grow as well. The pink tiger grew bigger and fatter and burst out of its cage as it showed its teeth. The pink tiger’s shape changed until it revealed itself to be a female tiger as it appeared to have breasts like a human being as well as long strawberry blonde hair. This tiger was now just as big as Daphne and gave a smirk as she spoke. “How’s that for a show.” The pink tigress heard the crowd cheering and decided to investigate.


Inside, the circus was taking advantage of Daphne’s transformation and had crafted a rather large hoop and set it on fire. Daphne gave a growl and then glared down at Jane. “I’m going to get you for this, Jane,” growled the white tigress rather angrily. “Just because I’ve turned into a weretiger doesn’t mean I’m an animal you can sadistically boss around.” Jane just gave a sneer. “You’re just lucky that we happened to have a hoop big enough for your ass.” “Watch your language,” said Mr. Burns. “There are children present. Now, everybody, Dazzling Daphne will jump through a burning ring of fire.” The crowd was beginning to laugh. “Do they actually think they can get that fat cat through the ring?” “I know, she’s ginormous?” “Where did they get a ring of fire big enough for that big pussy.” Daphne gave a confident grin and then leapt right through the ring, creating a small earthquake as she landed and everybody cheered. Daphne gave a smile and Atlas looked up and smiled at his girlfriend. “She’s going to be tough to beat in bed.” Said Pyro mockingly to Atlas.


Suddenly the large pink weretiger let out a growl and jumped through the hoop next, catching both staff and audience by surprise. The pink tigress let out a roar. “It’s good to be free!” yelled the pink tigress. “Is that the weretiger that bit Daphne?” asked Jane in horror. “Yes,” said Atlas. “But she’s super huge now. I didn’t even know the first tiger was a girl.” Daphne looked in surprise and the pink tigress smiled at her. “Daphne, I presume,” said the pink tigress. “I’m Dahlia and this is my true size. Boy, have I got a story for you for how I wound up in that cage. But first things first. It’s show time.” Daphne didn’t mind sharing the spotlight but was surprised at the first weretiger revealing herself to be sentient. The crowd was surprised themselves. “A second giant tiger? What kind of a circus is this?” Both tigresses smiled and took turns leaping through the hoop and shaking the ground before both of the tigresses gave a roar.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

Very soon, the show was over and Dahlia and Daphne were both devouring raw steaks. Daphne gave a look of disgust as the rest of the staff watched her eat. "This is absolutely disgusting," said Daphne. "I prefer cooked meat, but I can't stop eating." Dahlia let out a scoff. "You get used to it after a while. If you don't eat raw meat every day, you'll get a craving for people." Dahlia grit her teeth at Rollo and frightened the dwarf.

"Now let me get this straight," said Mr. Burns. "Dahlia, was it? You were a weretiger all the way from India and a local mystic tranquilized you, shrinking you into that form we saw you in and put you in a cage hoping to get rid of you." Dahlia then let out a loud belch. "That was the idea. I kinda romped on a village or two back in Asia. Sorry about the nasty nip, Daphne. The only way I could've returned to normal was to bite a virgin. That's the only way I can transmit the curse as well." Jane then let out a laugh at Daphne's expense. "You're a virgin, Daphne? You've been dating Atlas for how long and he hasn't popped your cherry?" Daphne growled at Jane as she kept laughing. "I can eat you with one gulp, Jane," said Daphne. "Don't tempt me."

Mr. Burns let out a sigh. "Well, this is going to make the Cirque de Flame a lot more interesting." Pyro nodded his head. "Dahlia," said Mr. Burns. "If you're going to stay here, there are going to be a few ground rules. The most important one is that you are not allowed to eat anyone, staff or customer." Dahlia let out a scoff. "Fine with me. Humans give me horrible gas anyway." "Well," said Pyro. We all better turn in. We'll get up bright and early tomorrow to move the circus."

Once everyone else had left, Atlas approached Daphne and Dahlia. "Dahlia," said Daphne. "This is my boyfriend, Atlas." Dahlia gave a growl as Atlas looked up in fear. "Oh yes. The man who threatened to flay me. I hear you're the strongest man alive. Why don't you prove it by trying to lift one of us." "I do not make bets with weretigers." Said an annoyed Atlas. Dahlia let out a scoff. "Oh. I get it, the alleged strongman is nothing more than an ant." Atlas got really mad as Dahlia laughed at him and Daphne bit her lip. "Atlas, don't let her get to you." But Atlas was determined. "You're on!"

Atlas decided he was going to prove his strength by trying to lift up one of the giant obese tigresses. But which one?
11223112222212.title: The Two Tigers

112231122222121.content:
Dahlia's glowing yellow eyes stared down as the pink tigress scratched her obese stomach and wagged her large tail back and forth like a pendulum. "So, little man," said the weretiger giantess. "Are you ready to pick your poison? Which of us is it going to be." Atlas looked at Dahlia's smirking face and then back at Daphne's worried face. The obese white tiger giantess couldn't believe that her husband was willing to accept such a suicidal challenge. Atlas saw the worried look in Daphne's eyes and realized that he probably couldn't trust Dahlia to play fair, so he nodded his head. "Daphne," he said. "I'm going to need you to trust me on this."

Daphne gave a distressed growl. "Atlas," she said. "Are you crazy? You can't agree to that challenge." Dahlia let out a scoff. "It's okay, Daphne. If you like being the girlfriend to a bug, I'm not one to stop you." Atlas gave a glare at Dahlia before maneuvering around Daphne's enormous body that kept shifting as Daphne tried to convince her boyfriend not to try anything. "Baby," said Atlas confidently. "I got this. I'm the strongman of this circus, remember?" "No human is strong enough to lift a 50ft tall tiger, Atlas. Besides, if I was still human sized, I would weigh at least a few thousand pounds." Atlas rolled his eyes, obviously not wanting to further argue with his colossal girlfriend and simply slide underneath Daphne's multi-rolled stomach and through the gap between her striped black and white legs.

Then Atlas grabbed Daphne by the flesh her left butt cheek and made her grunt. Atlas was groaning to himself in effort as he was trying to lift his giant white tiger girlfriend over his shoulder. Pyro heard the noise and came to investigate and looked in horror at what Atlas was doing. Atlas continued to pull on his girlfriend's ass and made her meow rather loudly and in distress as he actually managed to get her feet to move across the ground. "Oh no." Said Pyro. Pyro immediately ran off as Atlas was sweating heavily. "I know Dahlia's bite turned her into a giant weretiger," thought the strongman to himself as he finally managed to budge Daphne. "But why the hell did it have to make her fat as well? What sense does that make." Atlas then managed to finally lift up Daphne, much to Dahlia's surprise as the white tiger giantess was flailing her arms in the air and growling nervously.

Meanwhile, Mr. Burns was in his office trying to make heads or tails of what was going on. "I can't believe it. I get suckered into buying a cursed weretiger that turns out to be a Godzilla-sized fatso and then turns my main acrobat into an enormous tiger as well. The crowd thought it was all part of the show. Why did I get into the circus business in the first place?" Mr. Burns then walked up to a painting on the wall and revealed a safe inside before he took out a bottle of wine. "I just hope I don't have to deal with anymore supernatural surprises for a long time. At least this is ending better than that freak show with the mind-reading clown up North. Mr. Burns had trouble opening the bottle and tried to remove the cork when Pyro burst in.

"Dad!" yelled the fire eater. "Trouble!" Pyro's interruption caused a startled Mr. Burns to drop the bottle on the floor and break it. "Dammit, Pyro!" yelled the ringmaster. "That bottle was 15 years old. I was really looking forward to..." "It's Atlas!" yelled Pyro. "He's trying to lift Daphne into the air!" Mr. Burns grabbed his chest as if he was having a heart attack. "What?! You're kidding me! Daphne and Dahlia are both over nine times his size and a thousand times his weight! He'd have to be Superman to lift either of those fat cats!" Mr. Burns and Pyro ran out in an attempt to stop Atlas's fool hearty actions.

Atlas at the time was still holding up Daphne who appeared to have gotten even larger, especially in the ass. From a far away perspective, Atlas looked like an ant trying to lift an enormous tigress. Of course, Daphne's weight was putting a massive strain on her strongman boyfriend's body and it took all the concentration Atlas had just to avoid cracking under the pressure. Dahlia was looking down and was impressed as she seductively looked on at Atlas. "My, my, my," said the pink weretigress titan. "He's a lot stronger than he looks. Meow. Maybe we can share him after this is over." "What?!" yells Daphne at the rather audacious suggestion coming from the other tigress. Then, Daphne heard a tearing found and her nylons were coming loose as her thighs were expanding. She looked back to see her leotard appeared to be coming undone as well. "Oh my! Am I getting fatter." Daphne then saw that Dahlia looked bigger and fatter as well. "That goes with the curse," says Dahlia. "You're gonna be really huge really soon."

As Daphne was getting bigger, it was getting harder and harder for Atlas to hold up his white weretiger lover and he could hear bones cracking and it sounded like they were his own. Mr. Burns and Pyro ran in just in time to see exactly what Atlas was doing. "Atlas!" yelled Mr. Burns. "You idiot! What possessed you into trying something so stupid!" Atlas just gave a grunt. "Leave me alone. I'm busy taking that smart aleck newcomer down a peg." Mr. Burns turned to Dahlia who gave a feline smirk. "You dared Atlas to do this?!" yelled the ringmaster up to the pink tiger giantess. "Why I oughta..." "Dad," said Pyro. "I really don't think threatening a tiger the size of a skyscraper is a good idea." Mr. Burns looked up at Dahlia's large toothy smile and realized that Pyro made a rather good point. "Oh, crap." Grunted Mr. Burns.

Atlas was now sweating rather heavily and his back was bending as his knees were cracking. There was no way that he could keep holding up Daphne for long and Daphne was hissing and shaking as she tried to escape her minuscule boyfriend's grip. "Put me down!" yelled Daphne. "Put me down, Atlas! This is insane!" Atlas was huffing and puffing and from the looks of it, he was quickly getting tired and he had to admit that perhaps he had made a horrible mistake agreeing to the challenge. But he wasn't about to give up so soon, despite all the agony he was in. Daphne was screaming as Atlas was collapsing underneath her. Mr. Burns lowered his head to Atlas’s level. “Atlas, sometimes it’s better to be a living coward than a dead idiot! Put down the giant tiger already!” But Atlas wouldn’t budge and Mr. Burns let out a groan. “Pyro,” he said. “Remind me to never get involved with anyone selling supernatural looking felines ever again. This is a disaster.” Atlas just continued to stubbornly hold up Daphne and panted. He couldn’t hold on any longer and suddenly...

BOOM!

Atlas had collapsed under Daphne’s weight and found himself fatigue and flattened but alive underneath Daphne’s enormous white and black striped butt cheeks. Daphne gasped and got up. “Atlas!” she yelled out. “Atlas!” Dahlia gave a laugh because Atlas was still stuck in between the white tiger lady’s enormous ass cheeks. Daphne turned her head with four chins as Dahlia pulled out Atlas and placed him on the white tigress’s nose. “Atlas!” yelled Daphne. “Speak to me! Atlas!” Atlas just let out a groan. "I'm fine, baby," he said. "Just reached my limit. Ouch." Mr. Burns grabbed hold of his hair and let out a groan. "You should not have done something so stupid, Atlas! You're lucky you're not a red stain on a white and black striped ass." Mr. Burns even fainted and Pyro had to catch the ringmaster before he fell to the ground.

Daphne grabs hold of Mr. Burns and rubbed his tiny form against her (face) cheek as she purred. “Thank goodness you’re alright.” Atlas let out a scoff. “Strongest man alive, remember. Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!” Atlas held his shoulder in pain. He had pulled more than a few muscles trying to lift up his obese giant tiger girlfriend. “Don’t you move around too much, Atlas,” said Daphne. “You’re going to further hurt yourself.” Atlas and Daphne then heard Dahlia giving a purr herself. "Looks like you're tougher than I gave you credit for, little man." Dahlia gave a wink at Atlas that made Daphne growl slightly. "I'm going to have to keep an eye on this new tigress." Said Dahlia.
112231122222121.title: Sucker Bet

1122311222222.content:
On the night before Halloween, out in the countryside, there was a man and his wife out in the field looking for the perfect pumpkin. “How about this one, Jack?” asked the ginger haired goth girl to her husband.

Jack walked up to the pumpkin that his girlfriend was looking at. “Getting warmer,” said Jack. “But it has a slight bruise. We want the pumpkin to be just right for the Landers family jack-o-lantern. Especially since this is our first Halloween with Cythnia.” Samantha gave a smile. Earlier the two of them had been blessed with a beautiful baby girl that resembled her mother right down to her pale skin.

“I’ll be sure that we’ll find the perfect pumpkin. I can’t wait to carve it out.” Jack let out a laugh and Samantha smiled but then the goth girl spotted something that caught her attention. In the field there was a bright silver colored pumpkin that appeared to have a stem shaped like a crown. She found herself drawn to the pumpkin and lifted it up. “Whatcha got there, Samantha?” asked Jack.

Samantha took the pumpkin off the vine and smiled. “The perfect pumpkin, for our little pumpkin.” Jack took his wife by the shoulder before they returned home to their farmhouse. In a crib in the center, their daughter was sleeping away. Samantha smiled and walked to kiss Cynthia. “Good night, sweetie,” she said. “Tomorrow, Mommy will show you how to make the perfect jack-o-lantern.”

That’s what Samantha thought, but she neglected to read a special seal that was underneath the pumpkin. It was a plaque that read, “This is the Great Pumpkin, the mighty king of the pumpkin patch. Anyone who dares to pluck this pumpkin, will become the largest pumpkin monarch the world has ever known".
1122311222222.title: Queen of the Pumpkin Patch

11223112222221.content:
The very next day, it was Halloween and Jack and Samantha had decorated their house to look like a cross between a prison and a morgue. The fence had been lined with barbed wire with plastic skeletons inside of it and the windows were painted with fake blood while fake tombstones lined the garden. Indoors, Samantha had dressed up Cynthia in her Halloween costume. Cynthia was wearing a tiny costume that made her look like a baby vampire who was giggling. "The most adorable vampire I've ever seen," said Samantha. "That was my first Halloween costume too." Cynthia giggled as Samantha tickled the little baby under her chin. Jack just let out a sigh. "I still think that we should've dressed her up as a werewolf. She would've made a better werewolf than vampire." Samantha just let out a laugh. "Come on, Jack," she said. "This is Cynthia's first Halloween ever. We've got to get this right and make sure she has some fun. Besides, you know that as cute as our little girl is, she’d look good in anything. Just you wait. By the time tonight is over, Cynthia is going to love Halloween as much as us.”

Jack looked around at the decorations and then took a look at his daughter. “I sure hope so,” said Jack. “It’s too bad I have to go to work. But the good news is the boss is letting me out early since it’s Halloween. He’s going to a Halloween party at a friend’s house by the cemetery.” Samantha let out a laugh. “Hope he brought his zombie repellant. It’s the night of the dead tonight.” Jack bent down and then kissed his wife on the cheek. “I’ll see you both later. Can’t wait to spend Halloween night with my two favorite girls.” Samantha held up Cynthia and held her by the hand. “Wave goodbye to Daddy, Cynthia,” said Samantha. “You’ll see him tonight.” Cynthia burbled to Jack in baby talk and then Jack kissed Cynthia on the forehead before walking out. However, as Jack walked out the front door, he found it was surprisingly windy and there was lightning cracking in the sky. He could swear her heard panicked yelling in gibberish as he was walking out the door to go to work. "Huh?" he asked. "Those are some very eerie sounds. But then again, it is Halloween. I wonder if there are spirits out tonight this time." Jack shrugged his shoulders and walked up to his car. He looked back and smiled as he saw Samantha rubbing the pumpkin they picked out last night. That same silver pumpkin with the crown-like growth appeared to be glowing in the light as clouds filled up the sky.

Long after Jack had left, Samantha thought it would be time to show Cynthia how to make the perfect jack-o-lantern. She placed her daughter on the floor before laying down the newspaper to put down the pumpkin. "Okay, Cynthia," said Samantha. "Pay attention. Pumpkin carving can be very messy. That's why you first have to lay down the newspaper. And now here comes my least favorite part." Cynthia watched as her mother took out a knife. She realized something. "Please don't do this until you're older and not without Mommy's supervision," she told her infant daughter. "This is a very dangerous tool. Samantha started to carve off the top of the pumpkin, not hearing a scream of agony as a bright light shined in the pumpkin. Cynthia seemed to notice and was paying close attention to the pumpkin as she burbled.

"What is it, Honey?" asked Samantha. "Ouch!" While her daughter had distracted her, Samantha accidentally cut her finger. "Ow! See, Cynthia. This is why you have to be super careful when you're carving a pumpkin." Samantha put her finger into her mouth and then grunted. She saw that she was bleeding but her blood was a bright orange color and looked like pumpkin juice. Before she could think any more on the subject, Samantha saw the wound heal almost instantly. "Huh? Oh well." Samantha then started to remove the contents of the pumpkin. "See, Cynthia," said Samantha. "This is why we need the newspaper. Pumpkin carving is messy business. Okay, now here's the fun part. Oh, darn. Where did I leave that sharpie." As Samantha bent down to look for her marker, she failed to notice that somehow her butt had expanded and looked like it was the size of a mammoth pumpkin. And it was turning bright yellow-orange. Cynthia spotted her mother's giant rear and crawled up and laughed as she begun to climb it.

Samantha grunted and then looked back to see her baby sitting on her rear end, finally seeing how big it was. "What the?" asked Samantha. Samantha picked up Cynthia who was laughing and clapping and then looked at her behind. "Oh my, Cynthia. Looks like Mommy's been eating too much Halloween candy." Samantha then begun to gag a few times. "Why does my mouth taste like candle wax?" thought the ginger-haired girl to herself. Samantha opened her mouth and then gasped as she looked in the mirror because there was a candle in her throat and a lit candle at that. "Okay," said Samantha. "That fudge I ate must've been tainted." Samantha then heard a tearing noise and saw that her breasts were now as big as pumpkins as well and just as orange. "Huh?"

Samantha then gasped because her ginger colored hair was turning a more golden yellow color and her face was distorting. Her lips and teeth had fused together as her teeth turned the same color as her skin and became triangular shaped. Samantha let out a scream as Cynthia held on tight to her and giggled. There exists a legend among vampire hunters, a legend that has been taken seriously for generations. Every hundred years there is a bright red moon, one as red as blood. There is a legend that the Red Moon Baby is the most dangerous vampire there was. This was a vampire that fed off of life energy as well as blood and this vampire grew bigger and more powerful the more she consumed.

In the past, this vampire was always slain before it could reach critical level. But these were different times. Only one girl born on the night of this red moon will become the Red Moon Baby but nobody could tell for sure because the Red Moon Baby is a vampire that is originally born a human but will develop her vampire powers at an uncertain point in her life before she becomes full on vampire.

Since there aren’t as many vampire hunters as there were before in this day and age, there is no guarantee that the Red Moon Baby will be stopped in time this year. One such woman born on the day of this red moon is a 35 year old housewife named Mildred Moon. But surely she couldn’t possibly be the vampiress with such a legendary appetite, could she?

Later that evening, 050 and 091 miserably stumbled into their safehouse a few miles out of town. It had NOT been a pleaseant trip back: what with them trying to kidnap two kids in broad daylight, the police had been on their tails quite soon after they'd fled from Mildred. To make matters worse for the duo, the sudden appearance of a giant vampiress in the city had caused such a panic that cops seemed to come in swarms, hounding them from every direction--it was only through luck, and 050's last few remaining smoke bombs, that they'd managed to flee. Even now, 050 was peeking out the windows for signs of any tailing police

"I can't believe it, how could she have gotten THAT BIG?!" 091 ranted, running a hand through his pink hair. "She's only just transformed....taking her kids; what a joke! Even if he had managed to grab the brats, she'd have just tracked us down somehow and stomped us flat! What was 001 thinking with that plan?!"

050's head snapped toward his partner, a scowl on his face. "Watch your mouth, you know better than to badmouth our leader. It was OUR fault this didn't work, not his. Really, smoke bombs and poison darts against THAT beast? What were WE thinking?"

091 looked ready to retort that, but he was interrupted by his communicator beeping. He shared a look of dread with his cohort before taking out the device and keying the comm. "Er, 091 reporting..."
"I know there's a radio or television in your safehouse. Turn it on, now." It was 001's voice, even more stoic and commanding than usual.

The hunters shared a look of confusion before 091 obeyed, flicking on a radio atop a crate of medical supplies.
"--breaking just now, a kidnapping was foiled at a local school park today when what eyewitnesses insist was a...vampire swept down and saved two children. Jake Morgan is on the scene--"

091 tuned to a new channel, a look of dawning shock on his face.
"Ah say a monster is a monster, simple as that, Came the Southern accented voice of one presumed witness. "But it takes a right sicko to go an' hurt a kid. So, while I'd reach fer mah shotgun if I saw either Miss Vampire OR them hunters, I'd at least give HER a warnin' shot."

As 091 promptly turned the radio off, 001 resumed berating them. "Not only did you two fail, but now that demon is seen as a hero by much of the public! Do you two have any idea how much this could damage our efforts?! Now our mission to save the world from this abomination will be seen as propaganda! In their eyes, she'll be the victim, not the true threat!"

051 Cleared his throat. "Sir, the beast doesn't appear to be hostile to humams yet, or have designs on the world at large. We take full responsibility for this setback, but the Red Moon Baby is likely NOT at her full power and potential yet. Even seen as a heroine, she isn't invincible."

Static sounded as 001 humphed. "....You make a good point. All is not lost yet. And at least you two didn't get yourselves killed, lime the other hunters sent after our target. Very well, lay low until the autborities are off your trail; keep an eye on the news and roumors for any new developments with the Red Moon Baby...or her canine companion, for that matter. We'll have another chance to end this meanace within time. Just remember you won't be so lucky if you fail next time"
The line went dead with a *beep*.

051 sighed, rubbing his temples. "That was close, for a second I thought he was gonna send us out against that bloodsucking bitch again. Guess it's just intel-gathering for now."

091 slumped into a chair, looking exhausted beyond words. "Huh...just how big will that vaml and her werewolf friend get, anyway? Do I even want to know...ugh, i need a drink. A STRONG drink...."
11223112222222111122.title: You had ONE job...

choices: She Had Her Way with Vince
112231122222221111221.content:
At that moment, Mildred’s husband, Vince, had been informed of his wife’s transformation and he wasn’t any more amused than 001 about the situation. “Are you kidding me? I can’t believe it! Mildred, please tell me this is a joke. However, Mildred who was at that moment in the form of a 25ft tall and 10 ton vampire bat, shook her head to let her husband know that she was being serious. At that moment the bat giantess was perched in a tree that was coming apart under her weight and even though she was in the tree, her immense rear was still touching the ground. Vince let out a grumble. “Dad,” said Johnny. “Don’t blow a blood vessel.”

Vince glared at his son. “Really, Johnny? You couldn’t have chosen a better choice of words?! Your mother is now a vampire the size of a whale. I knew all brides let themselves go but this is ridiculous. Why did this have to happen? All because of some stupid prophecy. It doesn’t make any sense.” Mildred just lowered her head and smiled at Vince. “It’s going to be okay, Vince,” she said. “I may be big and bloated and bloodthirsty but it’s not like I’m plotting to enslave or destroy humanity or everything. Those idiot hunters must think I’m a...” “And that’s another thing. Where there’s two hunters, there’s going to be more. If I had any idea I would be married to a vampire, I swear...!!” Before Vince could finish his sentence, Mildred flapped her wings and then flew up into the air before she grabbed her husband between her toes and then turned to her tiny son. “Johnny. Please go back in the house with your sister. Your father and I have to talk.” Johnny obeyed his mother right as Mildred flew into the air carrying Vince.

Vince closed his eyes and held on tight to the bat giantess’s toes. “Dammit, Mildred! I told you I’m afraid of heights. Mildred just shrieked slightly as the clouds parted and revealed that it was night. Mildlred smiled before the vampiress flew down into a mountain area and placed her husband on the top of the mountain. Vince looked like he was about to have a heart attack right before Mildred transformed back into her vampire form. Now the vampire woman was 50ft tall, had F-Cup breasts, a 45ft wide stomach and a monstrous 75ft wide ass that looked like it was touching her neck as she sat down and looked down and smiled at Vince. Vince couldn’t help but look in fear at his wife’s sharp fangs. “I’m sorry, Honey,” said Mildred. “I know this is sudden but it looks like for the rest of my life, I’m going to be a creature of the night. Guess that leaves PTA meetings, pancake breakfast and Good Morning America out of the question.”

Vince let out a groan as he walked up towards his wife’s chins. “How can you joke about this? You’re a vampire. Where am I going to get enough blood to satisfy you.” Mildred just smirked at his husband. “Don’t worry,” she said as she licked her lips. “I promise I’ll stop at 7 pints, honey.” Mildred even licked her husband’s entire body and made him scream. “Don’t even joke about that, Mil,” he said. “I’m not a juice box. With how big you are, you might swallow me if you tried to suck my blood.” Mildred bit her lower lip. She definitely couldn’t tell her husband that she swallowed a would-be hunter earlier. Vince just let out a groan. “I’ll bet your friend Ellen doesn’t give her husband this much grief.” “I wouldn’t be so sure about that, honey,” said Mildred as she leaned forward and obliviously flattened a hill under her ass. “Ellen’s a werewolf as big as me now.”

Vince was now very horrified. “A werewolf!? You’re kidding me! Is every housewife in the neighborhood going to turn into a giant fat monster? The transformation, the hunters and now a werewolf. This isn’t happening, this isn’t happening, this....” Before Vince could rant any longer, Mildred stared down at him as her eyes glowed bright and she stared into his eyes. Vince’s eyes became wide and his pupils became dilated as if he was in the trance. Mildred had hypnotized him. “Listen and obey,” said the vampiress. “You are acting tense. I know how to fix this. Take off your clothes.” Vince was unable to do anything but obey his ginormous and obese blood drinking wife.

“And now,” said Mildred. “Allow me to destroy your body. I am your wife and your queen and you must give in.” Vince nodded his head and then Mildred managed to tilt back as she started to raise one of her thighs as thick as road tunnels and it was there...
112231122222221111221.title: Tiny Husband, HUGE Vampire Wife

choices: She eats him! (He's a jerk anyway)
112231122222221111222.content:
Ellen’s day had been far more fun than Mildred’s. She'd already loved her new lease on life as a 50-foot lycanthrope, and had been spending the day enjoying it.

Early morning had been a long stomp through the woods outside of town, swallowing a whole herd of deer whole for breakfast…and scaring the daylights out of some hunters. Seeing the tough-looking men squeal like little girls and run had left her (literally) howling with laughter. She even teased the poor hunters, half-heartedly chasing them and knocking trees aside with her ample hips. The few accurate shots they got off before she got bored felt like pinpricks; most didn't even pierce her hide.
Ellen gave a fanged smirk. Even with silver bullets, they wouldn't have hurt her. At her size, and with her girth, it’d take silver artillery shells to kill her.

The rest of the morning was some of the most fun she'd had in ages: stomping through her neighborhood, enjoying seeing people panic and stare in shock; lifting the roof off the grocery store to do some shopping—sitting on a few cars in the parking lot, just because she could. “Make that out to credit, will ya kid?” She told the shivering cashier.

She even tore strips off a circus tent to make some crude clothing for her giant form, managing to make a set of lingerie.
Ellen ignored the terrified crowd fleeing her as she put on her new clothes. “A bra and panties aren't exactly modest, but it was better than going around in my old clothes. They're pretty much destroyed anyway.” She spotted a cotton candy trolley, now small enough to hold in her hand. Shrugging, she snatched it up and tossed the whole thing into her canine maw, swallowing it whole.
“Mmm…blueberry flavored.”

On the way home Ellen experimented with walking on all fours like a “normal” wolf.
She could mange it, but her still-human cleavage swayed wildly, even with her newly-made bra on. “Ugh. So much for that. Guess I’m walking upright from now on,” she grumbled, not noticing her tail knocking over a telephone poll.

A swarm of cop cars and talk of a giant vampire woman interrupted Ellen’s fun. Apparently those hunters had tried to kidnap Mildred’s kids! “Sickos…I hope Mildred ate them alive for that! Mmm, maybe I should try and find where they're coming from—they could be tasty!” She blinked; “Did I just say I want to eat people? …Meh, guess it comes with being a werewolf.”

When she got home that afternoon, she found her husband drunkenly stumbling around the yard, and growled at the sight. Now it was time to teach him a lesson! She began to stalk him, staying as low as she could and hiding behind her neighbors’ houses. (Though given how fat and tall she was, it didn't conceal much. Luckily, her husband was drunk out of his mind; barely able to stand as he fumbled with his keys by the front door.

Ellen was just behind him, crouched in a hunter’s pose, fat rear in the air, when her stomach growled. During all her fun, she'd forgotten to get lunch. And here was an easy meal, right in front of her…

But did she really want to eat her husband?
112231122222221111222.title: Every Werewolf Has Her Day

112231122222222.content:
A lot of strange things can happen out in the open highway. Even in the middle of nowhere in the middle of Kansas. That’s where two young lovers by the names of Lance and his girlfriend Velma were zooming by the desert on their motorcycle. Lance was the driver while his rather chubby girlfriend was sitting in the sidecar.

“Oy,” said Velma as the radio was blaring. “Lance, could you turn the music down? If you’re trying to liven the road trip up, your crazy tunes won’t help.” Lance blushed and turned his radio down.

“Hey,” he said. “You said you wanted to see the desert. This is supposed to be where all the action is, but so far, no tornado, no coyotes, heck, we’re the only ones on the road right now.” Velma let out a sigh but then she heard a strange noise that sounded like thunder. What made it striking was that there was literally not a cloud in the sky. The biker chick then looked forward and saw something on the side of the road. Since it was so distant, she couldn’t tell what it was and mistook it for someone in need.

“Lance!” she yelled. “Pull over, I think there’s somebody out in the side of the road.” Lance did so and drove up to what Velma assumed was someone in the side of the pavement, but as it turns out, it was a totem pole with what looked like a large thunderbird on the top. “Looks like it was only a totem pole that collapsed from the heat,” joked Lance. “But what’s it doing all the way out here.”

Velma got out of the sidecar and walked up to the totem pole before picking it up and walking it out into the desert. “Well,” she said. “We can’t just leave it on the ground. These things are sacred.” Velma dug a hole to stick the totem pole in and suddenly she thought she could see the totem’s eyes glow.

“Huh?” she asked. Then she heard Lance revving the vehicle. “Come on, Velma. We need to get back to our road trip.” Velma walked up to the sidecar but had some trouble squeezing in. “What’s wrong, Love?” asked Lance. Velma groaned. “Well,” she said. “It looks like I’m putting on more weight than I thought.” Lance shrugged his shoulders and soon they were off. However, neither noticed the feathers growing on Velma’s arms.
112231122222222.title: Thunderbirds are Go

1122311222222221.content:
Velma held onto Lance as the lovely couple were continuing to drive down the road. "Hey, Velma," said Lance. "What do you think that totem pole was doing out in the open like that." "No idea, Love," said Velma. "Perhaps it was left there by some friendly Native Americans who couldn't take it when they migrated." Velma then saw purple feathers on her arms and then looked up. "Fast moving crows they have around here." She said. Then Velma's stomach let out a gurgle and she held it. "Hey, Lance," said Velma. "I'm feeling hungry. Let's see if there's a place to get a bite in this area." Lance nodded his head. "My baby is hungry," he said. "So let's see if Lance can't find anything." Lance looked ahead and saw what looked like a diner down the road. "Looks like we're in luck."

Lance and Velma drove up and parked in the parking lot to the side of the diner. However, Velma had trouble getting out of her seat because it looked a lot like her rear had gotten bigger, to the point where her bike pants looked more like a thong. "Lance, Sweetie," said Velma. "Do you think that perhaps you could..." Lance grabbed his ginger-haired girlfriend by the arms and yanked the biker chick out of the sidecar, totally it in the process. "I knew I shouldn't have left the bloody bike out in the rain. It must've rusted and contracted the sidecar" Moaned Lance. Velma just shrugged her shoulders. "It's alright, Love," she said. "No one got hurt. Now come on, I'm starving." As Velma walked into the diner, Lance adjusted his sunglasses because he could've sworn that Velma was taller than he was and was more pear-shaped than he remembered.

However, Lance shrugged it off as they walked into the diner. There, a burly and muscular trucker with blue heart tattoos over his body was just finishing his meal. "We don't get a lot of bikers around here." Said the trucker. Lance and Velma sat down in the stools next to the biker as the barkeeper showed up and she smiled at them. "You two look like you're dressed to kill." "That's right," said Lance. "Me girlfriend and I are taking a vacation to see America." The trucker next to them paid for his meal before speaking to them. "Happy trails then. But be careful. The open road can be a scary and unpredictable place. You never know what you'll find. The other day, I picked up a guy who turned out to have been dead for 100 years. That and a wanted fugitive. Well, I'm off. I've got a mission to lug some strange chemicals for a soda company. You two be careful." Then, the trucker whispered into Lance's ear. "You're a brave man by the way. Dating a gal twice your size." Lance raised an eyebrow before putting his money on the table. "We'll have the house specials." "Make mine a double." Said Velma. Lance looked at Velma in confusion.

It wasn't long before the barkeeper brought Lance and Velma their orders. Both appeared to be hamburgers with tuna, however, Velma had ordered double what Lance ordered and was biting into a burger before Lance could even think about eating his. "Are you sure you know what you're doing, Velma?" asked Lance. "That's a lot of food." Velma shrugged her shoulders and continued eating. The burgers however, weren't enough to settle her hunger and she quickly was stacking up plates from her meal to Lance's disbelief since he still had only taken the first bite of his burger.

The bar hostess then brought out a shake and pie for Velma to sample. "Land sakes," said the woman as Velma continued eating. "She sure is hungry. Your girlfriend eats as if there's a monster inside of her." Lance let out a sigh and he was about to eat his own meal when he saw that he had mysteriously been knocked out of his seat. Lance grunted and looked up and gasped because Velma had not only gotten taller but her ass expanded to the point where it was filling four stools and bending two of them. The bar hostess then gasped because Velma just appeared to be getting bigger and indigo feathers started to grow all over her body as her mouth extended and turned into a light bluish gray beak. Her feathers also had red and black highlights and Velma's ass expanded to the point where her shorts exploded off as she sprouted a few tail feathers and Velma's boots tore open to show her feet had turned into talons as green highlights sprouted around Velma's eyes. Velma kept getting bigger and bigger until every last stool was crushed. Velma grunted and stood up, crashing through the roof in the process.

Velma grumbled and then looked to see that she had turned into a 40ft tall thunderbird with thighs ten times thicker than tree-trunks, huge D-cup breasts, a 42ft wide belly and butt, a double chin and what looked like a 100ft wingspan. She gasped and looked down at Lance who was practically getting a nose bleed looking up at his thunderbird transformation. The bar hostess actually fainted at the sight of the thunderbird.

How does Velma herself take the transformation?
1122311222222221.title: Thunderbirds Are Loose

1122311222222222.content:
(This is gonna be the last storyline possibility I put up in this path. I want other people to come up with their own ideas, but I wanted to get 8 creatures in based off 8 elements)

It begun one time at an old house near Central Park. A young Native American woman named Salli and her husband, Keith were walking up to an old chateau that was adorned with tens of statues of gargoyles. “This is the place,” said Salli. “Grandmother trusted me to safely move everything.”

Keith took a look at one gargoyle statue with a bird like face and cringed. “I dunno doll,” he said. “She left you all these gargoyles in the will. Kinda creepy.” “My grandmother collected a lot of strange artifacts but none stranger than these gargoyles.” Sally lowered herself to the level of a gargoyle statue resembling some kind of imp. “I don’t mind. I think they’re actually kind of cute.”

Keith saw his wife petting one of the statues and gave a look of concern. “Whatever,” he said. “We’ll just box these things, take them home and decide what to do with them over the weekend.” The two of them wrapped the statues in bubble wrap and placed them in cardboard boxes before loading them into the truck then rented. “I still can’t understand why your grandmother wanted to keep so many of those things around. Anything this evil looking can’t be good.”

“Keith,” said Salli as she dusted off a gargoyle with spikes jutting from its head. “Gargoyles aren’t evil. Quite the opposite, they act to keep away evil spirits. Sort of like supernatural scarecrows.” “I can see why,” replied her husband. “I wouldn’t want to run into one of these things in a dark alley.

Salli shook her head and then noticed one statue that was covered in dead moss. She picked the statue up and took it out back to hose it off. “Poor thing,” she said. “I’ll bet you guys don’t like being left out in the cold. Don’t worry. I promised my grandmother, I’d take good care of you.” “Salli!” yelled Keith. “Could you give me a hand here? This one is really heavy.” “Coming, Keith. I’ll be right back, my stone friend."

As Salli walked away from that gargoyle statue, she didn’t notice the statue’s eyes opened. “We’ve found our queen.” The statue said telepathically.
1122311222222222.title: The Gargoyle Queen

choices: She Realizes She's Awake and Freaks
She Thinks it's a Dream and Goes Back to Bed
11223112222222221.content:
Salli and Keith were unaware of that apparently alive gargoyle statue and soon the two of them had taken every gargoyle from the chateau back to their house. Salli laid nine of them in a row outside the front yard and even a few in the backyard. Keith was very worried about his wife decorating the house with the grotesque and horrifying looking statues and then turned and looked in fear and even screamed because he was face to face with an incredibly grotesque looking gargoyle with a face resembling a bird's skull of some sort and this gargoyle seemed to have been modeled to resemble some kind of mage.

Keith fell to the ground and panting before he saw Salli right behind the stone statue. "Sorry about that, Keith. There were too many gargoyles to place outside so I've decided to bring some of them indoors." Keith stood up and gave a glare at the statue that scared him. "Your grandmother must've been crazy to keep so many gargoyles around her house. Just looking at that thing, I know I'm gonna have nightmares tonight." "Oh hush," said Salli to her husband. "They're not harming anybody. Besides, I think they give the place a supernatural touch." Keith let out a sigh and held onto his wife. "Well, if you say so. Maybe those things are good. Maybe they do protect against evil spirits. But I would never want to meet a live one of those in a dark alley." However, Salli didn't agree and stroked the head of the gargoyle. "Oh," she said. "I don't know about that." Salli let out a laugh and didn't see the gargoyle mage statue's eyes glowing bright white.

That night it was pitch black and thundering while Salli and Keith were asleep in bed. One man passing the street saw the gargoyles outside and shivered but then he thought he saw one of them fold his wings down as if to act as an umbrella. The passerby took off his glasses and put them back on to see several seemingly immobile statues. Salli and Keith were in bed snoozing away until something startled Salli up. The Native American woman awoke to a scratching noise and as she got out of bed, she thought she saw something that looked like a set of sharp claws trying to scratch on the window.

But she ignored it and let out a yawn. "I must be more tired than I thought," she said. "I need a nice warm glass of milk." Salli walked downstairs and made her way to the kitchen, but as she did so, it would appear that the gargoyles that decorated the stairway and living room were watching her. Salli walked into the kitchen and as she reached into the fridge, there was a crash of lightning and for a brief moment it looked as though the statue of the gargoyle mage was behind her. But when Salli turned around, she saw there was nobody there. Salli shrugged her shoulders and heated up a glass of milk. As she was waiting for her warm milk, the young woman heard a strange chanting sound that was in an unidentifiable language. Salli looked around and saw that she was completely alone, nothing but several inanimate statues. Salli smiled and drank the milk before stroking a small gargoyle on the head.

However, as Salli walked upstairs, she underwent a strange transformation. First her skin turned a bright violet color and her ears grew to a point. Then six large horns that looked like they were in the shape of a tiara, begun to form on her forehead as her sleepy eyes took a more animalistic shape. With each step, she also appeared to be growing taller and putting on weight, most of it was going to her ass and thighs, but her stomach was getting quite large as well. Her pajama pants were beginning to tear, not just from Salli's growing booty and hips, but because she sprouted a long reptile-like tail. her slippers then fell off as her feet transformed into sharp talons just as her fingers turned into claws that looked sharp enough to slice through steel like butter. She also appeared to sprout spikes on top of her shoulders and four spikes on her upper back. Salli let out a yawn and revealed that she had grown fangs. Finally, she sprouted a pair of leather wings from her back that had a bright cerulean membrane.

Salli was just about to return to bed with Keith when she walked by a mirror and saw that she had transformed into an 8-foot tall violet-skinned gargoyle who had to weigh at least a thousand pounds. Salli focused as she turned around to get a good look at her 6-foot wide belly and ass and wagged her tail and flapped her wings. How would she take this transformation? Given that she was half asleep, would she believe it?
11223112222222221.title: Hail to the Queen

choices: The Knave Comes to Life and Attacks Keith
112231122222222212.content:
Salli took a good look at herself in the mirror and then wiggled her humongous gargoyle ass in front of the mirror. She even took a closer look and opened her mouth to feel her fangs. It looked like she would realize that she had transmogrified into a huge violet-skinned gargoyle. However, Salli then let out a deep yawn. "I must be tired. This has got to be the strangest dream I've had yet." Salli then noticed a gargoyle with a fish-like face and what looked to be an eyepatch sculpted into the stone. Salli smiled and rubbed the gargoyle on the head. "Hey," she said. "You're welcome to stay in my house, but I would appreciate it if you stayed out of my dreams. Unless of course you could somehow make it a dream about Hawaii."

Salli laughed at her joke and then decided to walk back upstairs to bed. However, what she didn't know was that her gargoyle transformation was not a dream. This was proven as she was walking up the stairs and each step begun to crack under her talons from her enormous weight. The gargoyle woman however, was completely oblivious and got back in bed with Keith, the mattress springs creaking underneath the weight of the enormous purple gargoyle as she covered herself, unconsciously curling her new wings into a nightcap-like hood as she yawned again. "Maybe if I fall asleep in the dream, it will make more sense. I could've sworn that Keith was taller than me when we went to bed.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

BRIIIIIIIIIING!

The next morning, Salli and Keith's alarm clock rang loudly. Keith turned off the clock and mumbled. He would've ignored it and gone back to sleep, but in the back, he fell something huge and soft that appeared to be on Salli's side of the bed. "WTF?" thought Keith to himself. "Has Salli been putting on weight lately? I warned her that those chocolate croissants would..." Keith than woke wide awake and gasped at what he saw, surprisingly not waking Salli up in the process. Salli was still a gargoyle and she had gotten even bigger. She had to be 15ft tall and from the destroyed bed, she had to weigh at least 5000lbs. Her ass alone was big enough to completely cast a shadow over her husband.

Keith sprung out of bed and looked at Salli's tail twitching in her sleep. He felt around Salli to notice that while her skin was soft and smooth it was also rough at the same time, which was not unsurprising since she was a gargoyle. In her sleep her wingspan had also gotten bigger in order to suit her massive size and it looked like she was using her wings as a blanket. "OMG," said Keith in surprise. "Salli." Keith then turned to a multi-horned, long-fanged and goateed gargoyle statue dressed similar to a knave of hearts by their bed. "I don't know what's going on," he said. "But I bet you rocky, nocturnal, leather-winged jerks are behind it somehow. How's that for gratitude? If it were up to me, Salli would've dropped you off at a cemetery. Just you wait, as soon as I get my wife back to normal, you and all your roof-warming buddies are pumice. How do you like them apples, Pebbles!? What am I doing talking to a gargoyle. Nothing more than a mindless, immobile piece of slate."

Keith ran to the phone to answer it and as he turned around he looked in surprise because it appeared that the hand of the gargoyle statue he had just threatened had shifted position and appeared to be flipping him the bird. Keith rubbed his eyes and then saw that the statue appeared to have returned to its normal position. Keith didn't entirely know what was going on, but he also didn't care and so he dialed up a friend he knew who was a doctor. "Hello, oh, thank goodness it's you, Chris, it's Keith. Something is seriously wrong with Salli. What's the matter? She's turned into a gargoyle. I am serious. She inherited a collection of gargoyle statues and I'm pretty sure that they're cursed because when I woke up this morning, Salli had transformed into a giant, fat, purple... hello?" Keith's friend on the phone clearly did not believe a word he said and hung up, leaving Keith to grumble to himself.

Then Keith turned around to see Salli still asleep and snoring away. "She usually wakes up before I do," he said. "Then again, this is the time when gargoyles are usually out cold. But does she even know what's happened to her? I'm going to wake her up." Keith walked past the gargoyle knave statue and was going to shake his giant obese gargoyle wife up. Keith then grabbed Salli by the tail and begun to pull it. "Salli!" he yelled. "Wake up! Get your fat ass out of bed! It's an emergency!"
112231122222222212.title: Wake Up!

1122311222222222122.content:
Keith pulled on his wife’s tail but the gargoyle blimp just kept snoozing away. Keith let out a groan. “I heard gargoyles were supposed to be sleeping and immobile by day, but come on, Salli! Wake your fat ass up!” The purple woman merely yawned in her sleep before wiggling her flabby clawed hand. She rolled over and showed that her stomach was as wide as she was tall but her ass had to be 25ft wide, to say nothing of her E-cup breasts. Keith couldn’t help but feel all around Salli’s ass. It was somehow soft and rough at the same time given how thick-skinned gargoyles were. Keith then got an idea and picked up a baseball bat that was laying around. His plan was to smack Salli in the ass to wake her up. "I hate to do this, Dear," said Keith. "But desperate times call for desperate measures. This bat won't be the only hard thing after the first whack."
 
However, as Keith was about to assault his wife’s rear, the gargoyle knave animated and ran in before grabbing hold of the bat before it could make impact. The statue’s eyes glowed white to make it clear he didn’t approve of Keith’s actions. Keith himself looked at the living statue and gasped. “What the hell?!” The gargoyle knave then took the bat and broke it in half as he gave a glare Keith’s way. “The statues!” yelled Keith. “They’re alive!” The gargoyle knave then reached to his belt and took out a sword and swung it as Keith screamed and stepped back. “About that pumice comment, I was just kidding.” Keith gave a nervous smile but it didn’t look like the knave was in the mood for jokes and the creature swung his sword, missed Keith and destroyed a lamp. “Geez!” The gargoyle knave appeared to be very angry with Keith and continued to attack him, all while Salli in her transmogrified form was snoozing away and unconsciously using her wings as a blanket.

Keith backed up and then felt something sharp pointing in his back. Keith gave a grunt and turned to see another animated gargoyle statue. This one was a gargoyle with a long beaked face and what appeared to be a ponytail and an eyepatch. He appeared to be carrying a spear and he looked just as mad at Keith as the gargoyle with the sword. “This is not good.” Muttered Keith. The two gargoyle soldiers attacked Keith and forced him to duck to the ground to avoid getting bisected and impaled. “What the hell is going on?” asked Keith. “If this is a bad dream, I’d like to wake up, now.” “Silence, kur!” yelled a deep male voice. Keith looked forward and gasped. That voice came out of the gargoyle with sword. Keith couldn’t believe it but then the statue spoke again. “Thou dieth.”

As the gargoyles were advancing, Keith begun to laugh slightly insanely. “You talked? Gargoyles don’t talk! Gargoyles don’t move! They’re just statues built to be scarecrows for evil spirits!” “Not all gargoyles,” said the beaked spear wielder in a rather raspy voice. “You just stumbled upon a nest of live ones.” “And you have immediately proven yourself our enemy.” Said the swordsman. Both gargoyles swung their weapons, missed Keith and put holes in the wall. “Listen,” said Keith trying desperately to save himself. “I’m not your enemy.” “You must think we have rocks for brains,” said the spear wielder. “We saw you about to assault our new queen.” “Queen!?” yells Keith in surprise. The spear wielder tried to stab Keith, but Keith grabbed a book to act as a shield and tossed another one at the spearman to knock him to the ground. But the swordsman flew into the air and tried to attack Keith, narrowly missing his cheek in the process as he screamed. Keith felt his face bleeding and then he started to put two and two together.

“So those gargoyles did turn Salli into one of their own. Queen? They think she’s their queen? Well, it would explain why they made her so freaking huge. Ah!” Keith moved out of the way as the gargoyle swordsman nearly cut him below the belt with his blade and then his eyes begun to water. “I didn’t intend any harm!” yelled the young man desperately. “I was just trying to wake up my wife!” “By resorting to such barbaric and violent extremes?” asked the gargoyle swordsman. The spear wielder got up and pointed his sharp blade to the back of Keith’s neck. “Especially since she is your wife,” said the spearman. “That’s domestic abuse. Don’t think we didn’t see you pulling her tail as well. Assault and potential regicide. That’s what you stand accused of.” “And thou dieth.” Said the swordsman. Keith realized that the gargoyles were not fooling around and fully intended to harm him.

But then he got an idea. "You said that Salli was your queen, right?" asked the young man. "She is also my wife. That makes me your king. You are the ones attempting regicide." Keith smiled confidently, hoping that his logic would dissuade the gargoyles from harming him. However, both the spearman and the swordsman simply laughed at him. "We have no use for a king," said the spearman. "Besides, a human king commanding gargoyles? You're the one with rocks in your head." Keith let out a groan. "It was worth a shot." Keith then grunted because the swordsman pushed him to the ground. Keith looked up to see twelve of the gargoyles staring down at him, clearly enraged at what they believed was an act of malice towards their queen.

"Okay," said Keith. "I'm only going to ask this once, so you all better listen well. "WHAT THE HECK IS GOING ON AROUND HERE!? WHY IS MY WIFE A BIG FAT GARGOYLE!? WHY ARE YOU CALLING HER YOUR QUEEN!? WHY AM I SPEAKING TO A BUNCH OF STONE CREATURES?! AM I GOING CRAZY!" Keith then screamed because the spear wielder proceeded to step on his back and drive his talons into him. "Silence! You will be on trial for your sins! Take him to the dungeon!" However, one of the gargoyles walked out of the crowd, a short gargoyle with fin-like wings attacked to his arms and a face resembling that of a scorpionfish. "There isn't a dungeon in this house. We checked." The spear wielder rubbed the back of his head in embarrassment and would've blushed if he wasn't made of stone, just as the swordsman face palmed and let out a grunt. "Then take him to the basement. There, he will face judgement for trying to cause our queen harm."

Keith was sweating heavily. He knew that these gargoyles clearly did not like him and would probably torture him. Then again, he realized that attempting to wake up his giant mutated wife with a baseball bat probably did have unfortunate implications but before he could think, both the gargoyle with the spear and the gargoyle knave with the sword were dragging him down the stairs to the basement. "Ow! Ow! Ow! Watch it! Oh geez. Why oh why, oh why did Salli's grandmother leave her those damned gargoyles?" One gargoyle with a hawk-like face and thick wings shrieked angrily into Keith's face for that "damned gargoyles" remark and Keith bit his lip to tell the gargoyles how he understood his mouth was only getting him into more and more trouble.

While the human-sized statues had gone downstairs to tend to Keith, at that moment, Salli had finally woken up with a large yawn as she stood up, her massive gargoyle hulk causing the bed to bend and creak and the frame to crack slightly. Although at this point, Salli did not realize that she was a gargoyle, as she let out a deeper yawn, she stretched out her large wings that had to have a 30ft wingspan and accidentally knocked over the bedside table and broke the alarm clock. Salli tried to reach over and bend her back but was having trouble reaching over her wing. Salli grunted and then looked at her hand to see the claws as she raised a (well, gargoyles don't have eyebrows, but you get the general idea). "What the?" asked Salli. Salli bit one of her chubby fingers just to confirm if her suspicions were true that they were claws. While she was at it, she felt around her mouth to realize her canine teeth had turned into fangs. "Claws?" she asked. "Fangs?" Salli then wiggled her toes and lifted up her tree-trunk thick leg to see that her toes had transformed into sharp talons. "Talons?" asked the gargoyle woman.

Salli stood up and stepped off the bed, murdering it with her colossal ass. Salli then felt all around her body to see exactly how ginormously fat she had become. “What the?” asked Salli. Salli then saw that her pajamas appeared to be coming apart at the seams and revealing her bra and panties that looked like they were painted on. She was now so huge and fat that her body didn’t even fit in the entire mirror. She then wiggled her tail and looked down to realize that she did in fact have a tail. "Oh my," she said. "Is that a tail." Salli wiggled her tail and then she looked back to realize that she did have wings. "Oh dear," said the Native American woman turned gargoyle giantess. "Do I have wings. Big leather wings. It's as if I've turned into a gargoyle, like in that dream when I turned into a big fat gargoyle lady when I looked in the mirror. But it can't happen can it. Not for real."

Salli looked around and saw that the gargoyle statues had disappeared. "Oh my gosh! Thieves! Wait a minute? Who would steal dozens of gargoyle statues. And how would they go about doing that to begin with. I mean, they're not exactly something that you can just hide away in your pocket. Maybe they just got up and flew away. That's ridiculous Salli. Hmm, Keith isn't here either. That's it." Salli giggled to herself. "I'm dreaming again and it's a rather surreal dream. Hmm, I must be a deeper sleeper than I thought. Oh well, since I can fly." Salli opened up her wings and tore apart the roof before she started to fly off over the city in her ginormous gargoyle form, blissfully unaware of her new queenly status.

Now we continue from...
1122311222222222122.title: Gargoyles Are Alive

11223112222222221222.content:
Salli flapped her enormous wings as the 15ft high gargoyle was flying over the city in the middle of the night. She saw cars driving down the street before she flew up to a particularly high monument. She looked down and scratched her chin. “My,” she said as she showed her fangs. “This is a surreal dream. I wonder what Keith is dreaming about right now. I’ll bet it’s our wedding night.” The gargoyle giantess let out a laugh as her enormous belly hung off the edge of the monument. Salli then held out her stomach. “Though who knows why I’d have a dream where I weigh as much as two bull elephants.” Salli then tapped her big gargoyle booty and made it shake. “Well,” she said. “Keith did say that I needed more junk in the trunk. The doctor did tell me the other day that I was underweight.”

Salli then heard her stomach growling and then tapped her huge purple belly. “I need something in my stomach. I hope that George’s Pizza still exists in this dream world. Salli flew down from the sky and landed on a car on the ground, causing it to break beneath her heavy weight. Salli got up and in embarrassment the massive gargoyle pulled a steering wheel out from between her titanic butt cheeks that were murdering her pajama past. “Oops. I have definitely got to work on those landings. Salli then noticed a newspaper and read it. “Aha,” she said. “They finally caught that cretin who was experimenting on the homeless. He’ll never see the light of day again. What the? Loch Ness Monster sighted in American lake? How can anyone read this dribble.” Salli’s stomach then rumbled again. “I heard you the first time.” She said in annoyance as she slapped her bulging tummy.

Salli noticed a pizzeria nearby and her mouth begun to water. She waddled towards the pizzeria, bending a street lamp in the process before she squeezed her way through the door. As Salli grunted and bent the doorway, the proprietor turned and looked in shock at the elephant-sized gargoyle squeezing into his eatery. “Hi, George,” said Salli. “You’re open late tonight.” The proprietor’s jaw dropped as he recognized the gargoyle’s voice. “Salli!? Is that you? You look...” “I know,” said Salli as she assumed George was talking about the wardrobe she was wearing. “I should’ve thought about coming in wearing something other than my PJs.” “What?!” yelled George. “That’s what you’re worried about? You’re a.. you’re a gargoyle! And you’re the size of a bus!” “I know,” said Salli. “It’s a strange dream.” George blinked because Salli was still under the impression that she was dreaming. “O...kay. Uh, where is Keith?” Salli shrugged her shoulders as her breasts jiggled on her belly. “Heck if I know. He’s probably having his own dream. I’ll have the house special, please.” Salli walked forward and took 5 seats at the counter, all of which bent under her massive ass.

George decided to ignore the elephant...-sized gargoyle in the room and went to get Salli’s order ready. “Oh darn,” grumbled Salli. “I forgot my wallet.” “Uh,” said George. “Don’t worry. Gargoyles eat for free. So, why the sudden gargoyle dream?” “Well,” said Salli. “I recently inherited my grandmother’s gargoyle collection and I decorated the house with them. Of course, Keith can’t stand them. I keep telling that husband of mine that gargoyles aren’t evil spirits but he doesn’t want to listen. But, oh well.” George begun to sweat as he prepared a calzone as big as a surfboard and Salli instantly devoured it. While the gargoyle giantess was eating, George walked up to the phone. “Hello,” he said. “Is this the hospital. One of my regular customers came in and she’s not herself. By that I mean she’s a giant obese gargoyle. No! I’m not admitting myself! I’m trying to admit her! There must be... hello? They hung up.” Salli at the time had finished her meal and licked her chubby claws. “Thanks for the meal, George. I’ll pay you on Tuesday.”

Salli left the pizzeria and the proprietor saw her pants coming apart at the seams from her growing weight. “She thinks it’s a dream,” muttered George. “Maybe I’m the one who’s dreaming.” As Salli walked down the street she saw that she had grown again. She was now 30ft tall and with a 65ft wide belly and 60ft wide ass. Her wings had expanded to accommodate her weight and still allow her to fly. “Gee,” she said as she accidentally whacked her tail against a building and damaged it. "This dream is getting really weird. I think I'm ready to wake up now." Salli held up her thumb and bit onto it as she grimaced in pain. "Ouch!" Salli sucked on her thumb believing the pain awoke her from her dream.

However, she saw that she was still a gargoyle, she was still the size of a building and she was still ginormously fat. Salli gasped and felt her stomach as she gave a nervous look. "Huh?" she asked. "What's going on." Salli bit her other thumb and yelled in pain but she saw she was still an obese gargoyle giantess. Her purple skin turned pale as she realized something. "Good grief! I really am a gargoyle! Those gargoyle statues! They must've been magic. Oh dear. I gotta tell Keith about this." The ginormous gargoyle walked in the direction of her house, being careful not to crush any more cars. However, in the process, she accidentally crushed a car carrier under her huge belly and blushed. "It's going to be a really long night." Said the queen-sized gargoyle queen.
11223112222222221222.title: Midnight Snack

11223112222222222.content:
(Okay, I may have broken my note from last chapter. But I have no choice since I want to increase traffic in this interactive)

Nobody likes sick days, especially not one young woman named Carol Hale. She had caught a terrible cold and was forced to stay home from her job at the observatory and she was miserable about it. At that moment, she was sneezing her nose off while her husband, Marvin was busy in the kitchen.

“I ate being sick,” said Carol weakly. “I haven’t had a flu in ten years. This is hell.” “It’s just a common flu, Carol,” said Marvin. “Nothing to worry about.” As Carol was sick, Marvin was boiling some hot water. “But don’t worry, I found a store that sells health food on my way here. The owners said they just bought it. Here it is.” Marvin held up a strange box that had an image of a red Chinese dragon on it. “Red Dragon Medicinal Tea. Must be one of those Chinese medicines.”

“Huh,” said Carol. “Never was much for tea, but I’ll try anything to get rid of this flu. Ugh.” Carol held her stomach in pain because her terrible flu was only going to get worse unless she took something. Marvin walked in with the tea and handed the cup to Carol who seemed to notice red clouds forming in the tea. “Where did you get this?” she asked. “This tea looks like it’s on fire.” Carol saw flames briefly appear in the tea but by the time Marvin took a look, he saw nothing. “You must be sicker than you thought. I think you better stay here. I’ll pick up the twins from school and you stay here and take the tea.” Marvin kissed his wife and then left.

Carol sniffed the tea and was worried. “Smells like fire,” she said. “But what would I know, I’m sick.” With that, Carol drank the tea and then she gagged and coughed. “Ugh,” she said. “Feels like my mouth is on fire. But I think it cleared my sinuses. Maybe there is something to this Chinese medicine.” But Carol then begun to cough, completely unaware that her teeth were turning into fangs and red scales were appearing on her thighs.
11223112222222222.title: Red Dragon Tea

choices: Her transformation alters her mind in some way...
112231122222222221.content:
"Hmm..." As the tea coursed through Carol's system she was overwhelmed by a deep warmth building up within her stomach that started emanating through her body in deep waves. The suddenness of the sensation put her at ease, but as she let it sink into her skin it actually felt very soothing and comforting. As the waves faded to nothign she could still feel a tinge of heat in her skin, as though it was the afterglow to a light bulb.

"Woah..." She whispered in awe, slowly standing back up with no sign of resistance from her body. The flu she'd been suffering from for over a week felt as if it'd been completely washed away, replaced with a crisp, refreshed feeling of energy. After being so sick for so long it was off-putting how fast she'd healed, but at the same time she wasn't complaining after all the crap the flu had put her through.

"The hell was in that stuff?" She thought aloud. "...well, whatever it was, thank GOD it-"

But she was interrupted as her stomach let out a loud, wavering rumble, making her groan in discomfort. As she placed her hand to her abdomen she looked down to see that her belly was expanding right before her eyes, which as it pushed out of her shirt she could see what looked like red and black scales growing along her white skin.
