Verne and Rosalind were completely dumbfounded. "Really?" asked Rosalind. "That's all you notice." Wendy raised an eyebrow in confusion oblivious to the fact that she was A) a wereseal, B) as big as a tree and C) Morbidly obese. "What else is there to notice." Rosalind would've said something but her brother covered her mouth before she could utter a single word.

"Forget it, Rosalind," he said. "Our folks are too eccentric to notice a thing like this. Uh, Mom, did anything unusual happen on the way home?" Wendy shrugged her shoulders. "Unusual?" she asked. "I don't know what you mean by that, Verne. Well, along the way, I did encounter an old woman who was hungover and gave her my new hangover cure I've been working on." "Old woman?" asked Verne. "Hangover? What did this woman look like." "My, you're curious today. Well, she wore black with orange and yellow striped stockings and a pointed hat with a flower in it. She had thin gray hair and a long nose that was covered in warts. Now that I think about it, she looked a lot like a witch. Not that there are such things. Except in your father's stories. Now get inside, it's too cold out here for kids."

The Helder kids didn't know what else to do, so they followed their wereseal mom as she squeezed her enormous bulk through the doorway. Of course, Wendy had a little trouble getting through and Rosalind and Verne had to push her tail in. "Wendy," muttered Wendy to herself. "Not to yourself. Don't try to take all the groceries in at once." As Wendy walked away with the groceries, her son and daughter were trying to figure out what was going on. "This can't be happening," said Verne. "Moms don't just turn into giant elephant seals. I wonder if it has anything to do with..." Rosalind gasped. "Oh my gosh," she said. "Warmblood No. 11. It must've had the side effect of turning people into big fat seals."

Verne who had no idea of the formula his mother was testing out, was somewhat confused. “What are you talking about, Rosalind?” asked Verne. “Mommy was testing out one of her formulas in the laboratory and it was designed to make it so people could survive in the cold without...” “Rosalind,” said Verne. “Those experiments aren’t actually possible in real life. At least I don’t think so. Wait. Dad was writing a story where a witch blessed a princess with the power to turn into a wereseal.” “That’s a blessing?” asked a very confused Rosalind.” “Don’t ask me to explain Dad’s train of thought. This is the same man who wrote an Orangutang’s Autobiography. But my point is that what happened to Mom sounds exactly like what’s going on in Dad’s story.” “Now you’re the one being ridiculous, Verne. How can Daddy’s story be capable of doing something like this?” “I don’t know. That’s a new laptop. Perhaps it’s radioactive. Then again, I saw him taking medicine for his insomnia. I saw a TV show one time where a cartoonist took strange fertility pills and brought his comics to life.” Rosalind looked at her brother as if he was insane. “Really?” “Hey,” said Verne. “This doesn’t happen every day. She could’ve been the descendant of a seal god, could’ve been bitten by a radioactive seal, what do you want me to tell you?”

At that moment, Steve was typing as Wendy was in the hallway waddling by. “As the princess was moving through the castle hallway, there was a sudden quake that knocked loose the Jar of Mischief, an ancient container build to contain the ancient sprites of chaos who would seek to cause the most bizarre calamities to arise.” Sure enough as Steve typed those words, Wendy moved throughout the hallway and her big bulky body pushed against a table and caused a vase to fall and crash. “Oh, darn,” groaned Wendy. Not Grandma’s vase. Maybe I can glue it back together.” “The Princess was in anguish as the jar was destroyed for the kingdom’s most insane enemies were released onto the world and their wicked ways would rear their ugly heads.” As Steve typed this, Wendy picked up the pieces of the vase and put them in their pocket before waddling up to her husband and kissed him on the side of his head. "Hard at work I see." Steve let out a sigh. "I might have written my weirdest and best story ever, Wendy. But I'm having trouble continuing it. How goes Warmblood No. 11?" Wendy smiled. "It's working out fine. I haven't felt a chill since I got home. But it did get rid of my freckles." "Hey," said Steve. "It's no big deal. Good luck perfecting the formula." "Good luck with your story," said Wendy. "It looks good so far." Steve smiled at that before his seal wife was waddling away.

In the process, Steve saw the elephant seal shaped shadow and turned his head and realized that his wife had transformed. How does he react?
1122311222222222222222222221.title: Strange Things Are Happening

11223112222222222222222222212.content:
Steve just shrugged his shoulders and walked away without giving a thought to his transmogrified wife. Verne witnessed this and couldn’t believe it. “Uh, Dad,” said Verne. “Have you noticed anything different about Mom?” Steve didn’t give the matter too much thought and walked back to the computer to type. “Let your mother have her privacy, Verne. She’s been working hard in the lab all day and doesn’t need any disturbances. She’s been working on that formula for a long time and she might have perfected it. Aha. I just had an idea. On her travels, the wereseal princess stopped at one point to bath underneath a waterfall. But what she didn’t know was that the mystical waters induced rapid aging.”

While Steve was busy at his computer, Wendy had taken off her clothes and the giantess seal squeezed into the shower. “Ugh,” she said. “I can’t wait to get all these nasty chemicals off of me.” Wendy turned on the shower and was scrubbing her thick leathery body as she hummed to herself, still blissfully unaware that she was an enormous elephant seal. After the shower was over, Wendy turned it off and then grabbed a towel. As Wendy was squeezing out of the shower, the wereseal saw her face in the mirror and screamed. “Is that a gray hair?” she asked. “Oh no! It must be another side-effect of the formula. Oh darn. Looks like I still need to troubleshoot it.” The scientist let out a sigh as she waddled away to put on clean clothes, still completely unaware of the transformation. Her children were surprised that she still hadn’t noticed by now.

“A waterfall of rapid aging,” said Verne. “The shower! Then she saw a gray hair. It’s just like Dad’s novel, sort of.” “That was just a coincidence,” said Rosalind. “I still say that her kooky concoction Mommy made is what turned her into a seal.” “The problem is that these things happened at the same time,” said Verne. “If we knew what did this to her, we might be able to cure it.” “I don’t know. I think I like her better this way. Besides, she doesn’t seem to mind.” “That’s because she hasn’t noticed it! For that matter, neither has Dad. Are they so engrossed in their work that they don’t say anything?” “Well, guess all we can do is ignore the elephant in the room.” “She’s not an elephant, Rosalind. She’s an elephant seal. There’s a difference. Though she’s definitely the size of an elephant.”

At that moment, the next door neighbor was getting ready to jog down the street. “Well,” said the neighbor. “After months of therapy, I’m finally cured of my irrational fear that an elephant seal will see me in my gym shorts.” Sure enough, as soon as he said that, Dorothy waddled out onto the verandah. “Excuse me!” she called out. “Are you sure you should be jogging outside in the middle of the winter?” The neighbor looked up in horror at the giant wereseal looking down from the verandah, her huge belly hanging off the railing as she innocently waved. The neighbor in fear nervously stepped back into his house.

Soon, the Helders were having dinner and from the looks of it, they were having fried fish and calamari. Dorothy was stuffing her face with seafood as her children watched in concern. “I don’t know why,” said the enormous seal woman. “But for some reason I’ve been craving fish and squid. I usually don’t eat this much.” Rosalind and Verne stared at each other before whispering. "Should we tell her?" asked Verne. "No, way, dummy," said Rosalind. "We can't just tell her that she's a giant seal." "Well, sooner or later we're going to have to say something, if nobody else does." Verne let out a groan. "Okay, but this is like waiting for a bomb to go off."

Steve for his part was too deep in thought to either eat or notice that his wife was an enormous seal that was so obese it was a wonder she could move. "By the way, Steve," said Wendy. "Don't forget. The maid we hired is coming tomorrow." Both Rosalind and Verne gave looks of horror. "Oh no," whispered Verne to his sister. "We forgot about the new maid Mom hired. Wait until she sees the giant seal." Rosalind nodded her head. "Well, this just escalated." Steve ignored his wife speaking to him and his children whispering and continued to brainstorm ideas for his novel.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

The next day, the Helder children were looking out the window waiting for the hired help. "This is really bad," said Verne. "Really bad." "Why?" asked Rosalind. "The new nanny might be nice." "But she doesn't know that one of her employers is a wereseal," said Verne in response. "Mom and Dad might not have noticed the transformation but anyone they hire will and they'll ask questions. All because of that stupid book." "There you go again? Dad's typing has nothing to do with this. This is science gone wrong. Not magic." "I don't think those genetic experiments are possible in real life and even if they were, mom sure as heck wouldn't...." But at that moment, the newly hired maid was walking to the door. From the looks of it, she had bandages wrapped around her body that only exposed one of her eyes and her hair was bleached white. She was wearing a thick red jacket as well. The kids were visibly intimidated by her. "Oh geez," said Verne. "She looks like she was in a horrible accident." "Speaking of which." Said Rosalind looking down the stairs. Wendy was waddling to answer the door. "Oh no." Groaned Verne as he slapped himself in the face. "Here comes the fireworks."

Wendy opened the door and the maid looked up at the giant wereseal and gasped. "Hello," said Wendy. "You must be River. I'm Wendy Helder. I really appreciate you agreeing to the job. Between my experiments and my husband's writing, we've been meaning to hire someone to help with the house and the children. Uh, is something wrong?" River wasn't paying attention to her new employer, or rather she was paying more attention to Wendy's body than her speech. She didn't know how to react to the wereseal woman in front of her. "What the hell?" thought the woman in bandages to herself. "Does she know she's a giant seal? I thought I'd be working for a human. Should I tell her or shouldn't I?"
11223112222222222222222222212.title: Ignoring the Elephant (Seal) in the Room

1122311222222222222222222222.content:
Jessica Hale was buttoning her blouse as she smiled. She and her daughter, Tara, had recently moved into a new neighborhood and Tara was starting school that morning. Jessica herself had gotten a job as a liberal arts teacher at that very same school. She smiled because it was her boyfriend, Tony, a mythology teacher at the school, who helped her get the job. She was hoping that things would work out, given that her previous marriage had failed horribly. To Jessica, this was a fresh start.

“Now,” said Jessica with a sigh. “If only Tara would hurry up. Tara! Come down, sweetie! You’re gonna be late.” However, Jessica heard a scream. “Tara?!” she yelled. “Mom!” yelled Tara. “Come quick!” Tara was cowering in fear when Jessica ran up to check on her. “Tara,” said Jessica. “What’s wrong?” Tara pointed to her desk and revealed that there was a rather large spider on it. “Really?” asked Jessica with a laugh. “It’s just a spider. A rather large spider. Huh?

Jessica looked up and saw it was a dark blue spider with white spots and a yellow hourglass on its thorax. “Oh man,” said Jessica. “That’s a weird looking spider. I’ve never seen anything like it before.” Tara just shook her head. “Just kill it, already!” Jessica rolled her eyes. Tara hated spiders, especially ones that she couldn’t identify and therefore didn’t know if they were safe around humans. “Tara,” said Jessica. “Spiders are living things too. It’s probably more afraid of you than you are of it. I’ll just let it out harmlessly.” Jessica took Tara’s textbook and used it to lead the spider out.

However, just before Jessica had the spider out of the window, the arachnid suddenly bit her and made her yell in pain. The spider scurried out of the window just as Jessica slammed the window shut and blew on her hand. “Mom!” yelled Tara. “Are you alright?” Jessica just swung her hand a few more times before she went to the bathroom to put something on it. “Now that was one bad spider,” she said. “Ouch. My hand has never felt this store.” Tara looked in worry. “Oh,” said Jessica to her daughter. “Don’t worry. I’ve heard that the most dangerous bite is a human bite. After seeing that episode of that horror show from the 80s, I believe it. Now come on, you’re going to be late for school, and I’m going to be late for work.”

 Unfortunately, what Jessica didn’t notice was that underneath her bandages, the spider bite was throbbing. It was not an ordinary spider that bit her.
1122311222222222222222222222.title: Spider Bite

11223112222222222222222222221.content:
Soon, Jessica and Tara had arrived at the middle school. “I’ll see you third period, Tara,” said Jessica. “But until then, I want you to behave for the other teachers.” “You don’t have to tell me twice, I’m not a problem child.” “Uh-huh,” said Jessica before she kissed her daughter. “I’ll see you later sweetie.” However, Tara just felt her face because something was bothering her about her mother’s kiss. As Tara walked away, Jessica let out a slight hiss of some kind and held her throat with the hand where the spider bit her. “Ugh,” she said. “My mouth feels so dry. What’s happening?” Before Jessica could give a thought to what was going on, she bumped into somebody.

“Oh, my gosh,” said Jessica. “I’m sorry. It’s my first day and…” “Well, fancy seeing you here. Took that teaching position I see.” Jessica looked up and recognized the man she bumped into as Tony, her boyfriend. “Tony,” she said as she kissed her boyfriend. “There you are. I see that you’re ready for your first class.” “Well, let’s hope you’re ready for yours, Jessica.” Tony then gasped because he noticed the bandage on Jessica’s hand. “What the heck happened to her hand?” “Oh,” said Jessica. “That? Just a rather large spider bite.” “Spider?” asked Tony in surprise. “What kind of spider was it?” Jessica shrugged her shoulders. “I don’t know. It was blue with white spots and a yellow hourglass on its butt. I don’t think I’ve ever seen a spider like it. But Tara was screaming and I had to get…” “Wait,” said Tony. “You were bitten by a spider you couldn’t identify? What if it was poisonous? Don’t you know there are certain species of spiders that are deadly to humans? Black widows, redbacks…” “Well, I don’t feel any different. I doubt I’m dying, Tony.”

Tony let out a sigh. “Well, come into the lounge. Spiders actually have a lot to do with what I’m teaching in class today.” Once in the teacher’s lounge, Jessica made coffee for herself and her boyfriend. “So, what exactly does my boyfriend have in mind for what he’s teaching. In fact, what exactly is it that you teach?” “Mythology,” said Tony. “Specifically, Greek mythology. For class today, I’m going to teach the kids about the myth of Arachne.” “Arachne?” asked Jessica. Tony then nodded his head before he explained.

“In Greek mythology, Arachne was a seamstress who was more than a little cocky. She boasted that she could weave even better than the gods themselves.” Jessica gave a look of surprise. “Oh, that’s just asking for a trip to hell.” “Oh, she got just that,” said Tony. “Athena, the goddess of war and wisdom, was furious and decided to take up Arachne on that claim. The two of them had a weaving competition.” “I know where this is going. Arachne clearly lost. I mean, you don’t just pick a fight with the gods and expect to get away with it. “Oh yeah,” said Tony as he drank his coffee. “Arachne paid dearly for her bragging. After she lost, Athena turned her into a spider. Hench, arachnids.” Jessica let out a laugh. “Pretty high price to pay for arrogance. Good luck with your first class.” Tony let out a laugh and then left the room. “Good luck with yours.”

However, as Tony left the teacher’s lounge, he forgot his textbook and it showed an image of the Arachne myth. There, the spider Arachne turned into was depicted as looking remarkably similar to the very same spider that bit Jessica earlier. However, the ginger-haired woman could care less about the textbook because she had her liberal arts class to get ready for. Jessica was confident in herself and then took out her makeup mirror to fix her hair. She was confident but not arrogant like Arachne.

Suddenly, Jessica heard a ripping sound and turned around to see that her butt had torn out of her stretch pants. “Oh no,” she said. “How em-bare-ass-ing.” Jessica let out a nervous laugh at her own joke before she looked closer in pure surprise because her ass had turned a dark blue color with what looked like white spots and a yellow hourglass shaped marking on it. “What the?” asked Jessica. “That’s weird. It looks almost like that spider that bit me.” Jessica then grunted and got on her knees before her butt expanded into a massive thorax as big as a car. Jessica gasped and felt her pants coming apart right before her legs stretched out and she sprouted six extra legs. Jessica’s skin turned the shade shade of dark blue as her thorax as she yelled and her teeth all turned into fangs and mandible like growths appeared on the sides of her mouth. She then sprouted six extra eyes as she felt her belly bulging out. What was left of Jessica’s clothes tore apart as her transformation was complete. She had transformed into an 18ft tall humanoid spider with 8 legs, 2 arms, 8 eyes, a 30ft wide thorax, an 18ft wide belly and huge E-Cup breasts.

Jessica was horrified that she had become a large spider. “Oh my gosh! That spider that bit me must’ve been poisonous and in more ways than one. I’m a spider as big as a truck. Wait until Tara sees me like this. How can I face my daughter when I’m a giant arachnid?” Before Jessica could even think about what to tell her daughter, she heard her stomach growling and she let out a loud shriek. She now had an intense craving for...
11223112222222222222222222221.title: Spiders Bite

choices: She Stops Herself at the Last Minute
112231122222222222222222222212.content:
Jessica felt her stomach and then hissed as all eight of her obese legs twitched. “I’m starving,” said Jessica. “I need fresh meat.” Jessica then hissed again but then she realized something. Normally she wouldn’t even think of eating meat but the fact was, having been turned into a ginormous spider, she was technically a carnivore and needed meat. “I need something to eat,” she said. “Now, spiders eat... anything smaller than they are.” Jessica was now horrified. After all, she was in a middle school. She may have been a spider now but there was no way in hell she would eat children. She knew it was wrong.

“No,” she said. “I can’t eat Tara’s classmates. It’s not right. Only a sick psychopath eats children. But I’m so hungry.”  Jessica then dismantled the water cooler and chugged down all the water in an attempt to settle her arachnid appetite. But the drider woman couldn’t take it any longer and hissed again. “What I need is an adult. I know, the first teacher that comes in through that... no wait! That’s cannibalism. I can’t do it. I can’t....” But Jessica’s stomach gurgled and she rubbed it with four of her spider legs. “Oh,” she said. “I’m too hungry to care.” Jessica crawled up the ceiling and was humming to herself as she begun to spin her web. As she was doing so, she noticed the illustration of Arachne in Tony’s book. “That drawing,” she thought to herself. “That’s Arachne? That looks like the spider that bit me. Oh no. Don’t tell me that Arachne survived. That’s great. The spider that bit me turns out to be a millennia old cursed silk spinner who has turned me into a 12 ton arachnid cannibal. Just remember, Jessica. Students are off limits. Just eat something and you can make it through the rest of the day.”

Jessica then stopped to notice all of the webbing she had arranged all over the room and smiled. “Now that’s a pretty good looking web if I do say so myself.” Suddenly the doorknob was turning and Jessica heard it. Somebody was entering the teacher’s lounge. Jessica couldn’t control herself and begun to drool. “Forgive me for what I’m about to do,” she thought to herself. “I wish it didn’t have to end this way.” “Is anybody in there?” asked the voice. “What is that hanging from across the walls! Those brats must’ve gotten in! I keep telling that idiot principal we need barbed wire around here!” Jessica let out a groan. “Mr. Edwards,” she groaned to herself. “That figures.” Mr. Edwards was the school’s math teacher. Jessica had heard some really bad things about him from both Tony and the students. She even heard that he once failed a student just because he was out with an appendectomy that made it impossible for him to take a quiz. Suddenly Jessica didn’t feel bad about what she was about to do to satisfy her hunger.

Mr. Edwards walked in and saw all the webbing. Of course, he didn’t know about Jessica and figured that everything was just a prank. “Lousy brats! They have too much time. Why did people save recess? It’s the most useless thing. That’ why kids go to middle school and high school out of control. They oughta be chained up and studying for twelve hours in a row a day. That’s what children are put on this Earth for! To think that new teacher they hired is a parent. Some people have those little monsters on pur...” Mr. Edwards then realized that his feet were stuck to the webbing on the floor. “What the...? AAH!”

The mean teacher soon found a web falling down on him from above and fell to the ground when he looked up and screamed as he saw Jessica’s spider form staring and smiling menacingly down at him. “Hello, Mr. Edwards,” said Jessica. “I’m Ms. Hale, the new L.A. teacher.” Mr. Edwards was sweating in fear of the giant spider above him. “Y-You?” he asked. “You’re the teacher they hired?” Jessica crawled down, her huge and fat arachnid body looming over her prey. Jessica just let out an evil laugh. “I kind of had a run in with a rather unusual bug this morning. You know, I really didn’t want to do this, but after those nasty things you said and the even nastier things I’ve heard you do...” Jessica let out an evil laugh and secreted webbing from her thorax that she applied to her legs to wrap Mr. Edwards up as he was screaming and trying to escape his bindings.

The spider giantess then licked her lips as she used two of her spider legs to hold up her prey. But does she enjoy her meal uninterrupted?
112231122222222222222222222212.title: Eight-Legged Feast

11223112222222222222222222222.content:
Our story begins in Japan where a housewife and mother is having trouble sleeping. Suiren was her name and she was moaning as she laid in bed unable to sleep. She even got up and tried to jog in place but nothing was making her tired enough to sleep. She went into the bathroom and looked in the mirror to see that she had large bags underneath her eyes. “I read somewhere that a month without sleep is fatal. I only have 20 days left to live if this keeps up. I’ve got to get to sleep.”

Suiren didn’t know exactly how she was supposed to get to sleep and so she went down stairs to watch TV to find a way to fall asleep. “Damn,” she said. “Nothing on but kaiju films. I’d never get to sleep watching all of that.” Suiren shook her head and flipped channels before she saw a commercial for something interesting. “Are you having trouble trying to sleep? Yokaiba Corp is looking for an insomnia to take a 30-day trial period for our newest sleeping pill, Lasting Dream. The trial is free. Just call the number listed and we’ll see if we can’t give you sweet dreams.” This looked interesting and Suiren immediately picked up the phone in order to order the sleeping pill.

However, right before she could even dial the number, there was a knock on the door. Suiren then decided to investigate and found nobody at the door, instead there was a box of sleeping pills labeled “Lasting Dream”. Suiren picked up the box and begun to inspect it right as she was scratching her head. “That’s odd,” she said. “It doesn’t say what’s in this stuff. But I’m too tired to care.” Suiren took one tablet of the Lasting Dream in hopes that it would make her fall asleep. However, when she crawled back into bed, she was waiting for the pills to take effect and nothing happened, making her rather angry.

 This went on for a few days. One Friday morning, she was trying to prepare tamagoyaki only to accidentally ruin the batch by pouring in salt instead of sugar as she served them to the family. Her daughter, Ran bit into one and gagged. “Yuck. Mom, are you feeling alright.” “Gee, Ran,” said a rather ticked off Suiren. “What do YOU think!?” Suiren’s husband, Takeshi shook his head and then saw Suiren anxiously pouring in milk before putting in one of her sleeping pills. “Suiren,” said Takeshi. “Don’t you think that you should lay off those pills? They haven’t worked yet?” Suiren hissed and held her fork up to her husband while their son, Gou. watched in fear. “Ran,” said Gou. “I think we better start heading to school now. Mom’s extra cranky today.”

Suiren just slammed her chopsticks into the table. “I haven’t slept for over a week! I have a right to be cranky! If these pills don’t work I’m going to sue Yokaiba Corps for everything they have! They better work. They have to work!” Suiren just continued to huff and puff before taking more of those pills. “Mom,” said Ran. “It doesn’t say what those pills are made of. They could be dangerous.” Surien just stuck her tongue out at her daughter before she walked off.

Takeshi let out a groan. “It’s gonna be another bad night in bed.” However, neither Takeshi nor Suiren noticed a baku on the bottle of pills that seemed to be making an ominous noise.
11223112222222222222222222222.title: A Cure for Insomnia

112231122222222222222222222221.content:
That night, after the kids were in bed, Suiren and Takeshi were in the bathroom getting ready for bed themselves and Suiren held up the bottle of Lasting Dream and took out a tablet. “Suiren,” said Takeshi. “This is getting monotonous. You’ve been taken that medicine for a week straight and you haven’t had any results yet.” Suiren just grabbed Takeshi by the shirt collar and made him groan. “I haven’t been sleeping that well, Takeshi,” Suiren warned her husband. “Which means I haven’t been having a good week and I haven’t been in the best mood.” Takeshi gulped and nodded his head a few times. “Yes dear, I understand dear. I think I’ll go on ahead to bed. Good luck trying to get to sleep.” Suiren then kissed Takeshi to wish him a good night. As Takeshi went off to bed, Suiren opened the bottle of Lasting Dream and took two tablets before retreating to bed herself. She pulled the covers over herself before she curled up. “Please,” she said. “Please gods of sleep, pay me a visit tonight.”

However, an hour later, the pills had no effect. Takeshi was dead asleep while Suiren was wide awake. As Suiren was tossing and turning in her bed unable to sleep, she grabbed her green hair and stood up. She looked at the sleeping medicine she had been taking and gave it a glare. “Baka,” she said. “You are a baka medicine! Lasting Dream. Didn’t even work. Experimental. Failed experiment is more like it. I oughta.” Suddenly, Suiren grabbed herself by the chest and groaned. She even coughed up some strange mystical smoke. “What the?” she asked. Suddenly, Suiren felt her fingers and toes becoming clawed hooves as her skin was turning a greenish yellow color to suit her green hair. “OMG,” she said. “That medicine didn’t just not cure my insomnia. It made me sick. I’ve turned green.”

Suiren then coughed again and held up her hands before grunting as she held her hoofed hands. Then she felt her stomach expanding as she held onto her face. Her eyes became pointier as she sprouted what looked like tusks on the sides of her mouth and she then grunted and yelled as her mouth stretched into a snout and her butt expanded to make her pajama pants come apart at the seams and the skin below her waist turned a bright purple skin. Suiren stood up and then banged her head on the ceiling before she turned to see that her butt was casting a shadow over Takeshi and the entire bed. Suiren let out a snort and saw that she had completely transformed into a 18ft tall baku with a 23ft wide butt and belly, thighs as thick as tree trunks and fingers and toes that were as thick as sausages.

“Oh great,” said Suiren. “Not only can I not sleep, but I’m a baku. This is mortifying. I’ll be the laughingstock of the neighborhood once everyone sees I got turned into a yokai.” Suiren was so mad that she let out a growl. But that wasn’t just her because her stomach was what was growling and growling very loudly. “Onore,” said the tapir giantess. “I am starving. I need something in my belly fast.” Suiren then begun to sniff the air because she sensed something. “What the?” she asked. “What is that delicious smell? I’ve got to taste it.”

Exactly what does Suiren eat to get over her monstrous hunger?
112231122222222222222222222221.title: Rude Awakening

choices: She Decides Not to Tell Him
1122311222222222222222222222212.content:
Suiren was rubbing her stomach out of pure hunger and wondering exactly what to eat when something tickled her nose. “What is that strange aroma?” the baku woman asked to herself. The obese and huge tapir-like creature sniffed the air again and realized something. “That smells sweet. Suiren then looked out and saw that what she smelt was coming from Ran’s bedroom. Suiren walked in to see her daughter sleeping and then she smelt something coming from her. “Wait,” said Suiren. “I’m a baku. Bakus eat dreams. What I must smell is a delicious dream. I wonder what Ran is dreaming about.” Suiren heard laughter and was somehow able to look into her daughter’s dream. Inside the dream, Ran appeared to be having a foot race with several stuffed animals in a land that had roads of gingerbread and mountains made out of baked Alaska and trees made of pocky.” Just looking at the dream made Suiren very excited. “Oh wow!” she yelled. “That is one sweet dream that my daughter is having. Literally. I just want to eat it up.” Suiren held out her snout and opened her mouth wide. She was going to inhale Ran’s dream but stopped herself at the last second.

“What the heck am I doing?” asked Suiren. “I can’t wake my daughter out of such a pleasant dream just to feed myself. What kind of mother would I be.” Suiren walked away, although it took her five minutes just to squeeze her newly obese body out of her daughter’s room. “Man,” she said. “I need something to eat. Maybe there’s some leftover takoyaki in the fridge.” But before the baku SSBBW could even take one step downstairs, she heard screaming and realized something. “That came from Gou’s room!” Suiren ran to her son’s bedroom and saw Gou tossing and turning in his bed and he was sweating heavily. From the looks of it, he was having night terrors.” Suiren decided to look into Gou’s dream and saw something rather unpleasant.

Gou was having a rather horrible nightmare and there were several strange creatures in his dream that made it clear that they wanted to do him harm. There was a top-shaped robot with a buzz saw collar around his neck and a mace for an arm with nails sticking out of his head. There was a large armored cockroach creature that resembled a knight armed with a shield and axe who was walking forward. The third kaijin was a giant frog with a snake wrapped around himself and the last of the evil creatures resembled a dragon made out of teeth. All the vile nightmare monsters laughed wickedly as they cornered Gou in the dream world. From the looks of it, they were in a black castle of some sort that appeared to be wrapped up with barbed wire. “Oh my gosh!” yelled Suiren. “Gou’s having a nightmare. I told him not to watch Tokusatsu movies before going to bed. Now he’s having bad dreams about kaijin. Don’t worry, Gou, Mama’s got this.”

 Suiren held out her snout and opened her mouth wide as she inhaled deeply. In the nightmare, the tokusatsu kaijin would’ve attacked Gou but suddenly they grunted and held themselves tight as they begun to dissolve into smoke. “Nani?” asked Gou in the dream. It wasn’t just the monsters that fizzled into smoke but the entire dream landscape was transforming into smoke and that smoke was seeping out of Gou’s head in the real world and being sucked into Suiren’s mouth as the baku ate the dream. By the time Gou woke up to look around, Suiren quickly shut the bedroom door so her son wouldn’t see her transformed into a sumo-sized yokai. “What happened?” asked Gou. “Ugh. Guess it was just a bad dream.” Gou let out a yawn and then went back to sleep as in the hallway, Suiren was chewing on his nightmare and then swallowed it whole before rubbing and patting her 23ft wide belly. “Sleep tight, Darling,” said Suiren. “All your nightmares are going in Mama’s belly from now on.”

 But that was when Suiren hiccuped and grunted as her belly roared violently. “Oh my,” she said with a belch. “Ugh. I forgot. Bad dreams make bakus sick.” Suiren stepped down the stairs, making them crack under her 6 ton body in the process before she entered the kitchen and immediately chugged three entire bottles of seltzer water and then swallowed a couple of antacids. Once she had some relief in her stomach, the yokai let out an explosion of gas from body ends before feeling her tummy again. “Oh,” she said. “Ugh. Eating that bad dreams makes me feel like I’m about to vomit out a rhinoceros and that rhinoceros will in turn vomit a unicycle. I think I better eat a good dream in order to put out this fire in my belly. Oh, I know. I’ll see what Takeshi is dreaming up." The enormous baku waddled her way up the ruined stairs, but she was having trouble because her ass had outgrown the stairway. Suiren grunted as she wiggled her rear to try and free it from the railing but in the process, broke the railing from the stairway. The baku girl just blushed. "Okay," she said. "That's gonna take some explaining to Takeshi. Speaking of which, I wonder what my husband is dreaming of. The baku then let out a giggle. "As if I didn't already know. It's probably his beloved wife. Oh, when he wakes up, he'll get a big surprise."

Suiren saw her husband sleeping peacefully and then walked up to the bed, causing the legs on her side of the bed to break apart and the bed to tip as Takeshi slid down against his wife’s stomach. “You know,” said Suiren. “I’ll bet that whatever he’s dreaming is delicious. I think I’ll take a peak.” Suiren looked into the dream to see a cruise ship at sunset. “Oh,” she said. “What’s this? A romantic cruise, a sunset on the ocean. Oh, this reminds me of back when we were first married. I’ll bet that he’s dreaming about me.” Suiren heard Takeshi laughing and smiled but then she heard a female voice that didn't sound at all like her own voice. "Huh?" asked the big fat baku woman. "Who is that?" Takeshi laughed again in the dream. "So what do you think, Sanae." "Sanae!?"

Suiren took a closer look and it was perfectly clear that she did not like what she saw because there was a black haired woman in a punk rock style outfit who walked up and grabbed Takeshi in an embrace as they kissed, prompting Suiren to yell. "Who is that girl!? Why is she touching my husband!? What the hell is going on?" "The sunrise is beautiful," said the black haired girl that was most likely Sanae. "Isn't it, Takeshi-san." Takeshi bent his head down and kissed the girl, much to the dismay of Suiren who was watching. "No," said Takeshi. "No, Sanae-Chwan. You're beautiful. You're the most gorgeous girl I've ever seen." "What?!" yelled Suiren. Sanae let out a laugh. "Oh, you. It's too bad that when I met you, you were already married to... uh what is her name." "Suiren. It means "Water Lily". It oughta mean "drenched lily" given that green hair reminds me of expired seaweed. Heck. 12 years of marriage and 2 pregnancies has completely made her less appealing. With her insomnia, she looks worse everyday. It's only natural that I need someone more... blessed... in the looks department." In the dream, Sanae bounces her large breasts as Takeshi continues to stare. "We shouldn't have to see each other only in dreams and when you're pretending to be working late. When are you going to dump that green-haired hag for good." "Soon my sweet, sweet Sanae, very soon. I'm just waiting for the right moment. I'm surprised that fat idiot hasn't figured it out already. Then again, I didn't marry her for her brains." Sanae and Takeshi were laughing in the dream as Takeshi twirled his mistress in the air.

Needless to say, Suiren was way past pissed off by this point and the baku was filled with rage as she saw the adultery that was taking place in Takeshi's dream, no doubt a reflection of adultery that was taking place in real life. “Why that jiggalo! We’ve been married for 12 years and he has the nerve to do this to me! Ugh! Okay, DEAR. You’re about to be in for a rather rude awakening.” Suiren held up her snout and inhaled again. In the dream world, the ocean turned violent and the boat spun around as Takeshi and Suiren screamed. “What’s happening!?” yelled Suiren. “I don’t know!” yelled Takeshi. “This is new to me! Don’t worry, Sanae, it’s only a dream. It’s only a...” Sanae then screamed and turned into smoke as did the rest of the dream as it billowed down Suiren’s throat. “Too bad that this is only a dream I’m eating,” thought the yokai to herself as the last of the dream went down her greedy throat. “If I find out where that tramp lives, she’s getting a one way trip to my gut for trying to steal my husband. Hell, I'm even tempted to eat Takeshi right now."

Takeshi woke up yelling as he held his head. “What was that all...” Takeshi heard a grunt and then he looked up and gasped at the 18ft tall and 6 ton fatass baku looking down at him. “A baku?!” asked Takeshi. “Yokai are real?” The angry baku lowered her head and gave Takeshi a look at her green hair and realized that it was his wife that he was looking at. “Suiren! Is that you? Am I dreaming?” Suiren let out a grunt. From the sounds of it, Takeshi had no idea that Suiren knew exactly what he was dreaming about, let alone the fact that he was cheating on her, and so she decided to stay calm for a minute or two as her eye begun to twitch. “Well,” said Suiren. “From the looks of it, I had a violent reaction to the Lasting Dream.” Takeshi laughed nervously. “Well,” he said. “It’s definitely something.” Takeshi then gave a gulp. “Damn, she’s huge,” he thought. “If she finds out about Sanae, she’ll swallow me whole.”

But does Suiren make it known that she knows about the affair that her husband is having?
1122311222222222222222222222212.title: Dream Eater

112231122222222222222222222222.content:
“Here it is, Wanda,” said Simon to his wife as he drove their car in front of a cabin out in the woods. “The Pine Barrens of New Jersey. Home of…” “The Jersey Devil.” Continued Wanda. Simon let out a laugh as the two of them parked their car under a roadsign that depicted a strange demonic looking creature with hooved feet, a horned horse’s head with sharp teeth, bat wings and a pointed tail. “So that’s the creature,” said Wanda. “Are you sure that it exists, Simon?” Simon let out a sigh. “I know that we never did find the NASA gargoyle and I’m not one hundred percent sure that Hodag we saw wasn’t just a dog in a suit, but I have a feeling that the Jersey Devil is here.”

Wanda let out a sigh and then kissed her husband. “Well,” she said. “This is certainly the most interesting way to spend our honeymoon. I hope J.D. turns out to be real. After all, Daddy said that if you managed to find a cryptid, he’d eat his socks. After what he said about your cryptozoology hobby, I’d like to see that happen.” “Wanda,” said Simon. “Your father was drunk when he said that. You check us in, I’ll go see if the Jersey Devil is around here.” Wanda let out a laugh and then went to check in. The hotel manager let out a sigh. “From the looks of it,” he said. “You’re looking for J.D. I’m not even sure that he’s real. But he does a very good job of lining our pockets so he can be as real as he wants.” Wanda let out a laugh as she checked in.

However, once Wanda had put everything in the hotel room, she decided to check out the woods for herself. “I really hope Simon finally finds a cryptid,” she said. “I’ve always wanted to see one up close. Then again, anything with devil in the name is probably something we shouldn’t mess with.” As Wanda was walking through the woods, she saw a strange shadowed-out creature moving behind the trees. She gasped because she thought that it could potentially turn out to be the Jersey Devil. “Oh my gosh.” She said. Wanda ran off as the figure was running and even took out some mace before she jumped out in front of the creature. The creature responded in surprise right before Wanda struck it with mace and caused it to scream loudly in pain. Wanda then took a closer look and saw that it was not the Jersey Devil that she had sprayed but a man in green rags and a metal mask who was holding his eyes in pain. “Oh my gosh!” yelled Wanda. “Are you alright?!” The man held out his eyes in pain and then Wanda hastily rubbed them with a cloth. “Mama Mia,” groaned the man. “These modern weapons will be the death of Erlking.” “I’m really sorry,” said Wanda. “I didn’t know you were…”

“Human?” asked Erlking. “It’s okay. I’m not really sure myself. Ouch. That’s some strong mace there. What’s a young woman like you doing out here in the first place?” Wanda let out a giggle. “It’s my husband. We were just married last week and he wanted to take us to Jersey. You see, Simon has a fetish for cryptids. In fact, I first met him at a Halloween party when I was dressed as Frank Shaw’s gargoyle.” Wanda let out a laugh as Erlking blinked. “Go on.” The old man said. “Oh,” said Wanda. “Right. Well, Simon took me out here because he wants to show me the Jersey Devil.”

“The Jersey Devil?” asked Erlking. “I’ve heard of the creature. People apparently like it so much that they named a hockey team after it. Do you know the story behind this creature? Legend has it that a woman had 12 children and was expecting the 13th one.” “Good grief,” said Wanda. “Who would want that?” “Not her,” said Erlking. “She said that this one would be the devil. When she went to labor in 1735, the child was born normal but turned into a horse-headed monster with bat wings, hooves and a forked tail. It killed the midwife and then escaped out the chimney.” Wanda let out a whistle. “That’s quite a story, there, Erlking. But if I could get Simon to see the Jersey Devil... what I’m saying is that I wish that Simon would see the Jersey Devil.” Erlking then smiled and then climbed up on a nearby tree stump as Wanda looked in confusion.

“I say, 1, 2, spell me do. Let this lady’s wish come true, here me hihg, hear me well, let me be this spell.” Erlking’s eyes glowed bright and then Erlking disappeared. Wanda just blinked before she heard Simon calling. “Wanda!” yelled Simon. “Come quick! I found hoofprints, they might belong to the Jersey Devil!” “Coming, Sweetie.” Said Wanda. Wanda ran off to meet with her husband, but as she was running, she failed to notice that her ass was getting larger and she was getting taller. At this point, her butt was so big that her skirt could no longer cover it. She also appeared to be growing a devil’s tail and a pair of leather wings as her feet turned into the hooves of the Jersey Devil.
112231122222222222222222222222.title: Jersey Devil May Care

1122311222222222222222222222221.content:
Wanda walked up to find her husband as she continued to get taller and fatter and bright red. She was shaking her booty not realizing that she had a long pointed tail like a demon’s. Her wings were even getting bigger and her teeth got sharper as her face was stretching into the shape of a horse’s head as she was growing long curved horns. She saw Simon up ahead and noticed that he was looking at some hoof prints on the ground. “So, Babe,” said Wanda as she pressed her breasts against her husband’s back. “Any sign.” Simon let out a groan. “False alarm, Wanda. These are deer tracks. The Jersey Devil is described as an equine, not a cervine.” “Aw,” said Wanda. “Too bad. I was looking forward to seeing the Jersey Devil.” Simon let out a groan. “And I’m sure that your father is going to rib me about it. He almost called off the wedding after that fiasco with the ogopogo. But I'm gonna show him. I'll find a real cryptid if it's the last thing I ever due.”

 Suddenly, Simon felt his neck in pain from the weight of Wanda’s boobs that were at this point so fat they looked like they were at least H-cups. “Wanda,” he said. “Have you considered getting a reduction.” “What do you mean?” asked Wanda. As Simon got up, he saw a shadow over him, a rather large and fat shadow with long wings, a horned horse’s head and a devil’s tail. “Oh my gosh! There he is! The Jersey Devil. Huh, he’s much fatter than I imagined he’d be.” Wanda let out a squeal. “Where is he?!” Wanda was too excited to notice that she had been turned into a Jersey Devil. Specifically she was now 20ft tall with a 30ft wide stomach and ass and thick thunderous thighs. She turned around and took out her camera phone to get a good look at the Jersey Devil that her husband spotted.

“You can’t miss him,” said Simon. “He’s right... Ugh!” Simon had slammed his head right into Wanda’s big red ass that had all but swallowed her skirt and panties. Simon then gasped and felt around his mutated wife’s ass before looking up and noticing her reddish brown hair. Wanda gave a snort and blew fire out of her nose before turning around and intimidating Simon with her demonic equine face and sharp teeth. “I can’t see the Jersey Devil, Simon. Where is he.” Simon gave a gulp. “Uh, Wanda. He... is a she. Look in the mirror.” Wanda was confused but she reached into her big cleavage and took out a mirror before looking at herself and screamed loudly. “Good grief!” Wanda then held up her stomach and then looked back at her big ass. “Look at how fat I am, Simon! I'm morbidly obese! This ass looks like it should be wrecking buildings. My belly looks like it could deflect bullets and look at these breasts. I could just throw out my purses if I have a cleavage like this. How do they stay up?”

Simon was dumbfounded. “That’s what you notice first? You’re the Jersey Devil! Well, a Jersey Devil, but the point still stands. What happened?” Wanda scratched her obese stomach before she realized something. “Erlking.” “Erlking?” “A weird old man I met in the woods. He said he granted wishes. I wished that you would see the Jersey Devil. So he turned me into the Jersey Devil. I guess you really do have to be careful what you wish for.” Simon was very horrified. “How do we change you back?” he asked. “My parents will not be pleased when they find out I married a demon.” Wanda just twitched her fingers. “I don’t think there is a way to turn me back. I guess I’m stuck being fat and a demon for the rest of my life.” Simon shook his head. “Well,” he said. “For better or for worse. That’s what the preacher said. All my life I’ve been chasing after cryptids. And not even two weeks into our marriage, my wife becomes one.”

Wanda just smiled and kissed Simon so hard that her mouth completely enveloped her husband. Wanda then lifted her head and heard Simon screaming and realized she accidentally sucked him into her mouth. Wanda in embarrassment opened her mouth and stretched down her tongue before allowing Simon to slide harmlessly out of her mouth. Simon gagged as he wiped Jersey Devil spit off of his body. “That is going to take some getting used to.” Then Wanda smiled. “And Daddy is going to have to get used to eating his socks. I’ll send him a picture.” Wanda grabbed Simon and placed him on her shoulder before taking a selfie, focusing on her demonic head.

Both Wanda and her husband laughed before Wanda walked away, not realizing she still seemed to be getting bigger as the two of them...
1122311222222222222222222222221.title: Big Wanda in Little Jersey

11223112222222222222222222222212.content:
Wanda’s stomach started to rumble rather loudly and the Jersey Devil giantess gave a look of pure surprise. “Huh,” she said to herself. “If that don’t beat all,” she said. “Looks like this Jersey Devil has an appetite to match her belly.” Simon gave a gulp. “Ouch,” he thought to himself. “That’s gonna kill my wallet.” Wanda started to walk into town and Simon gave a look of surprise. “Wanda?” he asked. “Honey? What are you doing?” “What’s it look like, Hubby?” asked Wanda. “Big mama’s hungry. I think there should be a diner around here.” Simon gasped as he held onto his wife’s shoulder. “Wanda,” he said. “Are you sure that this is a good idea? After all, people might think you’re a monster.” Wanda gave a snort. “Simon, I am a monster now and a rather big one who is hungry enough to eat one hundred cows in one sitting. Simon, what do Jersey Devils eat?” Simon begun to think and then had a horrible thought. “People.” He said. Wanda gave a look of surprise. “Are you sure about that?” asked Wanda to her tiny husband. “Well,” said Simon. “I’m not completely 100% sure about that, but you’re definitely a carnivorous creature.” Suddenly, Wanda heard a loud gobbling sound and begun to drool. “Hold that thought, Simon?” The giant Jersey Devil licked her lips and rubbed her big belly as she walked into an open field and sniffed around for food. She heard a gobbling sound again and realized that she picked up the scent of a wild turkey, several wild turkeys.

Wanda flapped her wings and flew overhead as the turkeys gobbled and tried to run. Some of them managed to escape but Wanda snatched up five turkeys in her mouth and swallowed them whole. Once the turkeys were in her stomach, Wanda let out a thunderous belch that forced Simon to cover his ears. He even saw brimstone fly out of his wife’s mouth. “Excuse me,” said Wanda in embarrassment. I guess getting turned into a 20ft tall and 6 ton demonic cryptid takes away your manners.” Wanda then held up one of her sharp clawed fingers and started to try and pick at her teeth.

“Wanda?” asked Simon with slight worry in his face. “What are you doing?” Wanda let out a sigh. “I think I have a feather or two stuck between my teeth. Simon Dear, would you be a sweetie and held me out with this.” Simon was shocked. What his wife was asking him to do was to go into his mouth. “Are you kidding me?” asked Simon, obviously afraid. “You want me to go inside your mouth.” “Well duh, Sweetie,” said Wanda. “It’s no different from what plovers do with crocodiles.” Wanda opened her mouth wide and showed sharp teeth as big as stones and saliva was dripping from the top to the bottom. Simon let out a sigh. “Okay,” he said. “But you have to promise me that you’re not going to eat me.” Wanda just rolled her eyes at her husband’s words. “What do I look like?” asked the Jersey Devil giantess. “A black widow? Relax, Simon. I’m not going to swallow you. Just walk in and everything will be okay.” Simon let out a sigh because he saw no way out of this rather bizarre predicament.

Hoping for the best, he simply stepped into Wanda’s hand and then stepped into her mouth as she stuck out her rather large tongue right before closing her mouth and giving Simon a good view of her teeth. Simon crawled up to inspect Wanda’s teeth and saw that Wanda did indeed have some feathers stuck in between her teeth. He took out a pocket knife in order to remove the turkey feathers right before he spotted some spinach caught between her back molars. “Ugh,” he said. “Somebody definitely forgot to floss last night.” Simon let out a sigh as he continued to clean out his wife’s mouth. “I knew that I couldn’t predict how well our marriage would turn out, but who would’ve predicted that not even the first month of our marriage and my bride would turn into the very cryptid that I was looking for. Calm down, Simon. It will all work out. I hope."

Once Simon had finished picking out Wanda’s teeth, the Jersey Devil woman spat her minuscule husband into her hand and then bent her head down to give him a kiss. However, Wanda’s stomach was still rumbling and Wanda let out a groan. “You’re STILL hungry?” asked Simon. “I guess I shouldn’t be surprised given how big you are now, but seriously?” The Jersey Devil girl let out a sigh and then started to walk away. “Well,” she said. “Looks like we’re going to have to eat out anyway.” Simon was beginning to sweat rather heavily. “Oh boy,” he said. “This is big shock for little Jersey."

Wanda walked into town and the townsfolk gasped and stared. One young man on a bicycle crashed into a tree when he saw the big and huge cryptid woman. “Oh my gosh! It’s the Jersey Devil!” “I didn’t know the Jersey Devil was female.” “She’s humongous.” “That devil has some serious booty.” Said one teenager who couldn’t help but stare at Wanda’s huge and jiggling rear end. This resulting in the teen's rather jealous girlfriend slapping him in the face. "Give me a break. Like that's attractive." Wanda noticed that everybody in the vicinity was taking photographs of her as she walked right down the street. She then grunted because several tourists were right under her ass as they took a selfie with her. "You know," said one of the tourists. "I thought the Jersey Devil would be a lot more intimidating." Wanda then begun to blush as she bit herself in the lip. "Okay, Simon," she said to her husband. "Perhaps you were right about me attracting unwanted attention." Simon let out a sigh. "Well it's too late to do anything about it now, Wanda," he said. "At least we should be glad that nobody is calling the army on you." The demonic giantess let out a laugh but then she noticed she seemed to have gotten bigger and fatter as well. She even stopped to look at her now 35ft wide ass in the reflection of a nearby window as she blushed.

But before she could worry about her own vanity, Wanda’s stomach rumbled, reminding her exactly why she was in town. Then she looked ahead and saw a diner between two large oak trees. This diner was entitled “Mama Leeds” and had a giant wooden statue of a Jersey Devil on top of it. “Well, well,” said Wanda. “Looks like it’s lunch time.” Wanda walked up to the diner, startling the patrons inside, who turned around at the sound of the giant woman’s large footsteps. “What was that?” asked one of them. “Oh my gosh!” The waitress looked in surprise to see Wanda outside. However, Wanda gave a growl of pure frustration because there was one thing that she didn’t take into consideration with her dining plans. Namely, it was the fact that she was currently much too big to fit in the diner. Wanda stomped her foot in rage. "Dammit!" she yelled. "Don't lose your temper, Wanda," said Simon. "I'll just go in and bring something for you to eat." Wanda held down her pointed demonic tail and her husband slid right down her back before he made his way into Mama Leeds's diner.

As Simon walked into the diner, Wanda crossed her arms and tapped her foot impatient. However, things were about to get much more awkward because several spectators had gathered around. "Wanda?" "That's an odd name for a Jersey Devil. I thought that demons were supposed to have threatening names." Wanda gave a growl. "Would you vultures leave me alone? I wasn't always a Jersey Devil." "Well, duh," said one of the townspeople. "Everyone knows that about you, Mrs. Jersey Devil." Inside the diner, Simon had order up several plates of fried dough. "I really hope that this is enough to satisfy my wife's monstrous hunger." The chef let out a laugh. "You're a brave man," she said. "Marrying the Jersey Devil." "Actually," said Simon. "We came here looking for the Jersey Devil and my wife made a wish to a funny man in green to see the real deal." The chef let out a laugh. "Honey," she said. "This isn't the first time a human turned into Jersey Devil. The real deal was human for 5 whole seconds. Well, I hope your wife prefers fried dough over human flesh. Tell her that crypt ids eat free around Mama Leeds'."

Simon smiled and then walked out with the order and Wanda looked down and smiled as Simon put the plates down and then the demonic giantess dug her head down into the food in order to snarf it down greedily. The crowd was repulsed and stepped back due to Wanda's rather poor table manners. That was when Simon heard his cellphone ringing and checked the caller ID. "Oh no." He said. What Simon received was a text from his father-in-law. The young man was sweeting as he took a look at the text and read it.

"You rat bastard," the text read. "What did you do to my Wanda? I knew you wouldn't amount to anything chasing after windmill cryptids, but to turn my own daughter into one of your fantasies? What kind of mutagen did you use. If I ever see you again, I can promise you that I'm going to tear you apart just like they did last week to that Anton whatever-his name was." Simon let out a sigh. "I should've known that Wanda's father wouldn't take this well. Of all the things to happen. I'm beginning to be glad that we didn't find the Frank Shaw's gargoyle at NASA!"

Suddenly there was more vibrations and the townspeople gasped. "Huh?" asked Simon. Wanda rose her head right out from the fried dough she was devouring and saw a shadow cast over her. It belonged to a giant woman who was as big as Wanda herself. From the looks of it, she was a cryptid as well, but from the looks of it, she was definitely not a Jersey Devil like Wanda was. "Well I'll be," said the new titaness. "I didn't think there was a second cryptid in the area." Wanda turned and looked in surprise to see the second giantess was in fact a...
11223112222222222222222222222212.title: Jersey Devil Out to Lunch

1122311222222222222222222222222.content:
“BRIIIING!” went Helena’s alarm clock right before the young woman smashed it with her hand. “Oh dang,” she groaned. “That’s the fifth clock this month.” The rather large woman got out of bed. Her Italian figure was muscular but big gutted. She had to be tough. It was a job requirement. She was the night guard at the first national bank.” She checked to see that it was 7:30 at night, which meant she would have to be at work soon, so she wasted no time getting into the shower and then afterwards getting her strong body ready to take on another night. “I really hope that Chuck finally stops picking on Stanley, tonight,” she said as she put on her security outfit and tie. “After all, it’s not like he gave him any choice in regards to the latest job.”

Helena was referring to her boyfriend, Stanley, an accountant at the bank who in contrast to his musclebound Goliath of a girlfriend, was a small, neurotic weakling who was pushed around by their boss. Chuck, the bank manager was always picking on Stanley. Heck, Stanley might as well be the real manager of the bank since Chuck was very rarely if ever seen doing his job. It made Helena wonder why he hadn’t been fired yet, but she just let out a sigh as she put away her gun and flashlight in her belt and then put on her glasses. “The bank is starting to be run like the post office these days. Well, time to get to work.

At the bank at the time, Chuck and Stanley were going over several figures involving the bank’s latest investment. “I don’t know if this is a good idea, Chuck,” said Stanley. “The loan we gave this guy, Mr. Bededdy. I heard that the last few plays he directed were bombs.” “Which is why it’s important that this bomb sets off a stream of explosions that give us major interest. Which is also why I’m naming you to oversee the production.” “What?!” yelled Stanley. “But, Chuck. I don’t know anything about the theater.” “Well,” said Chuck. “If things go wrong. You’re fired.” Stanley gasped at that. “On second thought,” said Chuck. “You’re fired now. You can have your job back when the play succeeds.” Stanley let out a groan. This was the very reason why Helena hated Chuck.

“Exactly who’s fired?” asked a voice behind Chuck. Chuck gulped and turned to see Helena glaring down at him. “Helena,” he said nervously. “I wasn’t saying anything? Who’s fired? Certainly not Stanley.” “I should hope not,” said Helena. “If I check you picking on my man again, manager or no manager, I’m going to tear you inside out.” “Yes, ma’am.” Said Chuck. While Chuck was prone to bullying Stanley, he didn’t dare do anything when his girlfriend (who had several feet and more than 100lbs on him). Helena gave a smug smile. “And for the record, I have the utmost faith that Stanley will be able to handle that play in spite of Bededdy’s incompetence as a director. Now run alone and do, whatever it is you do around here.”

Chuck ran off in fear as Helena laughed at him. “Thanks, Helena,” said Stanley. “It looks like you’ve saved me again. I’d be nowhere if it weren’t for you.” Helena let out a scoff and flexed one of her muscles. “Not a problem, Baby,” she said. ‘I just don’t like Chuck to think that just because he’s the manager means he can dump everything on you. After all, when was the last time he asked you to do anything?” Stanley let out a sigh and then walked up to his own safety deposit box. “There’s something really wrong with this picture, Helena. I’m the weaker one in our relationship and you’re the one keeping criminals out of this bank.” Helena shrugged her shoulders and felt her large stomach and her muscular limbs. “Right body for the right job, Stanley. This is what happens.”

Stanley then gave a smile that confused Helena. “Stanley?” she asked. Stanley then closed his vault before turning around. “Helena,” he said. “I couldn’t find a ring but I’d like you to have this.” Helena then gasped in surprise because Stanley held out something that looked like a silver necklace with bejeweled studs and a dog-like head in the center of it. Helena saw Stanley on his knee and she didn’t need any hints as to what that meant. “Yes,” said Helena. “I accept.” Helena turned around and got on her knees for her boyfriend to put her engagement necklace on her. “It’s beautiful,” said Helena. “So, do you have a date planned for the ceremony? I have to tell my folks.” “I don’t know,” said Stanley. “We’ll cross that bridge when we get there.” Helena then bent down to kiss her boyfriend, now fiancé. However, as Helena put on the necklace, it was revealed that there was a strange writing underneath the decoration. The writing was in ancient Greek language but when translated it read “Cerberus”. From the looks of it, neither Helena nor Stanley was aware of this.
1122311222222222222222222222222.title: The Watchdog

11223112222222222222222222222221.content:
That night after Stanley had left, Helena was watching the monitors to make sure that nobody broke into the bank. She was scratching at her necklace and was panting. “I love this necklace that Stanley gave me,” she said. “But it feels a little hot. Ugh. My shoulders are killing me. As soon as I get out of work, I’m heading to a chiropractor. Helena didn’t notice it, but her breasts had gotten bigger and her ass was ballooning as well. She was sweating heavily and tried to drink a mug of water but as soon as her lips touched the water, it started to boil and she gagged. “What the?” asked Helena. “Gee. I must be coming down with a fever. Don’t think about the pain, Helena. You’re the watchdog around here and this dog is on duty.” Helena started to pant again when she spotted something on one of the screens.

  There were two men in masks. One man was wearing a clown mask and the other man was wearing a Darth Vader mask. “Oh no,” said Helena with a sigh. “Men in masks. Never a good sign. Looks like I’m getting some action tonight.” Helena held out her flashlight and gun and walked off to deal with the criminals, not realizing that the back of her pants was ripping at the seat. Helena then held her head and begun to growl not realizing that there was bright violet-red fur growing all over her body and two growths appearing on her shoulders. Her stomach was also stretching out several feet. She also sprouted a silver whip-like tail that ended in an arrow-like point. The security guard let out a yawn as she revealed her teeth had turned into sharp fangs. Then, Helena gave a grunt. “Ugh,” she said. “Darn shoes.” What Helena failed to realize was that she was sprouting claws on her feet and they were tearing through the shoes.

The thieves at that point had managed to break into the vault. “Ha,” said the thief in the Darth Vader mask. “What did I tell you? Easy money.” “What about the guard?” asked the criminal in the clown mask. The Darth Vader masked crook gave a scoff. "The guard is a skirt. We can easily get past her." The criminals then both heard loud barking. "What was that?" asked the one in the clown's mask. "Oh no. You don't think we woke up the guard dog do you?" "I used to work at this bank. There is no guard dog. This bank doesn't use dogs." "I swear that I distinctively heard some kind of guard dog. I think we better give up."

The criminal in the Darth Vader mask didn't heed his friend's warning and then walked into the vault to try and load a bag full of cash. Of course, there was no guard dog because it was Helena who was growling. An angry grimace formed underneath her glasses as she got bigger and heavier with each step. Fur had grown all over her body, her new tail dragged across the ground and two sets of spikes sprouted on her back. Her uniform was in shambles as she dragged her belly across the ground. She briefly stopped and felt her shoulders in pain and then suddenly those two growths had fully emerged into a second and third head and let out a growl as they showed their razor sharp teeth.

At that point, the bank robbers had loaded up a bag of cash and were trying to drag it out. "I think we took too much." Said the clown mask. "Shut up. We've got just enough. Now let's get the heck out of here before..." Suddenly there was a loud growl. The criminals held out their guns and then the ground begun to shake. The floor was even cracking as a large shadow came out and the bank robbers fired their guns. But the bullets harmlessly fell to the ground, having absolutely no effect on their target.

Helena came out and showed what she had become. She was now a 20ft tall and morbidly obese three-headed dog with purple-red fur all over her body, a devil's tail and spikes on her back. Each head had long black hair and razor sharp teeth, though only the middle head wore glasses. Helena's belly hung out 10 feet and was 25ft wide with a 20ft wide butt that destroyed her pants and revealed her panties underneath and a pair of E-cup breasts that devoured her shirt and reduced her to only a bra. Helena's three heads snarled and drooled as the bank robbers screamed. They both shot at Helena but their bullets did nothing to the Cerberus giantess's skin.

Helena growled and then grabbed the criminals as they struggled in her grip. Helena then noticed her reflection in the window and gasped. "Oh my goodness." said her left head. "What happened to me?" asked her center head. Then her right head gasped. "Stanley's necklace!" Helena then shoved the criminals in the back of her panties and saw down to immobilize them before she took out her cell phone. "I have a few calls to make about this situation." Groaned the center head to herself.

Who does Helena contact first?
11223112222222222222222222222221.title: Beware of Dog

11223112222222222222222222222222.content:
“Holt!” yelled Brooke to her husband. “Watch out!” Holt drove their fishing boat and nearly ran over a child swimmer nearby. “Out of the way, dummy,” said Holt. “The nerve of some people. They’d scare the fish away.” Brooke let out a sigh. “I can only hope.” She thought underneath her breath as Holt cast his line into the water. Holt gave a smirk and it wasn’t long before he caught a fish. “Still the king of the water.” He said. Brooke turned her head as Holt pulled out the rather large and jagged lure. “This is my best lure, Brooke. Hooks them from the inside so they can’t escape.” “That’s cruel.” Moaned Brooke.

However, Holt just ignored his wife and continued to fish, catching a large number of fish into a net. “Alright,” said Holt. “We’re heading to shore. Brooke, get rid of the garbage.” Brooke tried to put the empty beer bottles into a bag but then Holt struck her. “Not like that, stupid. Like this.” Holt then proceeded to toss every last bottle into the lake as Brooke could only watch helplessly. It wasn’t long until they were back at shore and Holt put several of the fish into the cooler. “Trout,” he said. “This should make a pretty penny when I sell them to John’s.” “But Holt,” said Brooke. “Not all those fish will fit in the cooler.” Holt then cut the net and poured the rest of the fish out on the beach before walking away as Brooke looked in horror at such a wasteful action.

No one could understand why Brooke married Holt Rivers. The man was less than an animal who had zero regard for life. This was just one of the many ways that he disrespected nature. This fishing trip, if you could even call it that, was one of many that was ruining the lake for everyone and everything and Brooke knew it. She wished that it would stop, but there was just no reasoning with Holt. The two of them had entered the bait shop to restock and the shopkeeper seemed like he wasn’t happy to see them. “You’re killing my business, Holt,” said the shopkeeper. “As well as everything in the lake.” “Shut up,” said Holt. “The customer’s always right.”

It was clear at this point that Brooke had married a brute. She was begin to seriously rethink her marriage. Especially considering that Holt barely treated her any better than the fish he caught. She even lowered her sunglasses to show a blackeye that she got from Holt who at this time was arguing with the bait vendor. “You dirty crook. Charging this much for mealworms? I know a drug dealer who doesn’t charge as much as you. Say, that’s an idea.” The vendor gasped. “Are you kidding? You can’t use crack to catch fish. That’s beyond cruel.” “Who cares?” asked Holt. “I don’t even like fish. They’ve got no feelings anyway.” Brooke couldn’t help but cry at what Holt was even saying.

Brooke gasped as she saw that inside the shop appeared to be a zombified Greek soldier with missing heels washing windows while a minotaur skull sat on the table. She had heard of this particular magic shop and ran out of the bait shop across the street in order to buy whatever it was selling. Inside the shop, the door flung open and Brooke accidentally knocked over the zombie before she confronted the skull. She put her hand to its mouth before it had the chance to speak. “Don’t say a thing,” she said. “Just hear me out. I am Brooke Kim Rivers and I am married to an abusive and wasteful fisherman. I want to intimidate him into giving it up. I heard rumors that this store caused women to turn into giant monsters. In Greece, a young woman turned into a giant swan. A pair of alligator shoes from this store turned a hippie girl into an actual alligator. I want to become the most powerful creature under the water.”

Brooke’s determination actually intimidated the skull who himself seemed very uneasy about that request. “Listen, lady,” said the skull. “I’m going to level with you. Everything in this shop is cursed. You’ll be turned into a giant with very little hope of ever turning back.” Brooke just gave a stern look. “Holt won’t stop until the ocean is one big liquid wasteland,” she said. “It would take a giant in order to stop him. Please. I’m willing to trade my humanity in to get my husband to stop his destructive behavior.” The skull let out a sigh. “Another customer who wants to punish the wicked,” he said. “But this doesn’t sound like revenge. Are you see that you’re willing to go through with it?”

Brooke just got on her hands and knees. “Please,” she said. “I’ve seen the destruction of nature’s resources and I want to fight back.” The skull then turned to his zombie assistant. “Achilles,” he said. “Get the tub of enchanted Loch Ness water.” The zombie nodded his head and then walked off. When he returned, he brought with him what looked like a large washtub filled with a glowing greenish-blue water as Brooke looked at the water. “Climb in,” said the skull. “Take a bath in this mystical water and then in 12 hours, you will become the monster you wish. Achilles, take me into the next room. We don’t want to be rude.” As the zombie picked up the skull to walk away, Brooke gave a glare and then she started to soak into the water as its magical essence filled her body. A great transformation was about to begin.
11223112222222222222222222222222.title: Loch, Stock and Barrel

112231122222222222222222222222221.content:
Brooke sat in the washtub and appeared to be growing impatient as she submerged herself. “Mr. Skull,” she said. “I don’t mean to sound impatient, but aren’t I supposed to be growing super huge now.” “Patience,” said the skull in the next room. Transformations take time to work. It’s rare that we come across somebody who wants to transform. We’ve been traveling around and this has happened a lot. This is precisely why this shop never stays too long in one place. Everywhere we go, we find fools who seek the cursed treasure of this shop. I remember one young man who took a ring from this store to give to his fiancée and turned her into the world’s largest and most powerful pegasus. I also remember in Greece, how a selfish man tried to steal a young woman’s heart by turning her into a giant swan by buying a curse. There is also a story I can tell you about a man who bought his wife a pair of alligator shoes from this store and turned her into an actual alligator. So many people cursed and transformed without being able to return to their human forms. Yet you want to become a titan. Is your husband so vile that you would resort to drastic means?”

Brooke nodded her head and then took off her sunglasses to reveal her black eye again. “He gave me this black eye for arguing with him. He claims to be a great fisherman but is completely wasteful and abusive. I feel sorry for the fishes he catches. Holt doesn’t even eat fish.” The skull let out a growl. “It is amazing that humans are better at being monsters than actual monsters. Do with him as you wish, but know this, you have little to no hope of ever becoming a human again after you bath in these cursed waters. “I don’t care,” said Brooke. “It’s clear that I’ve married somebody who does nothing but make everyone around him miserable.” “Then why on Earth did you marry such an obvious louse.” Brooke gave a look of sorrow. “My father was gravely injured in an accident and we didn’t have a car at the time. I had no choice but to rely on a stranger for a ride. There I found Holt. He would get us to the hospital but I had to agree to..” “I see where this is going,” said the skull. “To do something so awful, to drive his own wife to these extremes. I take back what I said. Your husband deserves the monster that you are about to unleash upon him.”

Speak of the devil, Holt was yelling outside. “Brooke!” he yelled. “Where are you, you wandering bitch!? How many times do I have to tell you to stay where I can see you?!” Brooke gasped and got out of the tub before she put back on her shirt, skirt and lifejacket, not even waiting until she was dry and then ran out of the shop. Achilles took the skull back out into the shop’s main room. “Pay close attention, Achilles. Karma can be a very powerful and dangerous thing.” The skull’s zombie assistant nodded his head.

Brooke ran out and was panting as Holt glared at her. “Where were you woman?!” “I’m sorry, Holt. I was just...” Holt then realized that Brooke was wet. “Why the hell are you so wet?” asked Holt. “Well,” said Brooke. “You see...” Holt let out a laugh. “I know what happened. You fell in. You’re such a child, Brooke. Now come on. I’ve got some bait to get." Brooke gave a look of confusion. "Bait?" she asked. "You didn't get any at the bait shop." Holt smirked evilly. "I have a much better idea. One that's guaranteed to catch a fish.” Brooke then gasped and as she was following Holt, she saw that her butt appeared to have gotten slightly bigger and her breasts looked like they were sticking out of her lifejacket. “Good,” she said. “It’s working. Just have to wait until tonight.”

Of course, Holt was still up to no good. After a few hours, Holt had met with a man who handed him a suitcase. “There you are,” said the dealer. “I gotta say, the idea of using it as fish bait, it sort of reminds me of King of the Hill.” Holt let out a scoff. “The difference is, I know what it is.” Brooke looked in horror because that case contained drugs. “Holt,” she said. “You can’t fish with that stuff. It’s dangerous to humans and poisonous to animals.” But then Brooke yelled because Holt struck her. “Know your place, Brooke,” said Holt. “I do what I do.” Brooke rubbed her face in pain as she and Holt were walking away and then Holt noticed how big Brooke's butt was on her skirt and smirked as he struck it and made Brooke scream. "Got a lot more junk in the trunk than you usually do, don't you honey?" Brooke was mumbling in pain. She growled. "You can laugh all you want now, you horrible man. Because in a few more hours, I'm going to give you just what you deserve."

Brooke was about to get in the driver's seat and Holt threw her into the passenger seat as she grunted. "What are you doing?" asked Holt. "It's illegal for women to drive. It's three hours from here back home and I ain't getting a ticket." "It is so NOT illegal for women to drive, Holt," said Brooke angrily. "I'm getting really sick of..." Holt gave an angry glare. "You want another shiner? Just keep quiet and know your place." On the drive home, Brooke's anger with Holt was growing and Brooke rubbed her stomach because it was getting bigger. "That spell must be working," thought the young woman to herself. "And soon Holt will..." Brooke gasped because Holt was going too fast. "Holt!" yelled Brooke. "This is a school zone!" Brooke then screamed because she saw several young students about to pass a crosswalk only to gasp and run back to avoid being run over by Holt. "Keep off of the road, brats!" yelled Holt. Brooke was quickly losing her patience with her jerk of a husband and she couldn't wait any longer for the mystic waters to take their effect as her eyes were glowing.

Soon, back home, Brooke was on the phone with her father. "You don't have to worry about me anymore, Daddy. I'm finally going to divorce Holt.
