He's kept me like a prisoner and I've watched him commit atrocity after atrocity for far too long. What's he gonna do to me. I know he'd probably kill me before he agrees to a divorce but I'm not changing my mind." With that, Brooke hung up because she heard Holt coming. Brooke looked and saw that she had gotten slightly taller but she was also much fatter, she looked like she weighed 600lbs. "Okay," said Brooke. "It's going to be murder on my figure, but it will be worth it to get away from..." "Where's my dinner!?" Holt came in and then saw Brooke. "What the hell, Brooke! What happened to you? You look like you swallowed a hippopotamus."

Brooke looked at her watch and smirked because it was almost past the 12 hours. She would soon be able to break away from her husband's tyranny. "Well," said Holt. "If you can get yourself monstrously fat, you can make yourself useful and get in the kitchen." "Get your own dinner, bully." Holt gave a glare. "What was that?" "You heard me. You're a bully and a fake fisherman and you're an misogynistic idiot. You see me as nothing more than a trophy. But no more, I want out of this farce you dare to call a marriage." Holt was now very enraged. "Know your place, Brooke. You are still my wife. It's time I reminded you of that."

When it looked like Holt would beat Brooke, Brooke’s eyes glowed and she saw that her black hair turned dark green and that her skin was changing to a bright green color while her underbelly turned white with purple highlights and her stomach begun to expand. Brooke looked at her hands to see that they had sprouted webs. “What’s going on?!” asked Holt accusingly. Brooke just gave a very evil looking smirk as she wiggled her webbed fingers. “Your bad karma.” Brooke shook off her sandals to reveal that her toes were webbed as well as her thighs were expanding and she sprouted a rather long tail. Brooke’s face then stretched into a snout and her teeth became razor sharp as she let out a dinosaur-like growl and her neck was stretching out as she let out a laugh. Holt became really afraid and took out a gun to try and shoot Brooke but Brooke snatched the gun with her teeth and crushed it as she growled and her clothes tore apart as she got bigger. In minutes, Brooke was a Loch Ness Monster and a big fat one. She was 18ft tall (28ft if you counted her neck), had a 26ft wide stomach and ass and huge E-cup breasts. She let out a roar and Holt screamed. Brooke stared down and growled. “I’ve put up with your abuse of me and of the fish for long enough, you bastard! You blackmailed me into marrying you and you’ve been making my life a misery ever since." "N-Now calm down, Brooke," said a clearly terrified Holt. "Please. I can change, Baby. Just spare me."

As Brooke stared down at her husband, she was pondering what to do. He was begging for mercy. Brooke let out a scoff at the irony of a merciless and sadistic fish killer fearing for his own life and wanting mercy despite the fact that he himself would never consider showing mercy. If anything, he deserved to be eaten for his crimes. But Brooke was beginning to wonder. While the Loch Ness Monster has been around for thousands of years, there was no mention of whether or not she ate humans. Then again, Brook felt her new Loch Ness Monster teeth and realized that they were clearly the teeth of a carnivore. But the diet of the creature she had morphed into wasn’t the only factor. Would it really be okay if Brooke ate the man who abused her and harmed nature for so long. Would it make her as bad as him? While Brooke was busy thinking the matter over, Holt tried to inch towards the door as the Loch Ness giantess was distracted. However, Brooke wrapped her tail around Holt and then glared at him as she was preparing to make her decision.

In the end, the Loch Ness Monster woman decides to...
112231122222222222222222222222221.title: Bad Karma

1122311222222222222222222222222212.content:
Holt looked up in pure fear as Brooke was trying to decide what to do with him. Then he remembered that he had a knife and gave a smirk. He took out the knife and was going to try and slash his wife’s tail. However, Brooke lowered her neck and destroyed the tip of the blade with her sharp teeth. Holt let out a scream. “So,” says Brooke. “You’d really stab your own wife. You’ll never change, Holt. You’ll always be a heartless monster who needlessly preys on the weak. You’re worse than an animal because you do it for fun. But now you’re on the bottom of the food chain. You’re about to get what you deserve. And it’s going to be delicious.” Brooke opened her mouth filled with deceptively sharp teeth that people would not expect the Loch Ness Monster to have and Holt looked in pure fear at what his wife had planned for him. “Don’t do this, Brooke! This is cannibalism! I’m a human being!” “Funny,” said Brooke sadistically. “Then why didn’t you ever act like one.”

Brooke let out a growl and lowered her head as Holt let out a final scream at her mouth opened wide. Brooke grabbed her husband head first with her jaws before lifting him up into the air for him to slide screaming down her throat. Because of how fat Brooke’s neck was, there was barely even a bulge to signify Holt’s trip down his wife’s 10ft long esophagus. Once Brooke had successfully swallowed her husband, the Loch Ness Monster woman let out a loud belch. “Figures you’d give me gas, Holt,” said Brooke as she punched her own 26ft wide stomach. “You made me miserable throughout our marriage so now you’ll make it up by becoming assimilated into my body. Oh, I love karma.” Brooke let out a laugh. “It was a good thing I found that magic shop.”

Suddenly something occurred to Brooke. “Oh my,” she said. “The skull! He said this transformation would be permanent. Huh, I guess I didn’t think this through.” Brooke then let out another loud belch and held her stomach before letting out a slight fart that knocked over the table. “Ugh,” she said. “Should’ve known the bastard would give me an upset stomach. But I can’t think about him anymore. He’s over and done.” Brooke’s stomach grumbled as the Loch Ness giantess tried to squeeze herself through the doorway. In the process she tore it off the hinges. Brooke let out a groan but then heard the phone ringing and stretched out her tail to pick it up.

“Hello,” she said nervously. “Oh. Hi, Daddy. Well, I didn’t exactly go as planned with the divorce. I kind of swallowed him. No, you heard that right. I found a magic shop and willingly allowed myself to be turned into the Loch Ness Monster to... wait, you believe that? Wait, when did you see somebody turn into the Jersey Devil? Okay, not the time. Listen, what do I...? I got it, I need to return to the lake to get used to this new body. Hey, what’s that about me saving you the trouble. Never mind. Thanks. I’ll talk to you later.” Brooke hung up and then started to walk away.

“Daddy’s never steered me wrong before,” she said to herself. “Maybe I wouldn’t have had resorted to such drastic measures if I had listened to him about marrying a creep.” Brooke was sweating as she waddled and panted. She moved rather clumsily, accidentally stepping on a few bikes in the process as she was making her way towards the lake. “Ouch. You know, maybe I should’ve tried to turn myself into a creature more suited to land and water. Live and learn, Brooke.” As Brooke was walking she was getting bigger and at this point, her body was 30ft high, her stomach expanded to 45ft wide, her ass expanded to 40ft wide and her neck elongated to 30ft long. She was breathing heavily and paused to take a slight rest, albeit accidentally stepping on a car and setting off the alarm in the process. Panicked, the Loch Ness giantess ran clumsily away before anyone could see her. “I definitely need to get the better hang of being on land in this new body.”

Fortunately, Brooke had managed to reach the lake and breathed out a sigh of relief as her enormous body touched the water. She took a deep breath and swam underneath the lake as she waved her tail and enormous neck back and forth. “Now,” she said. “This feels more natural. I better lay low here for a while. I don’t want any unwanted attention.” Brooke then poked her head out of the water and saw the shop in the distance but then it mysteriously disappeared and she looked in surprise. “Well,” she said as she rolled her eyes. “I guess that’s perfectly normal. After all, it’s a magic shop. I can’t expect it to stay in one place. Maybe they’ll be helping another girl with her problems.” Brooke then took a deep breathe before diving down into the water again.

Of course, while she got rid of one problem, the Loch Ness Monster giantess’s newfound size and weight would attract other problems. At that moment....
1122311222222222222222222222222212.title: Bottoms Up

112231122222222222222222222222222.content:
“Katherine,” said Garth. “You’re taking things too far.” However, Garth’s wife, Katherine was not listening to him. She was busy lifting weights. Given how big her body was, she didn’t really need it. But she was that obsessed. She even slammed her hand into the table to shatter it. “I’m not changing my mind, Garth,” she said. “I’m going to make it so in case that creep ever comes back, I’ll rip him apart.”  Garth rolled his eyes as he sat down. Last week, Katherine was mugged and her grandmother’s necklace was stolen from her. Garth was busy picking up their son from school and was unable to prevent what happened and was horrified that Katherine would be attacked in broad daylight. While the police assured Katherine that her identification of the crook would allow them to catch him in no time, Katherine was so paranoid that she decided to take action into her own hands. She bought a lot of gym equipment and currently she bulked herself up to She-Hulk size. However, that wasn’t enough.

“Kath,” said Garth. “All of this is going to wake up Milo and he has that spelling test to worry about tomorrow. He needs his sleep.” Katherine let out a sigh. “I’ll try not to wake up Milo, but what if I was attacked and he was with me. I need to be ready in case of another mugging. Just check out these guns.” Katherine held out her muscles. “Those look pretty good.” “Not good enough,” said Katherine. “I need to be twice as big as I am now.” With that, Katherine went to work out on the treadmill.

Garth was wondering what to do when he looked out the window and saw a homeless man in green rags and a metal face mask feeding pigeons and figured that with the stress Katherine was going through making her unapproachable, Garth needed somebody to talk to and then went out to meet with the rather strange man. “I’ll bet you don’t have to worry about muggers, sir,” said Garth. “You don’t have anything worth stealing.” The man in green then grunted slightly before he woke up. “Got a moment?” asked Garth as he held up a bottle of wine.” The man in green raised an eyebrow. “What do you seek from Erlking?” Garth let out a sigh. “I just need somebody to talk to. It’s my wife, Catherine.” “Hoo boy,” groaned Erlking. “Marital trouble?” “You might say that. My wife was mugged last week and is obsessed with making sure it doesn’t happen again.” “This is Chicago.” Said Erlking. Garth let out a groan. “She’s obsessed with becoming invincible and is working herself into a frenzy trying to make her body stronger.” Erlking took out a pair of binoculars and saw the bodybuilder that was Katherine working on a treadmill and his jaw dropped. “Holy cow,” he said. “She looks like she could give Hercules a run for his money.”

Garth shook his head. “But it’s still not enough. She’s gonna work until her body breaks. I wish that she was the strongest wrestler there was so she could forget about this nonsense.” This gave Erlking an idea. “Did I hear the word “wish”? That’s my specialty.” Garth raised an eyebrow. “What are you talking about?” Erlking gave a smile. “Well, I don’t look it, but I’m a wish granter. I don’t want anything in return but to grant your wish.” Garth was even more confused. “You’re telling me that you can make Katherine as strong as she’ll ever need to be? Is that true?” Erlking smiled. “What do you want to believe?” Garth didn’t know what to say, but the way he saw it, he didn’t have much to lose. “Okay, Erlking. Release the magic.” Suddenly wind filled the air as Erlking was getting ready to cast a spell.

“I say, 1, 2, spell me do,” chanted Erlking. “Let this young man’s wish come true. Here me high, hear me well, let me be this spell.” As Erlking worked his magic, a spell enveloped Katherine just as she was busy lifting a couple of weights and there was suddenly the roar of a lion ringing in her ears as she grunted. However, she just shrugged it off and then she went back to lifting weights, not noticing her hair was turning a brighter shade of gold and she sprouted what looked like a lion’s tail. At one point, Katherine accidentally dropped a dumbbell on her bare foot and to her surprise, the dumbbell bounced harmlessly off her skin. “What the hell?” asked the female bodybuilder, not noticing that her belly seemed to be getting larger as it glowed bright.

Meanwhile, Erlking gave a smile as he spoke with Garth. “Garth,” he said. “Have you heard of the Nemean lion?” “Uh,” said Garth. “No. Why do you ask?” Erlking let out a laugh and then faded away as Garth gave a look of confusion. “I hope I didn’t do anything I’m going to regret later.”
112231122222222222222222222222222.title: Won't Take This Lion Down

choices: For a Jog Around the City
1122311222222222222222222222222221.content:
The next day, early in the morning, Katherine made a startling discovery as she looked at herself in her mirror in her yellow leotard, her leg warmers and martial arts headband. “Garth!” she shouted. “What’s wrong with this mirror!?” “There’s nothing wrong with the mirror, Dear.” Said Garth. “Then how come I need three of them to see myself.” Garth gave a look of confusion and then turned and looked in surprise at his wife. All of Katherine’s muscles had been replaced with a massive hunk of fat. She even had a triple chin. She also looked like she was taller than she was yesterday. Katherine gave an angry look as she turned around and slapped her chunky butt. “How did you gain so much weight so fast?” asked Garth. “You were like the Incredible Hulk last night! Come to think about it, I didn’t see you eat anything since dinner last night and all you had to eat was a salad.” Katherine grit her teeth. “How the heck am I supposed to scare a mugger looking like this.” “Look at the bright side,” said Garth as he clutched part of his wife’s enormous belly. "A gut that size must be bullet proof. Besides, it's not like your granny's necklace could fit on you if you got it back. Look at that thick neck."

Katherine gave a glare at her husband. "Look," said Garth. "I have to go to work early this morning. You can work off that flab taking Milo to school." Katherine grunted as her husband kissed her goodbye and left. On his way to work, Garth was wondering how his wife became so huge and then he realized something. "Oh my," he said. "That wish. I wonder." Back home, Katherine walked on the treadmill and turned it on as her stomach pressed against the controls. She ran frantically on the treadmill and set it to full power. But no matter how much Katherine ran and sweated, she didn't lose any of the weight she gained. By the time she was done, she stepped on the bathroom scale and it read that she weighed 1/2 a ton right before it broke beneath her weight. "Are you kidding me?" asked Katherine. "How did I gain this much weight?" "Mom?" asked a voice. Katherine walked out and saw her son Milo climbing down the stairs to go to school. He looked in surprise at his mom's weight gain but said nothing.

Katherine escorted Milo out the door, albeit breaking the door frame in the process and was soon walking Milo to school. Milo then noticed something strange. "Mom," he said. "How long have you had a tail?" Katherine looked in confusion, not noticing the lion's tail she sprouted. "What tail? Milo, don't give me a hard time today. This massive weight gain is too much. I still can't believe that..." Suddenly, Katherine had to stop as somebody held a knife dangerously close to her neck. Katherine and Milo had walked right up to another mugger. "Nice earrings, Garfield," said the hoodlum mocking Katherine's weight. "I'll be taking them." Katherine turned her head to face Milo. "Stay back, Milo," she told her son before she turned to face the mugger again. "Listen, buster. One of your jackasses already stole my grandmother's necklace. I've been working hard to prepare myself for punks like you, so if you don't get out of my way, you're toast." The mugger let out a laugh. "It looks like you've had enough toast already, land whale." Katherine grit her teeth. "Don't say that I didn't...!"

Suddenly, Katherine’s voice turned into a growl that evolved into a loud roar. “What the?!” yelled the mugger. “Mom?” asked Milo. Katherine’s teeth became rather sharp as her pink fingernails turned into sharp claws. She also increased in weight again to the point where her leg warmings were being torn apart and her leotard was stretching out, letting her breasts free. That was when bright platinum fur grew all over her body as her fold hair begun to reach down to her butt that was now bigger than it was before. Katherine’s ears became more feline in appearance as she started to grow larger and larger. Milo quickly moved out of the way as his mother stepped back and crushed a car under her massive foot. Finally, Katherine’s eyes became bloodshot and feline like in appearance as her chin and underbelly turned white and she sprouted whiskers.

The mugger looked up and muttered in fear as he looked up. The woman he had tried to mug had transmogrified into a 60ft tall Nemean lioness. Her butt and belly were both 80ft wide and her breasts had expanded to H-cup size. The lioness let out a loud roar into the air once the transformation was complete. She then looked around her new form. She was now an lioness as big as Godzilla and as fat as 5 sumo wrestlers in a tattered yellow leotard and a martial arts headband. “M-Mom,” said Milo nervously. “Are you alright?” Katherine looked at her reflection in an office building, ignoring the horrified workers inside and then gave a satisfied smirk. She let out a purring laugh right before she looked down on the terrified mugger. The mugger tried to stab Katherine in the toe but the knife broke against Katherine’s indestructible skin.

 This only made the rather large lioness purr even more. “I don’t know what happened,” said Katherine in a much deeper voice. “But I LOVE the results.” Katherine then grabbed the mugger and squeezed him tight before she brought him to her face and smirked. The mugger was scared to death as he was sure that the lion giantess’s plans weren’t good. Even Milo was scared at his mother’s sinister expression. “Mom,” says Milo. “You’re not going to eat him are you?” Katherine let out a laugh. “Come on, Milo,” said the lioness to her son as she put him on her shoulder. “What do I look like? An animal? I’m just going to take this punk downtown.” With that, the gigantic cat woman stomped down the street as everybody looked in surprise and horror at the enormous feline.

Katherine arrived outside of the police station and dropped off the mugger as the cops looked in surprise. Katherine gave a purr. “This little creep tried to mug me as I was bringing my son to school,” said the giant lioness. “Could you do me a favor and put him away for me. Thanks.” The lion giantess waddled away down the street as the police looked on in surprise. In the process, she accidentally bumped her butt against a condemned building and made it collapse. It wasn’t long before Katherine dropped her son off at school and everyone in the area stared at the lioness giantess. One of the teachers even cleaned his glasses while another one threw out a cup of coffee she was drinking. “Hey,” said Katherine to Milo. “Good luck on the test. I’ll see you later.” “Bye, Mom.” Said Milo nervously as the gigantic lioness stomped away. The principal saw Katherine walking away and gave an angry look. “I don’t know what’s going on,” he said. “But I bet a certain red-haired scientist had something to do with it.”

Katherine looked at her reflection in another office building and let out a sigh. She noticed that she looked even fatter than she was earlier. “Damn,” said the lioness. “I’m a blimp. There’s no way I could shake off this much meat. Oh well. Just because I can’t lose this weight doesn’t mean that I gotta be slothful. I better make sure I can get used to carrying this much weight." With that, the skyscraper-sized lion decided to go...
1122311222222222222222222222222221.title: Queen of Beasts

choices: Spotted the Thief Who Stole Her Necklace
11223112222222222222222222222222211.content:
Katherine decided to take a jog around the city and immediately took off as much as her car-crushing fat feet could take her. The obese feline smiled as she ran down the street, being careful not to step on anybody. But everywhere she went, everyone stared at the fat Godzilla-sized lioness in leg warmers. The sun shined on Katherine's platinum fur as she stopped at a "Don't Walk" sign. Down below the people waiting at the stop looked in surprise and moved out of the way as Katherine was jogging in place, waiting for the light to change. "Wait a minute," said the feline. "What am I doing?"

Katherine simply stepped over to the other side of the street, knowing that she was too big to have to wait for the light to change. She giggled to herself right as the light changed. As the lioness jogged, she looked into the side of a skyscraper and saw how big her belly and butt were. She at first was distressed but felt her arms and legs to discover there was still muscle buried under tons of flab and then jogged around the skyscraper, accidentally crushing several streetlights in the process.

Suddenly, Katherine realized something. "Hmm," she said. "The building Garth works at is nearby. Maybe I should have some fun with that little husband of mine." The lioness knew that her husband was a reporter for the Daily Papyrus and realized that he was going to find out about her transformation sooner or later, so she decided to go for sooner." At that moment, Garth had been called into his boss's office. "You wanted to see me, Sir?" asked Garth. The editor snuffed out his cigar before he spoke with Garth. "Reed," he said. "I just got several calls from people who claim to have seen a lion jogging down the street." "Impossible. There isn't a zoo for miles." "This isn't an ordinary lion, Reed. The lion was jogging down the street. And that's not all. Eyewitness accounts say that this lion is 60ft tall and built like a sumo wrestler."

Garth lets out a laugh. "You're kidding, Chief. A lion that big? That's not possible." "I'm only telling you what I was told. A giant lion in leg warmers was jogging down the street. She stepped on several street lamps." "She? Okay, Boss. Let's say that this giant lion is real. How do they know it's a girl?" Garth's boss slapped himself in the face. "You honestly can't tell the difference between a male and female lion?! It probably didn't have mane. This is news. I'm asking you to find out more about this mysterious feline." But Garth was uninterested. "I'm not going on a wild goose chase. What makes you so sure this lion exists." Garth's boss dropped his jaw and pointed to the window behind Garth.

Garth turned around and looked in disbelief as he saw Katherine staring in at him. At first he didn't know the 60ft lioness was his wife and stepped back in fear before Katherine smiled. "Hey, Garth." Garth dropped his jaw as he recognized his wife's voice. "Katherine!? Is that you?" Katherine gave a purr. "I'll see you at dinner, Honey." Katherine then extended her football field sized tongue into the window to lick her husband as he screamed and then walked away. Garth could not believe it. "My wife is a Nemean lion," he muttered. "My wife is a Nemean lion." Garth's boss was just as surprised. "This is the first I've heard of this, Reed. Why didn't you tell me you married a giant lion!?" "Because she wasn't a giant lion when I married her!" Garth then gasped. "Oh my gosh. Yesterday, I wished to a strange old hobo in green rags that Katherine would be as strong as she needed to be and this must be the result." Garth's boss couldn't believe it. "A wish granter? Now that's a story I'd pay a million bucks to read. I'm going to need you to keep an eye on that feline wife of yours."

Katherine at this point kept walking and from the looks of it, she was getting bigger and fatter as she walked by and it was at that point the giant lioness...
11223112222222222222222222222222211.title: Giant Jogging Sumo Lion

1122311222222222222222222222222222.content:
“There isn’t going to be a closed mouth in the audience tonight, Deborah,” said Bruce to his wife. “You’re going to knock them all dead.” Deborah walked out in her magician outfit and waved her wand in order to fix her nylons before she smiled and spoke to Bruce. “You expect anything less from Deborah Dazzle, Bruce Honey?” asked the magician girl. “I’ve arranged some new tricks that I can’t wait to test out.” Deborah then cast another spell that turned the lights on to get a good look at herself in the mirror.

Bruce could only stare at his wife. She’s been a magician ever since he met her, but sometimes he wondered how much of it was stage magic or if she was a real sorceress. He remembered that on their honeymoon, he took him for a walk in the air, without the plane. Suddenly, Deborah realized something. “Oh dang,” she said. “Bruce. I almost forgot. I can’t go on stage without my hat and it’s being repaired.” “What? You go on in half an hour and you forget about it now?” “Don’t judge me,” said Deborah. “Bruce, could you be a dear and pick up my hat.” Bruce shrugged his shoulders. “Sure thing, Deborah. I’ll go get it.” “Love you.”

However, down the street from the haberdasher at the exact moment was something that definitely wasn’t something to take at all lightly. Down the street, there was a strange curio shop with a minotaur skull in the center and from the looks of it, a zombie dressed up as a Greek soldier was sweeping up while there was an open window with wind blowing in. “Achilles,” said the skull. “Would you please shut that window. That wind is driving me crazy.” The zombie heeded the bidding of the skull but it was too late because the wind picked up a top hat that looked similar to Deborah’s own hat and blew it out the window. It was flying towards the haberdasher shop where the haberdasher put Deborah’s real hat on the table. The moment his back was turned, the wind took the other hat and blew it onto the table where it knocked Deborah’s real hat onto the floor, not that the shopkeeper noticed it.

At that moment, Bruce came in. “Hello,” he said. “Anybody here.” “Oh,” said the shopkeeper. “Bruce. I trust you’ve come to pick up Deborah’s hat.” “That’s right.” Bruce paid for what he thought was Deborah’s hat and took it to get his magician wife ready for the show. However, what he didn’t know was that the hat he bought was in fact a real magic hat and it was going to make quite a show that even the great Deborah Dazzle couldn’t dream of putting on.

- - - - - - - - - -

Soon, the show was about to begin and Bruce had brought Deborah that hat. “Hmm,” she said. “It feels differently than I remember. I wonder what they used to patch it up.” “I wouldn’t worry about it, Deb,” said Bruce. “The crowd is waiting, the stage is light.” Deborah kissed Bruce before taking out her wand. “Wish me luck, Baby.” She said. However, as Deborah was looking away, she failed to notice magical energy radiating from her hat. Bruce noticed this and gasped. “Uh, Deborah?” Deborah turned her head. “What is it, Bruce?” “Uh, nothing.” Bruce noticed that Deborah’s thighs looked thicker than usual.

Soon, jazz music was playing and Deborah appeared on the stage in a burst of smoke as the crowd cheered. “Ladies and Gentlemen,” said the female magician as she smiled. “Boys and Girls. Let me take you on a trip to wicked wonderland.” Deborah held up her hat and summoned several doves and crows from it as the audience cheered. Then, Deborah cast another spell and conjured up a dragon made of smoke and made it roar loudly. The crowd cheered at that but Bruce noticed something. Deborah had done several realistic magic tricks before but these looked too realistic. Deborah’s next trick caused her hand to fall off and appear in her hat as she held it out. The dismembered hand even snapped its fingers to make a deck of cards appear in the air. The hand tossed the queen of hearts up into the air to make orchids fly into the air and even land in one girl’s hand in the audience.

Deborah herself was noticing something off. “That’s odd,” she thought to herself. “I could’ve sworn I used way less orchids than that.” Then Deborah gave a cough. “And now,” she said. “For my next trick...” Deborah conjured up a snake from her hat that danced as Deborah turned her wand into a recorder before the snake completely turned invisible, all except for its eyes and the patterns on its body as it wrapped around the magician master and then vanished up her sleeve before confetti flew out of the other sleeve. Deborah then started to wiggle her nose as the crowd continued to cheer and clap. “Alright,” said Deborah. “My next trick calls for something that’s out of this world. What happens next will be totally unexpected.” The audience looked in anticipation at that claim.

But before Deborah could go on with the act, strange magical energy exited out of her hat and enveloped in smoke as she gave a look of surprise. However, the crowd gasped in awe because they thought that it was part of the act. “Deborah?” asked Preston. The smoke enveloped Deborah as her nose begun to wiggle. Deborah realized that her nose had turned pink and bright white fur was growing all over her body. She then grabbed her cheeks to find they were expanding and she felt creaking because she appeared to be getting bigger and heavily. Her feet slipped out of her stilettos to reveal that they had turned into paws and then Deborah saw her butt expanding as a round and fluffy tail the size of a medicine ball sprouted above her fleshy white-furred nylon-covered massive butt cheeks. Deborah then felt her ears stretching out and gasped to see that she sprouted buckteeth. Then she saw that silver antlers had sprouted on her forehead.

Dumbfounded, the female magician put her hat back on and then the smoke cleared as the audience looked in surprise at what had become of the magician that was entertaining them. Bruce looked at his wife himself and gasped because Deborah had transformed into a 45ft high jackalope with a 50ft wide belly and 60ft wide butt. She looked back in surprise herself. “How exactly did she do that?” asked Bruce. Deborah looked in fear but then she heard cheering and looked to see that her audience liked the transformation and mistook it for part of the act, prompting the mutated magician to smile rather nervously.
1122311222222222222222222222222222.title: How to Pull a Jackalope Out of Your Hat

11223112222222222222222222222222221.content:
Deborah gave a nervous smile and let out a laugh. "Ta-da! What's a wonderland without the white rabbit! And now, for the big finale." Deborah gave a smile and took off her hat before looking into it. "This isn't my hat," thought the rabbit giantess to herself. "This is a cursed magic hat. But where did it come from? Oh well." Deborah then reached into her hat as Bruce looked in confusion from backstage. "What is Deborah doing?" he asked. "I never saw that trick b..." Before Bruce could finish his sentence, he was yanked up. On the stage, Deborah pulled Bruce by the shirt out of the hat as he gasped and the audience looked in awe. Deborah smiled as she held her husband in the air. "It's a new twist on an old trick." The audience cheered loudly as Deborah smiled and wiggled her nose. "Thank you. I'll be here all night." Deborah then snapped her fingers and she and her husband vanished backstage as the crowd was clapping.

Backstage, Deborah laid Bruce on her nose and stared at him. "That was amazing, Deborah," said Bruce. "Why didn't you tell me that you were going to turn yourself into a giant jackalope? Okay, Deborah, you can change back now." Deborah stared at her husband and frowned. "No, Bruce. I can't." "You can't? What do you mean you can't?" Deborah held up her hat and gave a glare. "This hat you brought back from the haberdasher wasn't my magician hat. It was some kind of cursed magic hat that turned me into a big fat bunny." Bruce's jaw dropped as he slipped and fell into the rabbit's enormously bloated cleavage. "You're kidding me?"

Deborah crossed her arms. "Bruce," she said. "I'm a sorceress. I know a curse when I see one and I don't think that this curse is reversible. Which means from now on, you're sleeping in my panties." Bruce let out a groan but then he realized something. "Wait, Deborah. This might not be such a bad thing. The crowd loved it when you turned into a jackalope." Deborah realized her husband had a point, the crowd did love the sight of a giant bunny on the stage, especially the children. The rabbit giantess held up the cursed hat and cast a spell to make popcorn explode out of the hat. Each piece of popcorn was as big as a wrecking ball. Deborah took a handful and shoveled it in. "You know, Bruce," said the obese rabbit giantess. "You might be onto something." Deborah handed her husband a piece of the popcorn and he nearly was crushed by it before he maintained his footing. "I can see it now," said Bruce. "Deborah Dazzle, the world's biggest magician." Deborah let out a laugh but then grunted in pain. Her nylons were now very tight on her enormous butt cheeks. "I think I need bigger stockings."

Bruce had to plug his nose to prevent it from bleeding as he saw his wife's enormous butt murdering the floor beneath her hulk and then Deborah lifted Bruce in the air again. "We're going to need to rethink our act, but first thing is first." Deborah placed Bruce on her shoulder before she started to walk away. The rabbit giantess walked down the street as everyone looked up at her. "There she is." "Deborah Dazzle?" "Now that's a magic trick." "Loved your show, Ms. Dazzle." Deborah smiled nervously and waved. "Say, Mrs. Dazzle," said a young girl. "Why don't you turn back now. The show is over." Deborah laughed nervously. "As embarrassing as it is, Little Girl," said Deborah. "I don't know the spell to turn back. Magic can be very fickle." Deborah tipped the hat and then she noticed the strange magic shop with the skull. "Aha," she said. "That must be where this naughty hat came from."

Deborah then lifted up the shop, causing the minotaur skull to fall to the floor and grunt. "What the? Achilles! What is going on!?" The skull say Deborah's car-sized eye in the wild and gasped. Deborah took off the cursed hat and made it shrink back to normal size before tossing it into the store where it landed on one of the skull's horns. "I believe this is yours." Deborah then placed the store on top of a skyscraper and gave a laugh before walking away to get her real hat. The skull let out a groan. "That's the first time one of the giantesses created by our merchandise actually retaliated. Achilles, let's get out of here before we get into any more trouble."

Deborah and Bruce arrived at the haberdasher's shop and the shopkeeper nervously stepped outside with Deborah's hat. "I'm really sorry, Mrs. Dazzle. It was an honest mistake. Deborah put the hat on but realized it was too small for her, so she snapped her fingers to make it the correct size for a 45ft jackalope who would weigh 2 tons if she was human sized." At that moment, Deborah heard a phone ringing and Bruce took his cellphone out. "Hello? Oh, how's you like the show. Oh, sure, we'll be there."

Bruce hung up and Deborah lifted her tiny husband up to her head as she sat her fat ass on three office buildings at the same time. "What was that about, Bruce?" asked the enormous rabbit. "That was a client," said Bruce. "And good news. The world's biggest magician is gonna make a special appearance in..."
11223112222222222222222222222222221.title: World's Widest Wabbit

11223112222222222222222222222222222.content:
(Note: I hope that this doesn't count as Necrophilia. I made the character a cyborg Frankenstein in order to avoid breaking that rule)

The Internet is a dangerous place (lately all the fun websites have been plagued with viruses due to idiot hackers, this is coming from somebody who had to have his own computer debugged). You could be walking right into a website filled with dangerous bugs. Of course, one young woman found herself dealing with a different kind of computer virus that proved to be a real hassle. It happened in a café where a young black-haired girl with thin glasses was sitting at a table with her boyfriend and was looking at her computer.

The girl was laughing to herself. “Come on, Don, look at this. Somebody posted a video of a cat jumping around in a bounce house.” Don let out a groan. “Come on, May,” he said. “There’s different entertainment from the internet.” However, May shook her head. “I don’t think so.” May then shifted to an online chatroom and there was an image of what looked like a giant flamingo in Italy. “Giant flamingo spotted in Italy?” May then opened another file that showed an ostrich giantess doing parkour with the Eiffel tower. “Giant ostrich spotted in Paris?” May then let out a laugh because she then saw an image that depicted a giant tyrannosaurus rex with glasses on and a girlish haircut walking around a college campus. “Give me a break, May,” said Don. “Those images are clearly fake. They put a lot of weird stuff on the Internet. To say nothing about how they twist even the most harmless things. Heck, I can’t even find a website without a new TV on it being talked about.”

“Hey, Don. Check it out. I found an awesome website for female monsters.” Don shook his head. He knew he was wasting his time trying to speak with his girlfriend about her internet addiction.” Suddenly, May received a notification. “Oh, look at this, Don. I’ve got a new e-mail.” “New e-mail?” he asked. “From who?” “It doesn’t say. There’s no e-mail address.” But Don was skeptical. “No e-mail address?” he asked. “That’s impossible. How can an e-mail not have a sender address? What’s the subject?” May adjusted her glasses in order to get a good look at what was posted. “Frankenstein XY.” May then opened the e-mail and saw nothing but gobbledygook.

The email read “R2D4, 6191141219 11710226.” “What the heck is this?” asked Don. “I can’t even read it? Hold on, May, this looks like the kind of e-mails that offshore casinos send you.” “You mean a virus e-mail, Don. That’s…” Suddenly something appeared on May’s computer. “Caution, Unknown Software.” “Oh no,” said May. “A virus. I’ll show them.” May inserted a flashdrive with an anti-virus in it and smiled. “Alright, let’s drop a train on them.” However, the computer just spat out the flashdrive.

“Huh?” asked May in surprise. Don let out a gulp. “Something tells me that is not an ordinary computer virus.” “It’s okay, Don. I’m just going to take it to the repair shop.” May put the computer in her purse and walked away. “Are you sure you shouldn’t put that laptop in a case made out of lead, May?” asked Don to his girlfriend. “May! Wait!” May was at this point far away and she felt her computer letting loose strange electrical currents. “Geez,” she said. “That is one really bad tempered virus.” Then May screamed because she suddenly felt a very nasty electric shock.

May grunted and while she didn’t notice at the time, she had grown to 13ft tall and she appeared to have been getting fatter. Currently she looked like she weighed a ton. But that wasn’t the only thing wrong with her. Her skin was changing colors in different places and looked like it was patchwork and a white streak appeared in her black hair as bolts sprouted in her neck.
11223112222222222222222222222222222.title: Frankenstein Online

choices: She Was Serious, She's Gone Mad With Power
112231122222222222222222222222222221.content:
May could not even begin to think about the possibility that her body was being transmogrified. Instead, she was focused on her computer issue. She was trying to recover from the electric shock. “The sooner that I get this thing to the repair shop, the better. I’m surprised that electric shock didn’t kill me. At this point, May’s body was mysteriously sprouting mechanical stitches that separated parts of her body that looked like they were mismatched.

First her head was divided with her chin and mouth area being pure white while her much chubbier cheeks had turned bright purple and her forehead turned light blue Her neck itself had become completely mechanical with a pair of large bolts keeping it together with electrical wires coming from the back of her neck into her back. May’s breasts that were showing as they were quickly outgrowing her shirt looked as though thy were stitched to her upper chest that was as pure white as her chin. Each breast was vertically split-colored so that one side was red and the other side was yellow whereas her large stomach was bright green. Her arms were mechanical at the shoulders and were a more metallic shade of green with bolts sticking out like shoulder decorations. Her upper arms were purple white her lower arms were light blue with metal hands that had wires connecting them to her fat back that was pure white with numerous rolls. May’s enormous hips were bright green with white and yellow split colored ankles and metal knees. It was unknown about her feet as they had swelled up that her shoes were stuck to them. Finally, the girl’s butt cheeks were split colored to be green at the sides but purple in the center. May’s black hair with its new white highlights was stretched down and acted as a cape over her ass as she was quickly outgrowing her clothes. May then grunted and blinked as her eyes turned into electronic eyes. She was human once but now she was a mountain of flesh and metal.

By the time May reached the bus stop she was an 18ft tall Frankenstein’s monster woman with a 20ft wide booty and 25ft wide stomach and large E-Cup breasts. However, May had no idea how big she had gotten and didn’t notice that at the bus stop sitting at the bench was a young man who was listening to a boom box. The young man lifted his glasses and gasped at the sight of the green and purple split-colored ass of the Frankenstein giantess descending upon him and then had to move out of the way right before May sat down and smashed the bench to pieces as she yelled pain. “What the?” she asked. “Damn. What kind of cheap defective benches are they building these days.”

The Frankenstein giantess, still very unaware of her condition was pouting as she sat down on the street and passersby stared at her in surprise. “What on Earth is that?” asked one middle-aged man. “It looks like Frankenstein’s monster.” “No way, it looks like his bride.” “Look at how fat she is though.” “Well, you know how all brides let themselves go.” “Maybe it’s a prop. That’s it. I heard they were going to be shooting a monster movie here in town. The things they’re doing with antimatronics these days.” May however, was paying no heed and was still waiting for the bus. However, May soon grew tired and shut her eyes as she held her hand to her patchwork face and let out a yawn. She was going into sleep mode.

 A few hours later, Don was still at the cyber cafe but was looking at his cell phone with a puzzled expression. “That’s very strange,” he said. “May should’ve called by now. And the computer repair store is closed by now. I better go look for her.” The moment Don stepped outside, it had begun to rain and and thunderclouds were in the air. Don had to hold up an umbrella as he was on his way to find his girlfriend. “May?!” he yelled. “May?!” Don then resorted to trying to call May on her phone but he didn’t get an answer. “This isn’t a good sign,” he said. “Where could she be in this bad weather with that bad computer. Oh my gosh, what if she electrocuted herself? That computer was spitting out electric bolts. I’m coming May! Maybe I’m not too late!” Don ran down the street as the rain came down faster. “May! May! May! Where are you!?” Eventually Don bumped into something rather large and let out a loud moan. “Oh!” he yelled. “What the hell?!”

Don then looked up and screamed. He spotted May in her Frankenstein form, catatonic and asleep. However, she had gotten much bigger than before. She was exactly 60ft tall with a 95ft stomach and 80ft wide ass and huge H-Cup breasts. Don stepped back as he looked at the patchwork and partially mechanical giantess with wires sticking out of her arms and back. He then saw the computer wedged in her navel and recognized it as May’s computer right before it sparked again and exploded to bits. Don rubbed his eyes in disbelief. “May?!” he yelled. “That titan is May!? What the?! Oh no, the virus! I can’t believe it. A computer virus that can turn you into Frankenstein’s monster? May! Wake up!” However, May didn’t respond as the rain kept beating down on her titanic body. “May!” yelled Don. “Please wake up now! Please wake up!” May still didn’t respond. Don then tapped on May’s metallic knee and then tried kicking her on her large fleshy hip but nothing could wake her.

Suddenly the sky rumbled and a bolt of lightning came down and landed next to Don who let out a loud scream. The lightning then struck again and hit May. However, the lightning didn’t harm the Frankenstein monster giantess and instead, make her eyes open and glow bright. “Aha,” said Don. “So that was it. She needed to be recharged.” May let out a yawn and then stood up, her fleshy ass leaving a large dent in the sidewalk and smashing a brick wall to pieces in the process. May then popped her metal neck as she stood up high. “Oh geez,” she said. “I must’ve dozed off. I hope nobody stole my computer while I was gone. May then felt the rain coming down and looked up. “Oh damn! Don’t tell me I fell asleep in the rain. My computer’s probably ruined by now.”

May looked up again into the sky and then looked in surprise because she could see a mountain in the distance. “Huh?” Several birds flew by and May looked to see one perched on her nose. May looked at her hands to see that they were made of metal and felt around her metallic neck to find the bolts. “Oh my gosh!” she yelled. “Is this some kind of a dream! What happened?” As May was trying to figure out what happened, she almost stepped on Don who rolled out of the way and then looked up to see his girlfriend’s skirt was in tatters and revealing her purple, electrical wire print panties. He couldn’t believe it. Parts of May were multi-colored flesh while other parts were mechanical and yet she was titanically obese either way.

“May!” yelled Don. “Down here!” “Don?” asked May. “Where are you?” May bent over, giving Don a good view of her patchwork ass, momentarily hypnotizing him before May called for him again. “Don?!” Don quickly ran around his ginormously obese girlfriend’s body and appeared in front of her face as May gasped. “Don!? Is that you?” Don couldn’t believe it either. The voice coming from the giant sumo-sized Frankenstein’s monster was clearly May’s, but for what reason would a virus be able to do something like that. “Uh, yes,” said Don. “It’s me, May. But I think that you should be much more concerned about yourself at the moment. Look at you, May, you're a giant Frankenstein woman the size of a building."

May looked all over her body and felt her shirt getting smaller to the point where it had been demoted to a bra at this moment. May flickered with electricity as she tried to figure out what was going on. "Don?" asked the giantess. "What happened to my computer?" Don rolled his eyes because that stupid computer was at this moment the very least of May's concerns. "Seriously, May?" asked Don. "You're worried about that stupid computer? It blew up. You should be more concerned with that computer virus. I'd bet a mountain of steel that the virus is what transmogrified you into a skyscraper sized patchwork metal fatso. Not sure how that's possible at the moment, though."

May tried to walk around and think but grunted because her shoes were much too tight on her giant patchwork feet. The giant woman had to sit down on top of a nearby garage, flattening it in the process as she took off her shoes and pulled her fat feet out of them, revealing that her feet were pure green. May gave a sigh of relief and twitched her toes. One of her feet was close to Don and Don gagged and held his neck as he coughed because the stench of his giant patchwork girlfriend's feet was otherworldly. "Son of a gun, May! Your feet could kill a herd of elephants. "Well excuse me!" yelled the Frankenstein titaness. "It's not as if there's any place in town that sells shoes to giant Frankenstein girls fat enough to deflect meteors."

May stood up and looked at her new body as she tore her shirt slightly so it would be less tight on her patchwork breasts. "Ah," she said. "Now that's much better." Don just looked up at the giant, obese, patchwork goddess that was his girlfriend and although it was impossible at his level to see May's face past her titanic girth, he could swear that she was smiling because he heard her giggling. "You know, Don," said the giantess. "This might not be so bad. This is too cool. Like a video game, but even better. You have no idea how powerful I feel. I feel like I could conquer the world." May let out a laugh and Don was slightly concerned at that thought.

That was just a joke, wasn't it?
112231122222222222222222222222222221.title: Frankenstein 2.0

1122311222222222222222222222222222212.content:
What May just said about taking over the world made Don uneasy as he looked up at the 60ft tall morbidly obese Frankenstein woman holding up her own enormous belly. She just announced that she could conquer the world and with her turned into a gigantic patchwork girl, such a thing happening was all too possible as she was now utterly huge and powerful. Her skin was now made up of stitched mismatched flesh and steel. Of course, she was just kidding about the idea of taking over the world. Wasn’t she? Don noticed May was still laughing and laughed nervously himself, believing as best he could that his girlfriend was only joking.

However, Don then stopped laughing as May’s laughing took on a sinister tone and her smile turned into a smirk as her eyes formed into a scowl. She finished her laugh with a rather malicious looking smile from purple cheek to purple cheek plastered on her several white chins. Her eyes then begun to glow with lightning as her black and white striped hair blew in the wind. She then started to rub her big green belly with her metal hands as the patchwork flesh jiggled. “In fact,” said May as the then rubbed the bottom of her obese face. “That isn’t exactly a bad idea.” Don gave a look of fear right before May stomped across the street. “May?” asked the young man to his skyscraper-sized Frankenstein girlfriend. “Are you feeling alright?” May just let out a laugh as she lifted up her enormous patchwork foot and held it over a truck.

May then stomped down and flattened the truck under her foot as she twisted her step and gave a satisfied smile. Don gave a look of pure fear as his face turned pale white. “May!” he yelled. “Be careful! What if there were people in there!?” May then looked down on her boyfriend and gave an evil laugh. “Oh,” said May. “Oh, Donny, don’t you see.” May stepped forward and then lifted up a telephone pole and tore it right off of the wires. “I’m bigger than a mountain. I’m Frankenstein’s monster reincarnated through new technology. I’m a cyborg giantess that gets bigger, wider and stronger with every second I exist. So why should I care about the bugs with my feet. With a single stomp I can flatten a truck.” The gigantic Frankenstein woman then held up her butt over a bowling alley and then brought it down to smash the building as Don looked back in fear. “Good grief.”

“Even my butt is powerful enough to destroy buildings,” smirked May. “Don’t you get it, Don? I’m invincible! Nothing will stop me! Empress May. I love the sound of that.” The Frankenstein giantess let out a wicked laugh and then made electricity surge through her body as lightning cracked from the sky and her breast, belly and butt all jiggled violently. A bolt of lightning even hit May's hair and caused it to stand up in a 40ft high beehive style.

Don could not believe this was happening. The sweet girl he knew had transformed into a giant patchwork monstrosity and then transformed into a megalomaniacal monster with a massive superiority complex. Don knew that he had to stop May somehow and tried to run to see what he could do. “I need to get far away enough,” thought Don to himself. “Maybe the army will be able to bring May down before she can do any more damage.

Unfortunately, May saw her boyfriend running off and gave an evil smirk. She reached down and grabbed Don as he yelled. May saw the obese patchwork face of his enormous girlfriend with eyes bigger than cars and teeth big enough to crush cars as she smiled. “Going somewhere, Don? You wouldn’t be against your girlfriend’s conquest would you?” Don was sweating as May was pondering what to do with her tiny boyfriend who would threaten her megalomaniacal plans.

"What to do with you?" asked May with a malicious tone. "What to do?" May then hears her patchwork stomach rumbling and she rubs it with a metal hand and then smiles fiendishly at Don who is now afraid for his life. "You know, Don," said May. "You could've been my emperor. I wonder if that's still a possibility. Let me think."
1122311222222222222222222222222222212.title: Lady Frankenstein Conquers the World

112231122222222222222222222222222222.content:
Delilah let out a groan. The Native American woman was outside of the monkey cage at the local zoo in a jungle woman’s loincloth and bra as a monkey grabbed her by the hair. “They don’t nearly pay me enough for this.” She thought. Delilah yelled as the photographer took photographs of her. “No, no, it’s all wrong, Delilah. The zoo needs this just right for the postcards.” Delilah groaned. She really didn’t like her job as a model but did it to make ends meet. “No offense, Finn,” said Delilah. “But this is worse than the shot for Britannia’s Secret.” “Come on, Delilah,” said Finn in a very sleazy tone. “Think about Jake.” Elisa let out a groan and relented. Delilah had actually been raising her child brother after their parents were killed in an accident. This was also why she lowered herself to such a level.” Fortunately, Delilah and Jake had little to no trouble getting along.

Soon, Delilah was done with the shoot and was getting ready to drive home. “Don’t forget, Delilah,” said Finn. “Tomorrow we do another spot. It will be a surprise.” Delilah let out a groan. “I’ll bet.” “By the way,” said Finn. “What are your brother and boyfriend doing tonight.” Delilah didn’t answer and instead walked away from the scene. Delilah was not alone in raising Jake. Her boyfriend Gabe helped her out and looked after Jake while she was at work. Of course, one wonders what a model like her saw in someone who was such an obvious geek. Like Jake, Gabe was a fan of tabletop games and from his latest text, he found a new game from a strange store. Delilah pulled into the driveway and opened the front door to find her kid brother and boyfriend just opening a box for the game. “Hi, Sis,” said Jake. “Just in time.” “Oh,” said Gabe in embarrassment. “There you are. You’re home early.”

Delilah let out a sigh. “Hard night at work. I blame you for recommending that job, Gabe.” But Gabe let out a laugh. “Come on, Delilah. You’re perfect. You got the right body for the job.” Delilah gave a laugh and then kissed her boyfriend before she spotted something surprising. It was the game on the table. It depicted a ruby city setting and there were figures resembling different character classes. “What kind of game is that?” “It’s a new and really weird game that Gabe found,” said Jake. “It’s weird. All the event cards are blank until you roll the dice.” Delilah rolled her eyes.

“Come on, Delilah,” said Jake. “Join us. This game requires three players.” Delilah let out a sigh. “Sorry, Bro,” she said. “I’m not a gamer.” “Come on, Baby,” said Gabe. “Just one game. I may be his babysitter but you’re his sister. Play a game once in a while, you might like it.” Delilah thought it over and then let out a sigh before she smiled. “Okay,” she said. “You guys win. I’ll do it.” “Awesome,” said Jake. “Fighter, Mage or Thief.” Delilah scoffed. “Well I’d never be the thief.”

Delilah, Jake and Gabe sat down to play Ruby City and Delilah rolled the dice. “Alright,” she said. “First round’s on me.” “Roll the dice already, Sis.” Said Jake. Delilah rolled the dice and moved her fighter figure and then she drew a card. As she was told the card was blank. “Gabe?” she asked. “Where did you get this strange game? How do the…?” Suddenly the card flashed in light and caught Delilah by surprise. “Wow.” She said. “Don’t keep us in suspense, Delilah,” said Jake. “What’s on the card?”

As Delilah held up the card, she read it and something puzzled her. “Is it a good event, Delilah?” asked Gabe. “What happened?” The young model read the card but for some reason, it didn’t seem to make any sense to her. “The gods have taken note of your righteous and protective heart and have chosen you to be the Bahamut defender of the Ruby City. Quest Over.” “Looks like you’re out of the game, Big Sister,” said Jake with a laugh. “And on the first round too. Talk about bad luck.” However, Delilah was confused with her fortune.

“What the heck is a Bahamut?” asked Delilah. Gabe was going to answer that but he couldn’t think of the right answer. “That’s actually a very good question, Delilah,” he said. “Don’t ask me.” Gabe then took out his iPhone in order to answer his girlfriend’s question. “Bahamut, Bahamut. Ah, here it is; Bahamut, Definition 1: A giant fish in Arabian mythology said to support the world and have the head of a hippopotamus.” “Say what?” asked Delilah. “Definition 2,” said Gabe. “A platinum dragon deity.” “That sounds… slightly more flattering… but come on. A dragon.” “Delilah,” said Jake. “It’s just a game, big sister. A rather weird game.” However, what none of them noticed was that Delilah’s game card was glowing in her hand. Something was seriously up with that strange game.

- - - - - - - - - -

The next day, Delilah was preparing breakfast when she suddenly felt something strange in her stomach. She absentmindedly started to eat the pancake dough without bothering to finish cooking it first. However, she eventually stopped herself and saw that she was surprisingly low on dough and blushed in embarrassment. By the time breakfast was ready, Jake was staring at pancakes with holes in them and Delilah looked in embarrassment. “Sorry, Bro,” she said. “This modeling job must be getting to me.” Jake then noticed something that Delilah herself failed to notice. There appeared to be platinum-colored scales on Delilah’s neck. “Uh,” he said. “Delilah. What’s that on your neck?”

Delilah turned her head and noticed the scales, but simply plucked them off. “Huh?” she asked. Jake was very afraid and was sure something was wrong with his sister. Then he remembered the game from last night. “Gabe’s tabletop game? The Bahamut.” “Excuse me?” asked Delilah. “Jake. You’re not making any sense. Oh. I better get you to school.” Delilah was soon walking her brother to school but along the way, she kept scratching herself. “Something wrong, Sis?” asked Jake. Delilah then gave a snort that sounded suspiciously like a combination of a hippo’s grunt and a dragon’s growl.

“I’ll admit,” said Delilah. “My skin feels a little dry. It was hot yesterday and I was modeling in a less than heat-worthy outfit. Oh, we’re almost there. Huh, we’re early for a change.” Jake then heard a ripping sound. “What was that?” he asked. Delilah turned around and saw her butt had somehow gotten bigger. She then glared at her brother. “Not one word, Jake.” “I wasn’t going to say anything, Delilah. Honest.” Delilah let out a groan. “Oh great. That jerkhole photographer is going to have a field day with…” Delilah then gasped because her fingernails looked surprisingly sharp. “Oh no.” She said. “What next?”

Suddenly, Jake begun to realize something. “Uh, Delilah,” he said. “Do you think that maybe that board game Gabe found was actually cursed.” Delilah was trying to hold her pants together before she spoke with her kid brother. “That’s ridiculous. Who would curse a...?” Before Delilah could finish her sentence, her pants had completely torn apart from her enormous booty and then she saw her feet turn into flat feet like those of a pachyderm. She looked back and saw a pair of leather wings growing out of her back and she even started to sprout a hippopotamus’s tail. “Oh no.” Muttered Delilah. Delilah then saw that she was getting taller and in seconds, she was as tall as a water tower. “Jake!” yelled Delilah. “Out of the way!” Jake ran back to avoid being crushed under his sister’s foot right before Delilah’s stomach bulged out and she opened her mouth and let out a hiss, revealing her teeth were turning into long fangs like those of a hippopotamus. Then she grunted as she sprouted gills and her face stretched into a snout as her skin turned scaly and platinum and her wings expanded until the wingspan reached 250ft.

Jake looked up at his sister as her transformation was complete. Delilah had become a giant and rather strange looking monstrous resembling a large hippopotamus with clawed nails, dragon wings, a long neck, gills and a scaly underbelly. She was 150ft tall with a 175ft belly and 200ft wide butt and large H-Cup breasts. Delilah looked all over herself and saw her reflection in her own platinum skin. “Oh,” said Delilah. “So this is what a Bahamut is. Wish they would’ve told me. Stupid game.” Jake looked up in shock at his transformed sister just as Delilah was looking at herself in the reflection in a skyscraper. “Delilah,” said Jake. “I am really sorry. I…” “Jake,” said Delilah. “Relax. It wasn’t you who bought the game, remember? Besides, the game said that I was now the defender of the Ruby City? This is going to take some getting used to.” Suddenly there was a ringing sound and it sounded like Delilah’s phone. “Crud.” The transmogrified model thought to herself.
112231122222222222222222222222222222.title: What's a Bahamut?

1122311222222222222222222222222222221.content:
Delilah reached down and tried to pick her cell phone out of the pocket of her jeans that were now struggling to hold back all of her dragon/hippopotamus ass, but her phone was so small compared to her giant and very obese fingers that just touching it would probably press all the apps at once or even shatter her screen. “Crud!” yelled Delilah. “My fingers are too big.” Delilah yelled and then the phone slipped right out of her hands. Before it could hit the floor and crash, Jake grabbed it. “Got it, big sister.” “Excuse me?” asked Delilah angrily as she was now literally much bigger than her brother in every sense of the word. The child let out a nervous laugh as he looked at the hippopotamus-like face of the Bahamut giantess and then gasped as he checked the caller I.D. “It’s that turkey, Finn.” Delilah groaned. Her idiot agent chose the worst possible time to call her but she couldn’t just ignore the phone ringing. She then had an idea. The bahamut let out a snort and then picked Jake up. “Huh?” asked Jake. “Sis, what are you... ugh.”

Delilah placed her kid brother inside her ear with the phone. “I can hear it ringing now, Jake,” said the bahamut giantess. “I can hear the phone loud and clear. Turn it on and I should be able to speak with Finn.” ‘Hello?” asked Delilah. “Delilah,” said the giant mutated model’s agent on the phone. “Baby. Have I got something that should make your name a household word.” Delilah let out a groan as she could hear Finn from the phone inside her ear. “Finn,” she said. “This is REALLY not a good time for a shoot.” “Not a good time? Oh, I get it, you were dropping off Jack at school.” “Jake.” Said Delilah correcting her pompous agent. “Whatever, D-La. You work for me, girl and I need your beautiful body by the wharf A.S.A.P.” “Finn,” said Delilah. “Whatever you want me to wear, I doubt that it will fit me at all.” “WHAT?! Are you telling me you’re putting on weight.” Delilah looks to see a plane nearly touching her huge snout and then hears beeping and has to step out of the road so cars can pass by. “Something like that.” The bahamut girl said to herself. “You better explain what’s going on, Delilah.” Delilah let out a sigh. “You wouldn’t believe me if I told you,” she said. “So I’m going to show you. Goodbye.” Jake hung up on the phone right before his sister pulled him out of her ear. “Sorry about that, Jake.” Said Delilah. Jake shivered. “You have seriously got to use stronger q-tips, Sis. There was enough wax in there to open a museum.”

“I’ve got bigger problems than that, Jake. That jerk Finn just called me to a job and I can’t come to a photoshoot looking like this.” “Why not?” asked Jake. “I think you look more awesome like this.” Delilah glared at her brother who looked up in fear and backed up. But then the titanic bahamut shook her head because there was no way of getting herself out of this situation. “I’ll be back to pick you up later,” said Delilah. “Something tells me that I’ll be home sooner than I thought. Have a good day at school, because I’m dreading this day of work.” The bahamut giantess then started to stomp away being extremely careful as not to step on anyone as her kid brother looked up and noticed that her jeans and black shirt were both appearing to come apart at the seams. “Uh, Delilah,” said Jake. “Your pants are dying on you.” “I know.” Said the amphibious hippopotamus/dragon giantess.

Delilah was soon grumbling to herself as she was trying to step over the traffic. “Sorry. Sorry.” “Watch where you’re going, Hyacinth!? Get your chunky butt off the road.” Delilah gave a snort of frustration. “There’s no need to be nasty about it, I happen to be a model.” “Model for what!” yelled an obnoxious young man in a Porsche by her toes. “Play Kaiju Magazine?” Delilah was quickly getting more stressed out when she realized she still had dragon’s wings. The bahamut creature let out a grunt as she flapped her wings. “I’m not 100% sure that this is going to work with how fat I am, but nothing ventured, that’s what they say.” Delilah flapped her wings and by some miracle, she managed to fly up into the sky. The hippo-faced dragoness couldn’t believe it herself. "Well I'll be a big ass hippo," she thought to herself. "At least I can fly."

Delilah flew up into the air to avoid the traffic and looked down to see how utterly small Ruby Town looked, not that it wasn't small before, especially to a 150ft high bahamut, but it was completely minuscule from Delilah's position in the air. "Oh great," thought Delilah. "As if I didn't feel colossal enough as it was. Well, as soon as Finn sees me like this, it's safe to say that I'll be out of a job. Oh well, I'm a hybrid of a dragon, a hippopotamus and a flying fish who happens to be as big as a skyscraper, I'm sure I'll find a job somewhere. Maybe they're making a new monster movie in Japan." Delilah suddenly stopped and grunted because a bird had flown into one of her huge nostrils and she was flying more clumsily before she started to fly towards the ground. "Oh no!" she yelled.

Nearby, Gabriel was driving past the mountains in the area when he heard a loud crash. "What the heck was that?!" he yelled. Gabe parked his car to the side of the rode and saw that something huge had crashed into a mountain and caused it to collapse to pieces. "O.M.G.! What happened? It looks like a meteor struck." Gabe heard coughing and then he gasped in surprise. Delilah had risen unharmed from the wreckage and seemed bigger than before. She had grown to 200ft high with a 300ft wide butt, 350ft wide wingspan and 245ft stomach. The bahamut girl let out a cough and accidentally blew steam from her mouth as she flapped her wings to make sure they weren't too terribly injured. She then gave a snort. "Okay," she said. "Definitely have to work on the landings there." Gabe could not believe the sight of the titanic creature in front of him, but what he found especially unbelievable was that the bahamut had spoken in his girlfriend's voice and had long shiny bluish black hair that Gabe recognized as Delilah's own.

"Delilah?" asked Gabe. "Is that you?" Delilah gave a look of surprise and then turned around to see her much smaller boyfriend below her. He was at level with her belly button from where he was standing and even walked up and tapped it. Delilah let out a sigh and accidentally horrified Gabe with her long and sharp hippopotamus teeth and long forked dragon's tongue. "Hi, Gabriel. It's me, lover boy. Just a little bit... ginormous today."

Gabe had to clean his glasses to make sure what he was seeing was not a hallucination. "Oh my gosh! Delilah, what are you?" Delilah gave an angry snort. "What does it look like?" she asked. "I'm a bahamut." "A bahamut?" asked Gabe. Gabriel took out his iPhone to do an image search and found that one image of a bahamut didn't match Delilah's appearance as it resembled a giant, demonic dragon. Gabe decided to check again but then he found an image that depicted a bahamut as an enormous fish with a hippo's head and an entire continent on it's back. "B-But, you don't look like the web images of a bahamut. You look more like several depictions of a bahamut and different interpretations mixed together. How is that?" Delilah gave a snort and scratched her enormous butt. "I'm pretty sure that artistic license is at work here." "How did this happen?" asked Gabe. "Did you get bitten by a radioactive hippo? Slimed by nuclear waste? struck by lightning." Delilah gave an angry roar down at her boyfriend. "It was that stupid Ruby City tabletop game you brought in. That card I drew told me this was going to happen and then made it happen." Gabe just gave a nervous look right before he grunted because Delilah picked him right up off the ground and gave him a slight stair as she held him in front of one of her eyes that looked like it was the size of a moon. Gabe flinched because he was sure that Delilah was mad at him.

However, Delilah just let out a deep sigh and then she let go of Gabe. Gabe yelled as he was plummeted but landed softly on one of Delilah's humongous D-cup breasts before slipping into her cleavage that was at this point being held back by a rather stressed out black tank top that was reduced to only covering up her nipples since she was now so enormous and obese. "Comfy, Gabe?" asked Delilah. Gabe just blushed. "Yes. Very." Delilah was then stomping away again as Gabe had to hold on tight. "Delilah," said Gabriel. "I am terribly sorry about turning you into..." "Shut up," said Delilah. "Don't worry. It's not as if you knew this was going to happen. I'd like to know at what kind of store you found this game." "It didn't have a name. There was just some strange bull's skull on the main table." Delilah let out a sigh. "That sounds like a red flag right there. Well, better go find Finn." Gabe gave a look of surprise. "Finn is calling you to work in your condition? Why didn't you...?" Delilah snorted. "You think that he'd believe that his supermodel cash cow mysteriously transformed into a hybrid of a fish, dragon and hippopotamus because of a cursed board game? All I know is that I'm gonna get fired when..." Gabe let out a scoff. "Excuse me, Delilah, but who in the right mind would fire a hippopotamus woman with the wings of a dragon who just happens to be 40 times bigger than them."

At the wharf at the time, Finn was waiting impatiently. "Where is she? Don't tell me she's taking this long just to drop off one kid at school. This is a very important job that will put us on...." Suddenly there were vibrations and the wharf was shaking up and then Finn looked up to see Delilah. "Looking for me?" asked the mutated model to her agent. "Delilah?" asked Finn. "What?" "You wouldn't believe me if I told you?" Finn was dumbfounded but then had an idea for publicity and smiled. "Change of plans. I have the perfect modeling job for someone of your... size." Delilah gave a gulp.

What exactly is Finn's idea?
1122311222222222222222222222222222221.title: One of Those Days

1122311222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Our story begins in the suburbs where a bespectacled African American woman with brown-reddish hair was reading a book when she decided to stop and get a drink out of the fridge. She walked into the kitchen and opened the fridge only to let out a scream as a giant inflatable clown came out. The woman slammed the fridge shut and panted before she grit her teeth. “Peter.” She muttered angrily. The woman’s husband gave a laugh before walking up. “So, did I finally make you laugh, Summer?”

Summer just glared at Peter. “If by laugh, you mean scream, then yes. Peter, I am really getting sick of these stupid pranks.” Peter let out a groan. “Come on, Summer. Where is your sense of humor?” Summer rolled her eyes. It had been this way for a while. Peter was an amateur comedian and yet his wife was as stone-faced as they came. Even before their marriage, Summer had never so much as uttered even a chuckle. It made one wonder how the two of them managed to get together in the first place. “Come on, Summer,” said Peter. “Have a heart. I’m just trying to make you laugh.” Summer shook her head. “I wish you would grow up, Peter. Not everybody is going to laugh at your stupid jokes. Now, I’m going to be busy reading but I don’t want to be disturbed. I’m going to be upstairs if you need me.”

Peter let out a sigh as his wife walked upstairs. He then waved his arm and let out a groan. “There’s gotta be some way to make her laugh. I’ve tried everything. Whoopie cushions, plastic snakes, squirting flowers. I need some new material.” Peter soon was driving down the street trying to figure out what he was going to do. “There’s gotta be a joke shop around here. Someplace that will make even Summer laugh out loud.” Peter then saw a strange shop up ahead, one with a Minotaur’s skull inside and gave a smile. “That place should work.” Peter then opened the door and saw nobody around. “Anyone home?” he asked. The skull then turned to face him. “What do you want?” Peter was surprised but let out a laugh. “Oh, so the shopkeeper is a ventriloquist? This is obviously the right place.” “Huh?!” asked the skull. “It’s my wife,” said Peter. “She’s as stone-faced as they get. In all the years we’ve been married, I haven’t been able to make her laugh even once. What I need is something that can sweeten even the sourest of puss.”

Needless to say, the skull was not amused. “What do I look like?! This isn’t a comedy shop! This store sells cursed magical objects, not jokes!” “But don’t you have anything that can give my wife a sense of humor?” asked Peter. “She hasn’t laughed once ever since I met her. It’s kind of depressing. Please, there has to be something in this store that will make her laugh.” The skull grumbled and spun around. “They’re always choosing to learn their lesson the hard way aren’t they? Fine. I’ll relent.”

The minotaur skull opened up and revealed what looked like a pack of a glowing blue gum. “Gum?” asked Peter. “What do you want me to do with the gum?” “That gum is made from the saliva of a werehyena. Anyone who chews it will be able to laugh like a hyena.” Said the skull. Of course, Peter was still skeptical and sniffed around the gum. He knew for a fact that Summer had a weakness for sweats and wouldn’t be able to resist bubblegum. “Are you sure that this gum will work?” asked Peter. “Believe me,” said the skull. “The moment your wife bites into that gum, she’ll laugh like a hyena.” The shop then faded away in a flash. Peter gulped in fear and he was really hoping that he could make Summer laugh.
1122311222222222222222222222222222222.title: Laugh Like a Hyena

11223112222222222222222222222222222221.content:
Summer at the time was at home reading a murder mystery novel. "I really wish that Peter would stop it with the crazy jokes. It's a good thing for him I love a man who's persistent and knows how to smile." At that moment, the door opened up and Summer realized her husband was home. She let out a sigh. "Here we go again." Summer put down her book to face her husband. "What's the joke this time, Peter?" Peter however, wasn't cheerful or jovial at that moment. He decided that if he was going to get Summer to laugh, he had to be subtle.

Peter let out a sigh. "Look, Summer. I'm sorry about all those jokes and pranks. I was just trying to make you laugh." Summer let out a sigh. "Peter," she said. "You knew when you married me that I wasn't a laugher. That just isn't my personality." "I know," said Peter. "And I understand. I'm going to stop trying so hard and driving you crazy. I even brought a peace offering." Peter held up the special werehyena-saliva gum and Summer adjusted her glasses and took a look at the gum. "Thanks, Peter," she said with a smirk as she took the gum. "I love chewing gum. Huh, I don't recognize this particular brand. It doesn't even say what's in it." Summer's eyes then popped and she gave a glare. "If this is spicy gum or something that will turn my mouth blue, I swear..." "It's nothing like that, Summer," said Peter. "I swear." Summer shrugged her shoulders, unwrapped the gum and then started to chew it.

"Hmm," she said right before blowing and popping a bubble. "This is interesting gum, Peter. Can't quite figure out the flavor." Suddenly, Summer started to giggle and hold her chest. "Oh, sorry about that. I don't know what..." Summer laughed more erratically as she stood up. "Oh my. What's gotten into me?" Peter gave a smile. "I can't believe it," he said to himself. "It actually worked." Summer held onto her stomach and then she took a deep breath.

"Peter," she said between laughs. "You're impossible. I knew this was some kind of a trick." "Well, it worked. It made you laugh." Summer had to agree to that. She was laughing so hard that she couldn't be mad with her husband. "That's true." She said. But suddenly, as Summer was laughing, something came over her. Her belly was bulging out and the button popped off of the front of her blue jeans, exposing her orange underwear. "Huh?" asked Peter in confusion. Summer's breasts expanded as well and were tearing apart her undershirt and stretching out her orange jacket. Then she got on her knees and her butt got bigger to the point where her jeans looked like a tattoo.

Then, Summer started to get bigger to the point where Peter only reached up to her butt crack and then golden-brown fur with black spots sprouted all over her growing body.
