Her fingers turned to claws and her toes did the same thing, tearing through her shoes as a canid-like tail grew over her butt crack. Her ears grew pointing and as she was laughing, her mouth stretched into a snout filled with teeth as sharp as knives. Peter gave a gasp as Summer paused laughing. "Peter?" she asked as she tried to fight the urge to giggle. "What happened?"

Summer then looked in the mirror and saw that she was a 15ft tall werehyena. She had a 15ft stomach, H-cup breasts and a 25ft wide booty. "Oh my," said Summer as she continued to smile and adjusted her glasses. "Peter, what did you do?" Peter then gasped. "Oh no," he said. "That gum was made out of werehyena saliva. This must be a side-effect." Summer smirked and glared at the same time as she looked over her obese body. "Peter," she said. "You are just impossible. Well, you won't have any trouble making me laugh." Summer then let out a laugh and then heard her stomach rumbling. She then turned to her husband and smirked from both of her puffy cheeks and then licked her chops.

Peter looked up in worry. "Summer? Why are you looking at me like that." "well," said Summer. "It looks like my tummy wants some company." Peter was seriously afraid because he knew that Summer was considering eating him. "Now don't do anything rash, Summer! I'm your husband. There's some leftover chocolate cake in the fridge. I'll get that for you." Summer just drooled uncontrollably as she laughed. "Better hurry, Peter. I'm starving." Peter went into the kitchen and brought out the cake that Summer quickly swallowed with one bite. Knowing full well that one chocolate cake wouldn't hold off a 5 ton hyena for long and brought out everything in the refrigerator as Summer devoured entire handfuls of food, mostly sweets.

In 20 minutes, Summer had devoured everything in the kitchen and let out a belch. Peter let out a sigh of relief. "I really hope she doesn't have room for me." Summer licked her lips and then rubbed her stomach. "That was an amazing meal." Unfortunately, Summer's stomach rumbled again and the obese hyena got up and moved her hulk to the door as she smirked. "Uh, Summer," said Peter. "Where are you going?"

Summer burst into an uncontrolled cackle. "Isn't it obvious, Honey?" she asked. "I'm still hungry and now I've got a massive craving for..."
11223112222222222222222222222222222221.title: Who's Laughing Now?

11223112222222222222222222222222222222.content:
“Come on? Are you sure that you can’t clear me for one more season. I’ve got plenty of ideas for Daedalus or Alive. Plenty of ideas. No. I’m Brad Dashing. I saved this studio from… I understand.” Brad let out a sigh as his wife, dressed as a Greek goddess, walked by. “The network president said no, huh, Brad?” asked Bianca. Brad let out a groan. “There’s no room for good shows on these days. No room for game shows like this anymore.” Bianca let out a sigh. “People have bad taste these days. Hench a station that once had very good television now has nothing but crappy sitcoms. If I see one more sitcom, I’m going to barf in my coffee.”
 However, Brad kissed Bianca and then lowered his head. “Unfortunately, Bianca,” he said to his wife. “We might have to find work on a sitcom. Daedalus or Alive is dead. I thought that making an ancient Greece themed quiz show would make our careers but now…” Bianca let out a groan. “Just goes to show you that everything is going to you-know-where these days. So much for good television. If only there was a way to save the show.” Brad let out a scoff. “Yes. It would be great. But that’s show…”

Before Brad could finish his sentence, he heard a sound that sounded like somebody chewing on popcorn. Both of them turned their heads and looked in surprise at a man in green rags and a metal face mask eating popcorn right in front of them. “Is this a bad time?” The man asked. “Who are you?” asked Brad. “Wait a minute, how did you manage to get in here?” The man just kept eating popcorn before he answered. “I’m Erlking. And your door was open.” “Erlking?” asked Bianca. “You look like you walked out of a bad Shakespeare production. What’s with the outfit? It doesn’t look like anything I’d see on any homeless men I’ve seen and you clearly look homeless.” Erlking shrugged his shoulders and bit into more popcorn. “I prefer to think of myself as shelter challenged. So, what would I be watching if I had gotten here earlier?”

Brad gave a nervous smile. “Well, you’re late for the party on more than one occasion. Daedalus or Alive is almost dead. We’re being cancelled. I’ve did everything to save it. I even got my beautiful wife to dress like a Greek goddess in order to attract viewers and ratings. But nothing’s working.” “Daedalus or Alive,” said Erlking. “I like the pun. I take it it’s a Greek mythology themed game show.” “It was a Greek mythology themed quiz show,” said Bianca. “The last episode airs tomorrow.” “Last episode?” asked Erlking. “Sounds like you’re in trouble.” “I wish that there was a way to save it,” said Bianca. “But oh well. Looks like we’ll have to find work somewhere else.”

However, at that moment, Erlking had finished his popcorn and wiped off his mouth before he popped his neck. “Don’t worry. Erlking has you covered. 1, 2, spell me do, let this couples’ wish come true. Hear me high, hear me well. Let me be this spell!” Erlking then cast his spell and disappeared. Bianca gave a cough. “Brad,” she said. “Exactly who was that kook?” “Well,” said Brad. “Whoever he is, he has great special effects. Maybe they oughta hire him for the studio. Come on. We have to prepare for doomsday.” While the Dashings were walking away, they had completely failed to realize that Bianca’s shadow had turned into that of an obese sphinx walking on all fours and Bianca herself was getting pudgier as her eyes turned into cat’s eyes.
11223112222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sphinx Happens

choices: He Tries to Pass Bianca Off as an Animatronic
112231122222222222222222222222222222221.content:
Brad shook his head as Bianca followed him. “Can you believe that guy, Bianca?” he asked his wife. “What a weirdo? A wish granter? More like a crazy homeless guy with access to good special effects.” Bianca was for some reason licking her hand as she followed her husband and her stomach was getting much pudgier than it was before. “You know,” said Bianca. “That Erlking ought to have his own TV show. Maybe we should call Mr. Warabino and tell him that the guy would be good for the preschool block. He looks like he’d be great with kids. What does Erlking even mean?” “I remember,” said Brad. “On Daedalus or Alive, I asked a contestant a question and the answer was the Erlking. The king of the fairies in Danish and German legend.” Bianca’s eyes became even more cat-like and shined bright blue as she let out a strange purring sound. “I thought Oberon was the king of the fairies.” “That’s in Greek.” Said Brad. Brad let out a groan as he took out his car keys.

“Well,” the soon to be former game show host said. “We’ll have plenty of time to figure out what is what because after tomorrow, Daedalus or Alive is dead.” Brad and his wife entered the car but Bianca dropped one of her earrings and bent over to get it off the ground. As she did this, Brad saw that Bianca’s butt had mysteriously gotten bigger. “Bianca?” asked Brad. “Are you putting on weight?” Bianca gave a scoff. “Excuse me?” she asked her husband. Bianca then grunted because Brad grabbed one of her butt cheeks to determine how much softer it had become. “Just as I thought,”said Brad. “Cellulite. I warned you to be careful with those Oreos. Hey, maybe a chubbier sex magnet might save the show.”

Bianca gave a glare at her husband and hissed, not realizing that her teeth were turning into cat-like fangs. Brad raised an eyebrow in surprise. “Did you just hiss at me?” Bianca seemed confused at her husband’s words.
"Hiss at you? What do I look like, a cat?" Bianca just sat in her seat and tried to put on her seatbelt, but had trouble getting it over her much larger belly as Brad was staring at her. "Not one word, Brad." Warned Bianca to her husband. The couple was driving down town and didn't notice it at the time, but Bianca had sprouted a long tail that looked like that of a lions and her ears were slowly becoming pointed like that of a feline.

"Well," said Brad. "I'm feeling like a going out of business dinner. Since Daedalus or Alive ends tomorrow night, we better eat like Zeus and Hera tonight. What sounds good, Bianca?" Bianca let out a purr and gave a smile just like a cat's and licked her lips. "I'm feeling like fresh fish tonight. Better yet. Raw." Brad gave a look of disgust. "Sushi for a last meal? Well, whatever you say, Baby." Bianca then begun to cough a few times. "I hope they've got plenty of water," said Bianca to her husband. "My tongue feels a lot like sandpaper." Brad raised an eyebrow but he didn't seem to see anything wrong with his wife at the exact moment as they pulled into a Japanese restaurant.

Inside the restaurant, Bianca was stuffing her face with sushi and eating ferociously and even licking away at her drink as everyone looked in disgust with judgmental looks. "What are you doing, Bianca?" asked Brad. "Geez. Did you skip lunch today or something?" Bianca let out a slight belch before answering her husband. "I'm sorry, Brad," said Bianca. "For some reason I'm insanely hungry and I can't figure out why." Bianca then begun to cough slightly. "Excuse me, Brad. I need to use the sand box, uh, I mean, the water closet." Bianca got up and Brad looked in surprise because not only did he finally notice her tail swinging around, but her ass had gotten so big that it knocked over several tables and chairs as she shook it and made her way to the bathroom. Of course, Brad didn't seem to notice at all that small feathers were growing on his wife's upper back in a shape that resembled tiny wings. Brad rubbed his eyes as he turned his head away. "I must be tired," he said. "And stressed. I wonder if all hosts go through this when their hit show is cancelled."

In the bathroom, Bianca was in front of the sink and was panting heavily and sweating as she held her chest. "What is going on?" she asked to herself. "What is happening to me...ow!" Bianca gave a hiss and put her hands on the bathroom sink as her fingers turned into rather sharp claws and the wings that were growing on her back had expanded as she felt fur growing on her body. Her ass and stomach were getting so big that they were tearing holes in her dress. One young woman entered the bathroom and gasped as she saw Bianca transforming into something monstrous in front of her. Bianca at this point had passed 8ft tall and her eyes were glowing as her nose became more feline-like in appearance. "Help.... me." Muttered Bianca. But the young woman took one look at the mutating Bianca and let out a scream before running the other way in pure fear. Bianca just kept hissing as she was forced to stand on all fours just like an animal as she kept getting bigger and swelling.

In the main dining area, Brad was shaking his head. "Gee," he said. "Bianca sure is taking a long time to use the bathroom. Like that's anything new." Brad was about to drink a glass of sake but then he heard loud screaming and people were running into the main dining area. "Everybody run! There's a monster in the restaurant!" "Monster?" asked Brad. Several customers in their seats turned their hands as a large feline shadow was coming out from the restroom area. The customers screamed and ran away, leaving Brad in utter surprise.

Brad was confused as to why everyone was running away, but then he gasped because Bianca came out of the bathroom and was stomping the ground as she walked on all fours. She was now a colossal 15ft tall (while walking on all fours) sphinx with an enormously fat 20ft wide stomach, 15ft wide ass and a pair of E-cup breasts. She had bright blue fur and aquamarine-colored feathered wings that had a span of 40ft as she came forward. The lioness beast let out a roar of distress as she was walking down the front of the restaurant and looked at Brad who was in utter fear. "N-N-Nice kitty." Said Brad rather uneasily. Bianca was filled in absolute dread at the fact that her husband seemed to believe that she was now a rather titanic monster that clearly looked like a man-eater. "Brad," said Bianca. "It's me." Brad could not believe it because the sphinx clearly had his wife's voice. "B-B-Bianca?" Bianca nodded her head and gave a look of distress. "Good grief." Said Brad.

It wasn't long until Bianca was devouring an entire tuna provided by the restaurant staff who were too scared to move with such an enormous sphinx in the vicinity. Brad still could not believe what had become of his wife and poked her in the stomach, prompting her to growl at him. "Sorry, honey!" yelled Brad very quickly. Bianca then returned to her meal as Brad could only stare at her tail that was minuscule on the sphinx's colossal butt cheeks. "What happened to you, Bianca?" asked Brad. "This definitely isn't something that happens everyday." Bianca swallowed a mouthful of fish before she gasped and remembered Erlking casting his spell.

"Erlking!" she yelled. "He did this!" "That's impossible," said Brad. "Are you telling me that vagrant was actually a real spell caster." "Evidently so," said Bianca. "I did say that I wished for something that would save the show from being canceled. The way he saw it, any game show, especially an ancient Greece-themed quiz show, would be more interesting with a real life monster from Greek mythology. This is what I get for not being specific." Brad let out a groan. "This is clearly what I did not have in mind. Sure it might save Daedalus or Alive, but at the price that I'll be married to a sphinx for the rest of my life?! And why are you so fat? What does this have to do with anything?"

Bianca turned around and snapped her jaws as Brad screamed. "You never mention a woman's weight, Brad!" yelled Bianca. "So maybe I'll never be able to fit into a size six again. But I’m a giant carnivorous feline. That’s the least of our problems.” Brad then begun to think to himself and Bianca looked at him with a rather confused look on her face. “Brad?” she asked. “What are you getting at?” Brad gave a smile and then rubbed his titanic wife in her side. "Don't you see," he said. "This will save Daedalus or Alive. Tomorrow night's game show features a titanic sphinx."

Once Bianca had finished her meal, the titanic sphinx was flying through the air with her husband riding on her back. "Okay," said Brad. "Theres's no way Mr. Warabino won't be impressed by this. He'll have to clear us for another season." "I just hope my sphinx transformation doesn't get the best of me," said Bianca. "I don't want to eat any of the contestants that fail." Bianca had landed right on the Channel 7 building and shook it up. Fortunately, Mr. Warabino was in his office at the time and felt it. "What was that?!" yelled the station head.

Before Mr. Warabino could even think of what happened, Brad walked in. "Hello, Mr. Warabino." "Brad Dashing? What are you doing here? You should be getting ready for the last episode of Daedalus or Alive." Brad gave a smile. "Oh," he said. "It won't be the last episode. I just found something to spice things up." Mr. Warabino was confused but then gasped as Bianca stomped into the room and smirked. "Ta da," said Brad. "We'll be the only game show with an actual sphinx." Mr. Warabino was horrified. "Where did that sphinx come from?"

Now, can Brad tell his boss that the sphinx is Bianca?
112231122222222222222222222222222222221.title: Catastrophe of Mythic Proportions

112231122222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Our story begins in an observatory where a redheaded and freckle-faced women with a ponytail was on the phone with her husband as she was looking at a photograph of herself with said husband and their young son. “Thanks for picking me up while my car’s in the shop, Robert. I really appreciate it.” “Hey,” said Robert’s voice on the phone. “I knew you were a terrible driver when I married you. It’s rare you get out of work early, especially when you’re working for NASA. I’ll just pick you up and we’ll both pick up Adrian from school. No problem, Susan.” Susan jus tlet out a sigh. “I really wish that those kids would leave him alone.” “Unfortunately it’s the smart kids that often get bullied. I’ll see you in half an hour.” “Love you, Robert. See you there.” Susan gave a smile as she hung up but let out a sigh right before she had to get to work. “This is Susan Potts calling the Riskier 2.0. You are clear for reentry.” “Roger, Mrs. Potts,” said one of the astronauts. “We’re coming back.” Susan let out a sigh. Her job was to act as mission control and call for astronauts and mere hours ago, the Risktaker 2.0 had gotten past a cosmic storm. She had to come in early just to help the motley crew return safely that day.

Suddenly, Susan got another call from the astronaut in charge. "Mrs. Potts. We picked up something strange from the trip." "Something strange?" asked Susan. "It was a simple trip to deflect a meteor. What could you have possibly..." "I'll bring it to you and you can see for yourself, Mrs. Potts. You'll see." Susan let out a sigh as the rocket landed. She soon heard footprints and then turned around to see the captain of the Riskier 2.0 and he was carrying a rather long container. "Check it out, ma'am," said the man to Susan. "This is literally out of this world."

Susan took the container and saw that it was filled with some form of glowing pinkish red ooze. “What is this?” she asked. “We don’t know for sure, Mrs. Potts,” said the astronaut. “We found it floating in a cosmic storm.” Susan took a closer look. “It appears to be some kind of ooze that is made up of cosmic radiation. I’ll take it down to the lab when I leave.” The astronaut then walked away as he nodded his head. Susan held up the vial of ooze and scratched her head slightly because the ooze appeared to be bubbling. “Now this isn’t your average everyday slime. It almost looks like cosmic clay. I better get a closer look at it.” Susan held up the vial filled with the cosmic ooze and saw that in the bright light it seemed to bubble. “Interesting.” However, as the technician continued to look up at the ooze, she accidentally leaned back in her chair and fell over, in the process dropping the vial as it shattered and splattered the ooze on her.

As the ooze hit Susan, she accidentally swallowed some and gagged. “Yuck! Oh my gosh! I swallowed it!” Susan groaned and spat a few times before she ran to the phone to call a hospital. As she did so, she had no idea that her butt and belly were expanding and her skin was turning a dark burgundy color as she gasped. Susan was sweating heavily as she held up the phone and failed to notice that her body appeared to be melting. “Come on,” she said nervously. “Come on. I might have just been poisoned!” Susan coughed into her hand as she waited and then she saw that her hand looked fatter than usual and from the looks of it, it appeared to be turning burgundy. The redhead heard a ripping sound and saw that back of her pure white pants tearing apart and her panties looked like they were coming apart as her body kept turning color. Susan in shock dropped the phone and her ponytail came apart as she grabbed her head and she sprouted a few extra chins as her fingers kept expanding and her stomach was bulging out. Her breasts had outgrown her shirt and Susan saw just how red she had become. “Oh no,” she said. “Good grief! How is this happening?! I thought cosmic ooze was only supposed to do this in comic books!” Susan then saw that she appeared to be getting taller as she got fatter and she also appeared to be turning into liquid.

Susan then heard a knock on the door and turned around, her body turning into slime as she walked up to the door, her burgundy body picking up tones of dark black as her eyes were turning pitch white. As she continued to walk towards the door, she gained a ton and got even bigger. “Who’s there?!” yelled Susan in a stressed out tone given what was happening to her. “Susan?” asked Robert on the side of the door. “Is everything okay in there!?” Susan let out a groan. “Great,” she thought to herself. “I definitely can’t let my own husband see me like this. What the hell is happening to me? That ooze must’ve had mutagenic properties.” Susan coughed a few more times as she continued to bloat out. Robert heard Susan coughing and was greatly worried and then opened the door and looked in absolute shock at the giant blob of ooze in front of him.

The slime rose up and Robert saw Susan’s face and was shocked to see his wife in such a state. “Oh my gosh!” yelled Robert. “Susan?!” Susan just blushed as her slimy body was bubbling as four chins formed on her face. Susan was now truly huge. She was a 25ft tall blob who would weigh 4 tons if she was normal sized. She had a 25ft wide stomach and a large 35ft ass, though because of her slimy body, she was more than flexible enough to reposition herself. “Slight accident with something the boys brought back from the meteor,” said the blob woman to her husband. “Let’s just say mutagenic ooze isn’t just restricted to Mirage Comics.” Robert just poked at his wife’s slimy stomach and looked in surprise and then disgust. “Now this is going to take some getting used to. But I think we can make it work.”

Susan let out a groan as she tried to pull her liquid red body together. “I hope so. This day isn’t going at all well. And now I’m starving.” Susan oozed out of the lab and then was moving her body across the hall, as she tried to keep her ooze body together. “Susan?” asked Robert. “Where are you going now?” “Where does it look like?” asked the blob woman. “To the kitchen. I feel like I could eat a dinosaur.” Robert could only let out a sigh as he followed his wife. “What am I going to tell Adrian?” he asked. “It’s not like I could just walk up to our son and tell him that his mother is now a giant creature made out of cosmic ooze.” Robert then gagged in disgust as he stepped on a loose piece of slime that appeared to have come off of his wife. “Now this is definitely going to take some getting used to."
112231122222222222222222222222222222222.title: Married to the Blob

choices: "My Boss is Coming to Discuss the Next Launch"
1122311222222222222222222222222222222221.content:
Robert tried to step around the piece of slime that came loose from Susan’s body but it kept wiggling in his way as he grunted. The glob was shaking in place right before it retreated to reattach to Susan. “Yech,” groaned Robert. “That’s even more repulsive than that mother in law of mine.” Robert then heard a ravenous eating sound and then walked down the hall to investigate and then looked in disgust because his now gigantic and amorphous wife was emptying out an entire vending machine. She was shoving the contents of her wallet (just don’t ask me where a slime creature would keep a wallet) into the slot and jamming the buttons before shoving candies, chips and snack cakes into her body where they appeared to dissolve and fizzle into her body. “Oh my gosh! Susan! That is totally disgusting! Ugh! You don’t have to worry about getting me dinner for the next... five weeks.”

The blob creature then raised her hand before taking a good look at her husband. “I’m sorry, Robert. But I’ve got a hunger that I can’t control. I feel like a black hole just opened up in my stomach. I’m a 25ft high pile of cosmic ooze for crying out loud! You think I planned on something so bizarre happening to me.” That’s when Susan heard a jamming noise and saw that a bag of chips got stuck in the vending machine. The slime woman let out a grunt and oozed herself into the machine where she proceeded to devour and absorb everything that she had yet to consume from the machine. Robert gagged and held his mouth as Susan’s slimy body oozed in pieces out of the machine and then reassembled into his gelatinous wife.

Susan rubbed her stomach and realized that it expanded and she had grown 10ft higher. “Oh geez.” She said. Robert gave a gulp. “You know something, Susan,” he said. “Maybe you better stop stuffing yourself. You’re gonna get as big as a house if you keep that up.” Susan thought about that and smiled. “Cool!” she yelled. Robert gave a look of worry and this prompted his giant slime wife to look rather nervous. “Oh come on,” she said. “I can’t enjoy being a titanic blob?” “Susan,” said Robert to his glob of a wife. “You seriously look like something out of a 1940s horror movie. And burgundy, that’s definitely not your color.” Susan then lowered her head. “Come on, Robert,” she said. “I may look different on the outside. Okay, so I’m a gelatinous giant and a bottomless pit, but I am still human. I think. What do you say? Open to a new experience with an old wife.”

Robert gave a nervous smile and then walked up to his wife to kiss her on the lips to let her know that it didn’t matter that she was a giant pile of slime. Of course, as he was doing this, it took all his willpower not to groan in disgust from the slime that got in his mouth. “Oh,” thought Robert to himself. “Gross. She tastes horrible. And her kiss. I don’t know if she’s force feeding me her slime or trying to swallow me whole. She’s never been this aggressive before. Calm down, Robert. This is your wife. I just wish that the preacher knew what to say for a situation like this. At last Susan let go of her husband's lips and Robert turned his head and shivered. The slime giantess still felt empty inside and then she turned to see a water cooler up ahead and smiled as she licked her lips. Susan unscrewed the water cooler and then chugged the contents before swallowing the entire cooler as Robert looked in surprise.

The blob giantess then let out a thunderous belch before covering her mouth. “Oops,” she said. “Excuse me. Oh my gosh. We better pick up Adrian from school.” Of course, Robert was very worried about that decision. “Are you sure that that’s such a good idea, Susan?” asked Robert to his giant slime of a wife. “What would Adrian think if he saw that his mom was a titanic creature made out of alien ooze.” Susan just lowered her head to kiss her husband and cover his head in slime. “You worry too much, honey,” she said. “Now let’s come on.” Robert let out a sigh and then walked up to the car but then realized something. Robert looked at his car and then he looked at his wife and then he realized that there was no way Susan would be able to fit in the car. Fortunately, Susan broke herself down into smaller bits that followed the car as the part with her personality inside of it clung to the front of Robert’s car. Robert saw the slimy chunks of Susan following after him while the piece that had Susan’s mind was stuck to the front of his car. “I really hope we don’t attract any stares, Susan.” “Well,” said Susan. “Adrian’s school is up ahead. We’re almost there.”

However, as the Pottses reached the school, they saw their son being pushed against a chain link fence by two bullies. “What’s the deal, Potts!? That report you wrote for me was bad.” “If you want something done right, do it yourself. It wasn’t MY homework.” However, the lead bully just punched Adrian again. “You’re gonna pay for your insubordinate Adrian. Let’s see how attached you are to that hair.” Needless to say, Robert and Susan didn’t take it kindly that their son was being bullied in front of them. However, before Robert could say a word, Susan pulled her blobby body together and then slinked her way up behind the two malcontents. When they were about to attack Adrian, Susan let out a growl.

The bullies turned and looked in fear as the 30ft blob creature made a ghoulish face at them and roared like a kaiju. The bullies screamed and ran as they pushed Adrian towards the creature, not knowing it was Adrian's mother. Adrian himself looked in fear only for the slime to smile at him. Adrian stepped back and backed up into Robert who grabbed his son by the shoulders to calm him down. "Whoa. Easy there, kiddo. No need to get excited."

“Dad!” yelled Adrian. “What on Earth is that disgusting thing!” Susan seemed to take offense at her son’s comment but since he didn’t know it was her, she decided not to get mad at him. “I’m choosing not to punish you for that comment since there’s no way you would know,” said Robert. “Adrian. That disgusting thing is your mother.” Adrian saw the slime form into Susan’s obese and gigantic form but with her recognizable face staring down at her son. “Hi, Sweetie.” Adrian could not believe what he was seeing and took off his glasses before rubbing them and putting them back on. “No way,” he said. “What happened? Did she get into a lab accident or something!?” “Uh,” said Susan. “Something like that. Let’s just say I learned that there is some credit to the term “Secrets of the Ooze”. Please don’t be afraid.”

Adrian was more baffled than actually afraid and picked up a stick. He would’ve poked his mother, but her slimy body grabbed the stick and threw it to the side before Susan growled slightly. “Already tried that, kid,” said Robert. “I don’t think she likes it.” Adrian stepped back in fear before Susan broke her slimy body into pieces that were each the size of a dog. The pieces of the amorphous SSBBW passed by her husband and son who could only look in dumbfounded shock. “I’ll see you boys at home.” One of the pieces said. Adrian gagged in disgust and Robert tapped him on the back. “Believe me, son,” he said. “It’s only going to get weirder and weirder from here.”

Susan’s slimy body was in pieces but the fragments of the blob goddess had gathered in groups and entered through gaps in pipes throughout the city in order to find the quickest route to the Potts Residence. Along the way, several of the globs absorbed more and more water, making some pieces of the slime woman much bigger than others, with the main piece of Susan ballooning to the size of a cow. One sewer maintenance worker was walking by a corridor when he gasped upon seeing the cow-sized chunk of slime form into a small version of the main body and rub her chin. Susan let out a mumble. “Hmmm,” she said. “Aha. Home should be this way.” With that, the slime Susan turned back to ooze and scurried off as the rest of the chunks of her followed. The maintenance worker could not believe what he saw and went to take out his phone to call his superiors to report on what he just saw.

At that moment, Robert and Adrian had arrived home way before Susan did. “Where’s Mom?” asked Adrian. “She said she was going to meet us here.” Robert then let out a sigh. “Something tells me she found an alternative and much more revolting means of travel than we did.” Robert then made his way up to the kitchen sink and turned on the nozzle. This caused the sink to sputter slightly and then burgundy slime came out and Adrian screamed at the sight of his oozy blob of a mother coming out of the kitchen faucet. The slime then overflowed into the kitchen floor and Robert yelled as he had to run out of the kitchen as his enormous wife reformed. Susan had reformed so fast that her body was leaking into three rooms. She had indeed gotten much bigger and had to weigh 20 tons by now.

Susan's head finally formed and she accidentally coughed up some of her own slime all over her husband as her son looked in disgust. "Oops," said Susan. "Sorry about that, honey." Robert groaned and shook off Susan's slime. "Now this is the kind of sticky that I'll never be able to get used to. Ugh." Susan just laughed nervously. "Don't worry, honey. We'll make it work." "I hope you both do," said Adrian in disgust. "Because there is no way I'll be able to get used to having a mom made out of goo."

Suddenly Susan realized something and gasped. "Oh my gosh!" yelled the blimpish blob behemoth. "Oh my good golly gosh. Robert, I forgot to tell you." Robert looked at Susan in worry. "Forgot to tell me what?" Susan gave a nervous look. "Well," said the slime being to her husband. "I meant to tell you earlier that..."
1122311222222222222222222222222222222221.title: The Ooze

1122311222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The village Vicar was furious.

"Vile Witch. We shall never let your plans succeed." He yelled.

"It's too late." Calinda replied. "I have already one." She then laughed as the portal opened, revealing...

Selena Bell stared at the monitor annoyed. 'Revealing what?' She thought. 'Come on, think!'

Selena was a screenwriter for McBelico Studios. In particular, she was one of the many writers for the popular horror anthology series, The Fair of Fear. Currently, she was writing the 15th Episode, Revenge of the Witch.

Selena certainly looked the part of a horror writer. Selena stood at 5'10'', had long, raven black hair, and black eyes. She had a fair build, with C cup breasts, fair hips, and a decent butt. As a Goth, she wore dark clothing all the time. Today, it was a long, black skirt, a black t-shirt, and black boots. She also had black lipstick and black eyeliner.

Selena was just about to start smashing her head against the keyboard in anger when she heard the door open. Turning, she saw her husband, Eddie, walk in. He was holding a bag. Eddie was an inch shorter then Selena, had dirty blonde hair and green eyes, and a skinny build. He was actually an actor at McBelico Studios, which is how the two of them met.

"Hey hun." He said as he walked up and kissed her. "How's the episode coming? There a part for me in it?"

"I though you were due for a beer ad shoot?" Selena asked.

"It got pushed back. Apparently the director ate some bad lobster." Eddie replied.

"Oh. Well, I would find you a part if I could figure out what kind of monster Calinda will summon." Selena told him.

"Well, maybe this will help." Eddie said as he pulled something out of the bag. It was a solid black book. "I got this at a small curio shop. It was pretty interesting. They even had an animatronic skull. It glowed and said "I would advise against buying that book." It was incredible."

"Wow. I'll have to visit sometime." Selena said. She then took the book and read the cover "Hm, 'The Book of 10,000 Creatures.' Maybe this can help."
Selena then began flipping through the book. Suddenly, she stopped on a page. "There! That's it!"

She pointed at a picture of a succubus. It had red skin, raven black hair, red eyes, horns, a spade tail, and hooves for feet. It was also incredibly obese.

Selena looked up at Eddie. "There's what Calinda will summon. A succubus to devour her enemies." Unknown to her, while she and Eddie weren't looking, a glow travelled from the picture up Selena's finger.

"Great!" Eddie said. "I need to go practice my lines for the ad. Good luck."

With that, Eddie walked off. Selena put the book down and, turning back to the monitor, began typing, oblivious to the spade tail that had appeared on her.
1122311222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Hot as Hell Screenwriter

1122311222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
A few hours later, in the living room, Selena was still typing away. Unknown to her, she was still changing. Her spade tail had fully formed, her feet had turned into hooves, her eyes had turned red, and she had grown horns on her head. Now her skin had started to change to red.

She also seemed to be getting taller and fatter. Her shirt was getting tighter as her belly and breasts blew up slowly, her hips began to press against the armrests of the chair, her butt sank into the chair as it grew, and her arms and legs were getting thicker as well. She was even starting to form a second chin. But she was so engrosed in her writing that she didn't notice.

"And as the succubus was pulled back into the vortex," Selena said to herself as she typed. "The village people sighed in relief, knowing that the witch and her demon were banished forever." She then grinned as she put in the last sentence. "Finally! Story's done! Now to email it to-"

She didn't get a chance to finish as the chair collapsed under her increasing weight. She landed hard on the floor, her new flab jiggling. She sat up and rubbed her head.

"Ow! Stupid chair." She mutted. "I told Eddie-" She stopped when she felt her new horns. She then looked at her hands and saw they were blood red and still getting fatter. She stood up and felt her horns brush the ceiling. She was speechless. Eventually, she stopped growing.

She heard footsteps coming down the stairs. Eddie raced into the living room. "I heard a crash! What-" He stopped when he saw Selena.

Selena was now 9 feet tall. Her breasts had grown into G cups, her belly was 8 feet wide, her butt was now 7 feet wide, and her arms and legs were twice as thick as before. She had a second chin and the beginnings of a third one. Her shirt and skirt were barely holding on. Her skin and eyes were blood red, she had curving horns on top of her head, a long spade tail stuck out behind her, and she had hooves for feet.

"Selena?" Eddie asked, surprised.

Selena looked at herself. "Um, before you ask, no I don't know what happened. And that crash was the chair."

"You look like a succubus." Eddie said.

Selena's eyes lit up. "Wait, a succubus..." She turned back to her screen and read her story again. "I look like the succubus I wrote in my story."

"You made yourself like this by writing?" Eddie asked.

"I don't think so. Maybe it was that book." Selena said. "Didn't you say you bought it at a weird shop?"

"Yeah, but I don't see-"

"Fair of Fear, episode 4. The Strange Shop. In it, a man buys a book from a shop that traps him in it's pages. Maybe this is like that, only turning me into a succubus." Selena said.

She then looked at herself again. "This is actually kind of cool. Maybe I can get some acting gigs like this." She said.

"Um, let's not get hasty. First, we should find out if this is reversable. Let's go to that shop." Eddie said.

"That shops not going anywhere. Let's swing by the studio first. Maybe they'll like the new me." Selena said.

Where do they go first?
1122311222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Fairly Quick Change

choices: Paul and Rita ask to See the Book
1122311222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Selena gave a smirk and then started to walk out the front door. Of course, she had to stop and squeeze her belly through first. However, once her belly was through the door, the succubus's ass had gotten stuck and Selena grunted. Eddie could only stare at his mutated wife's bright scarlet ass that was swallowing her jeans whole and her spade tail that was waving. "Uh, Ediie," said Selena. "Would you mind." Eddie simply poked his wife's 7ft wide ass before he gave it a swift kick and pushed the big succubus out of the door. However, in the process, Selena's huge stomach flattened their car.

Our story begins during an argument on the phone between a divorced couple. “Restraining order?! What do you mean, restraining order, Jacqueline?! I’ve only been gone 10 years. With that, Jacqueline slammed down her phone and left her ex-husband fuming mad. “That stuck up bitch!” yelled Horace. “Like she never made a single mistake in her life! That woman is driving me crazy! I wish there was a way to put her in her place. Somebody has to take her down a peg.” The con then spotted a strange shop of some kind up ahead, a shop that appeared to have a minotaur’s skull on the front counter. Horace put his hand to his chin and gave a smirk. “This might just be the break I need.” He said to himself.

Horace walked into the store to find a zombie dressed like a Greek soldier sweeping the floor. The skull’s eyes lit up. “It’s that time in the show where some fool buys one of the cursed objects from this shop. What do you want?” Horace looked at the skull in pure shock and horror. He then bit his lip and tapped on the skull as it gave a grunt. The skull then retaliated by biting Horace. Horace let out a yell of pain. “Oh, a wise guy.” Horace would’ve pounded the skull but the zombie grabbed him by the hands and restrained him.

“You know,” said the skull. “It’s unwise to pick a fight with the supernatural.” Horace let out a sigh. “Look,” he said. “I’m not here to…” “Wait,” said the skull. “I recognize you. Aren’t you the man who recently was released from prison after serving time from that Ponzi scam? I don’t think that I should sell you anything.” “Listen, bonehead,” said Horace. “I’ve had a rough day and I assure you, I’ve gone straight.” “Then why do I detect malicious thoughts emanating from you?” Horace let out a groan. “It’s that stupid ex-wife of mine. She won’t even let me see my own daughter.” “I can’t imagine why.” Said the skull sarcastically. “This is a magic shop, isn’t it? I’d like to place a curse on Jacqueline.”

The skull let out a sigh. “Why do I even bother?” he asked himself. “Why do I allow things like this to happen? I know that there is no way this will end well. But then again, nothing ever changes.” The skull opened his mouth and revealed a strange necklace of some kind with a charm shaped like a jackal’s head with a blue sapphire in the mouth. Horace held up the necklace and gave a look of confusion. “A necklace?” “That necklace contains an amulet associated with the Egyptian god of mummification, Anubis. Once your ex-wife puts on the necklace, the effects can never be reversed.” Horace gave an evil smirk. “That’s just the kind of thing that I love to hear.” Horace then walked out with the necklace as the skull realized something. “Hey!” the skull yelled. “Wait a minute! He didn’t pay!”

It wasn’t long before Horace went to work. At that moment, Jacqueline was getting her coat as she prepared to pick up her daughter Abigail from school. However, as she opened the door, she found a strange package. Jacqueline looked down in confusion before she picked up and opened the box. Inside the box was the amulet and a note. Jacqueline opened the note and read it loud and clear. “Consider this a peace offering. Horace.” Jacqueline held up the necklace and looked at it in curiosity. “Huh,” said Jacqueline. “It looks nice.” Jacqueline put on the necklace and it let out a flash of light. “I have to say,” said Jacqueline to herself. “Horace has good taste. He might finally be doing something right. I just hope this necklace wasn’t stolen. As Jacqueline walked away, her shadow briefly turned into that of an obese laughing humanoid jackal that gave a sinister cackle.

However, Jacqueline was blissfully unaware as she got into her car to run and pick up her daughter.

“Medusa was one of the three gorgon sisters. She was the only mortal gorgon of the sister. She was originally a beautiful woman who made the grave mistake of having sex with the ocean god Poseidon in the temple of Athena. The enraged goddess transformed Medusa into a horrible creature, a creature with poisonous snakes for hair who would turn anyone who looked her in the eye into stone. A hero called Perseus was sent by the wicked King Polydectes to fetch the head of this beast. Perseus used Athena’s mirrored shield to be able to face the gorgon without being petrified and lopped off Medusa’s head. Oh my. What a horrifying story.”

With that, Barbara closed the book on Greek mythology that she was reading and put it to the side as she continued to soak in the tub. The 6’ 10” blonde had been resorting to a medicinal bath to cure cramps in her legs she had been developing lately. She had recently found out that she had Greek ancestry and had been brushing up on Greek mythology. However, the myths that the young woman read had her slightly curious. “I wonder,” she said as she added some more bath salts. “Maybe there’s some truth to these myths. I wonder if the monsters of mythology actually existed at one point.” Barbara was a deep thinker. She was always asking questions. Something that drove her husband up the wall. I took a few days off from work just to see if we could save our marriage and he has to work late. There just hasn’t been any excitement lately. If only real life was as interesting as mythology. Maybe he’s been avoiding me because my legs have been sore. Come to think about it, my eyes have been killing me lately as well. I might just have to see the eye doctor.” Barbara just let out a yawn, but what she didn’t notice was that her tongue was forked, just like that of a snake. But that was the least of her worries. For one, she was now 11’ tall and she was now very obese, she would likely weigh 900lbs. But that was nothing compared to below her waist. Her feet had transformed into the tail of a puff adder, a type of poisonous African snake. Barbara was unaware of the transformation as she slithered down the hallway and down the stairs. With every inch, she became bigger and more obese, to the point that the floor was cracking underneath her serpentine tail, all while she was completely unaware of what was happening with her body.

"Face it, Eric! The bitch is dead weight! She's holding us back! She doesn't even look the part." "She's the manager, Matt!" yelled Eric. "She's not..." "How are we going to be taken serious as a rock band with that pig on the tour."

Kelly now was madder than ever as she looked at her chubby stomach and she was going to go after Matt but Nick stopped her. "Don't. He's not worth it. Besides, your man Eric is defending you." "I don't need my boyfriend to defend me, all the time," snapped Kelly back. "I'll prove to that idiot that I belong in this band."

Later, when everyone else was asleep, Kelly walked downtown. "I know what," she said. "I'll get a tattoo. A big one that says I'm all about heavy metal." Kelly looked down and saw a strange shop that looked like a tattoo parlor but on the top of the building looked like a witch's hat. As Kelly walked inside, she saw that the artist appeared to have tattoos of bones painted all over his body and appeared to be wearing nothing but a white speedo and a pair of dark glasses as he was watching a ballgame on the television. The skeleton man turned to see Kelly and adjusted his glasses slightly.

"Excuse me," said Kelly. "Are you open." The skeleton man walked up towards Kelly and rubbed his chin. He pressed his hands against the chubby manager's cheeks and then let out a deep breath. "I can hear your thoughts," he said. "There is somebody who plagues you like a demon." "That's kinds strong," said Kelly. "I mean Matt is a jerk and all but I wouldn't call him a demon. Look, I'd like a tattoo. Something that yells out "heavy metal". The skeleton man nodded his head. "You have three choices tonight," he said. "Bat, spider or cobra." "Cobra," said Kelly. "Definitely cobra."

The skeleton man took out his needles and ink as Kelly laid down on her back. "First," said the skeleton tattooed man. "The tail." The skeleton man worked his needles as her etched the tail of the snake into Kelly's leg, belly and shoulder. Kelly grunted in pain from the needles but she swallowed her pain. "And now," said the skeleton man as he continued to paint the scales. "The head." The skeleton etched the head of the cobra tattooed and its bloody fangs on Kelly's back. Once the tattooing process was over, Kelly looked all over her body in the mirror. "Oh my gosh," she said. "It almost looks alive. You're awesome, dude. How much do I owe you." The skeleton man shook his head. "You don't have to pay. This demon that plagues you will pay, soon enough."

Kelly had no idea what the man meant but she didn't think much of it and then she walked away out of the shop. What she didn't know was that the tattoo parlor seemed to be slowly vanishing away. Once Kelly had left, the man with the skeleton tattoos took off his sunglasses and revealed that beneath there wasn't a pair of eyes. What Kelly didn't know was that the cobra tattoo was hissing on her back as its eyes glowed and scales were growing all over her back.
112231212.title: The Lady with the Cobra Tattoo

1122312121.content:
Kelly strolled through the hotel's revolving door with a cocky grin, heading straight for the elevator to her floor. With each step she took, her stomach jiggled slightly as it puffed out further than before, and to boot she'd gained a few inches in height.

"Hey, guys, I'm back!" She announced loudly as she stepped back into their room, Matt cringing at her voice.

"Hey, babe. Where'd you go off to?" Eric asked.

"Well, I just felt that my presence here on the band wasn't really 'metal' enough for our style, so I just ran a quick errand."

Immediately a guilty look passed Eric's face as he stood up from the couch.

"Hey, Kelly, listen. You're just fine for the band, we don't want you to change for us!"

"Yeah, Kelly, you're cool just the way you are!" Nick added. Matt, of course, remained silent.

"Ah, thanks, guys! But still, I thought what I got might really give us an edge we need."

"What'd you get?"

"A tattoo!" She announced, which caught Matt's attention.

"You got inked?" Matt snickered. "Damn, whad'ya get!"

"Check it!" She boasted a she lifted her shirt for Matt to see.

"WHAT…THE…FUCK…" He stammered, a look of pure horror on his face.

"What? It's just a…" But as Kelly looked down at her (still growing) stomach, she was dead silent as she saw that her tattoo was gone, in its place an array of light tan scales. Her pants button finally burst apart as her stomach bulged out, now over 300 pounds heavy and quickly growing.

The other three watched in stupefied horror as the scales grew along the rest of Kelly's body, her head stretching until it formed a snake-like anatomy, sharp flaps of brown-scaled skin stretching out from either side.

Kelly's body continued to inflate like a balloon, her clothing torn apart as they stretched beyond their limit around her expanding girth. Her legs grew so wide that they started to fuse together, and even started to recede as a gigantic, fat tale began to sprout from her behind.

She also grew in height, stretching upwards foot by foot as she blossomed with fat. As she grew larger and fatter, her tale grew longer and fatter, laying behind her like an overinflated blimp. With her growth she looked less human and more like the serpent that had been imprinted on her body.

Finally, as her growth slowly spurted to a stop, Kelly reached over ten feet in height, reaching the ceiling. Her giant, tan belly was so huge that it was almost as wide and stuck out eight feet from her, her balloon-like breasts laying on top. The tail that laid behind her was almost twenty feet long as it was folded against the room behind her, and over eight feet wide.

Dazed, but still conscious, Kelly looked down her fat arm and the scales it was adorned with, slowly taking in her transformation. Its scales were dark brown as the rest of her back was, painted with intricate black markings traveling down her body.
1122312121.title: Go with this Storyline

choices: She Swallows Him Whole and Alive
11223121213.content:
Kelly hissed and extended her new forked tongue, terrifying her boyfriend and his friends with her enormous poison fangs. "This... this is not happening... this is not happening," said Eric. "What the hell kind of tattoo turns you into a five ton poisonous snake." The cobra girl looked at her fat scaly arms and saw that her hands now ended in claws. She felt her large stomach and then heard it growl loudly.

"That doesn't sound good." Said Nick. Kelly then let out a malicious sounding laugh. "Well, well, a gal could get used to a body like this. There's just one problem. I'm starving." Kelly let out a hiss and licked her fangs before turning to the band. "Uh, Nick," said Matt as he stepped back, noticing that Kelly was smiling at him menacingly. "What do cobras eat?" Kelly slithered up to Matt as she patted her stomach. "Anything smaller than they are," said Nick in fear. "From her markings, she's a king cobra." "Queen cobra." Said Kelly correcting him. "They'll even eat other cobras." Said Nick.

Kelly let out an evil laugh as she cornered Matt. "Kelly," said Eric in worry. "Baby. What are you doing?" "Oh," said Kelly. "Just settling the score with some misogynistic creep who has been treating me like a parasite while I've been working my ass, which I no longer have, off, putting Toxic Nightshade I'm the map. If anything, I'm more a part of this band than you are Matt." Matt was sweating bullets as Kelly licked him with her giant forked tongue.

"Please don't," said Matt. "I was just kidding. All those fat bitch comments, they were a joke. Don't eat me Kelly." "Oh," said Kelly with a hiss. "I'm going to eat you and your screams as your bones dissolve in my stomach." Kelly opened her mouth wide and Matt let out a scream. This ten foot tall and twenty foot long and growing snake girl could easily swallow three full grown people whole."

Nick and Eric looked in fear. But would Kelly really eat Matt?
11223121213.title: Snake Bite

choices: They go get her some food.
112231212131.content:
"C-C'mon, Kelly, let's talk about this! Please don't eat me!" The terrified bassist whimpered as Kelly dangled him by his ankle, the other two watching in frozen horror as she held him above her head and opened her fanged mouth wide, ready to swallow him whole.

"NONONONONO NO!!!" Matt cried as he covered his face with his hands, preparing for his demise.

"*URP!*" Kelly belched loudly in his face.

Slowly, Matt uncovered his face to see Kelly looking at him with a smug grin.

"Gotcha!" She giggled before she dropped him on her belly, sending him rolling back on the ground. The other two stopped holding their breaths, (just slightly) relieved to see him let go.

"Man, you should've seen the looks on your faces!" She laughed. "You totally fell for it!"

"Well, what else can we expect when you turn into a giant snake-thing right in front of us!?" Eric rebutted.

"Ah come on, guy's we're still cool! I'm not gonna rampage the city, or anything." She exclaimed as she stroked her gigantic belly, admiring its size. "…in fact, this feels pretty cool!"

"Kelly, are…are you alright?!" Nick asked fearfully. "What the hell happened to you?!"

"I dunno…must've been that weird tattoo that guy gave me. But whatever it is, I'm kinda liken' it!"

"H-How do you feel?"

"Not that different, actually. But one's thing's for sure, I am pretty damn hungry."

"Kelly, listen to me! THis is serious!"

"The only thing serious here is my need for a burger. Mind getting me some chow, boys?"

"Yes! As a matter of fact, we do!"

"Fine! Guess I'll have to get some myself."

"Kelly, you can't go out like this! You'll cause all kinds of panic!"

"Come on, I'm not gonna kill anybody, or anything! Just get some dinner!"
112231212131.title: She's Kidding - But Still Hungry

choices: "I could make an awesome addition to the band!"
"I think I should be calling the shots around here, now."
1122312121311.content:
"Kelly, how would we even be able to pay for your food?!"

"Here." Kelly reached into the breast pocket of what remained of her shirt and tossed Eric her wallet. "I've got a ton of cash on my card!"

The three looked at each other uneasily, Matt the most flustered by everything that's just happened. As terrifying as this whole experience was, they had to admit they had no choice between letting her loose or getting the food themselves.

"…alright. We'll do it." Eric sighed.

"Thank you, sweetie." Kelly replied sweetly. "But hurry, I'm starving!"

The three were dead silent as they walked through the hotel, not making eye contact with anybody they passed on their route outside.

…..


Four three hours the three drove around the entire city in their van, stopping at every single fast food joint they saw. None of them dared say a word, aside from asking the clerk for an order disguised as one to feed each, which they would instead toss into the back. The pile of junk food they'd gathered growing so tall that it nearly touched the ceiling. It was only when it just started weighing them down that it was midnight, and they'd spent the last of what was on Kelly's card.

They parked out the back where a service elevator lay, and to be convenient a box of plastic trash bags sat near. The three tried to be as quick and discrete as possible as they filled up six bags to the brim.

At their floor, Eric was relieved to see that the hall was devoid of any destruction, the door to their room still intact.

Please still be there. He begged in his head. Please still be there please still be there please still be there please still be there please still be there

He swiped his key card through the lock and opened the door to see that Kelly was still there watching TV, of course still a monstrously obese, giant snake woman.

"There you guys are! For a moment, I thought you'd skipped out on me!"

"Here you go, Kelly…" Eric and the other two tossed the bags into a pile on Kelly's right side, the top one she ripped open. She licked her lips with her forked tongue as she grabbed a large handful from inside and stuffed it into her mouth, devouring it quickly.

The three watched her eat a few more handfuls uneasily till Eric gave them both a nudge and motioned for the bathroom, leaving Kelly alone as they gathered inside and shut the door.

"ARE WE GOING CRAZY?!!" Nick whispered loudly. "IS THIS REALLY HAPPENING!??!"

"THIS IS ALL YOUR FAULT!!!" Mat hissed at Eric.

"MY FAULT? HOW IS THIS MY FAULT?!!?"

"IF YOU DIDN'T LET YOUR GIRLFRIEND FOLLOW US WHEREVER WE WENT AND JOIN THE BAND, THIS WOULD NEVER HAVE HAPPENED!!!"

"Oh, REALLY? IF YOU TOOK THE TIME TO ACT NICE TO HER RATHER THAN INSULT HER EVERY CHANCE YOU GOT, SHE WOULDN'T HAVE WANTED TO GET A TATTOO!!!"

"GUYS, SHUT UP!!!" Nick snarled in a hused tone. "It doesn't matter if it's anybody's fault or not. What's important is how we handle this whole thing!"

"…and tell me, how are we supposed to handle this?" Nick countered.

"Well…I guess…" Eric began. "…I think we should just hang out with Kelly, see how she's dealing with this, and if she's still the same girl, then…we'll just..have a big talk, the four of us."

"Talk about what? And what if she's a psycho?"

"I…I have no idea."

"…it's the best we got." Nick noted.

The three were silent as the looked at each other's faces assessing their options till Eric sighed and walked out the door.

Kelly had eaten so quickly that she'd finished the second bag when they got out, but her appetite was unhampered as she grabbed the next bag and tore straight through, greedily devouring its contents. Eric walked up to her side, but could barely see her over her obese sides, far outmatching his build.

"So, Kelly…"

"Yeah, Eric?"

"…how're you feeling?"

"Just great! I'd actually been doing a lot of thinking while you guys were gone."

"Thinking? Of what?"
1122312121311.title: They go get her some food.

11223121213111.content:
Kelly gave a hiss and flickered her forked tongue as she smiled. "I've been thinking that perhaps I can make an awesome addition to the band." The boys were all rather shocked to hear that proposal. "Are you ****ing kidding?!" asked Matt in outrage. "There's no room in Toxic Nightshade for a skirt! You're out of your mind if..." Nick then slapped Matt in the face for his comment. "Shut up. This is your fault to begin with." Kelly hissed and wrapped her obese coils around Eric as she then hissed and stroked her boyfriend with her forked tongue. “I’ve been going out and practicing my lyrics. Don’t you think I’d have what it takes? After all, since some people think I haven’t been doing a good job as manager, I figure that perhaps I’d take immediately action in order to shut them up.” Matt became really mad at that comment, but he knew that arguing with a cobra bigger than a trailer would be a terrible idea.

  Of course, Eric noticed a rather obvious problem. “That might have been a good idea back when you were human. But how exactly are we going to explain a giant obese cobra?” Kelly just let out a scoff. “Hello? Other metal bands use animatronics. You don’t have to tell people that I’m a real cobra.” Nick actually rubbed his chin. “That’s a good point, Eric,” he said. “After all, we’re gonna need some way to explain her since she’s probably going to get too big for us to hide eventually.” “Have you guys gone insane?” asked Matt. “We can’t have a giant poisonous reptile following us everywhere we go. How do we know you won’t eat anyone, you oversized handbag?”

Kelly just gave a hiss at Matt and stretched her head in front of her antagonist. “I would shut your trap if I were you,” said Kelly. “I have put up with you badmouthing me for long enough. Just remember, you are mainly the reason that this is happening, so I would appreciate it if you for once in your life treated me like a human being.” Kelly even slapped Matt in the back with her tail. Matt grit his teeth. “I wonder if there’s some place where I could find a 10 ton mongoose.” He thought to himself.

Eric and Nick were actually thinking the matter over. “Don’t tell me that you’re actually going to listen to her,” moaned Matt. “What if people find out that she isn’t animatronic. Then where will we be. That girl is...” Eric then grabbed Matt by the shirt collar. “Matt,” said Eric. “If you hadn’t goaded her she wouldn’t have done this to herself in the first place.” “Well how was I supposed to know that she’d run to a cursed tattoo store. How was I supposed to know we’d be dealing with a snake that looks like she swallowed 8 sumo wrestlers.” Nick just shook his head. “Nothing ever changes.” He complained to himself. But that was when Eric decided to give Matt an ultimatum. “You WILL be nice to my girlfriend, or so help me, I’m kicking you out of Toxic Nightshade.” Matt mumbled to himself. Things were clearly not getting any better.

Eric then turned to face his serpentine lover as she swallowed an entire roast chicken. “I hope that you know what you’re doing, Babe,” said Eric. “But it sounds like a good idea.” Kelly stretched out her obese neck to kiss her boyfriend before she stretched out her tail to pick up her phone. “Don’t worry, you won’t regret this.”

The boys were standing out of the doorway trying to make heads or tails of this situation. “I have an idea,” said Nick. “Why don’t we trick Kelly into eating three jars of jalapeños to get her to breathe fire when we’re on stage? I bet it would be awesome” “That only works in cartoons, Nick,” said Eric. “And besides, Kelly hates jalapeños. Although that grayish brown shade could do with a little paint. Maybe deck her out with purple flames and perhaps a skull on the back of her hood. “Do you guys even hear yourselves speaking?” asked Matt. “You’re trying to trick out a giant fat snake.” “For once, you’re right,” said Eric. “Kelly’s my girlfriend. We can’t treat her like a prop.” “It was her idea,” said Nick. “You know that. Besides, think of it as makeup.”

 At that moment, Kelly was on the phone booking the boys’ next gig. “Kelly?” asked the producer on the phone. “Are you feeling okay. What’s with the lisp.” “Nevermind that,” said Kelly as she flickered her snake’s tongue. “Toxic Nightshade just got a new act, one that is going to knock the crowds dead. As Kelly was speaking, there was a fly buzzing overhead that she then chomped on and swallowed before resuming speaking. “Thanks. Don’t worry. They’ll be there.” The band then walked in and Kelly smiled and flickered her tongue. “Good news,” she said. “I just got us a gig.”
11223121213111.title: Snake Happens

1122312122.content:
How he managed to go uncaught for years was quite a feat but there was next to nothing that Right-Hand Ronan couldn't steal. Interpol was hot on his trail but nobody ever succeeded in capturing him, especially because most of the items that he stole were rather bizarre. This very night, he was meeting with his fence girlfriend, Tiffany.

The blonde was wearing her white coat as she poured a bottle of red wine. She was waiting for Ronan because she heard that he had captured something rather interesting. Before Tiffany could drink a single sip, she heard a knock at her door. Tiffany took out a gun as she approached the door, just in case it was the cops knocking. She opened the door to see Ronan's smiling face. "Tiffany, baby, have I got a score for you."

Tiffany let out a sigh and let her boyfriend in. "The master thief returns." She said. "Try, king of thieves," said Ronan. "And I've got something your customers in the underworld will pay through the nose for." Tiffany shook her head. "I hope you're right. I barely got anything from that painting you stole." "What? It was the Mona Freakin' Lisa." "It was a counterfeit copy, Ronan. Somebody else beat you to the punch. What you stole was a knockoff. "Pick, pick, pick," said Ronan. "The last few prizes made up for it. I stole the Klopman Diamond and you turned it into the Klopman Diamonds, plural. No way to trace them."

Tiffany let out a sigh. While Ronan was a screwup he did provide her with merchandise to auction off to the highest paying bidder, illegally of course. "Alright, Ronan, what's on the market this time." Ronan reached out of his pocket and took the protective wrapping off his prize to reveal that it was the paw of some manner of monkey. Tiffany could only look in disbelief. "A monkey's paw? Are you serious." "Mandrill's paw actually," said Ronan. "It was a big monkey. The shopkeeper said it had magic powers."

Tiffany just slapped herself in the face, pretty sure that the mandrill's paw was worthless. "Sorry, dear," she said. "The loins sleep tonight." Ronan shrugged his shoulders and walked away as Tiffany took the paw into the next room to get a closer look at it. "Master thief," she said with a scoff. "If I didn't have such a bad heel, I'd accompany him and show him how it's done. Ouch!" Tiffany dropped the paw because she could've sworn that one of the fingernails hurt her. "He could've at least cut the nails before he handed it to me." She said. Oh, well. Better hit the sack.

As Tiffany put down the paw and took off her clothes, she failed to see that her rear end was not only expanding but it was turning bright blue and pink as well.

(Note: In case you're wondering, lwut, this is a mandrill http://wierdnwildcreatures.wikia.com/wik...)
1122312122.title: The Mandrill's Paw

choices: Tiffany Keeps it to Herself For Now
11223121221.content:
As Tiffany laid in bed, she was having a nightmare. She was panting in bed because her nightmare was something rather fierce. In Tiffany's dream, she imagined herself as a fat giantess climbing the Empire State building as planes shot at her. Tiffany shrieked in her nightmare as bullets pierced her skirt and made her bleed slightly. "No!" she yelled. "No! Leave me alone! I can't die like this! No!" As Tiffany was yelling, her screaming quickly turned into monkey-like shrieks. She was even forced to grab herself by the throat before she was shot in the foot and yelled right before she fell off the building.

The next scene in the nightmare depicted Tiffany chained by her limbs as she tried to shake free. Then she saw several monkeys and apes the size of ants come and take a look at her and some even took photographs as she screamed. There was even one mandrill wearing a circus barker's outfit. "Here she is," said the barker mandrill. "The 8th Wonder of the world." Tiffany screamed and tried to shake free as monkeys took photographs of her and one orangutan even threw a banana peel at her.

It was at that moment, Tiffany woke up panting and held her chest. She spotted the mandrill's paw that Ronan gave her to sell and grunted. She then took out a knife and used it to destroy the paw before throwing it in the trash. "Ugly thing," she muttered. "Ronan and his weird junk." Tiffany hadn't noticed it as she walked into the bathroom, but she had gotten much fatter and had to weigh at least 300lbs and her butt cheeks were glowing an even brighter shade of pink than before.

The blonde fence took severals handfuls of water from the sink and splashed the water in her face. "Damn Ronan," she said. "I used to think he was a master thief but he keeps bringing back worthless junk. First he stole a ruby lightbulb and then he tried to steal an ammonite fossil and that so-called readymade work of art. It was a damned urinal with somebody's name written on it for crying out loud! It's been a downhill spiral ever since, but this is the straw that broke the camel's back. I'm really glad I got rid of that mandrill's paw. Who in their right mind would want to buy that? I couldn't even give that thing away at the auction."

Tiffany then sighed and she then threw a couple of aspirins into her mouth before she drank a glass of water in order to swallow the aspirins more easily before she let out a gasp and then wiped her mouth. "Look at me," she said. "Here I am, selling stolen goods for a living. Being a fence in Boston only gets you so far. I wish I could be a real crime lord. Then everyone will give me the respect I deserve." Tiffany clenched her hand into a fist. "But alas, here I am, relying on the so-called master thief. I'd give anything to..." Suddenly Tiffany clutched her chest and yelled in pain.

As Tiffany panted, she looked into the mirror to see that her teeth had turned into sharp fangs and then gasped because her nose tun turned bright red while the sides of her face turned bright blue. Her blonde hair grew longer as blondish brown fur started to grow all over her body. Tiffany turned around and then saw that her butt had grown to be 8-feet wide and was bright red. Tiffany shrieked in a surprising monkey tone and then she felt her feet twitching as they turned into a pair of hands. "Oh my!" yelled the blonde criminal.

Tiffany shouted and then tried to run out of the bathroom, only for her butt to get stuck in the doorway. Tiffany grunted and then pushed her way out, tearing off the wall in the process. This was when Tiffany looked around and saw that she had transformed into a 18ft tall and very obese mandrill, a type of large West African Baboon. She had huge D-cup breasts, a 20ft wide booty, a 17ft wide belly and three chins. Tiffany felt around her body and was shocked at the animal she had become.

But after she got over the initial shock of turning into a large baboon with a colorful butt, she gave a scowl and a very evil smile. "This might not be so bad," she said. "For some reason, I feel stronger. Guess that mandrill's paw wasn't so useless after all." Tiffany gave an evil laugh. "Say, if I play my cards right, I could be the Queen Kong crime boss of Boston." Tiffany let out a laugh as she shook her booty and showed her sharp teeth.

It would appear that the criminal blonde has found the power to become a feared criminal mastermind. But should she let Ronan in on this? After all, he was the one who found the paw that mutated her.
11223121221.title: One Big Baboon

11223121222.content:
Everybody knows that genetic manipulation has all too many possibilities to go wrong. One experimental procedure went horribly wrong for one female scientist who thought she could mess in the domain of mother nature. Her name was Grace Keeler and she was working on a secret project for the navy. She was pouring some kind of strange chemical into a syringe. "Now," she said. "If this succeeds, the navy will have the ultimate soldiers. Creatures that could survive underwater for hours and in the most frigid temperatures."

Grace poured in some more chemicals right before she closed the syringe. "Here it is," she said. "Made through use of a super steroid and killer whale estrogen. First I'll put this away before finding a test subject to make sure it works. It has to be cooled in order to stabilize it before..." Before Grace finished her sentence, she heard a loud beeping noise and accidentally tossed the syringe in the air as she yelled. She turned around and groaned because the syringe she tossed landed and pierced her left butt cheek. Without even thinking, Grace took out the syringe and put it in the fridge, failing to notice that it already injected her with everything inside of it.

Grace went to the window to see that her fiancé Todd was waiting for her in his truck. "Hey, beautiful, you off work yet?" Grace just smiled. "I'm just putting something away Todd. I'll be down in a few minutes." "Well hurry up, Grace," said Todd. "The movie starts in fifteen minutes."

Grace shrugged her shoulders and walked downstairs to go out with her boyfriend unaware that she was about to have a killer whale of a time.
11223121222.title: The Killer Whale In Me

112231212221.content:
Grace rubbed her butt in pain, not aware that she had injected herself with her formula of killer whale estrogen. But she couldn't even think about it at the time, because she and Todd had a date for the movie. Grace got into her fiancé's car as she then kissed Todd in the face before they were driving off to the matinee.

"So how's the project coming along, Gracey?" asked Todd. Grace then let out a sigh. "I think perhaps maybe I've reached the surface." "What is it you're working on?" Grace then looked around to make sure that nobody was there to overhear before whispering into Todd's ear. "What I'm trying to do," she said. "Is to create a steroid that will bring life to the ultimate naval soldier. Soldiers that can swim through the water like they were designed that way by nature, soldiers with superhuman strength, soldiers that could survive the most bitter of cold. So I decided to use estrogen of the most powerful sea animal of them all. Orcinus Orca, the killer whale. I think I might've gotten the formula right this time." Todd then bit his lip. "Have you found a test subject yet to make sure that your formula works?" the young man asked his future wife. "Not yet," said Grace. "I haven't contacted the admiral yet. But I have a feeling I've gotten it right this time. So, what movie are we seeing." "The poster is in the back, Grace." Said Todd.

Grace reached into the back and saw that the movie poster appeared to depict dark red colored viperfish swimming in waters filled with blood. The bottom half of the viperfish monster resembled that of a lizard. "Fishlizard 3D?" asked Grace. "A remake. Oh, Todd." "Fishlizard is my favorite movie," said Todd. "The giant fish mutant from the deep." "I thought they killed him off." "They did," said Todd. "But this is a new Fishlizard. Come on. We can't be late for the movie." Grace let out a sigh before she followed her future husband into the cinema. However, she had some slight trouble getting out the door and then she saw that her stomach seemed to have gotten bigger. "Geez," said the female scientist. "I must've been eating like a whale lately. If I'm not careful someone might try to harpoon me." With that, Grace shrugged her shoulders and entered the cinema.

Todd was getting ready to buy the tickets. "Two tickets for Fishlizard 3D." Todd paid for the tickets and the vendor gave him two tickets and two pairs of 3D glasses." After Todd and Grave put on their glasses, their next step was to get snacks. "Two large Cokes." Said Todd. "And two large popcorns." Todd looked at his girlfriend in surprise and soon they had entered the feature and Grace was carrying what looked like two large pails of popcorn. "What were you thinking, Grace?" asked Todd. "Nobody could possibly eat one of those large popcorns, let alone eat two of them. Grace shrugged her shoulders. What Grace didn't notice (not that Todd seemed to notice either) was that Grace had gotten taller and fatter. She had to be 9-feet tall and weight 800lbs. In fact, when Grace and Todd took their seats in the theater, Grace took up three entire seats. Grace took in a handful of popcorn and then grunted because some jerk from behind her tossed a candy wrapper at her. "Back of the row, Moby Dick!" Grace let out a grunt and Todd turned to face the aggressor. "What's the problem, jerk?" "Your big fat girlfriend is blocking the screen." Grace gave an angry grunt. "I am NOT fat. I have the body of a ballerina." "Yeah, Hyacinth the hippo!" "Ignore him, Gracey," said Todd. "He isn't worth it. Now the movie's starting."

Grace and Todd looked up at the screen and it showed what looked like a very large and very deep ocean and there appeared to be a decayed corpse of a monster that looked similar to the creature in the movie poacher. "Day 21, the search for Owlman, the legendary cryptid has gotten more headway as we take you to Mawnan, in the English county of Cornwall. This creature first seen in 1976, during the same time as Morgawr, the sea serpent is believed to be a large eagle owl that escaped from the zoo. But we all know there is more to it than that. This creature while intimidating, has yet to actually attack anyone. It's time people knew the truth."

That's what Harriet Rowling said in her video blog right before turning her head to her husband, Devon. "I'm not sure why we're doing this, Harriet," said Devon. "This sounds like we're going on a wild goose chase, or more accurately, a wild owl chase." "Devon," said Harriet. "Nobody knows just how long Owlman has really been around or whether or not he is or isn't a malicious being. I intend to find the truth." Devon held his wife in an embrace and lifted her into the air. "Why chase after an Owlman when there's a real man in the RV with you." Harriet let out a laugh.

"Oh, you," she said. "But think about it. This is one of the mysteries that has eluded man for a long time. I'm pretty sure that owl man is watching us as we speak." Devon let out a laugh at that fact, but he wouldn't be laughing long. His wife was right, the terrifying cryptid, Owlman in truth had been watching them. Specifically, the tan skinned British girl with brown-reddish hair and sexy glasses. The owl monster used his fingers to frame Harriet's face before he let out a hoot. Just as Harriet was looking for Owlman, she was the one the owl was looking for.

There were just too problems. She was too small. The monster would've liked his potential mate to dwarf him. The other problem, she wasn't an owl. But Owlman knew a way to solve both problems. He rubbed his hands and squawked and then he flew off to his lair where he begun to concoct a strange potion out of herbs and magic spices and even some of his own feathers.

Once the concoction was ready, the bird creature let out a hooting laugh as he rubbed his taloned and winged hands.

Is he Jack the Ripper come back with a new motif? Is he an escaped lab animal or is he a demon or some sort? Is Owlman really supernatural. Hopefully, after 21 days, we will be able to put this mystery to bed once and for all." Devon rolled his eyes at his wife's words. He knew that marrying a cryptozoologist would come with many new and very weird experiences, but this one was a new one.

"The reason we bring cameras with us," said Harriet. "Is because it is said that although Owlman doesn't appear to be malicious, it's a known fact that encounters with this beast leave the victims unable to speak for days out of pure fear. Of course, I am not afraid of Owlman. Though, a cryptozoologist never takes any chances."
