There was just no reasoning with Veronica when she got this drunk.

Veronica then felt her stomach rumbling. “Oh my,” she said. “Looks like vodka and sake are two great tastes that don’t really go well with each other.” Veronica heard her stomach rumble again. “Oh,” said Veronica. “What did I drink? That new beer really isn’t sitting well.” “That’s because it wasn’t beer, you drunken idiot,” said Victor. “That was primordial ooze, an untested and mysterious slime from when dinosaurs walked the Earth.” “Oh well,” said Veronica with a loud hiccup. “They say good alcohol gets better with age.” Victor slapped himself in the face and shook his head. Then he heard a crashing sound. Veronica had collapsed to the ground and Victor let out a sigh. “This is the part that I always hate.” Victor then bent over to try and pick his drunken girlfriend up. Then Victor gave a moan. “Geez,” he said. “Has she been putting on weight or something. What’s going on?”

As Victor held up Veronica, he grunted because she seemed to be getting heavier and heavier. “What the?” asked Victor. That was when Victor saw that Veronica’s ass had expanded to the width of a bus and her belly had gotten bigger as well, to the point where Victor had no choice but to drop his girlfriend. Veronica’s skin had changed colors, Her back had become grayish blue and her belly and front neck along with her face had turned bright yellow as a giant red crest sprouted out of her forehead. Veronica moaned and then stood up to reveal she was three times as tall as Victor and her cargo pants had shrunken to a thong and her thighs got bigger. Veronica let out a yawn and then she sprouted a very long tail while her neck stretched out and her face turned into a snout while her teeth turned sharp. Victor stepped back as Veronica stumbled drunkenly down the street and then he looked to see that his girlfriend had somehow mutated into a humanoid brachiosaurus. “The ooze!” yelled Victor.

With each step, Veronica got bigger and fatter and would no doubt weigh 1000lbs if she wasn’t currently 80ft high (not counting her neck). “I can’t believe it,” said Victor. “My girlfriend is a dinosaur. I just hope she isn’t still drunk or we’re in big trouble. Is Veronica still drunk?
1122312122222222222221.title: When Dinosaurs Get Drunk

1122312122222222222222.content:
“Selene,” said Phillip. “Please think this over.” But Selene wasn’t heeding her husband’s warning as she put her jacket on. “I’ve made up my mind, Phillip,” said Phillip. “I’ve already joined the volunteer fire squad.” Phillip let out a sigh. “Of all the times for the real firefighters to go on strike.” Selene then put on her boots. “Real fires don’t go on strike, Phillip. Besides. I’m sick of being the quiet, stay-at-home housewife. I’m going to be kicking butt and saving lives.” Phillip and Selene’s pet Dalmatian dog came in and barked as he waved his tail and rubbed his head against Selene. Selene smiled and then petted the dog on the head. “Don’t worry Wildfire,” she said. “Everything will be alright. What can happen? And you don’t worry either, Phillip. I’m perfectly capable of taking care of myself.” Of course, Phillip wasn’t one-hundred percent sure of that and gulped. “I hope so.” He said. With that, Selene kissed her husband and went out to walk to the firehouse.

As soon as Selene reached the firehouse, she heard sirens blaring and the fire chief spotted her. “Mrs. Strange,” he said. “Better late than never.” “What’s wrong?” asked Selene. “A big fire broke out at S.K.Y. Labs. We need everyone we can get.” Selene climbed up the fire truck as it was driving off. Selene knew that S.K.Y. Labs was a hi-tech laboratory that conducted all sorts of strange inventions. If a fire broke out in there, it would no doubt be trouble. She let out a gulp. “I guess my first day is a trial by fire.” Selene gave a nervous laugh at her own joke.

Soon the fire squad arrived at S.K.Y. labs and immediately held out their hoses to try and put out the fire raging intensely. Selene ran in and used the hatchet to break through the door as she led several of the staff out. “This way!” she yelled. One female assistant ran forward and up to Selene. “You have to help us! It’s Professor Blum. He’s trapped in room 13B.” “Don’t worry,’ said Selene. “That’s what I’m here for. As Selene came in, smoke billowed out of the laboratory and she had to duck to avoid breathing it in and crawled across the floor. It was there, she spotted room 13B. The door was stuck so Selene had to kick it down. Professor Blum was barely conscious on the ground and there was smoke in the air with flames all around. “Hang on, Professor,” said Selene. “I’ll get you out of there.”

As Selene ran up and grabbed the scientist, a shelf behind her burned to a crisp and dropped several vials that leaked strange chemicals all over the firewoman. However, Selene had to get Professor Blum out of the lab before she could even realize that she had been splashed with unknown substances. Once Selene got the Professor to safety, her fellow firefighters had doused S.K.Y. Labs with their firehoses and had completely put out the fire. Professor Blum woke up and coughed as he looked at Selene. “Don’t worry, Professor,” said Selene. “You’re in good hands.” Professor Blum smiled at Selene. “You are a very brave firewoman,” he said. “Have you been working at the station long?” Selene shook her head. “It’s my first day.”  What nobody noticed, (not even Selene herself), was that there were several black spots appearing on the back of Selene’s neck.
1122312122222222222222.title: Firehouse Tails

choices: Continue Through Selene's P.O.V. at the Scene of the Fire
Switch to Phillip Watching Selene's Rescue on the New
11223121222222222222221.content:
After the lab fire was put out, Selene had a handsfree device on and was speaking with Phillip on her phone as she drove the fire truck down the street. “So, you’re stuck taking the engine to the car wash?” asked Phillip. Selene just let out a sigh. “It did get rather dirty with all that smoke and dust. You should’ve seen the fire at S.K.Y. Labs. I think some chemicals exploded or maybe an electric wire went haywire.” “Oh dear,” said Phillip. “Are you alright?” Selene let out a laugh. “Everything is fine. You are so paranoid, Phillip. I can handle anything. That’s why I signed up for this job in the first place.” Phillip just let out a sigh at his wife’s words. “Well, I knew you were stubborn when I married you.” Selene just let out a giggle.

As Selene was speaking with Phillip, black spots were appearing all over her body, starting with her hand and then spreading all the way around her body from her face to on her rear. Speaking of which, Selene’s butt started to expand as her pants were coming off. Selene heard the ripping noise and grunted. She then turned around and saw her expanding ass. “What the?” she asked. As Selene tried to pull over, she felt her belly growing as well and screamed before she stopped the firetruck and tried to get out of it. However, she instantly got stuck and grunted due to her large behind. “Great.” Groaned Selene. Then Selene yelled again because from the looks of it, she was growing white fur and had sprouted a tail. She then felt her ears become floppier and her nose stretched into a snout. “Selene?” asked Phillip on the phone. “What’s going on there?” “I don’t know!” yelled Selene to her husband. Selene then growled as she hear a crashing sound.
 When Selene looked back, she saw that her massive ass had completely destroyed the fire truck from the inside. Selene grunted and then she saw that her pants had shrunk to a thong that might as well have been dental floss on her booty and her boots were coming apart as well as her jacket. Selene’s fire helmet fell off of her head and she accidentally crushed it beneath her foot. Selene let out a yip as what was left of her clothes were completely torn off. The only thing left was the wedding ring on her finger. Selene looked in shock because she had turned into an obese 35ft high anthropomorphic dalmatian. “Holy smokes!” yelled Selene. “I’m huge! What the... how did... Oh my gosh! Something from that lab must’ve mutated me!”

Before Selene could think any further on the issues, she heard a loud smoke detector go off and she saw black smoke in the distance. “Damn!” yelled the Dalmatian giantess. Even in her transformed state, Selene was still a volunteer firefighter and there was absolutely no way that she could just sit back and ignore a fire going on. So, as fast as she could, the titanic dog begun to run and waddle towards the fire, shaking up the city as she went to put it out. “This is definitely not what I signed up for.” Said Selene as she ran down the street. Down the street at the time, there was a man walking out of his apartment veranda in his underwear. “At last,” he said. “I’m finally cured of my irrational fear that a Dalmatian will see me in my underwear.” At that moment, Selene ran by and the man looked startled to see her and nervously backed back into his apartment.
11223121222222222222221.title: Seeing Spots

choices: Phillip Picks Up the Phone to Call the Firehouse
Selene Comes Home and Opens the Roof
112231212222222222222212.content:
At that time, Phillip was at home stroking Wildfire by the head. He was worried and his dog knew it and even barked. "I'm worried too, Wildfire," said Phillip. "Something must've happened for Selene to hang up. I heard a crashing sound. That's it, I'm calling an ambulance. She might be hurt. Oh, why did she take that volunteer firefighting job." As Phillip ran up to the telephone to call the hospital, there was a sudden news report on the television.

"We interrupt this program to bring you an emergency news report. Not even half an hour ago, a massive fire broke out at the Free Lark apartment building when an improperly put together furnace blew and set the apartment ablaze." Phillip just continued to dial on the telephone as the reporter continued. We have word that the volunteer firefighters will be delayed as their firetruck has mysteriously disappeared."

On the television there appeared to be earthquakes and Wildfire sensed them and barked at the television. Phillip looked at the television and gasped as he dropped the phone. There was Selene in her transformed Dalmatian state rushing towards the fire on all fours. At this point her mutation had made the Dalmatian giantess 95-feet tall and had she been normal sized, she would no doubt weigh a few thousand pounds. The reporter looked in surprise herself.

"Wait!" she yelled. "Something is rushing up to the apartment building. It appears to be a giant overweight and strangely well-endowed Dalmatian." Wildfire pointed to the TV and Phillip looked to see that his dog was pointing to the ring on Selene's finger. Phillip immediately was able to recognize his wife and gasped. "Selene?!" he yelled in surprise.

On the television, Selene spotted the burning building and inhaled deeply before blowing on it to weaken the flames. "Wait a minute," said the reporter. "From the looks of it, this giant Dalmatian is trying to put out the fire. Selene then tore into the building to reveal several tenants still trapped inside. She then held out her paw. "Get on!" yelled Selene. Several of the tenants hesitated, but one young girl with a doll was unafraid and walked into Selene's palm. The rest of the tenants followed before Selene took them to safety.

Selene then smelt the fire and knew it was still burning, but she had an idea. Knowing that she had turned into a giant dog, Selene started to dig into the ground and toss dirt all over the burning apartment. The dirt managed to douse the flames and reduce them to smoke. Once the fire was out, Selene gave a smile of pride as onlookers cheered. Phillip could not believe what he was watching at home.

The female reporter at the scene had to fix her jaw before speaking. "Normally, giant monsters appear to cause damage and destruction and yet today we just witnessed one such bizarre creature not only refrain from destroying the city but actually save lives. Just what is this giant Dalmatian and where did it come from." Back home Wildfire let out a growl. "It?" asked Phillip. "That's not an it, that's my wife. Something must've happened in the lab when Selene went to put out that fire. Something had to have happened. A bizarre accident probably mutated her. Oh my gosh. My wife is a giant Dalmatian. She looks like she'd be a more suitable mate for you, Wildfire."

Phillip got up to catch his breath and even clutched his heart at this development. "Okay, Phillip. Calm down. Selene may be a huge and obese dog the size of a building, but she still put out that fire of her own free will. She's still a volunteer firefighter and still my wife. I just need to... oh my gosh. What do I do? This clearly isn't something that happens very often. Calm down, Phillip. Think, think."
112231212222222222222212.title: I Married a Dalmatian

1122312122222222222222122.content:
Before Phillip could think, Wildfire started to bark and the dog stood up. Phillip turned and heard loud rumble before he heard tearing at the roof. "What the?!" he yelled. Phillip looked up to see the roof being ripped off the hinges and the next thing he knew, he saw Selene's smiling, spotted face. The Dalmatian giantess wagged her tail as she looked down at her husband. "Hi, Phillip," she said. "Sorry about the roof." Phillip was dumbfounded at the sight of his enormous wife.

"S-S-Selene!? You just tore the roof off its hinges! Just look at yourself! You're a giant Dalmatian! And you're also fat!" Selene gave a scoff. "Rude." She said. But Selene felt her 150ft wide ass and realized that her husband had a point. "Okay," she said. "So my bones got bigger. Big deal. Speaking of bones, I'm starving." Phillip let out a groan as Wildfire followed him into the kitchen. "This will take a lot of getting used to.

It wasn't long before Phillip was pouring kibble for two dogs; a normal sized dog bowl for Wildfire and a kiddie pool full of kibble for Selene. Both the normal male Dalmatian and the ginormous obese female Dalmatian immediately dug in. "Selene," said Phillip. "You do realize that's dog food you're eating, right?" Selene pulled her head out out of kibble and wiped her chin. "I'll admit," she said. "It's an acquired taste but it doesn't look like I'm going to turn back to normal anytime soon, so I might as well get used to it." Wildfire gave a bark and caused Selene to twitch her ears.

"No thank you," said Selene as she shook her head. "I'm not rolling around on a dead bird. I'm still human on the inside." Phillip gave a look of surprise. "Hold on. You understood Wildfire?" "Well, duh," said Selene. "We're both the same species now. Heck, we're both the same breed." Phillip put his hand against his wife's large cold nose and let out a sigh. "Selene," he said. "Did something unusual happen at S.K.Y. Labs?" Selene wagged her tail and wiggled her ass as she thought about that. "Well," she said. "Some strange chemicals spilled on me and I didn't have time to wash them off." "I knew it!" yelled Phillip. "And you touched Wildfire before you went to the lab. You must've been splashed with some mutagen of some kind that combined with the dog DNA on you and turned you into a big fat mutate."

Selene just went back to her kibble before speaking. "Phillip," she said. "This isn't a comic book. That can't happen?" "Says the woman who turned into a Dalmatian as big as a parade float," said Phillip as he poked his wife in her enormous hip. The giantess just gave a bark and Wildfire barked as well. "Oh really?" asked Selene mockingly as she wiggled her tail. "Is that so, Wildfire?" Phillip's eyes popped out of his head. "What did Wildfire say?" he asked in worry. Selene just smirked tauntingly as she grinned wide and showed her husband teeth that were as big as he was. "Oh nothing. Just some interesting information about your web history." Phillip begun to sweat as Selene panted and played with her own ginormously fat belly. "Don't tell me this isn't a wish come true for you." Selene barked a few times and held out her tongue before she licked her husband all over and made him groan.

In seconds, Phillip was soaked with his wife's saliva and was shivering. "Now I know how Garfield feels." He groaned. But then Phillip's knees twitched because he was actually liking it. He could feel himself getting hard looking at the King Kong-sized canine that was his wife. But before he could put any more thought on that, Selene turned her head and then spotted a plane flying over head. Something came over the ginormous Dalmatian and she gave a bark before she ran on all fours to chase the airplane's shadow.

"Selene!" yelled Phillip. "Selene! What are you doing?!" Wildfire let out a canine whine and rolled his eyes before Phillip grabbed Selene by the tail and found himself dragged along by his wife. Phillip then begun to climb up Selene's huge ass and grabbed hold of her back fat. "Selene! Control yourself!" But Selene didn't pay attention and kept running down the street as the road cracked under her heavy weight. "No good," said Phillip with a sigh. "I forgot that Dalmatians were hard of hearing." Phillip climbed Selene's back only for Selene to stop running and then was tossed into Selene's hair as the Dalmatian girl finally stopped. Selene's white and black-spotted chipmunk-like cheeks turned a shade of pink. "I'm sorry, Phillip," she said. "I don't know what came over me."

Phillip let out a groan and held up his wife's ear. "You're part dog now," said Phillip. "In body and mind. Dogs like to chase. You have to be careful. Let the city get used to having a giant fatass canine before going into any hysterics." Selene nodded her head but then she sniffed the air and her eyes popped because she caught the scent of...
1122312122222222222222122.title: Dog Pounded

11223121222222222222222.content:
Our story begins in a secret military organization in the Mexican countryside where Dr. Salazar, the organization’s top scientist, is looking around. “Where is it?” asked Dr. Salazar. “Where did it go.” General Explicíto walked into the laboratory where the young scientist was looking around. “Dr. Salazar,” said Explicíto. “Por favor, tell me that you have finally decided to put our snake-powered raygun in motion.” Dr. Salazar let out a scoff. “I found your idea to be doomed to failure, General Explicíto,” said the scientist. “So I did my own idea albeit in a similar direction. Project Ophiuchus has managed to escape. If we don’t find that snake, a lot of pesos are down the drain.” Explicíto let out a groan and slapped him in the face. “Tamales verde, Dr. Salazar! Why couldn’t you just settle for the raygun. It’s much easier than that hit and miss genetic engineering.” Dr. Salazar gave a loud scoff. “I went to college. I can’t waste my talents on a stupid raygun that probably won’t even work. Organize the troops. We’ve got a snake to catch.”

Meanwhile, at a nearby farm, the Valencia family was hard at work. Jorge Valencia’s wife, Beatrice, looked surprisingly good for a woman her age and she was going off to harvest corn at that moment while their teenage twins were covering other areas of the farm. Beatrice stopped to see that their daughter, Génesis, the older of the two twins, was wearing boots. “A little hot to be wearing boots, isn’t it Génesis?” “Diego warned me that he saw a snake crawling around, Mama. Better safe than sorry.” Diego, the son of the family was walking by and was getting ready to sheer a sheep. He nodded his head to give his mother the message. Diego wasn’t able to speak but learned how to communicate nonverbally.

 Beatrice got the message and shrugged her shoulders. “Génesis,” she said. “Diego. The thing about rattlesnakes, you don’t bother them and they don’t bother you.” Jorge walked by carrying a hoe. “What are the ninos telling you, Beatrice?” he asked. “They think they saw a rattlesnake, Jorge. But I told them not to worry.” “There isn’t a rattlesnake within miles,” said Jorge. “It’s nothing to get worked up about. But do be careful with the corn.” Jorge and Beatrice kissed before going off to do their respective chores. Beatrice let out a laugh, although Génesis was slightly worried. “Sometimes I wonder about Mama, Diego. She’s so headstrong.” Diego just gestured for his sister not to worry and they both walked off to tend to the sheep.

Beatrice at the time was in the field picking corn and humming to herself when she heard a hissing sound. Beatrice looked to the ground and gasped because buried behind some reeds, there was a rattlesnake’s rattle. Beatrice immediately froze and decided to wait it out as the rattlesnake was moving out. However, unlike normal rattlesnakes, this one was bright black and appeared to have bright red eyes as it let out a hiss. Beatrice was hoping that by not making any sudden moves, the rattlesnake wouldn’t see her as a threat and leave peacefully. Unfortunately for Beatrice, this was not the case. The black rattlesnake spotted the farmer’s wife and hissed before lunging at her as she screamed.

Jorge, Diego and Génesis heard the family matriarch scream and were instantly panicked. “Beatrice!” yelled Jorge. “Mama!” yeleld Diego. The Valencias ran and saw the snake had bit Beatrice and she was on the ground holding her leg in pain as the snake was going to get ready to bit again. However, Jorge took out a gun and shot the snake in the side. The snake hissed and slithered away as the bullet fell out of its skin. Génesis and Diego ran to Beatrice who was weak and panting very heavily from the rattlesnake’s poison. “Génesis!” yelled Jorge. “Diego! Quick! We need to get your mother to the doctor.” Both the Valencia twins picked up their poisoned mother and wasted no time rushing to the truck as Jorge started it and they drove off to the hospital. “Hold on, Beatrice,” said Jorge. “You’re going to be alright.”

It wasn’t long before the Valencias took Beatrice to the hospital and they were waiting for her to make a recovery in the hospital lobby. Diego was biting his nails. “Mama is going to be alright, right Papa?” asked Génesis in concern. Jorge gave a nervous smile. “Génesis,” he said. “Your mother was been stung by scorpions before we were married and she recovered. I’m sure that she’ll pull through.” Diego gave a concerned smile and crossed his fingers. “But that was the biggest rattlesnake I’ve ever seen,” said Génesis. “I’ve never seen a black rattlesnake before. Oh, I hope Mama is gonna be okay.”

Sure enough, Beatrice walked out and her leg was bandaged. Her family was overjoyed and relieved to see her make a recovery. “Mama!” yelled Génesis as she and her brother hugged their mother. Jorge joined in on the hug. “Gracias goodness,” said Jorge. “I’m glad you’re okay, Beatrice.” Beatrice let out a scoff. “What are you all worried about. One anti-venom later, and I’m as good as new.” That’s what Beatrice thought but what she didn’t know was that there was something dangerous in that particular snake’s bite besides venom.
11223121222222222222222.title: Project Ophiuchus

112231212222222222222221.content:
What the Valencias didn’t know was that the black rattlesnake that bit Beatrice had crawled further down into the countryside before it mysteriously expired. Dr. Salazar and General Explicíto had drove up in a jeep and then spotted the rattlesnake. The general parked the car before Dr. Salazar ran and picked up the rattlesnake with a stick. “Oh no,” said Dr. Salazar. “Project Ophiuchus is dead.” “Must’ve died from the heat.” Said General Explicíto. “No, idiota!” yelled Dr. Salazar. “This rattlesnake must’ve bitten somebody.” “Oh my,” said the General. “You want to stop by the morgue to see if we find the unlucky civilian that the snake bit.” “That’s just it. The venom in Project Ophiuchus is a very powerful, very experimental and very irreversible mutagen. My intention was to use Project Ophiuchus to create an army of snake-men. Imagine, soldiers that could survive in extreme heat, move with absolute agility and strike with powerful venom. Unfortunately, I spilled beer all over my notes and can’t recreate the mutagen. Someone bad is going to come of this, something no doubt we’ll be blamed for.” General Explicíto slapped himself in the face. “This is precisely why I only asked you to build a snake-powered raygun. Something that couldn’t possibly go wrong somehow?” Dr. Salazar let out a groan and tossed the dead Project Ophiuchus to the ground.

Back at the Valencia farm the next day, Beatrice was getting ready to collect the eggs from the henhouse when Génesis tried to stop her. “Mama,” she said. “Should you be really going out? I’ll get the eggs for you.” “I appreciate your concern, Génesis,” said Beatrice to her daughter. “But I’m perfectly fine.” “But you were bitten by a rattlesnake yesterday. There could’ve been more of those horrible creatures.” Beatrice let out a sigh. “You ninos are so paranoid,” she said. “I’m perfectly fine. I got the antidote in time.” “But, Mama,” said Génesis. “I have never seen a rattlesnake like the one that bit you before. It could be an unknown species. It could be more poisonous than a normal rattlesnake. Beatrice just knocked her daughter to the side with her backside before walking out of the house. From Génesis’s spot on the floor, she saw that Beatrice’s rear appeared to be getting bigger and fuller and then she realized something that unnerved her; Beatrice appeared to be hissing as she walked out towards the henhouse. The farmer’s wife however, didn’t notice her mysterious weight gain or her hissing, or the fact that she appeared to now have a forked tongue.

“Aye carumba,” she said. “Est la nina loco. I am perfectly fine.” Beatrice walked into the henhouse and noticed that the hens seemed distressed. There was a rat in the henhouse that was trying to steal eggs. Beatrice gasped and grabbed the rat before it could escape. Then something came over Beatrice and she flickered her tongue out at the rat. Diego was walking in to check on his mother and gasped because as Beatrice walked out of the henhouse with the eggs and she appeared to have a rat’s tail sticking out of her mouth right before she sucked it in and apparently swallowed the rat. Beatrice then let out a belch and walked away as Diego gave a look of pure horror.

Back at the secret military organization base, Dr. Salazar had put together the snake powered raygun for General Explicíto. “See, Dr. Salazar,” said Explicíto. “How hard was that?” Dr. Salazar let out a sigh. “I still think this is a waste of my talents. But the snake-powered raygun is put together.” “Well? Is it optional or not?” “Unfortunately, General Explicíto, the raygun doesn’t have a snake to power it up.” “This is Mexico. We’ve got plenty of snakes.” “Si, General, but in order for the raygun to create so much as a spark, we’ll need a snake that weighs as much as a big rig.” “Then we’ll get an anaconda!” Salazar pulled on his hair. “I specifically designed the raygun to be powered by a rattlesnake.” “You know, for a genius, you seem to have crippling overspecialization when it comes to snakes.”

Meanwhile, Diego told Génesis what he had seen in the hen house. “Swallowed a rat?! Are you sure, Diego?” Diego nodded his head. “Carumba,” said Génesis. “No rattlesnake bite has those kind of side-effects. Something is seriously wrong with Mama.” Speaking of Beatrice, she was holding her head and was busy picking corn as she was hissing again. She actually seemed to have gotten taller and had gotten much fatter as well, mainly in her stomach and breasts. Suddenly, she gave a hiss as she got on her knees and her eyes turned into those of a reptilian. Beatrice opened her mouth to reveal that not only did she still have her forked tongue but she also appeared to have grown fangs. She saw that her fingernails were turning into sharp claws before her skin turned pale lavender with gray diamond spots running on her back. Her thighs then bulged out, as did her stomach and her neck appeared to be getting longer albeit with multiple chins. Then she sprouted a rather long tail with a rattle at the end as her body became more and more scaly. She let out a hiss of despair.

“What was that?!” yelled Génesis. Génesis and Diego ran off to check on their mother and as they ran through the cornfield, they heard loud hissing. The twins stopped in their tracks and they saw a rattlesnake rattle that was bigger than a mailbox in front of them. Génesis stepped back in fear and found herself pressed against a large and plush scaly stomach. She turned around and screamed. Beatrice had transformed into a huge 35ft tall and 50ft long anthropomorphic rattlesnake with a 45ft wide butt, a 55ft belly, huge E-cup breasts and three-chins. She was also completely hairless and completely naked.

Beatrice’s children looked up at their mutated mother in fear as she gave a hiss. “Okay,” she said. “I’ll admit it. Maybe Génesis was right to worry about the snake bite?” The Valencia twins turned to face each other in pure worry at their mutated mother.
112231212222222222222221.title: Split a Rattlesnake

choices: Beatrice has a Growth Spurt in Her Sleep
The Secret Military Organization Spots Beatrice
1122312122222222222222211.content:
Génesis and Diego looked up as Beatrice lowered her neck and flickered her forked tongue at her tiny son and daughter. "So," said the giant rattlesnake mom. "How bad is it?" The Valencia twins climbed up their mother's enormous belly and saw that her tail was nearly in the middle of the nearby road. "This is impossible," said Génesis. "No rattlesnake bite I know can turn a human into a rattlesnake, especially not una serpent de cascabel mucha gorda y gigante." "Maybe it was a vampire snake," said Beatrice. "There are vampire bats, vampire finches and vampire snails, so maybe there's such a thing as a vampire snake." Beatrice reached down to pick up Génesis and held her tiny teenage daughter in front of her snout. "Mama, if you get any bigger, you might be able to surround the world like that big snake in Norse mythology." Beatrice gave a hiss as the snake woman then held up her breasts. "Your father always did criticize how big my butt was. But now every part of me is big."

Suddenly, Beatrice's stomach gurgled as she put Génesis down. The sound of it was loud enough to crack the windows in the house. "Estoy muy hambriento. Diego, Génesis, please bring me as much food as you can find." Diego and Génesis then watched in worry as Beatrice's stomach growled again and the rattlesnake giantess stretched out her neck to swallow dozens of stalks of corn in one enormous gulp and then let out a thunderous belch that forced her children to cover their ears. Beatrice flickered her tongue and turned to face her twins. "Andale! I'm starving. I'm so hungry I could eat Texas." Diego and Génesis then decided that it would be the best idea to run off and find as much food as they could to satisfy their enormous mother's huge appetite.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

At that moment, Jorge, who knew absolutely nothing of his wife's mutation was outside of the supermarket when he heard his cellphone ringing. "Hola? Oh, Génesis. Do we need anything back home." Génesis at home was emptying the fridge as she spoke to her father. "Just please buy all the meat that you could." "Que?!" "Don't shoot the messenger, Mama's orders." "Carumba, girl! Does she have a tapeworm or something!? I'm gonna have to empty out the cash we needed to fix the tractor." Outside the window at home, there was a crash and Génesis saw that Beatrice had gotten so hungry that she ate the tractor and then belched out smoke from her mouth. Génesis bit her lip. "That's not gonna be a problem, Papa. Just please get as much raw meat as you can." Jorge was confused but Génesis hung up before he could question her.

Jorge groaned as he was picking up several cases of raw venison and several raw geese. Inside the grocery store at the time, Dr. Salazar was taking a soda out of a case behind Jorge when he noticed Jorge buying all the meat. "Esto es una gran cantidad de carne, amigo." Jorge let out a sigh. "Si. But my wife suddenly has a craving for all the meat she can get. She's already got a large backside. She's going to kill the rest of her figure eating all this raw meat." "Raw meat?" asked Dr. Salazar. "That's asking for trouble. By the way, have you seen any rattlesnakes lately." "Uno. One bit my wife yesterday. Thankfully she's made a full recovery." "Si, near death experiences will aggregate one's appetite. Just tell me if you see any 18 ton rattlesnakes in the area." Jorge nearly had a heart attack at that idea. "18 ton rattlesnakes!? Aye, aye, aye. Are you loco in la cabeza? There are no such thing as 18 ton rattlesnakes. At least I certainly hope not. Why do you ask?" Dr. Salazar bit his lip. "Uh, no reason." The mad scientist definitely couldn't let anyone know about the secret military organization's rattlesnake-powered ray gun. He then decided to make a hasty retreat as Jorge shrugged his shoulders.

- - - - - - - - - - - -

Back at the farm, Beatrice had actually gotten bigger and fatter to the point where she was three times bigger than the farmhouse and the rattlesnake giantess was greedily devouring all the crops that Diego gathered at her feet and belly. Beatrice even swallowed every last pumpkin on the farm in one gulp before eating all the tomatoes and splattering the juice. "Diego," said Beatrice. "Génesis. I need more meat." "Mama," said Génesis. "You already ate all of the eggs... and chickens." Beatrice downed an entire tank of milk before she belched again. "Then bring me the fattest pig we have. Andale." Beatrice groaned as her stomach continued to gurgle and Diego and Génesis walked away to get more food. "Pity," said Génesis. "She was very attached to that pig." Diego then spoke in sign language and horrified Génesis. "That's a terrible thought, Diego. And that's not like Mama. She won't go that extreme."

The teenage twins then stopped because Jorge returned in his truck with enough meat for a butcher's shop. "Papa," said Génesis in shock. "You're home. Uh, Papa, there's something you should know?" Jorge gave a stern look. "Where is your mother?" Suddenly, Jorge heard a swiping movement and turned to see a good chunk of the meat in his truck disappeared. "Que?" then he felt blood from the meat dripping down from the sky and onto his head. Then Jorge looked up and screamed as he saw Beatrice eating the meat. Beatrice smiled at her husband and gave a hiss. "Hola, honey," she said. "Well, this is awkward." "Beatrice?!" yelled Jorge recognizing his wife's voice. Beatrice nodded her head and let out a burp. "Sorry," she said. "I guess being turned into a giant poisonous reptile makes you a little gassy."

Jorge was too shocked to speak and then turned to face his son and daughter about what happened to Beatrice. "Calm down, Papa," said Génesis as Diego made similar gestures to tell the message in sign language. "That snake bite is probably what did this to Mama. We need to just clam down and think like rational people." Of course at that moment, there was loud motion and Beatrice was laying down as she rubbed her huge stomach and let out another belch before curling up and falling asleep. She even leaked out venomous drool as she snoozed. Diego and Génesis smiled nervously as Jorge crossed his arms. He was not amused with the fact that his wife had transformed into a titanic and obese rattlesnake.

To complicate matters....
1122312122222222222222211.title: Spicy Sexy Rattlesnake Queen

11223121222222222222222112.content:
While Beatrice was sleeping off her food coma, it should be stated that she had gotten even bigger. The snake woman was now 75ft tall, 150ft long with a 115ft wide butt and 125ft wide belly. Of course, this made her all too easy for her to be spotted by a scout for the secret military organization who was surprised to see such a titanic creature and even snapped a photograph of her. “General Explicíto and Dr. Salazar will want to hear about this.” With that, the scout ran off as the Valencios were trying to figure out what to do.

“I can’t believe it,” said Jorge. “My wife is a rattlesnake the size of a zeppelin. How does this even happen!?” “Calm down, Papa,” said Génesis. “At least she’s still Mama. She hasn’t lost her mind.” Jorge let out a groan. “I need an egg salad tortilla to calm my nerves.” Diego just shook his arms. “You’re out of luck there, Papa,” said Génesis. “Mama ate all the eggs. Not to mention the chickens too.” “What?! I guess I shouldn’t be surprised but I can’t believe that she did that. How are we supposed to keep up with an appetite like that? This is a farm, not a buffet.” “Well,” said Génesis. “On the bright side. We won’t have to worry about rats ever again.” Jorge had to sit down to wrap his head around the situation but wound up sitting on Beatrice’s tail because he heard a shaking noise and turned his head to see right behind him was the rattle on his wife’s tail. “That is going to take some serious getting used to.”

- - - - - - - - - - -

Back at the secret military organization, Dr. Salazar was looking at the photograph that his scout took. “Carumba,” said Dr. Salazar. “Project Ophiuchus must’ve bitten that farmer’s wife and mutated her into a titanic snake.” “Aye, aye, aye,” said General Explicíto. “She looks just gigante enough for the rattlesnake-powered raygun.” “Maybe too big,” commented Salazar. “What the?! That’s the guy I ran into at the store! Liar! He had an 18-ton... well she’s definitely much heavier than 18 tons at this point, but he was hiding our rattlesnake this whole time! That’s it, I’m going over to get our snake.” General Explicíto was about to say something to try and convince Dr. Salazar otherwise but the mad scientist was already stomping off. “Idiotas!” yelled Dr. Salazar. “Everyone in El Mundo is an idiota. It took me months to design Project Ophiuchus only for some bumpkin’s wife to kill it and become the queen of the rattlesnakes. Well I’ll settle their hash soon enough.” Dr. Salazar got into a jeep in order to drive off and give the Valencias a piece of his mind.

- - - - - - - - - - -

Back with the Valencias on the farm, Jorge and Diego were busy replacing all the maize that Beatrice devoured. “Toss some more seeds over there, son,” said Jorge. “Maybe if we’re lucky they’ll grow back faster.” Diego nodded his head before something fell down from the sky and caught them both by surprise and even made Jorge scream. What fell from the sky was a dead tapir that had puncture holes in its side from a pair of large fangs. They both looked up to see Beatrice’s fat serpentine face hovering overhead and flicking out her tongue. “I felt bad about eating us out of house and home, so I decided to catch dinner for you guys.” “Mom,” said Génesis. “That’s a Baird’s tapir. It’s endangered. Besides, it’s poisoned. We can’t eat that until we detox it.” Beatrice let out a scoff. “Pick, pick, pick. Alright, I’ll try to find some way of catching dinner without pumping it full of venom.”

That’s when the Valencias heard a jeep coming and it was Dr. Salazar. “Were you expecting company?” asked Jorge. Diego just shook his head. “Oh no,” said Génesis. “We can’t let anyone see Mama like this.” “How can they NOT see me, chica loca?” asked Beatrice. “I’m as big as a mountain. It’s not like I can find some place to hide.” Beatrice sat up and curled her tail around her serpentine body as she lowered her neck and then Dr. Salazar stormed up to the Valencias. “I have a bone to pick with you!” “What did we do?” asked Génesis. Then Jorge recognized the man. “Hey, wait a minute. You’re the guy from the market.” “And you were lying to me about your rattlesnake wife!” “How can I lie about something I didn’t know about? Wait.... 18 ton rattlesnake. You were looking for an 18 ton rattlesnake.” “18 tons?” asked Génesis. “I’d say Mom weighs at least 1800 tons by now.” Beatrice glared at her tiny daughter at that remark about her weight.

“What would anyone want with an 18 ton rattlesnake?” asked the massive and mutated matriarch of the Valencia family. Dr. Salazar glared. “If you must know, my name is Dr. Salazar and the idiota general I work for commissioned me to build a rattlesnake-powered raygun and we need your fat rattlesnake ass to power it.” “And what exactly are you going to do with a rattlesnake-powered raygun?” asked Génesis. Dr. Salazar’s eyes popped because he literally had no idea what the raygun would be useful for. He was pretty sure that not even General Explicíto and his army knew exactly what they were planning to do with a rattlesnake-powered raygun.

However, the doctor just spazzed out and grabbed himself by the hair. “How the hell am I supposed to know what to do with a rattlesnake-powered raygun! I only built the thing! I just work here! Why am I arguing with a stupid farmer about his fatass mutated rattlesnake wife. I’m just gonna do what I came here to do and take the giant rattlesnake.” Beatrice just smiled smugly. “Oh really, Doc? How do you plan on doing that?” Dr. Salazar realized that he hadn’t brought in reinforcements of any kind and there was no way he could move a morbidly obese rattlesnake as big as a skyscraper by force. Beatrice smugly lowered her head and then licked him with her forked tongue tauntingly as Dr. Salazar screamed. “I’ve been kissed by a rattlesnake! Water! Ayuda!” Dr. Salazar ran to his jeep in order to rush to a hospital out of fear that Beatrice poisoned him. Beatrice and Génesis shared a laugh while Diego simply smiled.

However, Jorge was worried that Dr. Salazar would be back. Men like Salazar were too stubborn to give up so easily.
11223121222222222222222112.title: Operation Rattlesnake

112231212222222222222221122.content:
( Please read this chapter in Wiggag so this crossover makes sense http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...)

Dr. Salazar had soon come back from the hospital and returned to the secret military base fuming mad. “You know,” said General Explicíto. “Perhaps running off to confront a giant rattlesnake on your own wasn’t the best idea.” Dr. Salazar grit his teeth. “I’m not going to let some mutated farmer’s wife get the best of me. It’s all over for those Valencias. I have a plan to catch that rattlesnake.” “How so?” Dr. Salazar gave a smirk. “How else do you capture a giant monster? With a giant trap. It couldn’t be simpler. We build a pit trap and then fill it with chains. The dirt will be stable enough that nothing lighter than that snake will fall in and we’ll have our rattlesnake for our rattlesnake-powered raygun. I will not be made a fool of again.”

 That’s what Dr. Salazar thought, but as you all know, it doesn’t take much for a plan to go horribly wrong in one way or another. But before we get to that, the next day, Beatrice was digging an irrigation tunnel for the crops as Jorge was still trying to wrap his head around the odd situation his family was facing. "I don't like this," said Jorge. "Something tells me that kook is going to be back. As long as we can't turn you back, Beatrice, we're going to have nothing but headaches from that man." Beatrice just surfaced her head out of the ground and gave a smile and a hiss. "That's funny. You didn't seem to mind where you were sleeping last night." Jorge blushed before his wife continued to dig through the ground. "That has nothing to do with this."

Diego and Génesis were planting some new seeds when they saw a gaudy looking car driving down the street rather clumsily. "Carumba!" yelled Génesis right before she and her brother moved out of the way just as that car blew a tire and stopped. Out of the car walked out three young men that looked like a rock band. “That’s the last time you drive, Matt,” said the guitarist to the bassist. “I swear.” “Get off my case, Eric. It’s not my fault your girlfriend booked us a gig in Sonra.” The drummer let out a sigh. “And so far away from a garage.” Génesis and Diego decided to walk up to help the band out. “Excuse me,” said Génesis. “We have a spare tire in our garage." Eric smiled at that. "That is so cool. Thanks." Jorge quickly took notice of the band and turned to face his wife. "Beatrice," he said. "You had better make yourself scarce." Beatrice nodded her head and the rattlesnake giantess quickly tunneled away. "Toxic Nightshade, huh?" asked Génesis as she and Diego were replacing the tire. "Must be one of those North American bands we've heard of. Unfortunately, our mom doesn't like rock and roll." Matt let out a scoff. "What is she, deaf." Matt looked around to make sure there was nobody else and then started to practice with his bass. "Anyway," said Eric. "Thanks a lot for this assist. By now my girlfriend is already on ahead without us." "Not a problem." Said Génesis. However, while the trio's back was turned, Diego noticed something surprising.

Diego spoke to his sister though sign language and Génesis looked in shock. “What do you mean that animatronic looks too realistic for your tastes.” Diego pointed to the poster and Génesis took a closer look. There, she realized that in the poster with the band there appeared to be a giant animatronic cobra that was just as huge and fat as her serpentine mother and had a pair of breasts as well showing that it might be anthropomorphic. Jorge noticed this as well and was shocked. “That cobra looks like it might be real,” he said. “It looks like Beatrice isn’t the only serpent goddess in the area.” Génesis let out a sigh. “I really hope Mom doesn’t get into a fight with this cobra woman. The last thing we need is too giant obese poisonous snakes that hate each other.”

That night, General Explicíto and Dr. Salazar were waiting by their snake trap for any sign of Beatrice. "Are you sure this will work, Doc?" "Positive, General. A snake that big will get hungry eventually and when she does, we grab her." Dr. Salazar let out a laugh right before he heard a crashing sound and a loud hiss. "Gotcha!" However, when Dr. Salazar and the general checked their trap, they got a big surprise.

The creature that got caught was not Beatrice. Instead, she was a giant tan-skinned cobra woman with a long frill around her neck. Like Beatrice, she was 75ft tall but she only had a 100ft wide belly and tail and didn’t have any legs. She appeared to be wearing loud eyeshadow and lipstick and looked somewhat like a young Asian woman and one of her frills looked like it was pierced. Needless to say, the cobra woman was pissed off at the idea of being captured and was shaking in her chains. Dr. Salazar was more than surprised to see such a humungous cobra. “What is this?” asked Dr. Salazar. “Where did that giant cobra come from? I don’t remember creating a mutant cobra. Cobras aren’t even indigenous to South America.” The cobra in the t rap gave an angry hiss. “What the hell is going on here?” she asked. “I was just out on a capybara run before meeting up with the guys and this happens! What the ****!?” “Damn it all!” yelled Dr. Salazar. “We caught the wrong snake!” "Don't be such a pessimist, Dr. Salazar," said General Explicíto. "We'll just use her for the rattlesnake-powered ray gun." The cobra woman was somewhat confused. "Rattlesnake-powered ray gun? Is this a joke?"

Dr. Salazar was just as unamused with that idea. “Are you insane, General!? It’s a rattlesnake-powered raygun! We can’t use a king cobra!” “Why not?” asked the general. “They both belong to the order squamata.” Dr. Salazar was surprised at those words. “Wow, just wow. That’s actually true. I guess you’re not as much of an idiota as I thought.” Kelly just rolled her eyes and hissed before she spat venom at the chains that were binding her and managed to slip out. “Wait!” yelled Dr. Salazar. “Where are you going!? You can’t just slither away!” “No offense,” said Kelly. “But I don’t like the idea of being used as a battery. Dr. Salazar would’ve gone after the cobra woman but Kelly spat venom and made the mad scientist jump back in fear of getting poisoned right before Kelly slinked away. “Isn’t anyone going to stop her!?” yelled Dr. Salazar. General Explicíto just twitched his fingers and smiled nervously. “Well, Dr. Salazar, we were so sure the trap would work that we didn’t bring any tanks.” The mad doctor just slapped himself in the face.

Kelly meanwhile gave a hiss as she continued to tunnel and slink away and away. “What a bunch of idiots,” she said. “A rattlesnake-powered ray gun. Where the hell are they going to get a... rattlesnake... big... enough... to...?” Kelly then made a startling realization. “O.M.G.! There’s another giant snake out there! I've got to warn the guys! She might be dangerous!” Nearby, Beatrice had slithered up towards a river for a drink and could hear Matt practicing from a few miles away as she groaned. "Stupid Northern rock and roll," she said. "If I still had ears, they'd be bleeding. How Génesis and Diego can torture their ear drums with that noise, I'll never know." However, as Beatrice kept swallowing the water, she heard hissing and then turned to see Kelly slithering by. The rattlesnake giantess squeezed out her water as she looked in absolute surprise and accidentally sprayed the water all over Kelly.

The cobra turned around and opened her hood as she gave a hiss and flickered her tongue. In caution, Beatrice shook her large rattle and she stretched her neck down. Beatrice was still surprised to see another serpentine giantess in the vicinity. "Carumba. Another snake and she's just a much of a gigante gordita as I am." Beatrice poked Kelly in the stomach as Kelly slithered back and hissed and then Kelly looked down and noticed Beatrice's clawed feet. "You still have feet?" asked Kelly. "You still have an ass? How is that possible?" "How are you possible, chica?" asked Beatrice. "Don't tell me that those secret military organization bozos created another mutant snake." Kelly gave a hiss. "Those idiots tried to use me to power their rattlesnake-powered ray gun. Apparently you were the intended battery?" Beatrice gave a nervous laugh. "Si. My name is Beatrice Valencia." Kelly rolled her eyes. "I'm Kelly. Just leave it at that. So you're telling me those creeps mutated you." "Not exactly. An escaped lab animal of theirs did. Did they do the same with you?" Kelly scoffed. "No. I bought a magic tattoo." Beatrice broke down in laughter that made her belly shake. "Magic?" she asked. "That's unbelievable."

Kelly got defensive and gave a hiss as she showed her fangs. "It's true, though! Just look at me. I'm a fat Godzilla-sized queen cobra speaking with a fat Godzilla-sized rattlesnake. What are you doing out here?" Beatrice gave a hiss before speaking. "Well, a rock band called Toxic Nightshade had a vehicular breakdown near my family's farm and my husband, son and daughter needed me to make myself scarce so as not to scare them." Kelly's eyes poked out of her head. "Toxic Nightshade? My boyfriend is the band leader and I'm their manager." Beatrice then realized something. "Then that animatronic cobra in the poster?" "It's not animatronic," said Kelly. "It's me." Beatrice dropped her jaw.

Kelly then bit her lip slightly. "I never thought I'd run into another snake lady. Señora Valencia, my friends and I are guests in your country so I'm proposing that we don't get at each other throats. The last thing that the world needs is two giant sumo snakes who hate each other." Beatrice let out a laugh. "Don't worry, child. I better stick around to make sure those clowns don't trap you again. Come on, I'll show you the countryside." With that, the rattlesnake giantess waddled off as the rattlesnake giantess followed after her.
112231212222222222222221122.title: Everybody Loves Crossovers

112231212222222222222222.content:
Our story begins in Moscow, Russia, home of the Pangaea Corporation. This foundation was run by Sasha Zolnerowich, a well-known corporate strategist who at only 26 years of age had saved the company from complete ruin after her father, Boltan Zolnerowich, was imprisoned for taking part in illegal activity. In contrast, Sasha had a strong sense of morals and ran the company in the best way to turn a profit while at the same time, doing all that she could to avoid any kind of trouble with the law. Of course, Sasha was not only brilliant, she was also a good looker. She was a very hourglass shaped woman with long silver hair with a dyed white highlight reaching to her rear. Because of this, she caught the eyes of many a lesser man.

None of these men were ever as persistent as the weedy and nerdy Peotr Kragoff, a young chemist who could not stop thinking about Sasha no matter how hard he tried. In fact, she was the very reason he chose to work at the silver haired vixen’s company in the first place. He had actually tried to ask her out dozens of time. Unfortunately for him, Sasha was one of those women who was married to her job and would not go out with Peotr until he had created a product that would revolutionize the Pangaea Corporation. He kept trying and while he had a few successes, none brought the stimulation from Sasha that was required for her to give him so much as the time of day. But because of that, Peotr just kept on trying and this very day, the young man held up a tube of a strange rubbing lotion and smiled. “This will be it.” He said.

In her office at the time, Sasha was looking over her profiles before she heard her secretary. “Peotr Kragoff to see you, Ms. Zolnerowich.” Sasha let out a sigh and slapped herself in the face because she was sure that she knew exactly why Peotr had come to see her and begun to curse in Russian before speaking with her secretary. “Send him in.” She said. Peotr came in and was nervous, but he gulped and gave a confident look as he was walking out to meet with Sasha. “Alright, Peotr,” said Sasha. “Let’s get this over with. What do you want?” Peotr was going to speak but Sasha then held up her arm. “Besides me that is.” She said.

Peotr laughed nervously and held out the tube. “I have created a new skin care lotion made from a fossil from the Ice Age I managed to acquire. Sasha then raised an eyebrow. “Peotr, I’ll have you know that we run a cruelty free company.” “Sasha, please give me a chance. This bones came from animals that haven’t been around for thousands of years. The way I see it, humans are fragile creatures with fragile skin that gets weak from age, even moreso from outside influences such as sunlight and gravity. But what I have here will make skin last longer, maybe even forever. Which is why this rub on, I’ve dubbed Navsegda*. Maybe this will make our skin virtually bulletproof.”

Sasha was skeptic and was looking around the tube as Peotr crossed his fingers. “Has this product been tested?” “Uh, neit, Sasha.” Sasha shook her head. “We can’t release a product that hasn’t been properly tested. For all we know this stuff could be hazardous.” Peotr groaned. “I wanted to test it out, but nobody volunteered. Just please trust me.” Sasha was not sure what to say and put the tube down. “I’ll give you one chance, Peotr. I’ll test it out myself. If it succeeds, we’ll talk.” Peotr nodded his head. “I see. Dasvidaniysa, Sasha. Uh, Ms. Zolnerowich.” As Peotr left his boss’s office, he was hoping that he would succeed. Once he was out of sight, he took out a fossil that looked like the jawbone of a prehistoric rhinoceros of some kind. “Please,” he said as he stroked the fossil. “Please work. Your cells are my last chance to get a date with the hottest woman in Russia.”

* Navsegda is Russian for “forever”.
112231212222222222222222.title: Big Time

1122312122222222222222221.content:
(Note: I believe that it’s time i gave a slight explanation. An Elasmotherium is a long extinct ancestor of the rhinoceros endemic to Eurasia during the Late Pliocene era. The name means, “Thin Plate Beast”. Here is an image for reference https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/c... Now we return to the writing.com chapter already in progress)

Sasha took a look at the tube in front of her and rolled her eyes. She knew this was yet another one of Peotr’s attempts to ask her out on a date, but she figured that maybe he had made a breakthrough. “Using fossil material to act as a skin rejuvenator? He wants the hardness of bones to be applied to the skin? Well, if he wants it tested, I better give it the run through since everyone else is too chicken. But if that durak’s strange formula causes my skin to fall off, he can start cleaning out his desk. The Russian woman then squeezed out the Navsegda cream from its tube and applied it to her skin. It felt odd and Sasha gagged slightly as she rubbed it on. “Ugh,” she said. “How utterly disgusting. Nobody said eternal beauty was easy.”

Sasha had finished rubbing on the skin cream and from the looks of it, that was the entire tube. Sasha then tapped herself on the forehead. “I certainly don’t feel like my skin is any cleaner or stronger. Maybe it’s a dud. I’ll have to break it to Peotr easily.” Sasha let out a sigh. “It’s really a shame,” said the CEO. “If the slime actually worked, them it would be a great boon to mankind and to the Pangaea Corporation.” Suddenly, Sasha heard her cellphone begun to ring. She immediately grabbed the cellphone to speak into it. “Zdravstuyte? Oh, Inga. What?! You know company policy! Deforestation is out of the question. Either you pull the plug or I pull your plug. No, I am not kidding. I will make that happen.”

As Sasha was speaking, she failed to notice that something was happening to her. Her rear end was expanding and her skin became rougher as it turned red and she sprouted a small tail. “Listen,” said Sasha. “You may have gotten away with those stunts when my father was in charge, but I am not my father. I do not intend to bring this company back into the mud after I’ve successfully pulled it out.” Sasha was so busy speaking on the phone that she didn’t notice that she was growing a prominent hunchback and her face was stretching out into a snout just like a rhinoceros’s face as a huge light-blue horn that was as thick as a tree trunk burst out of the center of her face and her feet turned into flat feet like those of an ungulate. She had turned into a red-skinned elasmotherium, a prehistoric species of rhinoceros but it didn’t stop there because Sasha was getting bigger as she spoke. Sasha’s height increased to 12 feet tall and had she been normal size she would weigh 1500lbs. She had D-cup breasts, a prominent double-chin, her ass had expanded to 15ft wide and her stomach expanded to 13ft wide. “Listen. This is your second strike. If I catch you even thinking about breaking company rules, you’re out of here. Dasvidaniya.” Sasha hung up and let out a sigh as she snorted loudly and erupted air out of her new rhinoceros nose.

Sasha then heard the cellphone ring again and let out a sigh as she answered the phone. She saw that it was none other than Peotr at the phone. She answered the phone and let out a sigh, still oblivious to the fact that she was a titanically obese and huge prehistoric rhinoceros. “Zdravstuyte, Sasha,” said Peotr. “So, how did it work?” “Well,” said Sasha as she drank a bottle of vodka. “I don’t see any immediate results. If there isn’t anything within 24 hours, I’m junking the project. You can waste your own money for a change.” “Drat. In other news, there’s a movie tonight. It’s a new romance film and I was wondering.” “Sorry, Peotr. I have a meeting with the board of directors in five. I’ll talk to you later.”

Sasha walked away getting ready to meet with her top executives. As she was stepping forward, the floor cracked under her heavy feet and she passed a mirror. But does the great Sasha Zolnerowich look into the mirror and discovery her transformation?
1122312122222222222222221.title: A Different Kind of Rhinovirus

choices: Extreme Fury. She's Pissed at What She's Become
A Sly Smile. She Actually LIKES the Transformation
11223121222222222222222212.content:
Remarkably, despite being turned into a giant obese rhinoceros that was apparently still getting bigger, Sasha completely failed to notice her own transformation as she was walking to the meeting. As she walked out the door, Sasha’s secretary gasped at the sight of her. Sasha however, had no idea why her secretary reacted the way she did. “Close your mouth, Anya,” said Sasha. “You’ll attract flies that way.” The elasmotherium giantess just walked away, prompting her employees to stare at her as she moved down the hallway and unnoticingly caused the walls to crack as her booty pressed against them with each passing step.

Inside another room, The Pangaea Foundation’s board of directors had met up and were waiting for Sasha. “Durak,” said one of them with a thick beard and a fedora hat. “Inga, you are durak.” “How am I an idiot?” asked a female executive. “You were the one who broke Sasha’s policy. She’s going to be in a bad mood.” “Rassilikov,” said a white-haired executive. “The only reason you are so anxious is because Ms. Zolnerovich vetoed your last three project proposals. She’s as stone-faced as they come. If she was even more thick-skinned, she’d be a rhinoceros.” Most of the admins laughed before there was a shaking sound and then a crashing sound. They turned and looked in shock because Sasha had smashed her way right through the wall, seeing that she couldn’t possibly have fit through such a tiny door.

“I am going to have to have word with architect,” said Sasha, still oblivious to turning into an elasmotherium. “I don’t know what’s more deplorable. Such inhumanly small doors or such fragile walls. Sorry about the mess, everyone.” That was when Sasha realized that her directors were too stunned to speak with her. “Excuse me?” asked Sasha. “So nobody is in the mood to talk? This meeting was your idea to begin with.” Sasha’s admins still weren’t speaking and prompted Sasha to tap her large foot impatiently and shake up the room while at the same time causing the floor to crack slightly. “I’m waiting for a response.” “Sasha,” said the white-haired man. “Are you feeling alright? You look... not you?” “What is that supposed to mean?” asked Sasha. “You seriously can’t be so married to your work that you haven’t noticed that you’ve turned into a rhinoceros the size of a car?”

Sasha looked at her executives as if they were insane. “Have you all gone mental?! I know we’ve been working around the clock lately, but not enough to be hallucinating. Me, a rhino?” “Boss,” said Inga. “Look in the mirror.” Sasha grumbled to herself because she was certain that her directors were seeing things and then snorted again. “Alright,” she said. “Just to shut you up and keep the ball rolling.” Sasha took out her makeup mirror and opened it before she screamed and dropped it. She had finally seen what happened. She felt her horn in horror and then turned around to see her butt had just about finished assassinating her skirt and wagged her new tail before she felt her thick elasmotherium stomach and snorted again. Then she realized what caused her transformation. “Peotr.” She said.

At that moment, Peotr was at the water cooler when one of his coworkers tapped him on the back. “Peotr,” he said. “You look surprisingly chipper for dead man.” “Dead man?” asked Peotr. “What do you mean, Ivan?” Ivan gave a smug grin. “Boss lady had violent reaction to your skin lotion. It turned Ms. Zolnerovich into a giant obese rhinoceros.” “What?!” yelled Peotr in shock. He had absolutely no idea that his lotion would mutate Sasha. “It can’t be true,” he said. “That’s impossible.” “Apparently it is possible. Last I saw, she was as big as a house. I wouldn’t want to be you, comrade.” Peotr was horrified. If the Navsegda transformed his boss into a rhino, not only would it be his job on ice, but even thinking about asking her out on a date was out of the question.

Suddenly, Sasha called Peotr over the loudspeaker. “Peotr Kragoff. I want you in my office in exactly one minute.” Peotr gulped because he was certain Sasha was mad at him for the fiasco. Ivan decided to taunt Peotr by humming a funeral march as Peotr walked away. “You are definitely going to be rhino feed, my friend.” As Peotr was making his way up to Sasha’s office, he was thinking to himself. “Impossible. I couldn’t have accidentally created mutagen. It’s impossible. Isn’t it?”  

Peotr soon came to Sasha’s office where Sasha’s secretary let him right in. “Sasha?” asked Peotr. “Are you... good grief!” Peotr looked up to see that Sasha had actually gotten much bigger. She was now 30ft high with a 45ft wide ass and 40ft wide belly and E-Cup breasts. She was so blobbish that she appeared to have four chins. Because her suit had been torn up, she was reduced to wearing a rather large bikini that even with its large size, looked as though it was painted on her body. Peotr couldn’t believe it. He really did turn his boss/crush into a rhinoceros giantess and he was sure he would be lucky if she merely decided to fire him.

Peotr walked in as Sasha looked down at him with...
11223121222222222222222212.title: Rhino Rush

1122312122222222222222222.content:
"This is getting out of control..." Rachel muttered to herself as she poured a glass of of orange juice to join a slice turkey sandwich and an apple on a wooden tray. The sight laid out before her had become like a routine for her, driving her insane the longer her husband stayed in his slum, which she ended up being dragged into as well.

"THAT'S IT!!!" She could hear a crazed voice cackle with glee through the ceiling above, as with so many other "ideas" that would end with him sobbing on the floor in the fetal position. With an exasperated sigh, Rachel rolled her eyes and waltzed to the steps to James' room with the tray in her hands.

She hesitated with her hand inches from the knob, fearing whatever state the room and her husband would be when she'd open the door, but upon pushing it open could only see darkness.

The only light in the room came from a book lamp on the desk where her husband was seated, who was too preoccupied scribbling complex diagrams to notice her enter. Even in the darkness she could see that the room was an absolute wreck: the bed was unmade with clothes haphazardly thrown into the ajar closet and erratically opened drawers of his wardrobe, while the walls were coated with elaborate blueprints of cabinets or structures labeled with secret compartments and trapdoors, many of which were shredded apart and tossed to the floor.

"Uh...James?" She spoke carefully, allowing him to know she was there. "Everything alright?"

"This is it, Rachel!" He spoke confidently, as he had, of course, many times before. "I've finally found my big break!"

He turned back and presumed his ramblings as Rachel gently approached the desk and set the tray next to him. "Sweetie, don't you think it'd be a good time to take a break?"

"Don't worry about that, dear, I took my fifteen minutes two hours ago."

"James, this isn't some crazy office you're living in, this is your house! You've been going nuts on all this stuff for three weeks! Don't beat on your brainpower this!"

"Rachel, please, this is serious!" He spoke seriously. "I appreciate your concern, but I've been performing magic too long without putting any effort into making a name for myself amongst magicians everywhere!"

"James, you're an awesome magician!" Rachel argued. "You don't have to go through ghost all this carp with what you've already got!"

"I know, but all magicians have their icons!" He argued with a determined posture. "They all have the trick painted on their posters as they're lit below whilst hung on the theater, what makes their name the threshold of a genre of styles! By this!" He shook a folder stuffed with papers in excitement. "This is my new routine! Speaking of which, I need your help."

"My help? For what?"

"Here!" He roads he a fire ax from beneath the desk, making herself before she caught it with both hands. "There's an old wardrobe in the attic, and I'd like you to chop it into boards!"

"The attic?! Hey, wait a minute!"

"Sorry, can't explain! Sworn to secrecy!" He got up and began guiding her to the door and showed her out, waving goodbye once she was out of the door frame. "Ta ta!"

Before she could argue again, he courtly shut the door in her face.

.....


Everything in the attic looked like it was covered by a milky blanket of cobwebs, with only vague shapes or structures beneath to discern what everything was. However, a wardrobe was completely untouched as it sat in the corner within a clear circle of floor untouched by web.

"Is that the one he was talking about?" As Rachel walked closer she could sense a pungent odor from something inside, but opening the door hit her with one of the most foul, rank stenches she could ever imagine as a pile of rotten moth balls sitting on the bottom rolled out onto the floor.

"Oh, GOD!!!" She gagged as she backed away, a sick pang in her stomach as she coughed out the rancid air. With the blade of the axe she swept aside most of the balls, allowing her to stand near the cabinet without wanting to retch.

The wardrobe itself had a rather ornate design for its simplistic shape. The edges were bordered with geometric spirals traveling its entire height, with a dark brown finish, complete with a full body mrror inside.

"You know what? Screw this!" She spat as swung the axe's blade into the floor. "I'm not destroying this! It's an antique!"

But she could also see a lumpy shape hanging behind the left door. She reached in and pulled out a white and black striped wool jacket, with a golden brooch shaped like a moth with a dark black gem in the center.

"Huh...not bad!" She whistled as she turned the jacket around, assessing its size. Out of curiosity she slid her arms into its sleeves, and buttoned the front into a perfect fit. She looked at herself in the mirror and smiled at her reflection, turning around, but a faint shimmer shone from the gem caught her eye as her back was to the mirror.

She gave the brooch a tug to undo the pin, but it clung onto the wool in a strange way, as though it was part of the material. But the weirdest part was that it somehow seemed to glow black with what seemed to be an otherworldly energy. She pulled at the brooch to find its seam, but a growing approach of black in front of her.

It was her own stomach, which stuck out a few inches further than usual. In a brief instance she was gripped by the fear that she'd been living more a lazy life style than she'd thought, but upon rubbing it with her hand it instantly swelled several times it's size and began to hung on top of her belt with all its weight, causing the buckle to tear apart as the front of her black shirt tore open.

"WHAT THE HELL?!!?!" But she looked back at the reflection to see a large, round growth sprouting around her rear end that tore through the back of her jeans.

But a powerful itching coarsed through her limbs as the cells beneath her skin started to change, the skin on fattening limbs turning into a sleek black with sharp hairs growing on their undersides. A patch of white hair floofed out of her collar as her chest sprouted a garden of fluff, while the exposed skin of her stomach stiffened into dark ridges of a thigh exoskeleton.

Her mind was flooded with her own senses, making he unable to resist the transformation spreading through her body. Her clothes were completely shredded around the expanding girth of her limbs, but the jacket remained intact around her enormous size. She was becoming obese at a size no human could ever believe was possible, but the human aspects of her form dematerialized beneath her monochromatic exterior. Her head was the last to go, but as the fur stretched over her face her nostrils fused shut before her nose completely flattened into her face, mouth melding into stubby pincers in the corners of her beak whilst her eyes turned a shiny black, which two spindly antennae growing that hung against her back.

It was as her transformation wrapped around that her body that her stomachs big enough to stand in the ground, and her butt growth had developed into a large thorax. But she still clutched her head and let out a sick groan as her growth continued, in more ways than one. As every part of her body bloated up, she was also growing taller, giving her ballooning weight as much volume within the now cramped attic as possible.

By the time the blur in her eyes began to clear away she was already over nine feet tall, her head touching the ceiling even as the floor bowed under her mass. Her maw was pressed from either side by both of her gargantuan breasts perched on her stomach, which had ballooned into an almost spherical blob of flesh packed that formed a soft crease around its equator as it poured into a huge mountain the ground, packed within black armor. Her arms and legs hung off her bulk like overstuffed ink blobs, weighing down on her muscles while filled a few feet in width each by drooping fat.

What...what happened? Her mind was still a mess in the wake of her sensory bombardment, but the feeling and sight of her enormous frame tossed the dirt around even more, like she was waking up from a dream. She looked over her shoulder to see her thorax, which was now the size of a minivan, but with only enough of a chance before physics finally caught up to her size.

CRACK

The floor tore apart beneath her, as did the next floor, which she completely obliterated before slamming into the concrete floor of the basement floor.

Above her, she could see the floors above her dissected with two holes covering almost the entire span of the room above, the walls of which were covered with blueprints. At the edge half of he husband's head peeked over, his eyes wide with horror at the sight of the creature below.

"W-W-W-What... W-What the..."
1122312122222222222222222.title: I'm actually a magician IRL.

11223121222222222222222221.content:
James looked in fear at the 25ft creature that stood up in front of him. Rachel held her head and then turned to look in a mirror and screamed very loudly. She had become a huge 25ft tall, black and white striped moth; a silk moth from the looks of it with big black eyes the size of watermelons. She saw that her thorax was the size of a mini-van and was so big that it burst through the wall. Her legs were as thick as tree trunks, to say nothing of her arms. Speaking of which, she now had four arms, just like a bug and had fluffy antennae with a colossal 28ft wide belly. Finally, she had a pair of lavender and pale pink colored wings that looked like they had a wingspan of 50ft and her hair had turned a palish pink color as well. Rachel was in utter horror at what she had become. Also, she was completely stark naked.

"Oh my gosh!" shouted the colossal silk moth woman. "What has happened to me?!" James backed away in fear of the moth that he didn't realize was his wife. "James!" yelled Rachel. "Don't panic It's till me, James. It's me!" James then gasped in surprise. "Rachel?" asked James. Rachel lowered her head and James looked in shock at his wife. "What happened to you, Rachel? You're a giant moth." Rachel just fluttered her wings. "You know that wardrobe that you asked me to chop up?" "Well did you?" asked James. "I need it chopped up for my act." Rachel gave a hiss and forced her husband to cower.

"Well," said Rachel. "SURPRISE! There was a black and white jacket inside with a brooch shaped like a moth and when I put it on, POOF! Now, I'm a giant bug. And I think I'm getting bigger." Rachel stepped forward and accidentally broke the table while at the same time, flattening the couch beneath her huge stomach. James could only look in surprise at what his wife had transformed into. "Unbelievable," he said. "This is unbelievable. It shouldn't be possible."

Rachel then lifted her head and grunted because now her head was in the attic while her body was downstairs. James had to move out of the way as debris fell down from the destroyed attic. "Well," said Rachel. "For a stage magician, somehow you must've gotten a hold of something that was really magical and it cursed me. Oh, this is just great. My mother warned me not to marry you. If only she knew." "Calm down, Rachel! We'll get through this. Of course, I don't think that I can change you back." Rachel let out a scream at that as the moth giantess grabbed her feelers and then shook her head a few times.

Rachel would've ranted again over her predicament but then both she and her husband heard a very loud rumbling sound that caused the walls to crack. Rachel then felt her bloated stomach and moaned. "James!" she yelled. "I am starving!" James knew that having a giant upset wife was not a good situation and it would be even worse with the moth giantess hungry, so he went into the kitchen and emptied out the entire fridge. Rachel wasn't even bothering to chew her food. Instead she swallowed everything whole. An entire roast chicken, several tomatoes, an entire watermelon, a stick of butter, an entire gallon of orange juice, an entire clove of broccoli, a bowl of leftover mashed potatoes, a rib roast... everything disappeared down the black hole that was Rachel's mouth. Rachel then banged her stomach. "Ja-ames!" she yelled. "I'm still hungry." "Calm down, Rachel. Don't get upset." James emptied out the Lazy Susan and decided to leave Rachel to her feast, lest she decide to eat him.

As Rachel was eating, she seemed to be getting bigger and James begun to think about it. He looked over his plans for his next act and threw them into the way of Rachel's hungry hands for Rachel to swallow the papers whole. "This is my big break," said James to himself. "Perhaps Rachel being a moth might not be such a bad thing after all." James then had to cover his ears as Rachel paused from eating to let out a rather loud belch.

James walked up to the phone to make a call. "Hello, this is Jameson the Great. I have finally found something that will make the audience drop dead in awe. The ultimate magic trick." As James was speaking on the phone, Rachel had eaten everything edible in the house and was still hungry, so she tore out and ate the entire fridge. Then she noticed the curtains and licked her lips before slurping them up. The hungry moth even decided that the car would be delicious and picked it up to devour it with a loud crunch. Rachel then pulled out a tire from her mouth and looked at it curiously.

At that moment, James hung up on the phone. "Good news, Rachel." "What's good news?" James let out a laugh and hugged a large section of his enormous moth wife's titanic tummy. "I found my big break and its you. I've decided that your moth form will be the act." Rachel's jaw dropped at that comment as all four of her arms felt her massive thorax and booty. "Now," said James. "We need to get you a new outfit. It wouldn't be right for you to show up at the palace naked." "The palace?"

James laughed and nodded his head. "Get ready, Rachel, my giant fat angel, we're going to be performing..."
11223121222222222222222221.title: The Moth(Wo)man Cometh

11223121222222222222222223.content:
Espionage is a real crapshoot. These days, the secret agent game can really go sour given things don’t go as planned and things rarely do go as planned. Our stories begins in an airport in Brisbane Australia where two characters resembling secret agents dressed in black with dark glasses were waiting.
