One was a dark skinned aborigine girl while the other was a fair skinned young man with long red hair. The girl was holding up a communications device designed to resemble a violet brooch when a voice came out of it. “Agent Charlie, Agent Delta,” said a voice on the phone. “Do you read me?” “Loud and clear Bravo,” said Agent Charlie, the female agent. “We expect the courier for Dr. Wafflestomper is about to arrive in Brisbane. The root rat has been conducting weird experiments again.” “Keep your eyes open, Agent Charlie,” said Agent Bravo. “We have reports that he’s been researching the local venomous animals. Whatever the mad doctor is up to, you can know for sure that it won’t be anything good.” “Roger, Bravo.” Said Charlie.

Agent Delta let out a scoff. “Teacher’s pet.” “Be quiet, Delta,” said Charlie. “You heard Bravo, this is a dangerous criminal that we’re dealing with. Who knows what Dr. Wafflestomper is up to.” On a plane arriving in Brisbane, there was a man with a mysterious package. On the man’s neck was a tattoo of a yellow double oblong and the man was then looking at his watch before it beeped. “I’m on my way back to Brisbane right now with the formula. Doc, I don’t mean any offense but perhaps this plan is ill-thought out.” On the watch phone, there was the sound of a goofy voice. “What do you mean my plan is ill-thought out? It couldn’t be simpler. I just took a venomous animal from the outback and synthesized its venom in order to create the ultimate super weapon that will take over the Brisbane area!” “Yeah, but a platypus?” “Platypi are venomous.” “Only the males.” Said the courier under his breath. “What was that?” asked Dr. Wafflestomper on the other end of the phone. The courier let out a sigh. “Nothing, Doc.” The man with the oblong tattoos then let out a sigh as he hung up with his boss. “I passed up the job in G.H.O.U.L. for this?” The courier then opened up his briefcase and looked at a vial of what appeared to be a strange aqua colored slime inside of it. “I really hope this stuff works like the doc said it will. I’m getting really sick of his idiotic plans.”

Back at the airport, Agents Charlie and Delta had bought sodas to pass the time as they waited for the courier to show up. “So,” said Agent Delta to his partner. “How are we going to know this courier when we see him.” “Well,” said Agent Charlie. “For one, Agent India said that he was carrying a strange briefcase and that he had a double oblong tattoo on his neck. I don’t know what Dr. Wafflestomper is up too, but I know that it’s probably going to be something stupid.” “Don’t get me started,” said Agent Delta. “When I signed up for Interpol, I had no idea that we’d be dealing with the goofiest mad scientist in the world. His plans are downright moronic.” Charlie lowered her sunglasses to speak with Delta. “It’s usually idiots who are the more dangerous ones. And speaking of idiots.”
 Charlie pointed to Dr. Wafflestomper’s courier and both agents walked up to him. The courier paused slightly just to look into his briefcase in order to take a good look at the strange vial that he had been carrying with him and then he nodded his head. However, that’s when Agent Charlie and Agent Delta appeared and caught the man by surprise. “What’s in the case?” asked Charlie with a smirk. “Something for us? Or something for the doc.” The courier begun to sweat and then ran away with the secret agents both running after him.
11223121222222222222222223.title: The Land Down Under

choices: She Runs Into Trouble Along the Way
112231212222222222222222231.content:
The courier was running out of the airport as Charlie and Delta went after him. He saw a cart carrying various luggage and tossed it at the agents, knocking Delta to the ground. “Delta!” yelled Charlie. Delta grunted. “I’m fine. Get him.” Agent Charlie nodded her head and ran after the man with the oblong tattoo. Charlie took out a soda bottle that turned into a motorcycle in order to chase after the thug as he was driving away in a car. Charlie pursued the courier and the courier shot at her but Charlie moved in a zigzag pattern to avoid the bullets. The man with the oblong tattoo was so busy trying to shoot Agent Charlie that he neglected to realize that he was about to crash into a telephone pole.
 The man yelled and then dove out of the car before rolling to the side in an attempt to get away as Charlie parked her motorcycle and made it turn back into a bottle. Charlie ran after the enemy agent and took out her gun to shoot at him. However, she missed and shot the handles right off of the case that the man was carrying.That case filled with slime fell on the ground and Charlie stepped on it, breaking the case and causing the slime to turn into smoke and envelop her. “Crikey!” she yelled. The man with the oblong tattoo bit his mouth. “Oh no,” he groaned. “The boss will kill me.” Charlie ran out and coughed before she continued to follow after the man. Delta ran forward but didn’t see Charlie anywhere in sight. “Where did she go?” asked Delta about the whereabouts of his partner. Charlie at the time was continuing to run and she even appeared to be coughing. “Oh,” groaned Charlie. “What was in that stuff.” Charlie coughing so uncontrollably was what allowed the man with the oblong tattoo to run away and escape. However, Charlie was about to have even bigger problems to worry about.

Agent Charlie had ran out into the street and was coughing. Since it was dark, she couldn’t find the man who had hid in a telephone booth. “That super steroid was meant for use on platypuses,” muttered the mysterious man. “Not humans. Who knows what will happen?” Sydney ran down an alleyway and was coughing to herself. “Oh,” groaned Charlie. “I don’t feel good.” Charlie begun to feel dizzy and from the looks of it, her skin was changing an aqua green color as her hair turned yellow-green and as she walked forward, she appeared to be getting taller. Charlie held her stomach and suddenly it had become very bloated as she hiccuped. The female agent’s belly expanded to the point where it tore through her uniform and made her belt snap off. Charlie’s pants also slipped off as her thighs expanded and her aqua skin appeared to be turning into fur. Sydney noticed how big her belly was and gasped. “What in Blue Billa Bong?!” she yelled. Charlie lifted up her stomach and what she saw of her feet had turned into webbed claws. She looked at her hands and saw they were the same way before she gasped. “Oh no.” She said. Charlie then grunted and held her face as she appeared to have sprouted a large duck’s bill. She bent down to see that her ass was the size of a monster truck and in seconds, it had sprouted a beaver’s tail.

Once the transformation was over, Charlie looked and saw she had transformed into an enormous and obese anthropomorphic platypus woman. She gave a nervous trill before she shook her head. As Sydney was walking away, she noticed that she was passing by a closed hat store that had a large fedora decoration on top. The giant platypus girl picked up the fedora and then placed it on her head. “I don’t know why,” she said. “But this seems more natural. Now, I had better find Delta before some other yobbos show up.”

With that, the enormous platypus begun to walk away.
112231212222222222222222231.title: Platypus Alert

112231212222222222222222232.content:
The day (like many days mentioned in these stories) begun harmlessly in San Francisco. There was a young woman at a gym who was walking up towards the treadmill. Her name was Farrah. She was a 25-year old Muslim woman who was visiting the gym like she did every Friday while her husband was busy at work. However, after a while, the process had become mundane and Farrah just exhaled and let out a sigh as she walked up towards the treadmill. “Welcome to you life,” thought Farrah to herself. “So this is what I have to look forward to on Friday.” The woman blew on her hijab as she was wondering what to do next. She was watching the news on a television in the gym but everything was either uninteresting or bad news. “Good grief,” thought Farrah to herself. “I can’t believe somebody would do such a terrible thing, especially a dentist. It’s appalling. Then again, hanging him would probably be going a bit too far.” Farrah then begun to gag and had to stop the treadmill. She was thirsty.

“It happens every time,” groaned the female athlete to herself as she walked up to a nearby fountain. “I always get tuckered out and have to stop for water.” As Farrah refilled her water bottle, she reflected on how she seemed to always get dehydrated easily. She hated it because it kept her from really getting anything done and she let out a sigh. However, right before Farrah could resume her exercise, she felt somebody tap her in the back. Farrah turned and wound up kicking a man in the waist as he grunted. The man was a middle-aged looking gray-haired man with glasses in a strange suit and grunted in pain before he got on his knees.

“I mean you no harm.” Grunted the man. However, Farrah just raised an eyebrow. “Really?” she asked. “I’ve heard that from perverts hundreds of time. It’s a good thing I took those self-defense classes. For the record, I’m married.” “Wait, wait, wait, wait,” said the man. “I’m serious. I represent Crystal Cola.” “Crystal Cola?” asked Farrah. “That sports drink they sell at the gym.”  The man got up before he further explained his intentions to Farrah. “That’s correct, ma’am. My intention is to find somebody who can test out our company’s new experimental drink that won’t be ready for the market for at least a month.” Farrah raised her eyebrow again. “Go on.”

Farrah didn’t know where this was going but anything experimental sounded absolutely dangerous. However, it would probably do well to relieve her of the monotonous lifestyle she had been leading for so long. The representative then took out a strange purple can of soda with a black steampunk robotic camel on the front of it. “This is Crystal Cola’s newest albeit top secret product; Camel Cola. One can of these soda and the drinker will be able to go without drinking anything for weeks, in theory that is.”

The man handed the can to Farrah who proceeded to take it before she held it up and inspected it. “The problem is,” said the representative. “We still need to test this soda out to make sure that it works. Of course, there aren’t a lot of people willing to volunteer for this experiment. Just for the record, this soda has no sugar or calories.” “Where’s the fun in that?” asked Farrah to herself. “So, you want me to test it out.” The man nodded his head. “After you drink the soda, keep the can. There’s a phone number to call for after the three weeks are up to see if it works. Then we’ll be ready to unleash it. Good day to you, Mrs...” “Just call me Farrah.” Said Farrah.

 Once the man left, Farrah went into the women’s locker room and carefully read the soda can. From the looks of it, she couldn’t tell exactly what was in Camel Cola. “Hmm,” she said. “This seems ominous. However, it could also be fun.” Farrah shrugged her shoulders and then started to drink the soda.
112231212222222222222222232.title: The Enchanted Cola Test

1122312122222222222222222321.content:
Farrah swallowed the soda and then coughed a few times. “Ugh,” she said. “They could do well to improve upon the taste. I just hope I don’t get thirsty again.” Farrah crunched the can and would’ve thrown it out, but then she remembered that the man had explicitly instructed her to keep the can for after the test was over to call the company back. So, she simply put the can in the back of her shorts pocket and then walked out to get back to exercising. Farrah went back on the treadmill and was walking for half an hour without so much as a sweat. From the looks of it, the soda appeared to be doing exactly what the man was supposed to do. Or so she thought, Farrah didn’t notice it, but her butt had gotten slightly wider and she appeared to have sprouted a tail.

Farrah then moved on to the rowing machine but as she was operating the machine, she failed to notice that her arms and legs actually seemed to be getting wider and thicker. The other patrons of the gym were sweating. Farrah then moved on to lifting a large weight that from the looks of it, weighed two thousand pounds. As she was lifting, she was listening to her iPod and failed to notice that with every lift her stomach seemed to be bulging and bulging. Several bodybuilders took note of this and put their own weights down right before Farrah stood up and loosened her hijab due to the intense heat. She even blew out some air before she decided to leave the gym.

As Farrah checked out, the gym manager gasped because Farrah was now 10ft tall and looked like she weighed 600lbs of flab. Before the gym manager could say anything, several of the bodybuilders came to confront him. “What kind of a place are you running? We saw that woman exercising all day and she suddenly became obese.” The manager was mumbling nervously as he tried in vain to explain exactly what was happening. But he couldn’t find the right words to explain it and found himself in hot water.

Farrah was jogging home, knowing that her husband would be back from work soon and was so busy listening to music that she had no idea that she was getting bigger with every step. First, her feet turned into what looked like hooves and burst out of her shoes. Her ass expanded as her shorts were stretched out and shrunk. Her belly bulged out as a thick golden brown fur started to sprout and grow all over her growing body. She then begun to slouch as her neck extended and two large humps grew out of her new hunched back, tearing through her shirt. Finally, Farrah’s ears stretched out and then her mouth appeared to stretch out into a snout before she gave a grunt. Of course, Farrah had yet to realize that she was indeed transforming.

 By the time Farrah got back home, the young woman had transformed into a 15ft tall and 10 ton Bactrian camel (Bactrian camels are the camels with two humps while single-humped camels are called dromedaries). Her breasts had expanded to E-cup size with thighs as thick as boulders and a 20ft belly and butt. Farrah had some trouble squeezing in through the front door until she finally got all the way through and shook her head. “Man,” she said. “We’ve got to get a bigger door. Francis is going to be home soon. I better get dinner ready and...” That’s when Farrah gasped. She looked in surprise because there was a mirror in front of her. Farrah looked into the mirror and saw her transformed state. She even turned around to see how her butt had gotten so big that her panties and shorts tore off. She was only wearing a hijab and a tanktop at this point. “Oh my.” She said in shock at her transformed state.

How does Farrah take her transformation into a huge and obese two-humped camel?
1122312122222222222222222321.title: It Must be Wednesday

choices: He Calls the Soda Company to Complain
He Decides to Try and Get Used to It
11223121222222222222222223212.content:
Farrah looked in shock at the titanic camel that was now her and then held up both of her massive butt cheeks before rubbing her two humps and stretching her obese neck. Most people would be afraid of such a development. However, Farrah was not only not afraid but she was smiling. “Well,” she said. “This is strange. It must be a side-effect. No wonder they call it camel cola. So that’s what they mean when they mention going weeks without water. Huh, it looks more along the lines that I’m retaining said water. The Pacific Ocean from the looks of it.” Farrah tapped her 20ft wide girth and then let out a laugh. “I might’ve just found a permanent cure for terminal boredom. Oh my gosh, it’s almost five o’clock. Francis will be home soon. I better get dinner ready.”

The camel giantess walked into the kitchen, lowering her neck in order to avoid injuring herself on the doorway. However, she soon had trouble because one of her humps got stuck. She grunted a few times before she squeezed her humps through, but then she couldn’t move because now her butt was stuck in the doorway. Farrah let out a groan and pulled on her hijab slightly before she simply wiggled her massive badonk in order to shatter the doorway and make it bigger. “Geez,” said the obese and huge camel woman. “If it isn’t the humps, it’s the cheeks. Nobody said being a camel was going to be easy. I might have actually gotten bigger. Maybe I’m still growing. It’s gonna be real fun to see how big I get.” Farrah then laughed and took out a leg of lamb to cook for hers and Francis’s dinner.

- - - - - - - - - - - -

While Farrah was preparing dinner, her husband, Francis was riding on the bus home from work and was reading the newspaper as he was eating a hamburger. “Farrah would kill me if she knew I was eating this,” he thought to himself. “But just because she isn’t allowed to eat this stuff doesn’t mean I can’t. Nobody said mixed marriages were without their complications.” Francis quickly got rid of the burger wrapper before he returned to the paper. “Crystal Cola Suspected of Questionable Chemicals: The soft drink company, Crystal Cola, is believed at the threat of going bankrupted, resorted to the use of unknown and potentially dangerous chemicals within their soft drinks. Might be facing a lawsuit.” Francis then let out a scoff. “Give me a break. Nobody really knows what’s in those soft drinks. Ah, here is my stop. Farrah should be home already.”

Francis got off and walked into the house only to look in surprise at the large hoof prints pressed into the floorboards. “What the heck happened to the floor?” he asked. “It looks like a camel's been stomping around on it. For that matter, what happened to the doorway. Farrah, are you in here.” “Oh!” yelled Farrah. “Hello, Francis. How was work?” Francis then turned his head and looked in horror and surprise as Farrah waddled out of the kitchen. He saw the giant obese camel woman who was his wife staring down on him. At first he didn’t realize it was Farrah but when he saw her veil on the creature, he all but fainted because he knew it could only be his wife. Farrah then stretched out her neck to kiss her husband and cover his face in camel saliva.

“Farrah!?” Francis yelled. “What happened to you?” “Oh,” said Farrah with a giggle. “I was at the gym when somebody asked me to test out an unreleased soft drink. That’s the can in came in over there.” Francis walked up to the can that was on the table and picked it up to inspect as he was still processing the fact that his wife was now an enormous and fat camel. “So, anyhow, it turned me into a camel. Who knew. Oh, dinner will be ready soon.” With that, Farrah walked back into the kitchen, leaving Francis to stare at her enormous humps and big rear.

How exactly does Francis take this development?
11223121222222222222222223212.title: Man and Camel

112231212222222222222222232121.content:
Francis looked at his wife nervously, completely dumbstruck that she wasn't taking her condition at all seriously. He held up the can of Camel Cola and noticed that there was a phone number written on the side. "Uh," he said. "Honey. I'm going to just make a call." "That's fine, Honey." Said Farrah as she continued to prepare dinner. However, the phone was right behind Farrah and the camel woman's massive ass was in the way. Francis let out a sigh as she squeeze past his wife's colossal butt cheeks and wound up pressed to the wall right by the phone. Francis dialed on the phone as his huge wife unwittingly begun to grind him to the wall as she wiggled her butt.

Francis nervously stroke one of the camel woman's humps right before he heard a dial tone and then a click. "Hello, Crystal Cola. How may I help you?" "Do you make the energy drink, Camel Cola?" asked Francis with an angry tone in his voice. "My name is Francis Cohen. My wife Farrah took your kooky cola and it mutated her into a camel the size of a dinosaur." "What?" asked the man on the other end of the line. "Please hold, sir. We'll get to the bottom of this." Francis tapped on one of Farrah's massive butt cheeks. "Poor choice of words." Francis had no choice but to wait.

As Francis was on the phone, Farrah had finished cooking a mouton dinner and brought the meal to the table. Francis was still holding the phone while he had his dinner and noticed that his wife was voraciously devouring her meat while using 4 chairs at once to hold up her bulk and her belly was even pouring over onto the table. Francis was still waiting and bit his lip nervously. "Isn't it cannibalism for a camel to eat meat?" Farrah just shrugged her shoulders and continued to eat. Francis drank his water as he continued to hold the phone and then realized that Farrah had no beverage to speak, only food.

"Put down the phone, Honey," said Farrah. "I kind of like being a big camel." "But you look even bigger than you were a few minutes ago. How big are you going to get?" "How should I know?" asked Farrah. "I thought you'd like this, honey." Francis bit his lip slightly. "Everybody is going to talk." At that exact moment, the Crystal Cola company finally responded to Francis.

"Mr. Cohen," said the man on the other end of the line. "I just checked with my superiors and they apologize deeply for this. As it turns out, the Camel Cola was made using actual camel genes. The idea was that it would allow human beings to stay hydrated without having to drink for a long period of time, much like camels do. However, it turns out that only 1 in every million people actually have a certain gene that's required for the mutation that your wife has undergone to take place." "Well," said Francis in annoyance. "What about the antidote." The service representative let out a deep sigh. "I'm afraid that we have no way to turn your wife back to normal." "I'm going to be married to a camel for the rest of my life!?" yelled Francis. "How could your idiot company be so irresponsible."

The representative begun to sweat as he knew all too well that Francis was in a position to file a lawsuit against the company. "Mr. Cohen. I can assure you that we are doing all that we can to refine the formula to make sure what happened to your wife doesn't happen again." Before Francis could open his mouth, Farrah felt her stomach and let out a deep belch. "Ugh," said the camel giantess. "I think I ate too much." Farrah then let out a hiccup and she begun to grow again and her humps pushed against the ceiling and caused it to break. Francis gasped and stepped back as the growing Farrah crushed the table underneath her hoof.

The camel woman stopped growing and revealed that she was now 50ft tall and her belly and butt were both 100ft wide. The two-humped giantess held up her massive girth to keep it from crushing the house but her butt had expanded so much that it touched the ground even when she was standing up and crushed several cars, even making one go off. On the street, there was a man staring as the dog he was walking barked at the enormous camel lady. "Oh darn," said Farrah with a laugh. "I seem to have outgrown the house.

Francis sputtered a few times as he saw his wife walking away from the house with the hole in the roof and then turned angrily to the phone. "Now she's 50ft tall! You can expect a lawsuit, buster!" "Don't lose your temper, sir. I just contacted the CEO of Crystal Cola and..." "Get him on the line!" Farrah shook her head. "Francis," she said. "You really have to learn to control your temper. It isn't that bad." "Farrah," said Francis. "You're not taking this with the seriousness that it deserves."

At that moment, the CEO of Crystal Cola was on the line. "Hello, Mr. Cohen. I understand you have a complain." "I've got several complaints, you jerk! Your soda turned my wife into a camel so big and fat, she could be mistaken for Godzilla's wife! I am ready to sue you for creating such a dangerous product." "Mr. Cohen," said the CEO. "I understand your anger. But if you hear me out, we can come to an agreement. I might not be able to turn your wife back to normal, but perhaps we can come to a solution that doesn't involve a lawsuit."

But is Francis willing to listen?
112231212222222222222222232121.title: Can't Ignore the Camel

1122312122222222222222222322.content:
It was the day before Halloween in Salem Massachusetts and everyone was getting ready. However, our story is about two houses that stand out in particular. The first house is the home of Tim and Lydia Spellmans, a goth couple who were busy decorating their house for Halloween. The pale-skinned and slightly chubby Lydia was busy carving a pumpkin while Tim was setting up a gargoyle statue. “It’s too bad that Halloween only comes once a year, Lydia,” said Tim. “It would be nice if it came once a month.” “It is too bad,” said Lydia. “For the ghosts and ghouls and witches to only have one day to have fun. Take a look at this, Tim.” Lydia showed her husband a jack-o-lantern carving in the shape of a skull and Tim let out a laugh. The fact was, for the Spellmans, Halloween could never come too soon.

Unfortunately, this was not the same for their cranky middle-aged neighbor, Maxine Parr. Maxine was a grumpy blonde haired and rail-thin woman who had a long nose that looked almost like a bird’s beak. She saw the Spellmans preparing for Halloween and was disgusted. Maxine hated being next door to a couple of goths (she considered pink to be the only beautiful color in existence) and she also hated how cheerful the Spellmans were. “I hate Halloween.” She said as she took out her keys. But then, Lydia noticed her. “Hi, Maxine,” said Lydia. “Aren’t you going to decorate your house for Halloween.” Maxine scoffed. “A holiday where idiots dress up as fake monsters and witches only to hand out junk food to a bunch of dirty brats? If you think that I’m going to take part in such a stupid holiday, you have another thing coming, Spellman.” With that, Maxine slammed the door. Tim shook his head. “That woman is never happy. Don’t waste your breath, Lydia.” But Lydia shrugged her shoulders. “Halloween isn’t for everyone, Tim. Maybe she has bad memories of Halloween.”

What the Spellmans didn’t know was that Maxine was a REAL witch and as she walked into her house, she took off her scarf to reveal a scar from an attempted lynching. She looked at a painting of herself from the times of the Salem Witch trials and then saw a literal skeleton in the closet that looked like it was actually real and looked like it had been burned. “Did you ever see anything so ridiculous, Abigail?” asked Maxine to the bones. “Halloween is an insult to all us actual witches. Did you ever see a witch wearing a pointy hat or be covered in warts? That stereotype makes me psychotic. And living next door to those insufferable Halloween-loving Spellmans really drives me up the wall. I am just about ready to snap.” Before Maxine could continue on with her tirade, she heard giggling from next door.

Maxine looked out the window to see the Spellmans from next door and was horrified. Lydia was wearing a costume that consisted of a long blue robe with a tiara made out of spikes and her hair worn in large horns that looked like a jester’s hat. She was also carrying a long fake wand. “How do you like my witch queen outfit, Tim, honey?” asked Lydia. Tim let out a whistle. “Lydia, baby,” he said. “You look gorgeous.” This was the last straw and Maxine was so mad seeing Lydia in a “witch queen” outfit, that she blew smoke out of her ears. “That’s it! No more Ms. Nice Witch! That was the straw that broke the camel’s back. I’m going to get that Lydia Spellman!”

 Maxine was soon working at a cauldron and mixing weird potions together before she emptied the cauldron into some dust. She smirked as she held up the bowl of dust. The next morning, she saw Lydia and her husband having breakfast and then noticed Lydia eating a donut. Using her magic, Maxine blew her spell dust in such a way that it would land on Lydia’s donut as she took a bite into it. “Think of this as a new twist on an old curse, Spellman,” said Maxine with an evil grin. “According to fairytales, true love’s kiss turns a frog into a prince. As soon as your husband leaves for work tonight and kisses you, the fun can begin.” Maxine then let out a sinister laugh and kicked back to watch the fun.
1122312122222222222222222322.title: A Very Bad Halloween

choices: It's Only  Tim, He Forgot Something
11223121222222222222222223221.content:
That night, the sun was going down and Maxine looked at her watch as she smirked wickedly. “Soon, Tim will be heading to work. He’ll kiss Lydia goodbye and leave her at the mercy of the trick-or-treaters. Imagine the look on the brats’ faces when they see the creature waiting for them with candy tonight.” Maxine then laughed fiendishly as her evil plan was about to be put into action.

At that time, just as Maxine predicted, Tim was kissing Lydia goodbye and Lydia was standing in her witch queen’s outfit. “I’m sorry you can’t stay to greet the trick-or-treaters with me, Tim.” “It’s alright, Lydia,” said Tim. “You know I have to go to work. Try not to scare them too much, my little witch queen.” “Happy Halloween, Timmy.” Tim kissed Lydia again but then Lydia felt her head and moaned slightly. “Lydia?” asked Tim. “Sweetheart? Are you feeling alright?” Lydia just gave a hiccup before she spoke again. “It’s nothing. Probably just a little migraine. Have a good night at work.” Tim kissed Lydia again and then walked away. As Tim was leaving, he saw Maxine with a smirk on her face. “Good evening, Tim,” said Maxine wickedly. “What do you feel about amphibians?” Tim just raised an eyebrow and got in his car before driving off. “That’s weird,” he said. “It’s not like Maxine to be courteous.”

Maxine then immediately ran back into her house to look out her window and into Lydia’s to see Lydia getting the candy ready for the trick-or-treaters. She looked at herself in her witch costume in the mirror and kept practicing an evil laugh, but it just turned into a giggle. Lydia’s giggling irked Maxine as she was watching. “Laugh while you can, little girl. You’re about to feel a little hoppy.” Lydia continued to feel her stomach and then went to get some aspirin. Lydia swallowed a couple of aspirin tablets and then realized something. “Oh,” she said. “I was supposed to take these with food.” Lydia saw an apple in a nearby fruit bowl, but instead of walking out to get the fruit, she instinctively and spontaneously flicked out her tongue and snatched the apple into her mouth before she swallowed it whole and gasped. Maxine watched the scene and laughed.

“Did I do that?” asked Lydia rather sheepishly. “What just happened?” Lydia then gave a few hiccups and held her stomach again. Before Lydia could say anything else, she let out a loud croak and then a dragonfly flew by. Instinctively, the young woman snapped up the creature in her mouth and then chewed it up before eating it. Lydia gasped and blushed. What is happening to.... croak.” Lydia held her stomach and felt it bulge out to several feet wide and then she felt her legs expand as well. The goth girl then screamed because she appeared to be getting taller. Maxine looked in confusion as she was spying on Lydia. “What’s going on?” asked Maxine. “That’s not supposed to happen.” Then Maxie grunted and held her head. “That idiot, Tim! He must’ve kissed Lydia multiple times.”

Lydia grunted and groaned as her skin turned a grayish shade of yellow and her mouth stretched out as she grew a triple-chin. She ballooned to 10ft tall and had a 15ft wide belly and butt with D-cup breasts and then she looked at her hands to see her fingers were becoming webbed and she gasped. Surprisingly however, her witch queen costume was staying completely in tact as she was growing. Then Lydia saw warts sprout all over her body and then let out a croak. Maxine gasped and actually fainted when she saw what her evil spell did to Lydia. Lydia was now a 10ft tall, 6 ton and possibly still growing anthropomorphic toad. She let out a croak as she tried to wrap her head around her current predicament. But before she could even begin to ponder what happened, there was a knock at the door.
11223121222222222222222223221.title: Feeling Jumpy

112231212222222222222222232212.content:
Lydia gasped. She knew that at the door there was no doubt trick-or-treaters and that meant somebody would see her in her transmogrified form. Next door, Maxine got up and she was very worried. “Greet Beelzebub,” she said. “If those brats see Lydia in her transformed state, they’ll realize that there is a witch in town. They’ll hang me for sure. Wait. What am I worried about. This isn’t Salem. They don’t hang witches here. I hope.” Lydia was just as concerned as her evil neighbor was and gave a croak of distress. “Oh my gosh,” she said. “Oh my gosh. Somebody is going to see me as a 10ft tall toad.” Then Lydia realized something and then slapped herself in her rather fat face. “I’m such an idiot,” she said with a nervous laugh. “It’s Halloween. They’ll just think that I’m in a costume. Well, better get my Halloween on. Maybe this could be fun.” Lydia gave a croak and then started to waddle up towards the door. As she did so, she spotted a praying mantis on the floor. Without even giving a second thought, the toad woman flicked out her tongue and swallowed the mantis whole. However, upon realizing what she did, she gagged and held onto her mouth. "Oh good grief." She then stuck her own tongue out and groaned. But then she decided to grin and bear it and face the awaiting trick-or-treaters and inflated her throat in order to be more intimidating. After all, it was Halloween.

Outside there were three trick-or-treaters. One of them was dressed up as Spider-Man, another boy was dressed up as a vampire and the girl who was with them was dressed as Medusa. The female Chaperone was dressed like Leonardo Da Vinci’s Virtruvian Man and smiled as she knocked on the door again. “You kids are going to enjoy this. The Spellmans practically worship Halloween.” The Spider-Man kid let out a laugh and held up a toy web launcher. “I’m prepared for any scary surprise she might have waiting for us.” “Shush,” said the vampire boy. “She’s coming.”

Lydia’s door opened and the toad woman leapt out and let out a loud and bellowing croak. The three trick-or-treaters screamed at the roaring face of the giant toad woman in front of them. Lydia then stretched out her tongue and swung it like a whip as the children looked at her in fear. She even gave an evil laugh before drawing her tongue back into her mouth and then laughed very sweetly. "Happy Halloween," said Lydia. "The night where the creatures of darkness run free." Lydia laughed again and this time the children laughed with her as she was passing out the candy. "Really cool." "I'll admit, I was so scared."

Neither the children nor their chaperone had any idea that Lydia's amphibian features weren't even part of her costume. "I'm impressed," said the chaperone. "Lydia, that is the most realistic costume I've ever seen. How did you get the warts and drool just right." Lydia gave a nervous laugh so her friend would be none the wiser about her transformation. "Well," she said. "Let's say it wasn't completely my own intention." Lydia's friend nodded her head and then felt Lydia's bloated stomach, much to the enormous toad woman's dismay. "I gotta say," she said. "I'd like to know what you're using for padding. Are you packing pillows underneath there, or is that just a fat suit?" Lydia did not appreciate that crack about her weight and slapped her friend in the face with her tongue. "Okay, okay, touchy aren't we. Okay kids. Off to the next house. Just don't go anywhere near that crank Maxine's house." "Bye, Mrs. Spellman!" "Thanks for the candy!" "I love your costume, Mrs. Spellman." The children and their chaperone walked away, leaving Lydia to smile and shut herself back into her house.

Once the trick-or-treaters had left, Lydia breathed out a rather deep sigh of relief before she spotted a dragonfly flying up ahead. She flicked out her tongue in order to devour the dragonfly just like she devoured the praying mantis from earlier. She then gagged in horror. “I can’t believe it,” she said. “I’m a giant toad and I’m eating bugs and...” Suddenly Lydia heard a ripping sound and saw that the back of the skirt on her witch queen costume was tearing apart. Lydia turned her head and saw her jack-o-lantern print panties. “Oh man,” she groaned. “How am I going to explain this to Tim.” Lydia was pacing back and forth as she was trying to figure out what caused her to transform and even croak a few times as she inflated her throat. The night went on with Lydia answering the door again and again and frightened trick-or-treaters with her appearance. She even swatted the hat off of one chaperone with her long tongue. Fortunately, because it was Halloween, nobody said anything about her monstrous appearance.

Soon, Lydia had been given out all but one handful of candy and let out a sigh. “Well,” she said. “That should be the end of the trick-or-treaters. Of course, Tim is going to be surprised to learn that he’s married to a sumo-sized toad.” Lydia was about to finish off the rest of the candy when she heard a buzzing sound that filled her with dread. “Oh no.” There was a firefly buzzing above and Lydia was trying to fight the urge to eat it. “No,” said Lydia. “I can’t keep this up. I can’t eat another bug.” However, the fire fly was too tempting and Lydia shot out her tongue. However, she missed the firefly and accidentally broke the lightbulb on the ceiling, causing everything to go dark. “Ribbits.” Groaned Lydia. Lydia saw the firefly and jumped up and caught it with her tongue before landing and creating a small quake that shook the entire house. “Oops.” She said. Then, Lydia saw something rather strange that intrigued her.

Next door, Maxine was mixing together a cauldron in front of a statue of a demon of some kind. “Come on,” said Maxine. “Come on. I’ll give you the entire bottle if you can just tell me a way to protect myself from that giant toad.” Lydia gasped because from the looks of it, Maxine was trying in desperation to invoke a demonic ritual of some sort. That was when realization struck. “Oh my gosh!” she yelled. “Maxine is a witch. Something tells me that she had something to do with this. And I thought all this time she was just an unpleasant neighbor.” The toad giantess then let out a croak before she came out of the window in order to confront the witch, causing the windowsill to break under her weight. "I'm going to give that witch a big old piece of my mind.”

Maxine just kept tending to her cauldron and grumbling to herself. "Of all the times for a spell to backfire. Other witches don't have trouble turning people into...." Before Maxine could even finish her sentence, there was a rather violent knocking on her door and then she heard a crashing noise and looked in horror at the now 20ft tall and 8 ton toad woman in front of her who was very mad. Maxine gulped and then stepped back as Lydia lowered her head. "Oh no," said Maxine. "Oh sweet Salem no." Maxine tried to get away but the toad giantess used her enormous girth before staring down at the villainous witch who was at this point frozen in fear.

“I can’t believe it,” said Lydia. “All these years we’ve been neighbors and you were a witch this whole time! I knew you weren’t exactly the most social or pleasant woman, but a witch!? I thought witches were supposed to dress in black and wear a pointed hat.” Maxine lit a fireball into her hand and then snuffed it out as she grit her teeth. “That is yet another way you mortals have bastardized black witchcraft! You are so narrow-minded! This Halloween is a travesty! Your love of these insults to the forces of darkness trigger me, you chubby bitch. You and your husband are so pleasant that it makes me want to vomit. But that “witch queen” costume was the final straw...” “So you turned me into a giant toad?!” Maxine kicked Lydia in the stomach but it was so soft and huge that her foot got stuck and she had to pull it out. “I never meant to turn you into a giant toad. The spell was designed so that you’d turn into a toad after that idiot husband of yours kissed you. But he kissed you three times in a row before the spell could take effect!” Lydia gave a croak and inflated her throat. “Well,” she said to the witch. “This isn’t a problem. You can just turn me back to normal and....”

Maxine begun to jump up and down and grabbed the sides of her hair. “Is there anything between those ears of yours, you ample, addle-minded amphibian!? yelled Maxine angrily. “Why would I design this spell to be capable of changing you back again! It’s permanent!” “Why would you do such a thing!?” yelled Lydia. “You had no way of knowing the spell would actually work the way you wanted.” “Shut up!” Maxine slapped Lydia in the stomach a few times. “I’ve been casting evil spells for years and you dare to tell me how to be a witch!? What do you know about witches and sorcery! You’re just a happy-go-lucky pleasant goth girl who still believes in fairy tales! I hate you! I would like to slit your throat and make a scarecrow out of your....” Before Maxine could finish her rant, Lydia stomped the ground and gave out a rather angry croak. “You know, Maxine,” she said. “I am really starting to lose my temper with you.” “Get real, you ugly bitch! Go back home and throw your hissy fit, little girl. You’re nothing more than an idiotic toad that’s not even worth my time!”

Maxine really shouldn’t have been pushing around such a ginormous toad woman because Lydia was quickly losing her patience with the witch and her insulting ways. Lydia in fact is so absolutely livid that she snaps and proceeds to...
112231212222222222222222232212.title: The Toad and the Witch

11223121222222222222222223222.content:
It begun in a mysterious curio store that had just mysteriously appeared in Venice. In the center of the store, there was a large skull of a minotaur in the center and it appeared to be glowing. “That young man should’ve known better. Now his fiancée is going to be a Pegasus for the rest of her life. That’s not even going into the fact that Pegasi can live for over a thousand years. Well, everyone seems to choose to learn things the hard way.” However, that was when there was a ring at the door and in walked a young woman with short black hair and what looked like a pair of red sunglasses on her head. She was very hourglass-shaped and was wearing a white-feathered coat as she looked around.

“Where’s the shopkeeper?” asked the young woman. “This is a magic shop isn’t it?” “Magic,” said the voice that appeared to be coming out of the skull. “Rarities, curios. For what reason do you enter this shop.” The woman noticed the skull appearing to speak and let out a sigh. “Oh great,” she said. “So the shopkeeper is a ventriloquist. Very cute. My name is Selena Bartolomeo. I came to buy revenge.” The minotaur skull then turned. “Revenge is poisonous, Signorina. Perhaps you should start from the top.” Selena gave a glare. “My boyfriend, currently ex-boyfriend, who I have been dating for 10 years since I met him in highschool, just dumped me. We were going to start a construction company together, but he ditched me for another girl, someone born into money.” Selena slammed her fist on the table. “Lust and greed are deadly sins indeed Ms. Bartolomeo. However, wrath is just as deadly. Perhaps you should think things through before you go through with something so questionable and dangerous.”

But Selena just pounded her fist on the table again and made the skull shake from the sheer force of her fist. “I don’t care! He hurt me and I want to hurt him! So, is there a curse of some kind? Perhaps something to turn him to stone?” The minotaur skull’s eyes then glowed bright red. “Your revenge is right behind you.” Selena turned around, accidentally knocking the skull off the table with her backside right before she saw a strongbox right in front of her. Inside the strongbox was a bottle of a strange pink perfume that read “Pink Flamingo of Horror No. 9.” Selena raised an eyebrow. “You’ve got to be kidding me. A bottle of perfume? You expect me to get revenge on Aldo by spraying him with…” “You do not spray the object of your wrath with this perfume,” said the skull. “You spray yourself with the perfume. Then you will turn into the tool of your very beastly revenge. Just as long as you want it. If I were you, I would take every chance that came your way. This shop won’t be in town tomorrow.”

Selena just let out a scoff and sighed. “Well,” she said. “How much are you asking for it?” When Selena turned around, she looked in surprise because the skull was mysteriously placed back on the table where it had been until it fell. “Oh,” he said. “This one is free. You will be paying for it soon enough.” Selena raised an eyebrow but she wanted revenge and didn’t really care about the details, so she shrugged her shoulders right before she left the store. “She will pay,” said the skull. “I almost feel sorry for her ex-boyfriend, even if what he did drove her to this extreme a decision.”

Selena then walked out of the shop and sniffed the perfume. “You have wronged me, Aldo,” she said. “And for that, you are going to suffer. I might spare your tramp providing she proves not to be as loathsome as you, but you, you I fully intend to destroy. Say your prayers for mercy, because I’m not giving you any.” Selena then sprayed herself with the pink flamingo perfume. She gagged on the perfume and then looked around. She was wondering what would happen next because she hadn’t changed at all. However, even though Selena’s body was normal, her shadow briefly turned into that of a large flamingo. A sudden change was going to take place and it was going to be big.
11223121222222222222222223222.title: Pink Flamingo of Horror No. 9

choices: She Sits Her Fat Ass on Him
112231212222222222222222232221.content:
Selena was walking away and looking all over her body to see if there was any potential change. “I don’t get it,” said the scorned young woman to herself. “What have I been doing wrong? What was that perfume supposed to do? Give me the power to fly, make me an amazon to pulverize Aldo. I dunno. At least it was free. I guess you get what you pay for.” The young Italian girl was walking down the street and up ahead she saw Aldo, her ex-boyfriend, picking up his new girlfriend, Catalina and saw the two of them kissing.” Selena gave a glare. “You poor girl,” she thought to herself. “He doesn’t really love you. You’re just another pretty face with money to him. Oh, that Aldo just makes my skin crawl.” Selena then grunted because her skin really did feel as if it was crawling. “Oh,” she groaned. “I think that I might actually be allergic to that weird perfume.” Selena then grabbed her head because she felt that it was spinning and then ran off.

Selena returned home and she was in her bathroom brushing her teeth as she was thinking about Aldo. In her rage, she brushed so hard that she had worn the brush right down. She threw the brush away and grumbled. “It’s all Aldo’s fault!” she yelled. “I gave him the best years of my life and he throws me aside for Catalina. I’ll bet Catalina doesn’t even know that I exist!” As Selena was growing more and more angered, she looked at the flamingo shape that her shadow had taken. She gasped and then stepped back. But then she grunted and she held out her arms to see bright hot pink feathers growing on them. Selena then saw her hair turn a rose color and then felt her head as her arms were now completely covered in feathers and they appeared to be bulging out. Selena’s face then appeared to have turned into a beak. “What’s happening?” asked Selena. “Is this the purpose of the perfume?” Before Selena could even say another word on the matter, the transformation continued.

She appeared to be getting taller and her neck stretched out. She also felt herself getting fatter as her thighs extended and her ass got so big that it smashed apart her bathtub while her belly got so big that her sink was soon destroyed. It was at this point that Selena realized exactly what that perfume was supposed to do and let out an evil laugh. She was going to have her revenge on her ex-boyfriend after all. “Look out, Aldo,” said Selena. “Here comes Selena.” Selena just continued to laugh as her transformation took place.

At that time, Aldo was with Catalina at Catalina’s mansion and Catalina was giggling in the pool. “Come on, Aldo,” said Catalina. “Come and join me.” Aldo was reading the stock exchange on the newspaper but quickly put it away. “Uh, coming Catalina.” Aldo was laughing to himself. “Once the company’s off the ground,” the scoundrel thought to himself. “I’ll get the naive girl out of the way. She’s so desperate for a man at this point. Sure I had to dump Selena to get to her, but it’s gonna be worth it in the end.” Catalina giggled and Aldo smiled at her and was about to enter the pool.

 However, that was when he heard a stomping sound and the water begun to ripple. “Mama Mia,” said Catalina. “What’s that?” “Bonjourno.” Said Selena’s voice above, somewhat deeper. Catalina and Aldo both looked up and Catalina screamed in horror as Aldo gasped. Selena had at this point, completely transformed into a 40ft high pink flamingo with a very chubby face and thick neck. She had a 50ft ass, a 60ft belly, huge thunder thighs and E-cup breasts as she smiled down at Aldo. Catalina got in the pool and looked in horror. “What is that?” asked Catalina. Catalina then yelled because Aldo hid behind her. “Still as weak and cowardly as ever I see, Aldo.” Said Selena. Aldo then gasped because he recognized that voice. “S-S-Selena?”

Catalina was surprised. “You know this giant flamingo?” she asked her boyfriend. “You alleged boyfriend is a liar and a sneak,” said Selena. “He’s only after your money. I should know. He dumped me for you.” Aldo laughed nervously as Catalina glared at him. “You didn’t tell me you had another girlfriend.” Catalina said in outrage. Aldo gave a nervous laugh but then Selena stomped the ground and Catalina got out of the way. “You stay out of this, Catalina,” said Selena. “I’ve got no beef with you. I just need my revenge on this piece of filth for breaking my heart.” Aldo screamed and moved back as Selena was closing in on him. She was going to make sure that he suffered for how he treated her.
 But how does Selena punish her evil ex?
112231212222222222222222232221.title: Revenge of the Pink Flamingo

112231212222222222222222232222.content:
Love is a many splendored thing. However, it’s also a war. It starts in Athens when a burly looking young boy in his early twenties with glasses is working outside of a flower store and smiled as he was pruning some daffodils. He then smiled and decided to walk away with the floral arrangement. Nearby, there was a young whitish-blonde hair girl in a pair of large black horn-rimmed glasses who was reading a book when the young man walked forward. “Good morning, Odile.” Said the young man as he handed the young woman a pot filled with daffodils. “Hector,” said the girl. “How are you doing?” “What’s important is how you’re doing,” said Hector. “Happy birthday.” “Thanks, Hector. They’re beautiful.” “Not as beautiful as you are.” Said Hector with a joking tone in his voice.

It looked like the two lovebirds would kiss but then there was a honking sound and then a fancy red car drove forward. Inside of the car was a young man Hector’s age with sunglasses. He gave a smile as he walked out and held out a box. “Happy birthday, Odile.” The young man opened the box and revealed that inside was a bottle of strange perfume. “Oh my,” said Odile in surprise. “Thanks, Troy.” Troy gave a smile. “All the way from Paris,” he said. “And there’s more where that came from. I just booked an awesome stay in a hotel in Sparta and…” “Uh, actually Troy, I already had plans with Hector tonight.” “Oh,” said Troy. “No big deal, I can just reschedule for later in the week. Uh, Odile, can Hector and I have a moment alone.”}

Troy and Hector then walked into an alley for Troy to tell Hector what was on his mind. “What’s up, Troy?” “What’s up is that you can forget about Odile. I’m the one who will be with her in the end.” “You don’t know that for sure.” Troy just let out a laugh. “You’re just a flower boy. Don’t you think that Odile deserves a real man?” Odile overheard and rushed in. “Are you boys fighting again.” “Oh,” said Hector. “No, Odile.” “We were just having a discussion, that’s all.” Said Troy. Odile gave a grunt. “Like I said, I had plans with Hector. I don’t want you two fighting over me again, especially not on my birthday.” Hector and Odile walked away, leaving Troy to try to think of a plan to get Odile all to himself.

Troy knew that he needed an Ace in the hole in order to win this game of love triangles, so he decided to walk down the street to a place that looked like it would be promising. It was a magic shop that had a minotaur’s skull in the center of it. He pulled his car up in front of the store and then walked inside. “I read an online article about this place. The last time it showed up somewhere, people have reported seeing a giant flamingo. Of course, I have something else in mind. Now, isn’t there supposed to be a skull somewhere in here?” The minotaur skull then turned around as an ominous wind filled the air. “You called?” he asked. Troy looked in surprise.

“What happened to you?” he asked the skull. “I have a feeling that you weren’t always a minotaur skull.” “I believe that is my business. What do you want?” “The most beautiful woman in Athens.” Said Troy. “Would her name happen to be Helen?” asked the minotaur skull sarcastically. Troy gave a glare. “I am the perfect man for Odile. I’m rich, handsome, athletic, and yet she likes that flower man, Hector. I need a way to ensure she’ll be with the man with whom she belongs.” “We don’t sell love potions here.” Troy beat the minotaur skull on the forehead. “Watch it! Last month a rather fat bottomed Southern sheriff sat on my head.” “I don’t want a love potion you idiot! I heard a rumor that several women turned into giant animals because of your merchandise. A man turned his fiancée into Pegasus for crying out loud.”

The skull spun around a few more times. “You are playing a dangerous game,” said the skull. “There is no guarantee that everything will go as planned. For all that you know, your plan will fail. You may very well lose Odile forever.” However, Troy just slapped the skull and made it spin. “Just give me results. I am not going to lose Odile to Hector. I have an idea, have you heard of the Swan Princess?” “There isn’t a fairytale made that I don’t know,” said the skull. “I read your mind. You want to turn Odile into a swan and make it a curse that will only break if she agrees to marry you.” “And not just any swan. Make her the biggest swan in the world.” The minotaur skull’s eyes glowed bright. “As you wish,” he said. “But you better be ready to accept the consequences should your plan fail?” “Shut up and cast the spell.” Said Troy.

The minotaur skull chanted in strange language and enchanted a nearby swan that proceeded to fly out just as Odile was helping out Hector in his garden. “Oh,” said Odile. “Hector. Looks like you have a visitor.” Odile reached to pet the swan but then the swan bit her as she yelled. “Be careful, Odile,” said Hector. “Swans sometimes bite.” However, the bite mark on Odile’s head proceeded to glow as Odile looked in confusion. An evil spell was about to strike.
112231212222222222222222232222.title: Swans a Swimming

1122312122222222222222222322221.content:
Odile felt her hand throbbing as Hector was bandaging the wound. “Oh my gosh,” said Hector. “I’ve never seen a bite like this before. Something tells me that that was no ordinary swan that bit you.” Odile nodded her head. “I believe it, Hector. That swan acted as if it was possessed. I wish it would’ve given me a closer look. I hope that it wasn’t hurt or anything.” Odile then gave out a honk. Hector looked in surprise. “What was that?” he asked. “Oh,” said Odile. “I’m sure that it was nothing. Odile then heard a ripping sound and turned back to see her butt had outgrown her skirt. “Uh,” she said. “Hector. “What exactly was in that birthday cake you made me.” Hector had to take off his glasses and then he saw that his friend’s ass had not only gotten bigger but sprouted tail feathers.

Odile then grunted in pain. “My feet are killing me.” Odile took off her shoes and gasped because her feet had turned into bright golden webbed talons. “Oh my gosh!” Hector couldn’t believe it. “Odile,” he said. “Something is seriously wrong with you. Odile felt her stomach gurgling and got on her knees as her butt continued to expand and tore her underwear to ribbons as she sprouted feathers all over her body.” Odile then let out a scream that turned into a honk as her neck stretched out. She kept getting bigger as feathers grew on her body and her neck became more and more bloated. She leaned back and pushed her rear against Hector’s house, causing it to crack slightly. Then her breasts expanded and destroyed her shirt, leaving her wearing nothing but a pair of glasses as her face stretched out and her mouth turned into a gold beak. Finally her arms stretched out and turned into huge wings.

 By the time the transformation was complete, Odile was an 80ft tall swan with huge H-cup breasts, a 65ft belly, a 115ft booty. Her wings stretched out and had a wingspan of 130ft in order to allow her ginormous body to fly and she also had thighs so thick that her ankles were toothpicks in comparison. Odile looked down and saw Hector and was shocked while Hector was just as surprised. “Odile, you’re a swan.” Odile looked back to see how huge and obese she was. “A sumo swan. What happened?” Troy let out a laugh as he came forward. “Troy?” asked Odile. “What are you doing here?” Troy walked around and let out another laugh. “Getting exactly what I wanted to happen. So, how’s it feel being the world’s biggest bird. Consider that my ultimate gift to you, Odile.”

“Troy,” said Hector. “You’re not making any sense. How could you be responsible for this?” Troy smiled smugly. “You know that weird store down the street than just opened?” “That creep shop?” asked Odile. “What of it?” “Am I the only one that reads the Internet?!” yelled Troy. “Everywhere that store has showed up something strange happens. A guy married a giant pegasus, all crimes in Texas were thwarted by a minotaur cowgirl as big as a building. So I figured that I’d ask the shopkeeper to place a curse on Odile.” Odile honked and felt her stomach bulging out again. “Curse?” asked Odile. Troy gave a laugh as Hector cracked his knuckles. “This isn’t funny, Troy. How do we turn her back. Troy just gave a rather sinister grin. “There’s only one way to return Odile to her gorgeous self. She must marry me.” Hector gave a gasp and Troy smiled at him smugly. “Face it, Hector. You lost.” Hector held his head down thinking that Troy’s evil plan would work.

Troy thought that with that ultimatum, Odile would agree to marry him. However, instead Odile looked at her reflection in a nearby lake and then shrugged her wings. “I’ll get used to it.” Troy’s eyes then popped. “What?! But you’ll be a giant swan for the rest of your life unless...” “Did I say that I didn’t LIKE being a giant swan, Troy?” asked Odile. “Swans are my favorite animals. Thanks for the transformation. This is the most unusual birthday present I’ve ever received. So, if I don’t marry you, I don’t turn back? Alright?” Troy was dumbfounded. This was not how it was supposed to go. Hector just let out a laugh and Troy looked at his rival in rage. “So you’re choosing flower boy over me!? But... but...” “Troy,” said Hector. “You’ve already proven who the better man is. If you had to take Odile’s humanity hostage, it’s clear you’re not her ideal man.”

Odile then let out a loud honk to get Hector’s attention. “Come on, Hector,” she said. “Let’s see if the world’s fattest swan can still fly.” Odile picked up Hector with her beak and placed him on her shoulder before she flapped her wings, creating a small jetstream before she managed to get her fat anatidaean ass off the ground and flew high into the air. She flapped her wings and feathers as big as cars came down. Troy could not believe it. He tried to turn her into a swan in order to coerce her and it still failed. He decided to return to the shop and give the skull a piece of his mind.

 The shop appeared to be packing up as Troy walked to the skull. “I’ve got a literal bone to pick with you, skull boy! You ripped me off! Your spell didn’t work!” “It worked fine,” said the skull. “You told me that you wanted a spell cast on Odile that would turn her into a swan and that the curse would only be broken if she married you. I didn’t guarantee that she would marry you.” “Then change her back.” “I couldn’t if I wanted to. There is only one way to break the curse and turn her back into a human.” “Listen here! Do you have any idea who I am?! I will have this place torn down!” Suddenly, Troy gagged because something grabbed him from behind. From the looks of it, it was a 80% rotted zombie with a skeletal face and a missing heel. “This is Achilles,” said the skull. “Perhaps you’ve read about him. I realized that after being kidnapped by sneak thieves and suddenly sat on by a fat-bottomed sheriff who I wound up turning into the planet’s most wonderful species, I needed somebody to keep troublemakers out. Achilles, kindly throw Troy out.” The zombie nodded his head and then walked out to throw Troy screaming into the garbage nearby.

Achilles returned inside the shop and Troy saw that the shop appeared to be fading away into nothingness. “I’d like to chat but we’re off to Scotland. Give the swan goddess my regards.” Troy angrily shouted and shook his fist as the skull, the shop and Achilles all disappeared. Meanwhile, Hector was still riding on Odile’s back as she had flown all the way to...
1122312122222222222222222322221.title: Swan Princess with a Twist

choices: Odile drops an egg on them.
Odile lands and tries to hide.
11223121222222222222222223222212.content:
Hector could see the Empire State Building amongst the skyline of New York. "We're almost at New York" he yelled over the wind.
Odile honked. "Good...I'm getting...a little tired." she said. Keeping her bulk in the air all the way across the ocean was quite a wear on a girl. Especially a first time flier.

As Odile flew over the city, dropping feathers onto the streets and casting a massive shadow over them, the people weren't quite as happy to see her. "MONSTER!" one woman yelled. "CALL THE ARMY!" another man said. Everyone started screaming and running for their lives.

"What are they saying?" Odile asked. "I don't think they're happy to see you." Hector said. "Nonsense" Odile snorted with a honk. "Who wouldn't love to see a giant beautiful swa...WHOA!" Odile banked as loud shot suddenly went past her.

Hector looked down, to see a tank was on the streets shooting at them. "I think we've got a problem!" Hector yelled.

Odile swooped and swerved and darted through the air like a pro, despite her huge frame, dodging like a jet. "I'm getting pretty good at this!" she yelled. But eventually she was struck in her massive stomach by a tank shell....which promptly bonuced off her gut with a BOING and flew off into the sea.

"Huh. Didn't even hurt." she said smugly. She heard a buzzing and looked to see a helicopter approaching her. Odile flapped her wings hard, causing a powerful gust that blew it off course. "I mean no harm! Really!" She heard a yell from her back, as a shot nearly hit Hector and send him tumbling off. But Odile managed to catch him with a leg, and tossed him back onto her back.

"Hector are you alright?" Odile said. "Grrr...those jerks." she growled.
11223121222222222222222223222212.title: New York

1122312122222222222222222322222.content:
“Night fever, night fever, night fever, we know how to do it.” That’s how the lyrics went, but there was something wrong with the delivery. A pudgy blonde woman in fishnet stockings was singing this song to her husband who was plugging his ears because the song was not going exactly as it was supposed to. “So?” asked the woman. “How do I sound, Arnold?” Arnold just looked at his wife rather nervously. “Well,” he said. “It certainly sounded like it was something. Not sure that it sounded like music though.” Grey let out a sigh. Arnold was right. She was very tone deaf and couldn’t carry a tune in a bucket. This was frustrating because she was planning to join the town’s glee club, though with her sorry excuses for vocal chords, that wasn’t looking like it would happen anytime soon.

Soon, Grey and Arnold had decided to take a walk in order to think, all while Grey was trying to practice singing again. “It’s my own design, it’s my own remorse.” Arnold kept holding his ears in pain because his wife didn’t have the right voice for singing. He knew that all too well. He learned it the hard way when they went to a karaoke club after their marriage. “I wish I knew what her singing voice was like before I married her,” thought Arnold. “How could someone who looks so angelic sound so disastrous.” Arnold looked back to see he wasn’t the only critic of Grey’s poor singing voice. In fact, everywhere they went, people were retreating from the voice, birds were flying away and stray cats even screamed as they saw Grey. “Oh who asked you!” yelled the blonde in annoyance.

Arnold knew that Grey’s voice was not going to get any better anytime soon and realized that if he hated her singing this much, there was no way that the glee club would like it. He heard Grey inhaling and exhaling and gasped in horror because she was going to practice singing yet again. He needed an excuse to get out of the area and then he had a thought. “Oh, Grey! Maybe your voice would do better with watering, like they do with flowers.” Grey just looked at her husband in confusion. “Excuse me?” “There’s a coffee shop in the area,” said Arnold. “I’ll go get something for that voice.” Arnold ran off as fast as he could and then Grey gave a glare. “Always my most vocal critic aren’t you, Honey Love?” asked the blonde in an annoyed tone.

Grey then tried to sing again. “Everyone’s watching, to see what you will do!” Nearby there was a scream of agony. There was a man in green rags with a metal mask and he was shaking his head. “What is that noise? It sounds like somebody is strangling a raccoon.” “Everybody’s a critic,” grumbled Grey. “Even the homeless.” The man in green walked up to Grey. “You’re never going to be able to join the glee club with a voice like that.” “Wait, how did you…” The man in green shrugged his shoulders. “I’m Erlking. It’s what I do. Anyhow, your singing is not exactly what I would call singing, lady. For the good of everyone’s ears, I am going to give you a wish to stop that horrid singing.” Grey gave a look of surprise, however, she had nothing to lose at this point. “You can make me sing like a canary then?” Erlking nodded his head. “Yep. Now just watch.” Erlking stood on a trashcan in order to cast a spell.

“I say, 1, 2, spell me do,” chanted Erlking. “Let this lady’s wish come true. Here me high, hear me well, let me be this spell.” Erlking jerked back and magical energy surged from his hands and took the shape of a canary before flying down Grey’s throat. Grey let out a scream that turned into a canary’s chirp. She then started to sing in the exact same tune as a canary and then covered her mouth. Erlking smirked but then he heard a stepping sound. “Uh-oh.” He said. Erlking snapped his fingers and disappeared just as Arnold showed up. “Grey?” asked Arnold. “What happened?” Grey gave a few more coughs. “I don’t know,” she said right before she smiled. “But something tells me I’m going to get into the club.” Grey then hummed in a far more angelic tune than earlier and smiled, not noticing the yellow feathers growing on her back.
1122312122222222222222222322222.title: Sing Like a Canary

11223121222222222222222223222221.content:
Grey's more angelic tune did not go unnoticed by Arnold as she was now whistling much more in tune in contrast to her horrifying excuse for singing from earlier. "Grey?" asked Arnold right before taking a shot of coffee. "Did you take singing lessons or have throat surgery in the last two minutes or is this just really good coffee?" Grey let out a giggle. "And that's just me humming the tune. Imagine what will come of me just singing it now." Grey then inhaled and then decided she would try her hand at singing for real. "Ain't she sweet? When she's walking down the street? I ask you very confidentially, ain't she sweet?" "Okay," said Arnold uneasily. "Unusual choice of song, but it looks like your vocal chords are working perfectly."

Grey smiled however, she didn't seem to notice that the voice was the least of her worries because with every step she was getting chunkier and taller, not that Arnold really noticed since his wife was already heavyset and was also already somewhat taller than he was. But that wasn't the only thing that was unusual. As Grey kept walking down the street, she appeared to be shedding golden yellow feathers. As Grey and Arnold came to an alleyway, a cat ran down the street carrying a fish and Grey let out a loud scream upon seeing the cat and jumped back. Grey's shriek was actually loud enough to cause all the windows in the skyscraper to her side to crack slightly. Arnold looked at his wife in confusion and noticed she was panting and clutched her chest. "Grey?" he asked. "Are you feeling okay? It was only a cat." Grey then inhaled deeply. "I'm really sorry about that, Arnold," she said. "I have absolutely no idea what came over me. Somehow that cat just stressed me out. Oh well." Arnold scratched his head because something was up. Then it occurred to him that something weird might be going on with his wife.

"Uh, Grey," he said. "Did anything unusual happen while I was busy getting coffee?" Grey let out a grunt. "Well, if you must know, earlier, my singing was apparently bad enough for a homeless man to put his two cents into the situation. He offered me a wish to remedy my voice." Arnold raised an eye. "A homeless man just magically improved your voice. I find that hard to believe. What exactly did this magical vagrant look like." "Well," said Grey. "I didn't get a good look at his true face, but he was wearing a metal mask, green rages and bandages all around his body. He looked rather strange." Arnold rubbed his chin. "Grey," he said. "I don't think that was a good idea. Have you ever by any chance read the Monkey's Paw." Grey gave a scoff. "I don't care about my hands, Arnold. I just want to have a golden voice. I'll show you. The next morning, I'm going to march right down and tell off those glee club jerks. They'll have to let me in when I show off my vocals. The blonde then let out a loud high note that shattered the windows of three nearby cars.

Arnold immediately tried to push his wife out of the way before they got blamed for the damaged property. However, Arnold noticed something. "Whoa, Grey," said Arnold. "Take it easy with the pasta. Your ass seems thicker than usual tonight." Grey grunted and then slapped her husband in the face. "You NEVER mentioned a woman's weight, Arnold." Arnold let out a grumble as he rubbed his face. "I can't say anything to her," he thought to himself. "I do recall her being only 300lbs this morning though. I know she's a compulsive eater but she seems to have gained more weight in such little time." Suddenly, there was a loud grunt.

While trying to walk into their apartment building, Grey had gotten stuck in the door frame. Somehow she had gotten too-wide for it and appeared to be 10ft tall. "Damn it all," grunted the blonde bombshell blob. "What gives?!" The landlord came by and looked in surprise to find Grey stuck. Grey gave him a glare. "Not one word!" snapped the blonde. The landlord couldn't help but laugh as Grey grumbled and tried to squeeze her way out. Grey grunted and finally managed to get her way out and revealed that there were yellow feathers on her back, much to Arnold's surprise. Then, Grey heard a tearing sound and then looked down to see that her fishnet stockings were coming undone. "Okay," said Grey. "I'll admit that I'm a little heavy." "A little heavy?" asked Arnold with a scoff. "You weigh more than three times what you weighed when we were married and that was only three years ago." Grey gave her husband a glare and then would've yelled at Arnold but then grunted in pain. Her shoes were feeling rather tight. What Grey didn't know was that her feet had turned into light gray talons like those of a bird with rather sharp claws.

It wasn't long before Grey and Arnold returned to their apartment and Arnold had picked up several of the golden feathers and was very confused as to where they came from. "Nobody in the apartment complex has a canary. Where did any of these feathers come from?" Grey at the time was brushing her hair as she was on the phone and hadn't noticed that there were bright golden yellow feathers sprouting on her arms and neck at this point and she had gotten so obese that the chair she was sitting on was barely holding on against her large booty. "Listen here, Vicky," said Grey. "You may be running the club but tomorrow after I show you my golden voice, you'll have no choice but to let me in. What was that? I'll have you know that my weight makes me a much better singing than you. To hit the low notes, I need a big throat and you can't have a big throat without a big everything. Tone deaf?! You'll see how tone deaf I am when I come by tomorrow and show you what I can really do. Good night to you!"

Grey then angrily hung up and grunted. "That Vicky drives me up the wall! She is so nasty!" "Don't listen to her, Grey," said Arnold. "You let her get to you much too easily. Hasn't she been taunting you ever since high school?" Grey let out a scoff. "I don't know why they made her the leader of the glee club. She criticizes my singing? Her voice sounds like somebody dropped a chainsaw in a wood chipper. Just hearing it makes me really mad." Grey then noticed the feathers on the ground, in the process, failing to notice the feathers growing on her own body. "What's with all the feathers? Did you get a pet canary when I wasn't looking." "You know I'm not that fond of birds, Grey,"said Arnold. "I found these feathers laying around the street. Grey, exactly what did you say to that homeless wizard you met on the street." "Like I said," said Grey. "I told him that I wanted to be able to sing like a canary. Speaking of which, I need to keep my voice wet to make sure my vocal chords don't rot back to the sorry state that they were before I met that Erlking character.” Grey walked up towards the bathroom and shed her clothes, revealing feathers growing all over her body that were bright gold. And she also revealed her taloned feet and her much larger than usual ass.

Arnold rose his head and then gasped as he saw his wife as feathers continued to appear on her fatter than usual body. “Oh my gosh!” he yelled. Grey at this moment had yet to notice she was transforming and stepped into the shower as she then turned on the water and was continuing to sing to herself. “Dance!” she yelled in a higher voice than before as she scrubbed herself with the soap. “Boogie wonderland! Midnight creeps so slowly into hearts of men who need more than they get. Daylight deals... huh?” Grey scrubbed her armpit and plucked out a few golden feathers. “Huh!?” Grey then grunted because she felt her stomach press against the wall and then looked at her hands to see that they had turned into sharp claws and her arms had turned into large wings. “Oh my!” she yelled. “Oh my! Oh my!” Grey then yelled and tripped over the shower curtain before she stood up with the curtain acting as a thong and then looked into the window to see that her mouth had turned into a large beak.

Arnold heard Grey shrieking and barged into the bathroom and gasped. His wife had turned into a 15ft tall canary with an 18ft wide ass, 16ft wide belly, enormous hips, H-cup breasts and a 25ft long wingspan. "Oh my gosh!" yelled Arnold. "I knew it! Grey, look what your bad choice of words has done. You wished for that weirdo that you could sing like a canary. Well, nobody can say you can't sing like a canary now."

How does Grey herself take the transformation?
11223121222222222222222223222221.title: Queen-Sized Canary

112231212222222222222222232222212.content:
Grey looked at her wings and then rubbed her enormous 18ft wide ass and turned it around, accidentally brushing her husband in the face with her tail feathers. Grey then lifted up her huge stomach in order to see her gray talons and tapped them on the floor before feeling her beak and letting out a canary chirp. “Grey,” said Arnold in a concerned tone to his giant mutated wife. “Are you going to be alright?” Grey held her enormous booty in front of the mirror and then she broke out in chirping laughter, much to the surprise of her husband who at this point only reached up to her knee. Grey opened her wings and then flapped them as she danced from side to side and shook her enormous hips.

“Bow chicka wow wow!” yelled the giant canary woman. Grey let out a giggle to herself before she started to sing to herself. “I want to know the structure of your heart, why do you tear my broken soul apart?” Grey laughed again and shook her belly as Arnold looked on in both surprise and in concern. “Well,” he said. “You certainly are taking this well.” Grey chirped again as she held her head in front of Arnold who could see a smile form on her beak from her enormously chubby cheeks. “This is perfect, Arnold. That annoying clod Vicky D’Arcy said that I had a terrible voice. Now that I’m an actual canary, there’s no way she can deny that I can sing like a canary.” Grey let out another laugh but then hit her head on the ceiling and grunted as she caused part of the ceiling to come off. She then tried to waddle her way out of the bathroom as Arnold quickly moved out of the way to avoid having his big bird of a wife stepping on him. Grey’s stomach got caught in the entryway to the bathroom and she grunted.

With a little shaking, Grey managed to tear out the entire wall to the horror of Arnold. “The landlord’s gonna kill us!” Grey let out a sigh. “Oh, pish-posh,” she said. “You worry too much, Arnold. Now, how about we go find that glee club and show them that I can sing.” Grey then started to sing a song in French as she was flapping her wings. She blew the furniture and caused it to fall back as Arnold tried to get out of the way. To his surprise, Grey actually got off the floor. He then saw Grey holding out her talons and gasped. Arnold tried to run but Grey grabbed him and then flew through the apartment wall out into the air with a loud chirp.

People looked up into the air and gasped at the sight of such a huge canary. Several strays cats spotted Grey and were drooling heavily. One man in a birdwatcher’s outfit spotted Grey through his binoculars and his jaw dropped.
