There must’ve been something really funky in that blue lemonade. Looks like this night is knocking off early. You don’t dance well when you’re high.” Atlanta nodded her head and begun to walk away as the patrons of the discotheque ran out of the way to avoid being trampled by the alligator lady’s massive feet. One man even took off his star-shaped sunglasses because he couldn’t believe it himself. “Wait a minute,” he said. “I didn’t drink the lemonade. Archie, you ain’t tripping. Your old lady is an alligator and a big one at that.” Archie just gave the man a stare. “Don’t call my wife old lady, man. She only looks like an alligator now because we’re stone cold... uh... stoned. As soon as the two of us aren’t baked, we gonna report this house to the department of health. Them drugs ain’t funny. Come on Atlanta, we’ve partied too hardy.”  Atlanta let out a grunt and nodded her green reptilian head before stumbling to the door, only to find that she was much too big to fit through it. Though, since Atlanta thought she was high at the time, she still attempted to open the door and wound up destroying the wall in the process as she and her husband walked out. “Come on, Arch. We’re going home.” Archie and Atlanta left the club as the rest of the patrons were dumbfounded. “Well that was a Big Lipped Alligator Moment,” said girl at the party. “Literally.” One bright orange haired girl scoffed. “Leave it to Atlanta Rainmaker to turn into a monster on the dance floor. Exactly what kind of drugs was she on?” “Archie and Atlanta are dead set against drugs,” said a young man with an Afro and a pierced lip. “You know that. Anyway, those two are going to get a big surprise when they wake up tomorrow and learn for sure that this isn’t a drug-induced hallucination.

Meanwhile, Atlanta and Archie were still walking down the street (or wobbling in Atlanta’s case), still under the impression that Atlanta’s transformation was just a hallucination. “Oh my, Archie,” said Atlanta. “Moon daddy, that was some heavy lemonade. I feel so bloated.” “Not to be a nitpick, my Atlanta Ocean, but you did feel like you put on weight back there. When you came butt down on me, I felt like I was that Atlas cat in Greek mythology. Hell, isn’t that the guy your daddy named you after.” Atlanta let out a scoff. “I ain’t fat, Archie. But you do look abnormally small. What kind of stuff was that. Oh man, I’ve got the munchies like you wouldn’t believe and I’m too wasted to cook.” “Well,” said Archie. “We’ll find something. There’s gotta be an eatery open around here.” As Archie and Atlanta were walking down the street, Atlanta failed to notice that she was crushing several cars under her feet and ass because she couldn’t see past her ginormous belly. One jogger spotted them and she gasped as she looked up at the titanic alligator woman. “Well,” said the jogger. “That answers the question about alligators flushed down to the sewers."

Archie and Atlanta just continued to walk in search of a restaurant. "So, Atlanta," said Archie. "What's on the menu tonight? A little Chinese? Perhaps a taco or two?" Atlanta just snapped her jaws as her mouth begun to water and she turned to see a steak house up ahead. "Somehow," said Atlanta. "I think that place has what I'm looking for." Archie squinted and even though he thought he was high at the moment, he clearly recognized a steak house when he saw one and was surprised that his wife would suggest such a thing. “Atlanta?” asked Archie. “Are you sure about that, babe. That’s a steak house. I don’t eat meat. You don’t eat meat.” Atlanta’s stomach just rumbled ferociously and the alligator woman patted her stomach. “I know, Archfiend, but for some reason, my mouth wants something red and bloody.” Archie could not believe that Atlanta would actually suggest eating meat, but even if he didn’t realize that Atlanta truly was a 25ft tall alligator, it would be a mistake to argue with his wife, so the two of them were walking up to the steakhouse.

Archie came in first right before Atlanta burst in and scared all the other customers, causing them to scream and run. “What was that all about?” asked Archie. “I dunno,” said Atlanta. “Guess they don’t like “hippies” around here.” Atlanta plopped her ass down and destroyed half the seats in the restaurant in the process. All the waiters were too scared to come out when the chef came forward. "What's going on in here?" he asked. "It looked like an earthquake struck this place." "Worse, sir," said one of the waiters. "An alligator dressed as a hippie just came in and she's huge." "An alligator dressed as a hippie. Of all the..." The chef spotted Atlanta chewing away at the napkin holder and was shocked and afraid. All the other waiters ran off as one waiter couldn't run off fast enough as the chef grabbed him by the collar and made him gag. "Sorry, kid," he said. "But we need all the men we can get." "But that's an alligator!" "Exactly. Give an alligator everything she wants to eat so she'll be too full to want to eat you." "Excuse me!" yelled Atlanta. "Not to be rude, but this dancing queen's got the mega munchies."

The waiter and the steak chef clearly didn't want to upset Atlanta so they brought out most of the meat they had in the kitchen and laid it on the table. Of course, Archie noticed something strange about the meat. "Uh. I don't normally eat meat, but isn't it supposed to be, I don't know, cooked?" Atlanta on the other hand, licked her lips and ate all the meat she could with one enormous mouthful as she continued to chomp down. "I don't mind, Archikins," she said. "Surprisingly it actually tastes better this way." Atlanta even let out a deep belch. "Atlanta," groaned Archie. "You'll get sick eating raw meat like that." Atlanta gave a look of embarrassment as she showed her large bloodstained teeth.

"Uh, I don't think that's gonna be a problem." Said the waitress. Archie just looked in confusion. "But that raw meat's not supposed to be good for you. Besides, it could make her totally fat." “Are you blind?!” yelled the waiter. “Your wife is an alligator as big as a house!” Archie shook his head. “Kid,” he said. “Don’t do that blue lemonade at Club Mango. It’s making you see crazy things.” “I am not high! And neither are you! Have you noticed that your wife’s ass alone is taking up half the restaurant.” Atlanta let out a growl at that comment. “Kid,” she said as she unconsciously showed her sharp teeth. “You never mention a woman’s weight.” Atlanta then unconsciously let out an alligator’s growl. “Oh really?” asked the waiter. “Look in the mirror! Haven’t you noticed that you have a tail.” Atlanta looked back and wiggled her enormous tail that had to be 15ft thick and would up tearing the wall off the side of the restaurant. “And look at those teeth!” Atlanta felt one of her hundreds of teeth and realized just how sharp they were. “Okay,” said Atlanta. “Maybe a trip to the dentist is...” “Stop right there! Answer me this, lady. Do you normally eat meat?” Atlanta scoffed. “No,” she said. “Archie and I are strict vegetarians.... usually. Tonight I just had a craving for...” “That settles it! For some reason, you’ve turned into a giant alligator!”

Archie and Atlanta processed this information and both gave looks of surprise. Atlanta even reached into her cleavage for her compact mirror and finally realized she was a giant gator. “Crazy!” she yelled. “Sweet Elton John!” yelled Archie. “It must’ve been them alligator shoes I bought you. They must’ve been magic.” “Well don’t just stand there, Archikins, let’s get them...” Atlanta held up her leg and saw that the shoes had disappeared and her feet became the webbed claws of a giant gator. “Crazy Jane.” "Don't panic, Atlanta," said Archie. "We'll just go back to that naughty shop and ask the keeper to put the kibosh on this curse." Atlanta got up and destroyed the ceiling on the steakhouse before she and Archie ran out. "Hey!" yelled the waiter. "You didn't pay!" The chef let out a groan. "I just had an idea," he said. "Alligators eat for free."

Archie and Atlanta walked down the street to try and find that strange shop. "What kind of crazy shop sells alligator shoes that turn the wearer into an actual alligator?" asked Atlanta. Atlanta suddenly heard a ripping noise and was that her bell bottoms were coming apart at the sides and gave a nervous look. "We better hurry, Atlanta," said Archie. "I'm not sure how big you're going to get. Aha, this is the place." Unfortunately when Archie and Atlanta finally reached the spot where Archie found the shop, they saw the shop had disappeared. "Ratsville!" yelled Archie. "I could've sworn...!" Atlanta let out a sigh. "You know the man, Archie. They probably bulldozed the place down. Guess I'm going to have to get used to being an alligator as big as a Megazord. Come on, babe, we're going home." Atlanta picked up her husband and dropped him between her scaly green boobs before waddling away. Archie let out a sigh and smiled slightly. "Well," he said. "At least there's one advantage to this."

Atlanta was busy picking meat out of her teeth with her claws. "I think I better look into hiring a bird to pick my teeth like alligators do." "Those are for crocodiles, dear." Said Archie. "What's the difference?" "Crocodiles have larger skulls and more narrow mouths and their teeth show when their mouth is closed." Atlanta just let out a yawn. "Whatever, Archie. This is worse than a hangover and I want to go back home and sleep it off." It wasn't long before the Rainmakers got home. However, by the time they did, Atlanta was 50ft high with H-cup breasts and an 80ft butt and belly and couldn't fit in the house.

The alligator lady just let out a sigh. "Whatever." She said before laying down next to the house as she and Archie drifted to sleep.
112231212222222222222222232222222222212.title: Big Green Mama

choices: She Stops Herself and Spits Him Out
1122312122222222222222222322222222222122.content:
While Archie was fast asleep, Atlanta couldn’t sleep and the alligator woman got up scratching her enormous belly. The 50ft gator girl let out a slight growl. “Geez,” she said. “I’m starving. I’ve got a serious case of the munchies.” Atlanta got up and started to walk away from the house. “No sense waking Archie up.” However, as Atlanta walked away, the alligator giantess stepped on a car and set off its alarm, causing it to beep loudly. Not wanting to wake her husband up, Atlanta grabbed the car and then tossed it into her mouth to crush it with her teeth so as not to cause a scene. As Atlanta swallowed the car, she lowered her head in an attempt to listen into her stomach. She then let out a sigh. “Thank goodness,” said the alligator giantess. “Crazy. I almost ended up like that crocodile that swallowed the clock. How they heard the tick and tock through the snapper’s skin, who knows.”

 Atlanta stomped off in search of food and found a large football field nearby where she started to tear the grass out of the ground but she had trouble actually swallowing it and then just gave a coughing fit. “No good. Atlanta, you big fat reptilian dummy, alligators don’t eat grass. They eat...” Atlanta shivered just thinking about it. Neither she nor Archie ate meat so the idea of the fact that she now depended on a carnivorous diet disgusted her. The alligator giantess stuck out her tongue and then tore into the ground with her claws to tunnel into the sewers. As she did so, she rolled her eyes as she moved on all fours.

She couldn’t help but laugh to herself. “Crazy. An actual alligator in the sewers. Just like the old cliché.” Atlanta then stopped and sniffed her armpit before she gagged. “You’d think I’d be used to smelling funky.” the hippie alligator thought to herself. Her stomach growled again to remind her that she was hungry. “Damn. I need to find something and soon.” That was when Atlanta heard something from above. It sounded like a burglar alarm going off and then a woman’s scream. “Shut up!” yelled a voice from above. There was then a gunshot. Atlanta’s blood ran colder than it already was when she heard what was going on. There were several more gun shots and the alligator giantess scurried through the sewer, tearing apart what was left of her bellbottoms. “That sounds like bad days.”

Above there was a bank robber who was driving away in a car that was clearly stolen. He was wearing a tattered prison suit as he held his gun in one hand. “Lousy broad,” moaned the robber. “Ratted me out. I hope they don’t get to her in time. I didn’t bust out of prison just to...” The criminal suddenly drove more erratically due to the tremors created by Atlanta moving underground. Before he could do anything else, Atlanta had burst through the ground, knocking the car over. The alligator giantess shook off bits of the street and then looked down to see the criminal looking up at her. “What the hell are you?” asked the thief. “Some kind of hippie crocodile.” Atlanta let out a moan. “I’m an alligator actually. My husband already told me the dif....” “I don’t care, broccoli buns!” yelled the criminal. “So just waddle your leather-skinned, viridian fatass out of my way before I make you into a purse.”

Atlanta’s stomach growled again. “Listen,” says Atlanta. “I don’t want any trouble and I’m too hungry to...” “Then eat this!” the bank robber tried to shoot Atlanta but Atlanta’s size, girth and leathery skin made the bullets completely useless against the alligator giantess. Atlanta grunted and scratched her girth. “For the record. I despise violence.” “Bite me!” yelled the robber. "Bite me you lousy hippie!"

Atlanta’s stomach rumbled again and at this point, hunger was clouding Atlanta’s judgement. The alligator woman let out a roar and opened her large mouth to show all of her razor sharp teeth. Now, Atlanta normally wouldn’t even consider eating meat, let alone stooping to cannibalism but her alligator body was influencing her behavior. Before the thief could react, Atlanta took a large bite out of the road, trapping him in her mouth.
 Now does the alligator giantess let her instincts take over?
1122312122222222222222222322222222222122.title: Gator Mama's Hungry

1122312122222222222222222322222222222122.content:
While Atlanta didn't like violence, something came over her when she trapped that criminal in her mouth. She gave a grunt and a growl before she gave an alligator's smile and tilted her head back, leaving the bank robber to scream as he traveled in a bulge down the 50ft alligator's throat. As soon as the criminal is eaten, Atlanta taps her large leathery belly and lets out a belch. "Damn," thought the alligator hippie giantess. "That's one crazy piece of meat. I had no idea..."

Suddenly, Atlanta gasped and then dropped her jaw because she realized what she had done. "What have I done!" yelled Atlanta. "Oh my gosh! I just ate somebody! Eating meat would be shocking enough but, is it cannibalism if you turn into an alligator and then eat some buddy. Well, look on the bright side, Atlanta. At least it was a criminal. But what is Archie going to think when he finds out....?"

Before Atlanta could further grouse on the details of what she had done, her stomach begun to growl again. "What?! How can I still be... Duh, Atlanta. You're 50ft tall. One bank robber is going to settle your stomach. Damn. Now I have a craving for meat. Hmmm." The alligator giantess then got on all fours and begun to crawl away, looking for more food.

It didn't take long for Atlanta to find something to eat because there was a couple of gangsters who appeared to be disposing of a body. "Man," said one of the two gangsters. "Some people just don't know better." "Let's just drop the stiff and leave. The cops already got half our gang." "Relax, man. By the time anyone finds us here, the gators will have already chewed through the body." The gangsters tossed the rolled up body into the water where it immediately sank. However, a stream of bubbles soon came up from under the water.

"Huh?" It was at that moment that Atlanta surfaced out of the water and let out a roar. The gangsters screamed. "What the heck is that?!" "I didn't know alligators got that big! Wait, does that thing have boobs?!" "Worry about that, later!" Both of the gangsters shot at Atlanta but the bullets that didn't bounce off her lardy belly just bounced off of her leathery scales. Atlanta growled and then snatched the gangsters as they screamed and tossed them into her awaiting mouth. She moaned in ecstasy as she swallowed the criminals. For some reason, the once peaceful hippie enjoyed being a ginormous predator and she snapped her jaws as if she had a carnal urge to use them. She was still hungry.

Up the street, there was an attempted carjacking in progress and the would-be thief was so busy trying to hotwire the vehicle that he failed to notice the enormous meat-eating reptile behind him and by the time he noticed, both him and the car were in Atlanta's esophagus. Atlanta spat out a tire before wiping her mouth. "Oops," she thought. "I probably shouldn't have eaten the car as well. Oh damn. Atlanta, what happened to you? Yesterday you'd never consider eating meat and now you're a man-eater. This alligator spell is messing with your head girl." Atlanta's stomach gurgled again and she let out a growl. "No. I can't eat anymore people. Wait. What's that smell."

Atlanta stomped forward and saw a fish market up ahead. She gave a smirk. "Good," she said. "It's closed." The alligator giantess snaps her jaws to rip the wall off of the fish market before using her tongue to slurp up all the fish inside. "Not bad," said Atlanta. "But eating all this meat is making me feel uncomfortable. Wait? Don't alligators eat fruit." Atlanta grabbed a fruit car filled with apples and then plopped it into her mouth before chewing it up. "I better lay low for a while." The gator girl then decided to retreat to the beach and the enormous and obese hippie swam out to make sure nobody saw her.

The next morning, Archie had woken up and was looking for his wife. "Atlanta?" he asked. "Atlanta? How does an alligator the size of a building disappear?" Archie then noticed a newspaper on the ground and picked it up before he read the headline. "Mass Disappearance of City's Illegals. Several criminals disappear mysteriously. Large reptilian footprints found at the scene of the crime. Paleontologists deduced that the footprints are not dinosaur in origin. More likely, a large carnivorous reptile?! Oh no. Atlanta. What happened?
1122312122222222222222222322222222222122.title: Gator Buffet

11223121222222222222222223222222222222.content:
Our story starts with a limousine. A young businessman was in the backseat going over the contents of his briefcase and was looking at his chauffeur, a young Asian-looking brunette woman with a pair of goggles on her head. He lowered his head as she looked back. She was lovestruck with her boss but what she didn’t know was that he seemed to feel the same way. “Just drop me off here, Halle,” said the businessman. “I can walk to the meeting from here.” “Sure thing, Remo. Uh, I mean, bo…” “Halle, we’ve known each other for years. You can call me Remo.” Barbara pulled over to the curb to drop off Remo. “Okay, Halle,” said Remo. “The meeting won’t take long. Just park in the parking lot up ahead and you have an hour break before I need you to pick me up.” “Yes, sir.” As Remo walked away, Halle gave a smile to herself but then noticed the limousine. “Maybe if I washed this thing before he was ready, he might like it.”

As Halle was driving away, Remo let out a sigh and then looked back at Halle. “She is something,” said Remo. “One of these days, I’m going to go through with it. Once it’s over, she won’t have to drive me around anymore. I’ll hire somebody to drive us both around. That is, if she’ll have me.” However, Remo failed to notice that his chauffeur had the same feelings towards him. She then held her head down. “What are you thinking, Halle? A rich handsome and powerful man like him wouldn’t notice somebody like you.” Halle then went to park the limo only to suddenly stop as a man in green rags and a metal mask walked in the way. “Oh my gosh!” The man turned and faced Halle. “Oh,” he said. “Sorry about that. I really should remember that red means stop. I’ve been around so long my brain isn’t working lately. I’m Erlking.”

Halle parked the car and Erlking looked at the limo and even noticed a hood ornament that looked a lot like a platinum sabertooth tiger. Erlking would’ve stroked it but Halle stopped him. “Please, please don’t touch it. My boss would have my hide if that ornament was destroyed. Sabertooths are his favorite animal. Well, they would be if they haven’t been gone for thousands of years.”

“Your boss,” said Erlking. “I think this sounds like more than a job for a young woman like you.” Halle bit her lip. “The truth is,” said the young woman as she pulled down her goggles. “I took the job because he’s such a gorgeous young man. Also very nice. Surprisingly given his place in society. And smart too. No wonder his folks retired early. But how on Earth could he fall for somebody like me? I’m a chauffeur. I just wish that Remo would notice me.” That was when Halle took off her shoe and then took out some money. “Here,” she said. “I don’t believe in purses. I don’t think they’re safe enough.” Halle handed Erlking the money and Erlking smiled.

“What a nice young woman,” he said. “I would love to help that brunette with her problem. She wants her boss to notice her.” Erlking then looked at Remo’s hood ornament and smiled. “That looks noticeable enough.” Erlking then waved his hand in order to cast a spell. “One, two, spell me do. Let that woman’s wish come true. Here me high, here me well, let me be this spell.” With that, Halle was washing the limousine not noticing the magic spell that struck her. Suddenly, Halle let out a yawn and then revealed that her canine teeth had turned into enormous fangs that appeared to be still growing. The hood ornament on the limo also seemed to let out a roar.
11223121222222222222222223222222222222.title: Sabertoothed Chauffeur

112231212222222222222222232222222222221.content:
Halle continued to polish the limousine as she thought about Remo. She didn't know that Remo was looking out the window at her right before the meeting. He reached into his pocket and took out a box, the kind one would use to carry a ring. He let out a sigh. “By the end of the day,” he said. “I’m going to do it. “Polar Bear Club?” asked Erlking. “What’s that?” “You don’t know?” asked Undine. “It’s where we swim in icy cold water.” Erlking raised an eyebrow. “People do that on purpose?” he asked. “Is everyone on this planet insane?” “The fact is,” said Undine. “My brother challenged my fiancé to a race in these frigid waters because he doesn’t approve of him. The class groaned as they got up to leave. Jane just chuckled as she began to pack up as well.

Jane Malkin was a professor at Donview College. Specifically, she was one of the math professors. As she walked across the campus to her car, she was aware of the stares she got. Some were annoyance, others were attraction. She was both loved and hated by the student body.

She was loved because many people thought she was hot. Jane was a 6' Russian American, with long red hair in a ponytail and black eyes. She had a naturally curvaceous figure, with E cup breasts, wide hips, and a nice bubble butt. She also spoke with a Russian accent. A common joke was that Jane could make even the boring suits she wore sexy.

But at the same time, she was hated for being considered tough. She always made sure to assign a lot of homework to the students, and if anyone didn't finish it, she would double that students amount of homework for next week. And if anyone broke the rules of her class, she'd make them stay after and finish three tough math problems.

Jane just smiled as she got in her car. She couldn't wait to get home. Scott was cooking tonight.
---------------------
Scott was humming to himself at the stove when he heard his wife walk in. He turned to see Jane taking off her shoes.

"Hey, hun." He said as he walked up to her. She bent down to give him a hug.

At 5'7'', Scott was much shorter then his wife. He had black hair and blue eyes. He was also pretty slim, so at first glance, no one could tell he and Jane were husband and wife.

"Hey to you. How was work today?" Jane asked.

"Good." Scott said. "I think we have the formula down. And we are 90 percent sure that it is safe."

Scott worked at a genetics lab, and lately they had been working on a formula to create human-animal hybrids. Why, no one knew. But Jane, interested in human-animal hybrids, offered to be the first human test subject.

"Really?" Jane asked. "Do you have it?"

Scott pulled out a vial with a cork. Inside the vial was a glowing blue liquid. "When you drink this, it will combine your human DNA with the animal's DNA, in this case that of a siamese cat. But are you sure you want to do this?"

"If it helps advance science, then yes. Besides, wouldn't you want a catgirl for a wife?" Jane said.

Scott chuckled and gave Jane the vial. She popped the cork and, without hesitation, drank the contents.

"So, when is it supposed to work?" She asked when she was finished.

"The change should start in a few hours." Scott said.

"Good. So, what's for dinner?" Jane asked.

She almost looks like a real dragon.” Jane then let out a purr as she swung her tail and held onto her husband’s shoulders. "I better be careful then. Wouldn't want to lose my man to a mutated dragon girl." Scott let out a laugh. "Impossible," he said. "There's no way to get dragon DNA because dragons don't exist. You should know. You're a college professor." Jane let out a laugh. "No I wouldn't. That area isn't my field."

It wasn't long before Scott was waiting for Jane in bed. "Jane," he said. "I'm ready." "Be right there in a minute, Kletska." Cooed the transforming cat woman. Scott looked as Jane walked in and now she had completely turned into a rather tall cream-furred Siamese cat woman with a brown-colored face and a pair of F-cup breasts. Scott looked in absolute delight as this new feline goddess was making her way towards him. Jane turned around and smirked as she shook her now much rounder than usual butt in her husband's face and rubbed his nose with her tail. "Oh, Jane," said Scott. "I am so hot for you right now." Jane then let out a growl and turned around to show Scott her now very sharp claws. "Spasibo, Darling," said the Russian Siamese cat woman. "You make me purr. Now let's love Russian style." Jane pounced on her husband and ravaged him with her claws as he moaned in pleasure. At this point he was used to the rough stuff and he was too catatonic with joy at his wife's transformation. "The formula was a success," said Scott. "I can't wait to tell the boys in the lab tomorrow. Hope Jane is okay with me leaving early."

However, these types of experiments are very dangerous and often unpredictable and very soon, Jane was about to feel the full effects of the transformation. However, the kick was strong enough to knock the entire bedside table over. Jane grumbled to herself as she got up and gave a slight hiss. “Ugh. I guess cats aren’t morning creatures. Oh, and it looks like Scott left for work early. Oh well.” As the cat girl got out of bed, it cracked in half, not that she noticed it. She shook the water off and hissed. “I hate water.” She mumbled.

Jane decided to have breakfast next. She ate three bananas and four pieces of toast before cooking herself some bacon. As she sat down to eat her second breakfast, she sat her ass down on two chairs. As she was eating, Jane felt her stomach and made a realization. “Geez,” she said. “Did I eat too much fish last night. Oh well.” Jane got up just in time for the chairs to break and put her empty dishes in the sink before she went to her car to drive to take a drive. As she took another step after another, she failed to notice that her shirt and skirt were stretching out because of her growing obesity. Jane drove her car as she was making her way to work. "I love Saturdays," she said to herself. "Wait until the people down town see what a cat I am. I think I'll freak them out." Jane let out a laugh. However, she noticed that for some reason, her car was slowing down. "What the?" asked Jane. Jane kept pressing her foot down on the accelerator but she wasn't making the car go any faster than it was already going. Obesity as a side effect? Was I infused with the genes or a Siamese cat or a hippopotamus.” Jane tried to walk away but only wobbled and was swaying from side to side as her ankles and thighs as well as everything above them expanded larger and larger. "Whoa," said the cat girl. "I am one big kitty cat." Jane turned and saw her skirt snapped off and her panties exploded as her red hair extended and she let out a hiss. "Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!"

Jane was getting too fat for her feet to hold her up and then she fell down, ass first on top of her car and completely crushed it to a pulp as it honked and beeped. Several more people had gathered around. "Oh my gosh! Is that a Siamese cat?" "That's the biggest cat I've ever seen. She makes Garfield look anorexic." "What an ass." "Get back. She might be hungry." One smart ass took out a laser pointer and Jane turned her head and tried to reach around her ass to try and touch the red dot right before she groaned. "Well," she said. The Siamese cat giantess squinted before she pressed the buttons with her claws to call....

1122312122222222222222222322222222222222.content:
The phone rang twice before she heard an answer on the other end.

"Calvin and Son's Towing and Salvage. This is Calvin speaking."

"Calvin? It's Jane." Jane said.

"Oh, Jane. How are you doing today?" Calvin said.

"Fine. Um, I need your help. You remember that formula Scott told you about?"

"Yeah. Oh, don't tell me. It actually worked? Well, crap. Guess Scott wasn't crazy."

"Yeah, um, I need you to come by Highway 226. And bring your strongest tow truck."

"Something wrong with your car, Jane?"

"Eh, something like that."

"Alright, I'll be there soon." Calvin said. Then he hung up.

Jane put her phone back in her rolls and sighed. "This is going to be fun." She said. Then she saw helicopters flying in. She recognized them as Channel 12 News copters.

"Ah, hell." Jane simply said.
----------------------
Meanwhile, at Temik Genetics Lab, Scott was pouring over some note when one of his co-workers burst into his station.

"Scott, you've got to see the news! Channel 12!" The co-worker said.

Surprised, Scott turned on the nearby TV and went to Channel 12. He was immediatly greeted by an image of a giant, obese Siamese cat woman. His eyes went wide.

"Jane!?" He yelled. He listened to the channel.

"Traffic was brought to a halt today by the unexpected appearence of a 50 foot, obese woman resembling a Siamese cat. The cat woman, who showed speaking abilities, has identified herself as Jane Malkin, a Donview College professor and the wife of Scott Malkin, a worker at Temik Genetics. This proves that the human-animal hybrid formula they have been working on and keeping Channel 12 up-to-date with works. This, while odd, is a great step in science, as it shows-"

Scott shut off the TV. He was surprised. He knew it would work, but wasn't expecting this kind of side effect.

"Scott!"

Scott turned at the voice and saw his boss and the head of the lab, Mark Temik. Mark was in his mid-80's, but was surpisingly fit and healthy for someone his age. He was beaming with joy.

"Scott! You saw the news! The formula works!" Mark bellowed happily. "You're wife looked amazing! It's great she volunteered!"

"Yes, but did you see her?" Scott replied. "She's 50 feet tall and morbidly obese. We need to go and help her."

Mark nodded. "I agree. We need to go and see the effects up close and personal. And the person who paid for this formula is on their way." On that, Mark left Scott's station.

Scott sighed. "I hope Jane won't be too mad."
---------------------
About an hour later, Scott's car pulled up in front of his gargantuan wife. He and Mark stepped out. In front of Jane was Calvin Tonner in his tow truck. Calvin saw Scott and smiled.

"Hey, Scott. Wasn't expecting this today. Can't believe that formula acutally worked!" Calvin said.

"It was only supposed to make her a human-animal hybird. Not make her a 50 foot blob!" Scott yelled. Just then, a Channel 12 copter landed near him.

"Scott Malkin?" The pilot yelled. Scott nodded. "You're wife wants to talk to you. I'll take you up."

Scott ran over and got on the copter, which flew up near Jane's face. It then landed on one of Jane's chins and dropped Scott off before flying off. Scott faced his massive wife.

"Um, hi Jane. You're not mad, are you?" Scott said.

"I'm 50 feet tall, and I'm so fat I can't move, but belive it or not, this actually feels great. I was surprised at first, but now I feel so soft. So no, I'm not mad." Jane said.

"That's a relief." Scott said. But before anyone could say anything else...

1122312122222222222222222322222222222222.content:
Suddenly, there was a rumbling sound and Jane begun to twitch. "Jane?" asked Scott as he held onto his wife's lower lip. "What's wrong." Jane let out a hiss as her body started to grow again. Everyone on the ground got out of the way as the feline giantess was expanding. Calvin tried desperately to pull on Jane in his tow truck but the cat was too heavy and she was still getting heavier. The tow cable on the truck snapped off and the truck itself drove 10 feet ahead before it broke down. "Whoa!" As Jane was expanding, the helicopter pilot panicked and took off, leaving Scott to hold onto his mountainous wife to avoid falling.

In less than a minute, Jane was now 100ft tall with a 250ft wide stomach and 275ft wide butt. She gave a hiss as she wiggled her now obsolete feet and her long tail. "Well," said the Russian cat giantess. "This will definitely take some getting used to." A news copter flew up into the air overhead to film Jane's growth spurt. "It would seem that the mutagen used on Professor Malkin's DNA still has some troubleshooting. The thunderous feline has now expanded to twice her size and has gotten larger than ever. She is a veritable mountain. I'd say it will take more than just a really powerful tow truck to get this cat back on her feet." As the news helicopter flew in the air, Jane's instincts took over and she tried to swat at it like a cat would a toy.

Then she let out a sigh and a purr as she looked down at Scott. "Well," she said. "Looks like you're going to have to get used to having a mountain for a wife. Scott climbed up and then scratched Jane's ear as the fleshy feline purred happily. Then Scott took out his phone to call Mark. "Hello, Mr. Temik. Something happened with the mutagen. Jane just got even bigger. Is that supposed to happen."

Mark tapped his chin before he spoke on the other end of the phone. "To be perfectly honest I'm not sure. I know that the previous results pleased the client but I'm going to have to talk with them to determine what they intended the formula for. I'd recommend you keep a close eye on your wife for any more side-effects. But it doesn't seem like any harm is going to come to her anytime soon. Just be careful with her. I've already called a construction company to move your wife out of the way of traffic." Jane gave a look of confusion. "Construction company?

Jane then grunted because something was pushing against her titanic ass. That something was several bulldozers that were pushed to their limit removing Jane from the road. The cat giantess gave a growl as the dozers pushed against her ass. One of the men driving the bulldozers was dumbfounded and reached out to poke Jane in her fleshy booty. "How am I going to explain to my wife that I spent the day moving a cat." The driver next to him shrugged his shoulders. "Stranger things have happened. Believe me, I'm just as uncomfortable.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Jane was placed near the Malkin residence and saw that she was much larger than the house. In fact, she could wear their house as a crown at her current size. Scott had to massage Jane's large ass as Jane gave a purr. "Thanks for the massage, Honey," said Jane. "Those bulldozers were starting to give me a wedgie. Not that any clothes will fit me today." Scott kept massaging the cat flesh right before Jane's tail wagged in his face and he had to push it back as he continued to rub his Siamese cat wife's butt. "You better get used to the bulldozers, Jane. You're going to need them to get to work."

Jane then gave a somewhat evilly laugh. "Wait until my class sees me now. Oh, damn. I'm gonna have to use my belly as a blackboard. Scott then climbed up Jane's red hair and then slid onto his wife's big brown nose. Jane gave a purr and then licked her husband as he groaned. "That sandpaper tongue is going to take some getting used to. But we can make it work. Once again I'm..." "Don't be sorry, Scott. I like being like this. Jane let out a yawn and then placed her husband in her large cleavage. Scott let out grunt but settled between the big fleshy and furry orbs. "Dobroy nochi, Scott." Scott gave a sigh. "Good night Jane." With that both Jane and Scott fell asleep, though Scott had some trouble with his Siamese cat wife's tremendous snoring.

The next day...
1122312122222222222222222322222222222222.title: Thunderous Cat

1122312122222222222222222322222222222222.content:
Our story begins in a small town in the middle of a mayoral election. One of the candidates was watching his opponent on the television. The second candidate was a 6’ tall tan-skinned blonde woman with a spot-shaped birthmark on her neck. “People of Wellhaven,” said the young woman. “For too long, this town has been in chaos.” The female candidate walked down a street that was missing pieces of the road and tapped her foot. “For one, the roads have been taken apart and put back together dozens of times. How much development do we need? We wouldn’t have to keep repairing the road if there was such a cheap budget. To say nothing of the streets littered beyond recognition.” The woman walked up to a garbageman who was driving a broken down garbage truck down the street.

“Excuse me, sir,” said the woman. “How long have you been picking up garbage just today.” The garbageman gave a scoff. “Are you kidding. I’ve been at the for three hours and I’m still not halfway done. The truck had a malfunction on the way and I had to call a mechanic to replace the engine. I told Mayor Blake that these old gal can’t take anymore.” “And how long have you been waiting for a replacement garbage truck.” “Six months! I know that the town can afford it, but what the heck!?” “Thank you, Sir. It is clear that the current mayor has been misusing Wellhaven’s funds. And speaking of which...” The woman in the video showed a photograph of a strange man in gladiator armor with a minotaur’s skull on his shoulder handing a suitcase to the mayor. “Mayor Blake was recently spotted accepting a payoff to allow an unknown shopkeeper to set up shop in the area. Several items in this shop include unknown chemicals and weapons that are outlawed in this state. Yet our current mayor is endangering our safety by allowing such dangerous merchandise into Wellhaven. Who knows what will become of Wellhaven if such corruption still stands. I am Candidate Patsy Nelson and I approve this message.”

Blake turned off the television and gave a glare. “Who does that woman think she is? I’ll teach her to run a smear campaign against me. She can’t prove nothing. Besides, the payoff wasn’t that big. I’ve got to get her out of the race somehow.” Blake’s assistant adjusted his glasses. “It really doesn’t help that her campaign manager is also her husband.” “Big deal, Pericles,” said Blake. “Marriage is overrated anyway. It only limits your options. What I need is to fight back, find a way to fight fire with fire. I need some dirt on that woman.” “Well,” said Pericles. “There is one thing we’ve found out about Patsy Nelson.” Blake turned his head to face his assistant and smirked. “I’m listening.” Pericles handed his boss a file. “Well. Mrs. Nelson always goes to bed right before the sun goes down. Apparently, there’s a superstition in her family that causes them to fear the moon. Her mother instructed her to never look up at the full moon.” Blake gave a smirk. “Interesting. Nobody will vote for somebody afraid of something as ridiculous as the moon. I need to draw her out and expose her fear to the world. I’ve got it.

It wasn’t long before Blake had sent a message to his opponent. “He wants me to what?!” yelled Patsy. Patsy’s husband Sam cleared his throat before speaking again. “It’s exactly as it sounds, Patsy. You have been called to speak at the Wellhaven Inn about your plans for the future of our town and it’s scheduled at 7:00.” “Kind of early for a speech, isn’t it, Sam?” “Not 7:00 a.m. 7:00 p.m. At night.” Patsy gave a look of concern. “Beneath the moon?” Sam let out a groan. “You’re not a little kid, Patsy. For crying out loud, it’s only the moon.” “But my mother always told me that I was never to look at the moon. She said that the moment someone in our family looks at the moon, there’s no going back.” Sam let out a laugh. “No going back from what?” “Well, she didn’t say.” “Uh-huh. Listen. I think this is Roger Blake’s way of trying to make you look like a coward in front of the voters. You’re not gonna let him scare you.” “No!” yelled Patsy. “No way! There’s no way it’s going to end like that. This city has suffered enough at the hands of Roger Blake’s incompetence and corruption. I’m going.” Sam gave a smile. “That’s my girl.” With that, the Nelsons kissed and were on their way.

At the inn, the people of Wellhaven took their seats to listen to Patsy’s speech. The entire ceiling above was a glass dome that let the moonlight come in. In the back was Roger Blake and Pericles. “After tonight,” said Blake with an evil smirk on his face. “It will be clear that I’m all set for another term. I’ll bet that Nelson will be too scared of the moon to come out. That’s what a skirt gets for running for mayor in my town.” Up on the stage, Sam was fixing Patsy’s tie. The presence of his wife’s opponent in the polls did not go unnoticed. “Look at that creep.” Said Sam. Patsy then looked out at the ceiling and then turned her head. “Look at that moon.” “Come on, Patsy,” said Sam. “It’s just your mother’s superstition talking. The moon can’t harm you. You just go out there and give your speech and answer any questions the voters might have.” Patsy nodded her head. “You’re right,” she said with a smirk. “Let’s let Blake try to intimidate me. I’m going out.” Sam smiled because he was sure that his wife had nothing to worry about.

As Patsy walked up to the podium, she felt the moonlight on top of her and at first flinched but then she shrugged her shoulders. “Huh,” she said. “Looks like Mom was worried about nothing.” That’s what Patsy thought but she failed to notice her breasts and butt were expanding. Her butt in fact was growing so fast as she was shuffling her notes to prepare her speech, that her tore off the back of her skirt and then sprouted a long furry tail as yellow fur grew on the exposed skin with black spots. Patsy also didn’t notice that her eyes had turned into those of a feline and she was still growing.
1122312122222222222222222322222222222222.title: The Cheetah Runs

1122312122222222222222222322222222222222.content:
“Jacob! Where are my shoes!? I always keep them in one place!” Jacob let out a sigh as he shook his head. “I put then on the dining room table, Aunt Sunny,” the 10-year old said to his aunt. “I accidentally spilt a soda and didn’t want them to get wet.” “You put shoes on the table!? Are you insane!” Sunny ran downstairs and grabbed the shoes as Jacob put some bread in the toaster to make a sandwich. Jacob was staying with his aunt for the summer and he wasn’t enjoying himself. Aunt Sunny was always stressed out and right now she was stressed out over her date with her boyfriend Mike.

Sunny took out a notepad and Jacob turned his head to face her. “What is that?” he asked. “It’s the schedule for my date with Mike. The movie starts at exactly 2:00 and runs for 120 minutes. Based on experience, 6 of those minutes are the credits, which means that we leave for dinner at 3:54, arrive at 4:03 and then leave at 4:55.” “Wait,” said Jacob. “You planned an entire date? That’s no fun.” “This is efficient, Jacob! I know what I’m doing. Without a plan, everything falls into chaos.”

Jacob let out a sigh. It was always like this. He knew that his Aunt Sunny and that Mike were a bad match for each other. Sunny was very controlling and had a serious case of O.C.D. Everything had to be done a certain way and everything had to be planned out. A sharp contrast to Mike who was more laid back. Even a child like Jacob could see that those two were bad for each other and wished that they could get along well. “Aunt Sunny,” said Jacob. “What difference does it make when you leave the movie. There might be a stinger.” Sunny gave a scoff. “Are you kidding me?” she asked. “Who cares about the stinger? If I stick around to read the end of the credits, I’d be wasting previous time and I’d fall behind schedule! Do you understand?!” Jacob let out a groan. “I understand perfectly well, Aunt Sunny.”

 What neither Sunny nor Jacob knew was that nearby, there was a grungy-looking mad in a metal mask and green rags walking around. “Erlking is hungry. I haven’t eaten in days. This traveling from town to town with every wish I grant is killing me. I hope I find something to eat soon.” At that moment, there was the sound of a toaster going off and Sunny let out a scream. “Jacob! What have you done!? This toast is burnt. Don’t tell me that you plan on eating it.” Sunny took the toast and threw it out the door. “Aunt Sunny,” said Jacob. “You’re overreacting. It was still edible.” “It was slightly burnt!” Outside, Erlking picked up the toast and bit into it. “This is good toast,” said Erlking. “What is that woman thinking?”

Sunny then rushed to the sink to wash her hands and then yelled. “Look what you’ve done, Jacob! Now I’ve got crumbs on my dress.” “Then wipe them off!” Sunny didn’t pay attention to her nephew and just ran upstairs. Erlking looked in and shook his head. “Good grief,” he said. “What is up with that woman. She’s insane.” At that moment there was a knock at the door. Jacob went to answer it and saw Sunny’s boyfriend, Mike, in a pair of Bermuda shirts and a tanktop. “Hey, Jacob. What’s shaking. Where’s that aunt of yours?” Jacob let out a groan. “Hi, Mike. Aunt Sunny is upstairs getting changed.” Mike let out a sigh. “That’s nothing new.” Sunny came downstairs in a black cocktail dress and saw Mike’s outfit and was absolutely horrified. “You’re wearing THAT to the movie!” “I was about to ask the same about you, Baby,” said Mike with a scoff. “Aren’t you overdressed for the occasion?” Sunny let out a groan and then checked her watch. “Augh! We’ve got no time to change! Come on, Mike. The movie starts in thirty minutes.” “So?” Sunny grabbed Mike by the hand and pulled him away as Jacob rolled his eyes. Mike was moaning as his girlfriend pulled him away. “Careful,” said Mike. “Careful, Sunny! I only have two of those!” “Remember, Jacob,” said Aunt Sunny. “Dinner at 5, bed at 9.” With that, Sunny shut the door. “Let’s go, Mike! Time’s a wasting!” Jacob couldn’t help but shake his head as he saw his aunt dragging her date away.

“I wish that Aunt Sunny was more colorful and fun for Mike to be around.” Said Jacob. What Jacob didn’t know was that outside, Erlking was digging through the trash when he heard the young speaking. He rubbed his chin. “Colorful?” he asked. “I can do that. 1, 2, spell me do..” Unfortunately, Erlking completely misunderstood the wish and as he cast his spell, something came over Sunny. She felt her forehead as she groaned. “Are you feeling alright, Sunny?” asked Mike. Sunny took out her contact lenses and put on a pair of glasses. “I’m fine. These lenses are irritating me. That’s all.” A fly then landed on Sunny’s cheek right before she actually flicked her tongue out to catch it and ate it. Mike gasped in disgust. “What?!” yelled Sunny. “Nothing.” Said Mike. Sunny just shook her head and then walked ahead, not realizing that her butt was getting bigger and parts of her body were changing colors.
1122312122222222222222222322222222222222.title: Come Chameleon

11223122.content:
Matthew was bored out of his mind sitting on a beach near the perfume store in the middle of the mall. His wife dragged him here to 'help' her with shopping. Right now she told him to wait outside while she 'browsed' the store. She always does this every time he gets his pay check for the month. Surround by multitude of bags he slump down with a sigh.

"Hey there deary, care for your fortune told?"

Matthew sprung up and looked around to find a old lady looking at him by a cart several feet from him. He could have sworn that it was not there before. He then pointed to himself and the lady nodded yes. Looking back at the store he slowly got up and walked to the cart.

There was not much was on this old wood looking cart. There was a small velvet cloth draping over both sides of it and a few stands with several necklaces drape over them.

"Yes?"

"Oh sonny, I saw you all sad over there and thought that might want a reading," the old lady answered with a big smile.

I looked back at the store and began to rub the back of my head, "I don't know."

"Oh it will be fine. She won't come out for another half an hour." she said confidently

I began to think of my wife and how she'll go crazy if I spend any money for myself. But something inside me that for once in my life I should do something for my self. I turned back to the lady and said yes.

"Good my boy," she said excitedly as she took out a old deck of cards. She shuffled them and took out several cards from random parts of the deck placing them on the cloth. She then reviled them one by one as she began to say something under her breath. She had this worry look when she eventually turned to me.

"My deary you have a very sad life, from birth to adult you have been controlled by your mother, sister and now your wife. You never got anything that you liked even for your birthday. They prevented you from having any friends or a life outside of them. When you became an adult your mother immediately married you to a wealthy woman that you hate. You work at a small company where you are push around by all your female coworkers. You are prevented from your wife to pursuing your interests of books and games by taking everything you make from your measly paycheck. You life is devoid of joy and happiness as you think about the day when it will all end."

I was both stun and sadden by the accuracy of her reading, but before I could say anything the old lady spoke up as she flipped the last card.

"But I for see change in your future, great big change, and finally happiness." She then paused for a moment as she again said something under her breath before looking back at me, "you poor young man, no person should live a life like that."

"Yea," I already accepted my fate a wile ago, "anyway how much I owe you," I asked as I pulled out my wallet.

"For you, one dollar," she said her smile returning.

I was a bit surprised considering that a sign that said ten for card reading. After giving her the dollar I looked back at my wallet seeing only a five left. But just before I close my wallet the old lady spoke again, "since you have been a good boy for listening to this old woman tell you what you already now I would like to give you this necklace for only five dollars." She then took a black sting necklace with a small green butterfly pendant off one of her stands and presented it to me.

I hesitate for a wile as words from my mother and wife telling me I shouldn't but deep down in my core something told me that I should get it regardless of what they say. In the end I followed that gut feeling and slowly took out my money still feeling a resistance as I gave her the money.

"Good my deary," her smile getting bigger handing the necklace to me, "now remembered, this for you to wear and don't be afraid. The things to come is all for you."

I became puzzled by her statement but before I could think about it further I heard my wife.

"Matthew?! What are you doing near that old hag?!"

I quickly put the necklace in to my pocket as I turned to face her, "nothing dear. She was just asking me when the mall closes."

Even though we have been married for a couple of years she already looked older by several years no thanks to her plastic surgery on about every inch of her body. Her breast was large but clearly fake including her rear. She was warring a white miniskirt with a golden tube top so she can show off her assets. With dyed blonde hair and more jewelry then you can count she was the definition of a spoiled rich girl.

"Well you're stupid for letting the bags go unintended, someone could have stolen something! Now get back here and grab the bags, we're off to the next store!"

I walked back to the bench where the bags are grabbing them all and followed her. I looked back to where the old lady was but to my shock she was gone.

112231221.content:
You'll think living in a mansion would be a dream come true for many but to me it was just a big fancy prison. It was given as a wedding gift but it's hard to enjoy it when I feel depressed just by looking at it.

We already finished dinner in silence then off to our beds. Of course we never slept in the same room which was a blessing in disguise. My room didn't have much to offer but it was mine. I had a small computer where I did my work that I brought home sometime with the occasional game here and there. I also had a small bookshelf with a dozen books that I've read several times.

I sat the corner of my bed as I was reviewing today's events, especially what the old lady said to me. I put my hand into my pocket to see that the necklace was indeed there and wasn't imagining things. I took it out and examined it. It was a simple necklace with a simple green crystal carving of a butterfly as the pendant.

As I looked over it there was this strange feeling in me telling me to put it on. I put it on the small dresser near my bed and went to the bathroom to get ready for bed. Even in the shower I could feel an urge to put it on like it was calling to me. When I came out I was half expecting it to disappear but there it was still on the dresser.

I looked upon it for a few moments thinking about what to do with it. I was never very good at making decisions due to how I was raised. I sat down on the bed once more grabbing it thinking what am I got to loss and putting it on. I could have sworn it glowed for a moment but when I looked at it it looked perfectly normal, although I did feel a bit more confident then normal. I then looked at the clock as it was getting late so I turn off my stand light and went to bed.

Meanwhile Sawyer (the wife) was taking off her makeup in the bathroom. She always loved the high life and would do any to keep it. The marriage was purely economic, merge both family's assets together making them more rich then being alone. Although it's been two years since the wedding, to her Matthew was nothing more than a extra servant but better, she gets money from him, with thanks to his more timid nature it was easy to control him.

Wearing a pink nightgown she walked to her bed when suddenly there was a small pain coming from her stomach. She recognized it as hungry pains which she was quite acquainted with it. Ignoring it she got into her bed, but the pain continued to grow. She tossed and turned trying to sleep but her stomach continuity growled. "Your on a diet so shut up," she yelled pounding her stomach but her hunger pains grew in protest. It grew so much that she jumped out bed running to the kitchen, "damn you, I got to eat something!"
112231221.title: Later that night

1122312211.content:
Monday. Although I don't have that hate for this day as most I still have that feeling of not wanting to go to work. Funny enough I favor it a little bit more then staying home with my wife, even though I have to deal with hardship there too.

I slow got out of bed getting ready to go down for breakfast. I purposely moved slowly as to be for of a hurry when leaving so I could spend less time at breakfast as possible but that did not matter that much for Sawyer felt the same. As I got my clothes ready I realized I still had that necklace around me, forgetting to take it off last night. I looked at it for a movement before deciding to leave it on.

After finishing putting on my work clothes I slowly walked down the stairs to the dining room. As I approached the room I began to smell many different kinds of food like pancakes and sausages. I question this because Sawyer always ban anything that is above the fruits and vegetables on the pyramid.

I froze when I walked in to see several plates of food across the table, with Sawyer eating a small pile of food. I began to stare as I began to see something was off about her but I could not put my finger on it.

"What are you starting at?!" Sawyer barked with food in her mouth snapping me out of my trance. "Nothing dear," I walking to the table grabbing a empty plate. Soon I sat on the opposite side of her looking down at my food. I had put one pancake with some eggs and sausages. It's been years since I have eaten anything like this. Most of the time I ate something more like toast or something.

As we ate a few questions began to swirl around my head as I occasionally looked at Sawyer eating like she hasn't eaten in days. Normally I would hold my tongue but right now I had a strong urge to say something.

"Sawyer dear, what's s with all the food?"

"What?! Can't I have a cheat day?" She ate without looking up.

"But this much for breakfast?"

"Yea! I was hungry!"

I was getting nowhere and it was getting late anyway. Finishing my food I got up and walked by Sawyer. That's when I got a better look at her. She looked 'better', more natural, as if she had reverse plastic surgery. She also looked bigger and not just fuller but also taller too, I think. But that can't be right, you don't just grow overnight like that. But before I could continue this thought I looked up to the clock telling me I was going to be late so I push the thought back leaving her to go to work.

"Matthew, I'm going to the mall later! Don't wait up for me!" Yelled Sawyer.

I froze in place, "she never tells me where she goes when I'm at work," I thought feeling bewildered.

11223122111.content:
It was hard to concentrate on driving as my thoughts was focused on my wife. Her actions confused me and for a moment I had a tinge of worry for her. Then a idea crept up from the depth of my mind, could it be something related to my necklace. I touched the pendant as I lingered on the thought. "I'm just imagining things, it can't be real," I thought as I drove into my work parking lot.

I walked into the one-story building where I worked for a small data-storage company with only 5 employees, and as soon as I walked in I knew I was in trouble.

"MATTHEW GET IN HERE!"

I signed knowing this would happen. I heard snickers from behind cubicles as I walked to my boss's door.

"Yes Ms. Bahl?" I entered into her office. The office was dimly lit with very few decorations scattered about the room, and what decoration was there was very organized and clean. At the back of the office Ms. Bahl sat behind a large desk looking at me sternly. She was a slim Indian woman wearing a black suit.

"Your two minutes late Matthew."

"I'm sorry Ms. Bahl I was..."

"Don't give me your excuse. I expect you to be on time and to make sure you do I would have to deduct pay for today for this. Now get to work!"

I quickly left her room rushing to my desk. Today was not starting in a good way.

"Hey Matthew, I needed you to come here for a moment." An employee called from across the room. I knew this routine all to well. Groaning I slow got up to see the one calling me, Filicia, a black hair thin as a rail woman was standing by the water cooler facing away from me. I walked out of my cubicle toward her. As I approached her I walked pass another cubicle when suddenly a foot jetted out causing me to trip. As I stumbled I fell close to Filicia's butt when she released a large fart into my face. I fell into my hands gagging as the room was filled with laughter from the 3 employees.

"Oh sorry there Matthew. I must have eaten something for breakfast." That was Filicia the prankster. She always pulls pranks one me at the pleasure of the others. Filicia walked pass me laughing going back to her desk. I got up coughing as I turned around to see the woman who tripped me.

"Don't look at me like that, you should watch where you walk," she giggled while working on her computer. Rebecca was the oldest of the workers among us, like somewhere in her forties. She was a mother until she got an divorce and the husband getting custody of the children a year ago. That was about the time she became mean toured me.

I walked back to my desk hoping this nightmare would end, but before I could get there the last of the employees came up to me. Sylvia was the smartest of all the workers and handled more of the technical problems. She could have been a great employee if it wasn't so lazy. She looked at me through her large round glasses with a evil grin.

"Good morning Matthew." The sound of giggles from the other employees grew.

"H-hey Sylvia," I stuttered

"I need to ask you to do a favor for me."

"Yes?" I knew I shouldn't have said that knowing what's to come.

"I got a little bit behind my work and need you to help me finish it."

But before I could say anything she cut me off.

"Thanks I'll bring you it." she quickly said as she dash off to her desk. Just as I sat on my desk sighing with frustration Sylvia came back with a stack of papers placing them on my desk. "They better be done by the end of the day." She left me alone with the papers questioning myself why I let myself get push around like this.

Every day was like this with no way to escape. I looked at the pile of papers as a saddess grew in me but I push those feelings down like every other day and got to work.
11223122111.title: Abnormal day of work.

"Yes Ms. Bahl?"

"I need you to go on a errand for me."

"Can't it wait till after lunch?" I knew I was pressing my luck.

"No, besides this is a lunch errand. I need you to get some food for me."

She had never asked me to fetch food for her. She always brings her own. Then I looked at her desk to see crumpled paper and napkins. This only confused me more.

"What are you standing there for?" she snapped me out of my confusion.

"You never told me what to get?"

"Oh, sorry." She then grabbed a piece of paper and started writing something on it. After a few moments she handed it to me. I read it in disbelief, it was filled with many different kinds of food from multiple fast food places.

"Are you sure about all of this?" hoping this was a mistake.

"Are you questioning me!?"

"No ma'am, I'll be right on it."

She then handed me a wad of cash and I left the room. This was getting bazaar I thought as I started to head out of the office. That's when I was interrupted by Rebecca.

"Hey Matthew." she calling out standing up from her cubicle.

"Yes Rebecca?" turning to her.

"You going out to eat?"

"Um no just picking up some food for Ms. Bahl."

"Great, then you can pick up some food for us too!"

She then went down into her cubicle to just come right back up holding a paper with money clip to it handing it to me.

"Everything is on here, thanks."

With a sigh I grabbed it and left the building. Now in my car I looked at my coworkers order. I was dumbfounded seeing the size of the order. "What is wrong with everyone today?" I thought. If this was some kind of prank then why would they give me their money. But in the end I knew that if I didn't get what's they ordered I'll be in trouble so, especially with my boss, I started my car and drove off.

Ever since then all I did was go out for food. Every time I came back to deliver there order they already finished the previous order and ordered again. "Hey Matthew, come over here." she said sternly but with a strange amount of softness. I turn around to face her but upon doing so I almost fell off the stairs in surprise. "Earth to Matthew. Hey I'm taking here!"

"Oh... Um yea. What do you want dear?"

"Here." she extended her arm out looking away from me shyly.

I looked down to see she had a book out. I took it out of her hand to see it was a fantasy novel. I'm shocked, I'm truly am, never in our entirely of being wed have I ever received a gift from her.

"Where do you get this?" I said quietly.

"It was on a rack outside of this book store near this clothe store I was leaving. I had some pocket money and you know how much I hate have loose bills on me. Also I don't know what you liked or even if you read so I chose the cheapest one there." she then turned around and walked back into the kitchen.

I just stood there frozen in place. I stared at the book for what felt like eternity before I looked away from it and looked at doorway to the kitchen. From here I could hear the sound of eating. If this is some kind of weird dream then I'm starting to like it.

I mustered all of my drained energy and began sprinting down the beach, my cut and battered body begging me to stop. Several times I'd trip or lose my footing on the soft sand, but nonetheless would stand back up and continue running.

It was an hour until I came across my own footprints, trailing down the beach.

"Oh, god…" I began whimpering, sweet hope ebbing away. "OH GOD, NO…"

It was like some kind of nightmare; the thing you only think would happen in the movies or to some survivalist on the news. But sure enough, I was stranded on an island perhaps devoid of any life.

"K-Keep calm, Stu…Just keep calm." I insisted to myself, uttering and absorbing the words with great difficulty. "First…First things first, find shelter…"

The trees ahead seemed to grow thicker the deeper they went on, almost warning me of any threats that lay within. I tried my best to stay at the edge of the trees, hyperventilating as I tore off the thick branches and laid them in a pile in the middle of the sand.

Soon enough my pile seemed large enough to make a crude tent. However, before I could calculate any strategy as to my survival, sounds within the forest caused me to shoot up straight, bringing hope to my unsettled mind.

"Wait here. I think I heard something in the trees."

"Hey…HEY!!!" I nearly fell over and turned around and sprinted towards the woods. "I CRASH LANDED HERE! I NEED SOME HELP, AND I HAVE NO…"

But as I passed the mouth of the trees, the muscle in my legs seemed to melt away as something huge came crashing through the woods. I couldn't tell what it was, but it possessed astonishing mass, probably ten feet tall.

It was...

Before I could move away, the titanic crocodile amazon wrapped her tail around me.

The crocodile girl then lifted her sunglasses and laughed sinisterly at me. "Well," she said. "Don't go running off now. I haven't decided if I'm going to eat you yet." The croc woman opened her mouth and was drooling more uncontrollably than ever and I was soaked as I yelled. "Of course," said the crocodile woman. "It isn't entirely up to me. I'll bet the girls will be really happy to see you. My gang is nearby and they haven't seen a man in years." I knew that whatever plan this crocodile girl had for me wasn't good but I was powerless to stop it as the crocodile pressed me against her butt crack and then grabbed me with her clawed hand.

The crocodile woman laughed evilly as she held her ass up and shoved me into her jeans'...

She had four large curved tusks and was staring down at me with a smile. "Well what do we have here?" she asked as she reached down for me.

We haven't had men on this island for years." The warthog girl shook her rump and her breasts jiggled on her big belly.
