1122323.title: The New Breed

112232312.content:
13/14/2015, 8:59 PM.


"Alright, we're here!" David proclaimed as he pushed apart the bushes in their way, allowing the other two following from the darkness of the forest to see the clearing. The campsite sat at the very top of the hill and allowed for a very wide, long view of the forested valley below. As the sun started to set the valley was coated in a blanket of shadow, peppered with orange lights in the mountains from the villages at the foot.

"Woah..." Jennifer whispered in awe as she stepped onto the grass and basked in the sight. "David, this is amazing! How'd you pick such a perfect spot here?"

"Eh, just a reflex several years in the making." He smirked confidently.

"Well, why not pick up some tent-raising reflexes on the way?!" Valerie sneered as he started unzipping the tent bag, with Jennifer coming to carefully pull out the tarp. "How long till the eclipse, anyway?"

"Soon. Very soon." He described, looking at the sun and moon in the horizon. While the sun was a glowing orange orb in the sky the moon looked like a perfectly round, black ink spot. He could almost see the moon shifting through the sky, as though it were part of a clock ticking the time away. "Get your boxes ready!"

"On it!" Jennifer announced, holding up a cardboard box with a hole cut out for her head. Valerie lazily raised hers, still busy adjusting the tent. "Gah, I hate the wilderness..."

"Ah, come on, Valerie, lighten up!" David chided. "It's a solar eclipse! An eclipse on thirteen-fourteen-fifteen! This is a one in a billion event and we're in the front row!"

"Meh, every moment's one in a billion..."

"Ah, you're no fun!" Jennifer teased, giving her a playful jab in the arm before running up to join David. The moon looked only less a minute away, it's approach to the sun much more visible. "Hurry, Valerie, it's starting!"

"Coming!"

The three of them stood with their backs facing the birthing eclipse with their heads covered by the boxes, aligning themselves so they could see the sun inside. At first all they could see was a white spot, but as the moon moved in the way the circle malformed until it shifted into the thin, glowing halo of the eclipse's corona. David smiled at the sight, and next to him he could hear Jennifer give an amazed "ooooooh..."

But then the eclipse seemed to dim, if ever so slightly. David took a step back to see if he was in a bad position, but nothing changed, because upon taking a closer look he could tell that the eclipse was changing color. It was turning to a pastel yellow and was slowly turning deeper, but rather than turn into a sun-like orange it tinted into a bright green.

"Uh...is it just me, or is the eclipse turning green?" Valerie asked, confirming that he wasn't seeing things.

"This can't be happening! Eclipses don't turn that kind of color!"

"Maybe it's some stuff going on in the atmosphere or sky?" Jennifer offered.

But a thin needle of light rose from the top of the eclipse, another forming from the bottom that seemed to slowly stretch until it reached the ground. It almost looked like something out of a science fiction movie, something David'd never seen in all his years studying astrology.

"...guys?" Jennifer began uneasily. "I feel kinda funny." He could hear her drop the box on the grass,

"Jennifer? What's going on?"

He lifted the box to see Jennifer stepping forward, clutching her abdomen, but before he asked what was wrong he could see that her midsection looked much larger than before. In fact, her breasts looked to have grown much bigger than he'd last remembered, and even her thighs had filled up a lot more.

But strangest of all, as he focused on her in the shade, he could see that she slowly, but visibly, fattening up on her own accord.

"W-What's happening to me?!" She stammered fearfully, pressing her hands against her engorged stomach. But in a sudden flare in her gain her stomach surged out enough that it tore apart several buttons on her shirt and placed a sudden, tense strain on her belt till it snapped in half and allowing her gut hang over her blobby knees, her thighs swelling enough that they burst through the seams on her jeans. David and Valerie watched in stupefied shock as Jennifer continued to expand, but to add to the surreal image they could see strange patches of color start forming on her skin that grew into layers of...
112232312.title: The Green Eclipse.

choices: She starts to welcome her new form!
Her transformation's rendered her unable to talk!
1122323122.content:
"WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME?!!?" Jennifer screamed. Her clothes started to tear apart around her increasing girth and slid off her inflating body in tatters, her stomach in a few moments ballooning so big that it started to touch the grass in front of her. Tiny little pinpricks began to form on various places on her body that slowly began to sprout into feathers, longer ones spreading on her arms as though they were wings.

But the icing on the cake plopped down as even while transforming and gaining weight at an unprecedented rate, Jennifer began to grow taller. Slowly, foot by foot she started to ascend as her body quickly swelled beneath her as though she were an inflating parade balloon. The feathers covered a majority of her body by the point she was seven feet tall, her stomach coated with white while the rest of her body was covered in brown that darkened as they reached the ends of her limbs. But as the last few shredded remains of her clothes were torn off, by some surreal chance her enormous breasts were held within a black bikini that managed to stretch along with her growth, the bottom relatively a thread as they travelled around her mountainous legs.

Finally, as Jennifer loomed a few inches above ten feet, she let out a shrill squawk as her face was coated with beige feathers and her lips and nose melded together so they formed a small, dark black beak in between her swollen cheeks, but as engorged as her head was it looked like a small bump compared to the rest of her mammoth-sized body. Her legs were so horrendously swollen with fat that her rear end was over nine feet wide, able to crush a sofa into dozens of pieces. But what took the majority of her body was her gargantuan belly, which billowed out from her in a grandiose, almost spherical mass that crushed a large amount of the grass in front of her with her legs pressing in from behind, and her firm, colossal breasts laying on top. The only way she bore any semblance to their formerly human friend was her long brown hair, but even the it'd grown over twice its own length, almost to her new tail feathers.

David and Valerie huddled in fear as Jennifer slowly regained her senses, and became more aware of her evolution. As she felt the feathers on her arms she ran her hands along her belly to assess its size, which was far too large for her to completely reach around and kept her hands several feet apart.
1122323122.title: ...feathers.

11223231221.content:
There was a brief moment of silence before Jennifer started to scream.

"OH MY GOD! WHAT'S HAPPENED TO ME?!" Jennifer screamed in terror.

"Jen, calm down." David said.

"CALM DOWN?!" Jennifer continued to scream. "LOOK AT ME! I'M A GIGANTIC, OBESE BIRD THING! WHAT DID THAT ECLIPSE DO TO ME?"

"Look, Jen. This is odd, but freaking out is not going to help. We need to calm down, and think of something." Valerie said.

Jennifer nodded, but was then distracted by a very loud growling. Jennifer blushed.

"Oh boy. I think all of this gave me a gigantic appetite." Jennifer said.

"Crap." David said. "All right. We'll head into town and see if we can get you some food. Stay put until we get back." On that, David and Valerie started heading back to town.

But does Jennifer listen to them?
11223231221.title: Feathered Freak Out

11223232.content:
"Hang in there, Gloria, we'll have you alright in no time!"

Holland's face was forlorn as his princess' head laid on his lap, the rolling of the carriage jostling them with the sound of horseshoes cluttering outside. Beneath her black hair, he could see the sides of her head covered by a dark, tomato red with the tips of some black veins peeking out, and against his legs she felt as hot as she looked.

"Holland...ghh..." Her body winced as she clutched her stomach in pain, yet was barely aware of where she was or what was happening.

"We'll be arriving at the entrance to the city shortly!" The driver announced, sitting two rows ahead of them. The other riders were dressed in metal armor, wielding wooden spears with metal tips.

Outside, Holland could now see the dark opening to the cavern Cinder Island lay within, him and the five other guards tensing in apprehension at having to face the delegates. All of them were dead silent as the horses trotted in through the mouth of the cave, save for an occasional whimper from Gloria, whose soft voice whispered against the cold walls of the tunnel.

Once all light had gone and they were riding through darkness, one of the drivers lit up a lantern, giving them a small spot of warmth to help them navigate. But even though it lit enough for them to see their way, they still couldn't see more than ten feet above them.

They kept traveling in silence for several minutes through the shadows of the stone tunnels, watching within the meager distance ahead of them for anything in their path, but it was as they reached a clearing in the tunnel that a stray gust of air puffed the candle's light out.

However, they could still make out some light ahead of them. All of them finally began moving and apprehensively disbanded from the carriage, one of the men helping Holland at his side to pick up Gloria and cradle her with them. The chamber they walked into was absurdly large, probably a few hundred feet high and wide. Far in the distance they could make out torches lit on the walls, which gave vague silhouettes to monument-sized furnishings in the room.

"MY NAME IS ARLINGTON, FROM THE KINGDOM OF SANDYE!" The head of their troupe called out. "WE COME ON BEHALF OF THE ROYAL FAMILY ON MATTERS OF ROYAL INTEGRITY!!!"

Nothing. Just a wind howling by.

"OUR PRINCESS REQUIRES AID, AND WE NEED ASSISTANCE TO ENSURE MAINTAINED TIES!!!"

That seemed to do it. They could hear a heavy groaning followed by some sort of thunderous movement from elsewhere in the area, which tapered into very loud, paced footsteps that shook the ground beneath them in decent tremors.

The guards nervously raised their spears while Holland and Gloria stood from behind, watching with fear. As the footsteps became louder and closer he could also hear whatever it was dragging something along the ground, and flinched as he saw some sort of mountainous black shape that had to be over a hundred feet tall lurching towards them.

But Everyone jumped in shock as a stream of white-hot fire sliced through the air and set ablaze a wooden chandalier hanging from the ceiling, hot enough that each of them reflexively backed away from the heat.

With the room lit, Holland gawked in astonishment and horror at the fire's source; a female dragon with thick black scales, her underbelly covered by dull gray armor traveling from the chin of her maw across the entire expanse of her astronomical midsection. Her body was fattened up light years beyond the threshold of 'morbidly obese', fat enough that he could see that the load she was dragging around was her own belly, which billowed out in front of her in a rounded mountain of flesh.

Contrary to their filthy scraps she was dressed in a black T-shirt with the design blurred as it wrapped around her breasts, with her balloon-like thighs bound within a pair of khaki shorts. Two red horns sprouted from a head of straight black hair so long that it covered most of her back's width, wrapped around deep hills in the folds of her fat.

Her eyes were a red so bright it looked as though they were fueled by the fire she breathed, which haunted the travelers as she stared them down.

"Well...what have we here?" She inquired in a hearty, yet young voice.

Arlington recalled why he'd come in the first place and cleared his throat. "I am Arlington of Sandye, and these are my cohorts. We ave a matter that requires your urgent aid!"

"My aid?" She asked curiously. "What's up?"

"Our princess has succumbed to Crimson fever, and she's not expected to live through the night at her condition! All our best medical tactics have no affect on her body, and

Crimson fever? She pondered. ...Ah, yes, one of those 'diseases' they get time to time...

"...and by stability of governmental relations, we appease you for treatment to preserve the royal family's ties!"

She sneered at his appeal, spitting out a stray flame from the corner of her mouth. "Really?"

"Well...yeah, that's about it." He muttered, using up the last recited words he had.

"...and what if I don't?"

"Don't? Why wouldn't you?"

An arrogant...this is gonna be fun. "Iunno, what if I don't feel like it? Maybe I got better stuff to do?"

"B-But...we'll lose a vital link in our family tree! Our economy requires a successor!"

"What's in it for me?"

"If one economy goes, all will follow!" His mind grabbed at any straw in reach as the tide turned against him. "We won't accept such a reaction! If you don't help us, we'll take action!"

"Action?" She laughed scoffingly. "Sorry, pal, but you're on your own. I don't know if you notice or not, but which one of us is 120 feet tall? Yup, that's me. Hell, I could call my pals over right now and stomp the living crap out of your little kingdom, and you know what? I'd still be having bacon the next morning. Don't think that just 'cause you've got a gold-plated toilet means you call shots on every damn inch of the planet!

"Oh, and for the record, I'd actually be more willing to give a rat's ass to help if you actually came here to save her life rather than keep your country pretty. So, yeah, way to help yourself out!" She pointed to the cave which they'd entered with. "Get out."

"B-but-"

"OUT!!!"

"Miss dragon, please!"

The guards turned to look behind them and parted way as Holland walked past them, with Gloria cradled within his arms. "Listen, I know that we're not in your jurisdiction. I know that you don't owe us a single favor. And I know that anything I beg for you would mean absolutely nothing to you, but-"

"...and this appeals to me how?" She snickered.

"Please, I beg of you for just one chance to help us out! Gloria lived her childhood with nothing but the hardwood floors, but in her time under royal rule had done absolutely nothing for herself and always strove to help out those in need! She'd done so much for the lives of so many people and always found happiness in the joy of others, but now..." He looked down at her face, which was devoid of any of the spark of optimism she always lived with. "Anything it takes, I promise I'll do anything to repay you! Whatever task you could lay down for me, as insignificant or even implausible as it could get, I'll attempt and follow through with even if it kills me!"

"Hmm..." The dragoness tapped her chin with one of her claws. Damn...that was the corniest thing I'd ever heard. But even if he was the size of an ant to her, she still had to admit she did sense a tangible love and dedication to his voice. ...eh, why not?

"You guys go." She pointed the guards to the exit, but they didn't immediately react. "COME ON, ENDELE!!!"

The guards flinched and started to bustle out, while Holland slowly sunk to his knees in despair. "...but not you."

"Me? But..." A glimmer of hope shimmered in his eyes. "You'll help her?"

The dragoness reached to the ceiling and plucked a torn from a branch hugging the stone above them, and flicked it down so it lawn-darted into the ground only a few feet from him. "That's a thorn from the cinderberry bush."

"Cinderberry brush? Will it cure her?"

"By default. It'll turn her into a dragon like me, but-"

"TURN HER INTO A DRAGON?!"

"...But! As the venom enters her body it'll immediately cure her ability to get sick or injured, so in a few seconds she'll be up and running."

"But that's so drastic! Isn't there some other way?!"

"Whelp, you asked for my help and this is the best you got. Whaddya say?"

"I..." Holland's body felt numb, drooping as he took in the dragoness' offer. Looking down at the thorn, he reached down and pulled it out of the ground, observing the pink liquid oozing from the tip. "No other way?"

"Nope. Sorry."

The deal struck him like a cannonball. On one hand he was fearing they'd live empty-handed, but one the other something didn't meet the thing. But then again, he knew Gloria, who never strove solely for royal lifestyles, and also the times he'd alway spent at her side, promising to stay there for her. "...alright. I'll do it."

"...and as for repayment, you will thus live under her possession." She added. "The full transformation shall take about a week, but by the end of a day or two she'll have completely shed her humanity and become a full-on dragon, save for the complete size. As such, she'll live here with you her property, and whether she treats you as an equal, pet, slave, or even snack is up to her. Deal?"

"...yeah, deal." He sighed.

"Alrighty. Just jab her with it, and we're good to go."
11223232.title: Land of the dragons.

choices: Coincidentally, it's around feeding time for the dragons. (Gloria has dinner?)
They sleep for the night. (Skip to the next day, when Gloria's bigger?)
112232321.content:
"Where am I supposed to inject her?"

"Anywhere, but the heart'll work best."

"The heart?! You sure that won't kill her?"

"Well, she's gonna die if you don't, right?"

Holland looked uneasily at the thorn in his hand, which felt as though it was carved out of wood. The purple liquid drippind from the hollow tip looked like acid to him, But then he looked back at Gloria; at the seething pain she was filled with as the virus spiderwebbed through her body, which hurt him more than the sight of the throne.

Sighing reluctantly, his fingers wrapped around the thorn as his hand tensed into a fist and slowly lifted it above, forming a mental path from the tip of the thorn into her chest. The dragoness watched curiously as he hesitated for a decent amount of time, occasionaly twitching his arm in a few muttered attempts to muster the courage to inject her. But finally, in one swift motion, he thrust the thorn downwards and straight into her chest.

WHAP!!!

Gloria's eyes shot open as she sucked in a long breath, which ran back out in a horrified scream that made Holland leap back in terror as she scrambled away and hit her back into a rock, the thorn still embedded within her chest as she slid back onto the ground. Her breathing was coarse and heavy as she slowly got her bearings back on her surroundings, but Holland could still see the grip of the virus slowly vanish and leave behind her healthy, unblemished, appearance.

She weakly lifted her hand and grasped the thorn, slowly drawing it back from her heart, but the bleeding hole it'd left slowly shrunk until her skin had completely healed over it, leaving behind only a few drops of blood.

"...Gloria?" Holland asked carefully. "Are you alright?"

"ggh...Holland?" Gloria began to look about the wide cavern around them, unsure of where they were. "...What just happened? Where are we?"

"You'd been infected with crimson fever! Don't you remember everything?"

"Barely, I..." But her eyes laid sight on a black-scaled blob nearby and followed the path of the gray armor to their hostess' face, and immediately went pale.

"Gloria, listen to me..." Holland slowly rose to his feet so he was crouching and gently approached her side. "...I want you to be ready for what I'm about to tell you. It might be shocking to you, but I promise that I did it to..."

"W-W-W-What's going on?" Gloria stammered fearfully. "Holland, are we in Cinder Island?!"

"Gloria, our doctors had no means of treating you due to your anaphylaxis, so our last resort was coming here to request assistance from the dragons, and..." Holland could feel his words tumbling down the steps as he came closer to the moment of truth. "...the nobles failed to gain any sympathy from her, but she'd managed to trust me enough to let me perform a...well, procedure on you that would save your life, but...

"...Holland? What did you do to me?"

"I'd injected you with a cinderberry thorn, which would..." He gulped in apprehension. This was it. "...turn you into a dragon."

"WHAT?!!?" Holland leaped back at her volume. "A DRAGON!!?!!?"

"Should I take offense to that?" The dragoness snickered.

"Gloria, I'm so sorry! I promise that this was the only way we could've saved your life, and that we were at our final resort!"

"But...A DRAGON!?!??! YOU MEAN TO TELL ME I'M GOING TO GET ALL HUGE AND SCALY AND STUFF?!??!"

"I know that this a huge shock to take in Gloria, so-"

"Holland, listen to me! What about the kingdom?! You know how Dad gets, how the hell will he react to finding out I'm transforming into a species he completely despises?!!?"

"Well, I'm sure that-"

"He could lead a crusade against dragons! That could lead to thousands of humans dying!!!"

"It was the only way, Gloria! I'm so sorry, but I would've done anything to have saved you!"

Gloria's lips tensed to rebut, but didn't say anything. After all, she couldn't argue against somebody who tried to save her life and succeeded.

"Listen, uh...Gloria?" The dragon spoke. "I know it's a lot to take in right now, and you probably don't wanna hear it from me, but I promise that bein' a dragon's something you'll get used to." She promised. "If you need somebody to take it out on, you can take it out on me, but I can also show you around if you want. Teach you a thing or two about the change, alright?"

Gloria turned her head away so she looked at neither of them, mulling over what she'd heard. "There was no other way?"

"Nope. Sorry."

She took a deep breath, letting it back out in a tired sigh. "...thank you, Holland."

"I'm so sorry, Gloria." Holland said honestly as he laid a hand on her shoulder. "I truly am."

"Whelp, I think it's time for square one." The dragoness laboriously turned her mountainous bulk around, stomping toward a passage deeper into the cavern. "C'mon, I'll give you your training wheels!"

Gloria kept a glare on Holland as she pushed herself onto her feet, but with some more strain then usual. As she stood back up Holland could see that her breasts had a bit more perk to them than before, and underneath her dress he could see a soft roundness that her dress gripped against, while her hips puffed out further with a chubby paunch.

He couldn't help but watch in place as he watched her newfound pudge jiggle as she waddled away, but when she glanced back at him he snapped back and ran to follow them, the three venturing into the dark recesses of the dragon city...
112232321.title: They're european dragons, BTW.

112232322.content:
The Red Plague was spreading not just in the kingdoms to the west, but in a kingdom to the east, there was an epidemic of the worst possible kind. In the kingdom of the Blue Fan, Crimson Fever was running rampant, only in Paragon City, the epidemic had led to a massive burst in crime. People had gone mad from the disaster and had resorted to stealing food, money and medicine just to stay alive. Panic was griping the city and the rest of the kingdom.

However, that was the least of the problems for the kingdom of the Blue Fan. The kingdom was actually an offshoot of the Dark Hand kingdom that had been responsible for releasing the crimson fever in the first place. Exactly three centuries ago, the Blue Fan broke away from the Dark Hand to escape from their cruelty and vice. However, the Dark Hand had not forgotten and they sought to take the land that the people of the Blue Fan had obtained since they broke away. The Dark Hand’s leader, the cruel and vindictive King Hoi had enlisted the help of a dark wizard to create and spread the Red Plague into the Blue Fan Kingdom. At that moment, the evil king was watching as his enemy kingdom was affected by the plague and the wizard walked up to him. “It would appear that the Red Plague has spread to the west, my King,” said the red wizard. “I fear that many far lands will be effected by the disease.”

However, the king turned to face the wizard and frightened him. “Why should I care? As soon as the Blue Fan Kingdom is back under the Dark Hand’s control, where do you think we’re going next?” Then the king grabbed the wizard by the throat and begun to choke him. “Think about it, the king of the Blue Fan kingdom is dead. All that leaves is Princess Seiryuu and there’s no way that she can stop the plague. Just sit back and watch as those traitors come crawling back to the Dark Hand kingdom.” King Hoi let out a laugh.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Back at the kingdom of the Blue Fan, Princess Seiryuu was conducting a strange ritual in front of an idol of some sort and lit several candles. “Princess Seiryuu,” said the vizier. “I understand that times are bleak, but this sounds very desperate.” But the princess was not going to be discouraged. “Yuya,” she said to the vizier. “Magic created this plague and divine magic should drive it away. I am going to seek the ancestors’ help and end this plague. We are not the only ones suffering. The kingdoms to the west are being unjustly punished by the Red Plague because of King Hoi’s cruelty and greed. I will do all I can to stop the plague.” Yuya nodded his head and stepped back as his Princess Seiryuu was casting a spell.

The princess chanted in an indecipherable language as she cast her spell and the idol glowed before cracking to pieces and revealing a light blue-colored spirit with a disfigured looking eye. Yuya stepped back in fear as the spirit stepped up to Princess Seiryuu. “ I am Zuu, first kind of the Blue Fan Kingdom. I have heard your pleas for help and have seen the evil committed by the Dark Hand king upon your kingdom. Hoi’s Red Plague is truly odious, but I know of a way to cure the plague from your land and put an end to Hoi’s evil once and for all.” Princess Seiryuu just stared at Zuu. “I am willing to do anything to save my kingdom. Even as we speak, the illness and death from the Red Plague has driven my people mad. They’ve resorted to the very wicked acts that were the reason why the Blue Fan separated from the Dark Hand.” Zuu nodded his head before speaking again.

“Princess,” he said. “There is a way to end the plague, but it requires a sacrifice.” Seiryuu nodded her head. “I will willingly sacrifice my life for the good of the Blue Fan.” Zuu just shook his head. “Not your life, your body.” Seiryuu looked in confusion. “My body?” she asked. “I don’t understand.” “The rising of a great beast will make the plague vanish from the land, but the great beast needs a human mind, your mind, Princess. Will you allow your body to be traded for the beast?” “The ghost is speaking in riddles, Princess,” said Yuya. “Don’t you listen to him. This is madness.” Seiryuu however, didn’t seem to think so. It can’t be any worse than the madness that plagues our kingdom, Yuya. Zuu, I am ready.”

Zuu nodded his head and that’s when blue fire enveloped Princess Seiryuu and she rose into the air in a trance as her eyes glowed bright blue. Yuya stepped back as Seiryuu’s body begun to change. She appeared to be getting bigger and her dress was coming apart because she also appeared to be getting somewhat obese as bright glowing blue scales appeared on her body. Her neck and body elongated into a long pear shape as her hips expanded to be as wide as tree trunks and the princess’s face transformed into a long snout as she sprouted glowing silver antlers and golden scales decorated her body as her breasts swelled to the size of watermelons. The princess’s hair turned bright white and stretched to her large behind as Yuya look up in fear. Seiryuu then sprouted a long tail and a small red fin running from her neck down to her tail. Finally, her teeth became sharp as her fingernails and toenails turned into sharp claws.

As the transformation ended, the princess of the Blue Fan kingdom was a 200ft tall Chinese dragon with a 250ft wide stomach and rear and huge H-cup breasts. Yuya looked in fear before Zuu disappeared, his job complete. Seiryuu looked at her new form and breathed fire up into the air as light radiated from her scales. She knew that the Red Plague would soon be over. “Hoi,” said Seiryuu. “Once the plague is over, I’m coming for you.”
112232322.title: There Are OTHER Kinds of Dragons

choices: Follow King Hercules as he transforms into a fat dragon
1122323222.content:
In the Kingdom of Salmonia a curse had struck the land. The curse was called the Scarlet Curse or as most people call it, the Crimson Plague. Our story begins with a carriage on a mountain road. Inside the carriage King Hercules Baronheart was leaning against his maid due to contracting the Crimson Plague. Symptoms of the plague include unusually high fevers followed by chills, red skin, and a dry mouth. Now King Hercules wasn't a man who would easily get sick. Being a young man in his 20s and standing at seven feet tall with huge muscles is a testament to his rigorous training.

"How much farther until we reach the dragon warlock's lair?" The maid asked.

"It shouldn't be much longer Evelyn. We should be there momentarily."

Evelyn sighed as King Hercules's head was resting against her bosom. Evelyn was tall for a woman, standing at 6'2". She had blonde hair and blue eyes. She stroked her king's black hair. Normally Evelyn would freak out if a guy even dared to touch her bosom, but with King Hercules Baronheart rendered unconscious due to the Crimson Plague she was more concerned about his health. Little did anyone know that she was secretly smitten with Hercules. Ever since they were children she always liked Herc. But as she grew older she began to develop feelings for him, unfortunately he was to wed a queen from another kingdom to help build political and economical ties. Herc wasn't fond of the idea, but he had no say in the matter. It had always been family tradition to plan out who the future king or queen marries.

By the time Evelyn finished reminiscing the carriage had stopped by a cave.

"We're here. Someone help the king out of the carriage."

Four guards carefully hoist their king on their shoulders. Evelyn followed King Hercules to the cave. The cave was dark and damp. Stalagmites and stalactites were all over the sides of the cave except for the cave's center. Evelyn and the guards stood at the center. After waiting for a few minutes a loud thud could be heard."

"What was that?"

"I don't know, but don't lose your grip on the king! We want to cure him, not kill him!"

As the guards were arguing the thuds got louder. Out of the shadows a large figure appeared. It's belly was dragging on the ground and it's massive legs caused the room to shake. The figure let's out a spark of fire. The guards carrying King Hercules step back. The figure was a massive red dragon. The dragon stood at 350 ft and was almost as wide as he was tall, with his belly being the largest thing on him. His horns rested on his head and he evevn had a horn that resembled facial hair.

"Are you the dragon warlock?" Evelyn asked the massive dragon.

"I indeed am the dragon warlock. State your purpose for disturbing my slumber!"

"As you can see our king has fallen ill and we need your help." One of the guards responded.

"Why do you need my help? Can't your sorcerers and alchemists come up with a cure? Are you really that shallow?"

"We've tried everything and his condition is not improving. We have heard legends of your magic and how it does wonders."

"So you expect me to be a miracle worker. Do you not know that magic always has a price?"

"Listen bub, our king has to prepare for his wedding to Queen Natalia Smerch. Without this marriage our kingdom will be doomed."

"So that's how you're playing it. You just care about being in your king's favor. Forget about about it. If I felt like it I could send my buddies to wipe out your kingdom. Unlike your race, dragons live thousands of years. If you're unwilling to show some humility and respect you can show yourselves the way out!"

Evelyn just shook her head at how incompetent the guards were being. It wasn't a secret that the last queen had spoiled them by lining their pockets, but at this rate Hercules will die!

"Please great and powerful warlock! Please help our king! I beg you! Don't let him die!" Evelyn sobbed.

Looks like someone knows how to be humble. Humans just think they are entitled to whatever claim their family name offers. It's such a sick way of thinking.

"Why should I reconsider and help your king, maidservant?"

"Our king is a kind and noble man. He helps the poor and even offers opportunities for one to improve their social standing. When we were young he took me off of the streets and provided me food and shelter. I am forever in his debt."

"Very well, I shall heal your king. Only the maidservant gets to watch. All others must leave!"

The guards place King Hercules by the dragon warlock's feet before they exit the cave. Once the guards left the dragon explains the price it would cost to cure King Hercules.

"The only way to cure your king is to have him drink my blood. By doing so he'll be cured of the Crimson Plague, but after a day or two he'll start transforming into a dragon. The transformation should be complete in a week or two, save for his size. As his maidservant you're already bound to serve your king until you die. Are you willing to accept this price?"

"I am!"

"Very good. Then we can proceed."

The dragon warlock uses his magic to summon a golden chalice. He places the chalice near his belly. He then uses one of his claws to puncture his belly. The dragon warlock's blood fill the chalice. Once the chalice is filled the self-inflicted puncture would is miraculously healed. Evelyn hoists Hercules into a sitting position. She then grabs the chalice and puts it to his lips. After downing the dragon warlock's blood King Hercules recovers from the Crimson Plague. His green eyes shoot open.

"Where are we Evelyn?"

Evelyn responds by passionately hugging Hercules with tears running down her face.

"You are now cured! Now go King of Salmonia!"

Hercules and Evelyn exit the dragon warlock's lair and make their way back to the castle. On the way back Evelyn whispers everything that happened while Hercules was unconscious. Hercules nodded in understanding, knowing full well that his fate is irreverasble, but learning how to shapeshift may help him once his transformation has been complete.
1122323222.title: Similar concept, Different story and gender

choices: Linda comes home and tries some!
1123.content:
I barely remember anything else of that day. The most I remember is that I was watching TV right before it all began, and that Linda had gone out for groceries.

What started it all for me was a knock on the door, and I got up from the couch expecting it to be Linda, probably needing help with the bags. However, upon opening the front door, I was met with anything but my slender wife.

It was a woman clad in a tight brown delivery outfit, her eyes a bright green and her hair a silky brown. What stood out about her, however, was her size. She stood at least 6'4", but most of all was incredibly fat. Probably 400 pounds, her sit still leaving a part of her belly exposed.

"Mornin', mister! How're you farin', today?" She greeted in a minnesotan accent, breaking me out of my stare.

"Oh…uh, fine!" I stammered. "Sorry, I just wasn't expecting anybody today…"

"Not a problem, sir!"

"Yeah…so, is this a delivery? I dunno if my girlfriend ordered anything, but-"

"Oh, this isn't a delivery! I'm just givin' out free samples."

"Oh, free samples? Of what?"

"Sizemore Chocolates!" She replied in a boastful tone, stepping aside for a box sitting behind her. "Wouldja be interested in a box?"

"Chocolates? Huh…" I wasn't much of a chocolate person, but I knew Linda was. "This isn't gonna cost me anything, is it?"

"Like I said, free samples!"

"Well…eh, why not?"

"Alright, thanks a bunch, sir!" She lifted the box from the ground and held it out for me. "Hope you enjoy!"

"Yeah, thanks!" I replied as I claimed the box. It sounded like it was filled with candy bars, but I had no idea the true potential of what lay inside.

"Oh, but before I go…" She pulled out a slip of paper from her breast pocket, which she stuck on the box's lid. "That's a subscription form for out chocolate of the week system. Just in case yer wantin' more!"

"Well, again, thanks!"

"No prob. See ya 'round!" With that, she waddled off down the walkway. I didn't really see her off as I walked back inside.

Setting the box on the dining room table, I flipped open the lid, curious as to what lay inside. Sure enough, dozens of wrapped candy bars sat inside, far more than anything I'd consider a free sample.

I took one out to examine it. It was wrapped in a purple cover on aluminum foil, but what caught my interest (and suspicion) was that there was no nutritional facts. There was an ingredient list, but the only thing listed was "Damn good chocolate".

I cocked my eyebrow, curious as to what catch there might be to the treat...
1123.title: Story 6

11232.content:
However, my thoughts were interrupted as the front door opened again, followed by the sound of rustling paper.

"I'm home!" Linda announced.

She walked into the kitchen carrying a grocery bag, setting it on the counter and sorting out its contents. She was a pretty slim girl with not much bounce, but nonetheless had nice blue eyes along with messy, short black hair.

"Hey, Linda, how was the store?"

"Eh, nothing new. Anything happen while I was gone?"

"Yeah, actually. We got chocolate."

"Chocolate?"

"Yeah, some lady came over and gave us a free sample."

"Huh, that's neat!" She replied as she walked into the dining room, meeting sight with the box. "Can I have some?"

I don't know why I didn't say no, to heed the fact that some stranger dropped off chocolate on our front step with no information about or even any hint as to what its ingredients were. But for whatever reason…

"Sure, go right ahead."

"Thanks!"

I left her to the chocolate and headed into the kitchen to sort out the rest of her groceries, but paused as she let out a "WOAH!"

"You alright in there?"

"Yeah, it's just…this is good!"

"Well, it contains 'damn good chocolate', as it says."

"I'll say! Mind getting the rest of the groceries for me?"

"Nah, I'm on it."

I went back to work and put the groceries away for her, ignorant to whatever she was doing in there. Once I was done, I headed back into the living room to watch TV.

I spent about five minutes alone in the living room. As I watched TV, it slowly dawned on me that not once since I'd left Linda alone that I didn't hear her move about at all, just standing in the dining room alone.

"Linda, you alright in there?"

"MM-HMM!!!" She exclaimed, as though her mouth was full.

"Alright, then…"

Another two minutes had passed, which to me felt longer as I kept a close ear on Linda. Sure enough, I didn't hear her take another step. Curious as to what was preoccupying her, I finally left the couch and headed back to the kitchen.

"You alright in there, honey?"

"Yeah, I just…mmf…I just said I was fine!"

"What're you doing in there?"

"Just having some chocolate!"

Sure enough, Linda was seated at the table and eating a chocolate bar, but to my surprise at least ten wrappers lay on the table.

"Geez…how much you'd eat?"

"Iunno…a few."

"Well, wanna watch the game with me in the living room?"

"Sure, be there in a sec…"

She lifted the box off the table and (with a bit more effort than usual) pushed herself from the chair. She walked into the kitchen with the box under her arm, but I had to take a second look at her as she stood tall.

Her clothes seemed a bit tighter than usual, but more so her stomach seemed a bit rounder and jutted out further. Her arms and legs had thickened out as well, and her breast and hips seemed somewhat more prominent. It looked as though she's gained several pounds (hell, if not several ten!) since I'd left her alone.

I thought I was just seeing things, but up close I noticed that she was taller, as well. She was always shorter than me by a few inches, but as of now we were equalized.

"You alight, sweetie?" She asked as she took another bite from a bar.
11232.title: Linda comes home and tries some!

12.content: Is she the first to gain?
12.title: Female

1211.content:
As Terry paused from her work, she took a moment to remove her filthy glove and wipe her brow, which was damp from sweat by the morning gardening.

It was a hot, humid day, but nonetheless a beautiful one for gardening. The cabin she lived in was the ideal spot, too, given its isolated location and heavy plant density.

She gently hummed to herself as she got to work. She wasn't a very toned person, but always found joy in tending to her work.

"Alright…got my roses all trimmed and nice, and now all I have to do is…" But she stopped talking as she noticed a strange flower nearby.

It was a tall flower with a large head, composed of black and white tulips. It was a beautiful plant, almost artistic in design, but she was suspicious of how she'd never seen anything like it, as in she'd planted every flower in her garden but this one.

"Strange…what could you be?" She thought aloud with a chuckle. She reached forward to stroke its petals, wanting to feel their texture, but gasped as the plant suddenly shuddered to her touch, the head pointing right at her as it spewed a cloud of yellow gas in her face.

"GAH!...EW!!!" She coughed in disgust as the cloud began to fade away. "What the hell was tha-"

She was struck silent as she saw that the flower was gone.

"What the hell? Am I seeing things?" But a sudden rumble in her stomach insisted other wise, which caused her to groan slightly as she clutched it...
1211.title: Story 7

12111.content:
Immedately, unbeknownst to her, Terry started changing. It was a slow change, but sure enough, Terry was growing, and a rate too slow for her to see. However, she could tell something was wrong by a growing feeling in her stomach.

"Ugh…what's com ove-GUGH!!!" She groaned as she clutched at her stomach, which was starting to puff out. She recoiled at the softness of her body.

"WHAT THE HELL? WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME?" She stood up (with unfamiliar difficulty) to see that she was getting fatter with increasing speed, her shirt tightening to the point where her gut was starting to peek through. She could also feel her pants beginning to tighten around her legs.

Finally her shirt burst apart as each button began to pop off, her jeans unzipping as her large belly sagged out. By that point she finally noticed that she'd grown a few inches.

"help…" She called out, but her voice was sounding weak; as if her voice was deteriorating. "Somebody…help…"

Those were her last words.

Her pants finally started splitting around her girthy legs when she'd reached about 400 pounds in weight, and more of her expanding pink stomach was visible as her shirt was torn apart. She wanted to scream, to run for the neighbors and get help, but she had little luck running due to her weight. Plus, a rather distracting itch

That, and a rather distracting itch overwhelmed her focus on her shoulder. As she scratched at her arm and lifted up her vise-tight sleeve, she gave a silent shriek as dark fur began growing down her arm.

Whatever shredded tatters of her clothes remained on her were finally shredded away by the time she was seven feet tall, her stomach sticking out almost four feet from her. Whatever nude bits she once had were concealed as black, plastic-like skin began covering her globular body, from which soft fur began to grow. Terry couldn't bend her head forward to see her enormous self, but could only lift her arms to see that her fingers were fusing to three fat digits as their skin turned to the same black as her legs.

Finally, Terry was overwhelmed by an onslaught of sensations and emotions covering her entire body and slowly sat herself down as she clutched at her head, slowly fading from consciousness as her body began adapting to its new species…

…..


Terry was obviously silent as her eyes slowly flittered open, the world slowly coming into view. To slow; almost pixelated.

She lifted her arm to scratch her hand, but pulled it away when she felt fur on her head, alone with some other appendage. Her arm looked massive; well over a foot at the biceps.

Although her senses were coming back, her eyesight still seemed splotchy, yet somewhat clear. Al she could feel was her immensely fat body, her belly a huge fat that pushed her tree-trunk sized legs apart.

With an imaginary groan, she braced herself on the ground and slowly, with considerable labor, stood herself up, now eight feet tall. Lifting one leg forward, she began to heaved her gargantuan bulk forward with surprising strength, but paused as she felt something dragging behind her.

She turned her head to see that a massive thorax sprouted from behind her.

Panicked, she lifted herself several more steps towards porch, ducking as she trudged through the wide screen doors to the living room. Various items in the room shook or broke on the floor as she thundered into the room towards the bathroom, which she could only lean towards and peek her head through to see the mirror.

Any activity she once expressed vanished as she saw herself, staring in pure shock as she realized what creature she had become.

She was...
12111.title: She changes!

121111.content:
What stood wedged within the doorframe staring back at her was some kind of bug…a moth. Her breasts were the size of backpacks, and any expression she bore came from that of a plain white head covered in fur, sprouting two black antennae and bearing a face composed of two large black eyes and small pincers at the tip of her beak.

After staring at herself in silence for several minutes, she quickly (as quick she could) stood back up and felt her back, which sure enough was draped with two long, felt-like wings. She took one more look down at her stomach, the size of a van and coated with a thick exoskeleton, and slowly slumped down and fell on her monstrous weight with a gigantic CRASH!!! that either shook or knocked all the furniture in the room.

Had she a voice or tears, she would've cried at the behemoth she'd become, holding at the grotesquely enlarged parts of her body to see if this was all real. But sure enough, this was no dream.

However, any brooding within her came to a halt as she felt something within her globular stomach, her antennae perking. She had an appetite. Not hungry, but a sudden desire to be fed.

Woah…I…I gotta get something to eat! She thought. But…what can I eat?
121111.title: A bug's life

choices: The three cartons of ice cream
1211112.content: As the moth girl got up, she headed for the fridge, and opened it up to see the many options for food, which one would she eat first? That was the question...
1211112.title: Human food.

121112.content:
(Note: Terry loses her ability to speak in this chapter so her thoughts/communications with other bees will be highlighted in Banana Yellow

Terry saw that she was transforming into a large bee. Her skin had sprouted yellow fur all over her body as yellow-orange tufts appeared all over the back of her neck, forming a high and royal looking collar. Terry gasped. "Oh no," she said. "Oh no! Oh no! Oh! BZZZZZZZZZ." Terry's speech had quickly turned into buzzing as yellow and black stripes appeared on her large thorax that bulged out to be twice as wide as she was and just as long. Terry looked down and heard a ripping noise. What was left of her shirt had been completely destroyed as she sprouted two extra arms. She gasped as she wiggled all twelve of her fingers. As Terry was waddling around in a panic, she stepped on and smashed her coffee table and even screamed. "What is happening to me?" thought Terry to herself. "I'm turning into a giant bee!?"

As Terry waddled her obese form, she sprouted a pair of transparent wings on her back that looked big enough to allow even a big fatso like her to fly. Terry let out a buzzing scream as she felt her puffed up cheeks. Her hair extended and turned a golden brown color just like honey as her stomach bulged out more. "This has got to be a dream," thought Terry as she was getting bigger and bigger and her giant stinger pushed away a wall in her house. "That's it, this is just a bad dream. I hope." The bee girl grunted as her head burst through her ceiling. Terry looked around to see that she had outgrown her own house.

The queen-sized queen bee was now 40ft high with a 60ft wide thorax that was 40ft long as well as a 40ft wide belly, thunderous thighs that each had to be 20ft thick, D-cup breasts, three flabby arms with twelve sausage-like fingers and a prominent triple chin. Terry felt around her body and was horrified at what she had become. "This isn't a dream! This is a living nightmare! Look at me, I'm as big as a house." Terry then spotted the strange plant that mutated her in the first place and gave an angry buzz. "Evil flower! This is all your fault! Take this!" Terry gave an angry buzz and then stomped the flower into oblivion. She buzzed a few times and smiled briefly, but she realized she was still a giant bee. The world didn't take too kindly to bees that were the size of skyscrapers.

But as Terry was wondering what to do, she heard a loud, loud buzzing and looked all around to see a swarm of bees that resembled a maelstrom. None of the other bees were giant. They were millions of tiny normal sized bees that had took note of the former human turned bee who was ten-thousands of times bigger than them and from the looks of it, they had taken Terry as their queen. Before Terry could make heads or tails of the situation, a group of bees took the remains of the mutant flower and shaped them into a crown that was just big enough to fit on Terry's huge fat head. Terry could not believe it. This morning she was a gardener but now she was a literal queen bee. She actually smiled. "This might not be so bad. Alright, my tiny subjects. If you insist, I will be your new queen bee, and for my first decree, I order you to...."
121112.title: Queen Bee

choices: She's still hungry; get more food.
She'd like to explore, to check out her own bod.
1211122.content:
But before she could ask them to make her a new house, her stomach let out a deep, empty growl, and the bees didn't even wait for a command as half immediately flew from the swarm and over the forest while the rest swirled around the house she was still wearing.

Wait, what're you... The bees gathered on her to gently coax her back down as they flew through the Windows and began dissecting the house piece by piece, fashioning a platform under her looming 200,000 pound butt with legs and structures glued together by honey strong enough that it didn't crumble under her monster-sized weight. They kept working around the girth of her thorax to construct a backboard cushioned with all kinds of blankets and fabrics from inside the house, leaving her seated in a crude throne for a queen bee her size.

Wow... this is nice! She laid her arms on the armrests just as they were fastened on, leaning back with a comforted buzz. I could get used to this!

But a loud hum of thousands of bumblebees buzzed through the forest as the other bees returned whilst gathered in strong platforms. Upon their backs were tall mountains of food that they dispersed to drop around her, surrounded by piles of food reaching her shoulders.

Wow, that'll do nicely! She smiled excitedly as she reached to chow down from the pile, but the bees pushed her arm back down so they could carry five watermelons from the top instead, and fluttered them in front of her face. Surprised, yet flattered, she opened her maw wide and let the bees dump their bounty in, large enough that they barely filled her entire mouth. She chopped into the melons only once to fill her mouth with juice, which overwhelmed her insectoid tastebuds with a delightfully sweet wave of flavor, and she swallowed them whole while happily licking her lips.

More, please! She opened her mouth to invite herself to be fed, and the bees paid no haste as they began picking from the piles and lining up before their queen...

.....


"Bzzz..." Terry purred as the bees fed her the last of her feast, her face now crowded by another two chins and puffier cheeks.

All that was left was a few stray rinds littering the grass around her, and her transformation was quick to absorb her gluttonous behavior. Now she was forty feet tall whilst seated, and her stomach had bloated outward a dozen more in a long, blobby heap, tiered into two mounds of fat bordered by a deep crease wrapping her circumference and traveling through her naval. At either side of her mountainous gut, her legs had fattened into black, luscious hills of fat beneath tough skin, with her midlegs resting atop, only slightly smaller than her wide booty's limbs. However, her body's growth was far overshadowed by her newfound thorax, which now took up over half her height and stretched to cover an area of land that could fit a house and yard. Her throne had long been torn apart by its girth, but she paid no heed as her personal army rushed to replace it.

Scratching the side of her belly, she thought with a wry smile as she pondered her next command, the humming buzz of her new servants filling her hearing...
1211122.title: Find Me Something to Eat

choices: Both Giantesses Get in a Royal Catfight
The Ant Woman is Surprisingly Peaceful
12111222.content:
Terry raised all four of her flabby arms and then she buzzed her wings as she looked at her tiny insect subjects. “That was a good meal,” thought the bee queen. “But now that I have this new body I had better get uzzzzed to it.” That’s when Terry gasped to herself as she held out her wings and then flew up as her tiny subjects all flocked around her. Terry grunted because the bees appeared to be trying to hold up their ginormous and obese queen. However, the queen bee let out a yell. “Would you knock that off! I can fly perfectly well by myself. But I do zzzzuppose that a giant bee like me would attract zzzzuzzzpizzzcion. I inzzzztruct you, my zzzzzzubjects to azzzzemble a new hive out in the woodzzzzz zzzzzomewhere while I get uzzzzed to my new body.” The bees nodded their heads and then flew off to do their queen’s bidding as Terry flew into the air and spread out all four of her arms.

“Thizzzz izzz kind of fun.”   Of course, Terry realized that she was buzzing in her speech. “Oh dear,” thought the queen bee to herself. “I’m even buzzing to myzzzzelf. Oops. I wonder if the mind really izzzz a plaything of the body.” Then Terry let out a slight belch. “Ugh. That was a big meal. I wonder how much bigger I am.” Terry saw a nearby river and went to look at her reflection over the water just as she hovering. From the looks of it, She was now 90ft tall. Her thighs were now 40ft thick and her thorax was 85ft wide with a 75ft wide belly and four large chins as she saw her reddish brown hair flowing in the wind in her reflection. She truly was a queen bee; a queen bee as big as King Kong. As Terry flew down she heard a breaking sound and saw that her large thorax and stinger had pushed down and destroyed a few trees, prompting the queen of the bees to blush in embarrassment. “Oh my.” Terry even grabbed her stomach and held it up. She put her fingers through her thick fur to see that each strange was as thick as a small tree trunk. “I guezzzz I can forget about ever zzzzzzhaving my legs ever again."

The bee giantess then flew up into the air again and flew by a mountain that looked like a molehill to her. She noticed that it was covered in flowers and then sniffed it before beginning to drool slightly as she was buzzing. “Nectar,” she thought to herself. “Zzzzuch zzzzweet nectar.” The queen bee inhaled and sucked hundreds of nectar filled flowers into her huge mouth. Terry just kept on buzzing as she devoured the flowers in the process, all the pollen came out and covered her massive furry insect body. “I can’t believe this appetite.I juzzzzt ate. Izzzz thizzzz becauzzzze of my new bee biology? I really hope those other beezzzzz don’t expect me to lay a hundred eggs no matter how big I am.” Terry then let out a slight hiccup and buzzed in embarrassment. "I wonder how the bees are doing with the new hive."

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

At that time millions of bees were all but tearing apart trees and logs and building honeycombs as they put together a rather large hive in the side of a mountain. They knew that with such a titanic queen they needed the biggest high imaginable. They then picked up a few rocks and even found a deer skeleton in order to build support beams for such a giant hive. Nearby there was a young male entomologist observing the bees. "This is incredible," he said. "Bees are certainly the busiest and most unified creatures in the animal kingdom. However, this is a whole new level. The bees appear to be dismantling the forest to build a beehive that puts skyscrapers to shame. There appears to be more bees at the high than average. There must be some reason for such abnormal behavior." The entomologist then saw several of the bees also appeared to be gathering more fruits and vegetables and raised an eye at the apparently sudden new appetite of the small yellow insects. "There is definitely nothing natural about this situation."

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Meanwhile, Terry had decided to advance on foot as people would've no doubt seen a giant obese queen bee if she kept flying through the air and that would no doubt attract more trouble. With every step, her stomach rippled and she rubbed it with all four of her enormous pudgy arms. The giant queen bee then picked up a large tree and begun to eat it as if it was a stick of cotton candy before she decided to chew on the naked trunk, reducing it to a toothpick right before she let out a world shattering belch. The queen bee looked out and saw that her subjects were surrounding around the mountain to build the hive. "Holy cow," thought the queen of bees to herself. "That'zzz the biggest beehive I've ever zzzzzzeen. It lookzzzzz more like a palace. That hive lookzzzzz too good for a mere bee like me. But then again, at thizzzzzz zzzzzizzzze, I am no mere bee."

Terry laughed to herself when she suddenly had another thought and had a sinister grin on her face. "On zzzzzecond thought. Perhapzzzz I could be more than a queen bee. At this zzzzzizzze, I could rule over the humanzzzzz. Maybe once I've gotten better uzzzzzzed to thizzzzz new body, I'll conquer the world." Terrry then let out a laugh to herself although even she wasn't sure if she was just joking or if she actually did aspire for world domination. Terry then saw her reflection in another nearby lake and then she smirked as she adjusted her reddish brown hair into a beehive style. "There," thought Terry with a laugh. "Now that'zzzz a hairdo that zzzzzimply zzzzpellzzzz, Queen Bee." But then, Terry saw something that caught her attention and made her drop her jaw.

Across the ground there was a large sea of black wash over, but it wasn't a stream of oil. From the looks of it, it was millions of tiny ants that were as tiny and numerous as Terry's own bee subjects. "That'zzz odd. I wonder where all thozzzze antzzzz are marching." Terry stomped forward and followed the ants, she was curious as to what they were doing and even more curious as to why they didn't seem to be paying attention to the humongous and obese queen bee giantess following them.

Terry then looked forward and her eyes popped out of her head because she saw that the ants appeared to be constructing a dwelling of their own and it appeared to be one who's size was more than capable of rivaling her own beehive. It was a giant anthill that was as big as a volcano with millions of ants gathering around. "What the hell?" thought the bee giantess who appeared to be extremely jealous with how big the anthill was. "I hope for the zzzzake of those antzzz that that anthill isn't bigger than my hive. Don't they know I am the queen?"

Suddenly there was more stomping and Terry was even more confused than ever. "Where izzzzz that zzzzztomping coming from?" asked the giantess bee to herself. "I'm not moving an inch." Then Terry heard a deep and dry but still feminine voice. "What are you doing in my kingdom?" asked the voice. Apparently the voice was coming from a creature that could speak telepathically to insects just like Terry could. "Your Kingdom?" asked a rather angry Terry. "Let me tell you zzzzz....."

Before Terry could even say another word, her jaw dropped because now she was looking at another giantess who was an obese insect like her. From the looks of it, the giantess was a giant black-skinned ant woman with lock bluish black hair and a slight beauty mark on the first of her four chins. Just as Terry had four three-fingered arms, this ant giantess had four legs and two three-fingered arms. The ant woman was 90ft tall just like Terry with 50ft wide thunder thighs a 100ft wide thorax and 60ft wide belly. Like Terry she also had H-Cup breasts.

Terry could not believe it but then she saw that wrapped around one of the ant giantess's legs was a flower just like the flower that mutated her into a giant bee. This ant woman was a mutated human like her and the ant woman was staring at her. Terry didn't know what to expect from the ant giantess and what the ant thought of a giant bee woman in her territory.

Terry groaned and twitched as she got on her three-fingered hands and heard what was left of her pants being torn apart. She even let out a hiss as her body turned pale green with black and yellow stripes. She then felt her thorax turn into segments as each segment sprouted thighs and legs as thigh as tree trunks. Terry then felt her face becoming more chubby as she swelled all the way to 10-ft tall and from her weight, had she been half her height, she wound weigh 2000lbs. The girl then yelled as she spewed white silk from her nostrils and then sucked them back into her nose. By the time the transformation was over, Terry was a 12ft tall, 20ft long and five ton caterpillar, specifically, the caterpillar of a swallowtail butterfly.

Terry looked at the mirror and saw that she now had six arms that she used to feel all around her newly obese body. She even felt her breasts that were the size of watermelons. The caterpillar woman turned around and shook her 6ft wide booty in front of the mirror. “Oh my gosh,” she said. “What was in that flower? It turned me into a caterpillar.” But then Terry gasped. “Wait,” she said with a smile. “This is actually a very, very, very good thing.” Terry let out a squee as her obese body was shaking. She wiggled her body and giggled. “Big fat caterpillars turn into big beautiful butterflies. This is good, if I continue to be a caterpillar, I’ll be a butterfly before I know it. A rather big butterfly, but I’ll be gorgeous. It will be as if I’ve turned into a fairy. Terry giggled but then the obese caterpillar girl realized something. “But wait,” she said. “Caterpillars need to eat a lot of food to have the strength to become butterflies. Well, I am one very hungry caterpillar. One VERY hungry caterpillar who is going to become a beautiful butterfly.”

Wasting no time, Terry immediately rushed to the fridge and started to eat everything in it. She ate three entire watermelons, rinds and all before spewing the seeds out the window like a gatling gun. She guzzled three entire cartons of milk and then swallowed an entire turkey in one gulp. She saw a chocolate cake and some gelatin that had been in the fridge for a while and then shoved both of them into her chubby cheeks with one greedy gulp before she guzzled two bottles of soda and let out a belch. Her stomach was bulging and she rubbed it. Then she heard her stomach rumbling. “You greedy thing,” said the caterpillar woman rather teasingly. “I know where there’s more to eat.” Terry then moved onto her garden where she proceeded to eat every plant that wasn’t moving away. She sucked up creeper vines as if they were spaghetti and then chewed up dandelions in a salad before she greedily gobbled all of the grass. She was sorry to see her garden being destroyed, but she could always revive it once she became a butterfly like she hoped. Then she came upon the mutant plant that turned her into a giant caterpillar in the first place and licked her lips. “I have you to thank for the fact that I’m going to be a butterfly soon, but now I have to eat you, little plant. Bottoms up.” Terry ate the entire plant in one ginormous gulp and then let out a belch. She looked and saw she had gotten bigger. She was now 15ft tall and doubled in weight.

Terry let out a giggle. “It looks like I’m going to become a big beautiful butterfly woman real soon.” However, Terry’s stomach then begun to gurgle. “Are you kidding me?” she asked. “Are you still hungry? Terry let out a sigh, but she knew that such boundless and greedy hunger was inevitable. The caterpillar woman retreated back inside, crushing her couch beneath her as she was ordering pizza. “No, you heard that right, 25 pepperoni pizzas with mushrooms, extra goat cheese and anchovies. Please deliver it to 555 Gardenia Way. Thank you.” Terry let out a sigh. “So much for that car I was saving up for. But hey, 1) I couldn’t fit into any car at this size and 2) once I’m a butterfly. I’ll have no more use for a car.” Terry let out a laugh. Her metamorphosis was going to take some extra food, but she knew that in the end, once she was a beautiful butterfly, she’d be worth it.   Suddenly there’s a knock on the door and Terry waddles up to answer it.
1211131.title: The Very Very Very Hungry Caterpillar
