"Yes ma'am that will be..." The teen stared in disbelief at the gigantic caterpillar woman before him.
"Uh... a... guh..." The kid was at a lost for words.
"Oh this is nothing just wait until I turn into a beautiful butterfly. Now here's my payment, keep the change." Terry handed him a ton of money before closing the door and waddling back to the living room leaving the kid to question his eyesight.

Once in there with all her pizzas Terry opened one up and messily dug in. After an hour or so Terry sat back and sighed in pleasure. She rubbed her gigantic stomach which had grown even bigger than before.
"Who knew being a caterpillar was so hard?" Terry said to herself before giggling. She couldn't wait to turn into a butterfly and she had to admit, she was getting a little impatient now.
"Do caterpillars usually have to wait this long?" Terry let out a groan but then she felt a little parched.
'I could use a drink... the garden hose outside would do...' Terry thought to herself so she got up and went off to the backyard.
12111311.title: The Pizza is Here

12113.content:
(Note: the garden idea isn’t a bad idea, but perhaps we should take it in a different direction).

Our story begins in a greenhouse that appears to be filled with all manners of cacti. Hard at work was a young violet haired woman with what looked like red body tattoos all over her. She was wearing an indigo tank top shirt and a pair of skintight indigo shorts that emphasized her pear-shaped figure as she walked into the greenhouse wearing an apron. Her name was Temperance Collins and cacti were her hobby. She had gone through a nasty divorce months ago and had taken up raising cacti in order to cope. Temperance held up her spray bottle as she used it to water the cacti. “There you go,” said Temperance. “People think I’m strange for spending 10 hours a day on cacti, but cacti are much different from people who really don’t understand. Cacti don’t intentionally try to hurt you.”

Temperance then gasped because she saw that there was a cactus with a flower on it that was getting ready to bloom. “O.M.G.,” she said. “This is perfect. Hold that pose.” Temperance smiled and held up her camera in order to snap a photograph of the cactus about to bloom. “This is it,” she said. “This is it. Get ready to bloom.” However, before Temperance could take the photograph, there was a loud banging on the greenhouse door and Temperance was so startled that she missed and accidentally snapped a photograph of her feet. She then saw the flower had bloomed and she missed it. The young woman gave a grunt and then stomped off to find who was the one who knocked at the door.

But when Temperance opened the door, she saw that nobody was there. She looked around and found nobody but then she looked down and to her surprise, there was a small blue cactus on the floor that was shaped like a cube with a purple flower blooming from it. “Oh my gosh,” she said. “What is this?” Temperance looked at the cactus and could not believe it. “I’ve never seen a cactus that looks like this one before. In fact, I’ve heard of people growing watermelons in cubes, but not cacti.” That was when Temperance noticed a strange note with the cactus and picked it up. As she read it, she was surprised.

“I know I haven’t been the best man and you want me out of your life. I can’t say I don’t want you back, but I understand that I was the one who was wrong. What I did was inexcusable. I know you never want to see me again, but let’s end this on a happy note. No more hard feelings. I heard you like cacti, so please accept this gift. Signed, Zack.” Temperance let out a groan. Zack was her ex-husband. She had left him because he had an awful temper and even hit her once. This was out of character for him. He never cared much for her plants or her hobbies. However, it was a beautiful looking cactus, so Temperance decided to give Zack the benefit of the doubt and take the cactus in.

She placed it right on the floor and then sprayed the cactus a few times. "You're quick a cute cactus. I'll just see if there's a space up on the top shelf for you. Temperance then climbed up the ladder to reach the top of the shelf. She moved a few cactuses in order to make room for her newest acquisition. "There," said Temperance. "This looks like a nice spot."

But then suddenly, one of the rungs on the ladder broke and Temperance screamed as she fell down and landed butt first on the blue cactus and jumped into the air. Temperance yelled and screamed as she held her butt in pain. "Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow!" Temperance then started to pick out the needles from her backside and then turned around. She gave a sigh of relief that her large butt did not flatten the cactus. "Oh," she said." Thank goodness that you're alright. I wouldn't want my enormous booty to crush the newest member of my cactus family." As Temperance but the cactus in its new spot, she rubbed her ass in pain.

"I gotta admit," said Temperance. "My ass has been getting bigger every month, every since the divorce. However, my butt's always been big, ever since I was a child." Suddenly Temperance felt her butt throbbing and then she scratched it. She failed to notice that her ass was turning bright green and her skin was getting rougher and rougher. "But I must say," said Temperance. "This is why I raise cacti. Cacti won't betray you and I know we got off on the wrong... butt... but I have a feeling we will." Temperance then yelled because her ladder broke and she landed on the ground hard enough to make it crack.

Temperance grunted and tried to get up, but it was to no avail because her ass was too big. By the time Temperance finally got up, she saw that her skin had turned completely green and Temperance gasped because she was now 12' feet tall and her stomach was 8' wide while her ass was 15ft wide and managed to crack a hole in the glass wall as she backed up. Temperance grunted and then she looked up to see a pink flower blooming on her head and then she felt spikes growing all over her body and tearing through her clothes. It was as if she was turning into a human cactus.

"Oh no." Muttered Temperance.
12113.title: The Cactus Lady

121132.content:
'Note: two things. First this character is deaf, so she'll be speaking with sign language. Sing language will be represented with these symbols: <>. Second, this character will remain deaf throughout the story, so her becoming a giantess will not fix her hearing.'

Claire Fieldmore was a fairly normal person. She'd just finished college and was ready to get a job. But that proved to be quite hard. Once again, she had been turned down. That was the 4th job this week. No matter what she did, no one would hire her. And she knew why.

It was because, since birth, she has been completely deaf. And most of the places she tried to get a job at weren't comfortable or couldn't accomidate a deaf person.

Right now, she was sitting a bar, upset. While she sat, some guys were checking her out. She didn't blame them. Standing at 5'8'', with black hair in a ponytail, blue eyes, and a nice pear shaped figure, Claire was fairly pretty. But she just wanted to drink her sorrows away right now.

She did smile when she saw her friend, Thomas Mattew, sit down next to her. He was an inch shorter then her, with spikey brown hair and green eyes, and was pretty lankey. He saw Claire's frowning face.

<What's up Claire?> Thomas asked, using sign language.

<Got turned down again. At this rate, I'll be unemployeed forever.> Claire signed back.

Thomas sighed. <Claire, you are smart. I'm sure you'll find a job that will take you. You just need to keep trying.>

It was Claire's turn to sigh now. <I know that, but there aren't any in town. And this job was pretty rude in turning me down. They didn't know about my deafness, so they thought I was stupid. Can you believe that?>

"Closing time!" A bartender yelled.

<Closing time, Claire.> Thomas signed. <Tomorrow, I'll take you around to find a job.>

Claire nodded and got up to leave. <Thanks.> She signed, and left the bar.
----------------------------
An hour later, Claire was walking down the sidewalk, heading for her apartment.

'I hope Thomas is right. I'm sick of being unemployeed.' Claire thought. 'Wish I had the money for a hearing aid.'

She was pulled from her train of thought when she passed a field. She saw a red glow coming from it. Intrigued, she walked into the field to see what it was.
She saw a small crater in the field, and in the crater was a glowing rose. Confused, she walked closer to the crater. But as she did, the glow got brighter, and she passed out.
121132.title: The Deaf Rose

1211321.content:
1 hour later, Claire groaned as she woke up. She looked in surprise because she was mysteriously found herself back at her apartment. “I’m home?” thought Claire to herself. “What’s going on? All I remember is...” Claire then turned her head and looked in surprise because there was that glowing pink rose on the table by her bed and even the stem and leaves were glowing as the rose opened up. Mysteriously the rose had been placed inside of a flowerpot. “The rose?” thought the deaf girl to herself. “But that’s impossible. I thought that I left it in the crater. How did it get into a flowerpot. There’s something strange going on... ow!”

Claire had foolishly tried to touch the rose to see exactly what it’s true nature was. As we all know, roses have thorns and one of the thorns had pricked Claire’s finger. Claire grunted as she bled slightly and then put her finger into her mouth. However, what she didn’t know was that there was a strange glowing enzyme of the thorn that entered Claire’s bloodstream and mouth. “What is with this strange plant? Ouch. Okay, maybe I should not have touched it. It is a rose after all. But how did it get there? Did I pick it in my sleep or something? Well, I might as well waster it and then go to bed.” Claire walked into the kitchen to fill up a pitcher of water for her mysterious new plant. In the process, she stopped herself and then proceeded to drink all of the water in the pitcher herself right before she refilled it and then went to tend to the plant. Now, Claire was always pear-shaped but for some reason her butt looked even bigger on her body than it usually did, to the point where her pants were abnormally tight on it.

After she watered the rose, Claire decided to turn in and go to bed. However, when she was putting on her pajamas, she felt something strange with her pajama pants. “What is going on?” thought Claire. “I just bought these pajamas and already the pants don’t fit? What the actually heck.” Claire grunted again as she finally shoved her pants on. Although they were slightly tight and Claire was grunting as she laid in bed until she finally felt asleep. What she didn’t realize was that there was a light pink tone developing in her hair which appeared to be changing color as she slept. As Claire was snoozing away, her bed was creaking and bending as the springs stretched. She was getting bigger and heavier in her sleep and grew two more chins as her fat was growing mainly into her ass that was causing her pajama pants to slip off. Curiously, strange spike-like growths in her skin grew on Claire’s back and nearly made holes in her shirt.

The very next morning, Claire’s alarm clock rang very loudly, prompting the deaf girl to slam down on it. “Dammit. I hate Mondays.” As Claire yawned and stood up in her bed, she yelled because at that moment, her bed broke in half in the center and her ass had completely destroyed her pajama pants. Claire got up and rubbed her head and then felt her stomach to see that she had grown a few rolls on her body. “What on Earth?” Claire then screamed as she looked at herself in the mirror. She had grown to 8’ 3” and had to weigh 500lbs. Claire turned around to see that she now sprouted a 5ft wide posterior that bumped against the mirror and cracked it slightly. Not only that, Claire’s hair had completely turned light pink, the same shade of pink as the rose on the table. “Oh my gosh! How did I get so fat? I skipped dinner last night.” Claire then noticed the strange spikes on her shoulders and felt them as she was in absolute surprise. “How can this be?” Claire turned her head and then she remembered that strange rose and saw that the rose had completely bloomed and was glowing. “Could it be that rose? Maybe this is an allergic reaction. But what kind of allergic reaction causes you to grow spikes on your body? And your hair to turn pure pink! This is too weird.”

Suddenly, Claire’s phone begun to ring, not that she noticed it because she was deaf, so she just stepped into the shower. “Water! I need water!” The deaf fat girl turned the shower on at full blast and smiled with bliss as the water was swept over her. She had her mouth open wide to swallow as much of the water as she could. "Oh yeah. That's the good stuff. As Claire was showering, she failed to notice that more spikes were growing over her back and her ginormous booty. The spikes even fell down to her legs. As Claire stepped out of the shower, she finally found her cell phone and noticed that Thomas had left her a text message. “Oh my gosh!” thought Claire to herself. “Thomas! Oh man! I’m gonna be late.”

Wasting no time, Claire ran up to her closet and tried to put on a jacket. However, she discovered that it was too small on her much huger body. “Crap.” Claire went through every last shirt and pair of pants in the closet but none of them fit and caused her to mentally scream. The deaf woman then noticed the curtain on the wall and she let out a sigh. “Desperate times call for desperate measures.” Claire figured that she needed to improvise this time and made the curtains into a makeshift cocktail dress. “Well,” she said as she failed to notice spikes sprouting on her arms. “At least this will help me make a good first impression to a potential boss.” Claire walked out to meat with Thomas, but as she did, her hair turned into a more reddish shade of pink and she appeared to be sprouting a tail. This tail however, was bright green and covered in spikes and appeared to be made up of twisted vines.

At that moment, Thomas pulled up in his car to pick up Claire and parked on the side of the street. He looked at Claire in pure surprise, obviously not expecting her to have put on so much weight overnight. He signed to her to speak to her. "<Wow, Claire. What happened? Have you been binge eating since the last time I saw you? You’re huge.>” Claire gave a blush. “<Don’t flatter yourself Thomas. I literally have no idea how this happened.>” “<I’m sorry, that was mean. I found a few potential jobs that might interest you.>” Claire smiled and got into the car but in the process she found herself canned like a sardine in the vehicle and grunted. Thomas then noticed the spikes on Claire’s arms and looked in surprise. However, he couldn’t talk to her in sign language about the condition while he was driving, so he decided to just grin and bear it.

 The first stop appeared to be in front of a studio that was brightly colored. “<Isn’t this where they shoot the fashion pictures for Mon*Starz Magazine?>” asked Claire. Thomas nodded his head. “<I’ll admit. I wasn’t expecting the weight gain. But I’m pretty sure we’ve found a job for you.>” "<I hope so.>" Claire tried to get out of Thomas's car but grunted because she had gotten so obese that her butt got stuck inside the car. "<Uh, Thomas, a little help please? My butt is kinda stuck.>" Thomas let out a sight and slammed both his feet into Claire's ass to push her out of the car. Claire grunted and hit the ground and Thomas yelled in pain because spikes seemed to grow on Claire’s fleshy booty as well.” Thomas looked down and gasped as he noticed the spikes and then noticed that Claire had a tail. “What was in that breakfast burrito I ate?” asked Thomas in disbelief. Claire let out a grunt as she rubbed her ass in pain but then moaned because of the spikes and proceeded to put her finger in her mouth. “<I don’t know about this, Thomas. Maybe I don’t look the part.>” “<Read my hands, Claire. This job doesn't require use of your ears. The photographer and editor will be out in a few minutes. Maybe they won't mind... uh, well.>" Claire let out a sigh. "<I hope so. Or I'm sunk.>"

Suddenly, Claire held her stomach in pain. "<Claire? What's wrong?>" Claire made a few gestures as best she could as her stomach hurt. "<I'm in pain. My stomach feels like it's gonna explode. I think that's what I get for skipping breakfast today.” Claire’s stomach then gurgled again and Claire moaned slightly. But then something strange occurred. Claire’s spikes got bigger and her body grew fatter to the point it shredded the curtains she was wearing just as he body turned green. Claire held out her hands and her fingers formed into three digits on each hand that quickly turned into rose leaves. A second pair of leaves appeared on Claire’s back and took the form of what looked like a pair of wings. Claire’s head also started to mysteriously change shape. Her hair morphed into rose petals as her face stretched out into a dragon-like snout made out of the same material as the petals. However, she hadn't noticed this. Thomas took one look at the mutating Claire and he was horrified. He even let out a loud scream. Back home, Claire's mysterious rose was still glowing, but it had closed up and shed some of its petals as it spun and shook inside of its flowerpot. No doubt the weird flower had something to do with Claire’s transformation.

Back with Claire and Thomas, Thomas was on the ground and screamed as the transmogrified Claire stood up and unconsciously swung her long vine tail. Since Claire couldn't hear Thomas screaming, she had no idea what was wrong. "Oh," thought Claire to herself. "My head. My ears feel number than usual. Where are my ears. Claire then looked and see that everything seemed to be getting smaller. "What's going on?" Claire then gasped as she looked into her leaved hands and then saw the leaf wings on her back. That's when it dawned on her, she was a giant and obese rose creature and she was still getting bigger and bigger and bigger. When she stopped growing, Claire was...
1211321.title: Now That Your Rose is in Bloom

12113211.content:
Claire took in what happened to her. She had to be around 100 feet tall now, and was massively obese. Her belly was 50 feet wide, her butt was 70 feet wide, and her breasts, if human sized, would have been K cups. She also appeared to have 4 chins.

But that wasn't what freaked her out. She was now some sort of rose monster. Her hair had turned into pink rose petals, and her face streched into a dragon-like snout. Her skin had turned green and was covered in thorns. Her hands now had only three fingers and looked like leaves. On her back were two large leaf wings. Sticking out of her lower back was a thorny green tail.

As she looked down at herself in disbelief, she noticed Thomas was waving his arms. Squinting to get a better look, she finally realized he was signing to her, asking if she was alright. She began to sign back, only to remember she only had three fingers now, so signing would be a problem. She thought for a moment, and then had an idea. Concentrating, she moved her tail and shaped it into a pair of hands. Using those, she began to sign.

<Thomas! I'm fine! But look at me! I'm a monster!> She signed, having to carefully manuver the tail to make the proper words.

<What happened?> He asked.

<I'm not sure! Last night, I was walking home. I saw a crater with a rose in it, and... THE ROSE! That thing must have done this! It's at my apartment!> She signed with her tail.

<Right. Let's head to your apartment.> He signed back.

<But, my job...>

<I think a photography job isn't as important as turning into a giant flower monster!>

Claire nodded and picked up Thomas, careful not to prick him with her thorns. She set him on her shoulder and started for her home.
-----------------------
Meanwhile, back at the crater, a figure was looking at it. The figure was female and humanoid in appearance, but with green, thorny skin and a large pink rose bod for hair in place of her hair. Like Claire now, she was morbidly obese, with H cup breasts, a yoga ball sized gut, beach ball sized butt cheeks, and 4 chins. She looked at the crater in annoyance.

'DAMN IT!' She thought, 'The rose is gone! It must have bonded to someone. This is bad. I can't go back to Floraniko without that rose. Ok Xanatra, think! If someone bonded to the rose, they'd be a 100 foot Zuok. So just look around for a giant rose monster, and it will lead you to the rose.'

Sighing, the green woman turned and started for the road.
-------------------------
Back with Claire and Thomas, they were on their way back to Claire's apartment, Claire moving carefully so as to not crush anything. Eventually, they made it to the apartment building. Claire set Thomas on her balcony and, using a finger, broke the sliding door.

<It should be in my room.> Claire signed with her tail. <Grab the flowerpot, but don't touch the rose.>

Thomas nodded, and entered the apartment. Before he could do anything, however, he saw that someone else was in the aparment. That person was...
12113211.title: Claire the Rose Dragon

121132112.content:
Thomas stared in confusion at the two people holding the glowing rose. One was a skinny man in his early 90's, bald and with green eyes, and the other was a skinny woman in her mid 80's, with grey hair in a ponytail and blue eyes. Both of them were wearing lab-coats. They looked at Thomas.

"Are you the owner of this apartment?" The old woman said.

"No, that would be Claire Fieldmore. I'm Thomas Mattew." Thomas replied.

"Is that Claire behind you?" The woman asked.

Thomas turned to see Claire's giant eye staring through the window. "Yes it is." Thomas replied.

"Ah. Good to know." The old man replied. "I'm Dr. Stephen Henikow, this is my assistant and wife, Jess."

"I've heard of you two." Thomas said. "You're famous, aren't you? You're the people who have been trying to prove alien life for the past few years. And from what I've heard, you're getting close."

"That's right." Stephen replied. "And we believe this rose may be the key."

"How did you know it was here?" Thomas asked.

Stephen reached into his coat pocket and pulled out what looked like an old ship radar. "This baby tracks energy that isn't from Earth. It traced the rose to this apartment."

"How did you get it?" Thomas asked.

"Listen, we don't have time to answer that." Jess said. She then walked to Claire. "HELLO! MY NAME IS JESS HENIKOW! WE ARE HERE TO HELP YOU!"
Clarie just stared at her before using her tail-hand to sign.

"Claire's deaf." Thomas said.

"Oh, let me then." Stephen said. He then walked up and began signing.

<Claire? I'm Stephen Henikow. This is Jess, my assistant and wife. We are here to help.> Stephen signed.

<I've heard of you. Can you really help?> Claire signed back.

Before anyone could reply, the door burst open. Entering the aparment was...
121132112.title: How Scientific

1212.content:
It happened in a top secret laboratory where there was a strange machine that appeared to be picking away at a strange block of ice. One of the scientists was a messy-haired and pale-skinned man who was smiling fiendishly as he looked at the ice. His coworker, a large Japanese man with a thick goatee ran behind him. "Gutierrez," he said. "What are you doing? This is insane." Gutierrez turned to face his coworker. "This is science, Shijima," he said. "After years of searching I have finally found a test subject for the very chemical I've been working on. My Ultimate Human formula." "I know all about your super steroid, Gutierrez," said Shijima. "But I'm telling you that it can't be done. A chemical that can induce psychic powers, superhuman strength and invulnerability. It can't be done because modern humans aren't strong enough to take it."

Gutierrez then smiled and looked into the block of ice. "Which is precisely why I've had to outsource and dig up a more primitive model. Inside the block of ice appeared to be a tan-skinned neanderthal woman who had black hair that also appeared to have a white streak in it. From the looks of it, she had purple tribal makeup all over her body and she looked like she was stronger than the modern human bodybuilder. She was wearing nothing but what looked like a leopard-skin loincloth and a necklace that appeared to be made out of fangs. The ice was rapidly melting and Dr. Shijima looked in concern. "Gutierrez, what you are doing isn't realistic. You don't know whether or not that girl is still alive." Gutierrez gave a glare. "I'll admit," he said. "She will more than likely be on death's door upon revival, burt my Valentine serum should revive her. Make a note, Shijima, project Valentine will succeed."

The ice continued to melt and the cavewoman's eyes slowly begun to open, even under the ice. Once her arm was thawed out, it begun to twitch and she begun to break through. Once she was out of the ice, the cavewoman let out a scream and stood up before panting heavily. Shijima was more than a little afraid seeing as this girl came from a more savage time. The cave woman looked around at the strange machines and she was yelling in fear she even held her head. "Gutierrez!" yelled Shijima. Gutierrez didn't lose his cool however and calmly walked up to the cave girl. "Hello," he said. "You are Valentine." The cave girl growled and stepped back in fear as Gutierrez held up what looked like a combination of a syringe and a stamp. "Do not be afraid. I am Dr. Horatio Gutierrez. I freed your from your frozen tomb." The cave girl then begun to sweat heavily because it really did appear that the cold hadn't done her any good.

"You're losing here!" yelled Shijima. But Gutierrez was determined not to lose "Valentine" and injected her with the syringe, making her yell before her eyes glowed. The strange serum turned her hair pink and from the wound with the syringe appeared a tattoo of a heart and the number 02." Valentine sweated and then felt her arm in pain before she did something that startled Shijima. She spoke.

"Where am I? What is this world." Gutierrez let out a laugh. "Phase one is a success. Her intelligence has started to grow." Then Valentine felt her stomach in pain. "I'm starving," she said. "I feel as if I haven't eaten for ages." Gutierrez nodded his head. "Come with me. Can't have you dying of starvation." As Valentine followed Gutierrez, Shijima realized that she appeared to have gotten slightly taller and thicker than she was a minute ago. It would appear the Valentine Serum had more side-effects than Gutierrez was aware of.

(Note: In this path, the test subject is to remain human without turning into an animal or a monster because lwut asked me to do a strictly human chapter. I just decided to exploit a loophole in his instructions)
1212.title: Loophole Abuse

choices: She Panicked and Ran Out into the Big City
Dr. Shijima Heard the Noise and Went to Investigate
12121.content:
The cavewoman, now called Valentine, was brought into a room to test her abilities. Since even a madman let Gutierrez wouldn't expect instant results from a cavewoman with an empty stomach, Gutierrez had brought several steaks that Valentine was quickly tearing into with her bare hands as Gutierrez himself looked in disgust. "I know that I shouldn't expect any basic table manners from a cavewoman." Valentine then let out a large belch. "What kind of animal is this?" asked Valentine. "It tastes a bit like aurochs but something is somewhat off. I prefer mammoth." "Well," said Gutierrez. "I'm afraid that mammoth meat has been off the menu and out of stock for thousands of years." Valentine was scratching the mark where she was inoculated. It was then she jumped out because she spotted the lightbulb above her head.

She reached out and grabbed hold of the bulb in curiosity, only to burn herself as she yelled in pain. "Fire?!" she yelled. "Fire in a gourd." "Those are lightbulbs," said Gutierrez with a sigh. "The 21st centuries has been shaped by centuries of advancements beyond the wheel." "Impossible," said Valentine. "It took my father years of hard work perfecting the wheel." Gutierrez raised an eyebrow. "Your father invented the wheel? Well, there is one mystery that's been solved. Now, Valentine, I need to test your strength. Come with me." Valentine followed Gutierrez to a room with a large metal bell. "This bell weighs exactly three tons," said Gutierrez. "It took a crane to bring it into this room. Do you think you can lift it." Valentine was confident and cracked her knuckles. The cave girl walked to the bell and easily lifted it with one arm. "Good," said Gutierrez. "Now put it down and try lifting it with your brain."

Needless to say, Valentine did not understand Gutierrez's words and tried to pound her head against the bell, only succeeding in making it ring loudly. Gutierrez then let out a sigh. "Let me explain," said Gutierrez. "We scientists believe that humans use only 10% of their brains. My Valentine Serum I used on you is designed to increase those very abilities and utilize the full potential of the human brain, granting you telekinesis and extrasensory perception." Valentine looked in confusion and scratched her head because she had come from a time when the words for such concepts, let alone the concepts themselves, did not exist at all.

Gutierrez slapped himself in the face. "Of course!" he yelled with a laugh. "Of course! I guess I shouldn't have expected your brain to evolve this fast. What I meant to say is, that you should now be able to hear the thoughts of others and move objects simply by thinking. Now, using only your thoughts, I want you to move that bell." Valentine was slightly confused but then she gave a look of surprise because she could hear Dr. Gutierrez talk, only his lips were not moving. "I know you can hear my thoughts, Valentine, so I know that my Valentine Serum is working. Now, just concentrate on the bell. You can do it. Show everyone that I'm not insane."

Valentine nodded her head and grunted as she concentrated her telekinetic abilities. Her telekinesis was indeed strong because the table and chairs and pens and papers in the room all were floating in the air. Her hair and loincloth were even moving as if there was wind and the purple tattoos all over her body were glowing. Finally, Valentine managed to lift the bell with her mind. "Yes!" yelled Gutierrez. "That is it. Good girl Valentine."

However, Valentine then felt a tingling in her chest and groaned. "Valentine!" yelled Gutierrez. "Don't lose concentration now." That's when Gutierrez noticed that Valentine appeared to be getting bigger. Not only was she getting taller, but her stomach, breasts and thighs were expanding. "Good grief!" yelled Gutierrez. "What's happening?" Valentine was quickly growing and putting on weight. She saw her belly overflowing on the floor and her legs expanding as her loincloth shrunk and gasped as she felt her stomach. She even begun to scream, causing her telekinesis to fly out of control and make the bell shake and ring violently before it started to crack and come apart. The walls begun to crack as well and the tables and chairs exploded before the windows shattered. Valentine was yelling loudly and from the looks of it she was getting larger and larger. At that moment, she was 12feet tall with E-Cup breasts, an 8ft wide belly and a monstrous ass with thighs as thick as tree trunks.

Valentine screamed as she grew taller and fatter. "Oh no," said Gutierrez. "The Valentine Serum! It must be a side effect!" Valentine kept on screaming as her telekinesis continued to run out of control. "Calm down, Valentine!" yelled Dr. Gutierrez. "Calm! Ah!" Dr. Gutierrez held his head in pain and even begun to bleed through his ears and foam at the mouth because Valentine was accidentally squeezing his brain with her psychic abilities. By the time the cave girl realized what she was doing and stopped, Gutierrez fell to the ground mumbling, showing that his brain had taken a severe beating.

Valentine screamed and then looked around and yelled as she held onto her head. At that moment...

1213.title: Mutual Metamorphosis

12131.content:
The day begun harmlessly enough in a small art colony town where two lovers were walking through a craft store. This however, wasn’t your average pair of lovers but a same sex couple. First of the couple was Ava, the shorter one, a mocha-skinned and hourglass shaped Brazilian woman who was holding tight to her lover, Zephyr, a tall and well-endowed blonde with a freckled face. The two of them were in a very happy mood. This was because they had been dating for several years and in a month they were going to be married. Zephyr held up a broach that looked like it was shaped like a rook chess piece.

“How about this one, Ava?” asked Zephyr. “Do you think that I’d look good with this brooch on?” Ava smiled. “Zephyr,” she said. “You’d look good with anything on.” Zephyr let out a giggle and then she and Ava embraced in a kiss. “You two must really be in love,” said the shopkeeper. “You’re in such a happy move.” Ava and Zephyr gave a giggle. “Well,” said Zephyr. “It’s only natural. Next month we’re going to tie the knot.” The shopkeeper gave a smile. “That’s wonderful,” she said. “That’s exactly why I love this town. Love is love, no matter who.” Ava then took Zephyr by the hand and walked down the hall. “Would you look at that tiara,” said Ava. “I bet you’d look good in that.” Zephyr let out a giggle.

However, while the lovely couple was very happy about their plans for the future, there was somebody around the corner who wasn’t very happy. He looked like a French painter and a rather disfigured looking one. One of his ears looked lower on his head than the other ear, his nose looked distorted, he appeared to have sharp teeth and his eyes seemed lower on his face than his nose. He also had a mustache and a red beret. He was yelling to himself as he read a notice. “Bastard landlord! Only one month or I’m out on the streets?! Does he not realize who I am?! I am Duba! The greatest artist in the world. And yet the stupid apes of this town do not recognize my genius. All I need is just one customer! Just one and it will show the world! But first I need to find a customer. Or two.”

That was when Duba heard the sound of a cash register and realized that Ava and Zephyr were leaving the shop. That’s when Duba got a smirk on his face and ran up to the couple as they were about to leave. “Excusez-moi, mademoiselles,” said Duba. “You two are quite beautiful. Perhaps you would each like a painting as beautiful as yourselves.” “Ugh,” said Ava. “What happened to you? Did you try to paint your own face?” Duba was about to get very angry, but then Zephyr bent down to speak with him. “You know, Ava,” she said. “It might not be such a bad idea. After all, the painting could be used to commemorate our marriage.” Duba seemed surprised that he was talking to a couple of lesbians but then she forced herself to smile. “Ah, I see,” said Duba. “A wedding. I’ve got it! It will be the greatest commemoration of a union between lovers. I promise you, come back in a week and I will have a painting ready for you to pick up. It will be the best painting in the world.” Ava let out a laugh. “That’s just what my Zephyr deserves.” “Oh you,” said Zephyr will a laugh. “Okay, sir. we will pick it up in a week.” As he shook hands with Ava, Duba let out a laugh.

Duba wasted no time getting to work and laughed to himself. “This is it. Once those two take a look at this painting that I use with my special paint, everyone will see the genius that is Duba.” Duba let out a laugh and sprayed a strange glowing paint onto the pallet before he got to work. Duba’s painting appeared to glow and Duba was humming to himself as he was putting the painting together. The finished product of the painting made it resemble the queen of hearts card with the queen being replaced by a lion and a tiger.” Once Duba took the brush away the painting glowed bright.

 Back at the craft shop, that painting of the lion and tiger was on the wall and it was glowing before it turned pitch gray. Zephyr then gave a smirk and showed her hundreds of razor sharp teeth. She let out a giggle as Ava looked in confusion at her manticore fiancée. “What’s so funny, Zephyr?” asked the weretiger. “Oh,” said Zephyr. “Ava, I just had a fun idea. How about we hit the all-you-can-eat buffet down the street.” Ava blinked in surprise at her fiancée’s proposal. “Zephyr, you’re not serious are you? People will see us.” Zephyr let out a scoff. “So what? They’d see us anyway. We’re both as big as buildings. Besides, just because we’re giant monsters now, that doesn’t mean people can label us. We’re still human. Uh.. kinda. Besides, this might be good for a laugh or two.”

Ava and Zephyr both laugh and then begin to walk away. Of course, they have to be very careful as not to crush any cars beneath their feet, stomachs and asses. At one point Ava’s scorpion tail accidentally scratches the side of a truck while one motorcyclist accidentally drives into Ava’s navel and gets stuck. The white weretigress has to pull out the cyclist and place him on the top of a skyscraper right as Zephyr accidentally tilts one building by pushing her huge ass into it. Inside the office building, the workers scream at the sight of manticore ass right in front of their window. Zephyr blushes and then sits down only for several cars behind her to beep their horn at her. “Geez,” says Zephyr. “Traffic is terrible in this city.” Ava gives a grunt because a helicopter landed on one of her lovehandles. “Tell me about it.” The two fat cats let out a sigh as they get up and begin to walk towards the restaurant with the buffet. “Ah,” says Zephyr as she licks her lips. “There it is.” Ava then looked at the doorway and realized something.

“Uh, Zephyr,” says Ava. “We won’t fit.” Zephyr let out a laugh. “Oh, we don’t need to, Ava. We don’t need to.” Zephyr then proceeded to rip the roof right off the restaurant. All the patrons looked in stunned silence as the felines looked down at them. “Oh,” said Ava with a smirk. “Don’t worry about us. We’re just in for a bite.” “And don’t worry,” said Zephyr. “My fiancée and I are only here for real food so don’t get overheated.” The cats stepped inside as almost everyone else screamed and ran out of the restaurant.” Ava let out a laugh and then gave a purr as she waved her tail and held her real into the air. Both she and Zephyr shoved their faces into the buffet and were greedily gulping everything down.

One patron hadn’t left the buffet and the young man seemed more baffled than afraid to see the two enormous felines and even walked up to the area between Zephyr’s butt cheeks and poked it with a fork slightly. Zephyr stopped chewing on buffalo chicken briefly and tried to look back but Ava’s stomach was in the way, so she shrugged it off in order to get back to eating. Ava slurped up some hard boiled eggs just as the young patron snapped a photograph of both the tiger and manticore lovers and then ran out of the buffet. “Did you hear something, Zephyr?” asked Ava. Zephyr shook her head right before she scarfed down some lasagna. “Ugh,” she said. “I feel like Garfield.” Ava gave a smirk. “Then pretend I’m Odie and kick my ass.” Zephyr let out a roar and a purr as she held up her wings.

At that moment the maitre'd walked into the main dining hall. "What is going on in..." The maitre'd then spotted Zephyr and Ava who just glare at him. "It's rude to stare," says Ava. "If you're going to make a fuss then my future wife and I will find some other place to dine." The maitre'd nervously walked back and ran into the hallway before letting out a gasp. "Did somebody leave the gate open to Sarmoti or something? Where did that manticore and weretiger come from?

Ava and Zephyr then both stood up and rubbed their stomachs. "That was a good meal," said Ava. "We need to remember this place for the wedding." Zephyr gave a purr. "Now how's about some dessert." "Oh, you naughty lioness, I'm all for it."

But before Ava and Zephyr can continue...
121311222.title: The Buffet

12132.content:
(Note: This is a Mutual Metamorphosis story, but with animals in place of supernatural creatures)

It was a peaceful evening after dinner in Zoomtown. Our story takes place in the home of a married couple, that is to say a same-sex married couple. This was the family of Elisa and Dominique Ventura. They had been married for several years now and had an adoptive son named Jeremy. Elisa at that moment was in the living room watching the television. She was a tall African American woman with long dark bluish black hair that appeared to be glowing in the light. Dominique was a tall Caucasian woman with long red hair and blue eyes that looked like they were glowing with her red mascara. At the moment she was washing dishes in the kitchen. She turned her head slightly and saw that Jeremy was busy reading a textbook of some kind.

“Jeremy,” said Dominique. “You’ve been looking at that textbook all day. It’s time for bed.” “But Dominique,” said Jeremy. “In three weeks, we have a research paper due.” “Giving out research papers in 4th grade,” said Elisa as she walked up to her son. “They should save it for high school.” Elisa looked down and noticed Jeremy was reading a textbook on wild animals. “Zoology?” asked Elisa. “That’s right,” said Jeremy. “Mr. Burns is having us write research papers on African animals and gave each student a choice between two different animals to choose from. That pervert is always giving these crazy assignments.” Dominique dropped a plate in the sink when she heard her son’s words. “Jeremy, do you even know what “pervert” means?” “No. But I heard the neighbors calling him that. What does it mean?” Dominique bit her lip, wanting to change the subject as fast as possible. “Uh, what two animals were you assigned?” Jeremy let out a groan. “I have to choose between writing a report on hippopotami or writing a report on cape buffalos.”

Elisa was suddenly very interested. “Well, that’s easy enough. If I were you I’d go with the buffalo.” Jeremy then turned to face Dominique. “Personally,” said Dominique. “I prefer hippos. The first thing to know about either choice however, Jeremy, is that both of those animals are extremely dangerous. They’d kill you if you provoked them.” “Really?” Elisa nodded her head. “Just because an animal doesn’t eat meat doesn’t mean it’s harmless. Remember, they’re herbivores but they’re BIG herbivores. But mind Dominique. It’s time for you to rest. Remember, you have school tomorrow and you’re not staying up all night wracking your brain around this issue.” Elisa kissed her son right before Jeremy smiled and walked upstairs to bed.

Once Jeremy was in bed, Elisa walked up to Dominique in the kitchen. “Personally,” said Elisa. “I’d recommend the report on the cape buffalo.” “And why might I ask would that be?” “Because the African buffalo is one of the most unbeatable animals in Africa. They can even kill lions. They come in herds that contain 50 to 3000 members and protect the herd so well that nothing can get them. Anyone stupid enough to hunt a buffalo gets a violent death on their 6-foot long horns of doom.”

Dominique let out a laugh. “That may be true, but hippos are more dangerous. They’re the third largest land animal on the planet, can open their mouths at an angle of 150 degrees and when they get enraged they bite boats in half. They kill more people a year than lions or crocodiles. They can run up to 20 MPH.” “So what, African buffalos reach 35 MPH. And they only sleep 2-10 minutes at a time.” “Well hippos secrete a blood-like sweat to protect from the sun. Did you know that they brought them to fight gladiators in ancient Rome.” Elisa let out a laugh. “Well, that report isn’t for a while so Jeremy still has time to decide on a topic. And it’s going to be buffalo.” Dominique rolled her eyes. “That’s what you think, Honey.” “Oh, I’m sure it will be African buffalos. You’re just being defensive because hippos are your favorite animals. I’m so certain that Jeremy will decide on a report on African buffalos that I’ll do the dishes every night for 3 months if he chooses a report on hippos.” Dominique just let out a laugh at her wife’s words. “Oh, it’s on, Elisa.” Both women let out a laugh.

Of course, fate can be a strange thing. That night, Elisa and Dominique were about to get ready for bed and as Dominique was brushing her teeth, she felt her canine teeth and noticed something off. “Elisa, Honey,” said the redhead. “Do my teeth look sharper to you.” Elisa was brushing her hair as she shrugged her shoulders. “You’re probably just imagining it, Dom.” However, as Elisa pulled her brush from her hair, she looked in surprise because for some reason all of the teeth on the brush were completely destroyed. “Huh?” she didn’t realize it, but she also appeared to have sprouted a long black furred tail like that of an African buffalo. Dominique and Elisa then made their way into their bed but as Dominique got into the bed, she heard one of the legs snap off. As Dominique looked down to investigate it, Elisa noticed her wife’s nightie looked a little tight on her. “Whoa, Dominique,” said Elisa. “Gotta cut back on the devil dogs.” Dominique then smirked. “Oh yeah. Look at that jelly belly.” Elisa felt her stomach and realized that Dominique was speaking the truth. “Oh my,” said Elisa. “I must’ve been eating too many donuts.” Dominique just smirked and poked her wife in the chest. “You’re starting to look like a buffalo yourself.” “Well, goodnight, my hippo honeybun.” Both lovers let out a laugh before falling asleep, unaware that a transformation was taking place.
12132.title: Ungulates Alive

121321.content:
The next morning, the Venturas had sat down to breakfast. For some reason, Dominique was eating more ravenously than usual and had even resorted to eating the flowers from the pot on the table. “Geez, Dominique,” said Elisa as she cut into her own pancakes. “You’ve got a tapeworm or something?” Dominique let out a rather deep grunt. “I’m not sure, Elisa,” said Dominique. “For some reason I woke up ravenous.” Jeremy could only stare because he saw Elisa pick up a flower that Dominique didn’t eat and then ate it herself. “Are you two feeling okay?” the young man asked to his mothers. Elisa just let out a laugh. “Oh, don’t worry, Jeremy. We both slept rough last night. I had a strange dream. One where I was a cape buffalo running on the African Plains.” “That’s funny,” said Dominique. “I dreamt that I was a hippopotamus at a watering hole.” “Well, it felt great,” said Elisa. “Nobody messes with you when you’re an African buffalo. Remember that for your paper Jeremy.”

Before Jeremy could respond, Elisa got up and went to get milk from the fridge. Jeremy looked in shock because he spotted Elisa’s tail that she grew last night. From the looks of it, Elisa herself didn’t know it existed. Jeremy then turned his head and he could’ve sworn Dominique had a tail as well, except that it was small and stubby. He rubbed his eyes right before Elisa groaned. “Dominique! I thought you bought an extra gallon of milk.” Dominique gave a snort. “Well, if you don’t like it, maybe you should just grow an udder like those ridiculous buffalos. By the way, Jeremy, did you know that hippos only weigh 9lbs when they’re born?” “They do?” asked Jeremy. “But they weigh more than 3 tons as adults. That’s amazing.” “Well,” said Elisa not wanting to lose her bet with her wife. “Well, did you know that cape buffalos are among the only bovines who can’t be domesticated? Oh yeah, they’re wild and that’s how they like it.” “Excuse me, Elisa,” said Dominique. “But hippos are more famous than cape buffalos. They’ve been board games, been to New York, been ballerinas...” “Which is why it’s time for a buffalo to step in. Have you noticed that in Japanese action hero shows, they use buffalos way more than hippos. There hasn’t even been a hippo-themed ranger but there’s been at least one buffalo.”

Jeremy just let out a groan. “Come on you two, this is hard enough to decide already.” Elisa let out a sigh. “You’re right, Jeremy. I have to get to work and you have to get to school. Just let me put my uniform on and I’ll drive you.” Jeremy smiled as Elisa went to put on her police uniform. Dominique then snapped her fingers. “Oh dang,” she said. “I can’t forget. Tomorrow’s the church bake sale. I better start getting work on those macarons. While Dominique was getting her ingredients and kitchenware ready, Elisa was having trouble getting her police uniform on. Her pants were feeling too tight. “Ugh,” she said. “What is with these pants? I just bought them.” Elisa didn’t know it, but she was growing an udder just like a cape buffalo. As she slipped on her boots, she failed to realize that her feet appeared to be turning into hooves. In no time at all, Elisa had walked down to take Jeremy to school. Jeremy looked up at her more paternal mother and realized something off. “Elisa?” he asked. “Are you getting taller?” Elisa rolled her eyes because she didn’t know what her son was talking about. Instead, she just walked up and kissed Dominique (who also seemed to have gotten taller). Dominique then bent over to kiss Jeremy. “You two have a good day.” “You too, Dominique.” Said Jeremy. Dominique gave a giggle as she remembered something. “And remember, hippos all the way.” “She means, buffalos all the way, Jeremy.” Said Elisa in annoyance.

As Elisa walked Jeremy out the doorway, her butt appeared to be getting bigger as her belt appeared to be coming undone. Her breasts were also getting larger as well as her stomach and her black hair was getting longer as she appeared to be growing horns. Dominique on the other hand was getting much larger in the rear than Elisa and that was saying something. Her skirt appeared to look smaller on her and her skin appeared to be changing color into a golden-red shade as she walked into the kitchen and bent down to reach into the lazy Susan for flower. As she did this, she also let out a loud snort not unlike the snort of a hippopotamus. “Let’s see,” she said as she failed to notice her teeth had gotten sharper. “Almond powder, granulated sugar. What else do I need.”

Meanwhile, Elisa was driving Jeremy to school and Jeremy was still looking at his textbook. Elisa didn’t notice it, but her horns had gotten bigger and her face had stretched out and new resembled that of a bovine with long ears. “Elisa,” said Jeremy. “Why do you like African buffalos so much?” Elisa gave a scoff. “Are you kidding? They don’t have to be afraid of anything. They’ve got to be the strongest bovines in the world. I guess you can say I’ve always been a fan of cows.” Elisa even let out a moo. “Oh, I had no idea where that came from. Well, here’s our stop.” Elisa parked in front of Jeremy’s school and decided to walk Jeremy out. However, when Jeremy stepped out of the car, he looked up at Elisa in pure surprise.

Elisa had transformed into a 12 foot tall cape buffalo with a 12ft belly and 8ft butt. She had D-cup breasts, an udder as big as her head and horns that had to be 8ft long. All the students and teachers looked at her in surprise but Jeremy was trying to be calm about seeing what happened. “Something wrong, kiddo?” asked Elisa. “Uh,” said Jeremy. “Nothing is wrong, Elisa.”


 Back home, Dominique had undergone a similar transformation. She was now a 12ft tall hippopotamus with an 8ft wide belly and 12ft wide butt and D-cup breasts. She hadn’t noticed her transformation either, largely because she was wearing her headphones as she was preparing the batter for her macarons.

Now, which of the giantesses should we follow?
121321.title: Sometimes Things Happen

1213211.content:
Elisa mooed again, this time quietly. She took her son aside and lowered her voice as she spoke to him. "Jeremy...you've been acting nervous all morning. What's really up? Just tell me something quick, and we'll discuss it later after school, alright?"

Jeremy looked out at the other staring kids. Everyone, from the fat bully Jimmy Hopkins to his baseball-loving buddy Timmy, looked either scared of his newly-transformed mother; or had a look that screamed Get on with it, dummy! He looked back at his expectant buffalo-mom and sighed. "Might as well get this over with...Mom, have you, uh; looked in the mirror since we left home?"

"...Kiddo, if this is leading to a joke, it better be a good one. You're making me worried." Elisa's new bovine ears twitched, swatting away a passing fly.

Jeremy, showing strength far beyond his years, managed to NOT shout what came next.
"Mom, you've turned into a cape buffalo."

"....What?!" Elisa was flabbergasted and started to laugh. Jostling her son's hair with a new hoof. "Jeremy, what are you on about? Even if that WAS possible, I think I'd notice someth--" She broke off as she caught sight of herself in a puddle underfoot. Staring with mouth agape, she saw that her human form was indeed gone. Jeremy was telling the truth....

Meanwhile, Jeremy waved the other kids away, staying quiet but sending a clear message: Mom Freak-Out incoming! Take cover!!


But how does Elisa take her transformation?
1213211.title: Delayed Reaction

choices: Dominique Picks Jeremy Up From School
1213212.content:
Dominique was so deep into her music as she was preparing the batter for the macarons that she had no idea she was now a large hippopotamus and the hippo housewife was tapping her foot on the floor to the beat, in turn causing the floor tiles to crack. Her feet had expanded so wide that her high heels cracked apart and broke off. Her butt had expanded to a degree that her skirt couldn't contain it and her panties had degenerated into a sumo thong. Whether she knew it or not, Dominique's stubby new tail was shaking from side to side.

Suddenly, Dominique gasped and let go of her spoon before turning off her iPod. "Oh my gosh! I'm forgetting the milk." Dominique waddled up to the fridge and opened the door to find out that Elisa wasn't kidding about them being out of milk. "Drat! Elisa was right! She had better not be right about Jeremy's report for my hands' sake. Guess this is one thing that buffalos have over hippos. You can’t milk a hippo. Not that you can milk a cape buffalo without getting killed either, but hippos don’t have udders. Well, guess I better head to the store.”

Dominique failed to notice that she was now a hippopotamus and when she tried to walk out the front door, her butt got stuck and she grunted as she tried to push herself out. “Oh come on! I skip one flipping day on the treadmill and this happens? Wait a minute, Jeremy’s not here, I can swear for real.” Dominique inhales before she slips out and has to use her left leg to maintain her footing. “I hope I’m not putting on weight,” said Dominique. “For some reason, my stomach feels like it weighs at least a thousand pounds. Oh well. Better get that milk.”

It wasn’t long before Dominique reached the supermarket and was in the dairy aisle. However, everybody in the market was staring at the 12 foot high hippopotamus woman among them. Dominique noticed the staring and was very concerned. “Why is everybody staring at me?” the redhead asked to herself. “Is it because of my blood red hair. Or is it because I’m a lesbian. Not again. I moved to Zoomtown and married Elisa to get away from that prejudice. Calm down, calm down, Dominique. You just came for some milk. You’ll be in and out... oh man, why am I hungry all of a sudden. I ate so much at breakfast. But my stomach feels like a black hole. Okay, maybe while I’m here, I’ll pick up a quick snack. Aha.” Dominique spotted a bag of popcorn and put it into her basket. But then she saw several already prepared fish sandwiches in wrappers and picked a few up.

One thing led to another and the redhead had brought her groceries to a check out counter and needless to say, the clerk was terrified at the hippopotamus in front of him. Dominique had also seemed to have gotten bigger as she was more than twice his size. “How much do I owe you?” asked the hippo giantess. The man just fainted and the other clerk gestured for Dominique to leave before Dominique had the chance to pay. Dominique stuffed her face with the sandwiches, chips and sweets she bought and was wondering to herself what had happened. “What was that about?” she thought. “Well, it’s lucky for me. All this food would’ve cost a large wad of cash. I only wanted to pick up some milk for my macarons but I had the biggest snack attack I’ve ever seen. Why am I... huh?!”

Dominique looked down to see that she was 20’ tall if the size of the cars at her feet was any indication. Her belly was 20’ feet wide and her butt was even wider. “What on....?” Dominique was then left speechless as she looked into the window of a nearby building and saw the reflection of the hippopotamus giantess she had become. When Dominique saw her reflection, she very nearly fainted and gave a look of pure shock. She walked up to the window and rubbed her snout and then lifted up her large stomach before turning around and looking at her wide booty before spanking herself and making her titanic cheeks shake. “Oh my... O.M.G.!” Dominique took out her cell phone so she could contact Elisa and tell her what happened. However, she noticed that her fingers were much too big for the buttons and lowered her pinky finger to use her long red fingernails to press the buttons and call her wife.

"Elisa," said Dominique to her wife on the phone. "You're not going to believe this but I've turned into a hippopotamus the size of a house." On the other end of the phone, Elisa, now a cape buffalo as big as her wife and sitting on top of a donut shop, bit her lip. "Oh... I believe you. I just got turned into an African buffalo myself." "What?! How the heck did this happen!? Maybe this is just a dream." Dominique pinched herself on her car-destroying booty and then grunted in pain but then looked and saw her fat golden-red hands and then let out a moan. "It's not a dream, Elisa. But why would we turn into a hippopotamus and a cape buffalo? It doesn't make any sense."

Elisa tossed a handful of strawberry donuts into her mouth before she spoke. "Wait. These are the very same animals that Jeremy was trying to decide to do his report on. Our bet last night. I bet he would choose an African buffalo and you said he would choose a hippopotamus. Maybe this is a psychosomatic change. Maybe somehow through our bet, we willed ourselves into the very animals we were siding on." Dominique dropped her very large jaw in confusion as she showed her huge fangs. "Elisa," she said. "That is the dumbest thing I've ever heard! We're not psychic. Oh my goodness. What will Jeremy think when...." "When he learns that his other mother is a hippopotamus? You should've been at the school, I felt like I belonged in a zoo." "School nothing," said Dominique. "You had to go to work." Elisa let out a groan. "Don't remind me. Thankfully, mutating into a buffalo big enough to wear cars as roller skates doesn't get you kicked off of the force."

Dominique let out a sigh and then tried to sit down, only to hear a crashing sound. She rose up and saw that she had inadvertently sat on four parked cars and pressed them so flat that they were tattooed to her enormous butt. “Well, this is a fine kettle of fish, Elisa. What are we gonna do about this? We sure as heck can’t go on with our bet. Our fingers are too big. We’d break all the dishes we have.” Elisa let out a sigh. “We’ll figure out where we’ll go from here at the end of the day. Something tells me we won’t be turning back to normal anytime soon." Dominique let out a groan and waddled away. "I hate Mondays."

Later...
1213212.title: Hippo-Mom-Tamus

121322.content:
The Dark Emperor laid slain in his throne. The mighty warrior stood triumphant, knowing that peace would return to the land.

The sound of footsteps pulled her attention behind her. Turning, she smiled as she saw her beloved. The mere sight made her heart pound. Her lover was a beauty. Her well-muscled, yet voluptuous body on display in her leather armor. Her skin a healthy shade of green. Two small tusks protruding from her lovely smile. The orc was a sight.

Slowly, the warrior walked to her lover, ready to celebrate their victory. She leaned in for the kiss-

"HEY CARLY!"

Carly nearly jumped out of her computer chair when the voice called out. Turning, she saw her wife, Jen, leaning in the door frame. In her hands was a small paper bag.

Jen was one to easily been seen in a crowd. At 27 years old, she was a tall woman, at least 5'10'', with bright red hair and bright green eyes. She was somewhat pudgy, but with a fair hourglass figure. She was dressing in a bright blue top with a bright yellow skirt and sneakers.

Carly, meanwhile, was a bit less noticeable. She was 26 years old,, and was only 5'7'', with short dirty blonde hair and dark brown eyes. She was slim, and was decently proportioned. She was wearing a green tee-shirt with grey slacks and socks.

Both were employed. Jen worked for a law firm, while Carly worked at a nearby comic shop.

"Don't you ever knock?" Carly said, a little annoyed at the interruption.

Jen giggled. "Absorbed in your fanfictions again, dear?" Jen asked. Carly blushed a little, which made Jen giggled again.

"Anyway," Jen started. "I've picked up the dry-cleaning. I also got you a little something. Found this little store near the Laundromat. Kind of a curio shop. Had an animatronic talking skull. I found this in there."

She reached into the bag and pulled out something. Carly got up to look at it. It was a pair of small necklaces with a symbol she had never seen before. It looked like it was made of gold.

"Oh, wow, it's beautiful." Carly said. "What's the symbol?"

Jen grinned. "The skull said it was supposed to be an orc symbol. It did have a picture of some green-skinned orc women" She said. "That's why I got it for you. There's one for me too"

Jen knew many of Carly's loves, from true crime novels to bad horror movies but one stood out among the rest: Carly had a huge fetish for female orcs. When she wasn't browsing art sites for sexy orc pics, she was writing erotic fiction with them. She even had a type: green skin, tusks, and huge, be it fat or muscled.

Carly's face lit up, and she immediately took the necklace and put it on. Heading over to a mirror, she looked at herself.

"It looks incredible." Carly said. "Thanks, babe."

"Not a problem." Jen said, putting on her own necklace. "Now, I gotta go finish up that report. The boss is expecting it by Monday."

Carly nodded, and Jen left the room. Carly went back to her computer to finish her story. Both were unaware of the soft glow coming from the necklaces.
121322.title: Oversized Orcs

1213221.content:
Carly settled back into her chair and clenched her fists a few times--a little ritual she did to get back into writing when she was interrupted...not that she minded this interruption, though. Smiling, she picked up Jen's gift up and turned the necklace over, examining it. It sort of looked like stylized axes crossed over a ring of leather armor and animal skulls...but not in an evil way, more intimidating.

"Just like orcs should be," she mumbled. Carly was always annoyed when female orcs were depicted as being human women with green skin and fangs. They were supposed to be fearsome barbarians; that was the whole point of orcs in the first place!

Carly was just about to get back to writing when she noticed something. At the right angle, the axes almost looked like an orc woman's legs; the bones beneath them like...bugs? She squinted. No, like tiny people!

"Giant orc women?" Carly whispered, a grin on her face. "Now there's an idea! Just imagine what they could do..." Her eyes widened and a wide grin spread across her face. She imagined unstoppable orc giantesses casually stomping human villains, swallowing arrogant elves whole; taking over tiny kingdoms as the new rulers...oh yeah, that was definitely gonna be her next story!

Giggling, she opened a new tab and typed out some quick notes and ideas--one being a warrior and the other a mage; them eating or sitting on the main villain; maybe have a human kid tag along as their mascot?--before going back to her original story.

The two orcs kissed, a jolt shooting through both their bodies all the while. They held the kiss for a long while, but when they parted their smiles made it clear they were both eager for more. Smirking, the warrior gestured down the hall--to the Dark Emperor's bedchamber. This was their castle now, after all. Why not make that official? Arm in arm, they marched down the hall...

Carly didn't notice a subtle green glow coming from her new necklace, or her eyes.

========================================

Jen hadn't examined her new necklace like Carly had, but she liked it, even if an orc-themed piece of jewlery was a bit silly. It was like cosplay--which Carly had done before, plenty of times--but it made her wife happy, and that was what really mattered. Besides, whoever made it knew their stuff: the gold was polished and sturdy, and the axes and armor were pretty eye-catching.

All that went through Jen's head in a flash as she sat down at her desk and pulled up the day's report on her computer. This time it was about shady antique shops facing potential lawsuits--apparently these places had been peddling weird knick-knacks that turned some customers into monsters.

A cop out in Texas had become a giant minotaur

Some hippy had been turned into an aligator.

There was even a girl who'd become a creature like the Loch Ness Monster and eaten her abusive boyfriend alive. (Jen winced at that, but figured the jerk deserved it.)

Sightings of the shop were all over the world, but they had a few things in common: all the transformed customers were women who'd bought something from the shop, the changes were permanent; and their new forms all seemed to be both fat and gigantically tall.

Jen shook her head. "Jeez, good thing crazy crap like that doesn't happen around here...hmm? Something else is here."
She read the report. Apparently at all the sightings, the shop had a talking magic skull that sold its wares.

Jen blinked. Did the shop SHE went to have that? Could she have...
"No, wait--it was an ANIMATRONIC skull, not a magic one," Jen realized with relief. "Thing was made of plastic. Phew!"

Nodding to herself, Jen got to work. It looked like the firm could take this case, but she'd have to see about contacting the transformed women. They could be valuable witnesses, if they agreed to help out...

Like Carly, Jen didn't notice the glow coming from her necklace and eyes.

========

By the time they'd sat down for dinner, both women's skin had taken on a slight green tint. This time, they noticed it.

"Woah, you okay babe?" Carly asked. "You don't look so good." She took a bite of steak, but looked concerned.

Jen looked herself over. "You're right--I look like lime Jell-O! You're a bit off, too. Do you feel sick? Maybe we should go to a doctor..."

"I dunno; I feel great. Not sick at all. Maybe I've just been spending too much time at the computer? Just need to get some sun." Carly shrugged. "Might need a break before I start my next story, anyway."

Jen looked at her greenish arms, but shrugged. She didn't feel sick either. "Some time outside sounds great...so what's your next story about? Orc lawyers?" She smirked.

"No, but I'll keep that in mind, heh. It's about GIANT orc women! Stomping around, showing those humans and elves who's boss! I even have an idea where one of them sits on a castle and crushes it with her mighty orc booty!"

Jen laughed so hard she almost choked on her wine. "Heh, reminds me of the case I'm on--a lady cop out in Texas got turned into a giant cow monster, and when this thug tried to shoot her she just sat on him. Wham, giant cow butt comes down! It didn't squish him, though. She took him to prison wedged between her cheeks!"

Jen was so caught up in her story she forgot about the detail of the shop, and the talking skull within.

It wasn't long before Carly and Jen were in bed, still wearing their necklaces as they snuggled.

"Night, Orc Queen," Jen said, kissing Carly's forehead. "Sweet dreams. Sit on some castles for me, 'kay?"

Carly returned the kiss. "Sure, Miss Judge Dredd. As long as you arrest the Cowgirl Cop."

They shared a laugh and were soon asleep, the glow around the necklaces getting brighter.
Their skin became entirely green, and tusks sprouted from their mouths. Carly's tusks were smaller and curved gently; Jen's were larger and sharper, curving harshly from her lower jaw.

And they grew; both in size and in girth. Carly became more and more plump, but not so fat she was obese...still, she was quite fat. Jen became more and more muscled, looking like a bodybuilder. They also grew to Amazon heights, amost ten feet tall by the end.

Neither stirred during the transformation, even as their growing limbs knocked over lamps, kicked down the foot of the bed, or toppled a bedside table.

Even their clothes changed: Carly's nightgown became flowing robes and a cape--a mage or magician's outfit.
Jen's tank top and sleeping pants became a set of bikini-like leather armor, complete with straps and a holster for bladed weapons.

By the end, there were two Amazon orcs where two human women had once been.
1213221.title: Go with this story

12133.content:
Out of This World


What if our beautiful protagonist, soon to be a fat giantess, is an alien life form of some sort who for some reason or another upon arriving on Earth, winds up growing and gaining weight at an alarming rate. It could be something on Earth having a strange effect on her alien biology or some other factor.

Sound good to you?
12133.title: Out of This World

121331.content:
Do you believe in extraterrestrial life? Do you have any idea as to what would transpire if such lifeforms landed on the Earth. However, some features of Earth that are known to be harmless to humans may or may not have strange effects on alien lifeforms. This will be a story in which we see those very effects on one particular alien being. Our story begins in Chicago where a young man is about to go on a computer chosen date that he will never forget. Our young protagonist has arrived with a box of chocolates as he is walking up to a bus stop where he is supposed to be meeting with his date.

The boy was slightly nervous so he had to look at the address that the website had given him. “Venus.com has yet to have steered anyone wrong,” the young man said. “Or at least that’s what they say. Try, Venus.com. We’ll hitch you up with a date that’s out of this world. Yeah, like I haven’t heard that one before.” But little did that young man know was that the slogan was rather literal in this case. Something strange had appeared in the sky and appeared to be glowing. The strange thing had bounced off of several buildings and then it landed in front of the young man who looked in surprise. What had landed in front of him was a strange alien creature. However, she looked female in appearance. She was a bright yellow-skinned and blue-striped alien resembling a humanoid cross between a lemur and a spider-monkey. She had a rather long neck, stood 8-feet tall with huge hips and three long tails, a pierced nose, long blue hair worn in dreadlocks, three fingers on each hand and foot and was dressed in little more than an A-shirt and a loincloth as she looked down at the young man who was understandably afraid.

The alien woman bent down and her eyes blinked vertically rather than horizontally the way that humans did. “You are Morty Landing, right?” asked the alien in surprisingly good English.” The boy gave a look of surprise. “How do you know my name?” “Venus.com,” said the alien. “I take it you’re my date for this evening?” Morty gave a gasp. “You’re Skyla?” Skyla nodded her head. “A date that’s out of the world,” she said with a laugh. “I get it now. Very funny. It would explain why I had to travel 5,000 lightyears for a date.” “You’re an alien! Skyla let out a nervous laugh. “You’re right,” the lemur/spider monkey-like alien said as she wagged all three of her tails. “I’m from Planet Lemuria. This is actually my first time on Earth. I never knew that Earthlings were so short and pale-skinned.” Morty just let out a nervous giggle himself before Skyla noticed the box of chocolates.

“What are those?” she asked. “Well,” said Morty. “On Earth, it’s tradition for a young man to give his female lover chocolates.” “Chocolates?” asked Skyla. Morty handed the box of chocolates to Skyla and Skyla sniffed at them. As Skyla was eating the first piece of chocolate, Morty crossed his fingers. “I really hope that chocolate isn’t poisonous to aliens.” He thought to himself. However, while Skyla wasn’t exactly poisoned, she made a strange noise after swallowing the first piece of chocolate and something went off inside of her. Her cells were acting weirdly to it. However, outside Skyla seemed just fine, albeit slightly dazed.

“Are you alright?” asked Morty. “I’m fine,” said Skyla. “They just don’t have anything like this on my home planet. Well, the date’s just started.” Morty and his alien date walked off, not noticing that Skyla seemed slightly taller than she was a minute ago.
121331.title: A Blind Date to Remember

121332.content:
Water Weight

In this scenario, an untested drink (soda, health drink, mineral water) is released on the general market. It carries a new formula that has a strange effect only on people with a certain gene. A gene that only occurs in bodies with XX chromosome cells, that is to say, female cells. However, the effect takes time in order to activate and only effects adult women but a side effect is that the beverage in question becomes addictive and drinking more of it would only feed the effects of the formula. And because the gene required for the side effects to take place is so uncommon, not all women will be effected by it and therefore the company (which may or may not know the gravity of the effects) can avoid being shut down.
121332.title: Water Weight

1213322.content:
Superhero Size Me

Okay, this is something I’ve been meaning to do for some time now. Imagine the protagonist is a superhero of your own design and choice. Provide a name, outfit and superpowers, although superpowers are only optional to actually be a superhero. She could either become a superhero at the start of the story or she could be a hero who's been active for some time. Our superheroine for some reason is altered in a way that she starts to get bigger and gain weight at a rapid rate. It might be her superpower or it might be do to circumstances, but either way, she’ll be a big fat thorn in the sign of injustice, evil and crime everywhere.
1213322.title: Superhero Size Me

12133221.content:
Cassandra Knight.

Secret Identity: Erebus.

Age: 34.

Height: 5'7" (disguised), and 10'10" (unbound.)

Cassandra suffers from a rare genetic condition that, clinging to her adult years, renders her unable to loose weight. Top that with an overactive pituitary gland, and she slowly ballooned herself into an absolute giant, which she'd thankfully managed to keep under wraps courtesy of Blake, her brittle-bone stricken husband.

The key to Cassandra's dual identity is a specially designed belt created Blake that, when worn, compresses her actual elephant-sized girth into a petite, slim build, allowing her to live both the life of a fashion designer and a morbidly obese superheroine. On the frontside she's a friendly, helpful soul that's well-liked by her workers, but on the streets, she's an mysterious and haunting terror to any criminal lurking upon the innocent at night.

Cassandra's abilities entail immense strength, enabling her to move her mountainous bulk around with impressive speed and agility, and also borderline invincibility against a landslide majority of firearms on the market, thanks to her huge blubber. And while not directly related to her unique biology, Cassandra is also very intelligent and observant, fighting criminals with a resolve of both intimidation and elegance

However, she's also prone to occasional bouts of extreme gluttony. It doesn't help that, even as big as she is, her belt still has a weight limit...

At the start of the story, Cassandra is finishing up her last true night as just a fashion designer, and finally putting on her mask after months of planning to bring a change to the city of her business...
12133221.title: Try this on for size.

choices: Prowl the streets for some muggers?
Never mind - she has another hunger pang.
121332211.content:
"Need any help closing up for the night, Miss Cassandra?"

"No thanks, Conrad. You go home and have a nice night, now!"

"Alright! Don't get into any trouble, tonight!"

"Yeah, I won't..." The honesty dripped out of her voice as her elderly janitor left her office, leaving her alone in the entire skyscraper.

She anxiously twirled her pen around in her fingers as she stared down at her papers, the only few keeping her from going home. All she had to do was look over and sign a few contracts, but with any attempt to try and get her work done, the words never seeped in through the thought of the incoming night.

"...what the hell am I doing?" For all the time spent training or consulting with Blake that was the first time she'd truly asked herself that. She couldn't think of an answer.

With a tired sigh she pushed her seat back so she could lean against her desk, resting her face within her ands, but that didn't give much of a help when she still managed to catch a glimpse of her own figure. Thankfully, not many of her workers seemed to give a second glance, but she could always see her apparently slim, lithe figure tightening her belt as her abdomen curved outward in a filling amount of chub, while below her thighs had thickened out with enough paunch that they now rested together, covering more of her chair.

This whole thing just keeps getting better and better...

She sat back up, letting in a long, unsteady breath. This was it. All the months of training, designing, exercising, worrying, and circling dates on the calendar had finally come, right on her doorstep.

With a blank face she pushed herself back up and walked away from her desk, heading out of her company and into the dark of the night.

.....


"Alright, so the new suit is in the bathroom, and your belt should be ready by morning." Blake hobbled across the room on two crutches under either arm. "You gonna need it before then?"

"Nah, I should be fine." Cassandra took another deep breath, slapping her hands against her knees. "Well, I'd think it's about time."

Blake hurriedly shuffled to the bathroom as his wife stood up and worked with the latch on her belt. Once undone, her stomach swelled out so quickly that there wasn't a sliver of space behind the strap, with a growing speed that tossed the belt away, allowing her to instantly double in height, and her body below surged out in a huge expansion of fat flesh that her bed nearly tore through the wall when it was pushed away.

When the cacophony had subsided, Blake peeked out of the door and wilted in amazement at Cassandra's full, enormous form cramped within their bedroom, filling almost half the space with her mountainous flab.
