"Woah, MAN that feels good!" She whooped in delight. "You'll never know how good this feels!"

"Well, that's a valid statement..." Blake sighed, dragging his feet out of the bathroom by his crutches.

"...oh." Cassandra blushed in shame. "Blake, I'm so sorry!"

"Eh, It's alright. You're not the only elephant in the room."

"Pfft...okay, add that to the one-liners!" She snickered. "Anyways, I gotta gear up!"

As large as she was, the supercharged muscles in her van-sized legs easily lifted her gigantic weight to stomp towards the bathroom, sweeping against the flanks of her gut as she pushed it forward. The bathroom doors were built tall enough for somebody of her size to step through, but her sides still managed to brush along the edges.

The floorboards creaked in a loud symphony from behind the shut door, accompanied by a few muffled grunts and the sound of latex slipping along her skin, being sipped up. By the hopping nature of her steps Blake could tell there was quite a bit of labor going into her task, but with two more heavy stomps she let out a contented sigh, then walked towards the door.

When the doors parted away, it looked to Blake like a complete stranger had entered the room, even if he could recognize her shape. The black spandex she wore completely smoothed out the wrinkles on her skin, with singular purple stripes running down the sleeves, legs, and the front down the long curve of her belly, long enough that it packed into the tightest region of the suit in a heaving mountain that resembled a colossal, jiggly bowling ball, while the width of her breasts tugged a long crease in the rubber that reached along the length of both. The mask she wore, save for some roundness in her cheeks, didn't shape to conform around her nose and lips at all, leaving her with a completely blank and even visage with only her eyes to help emote. Above either shoulder he could see the handles to two sledgehammers affixed to her back in a cross through her hair, which was wide and long enough that it almost acted like a substitute for her absent cape.

Cassandra flexed her arms to show off her bulging biceps, which forced a giddy laugh out of her. "Oh my gosh, I look like a friggin' superhero!!!" She squeed excitedly.

"'Intimidation and elegance,' huh?" Blake quipped with a smirk. "So, what're you gonna do first?"
121332211.title: So sorry this took so long...

121332212.content:
Leah Halbrook
AKA: Armorette
Born: June 3rd, 1975 (age 40)
Height: 6'2''

The daughter of a WWII veteran, Leah always loved to hear her dads war stories, eventually deciding to be a soldier herself. At the age of 26, she joined the US Army, and through years of training, reached the rank of Lieutenant Colonel.
One day, her commanding officer, Alex Black, revealed that her division would be testing a new device: a shape-shifting weapon, and Leah was chosen to test it first. But something went wrong during the test, and the device exploded. Leah was unharmed, or so she thought. She later discovered that the weapon somehow fused to her, giving her limited shape-shifting abilities, but, as a side effect, mutating her adipose tissue, making her gain weight when she uses her "morphing abilities". Amazed by this, she donned a costume and took to the streets as Armory, while keeping her new hobby a secret from her squad-mates. Only Alex knows the truth.
As Armory, Leah has the power to morph her body into any weapon she can imagine, from blades to firearms. She is also capable of making her body take on metallic properties, granting her limited invulnerability.
For a costume, Leah wears a form-fitting bodysuit in camo, and a helmet to conceal her face.
121332212.title: The Walking Armory

121332213.content:
Jessica Keane.

Secret Identity: The Monolith.

Age: 22.

Height: 5'1".

Jessica is a very skinny and short college freshman who yearns to have a much more noticeable body, despising her short and lanky stature, but is nonetheless a very kind and gentle soul always willing to help others out in any way she can, thankfully a trait that hasn't been lost after being caught in a chemical tanker's explosion on her campus.

Her body is genetically altered in a way that, with concentration, she can make her body expand indefinitely both in height and weight, all the while maintaining enough strength that she can move around. She's so sensitive to her abilities that anything as small as a sneeze or hiccup can make her shoot up and out a foot, and even then is already gaining at a very slow, gradual pace.

Shrinking back, however, is a different story...
121332213.title: Alt. Character.

1213322132.content:
Name: Rebecca Hawk

Superhero Name: Sky Queen

Age: 26

Height (at the start): 5’ 7”

Appearance: Rebecca is a tall Native American woman with raven colored hair with purple-red highlights at the bottom and an enormous rack. Due to the event that gave her her powers, her eyes permanently glow bright red and her fingernails permanently glow bright blue. As Sky Queen, she wears a split colored yellow-orange and violet jumpsuit with glowing silver stars decorated on it. She also wears a blue tiara made up of letter Qs.

Description: Rebecca was originally a policewoman out in a small town where a nuclear power plant stood. The power plant’s was in danger of being shut down when the CEO had the idea of attempting to harvest cosmic rays from outer space and had a rather large generator built. However, due to cutting corners, the machine was dangerously unstable and caused several electrical disturbances. Rebecca and her fellow officers were called in to investigate, but only Rebecca herself was able to enter the plant. At that moment, the generator broke down and bathed the young woman with the cosmic radiation sealed inside. As Rebecca was recovering in the hospital, she discovered that she had developed the power to control gravity and cosmic forces. However, due to her powers revolving around gravity, they require her body to have a large mass and the radiation is slowly making Sky Queen larger the more she uses these powers.
1213322132.title: Sky Queen

choices: She takes some more time to explore her powers...
12133221321.content:
Rebecca felt fine.

She didn't feel any pain in her body. She didn't feel sick to her stomach, her head wasn't splitting open, not a single bone in her body was broken, she didn't feel any different than she did when she stepped into the plant, or even after the generator inside exploded.

...but they were glowing. By whatever alien parasite could've been in her body, they were glowing, blue as the sky.

"Doc, come on, you gotta check me out some more! Look at me!" She demanded, holding her hands out with fingers splayed.

"Miss Hawk, I assure you that our tests show nothing's wrong with your body. After all, we'd gone through three opinions!"

"Well, you're gonna need to take a fourth one, cause there's no way nothing's wrong! I hate makeup!"

...and yet the nails on her fingers were a brilliant dark blue. It didn't even look like they were painted over, but that the sapphire hue was their natural color, down to the roots, and sparkling in an energetic aura.

She tried to hold them against the doctor's coat to emphasize their illumination, but he shook her off. "Miss Hawk, my only guess as to what could be wrong is a mere case of amnesia. I assume you'd put on some nail polish this morning, only to take a blow to the head hard enough to wipe away the memory."

"Doctor, please!"

"Miss Hawk, it's not our duty to treat a patient who has nothing wrong with her." He walked to his desk with his back facing her, but pulled out his chair and seated himself, gazing up at her with a condescending gaze. "If there's no issue here, then let's leave it be and have a nice day."

"But-"

"Have a nice day, Miss Hawk."

Rebecca's fist tensed, but nonetheless she spun away from him and stomped out of his office in a huff.

"There's gotta be someone I can talk to about this..."

.....


"...is there such a thing as fingernails glowing?...Yes, they're blue....Well, I was doing a job in this place doing research on cosmic rays, and there was this radioactive generator that exploded during our sting, and-"

click

"Hello? Hello?" But the dial tone hummed into her ear, and she slammed the phone back onto its perch. "Come on!"

Even brighter they were, now, enough that she could see the reflection off her fingertips. At first it'd just been a quirky sight, but now she was genuinely afraid.

She could feel something in her fingers. It wasn't pain, it wasn't comfort, it was just some alien energy without any definition known by earth, thriving right under the skin of her fingers.

"What the hell is happening to me?" She said worriedly.

She reached to grab the phone again, but a bright blue spark glittered out of the corner of her eye, followed by the sound of a plastic smash against the ceiling, forcing her to shriek and jump in surprise.

The telephone now clung to the ceiling, broken pieces of it strewn out as if the device lay on the floor, some of them still quivering from impact.

"What...the...fuck..." Rebecca kept staring at the phone with wide eyes for a full minute, trying to process the image as a real, breathing occurence happening in her own bedroom. Looking to her desk, she carefully reached for a styrofoam cup, but even though she hadn't touched it yet, it slid straight into her hand on its own.

She could feel her hand naturally pull around the cups surface, almost by some magnetic force. She let go, and gasped when the cup stayed afloat in midair, drifting away from her unfurled fingers. She gave it a poke, sending it gliding through the room, only to clatter againt the wall and fall back down.

"Huh..." Come to think of it, this whole thing sounds like some kind of bad comic book...

She planted her hand on the wall, then the next one, somehow gripping tightly against the flat surface. Like with the phone, as though she were on the floor, she reached higher and pulled her feet away the ground, too stunned to even whimper as she easily crawling all the way to the ceiling, which was just as easy for her wrap around and hang above her room like a bat.

She touched the phone, causing it to retain its original gravity and rocket away from her to the surface above her head, only back to where she once stood.

"...uh..." She finally murmered, the only first word she could say to match what just happened.

But her newfound abilities stole her attention from what was happening to her, far beyond the energy coursing through her body. Looking down at the floor, she couldn't see that her already plentiful breasts had expanded another cup size, going on two, along with a gently thickening layer of paunch spreading along the rest of her body...
12133221321.title: Continue with Sky Queen

1221.content:
Monster Mayhem

Here is the overview, an ancient tomb was opened, releasing a virus into the air that is causing strange transformations. These transformations bizarrely only seem to effect humans. The victims start to gain abnormal amounts of weight in short time and they slowly begin to grow bigger in height as well as weight. However, the transformation gives another side effect. The victims begin to transform into the monsters of fantasy and mythology and soon the world would be ruled by giant obese monster women.

Our protagonist is one female who has yet to transform. However, she will soon experience the effects first hand.

You can choose to follow this story or make up your own story.
1221.title: Monster Mayhem

12211.content:
The day begun harmless enough. A young Native American woman, around 21 was reading the newspaper from her college dorm room. "A few days ago," she read. "A mysterious tomb was discovered in the heart of Transylvania. The tomb was believed to be the burial ground of Rankira, the legendary vampire queen. But upon opening the coffin, there was no trace of a body, much to the disappointment of the archaeologists. But it was reported that a strange moss was growing on the inside of the tomb and begun to dissolve when exposed to air. How weird is that?"

Suddenly the young woman's phone rang. She checked the phone to see it was her friend on the other line and answered it. "Mira," said the voice on the phone. "Where the heck are you?" "Oh, hi Nikki. I'm sorry, I just woke up." "Well for Pete's sake, get up. We'll be late to class at this rate. Get up." Mira let out a sigh and then got dressed before she walked out to meet with Nikki. "Nikki?" she asked. "Where are you?"

That was when the ground begun to shake and Mira turned around and saw a frightening sight. There was a 10ft tall sphinx right behind her. The sphinx had pure white fur but with purple hair resembling a lion's main as well as a pair of large feathery wings. The sphinx was very fat, having a belly big enough to safely fit four full grown men inside and D-cup breasts. Mira took a closer look and saw that the sphinx woman was wearing black jeans, a white shirt and had a pierced lip and nose.

"Wh-What....?!" "Hello small fry," said the sphinx in Nikki's voice. "What's the matter? You look like you've seen a ghost." "N-Nikki?" asked Mira. "What happened to you?" Nikki just licked her lips. "Get used to it Mira, because the same thing's happening to all gals on campus. Massive, morbidly obese and monstrous."

Mira was terrified, her roommate was now a sumo sized sphinx who could swallow her whole if she wanted to and it looked like she'd be turning into a monster herself real soon.
12211.title: Monster Mayhem Story 1

choices: They had both grown to 15 feet tall and gained several tons
Mira had started to mutate into a monster
122111.content:
Mira is hesitant as Nikki looks down at her, but now the Asian punk girl she knew as her roommate is a giant obese sphinx who could easily swallow her whole. Nikki just lets out a purr. "Oh don't worry Mira. I won't eat you. But I am considering swallowing my ex-boyfriend whole, just for laughs. Now come on. You don't want to be late for art history class do you?" Nikki starts walking away, her footsteps shaking the ground. Mira gulps and then follows her friend. Not only had Nikki turned into a monster, but Mira would have to say Nikki had to weigh at least 2000lbs.

MIra even had to rub her eyes because to her it looked like Nikki was actually getting bigger by the second. "So," says the untransformed girl. "Nikki. How did this happen?" "Heck if I know," says Nikki. "I woke up this morning and suddenly I was a fat titanic sphinx. How awesome is that? I always wanted to be a giant monster. And get this, I'm not the only one like this. Every girl on campus and female professor I've seen today has mutated into some form of monster or another."

Mira looked around and saw that Nikki wasn't exaggerating. Every girl they saw had somehow turned into a monster that was enormous in both height and weight. Some were as big as Nikki and some were even larger. Mira turned and saw a cheerleader who had been turned into a 12-foot tall succubus girl with massive thunder thighs and E-cup breasts. One female teacher had been turned into a gorgon with a large protruding stomach and she was 15-feet tall. There was even one 13-foot tall 5-ton tanuki girl walking to class with her much smaller boyfriend. Mira felt utterly small compared to the monster girls and felt her chest but then she gasped because she looked and noticed her belly was getting bigger.

Nikki lets out a laugh. "Well small fry," she says. "Looks like you're a late bloomer. Now you get to be a monster like the rest of us girls." "What?" asked Mira. Mira then looked back and saw that she was almost as tall as a nearby tree. She was catching up to Nikki in height. "B-But... Nikki, exactly how big are we going to get." Nikki let out a laugh. "That's the best part. The university doctor said that whatever anomaly is making all the girls grow, it won't stop until we're as big as skyscrapers."

Mira was now very afraid and her body was still transforming. By the time she and Nikki reached class.
122111.title: Massive Monster Girls on Campus

1221112.content:
Mira kept her head down, only looking up to make sure she wouldn't collide with another person or a tree. Seeing the old oak trees around campus almost level with her was just another reminder of the impossible, insane transformations going on around her--and happening to her. If she looked at the ground, she could ignore it. deny it, for just a little bit longer...

Of course, that also meant she had to look right at her ballooning belly that rippled with every step she took. While Mira wasn't really vain by any stretch of the imagination, she had always took some pride in staying in shape. Now, she resembled an overgrown beach ball; she'd gone beyond morbidly obese to cartoonishly fat. It might have even been funny, if it weren't really happening to her.

Mira flinched when she felt a paw on her shoulder. Turning, she found Nikki standing beside her, somewhat taller than her and a little more fat. "Easy, Mira; calm down, okay?" Nikki said, sounding more concerned than Mira had ever heard. "I know this all seems crazy to you, but don't just drag yourself around over what's coming. It'll take some...adjusting, but you'll come to like being one of the 'big girls'. Trust me, you'll see." She smiled, showing off her new fangs. "And hey, your clothes will grow with you no matter what. So you won't be running around naked."

Mira couldn't help but laugh, despite her stress. "Nikki, I...thanks for that, but I don't know if I'll ever just 'adjust' to this. I won't be human any more! What if I turn into something....evil? Or if I have these weird monster instincts and...and--hurt innocent people?"

Nikki snorted, but thankfully held back her snark. "Did you see any of the girls doing something 'evil'? Remember the girl who became a succubus? Model student. Straight A's, proud parents, big scholarship; the works. As far as anyone knows, she hadn't gone around dragging guys to hell or anything. Even studying as hard as ever, too. No matter what you turn into, Mira, you'll still be you, just at a different size and shape. You won't suddenly get a craving to eat babies or something fucked-up like that."

Mira rose an eyebrow. "But...you told me you wanted to eat your ex-boyfriend. Alive."

Nikki just shrugged. "That's more for him being a complete asshat than me being a sphinx, but...touche."

By then, the pair had arrived at the art building. Only a few students (mostly the now-tiny guys) were entering through the front doors; the monster girls were sitting outside the building, crowding around a loudspeaker and getting out their notebooks and supplies. A few were even bigger than the three-storey building and had smaller monster girls sitting on their laps and shoulders.

Mira tilted her head. "Well...at least all this transforming won't screw up our schedules too much. And it's a nice day out, so I guess---" She cut herself off, holding her head. Everything got blurry, then clear, then blurry again...she felt itches, burns, tingling all over her rotund body...
She knew that this was it. This was her transformation, the moment where she said goodbye to her humanity and hello to her new life as a giant, chubby beast.

As if distant, she heard Nikki's voice. "You're finally changing! Welcome to the club, Mira and---HOLY HELL! You're gonna be HUGE!!"

When everything cleared, Mira had become...
1221112.title: Mira Monstrously Mutates on Monday

122111222.content:
"...…ugh..." Mira groaned as everything came back into view, but instantly gasped as she observed her diminutive surroundings. Her head felt as though it was on a mountain of fat, and that she was about twenty five feet tall.

"Holy crap! I'm huge!" Her clothes had still grown to accommodate her size, but she could still feel the lower half of her massive belly exposed to air. But upon reaching to pull her shirt down, her eyes widened as she felt fur on her belly.

"Oh no." She lifted her blobby arm to see what beast she had become, but let out a shocked squawk as she saw that her arms were covered in thick brown feathers. She quickly cupped her wing-like hands over her mouth at the avian sound she'd made, but felt that her nose and lips had formed a hard beak.

Glancing over her large shoulder, she noticed a small pond nearby.

"'Scuse me, pardon me, 'Scuse me!" Mira delicately inquired as she lumbered towards the pond, the tiny male students fleeing in semi-panic as she trudged by. Looking down at her reflection, her eyes widened as she saw her new face, now covered with brown feathers and sporting a petite black beak between two rather swollen cheeks. Despite her engorged face, her head seemed small on her enormous body, perched over two massive breasts resting on her house-sized belly.

Eyes still wide in amazement, she slowly turned her apple-shaped bulk around to observe her incredibly wide rear end, which sported a feline-esque tail above two balloon-like legs covered in fur.

"Woah! I'm a gryphon!" She uttered as she felt at her belly, which she could feel and see continue to puff out and grow fatter. She could even feel herself getting taller inch by inch. "A gryphon who can't fly..."

"So, whaddya think?" Nikki's voice came from behind, now standing behind her. Her body was about five feet taller than Mira's, and was even fatter to scale.
122111222.title: A gryphon!

1221112222.content:
Mira actually smiled as her feathered fingers felt around her belly. "I actually love it," she says. "It's wonderful." Mira giggles as she waves her new tail and feline booty. She even uprooted a tree to get a better look at it. It was the size of a doll in her hand. Nikki let out a laugh. "That's my girl. And just wait until you're bigger Mira. Something tells me by the time we stop growing, the real fun can begin."

Mira smiled and flapped her wings before she felt Nikki tap her on the butt. "Come on girl. We better get to class." Says Nikki. "Professor Bromwell only excused you because you were in mid transformation. Let's go." Mira let out a giggle and walked forward only to hear a scream. Mira looked down because she almost stepped on another student. "Hey you freak! Watch where you're going!" yelled the young man rudely. Nikki looked down and focused on the boy who was yelling at Mira. Then she cracked a wicked smirk. "Hello Will." She said.

The young man looked up as the 35ft and growing sphinx girl looked down on him and was in fear. "N-Nikki?" he asked. "Is that you?" Nikki growled and reached down to pick the young man up rather harshly. She gave a devilish smirk as she lifted him in front of her huge fangs. "I've put up with your abuse when we were dating far too long Will," said Nikki as she licked her lips. "Now it's payback time. "Come on Nikki," said Will. "Don't do anything rash. Ah!"

Will yelled in fear as Nikki tossed him into the air and caught him in her mouth. Mira screamed slightly. "Nikki," she said. "You're not actually going to." Nikki just swished her ex-boyfriend in her mouth a few times and then spat him out as a giant loogie on the ground. Will screamed before he stood up all covered in sphinx saliva." He saw his ex-girlfriend grinning down on him and wisely ran the other way before Nikki broke down in laughter.

"Wow," said Mira with a giggle. "You really let him have it." Nikki licked her jaws. "Yep. Now no man can push you around anymore Mira. You're a giant gryphon and you're still getting bigger. Now let's just get to art history before the professor has a fit." Mira let out a giggle. She was actually looking forward to the idea of having a cute boy in her mouth, or rather beak. Maybe when she found a boyfriend. "You know Nikki. I actually thought you were gonna eat him." "I was," says Nikki with an evil smirk. "But he tasted terrible." Mira didn't know if her sphinx friend was being serious or not but didn't question it. She was just glad she was a giant gryphon even if she did have a body that would make a sumo wrestler look like a twig.
1221112222.title: I Love Being a Monster

choices: A Boy Asking Her Out on a Date
12211122222.content:
Nikki and Mira went through the day rather peacefully and made it through their classes. Having class outside was a good experience but the dean said that the college would be renovated over the next few days to accommodate the newly transformed giants. With obese monster girls the size of skyscrapers walking about, the world was in desperate need of change.

Later that day, the sphinx and gryphon had met with some friends of theirs that had also been transmogrified.First of them was Elsa, the bookworm of the group who had been turned into a giant apple-shaped gargoyle with teal colored skin and large horns on her forehead. There was also Haley, a blonde girly girl who had been transformed into a giant blue furred wereboar. Lastly was Moira, an otaku girl who was turned into a massive cerberus. The five friends had gathered in the mountainside near campus and were having dinner as they watched the school being rebuilt.

"Well it's about time they did something about the infection," said Haley as she swallowed a handful of burgers. "I can't believe this happened to us so fast. Elsa, how big would you say we are now." The gargoyle giantess felt the ground crack beneath her massive rump before she decided to stand up and answer her friend. "I'd say each of us has to be at least 100ft tall as of now. But I can't tell if it's really over." "You're kidding," said Mira as she downed 30 more burgers in her beak. "We might actually get bigger?" Nikki smirked. "Oh well. Bigger is better. Looks like the males are the lesser sex now. I like it." Moira's center head let out a laugh as her left and right heads chose down on some trees. "Guess that means we're in charge. Do you think we can still reproduce with the bugs." Moira lets out a laugh at her bug comment. "The doctor said its still possible. It seems that we've been permanently altered to give birth to male humans and female titans. Though in mine and Mira case, we don't actually give birth the traditional way." Said Elsa as she showed her teeth.

Mira gagged and almost choked on the burgers she swallowed. "I'm going to lay eggs from now on!? The gryphon giantess yelled. Elsa nodded her head. "And so am I. Get used to it Mira, you're going to be a skyscraper sized bird for the rest of your life." Haley giggled at that and shrugged her shoulders. "Well, a blessing and a curse. Just today, I accidentally sat on my boyfriend." The wereboar let out a snorting laugh. "He was so adorable. Like a little tattoo. It tickled when he tried to shake free." Haley giggled as Mira laughed. "Well, earlier today, Nikki put her ex in her mouth and hocked him out in a loogie the size of a comet. It was hilarious." Moira smirked and let out a giggle. "I'm surprised the sphinx didn't swallow him. I would've." Moira's other two heads licked their lips and rubbed their protruding stomach at that thought. Haley let out a snort. "That reminds me, you know Professor Kay, the psychology teacher who turned into a manticore? I hear she ate her husband for cheating on her."

"Really?" asked Mira in surprise. "She could get arrested for that?" Haley let out a snort. "It's a changing world Mira. In ten years, husband will just be a synonym for pet." Elsa smirked and wiggled her large body. "That reminds me. Spring break is in a week. Mira, this epidemic has spread throughout the world. The next time you see your folks, your mom could be a monster too." Mira didn't even think about that. But then again, she was already getting used to herself being a monster. Perhaps this could be fun." Haley guzzled a barrel full of soda and Mira did the same as Nikki was picking her teeth.

Suddenly Mira phone begun to ring. "Hold on," she said. "I've got this." Mira held out her phone and saw that the gryphon giantess had a text from...
12211122222.title: A Meeting Between Monsters

choices: "a BIG nerd, but a really nice guy. I've known him since we were kids."
"a hotshot from a rich family--big money, bigger ego."
122111222222.content:
Mira's eyes went wide, and she let an avian squawk. After the laughter from her friends died down they all leaned in, curious and giggling. "What's got you so excited, Mira?" Nikki asked, dropping the tree she was using as a toothpick. "You look like something ruffled your feathers. Literally."

"Yeah, what's up? My BF didn't even look that surprised when I sat on him," Haley added with a chuckle.

Mira re-read the text message just to be safe, then turned to her fellow monster giantesses. "Girls...I just got asked out! Out of the blue, I have a date!" She held her phone out in her talon and showed the others, grinning her beak off. The girls read the message and let out a cheer.

Moria's three heads barked in joy. "What do you know? Mira could leave the Singles' Club tonight!" Her center head exulted. "You see, girl? We all told you you'd find Mr. Right eventually...or maybe he found you?"

"Real sweet, just don't let him talk you into paying for everything tonight." Nikki scowled a bit, obviously still a bit miffed about her ex-boyfriend. "He says you should pay for dinner and won't even split the check? Tell him if he doesn't pay his share, he's dinner!" the sphinx girl insisted.

Elsa tapped her chin "Maybe you could ask him to help preen your feathers? You've got wings, after all--"

"Girls! Cool it, please!" Mira interjected, feeling flustered from all the rapid-fire advice. Her friends quieted down and gave her sheepish looks....or at least as sheepish as giant chubby monsters could look. "I get that you all want to help out but, I'm not clueless about dates. I have some social skills." The griffon giantess rolled her eyes and looked back at her phone. "I haven't even told you who asked me out yet...none of you asked, either."

Haley, Moria, and Elsa apologized. Nikki just shrugged.

"Well then, who is it? Do you know the guy?" Haley chimed in.

Mira looked at her phone and smiled. "Yeah...my hopeful date is Mike Richards. And I know him; he's...."
122111222222.title: Griffon's Night Out

1221112222222.content:
"a hotshot from a rich family. He's got tons of money and tons of ego. The guy's a thrill seeker. I'm hardly the first girl he's ever dated but I'm definitely the first monster." "Oh," said Haley as she let out a snort. "Oh my." Nikki let out a scoff. "Sounds like he'd make a much better breath mint than boyfriend. You're not seriously going out with this guy are you?" Moira's three heads begun to drool and giggle to each other. "If he's that rich, I'd go out with him in a heartbeat."

Elsa rolled her eyes. "Money isn't everything. Mira, how do you know this isn't some kind of prank?" Mira let out a sigh and lowered her beak. "I don't know. But come on, who would play a prank on a hundred foot monster." Nikki let out a scoff and then smiled wickedly. "Why not just go? If it does turn out to be a prank you could always use a nice new seat cushion." Moira and Haley actually laughed at that idea.

"Nikki," said Mira with an accusing look. "Why do I get the feeling turning into a titanic cat has only succeeded in making you more vicious." Nikki shrugged her shoulders. "Hello, we're giant monsters. Who's gonna stop us if we swallow a few jerks. But if you don't have the heart, then go." Mira however tapped her beak. "But what should I wear? I mean, what will fit me now."

Hayley let out a snort and the were boar giantess got up. "Hold up. Hayley has you covered." The porcine giantess stomped away as Mira raised an eyebrow. Elsa flew off herself and Moira rushed away. Mira then turned to Nikki. "I am never going to get used to this." When Elsa returns, she is carrying a bullet train that she proceeds to wrap around Mira's neck like a necklace and as Hayley returns, she has a deflated zeppelin that she tears apart and makes into a cocktail dress that Mira slips into. Moira returns and the Cerberus girl holds up two ferris wheels that Mira puts on as earrings.

"How do I look?" asked Mira. Nikki rolled her eyes. "Let's just say there's a reason Godzilla and King Kong go au natural." Mira shrugs her shoulders. "Well I'm as ready as ever. Thanks girls." Mira walks away and creates tremors from her giant steps but Elsa stops her. "Why walk when you can fly?" she asks. Mira let out a scoff. "Elsa, do you see how fat we are, it's a miracle we can... wait, you were just flying a minute ago." Out of curiosity Mira flaps her wings and begins to fly into the air. She lets out a laugh and flies off. "This is too cool." "Good luck on your date!" yelled Hayley. "Ask if he has a brother." Said Moira. Elsa let out a laugh as Nikki smirked. "And remember!" she yelled out. "You can always eat him if it doesn't work out!" This prompts a glare from Elsa. "I'm kidding," said Nikki. "Mostly."

With that, Mira flew off to meet with Mike
1221112222222.title: The Hotshot.

choices: "Ha! I love it! We are gonna be the talk of the town, Mira!"
"...None of those are from companies MY family owns, right?"
12211122222221.content:
"Thanks, girls; I'll you all how it went!" Mira called back, watching her friends shrink away as she took to the air. After a pause she added, "And no, I'm not eating him!" The gryphon giantess rolled her eyes and focused ahead. She really was starting to think this transformation was going to Nikki's head, with all her talk of eating men who annoyed or wronged her. As good a friend as she was, the Goth had a vindictive streak a mile wide; her new lease on life as a giant fat sphinx seemed to be bringing it out even more. She'd have to keep an eye on Nikki, just in case...

Then again, Mira did kinda like the idea of sitting on a guy as comeuppance. The whole idea was pretty funny, actually. And going by Haley's story, her boyfriend wasn't instantly squished under the wereboar's massive behind. (And Haley, being a porcine monster, was even fatter and heavier than Mira or the other girls!) Maybe...maybe she could try that out, if Mike proved to be a jerk. Being pancaked under a multi-ton feline rump would teach him some manners right quick!

And if he turned out to be a nice guy, but into....that sort of thing...well,what was a little kink compared to a great night? Chucking, Mira checked her cell for the address one more time, and angled her flight towards Mike's address.

= = =

It was ten minutes into her flight that a thought occurred to Mira. "Hang on a second...how do I even know how to fly? I just became a gryphon this afternoon, and I haven't even used my wings until now?" She wracked her brain for some explanation, but eventually gave up with a nonchalant squawk. "Ah, hell with it. Doesn't matter--this is incredible! ...Oh, here I am." Looking over the estate, Mira whistled as she came in for a gentle landing.

WHUMP.

Or at least as gently as someone her size and weight could hit the ground, anyway.

Mike Richard's mansion didn't have a big sign with I'm Richer Than You! on it, but it might as well have. It was one of those gigantic plantation-style places you saw in magazines: big Corinthian Columns, a red-tile roof, three floors; the works. The place was ritzy six ways from Sunday, no doubt about that...though it may have been more impressive if Mira wasn't twice the size of the entire mansion. Fancy as it was, at Mira's scale it was sort of like looking at an oversized model. That, and its plantation style stuck out like sore thumb from all the sleeker, more modern-looking houses in this part of town.

"Quite the entrance, sweetheart; but next time let's have someone flag down your landing." a smooth voice rang out, making Mira squawk in surprise. She darted her eagle-head down...and found none other than Mike Richards standing in her shadow, smirking up at her. He was wearing a VERY spiffy grey suit and trousers, along with a pair of shined black dress shoes. "Or maybe meet up at an actual airstrip." Mira's sharp (literal) eagle eyes caught a silver Rolex watch on his wrist and a cirgarette holder--not lit--in his mouth. He looked like he'd stepped right off the set of a gangster movie...but that egotistical swagger of his somehow made the overblown look work.

Mira chuckled nervously, noticing how her landing had left craters in the lawn and road where her lion feet had come down. And given how close Mike was, she'd very nearly flattened him. "Er, sorry Mike. Guess we had a close call...but anyway, here I am! So, how's your first monster-girl date look, Mister Thrill-seeker?" On an impulse, Mira sat on her haunches and struck a little pose showing off her chubby griffon form--and the outfit her friends had crafted. "Like the dress? It's zeppelin canvas." For a moment, she thought about wiggling her rear to show off the dress...but threw that idea out on its head instantly. She may be a giant, fat monster, but she was going keep some class.

Mike Richards rose an eyebrow, his cocky swagger dropping off for a second as he took a few steps back and looked Mira over. "Is that a...train around your neck, Mira? And are those earrings Ferris wheels?"

Mira dropped her pose, rubbing the back of her head with a wing. "Yeah...my friends just snatched this stuff up when I needed an outfit for tonight. I never thought anything else would fit me...so what do you think?"

Mike answered....
12211122222221.title: Lifestyles of the Rich and Egotistical

122111222222211.content:
Mike let out a laugh as he twirled his cigarette holder and rubbed one of Mira's toes. "Love it. You're a woman who takes on the world. My kind of girl. Of course, nobody less would be worthy of me." Mira rolled her eyes and smirked. 'Be careful, Tiger," she said. "I'm still the queen of beasts and a bird of prey." Mike was unintimidated and just laughed again. "Careful. I know how to tame a beast. Mira lowered her taloned hand for Mike to climb on and then placed him on her head before she got ready to fly away.

Well Mike was as snooty as ever but at least he was being pleasant now, if only to feed his ego. Mira figured the date would go well and she'd forget about what Nikki told her. If that overgrown cat wanted to be some alpha predator that wasn't her problem. At least Mira wasn't letting the fact that she was a monster led her to act like a monster.

However, what neither Mira nor Mike knew was that nearby, there was another monster and a rather hot tempered one. This one was a monster resembling a cross between a sea turtle and a cow. She was a mock turtle and she looked even bigger than Mira. The Mock turtle woman had green yellow fur with spots one would expect from a cow and a huge udder twice as big as her puffy-cheeked head. She also had a bright red shell on her back covered in spikes and long red hair worn in a bun.

The mock turtle woman let out a snort as she looked up at Mira flying off with Mike. "So, ordinary girls aren't cutting it for you anymore are they Mike?" the mock turtle asked herself. "I was never normal and that didn't stop you from using me as if I was some hood ornament to boost your male ego. I just hope your new girlfriend can defend you from your own.

The mock turtle girl snorted again and dragged her foot on the ground. Meanwhile, Mike is looking down at the city from Mira's head as Mira flies. "I feel like I'm king of all I survey." "Oh really?" asks Mira. "Does that make me the queen? Where are we headed anyway?" "There it is up ahead." Said Mike as he pointed down.

Where was their date headed...
122111222222211.title: Messing with Monsters

122111223.content: Here are the last two choices I have. I'll come back with an idea later or let others do what they do.
122111223.title: Something else. (last one, okay?)

122112.content:
It all begun when a strange tomb was opened in Transylvania. They were hoping to find what would be the corpse of a long dead vampire queen, but when the tomb was opened, there was no body inside. But what nobody noticed was that there was an ancient virus that would have a strange effect on what would no longer be called the lesser sex, turning them into the creatures of mythology.

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

It has been exactly one week since the opening of the tomb and the virus has spread. Their effects would be known soon enough. But before we get to that, we take you to the back of a church in Manhattan, New York. It is here a wedding is about to take place, however, the bride is about to discover something odd happening to her.

Beth Robinson at the time is struggling to tie the back of her wedding gown. "Come on," she grunts. "Why does this have to happen now?" One of the bridesmaids immediately ran to help the young woman and tighten the back of the dress. Beth grunted and then smiled at the bridesmaid. "Thanks Emily." She said. "What is with this dress? It fit perfectly last night." Emily looks down at her friend and noticed that her belly and ass seemed to be getting bigger. "Putting on a little weight are we Beth?" Beth notices Emily's stomach bulging and pokes it. "Like you're one to talk. Besides, I've actually been working hard to lose weight for the wedding."

Beth smiles. "Finally," she said. "My new life with David. I can't believe it's already happening." Beth walks forward and smiles before groaning and rubbing her head. She had accidentally bumped it on the ceiling and then she looked up in confusion. "Geez, I didn't think the ceiling was so low." Emily then gasped. "Beth?" she asked. "Are you getting taller." Beth gave a look of confusion at her friend. "What are you talking about?" she asked. "I..." Beth then gasped because for some reason, her friend was now half her height.

Another bridesmaid walked in. This time she was a redhead, from the looks of it, she was the maid of honor. "So, my BFF is finally walking down the alter." Beth smiles. "Hey Lyd...ia?" Beth gasps and steps back because not only is Lydia as tall and heavyset as herself, but the redhead now has a fox like face and from the looks of it, nine fox tails. "Lydia?" asked Beth. "You look different." Lydia raises an eyebrow. "What do you mean? I know I felt heavier when I woke up this morning but I definitely wasn't as big as your mom. I mean, how do you gain so much weight overnight. David already started to make cracks about your mom having her own..." "No, Lydia," says Emily. "Your face, you look like a kitsune."

Lydia raises an eyebrow. "I expect Beth to be stressed about the wedding, but you? Just try not to be crazy when it's time to walk down the alter." As her kitsune friend waddled away, Beth suddenly had the feeling that her life was changing in a whole different way.
122112.title: Monster Mayhem Story 2

1221121.content:
Beth couldn't help but put her hand to her chin. "That's strange," she said. "I could've sworn that Lydia was turning into a kitsune." "Well," said Emily. "If you were hallucinating, I was too. It's weird, you're the one getting married. Why am I the one seeing things?" Beth just let out a sigh. "Could it be physically possible for stress to cause contagious weight gain and hallucinations. I just hope we can get through this wedding without things getting too strange." Emily let out a giggle and walked away. As she did, Beth noticed that he friend appeared to be growing a devil's tail and gasped before rubbing her eyes.

In the church at that moment, it was becoming apparent that there wasn't any hallucination involved. All the female guests at the wedding were not only expanding in height and mass, but they were beginning to transform as well, into different types of monsters. The preacher was trembling as he looked at what was going on while the other male guests only looked in surprise. The only one not unnerved in the slightest was the groom, David Harnell. "There's an evil aura in the air," said the preacher. "For what reason has this curse been cast upon us. Has He forsaken us? Is it not too late to repent." The preacher stepped back as the bridesmaids were all growing to the same high as Lydia who was finally realizing something strange was happening. She looked back at her monstrous butt that was riding through her dress before wagging all nine of her tails. "Why doesn't anyone tell me these things?" she asked with a grunt.

David just rubbed his chin. "That tomb in Transylvania?" he asked. "I wonder. If that's the case, why is it only women were affected. I wonder if Beth if... meh, I could get used to a monster wife." Mrs. Harnell, the groom's mother at this point had turned into a 15ft tall cyclops and appeared to still be growing as she tried to adjust her glasses that would no longer be suitable enough as her eyes merged into one giant one. "Perhaps the wedding should be cancelled," she said. "I can still feel myself growing and I'd hate to see what kind of creature my future daughter-in-law becomes." The preacher was shaking. He didn't know how to respond. Part of him thought that was a good idea, but another part of him didn't like the idea of heeding the words of a demonic looking creature.

However, David just looked him in the eye. "Nobody is canceling anything," he said. "The phrase is for better or for worse." "It didn't mention anything about weird, Sweetie," said the groom's mother. "It's not too late to..." That was when she heard a hissing noise and turned to Mrs. Robinson, the bride's mother, who had turned into a 20ft tall and obese gorgon who had to keep her eyes closed to keep her deadly gaze under control. "What's the matter, Iris?" she asked. "You think my daughter wouldn't be good enough as a monster?" Iris just let out a scoff. "And risk her turning into a snakehead like you, Jacqueline. I do not like the idea of my son being turned into a statue." Jacqueline let out a hiss. "Don't tempt me to open my eyes. At least I have two of them. The two giantesses are about to fight but David holds up his hands. "Stop it!" he yelled. "This is a church! Remember!"

The preacher let out a groan as he knew there was no way he could escape this plague that seemed to envelop around the area. The organ played and it wasn't long before Beth was walked out by her much smaller father and at this point, she was as big as her mother. All her new weight seemed to be going to her hips and breasts as they were shaking with every step. She was embarrassed but her groom only looked on in shock and awe before letting out a whistle as his bride was walked up to his side. The groom saw that he only reached up to her knee. Beth let out a groan. "At least I'm not a monster... yet." She said. "And let's hope for a real wild once it's over with," said David. "Like beauty and the beast rolled into one." Beth let out a laugh before the ceremony was about to commence.

As the preacher was speaking, both Beth and David were wondering how this monster plague started and more importantly, what Beth would turn into. Beth even turned to see that Emily had turned into a succubus and was hiding behind Lydia's vulpine hulk due to the environment being the last place any succubus should be caught dead in. Finally the moment came. "Do you, David Harnell take Beth Robinson to be your lawfully wedding wife... no matter what she turns into." David let out a scoff. "What?" he asked. "You think I'm shallow. Of course I do." The preacher gave a nervous laugh and then spoke again. "And do you, Beth, take David to be your husband. For normal or for weird?" Beth nodded her head. "And now by..."

Before the preacher could finish his sentence, Beth grabbed her head and begun to twitch as she started to grow bigger and saw that she was transforming. "David!" she yelled as her groom held her by the leg. "Don't fight it!" yelled David. "It's better sooner or later. Now let's see that virus bring out the monster in you. All the other monsters and the human men moved back as the transformation was underway and Beth was transformed into a giant...
1221121.title: Incoming Bridezilla

12211211.content:
Beth felt her hands turn into talons as her mouth stretched into a silver colored beak with fangs and spikes. She let out a bird like shriek before a pair of giant pair of dark gray wings came out of her back and tore her dress. "Beth!" yelled Jacqueline as the gorgon giantess watched her daughter morphing. "What are you becoming?!" "From the looks of it," said the bride's father. "I'd say a gryphon.

Mr. Robinson was quickly proven wrong as Beth's lower body turned into the thick legs of a zebra with red candy cane style stripes and a pair of hooves that could easily crush cars. As Beth reached the 40ft mark, her hair glowed red as the transformation was almost complete, all while her future husband looked up with a bleeding nose. "Is it wrong that I find her more attractive this way that she looked before?" he thought to himself. When Beth stopped transforming, she had become a giant hippogriff. She looked down at her equine rear that was as wide as the church would've been if the giant monsters hadn't caused it to break apart just now. She then saw that each breast looked as big as a truck and gave an uneasy look before feeling her beak. "Couldn't I have turned into a normal monster?" she asked. However, she then grunted because she felt someone climbing the ruins of her dress.

She looked down to see David having climbed up her left breast and was at level with her beak. He looked down at the preacher with a glare. "It's rude to gawk," he said. "Continue. The preacher nervously got back into place before continuing. "I now pronounce you, man and... wife? You may now kiss the... bride." Beth was surprised at first but then she saw David kissing the tip of her beak and knew she couldn't fight it as everyone around clapped. "You seriously don't mind me being a hippogriff?" asked Beth. David smiled and looked his new hippogriff wife in the eye. "Stranger things have happened." "Liar." Thought Beth. Though she did have to admit, this worked out well, despite what had just happened.

//////////////////////////////////////

A few days after the wedding, Beth and David were on their way to their honeymoon and Beth was flying through the air with her husband on her back. At this point she had grown to 80ft tall and 130ft wide and was having fun flying through the air. "Woohoo!" she yelled. "And to think, I used to be afraid to fly." David let out a laugh as he stroked the tip of his wife's beak. "What choice do you have now babe?" he asked. "You'd never fit in the most jumbo of jumbo jets. I just read the paper. Where we're going, your mutation won't look out of place." "Well," said Beth. "At least we can enjoy our honeymoon without worrying about any stares. Seriously, you don't mind that our children might hatch from eggs?" "It's too soon to think of that, Doll," said Beth. "Two lovebirds just starting the chapter to their new life. The wife being a giant obese horse bird is a nice touch." "Well," says Beth. "With the weight gain this weird virus put on me, it's a wonder I can fly"

Both of them laughed to each other before landing in...
12211211.title: Man and Hippogriff

122112111.content:
Beth landed with a loud rumble on her hooves on the ground in Paris below. She smiled a smile that reached all the way to both sides of her beak. "I can't believe it, David," she said to her new husband. "We're actually in Paris. I never thought that I'd actually go to Paris one day." David let out a laugh as he stood on his wife's shoulder. "We only get married once, Beth. And I definitely only ever marry a giant hippogriff once." Beth gave a self-conscious look on her face. "Seriously?" she asked. "You don't mind me mutating into a skyscraper-sized bird built like a sumo wrestler?" David let out a scoff. "Are you kidding, you look better now than you did as a hu...?" David quickly shut up to avoid angering his giant wife so soon into their marriage. However, Beth simply shrugged her shoulders. "I'm choosing to take that as a compliment."

As Beth was walking further and further down into Paris, David realized that she seemed to have actually gotten slightly larger since she landed in Paris. The hippogriff woman was now 110ft tall with a 150ft ass, a 130ft wide belly and huge breasts that each had to be 35ft wide. He was wondering if she had finally stopped growing as the hippogriff lady stomped down the street. Beth looked in surprise as well, from the looks of it, Paris had been completely restructured if not magically altered because all the buildings were big enough to house the giant monster women. "Well," said Beth jokingly. "This is interesting. And I was so looking forward to using the Eiffel Tower to pick my teeth." David let out a laugh at his wife's joke. "I didn't think that hippogriffs had teeth.

Beth was far from the only giant monster girl because every last adult woman she saw was as humongous and obese as she was. However, there was one thing that she noticed. Most of the French giantesses she saw were gargoyles. Beth turned to see that there was a waitress at the nearby cafe who was a large green gargoyle woman with fin-like wings and long circular horns in the center of her forehead with purplish red hair. This waitress was as tall as Beth but actually looked fatter and her waitress outfit looked tattooed onto her body. Beth then looked into the air and saw another obese female gargoyle, this one dressed as a policewoman. From the looks of it, she was yellow skinned with long downwards curving horns, pterodactyl-like wings, a devil's tail and golden blonde hair. She was so big and fat that Beth found it hard to believe that she was indeed flying through the air. Beth also turned to see that there were a few giant women of different species than gargoyles. One of them was an enormously obese mermaid woman with aqua-colored hair and the lower body of a kissing gourami, with the lips to match. She felt her massive belly and blew a kiss as she was posing for a painting done by a male artist who was standing on the table in front of her.

Beth let out a whistle. "It would seem that Paris has had a much more successful time adjusting to this epidemic than back in New York.” David then saw an orange-skinned gargoyle girl who had a beaked face and curved horns. She was wearing a pair of khakis and a pink tanktop that both looked tattooed to her enormously fat body. From the looks of it, she was carrying her boyfriend in her purse. This prompted Beth to stare smugly at David. “Don’t even think about it, David said to his much larger wife.” Soon, the newlyweds had reached a hotel that read L’Escargot D’Argent and smiled as they walked in. The female hotel manager was a 250ft tall and equally wide gargoyle woman with palish blue hair, small stubby horns on her forehead, rather small wings and a long tail. She was wearing silver earrings, a black shirt that had devolved into a brat on her monstrously obese breasts, purple shorts that were coming apart at the sides and a white jacket. From the looks of it, she was also smoking a cigarette. “Bonjour et bienvenue,” said the gargoyle woman to the Harnells. “Welcome to L’Escargot D’Argent.” “Bonjour, Mademoiselle,” said David. “It’s under Harnell. The honeymoon suit.” “Bon, bon. Congratulations.” As the manager was rooting around for the keys, Beth was looking all around and took note of all the enormous monster women all around and even saw an obese werewolf woman as big as herself who appeared to be dressed as a hooker and she was even blowing a kiss to some male guests.

Once the Harnells were checked in, they were escorted to their room by a female bellhop who appeared to be a bright red skinned and obese brunette gargoyle with four arms. Beth tipped the bellhop before she went into the room to unpack her bags. “It’s amazing,” said Beth. “Everyone else appears to have gotten use to what’s happening. If I didn’t know better, I’d say this virus affected reality as well.” “I don’t know if it is a virus so much as a curse, Beth,” said David as he stood on the pillow. “I guess we were starting a new life in more ways than one.” The Harnells smiled and then shared a kiss.

What do they do now after the lovely couple is done unpacking?
122112111.title: A Hippo-Sized Hippogriff in Paris

They appeared to be bouncing a volleyball off their large girths. “You weren’t kidding around, David,” said Beth. “Whatever happened to me apparently works fast. The parrotfish mermaid got so mad she spat out a stream of water at the hippogriff giantess, only for Beth to move out of the way and laugh it off. “I never was too fond of mermaids,” said David. “Too wild for my taste.” However, as David looked back at Beth’s striped tail, he realized that his wife appeared to have gotten bigger. “Uh, Beth,” said David. “I think you’re putting on weight.” Beth let out a laugh. “Come on, David. I’m a hippogriff the size of a skyscraper. How could you possible tell if I’ve put on weight?” Of course, David was not wrong about his wife getting bigger. "As far as you should be concerned, you're a planet all for me and you've got the most beautiful pair of moons I've ever seen." "Flatterer," said Beth with a laugh at her husband. "I definitely made the right choice marrying such a charmer." Beth then gave David a rather large smooch, coating her husband in hippogriff slobber. "Dang," said David. "I wasn't planning to get this wet until the bedroom." "Come on," said Beth. "There has to be a hotel around here somewhere."

Beth walked down the street and noticed Hawaii's streets had gotten much larger, obviously reconstructed in order to best allow the giantesses to move around. She was catching a lot of stares in her hula skirt. This prompted David to imagine Beth herself in a hula skirt and no bra and juggling burning batons. This thought prompted David to stuff his nose with tissue to prevent it from bleeding. "In many ways," he said. "I think she looks better as a hippogriff."

Beth then noticed a hotel up ahead and passed by a female bellhop who had been transformed into an enormous cyclops. The cyclops girl had bright blue skin with dark indigo colored hair and white leaf tattoos all over her body. Her red bellhop uniform looked more like a thong and bra trying to contain her enormous girth At the front desk, the receptionist appeared to be a bright golden-furred minotaur giantess who looked bigger than Beth. She had long brown horns, a pierced nose and long golden-brown hair with a flower worn into it and a flower tattoo right above the rolls of fat on her back. The minotaur giantess didn't even bother to turn around because apparently she had been weighed down by her own colossal ass and udder. "Aloha," said the minotaur woman. "Welcome to Hawaii. We don't get a lot of hippogriffs around here." "I noticed," said Beth. "I take it Hawaii was hit before my hometown was." The minotaur giantess had eaten her apple to the core and then decided to swallow the core before talking to her avian customer. The minotaur let out a moo as she reached for the key rack and then handed Beth the key to the room. "Congratulations. You've the seventh pair of newlyweds we've had today. I guess these new husbands like their brides extra wide." David smiled and grabbed the side of Beth's face. "Thank you," said Beth to the receptionist. "We're definitely going to enjoy this." Beth waddled up the stairs and found the room and to her surprise, it looked like a luxury suite scaled specifically for a girl of her size. "Whoa, Mama." She said. The hippogriff goddess walked up and sat on the water bed before she placed David down. He could barely stand and had to lean against his wife’s zebra-striped ass. “They really pulled out all of the stops here, Beth,” said David. “I can definitely imagine us having fun in this bed.” “Just don’t get too close to the pillow, David,” said Beth. “I don’t want to mistake my tiny husband for a mint and gulp him down.” “Why not?” asked David smugly. “I’ll bet your insides look just as gorgeous as your outsides my avian goddess.” Beth smiled and held her butt just inches above David’s tiny form. “Now you better watch it, Honey Love,” said the hippogriff seductively to her tiny husband. “If you keep flattering me, I’m going to flatten you under this meteor ass of mine." David just rubbed the underside of his wife's ass and pleasured her before she stood up.

"I'll be right back, David," said the hippogriff goddess. "I bought a new swimsuit at a store Lydia told me about that started catering to titans like me." David saw Lydia walking away shaking her ass as she went to try on her new swimsuit. "Personally," he said to himself. "I'd prefer if she never wore clothes ever again. Damn, I'm gonna enjoy this marriage." In seconds, Lydia walked out wearing a skin tight...
122112112.title: Hippogriff Goes Hawaiian

1221122.content:
Deep in the heart of Transylvania, a massive, somewhat foreboding castle saw itself through hundreds of years of wear and tear. The once prideful estate grew old and decrepit, with centuries of no human aid to see to its repairs.

However, it was at least three centuries till it saw its first visitors since its retirement. They came with no desire to repair, but to search through its massive, empty halls in effort to uncover its dark past.

After spending a few hours exploring the decaying home, two girls and one man stood in the master bedroom.

"Alright, it should be…right here!" Susan, their boss announced as she rapped upon the wall, which yielded a hollow sound. "Frank?"

"Right behind you." Wielding an axe, Frank swung away at the wall, the old foundation easily smashing under his force. A long cloud of dust flew out of the space behind, clearing away to reveal a staircase descending deeper into the mountain.

"Okay, if I'm right, the tomb should be at the bottom." Susan announced.

"So what exactly are we looking for with the body?" Dana, the scout of the group asked.

"We'll take pictures for the lab to research, and find anything to add for a timeline of the castle's history, basically."

Staring into the darkness, Susan pulled a quarter from her pocket and tossed it down the steps, several echoing clinks indicating its decent.

"Geez, pretty damn deep." She muttered. "Come on, we've got a ways to go, guys!"

The three wearily descended down the steps, Susan appearing the most confident as she flipped open her lighter to light the way...
1221122.title: Monster Mayhem Story 3

choices: Something followed them from the staircase...
12211221.content:
They didn't time or check how long they were going deeper into the mountain, but it was far longer than any of them had anticipated. The stairs twisted and turned indiscriminately the further they went, the wall adjourned with the occasional painting or sculpture smashed against the ground.

"Geez, how much longer till we're there?" Dana nervously asked.

"I dunno…" Susan replied as she looked down at her watch, twisting the knob as she set the timer. "We'll turn around after ten minutes, alright?"

"Yeah." The other two simultaneously agreed.

"Good. Kinda wished we-" But she stopped as she noticed a turn in the stairs that tapered into a larger hall, a set of wooden doors at the end.

"Oh, we're here!" She replied excitedly as she ran up to the door.

"Careful, Sue! We don't know how strong this place is anymore!"

Standing in front of the doors, Sue gave a test push to determine its give, which failed to open the door.

"It's jammed. We're gonna have to force it through."

"You sure about that, Sue?" Dana asked with trepidation.

"I'm sure we'll be fine. Just try not to blow the door off it's hinges, alright?"

"I…I guess…"

"Thanks. Come on!" The other two joined her as she stood ten paces from the door, bracing themselves to run.

"On go, alright?" The other two nodded. "Alright…3…2...1...go!"

The three of them lunged towards the door with their shoulders ready to make a solid impact. However, a loud CRACK! rang through the empty hall as they smashed through and landed sprawled on the ground. SUrrounding them was a thick dust cloud accompanied by one of the most rank stenches they could've possibly imagined.

"OH, GOD!!!" Susan hacked, covering her face with her shirt to avoid the stench. "LET'S GET OUTTA HERE!!!"

The other two wasted no time following her as she turned tail and ran back up the steps, desperate to get away from the tomb as fast as possible. The bedroom was filled with a faint green mist as the three of them burst in from the staircase.

"Oh, god…that was horrible!" Frank gagged as he caught his breath from the exercise.

"Alright, I think it's safe to say that we should call it a night…" Susan announced as she leaned against the wall. However, her attempts to calm herself were disturbed as...
12211221.title: The tomb.

122112211.content:
"Frank, you alright?" Sue asked.

"Yeah, I'm fine…"

"What about you, Dana?"

Dana didn't respond. In fact, she stood stone still, one of her arms outstretched.

"Dana?"

As her friend turned around, Susan could see a look of pure, absolute terror on her face as she stared down at her own arm. The other two were struck silent as they noticed a growth of what looked like orange and red hairs covering her arm, albeit much thicker than usual. More of them began growing on her other arm and down her legs, growing thicker and thicker until they turned out to be feathers.

"W-WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME?" Dana finally screamed. "WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME?"

Her arm feathers grew large enough to become wing-like, which she cupped over her face as she felt more growing on her face. Susan finally snapped out of her shock and ran to her friend's aid.

"Dana, listen, it's gonna be okay! We just gotta call someone, and then…" But she gasped as she lifted Dana's arms away, revealing that her nose and lips had formed a dark brown beak. Susan backed away in shock, staring at the creature before her. Aside from the messy brown hair and her clothes, she bore no resemblance to the lady she'd gone on the trip with.

"Woah…what the fuck's going on here?" Frank whispered.

"I…I feel funny…" Dana exclaimed as she held at her abdomen, which the two realized was becoming rounder and bigger. A button popped off of her shirt as her girth expanded, revealing her yellow-feathered stomach beneath.

The other two backed away in a stupor as they watched their friend inflate with speed, blowing up to obesity in an instant. She grew taller as well, making her all the more mountainous than the diminutive girl she once was.

"GET ME OUTTA HERE!" Frank screamed, Dana by that point seven feet tall. Susan didn't join him as he struggled to open the door to escape, instead watching in astonishment as her friend transformed before her eyes, filling more and more of the room with her immensely obese body. Dana herself only seemed somewhat surprised; not scared or excited, but trapped in a dazed stupor as her chin rested on her gigantic breasts.

Soon enough she was almost fifteen feet tall, her belly looking like a fat, feathered planet with huge breasts and blobby arms and legs hanging from the sides. Susan had long since joined Frank in trying to get out, Dana's expanse only within a few feet at the room grew more cramped.

It was the telltale cracking from the floor that came as the floor beneath them buckled under Dana's monstrous size, finally collapsing and sending Dana through the floor screaming.

On what little floor was left, Susan and Frank desperately clung onto the wall and looked down through the floor into the room below, Dana sprawled on the ground with her mountain of a belly still jiggling from the impact.

"DANA?" Susan finally hollered. "ARE YOU ALRIGHT?!"

There's no telling what the infected may become." Frank then realized something.

In layman's terms, it only affects women. "Swell." Groans Susan. "It gets worse," said Violet. "The virus is incurable. By the time it stops, the damage is done and the victim will have already grown to be at least 100ft tall. It could take years, months or even days but soon, there won't be a human woman left untransformed." Frank, Susan and Dana gasped. "That virus must've been created by the vampire queen to bring in another era of monsters," said Violet. "I'm afraid you three made a grave mistake entering."

Dana then scratched the side of her head with a wing. "Wait, shouldn't you be transforming right now as well, Violet?" Violet's eyes popped as she realized that and then she screamed as she held her chest and begun to transform into a...
122112211111.title: The Virus

Her belly soon touched the ground and continued to puff out further and further, making her look like an inflating balloon. Sure enough, she started growing taller, foot by foot transforming into what looked like a mountainous blob of soft dough.

Violet watched her expansion in horror, but began scratching her arm as what appeared to be gray fur started traveling down her obese arm. As it reached her hands, they melted into paws and grew sharp, black nails. The same happened for her legs as they formed paws as well, a tail forming on her monstrous hindquarters.

Finally, the fur started growing on her neck and onto her head, stretching her nose and mouth into a wolf's muzzle, her ears becoming pointed.

With her species change complete, all that was left of Violet was her black hair, still tied in a ponytail. Her belly was so huge that it covered a large amount of the ground in front of her, still enlarging as she expanded like a blimp.

"Oh my god…" Frank uttered fearfully as the last of his human girlfriends transformed a 15-foot obese werewolf right before his eyes, the other two several times more massive.

She seemed to fully realize what she'd become and turned to her friends, all of whom looked at her expectantly.

"…Well?" Susan inquired. "How do you feel?"
1221122111111.title: Lycan Park

Would she heed her friends' advice?
