Kim felt her own stomach rumbling and then waddled off before she picked up an unattended fruit cart and threw it into her mouth. "Are you kidding, Pepsi? It would take an entire supermarket just to feed one of us. Hmm. I wonder how my ex-husband will taste." Pepper gave a look of shock and leaned her neck back before she let out a yell.The giraffe woman fell backwards and accidentally crushed hers and Keith's house under her mountainous butt.

Pepper stood up and saw pieces of her house stuck to her butt and blushed. Now she was dreading having her husband come home and see her like this. It was at that moment that...
1221212211.title: The Giraffe and the Quagga

122122.content:
Dawn of the Dinosaurs


The Story here is that a comet struck the Earth but instead of destroying the planet, it created an overgrowth of prehistoric and long forgotten plant life that covered the entire planetary landscape, making the world look like something out of the mesozoic era.

However, that was not the only change, the human race would be forever changed. All women on the planet were transformed into giant obese anthropomorphic dinosaurs that would become the new rulers of the planet, the smallest beasts being 300ft tall. They could still have children with tiny men, but there was a twist. Instead of giving live birth, these women turned into dinosaurs would lay eggs the size of footballs that would hatch out human offspring. But at the age of 20, all female offspring would begin their transformation into dinosaur giantesses.

Needless to say, the women ruled the world with men being ranked less than female infants.

Our protagonist is one young girl about to turn into a dinosaur giantess...
122122.title: Dawn of the Dinosaurs

1221221.content:
Our story begins in a city in an apartment building built for women who were still human-sized. A young woman was busy reading the newspaper. She was a young woman with long black hair with one red highlight and one blue highlight and she was wearing a black Jurassic World T-shirt and a pair of tight black pants with long black gloves as she read the newspaper as she drank a cup of coffee. In the newspaper there was a giant obese green-skinned ankylosaurus woman with long green hair wearing a purple suit and black tie in front of a flag that looked similar to the American flag except that the flag's stripes were red, black, blue, green and pink. "I can't believe she actually won," joked the girl reading the paper. "This is the first time since the comet that the U.S.A. has had an herbivore as the president."

The young girl then looked out the window to see one of her neighbors passing by. She was an obese redheaded parasaurolophus woman with a freckled face. She was 800ft tall with bright golden red skin and a large crest on her head, a 1000ft wide stomach, 1300ft wide ass and huge E-cup breasts. She was wearing a purple shirt, white jacket and skirt. The parasaurolophus woman turned to face her neighbor and smiled. "Hi, Zoe," she said. "Happy late birthday." "Thanks, Pepper," said Zoe. "I can't believe it. I'm finally 20. Won't be long until I'm as big as you. Maybe even bigger." Pepper leaned against Zoe's apartment and let out a laugh. "And you're going to have to move soon. That apartment's not going to hold you for long.

What both Pepper and Zoe were talking about was the fact that hundreds of years ago, a comet struck the Earth and transformed the planet into a new world that looked a lot like how it was millions of years ago when dinosaurs walked the Earth with trees bigger than skyscrapers and vegetation as far as the eye could see. The continents were also closer together. However, the most extreme effect was that the human race was effected. The women were given a strange mutation. At the age of 20, they would permanently transform into giant and obese anthropomorphic dinosaurs. The smallest dinosaur giantess was 300ft tall. Their biology had been affected so that while they could still reproduce with men small enough to fit into their mouths, they would lay eggs that hatch into human offspring of both genders, with only the female children eventually growing up to be dinosaurs as well. Needless to say, women were in charge and all government positions were fulfilled by giant dinosaur women while for the most part, men were servants.

Pepper gave a laugh. "And don't forget, what your mom says. As soon as you become a dinosaur, you'll be able to marry Chris." Zoe looked at her engagement ring and smiled. "I'm looking forward to being married to Chris, especially since I'll be much bigger than him. Tell me, Pepper, what's it like having a breath mint-sized husband?" "We make it work, Zoe," the parasaurolophus giantess said. "In a few weeks I'm expecting eggs." "Congratulations. And don't worry, we'll still be friends once I transform." Pepper smiled and waved as she stomped away. What Zoe meant was that carnivorous and herbivorous dinosaurs didn't always get along. While they were all still human and therefore it was illegal for them to attack each other, old species conflicts die hard. Pepper was Zoe's best friend despite the fact she was a parasaurolophus and the latter was the daughter of a velociraptor.

Zoe then looked back and saw that she had indeed gotten taller and her belly was bulging but her ass was now 4 feet wide. She squeezed it and smiled. In this world of obese giant dinosaur girls, the bigger you were, the more beautiful you were. Suddenly, Zoe heard a knock on her door and smiled. She knew it could only be her fiancé, Chris. Zoe smiled and tried to walk out, but her big ass got in the way and she grunted before Chris pulled her out. "Thanks, Chris, honey," said Zoe. "Damn, my ass is big." Chris gave a smile and rubbed his girlfriend's booty. "That's a good sign, Zoe, you're going to transform. soon and then we can get married." Zoe bent over and kissed her future husband before they walked out onto the human sidewalk, just as they saw large dinosaur feet walking to the side.

Zoe and Chris looked to see everywhere there were dinosaur giantesses. There was a giant and extremely bottom heavy, purple-skinned and lavender haired carnotaurus woman with a Union Jack t-shirt who was rocking her human infant son on her nose and on another end of the street, there was an obese red-skinned pterodactyl girl with long white hair who was eating a skewer of roast pigs while sitting on and bending a street lamp. Zoe let out a sigh. "I can't believe this might be the last time that I walk the human side of the sidewalk." Chris gave a smile. "And I'm sure you'll make a gorgeous dinosaur." Zoe kissed her fiancé and the two of them walked off.

Soon the couple arrived at a cafe where Zoe wasted no time biting into an entire roast cow. At this point, she was 12 feet tall and weighed two tons and her teeth had already turned sharp, signaling it wasn't long until she fully transformed. Since Zoe's mother was a raptor, she only ever ate meat. Chris himself found it attractive though his mother was a spinosaurus. "So how long until the transformation is complete?" asked Chris to his future wife. Zoe let out a loud belch and then heard a tear before seeing a tail sprout behind her and noticed her skin turning green as she smiled. "Not that long."

Zoe stood up and was getting bigger and fatter by the second, easily passing the 60ft mark as she let out a laugh and her clothes begun to tear apart. Chris gave a look of surprise and took out his phone. "Hello," he said. "City hall. Prepare yourself. My fiancée is undergoing her transformation as we speak." Zoe herself had grown past 300ft tall and let out a roar as she held out her hands and they turned into claws as her underbelly turned yellow-green and her face stretched out into that of a velociraptor. She let out a laugh as the rest of her body quickly followed and her ass expanded large enough to tear apart her pants and panties. "Get ready Chris," thought the currently mutating woman to herself. "You're about to be a dinosaur's fiancé."
1221221.title: Dawn of a Dinosaur

12212211.content:
Soon, Zoe in her 300ft tall and 8 ton (in scale) velociraptor form was at the Registry of Transformation to have her IDs updated to suit her new appearance. The photographer was a large saichania woman with bright reddish-brown skin and ginger hair worn in a bob cut. The saichania girl was 600ft tall and with a 900ft wide stomach that she rested her camera on. “Smile.” She said. Zoe grinned and showed her new rather sharp fangs right before the photographer took her picture and it wasn’t long until Zoe was showing her dinosaur I.D. “Name: Zoe V. Marshall. Birthday: October 10th. Species: Velociraptor.”

However, Zoe grumbled because she had a piece of meat stuck in her teeth. “Damn!” Chris let out a sigh. “It’s no big deal, Zoe. Nobody looks good in their Dino ID photograph. My cousin the suchomimas sneezed and messed up her own photograph.” Zoe then smiled and gave a laugh. The saichania photographer was confused but then she saw Chris and realized something. “Oh!” she yelled. “That’s right. Your mother must be one of those girls who waits until mutation to marry. It sure makes it easy passing eggs. Just ask my sister. Good luck, you two.”

Zoe stomped out of the registry with Chris riding on her left boob. “I can’t wait to tell my mom that we’re going to be married sooner than we thought.” Zoe let out a laugh as she hugged her large boobs and Chris tried to maintain his footing. “Well hold on, Zoe,” said Chris. “We can’t rush into this.” Zoe just gave a laugh. “Don’t worry,” said Zoe. "I'm sure we'll be a perfect couple." But Chris let out a sigh. "You do realize that my mother is going to be living with us. I hope you're okay with that." Zoe let out a scoff. "Where do you think that we're stopping off first?"

Zoe stomped away, being extra careful not to step on any men, children or untransformed women. She almost stepped on the human sidewalk before she remembered to walk on the dinosaur sidewalk, whereupon she accidentally bumped into an obese orange-skinned oviraptor woman dressed in a Batgirl shirt and a pair of tight khakis. "Hey!" yelled the oviraptor girl in a Chinese accent. "Watch where you're going!" "Sorry," said Zoe with a blush. "I..." The oviraptor girl rolled her eyes and let out a sigh. "Let me guess," she said. "Newly transformed." Zoe blushed and nodded her head. The oviraptor girl just put her hand on Zoe's shoulder. "Be very careful," she said. "Being this titanic takes a lot of getting used to." Zoe gave a snort and then nodded her head again. The oviraptor girl stomped off just as Zoe noticed Chris had suck into her cleavage. The velociraptor giantess reached down and pulled out her fiancé before she was about to kiss him. But Chris blocked with his foot. "Hold on there, lover girl. Save it for the wedding.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

It wasn't long before Zoe and Chris returned to the house where Chris lived with his mother. Chris's mother was like they said, a 1000ft tall violet-skinned spinosaurus with an enormous fin on her back. She had a 1500ft wide stomach and 1200 wide ass that was at the moment plopped into a chair as she was busy trying to fix a quilt as Chris was guiding her needles. Chris's mother was actually blind and as such, despite being a dinosaur big enough to make her human son look like an insect, she was fully dependent on Chris to help her with everything from chores around the house to paying the bills. Not an easy task for a man in a world where all women were titanic and obese dinosaurs.

The colossal spinosaurus woman let out a snort as she lowered her head. Since she couldn't see Zoe, she merely sniffed her future daughter-in-law. "A velociraptor, huh?" she asked. "My son is just like his daddy. Likes fierce predatory girls. Of at least girls who look fierce. I wish I could see what kind of person my son is marrying." "Mom!" yelled Chris. "Look out!" Mrs. Owens stopped sewing just as she was about to poke herself in the finger with the needle. The spinosaurus giantess sniffed out her small son and smiled. "Thank you, Chris," she said. "I definitely don't want to soak Pepper's quilt with blood. I hear she's expecting twin eggs. I'm really sorry to rely on you so much. I'd also hate to shift a lot of the burden on such a wonderful girl like Zoe." "I don't mind, Mrs. Owens," said the velociraptor woman to her boyfriend's mother. "After all, I've got to get used to this new body. I feel like I can take on the world." "Well duh," said Chris. "You're the half of the population that rules the world." Both dinosaurs in the room let out a laugh at the sole human's joke.

Mrs. Owens then gave a serious look that could be seen even with her blind eyes. “Remember, Chris,” said the spinosaurus giantess. “Divorce isn’t legal in this state so you have to make sure you and Zoe will be happy together.” “What are you worried about, Mom?” asked Chris. “I love Zoe.” Zoe nodded her head. “And I love Chris too, Mrs. Owens. Don’t worry. We’ll be perfectly fine together.” “I hope so,” said Mrs. Owen. “Because I really don’t want Chris to go through what happened with Bertha.” Zoe looked in confusion and Chris gave a nervous look. “Uh,” said Chris. “Mom. I just realized we’re out of milk. Zoe and I will just go out and pick up some more. Zoe gave a look of confusion before Chris waved his hand to signal to his velociraptor fiancée to leave the house. Of course, after they left, Mrs. Owens just shook her head. “You’re a terrible liar, Chris,” she said. “You already ordered milk this morning. Well, it’s about time Zoe knew.”

Zoe was very curious and skeptical at the idea of this Bertha woman that her soon to be mother-in-law was talking about and turned to face Chris who was predictably nervous about the subject. “Bertha?” asked Zoe. “Who’s Bertha?” Chris let out a sigh. “I didn’t want to say this, Zoe,” said Chris. “But you’re not the first girl I dated.” The velociraptor giantess was surprised to hear this. “Wait? There was another.” Chris nodded his head. “That’s correct. But Bertha, she had an awful, uncontrollable temper and made me miserable and that was back when she was a human. I knew that she’d be nothing but trouble once she became a dinosaur so I dumped her while I was still legally able to.” Zoe just stared at Chris. “She sounds like a bad egg. Exactly what kind of dinosaur did she turn into?” “I have no idea,” said Chris. “I never met her mother so I have no way of knowing if she’s an herbivore or a carnivore. Hopefully I’ll never see her again though.” That’s what Chris thought, but what he didn’t know was at a nearby cafe, there was a dinosaur woman who was obscured by a large patio umbrella making it impossible to tell what species of dinosaur she was. However, she looked even bigger and fatter than Zoe and she was glaring and let out a slight growl as she saw Zoe and Chris walking away.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Soon, Zoe was meeting with her mother. Zoe’s mother was a velociraptor much like her daughter, except she was 500ft tall and was bright blue-skinned with purple spots and was even fatter than her daughter. She was speaking with her daughter over several roasted pigs. “So my little girl has finally grown into her dino form,” said Mrs. Marshal. “Pretty soon, you’ll be ready to lay an egg.” “Mom,” said Zoe as she chomped on a pig. “Mom, Mom, Mom. I’m not that far in our relationship yet. But a deal’s a deal. I’m a dinosaur now, so that means I can finally marry Chris.” Mrs. Marshall smiled and growled as she nodded her head. “I hope you can bear living with that blind mother of his. It’s embarrassing for a dinosaur to have to rely so much on a man. It’s a good thing you’re marrying somebody with a steady job.” “Speaking of which,” said Zoe. “How’s Dad doing applying for that job at the power plant.” “You mean reapplying,” said Mrs. Marshall. “Remember, he worked their two years ago. I don’t think that place is properly run. Well, I can tell you one thing. If he’s a no show at our only daughter’s wedding, He’ll be sleeping in my armpit for weeks." "Don't worry, Mom," said Zoe. "Everything is going to be alright."

Mrs. Marshall started to pick her sharp teeth as she gave a growl. "So, Zoe. Have you decided who you're going to invite?" "Well that's simple enough. I'm going to definitely invite Pepper and her husband to the ceremony. After all, Pepper is my best friend and I can't think of anyone else to be the best lady. Then I'm going to have to remember Vince, Dave and Cooper. After all, their best friend is signing himself away to a giantess." "I think that Chris will take care of inviting the guys." Said Mrs. Marshall right before she lets out a slight belch and then wipes her face with a napkin. "Right," said a very embarrassed Zoe. "Well, Scarlet will throw a hissy fit if I don't invite her so that's a no brainer. What about Colleen?" "Haven't you been mad at Colleen for years?" Zoe gave a snort. "I'm willing to forgive her for losing that scarf she borrowed from me. Hmm, I definitely got to get my affairs in order. Oh my gosh! I've just realized something. There's so much to do to prepare for the wedding. I've got to invite everybody I can think of, get my dress ready, order a cake made out of meat.”

Mrs. Marshall rolled her eyes and then grabbed her daughter by the cheeks. “Zoe. It’s going to be alright. We’ve still got plenty of time before we can worry about the wedding. I'm sure that Chris and his mother are having just as much to consider themselves." Zoe just gave a snort and smiled. "Well," she said. "Hopefully Bertha isn't invited to the ceremony.”

Now, who should we follow as the wedding is being planned out?
12212211.title: Big Beautiful Raptor

choices: Suddenly, Chris's Ex Comes in to Confront Zoe
122122111.content:
The next day, Zoe and her parasaurolophus friend, Pepper, were at a salon having their toenails done. Zoe wanted to look her best for the wedding. In this new world, pedicures to these dinosaur giantess were done by human men much smaller than the smallest toes of these titans and at that moment, there were two specialists tending to Zoe’s right foot while Pepper had two men on her left foot. Zoe couldn’t help but grunt slightly as one of the beauticians filed the tip of one of her sharp bus-sized toenails. “You’ll get used to it,” says Pepper. “Just let them do their job.” Zoe just smiled nervously as she showed her sharp teeth. “Thanks for letting me stay at your place until I can move in with Chris and his mom, Pepper. I’d stay at my old apartment but I kinda outgrew it.” “At least you were outdoors when it happened,” says the pregnant parasaurolophus to her velociraptor friend. “When I first turned into a parasaurolophus, I burst apart my college dorm.” One of the men working on Pepper’s toes laughed at Pepper’s expense, prompting her to grab him between her toes. “It’s unwise to laugh at a dinosaur.” Warned Pepper right before she let the man go.

Zoe let out a laugh right before she forced her head past her large stomach and saw that one of her pedicurists had already gotten out a paintbrush. “So, what’s your fiancé’s favorite color, Ms. Marshall?” asks the man. Zoe thought about that but then smiled nervously. “Not a lot goes with green skin. Just paint them black.” Pepper smiles as she then gestures for the men on her foot to move on to the next foot and then speaks again. “So, the wedding is in a few days. You are so impatient.” Zoe let out a snort. “Hello. I’m a velociraptor. The name means “speed thief”. I can’t get married fast enough.” Pepper then snorted again and then made a strange noise from the crest in her head. “Well, don’t you worry. I’ll be the best best woman you’ll ever need when it comes to say the I-dos.”

At that moment, there was a stomping sound and into the parlor walked another giantess and this one dwarfed even Pepper. She was a 2500ft tall (including neck) seismosaurus woman with pitch gray skin who looked like she would weigh 10 tons had she been normal-sized. This seismosaurus girl had bright black skin and long white hair and was wearing a navy blue unitard. She also had two tattoos of a black seismosaurus’s foot on each of her monstrous butt cheeks. The giantess had to lower her 1000ft long neck just to get into the parlor. “Dammit,” she grumbled to herself. “They can accommodate the world’s biggest hips, heaviest belly and roundest booty and yet they can’t make a door to suit my neck. That’s discrimination against sauropods. I should sue.” Zoe and Pepper rolled their eyes. “Don’t get overheated Sara,” said Pepper. “You always have to play the species card.” The seismosaurus let out a scoff and plopped her enormous ass in the seat next to Pepper and rang the bell for a young man to run up to her titanic hand. “These are getting too long,” said Sara. “Be a dear and file them for me.”

As Sara was having her nails done, she turned her head to face Zoe and Pepper. She recognized Zoe and was surprised that she was now a velociraptor. “Zoe!?” Zoe gave a smile. “Hi, Sara. Guess who just finally metamorphed.” Sara gave a nervous look. “Oh,” she said. “A velociraptor. Just like your mom. Yeah, guess there’s no way it could’ve gone differently.” Sara gave a nervous smile and laughed slightly. “So, now we have a carnivore among our ranks.” Pepper gave a laugh. “For once, Sara is speechless. This is going good. And to celebrate Zoe’s transformation and marriage in a few days, we’re taking her out to the Angry Cabaret.” “That new nightclub that opened across the street?” asked Zoe. “Wow.” Pepper gave a smirk. “Hey. You’re the one getting hitched here.” Sara let out a scoff. “Well that’s just great. Pepper’s already married, Zoe’s engaged but I’m still single.” Pepper and Zoe laughed at their friend’s expense before Zoe remembered something and bit her lip nervously.

“Something wrong, Zo?” asked Sara. “Well,” said Zoe. “I’m wondering about Chris’s ex-girlfriend, Bertha. He told me that she was hard to get along with and had an awful temper.” “Sounds kind of like Sara.” Said Pepper smugly. Sara glared at the parasaurolophus woman before Pepper turned her head. “He dumped her before she transformed so she’s probably a dinosaur by now.” “So what are you worried about?” asked Pepper. “You don’t even know what kind of dinosaur she turned into and she hasn’t even met you. That’s no reason to be afraid. You’re getting married to Chris in a few days. If this Bertha woman doesn’t like it, she can go choke on an ammonite.” Zoe let out a laugh at that comment.
122122111.title: Dinosaurs in the Beauty Parlor

choices: A song they all love starts up--time to boogie!
There's a commotion on the dance floor--It's Bertha!
1221221112.content:
---That Night:---

A chorus of roars, hisses and cheers rang throughout the club as the last track faded out; the crowd of dinosaur women parting to make way for a pink-scaled Dimetrodon girl who'd wowed everyone with her break-dancing session during the song. (A doubly-impressive feat, given her plump shape typical of transformed women). Smirking and showing her fangs to the cheering crowd, she wiggled the rain-bow tinted fan on her back one last time before making for the bar, and a waiting round of free drinks.

She happened to walk by a certain chair in a lounge area by the dance floor, giving the two tiny men standing on the cushion a spectacular view of her giant, leather-pants clad rump; her tail poking out through a hole just big enough to fit it without showing more skin than she wanted...not that it mattered, since her tight pants and tank top looked like they were painted on anyways. One of the guys, muscle-bound and thuggish-looking, cracked a leering grin as he stared.

"Hell of a woman, amirite?" The thug rumbled to his much skinnier cohort, taking a swig of his drink. "Better views than up there in the 'little boys' club', right?" He looked up at the ceiling and scowled. Above the crowd of titanic dinosaur women, catwalks hung from the ceiling leading to a human-scale dance floor and bar built into the club's rafters. Everyone up there, from the clubbers to the bartenders, were men. Most seemed oblivious to the dinosaur women below save for a few chatting with a brontosaurus woman who could easily get to them with her long neck. "Buncha pussies; letting themselves get shoved to the sidelines...." he shook his head. "

His rail-thin partner shivered a bit, looking about the lower dance floor. "Or they just didn't want to get, y'know, flattened. Most people who go out to get smashed don't want it to be literal....like how you want us to end up. Seriously, didn't you see the bouncers laughing when you told them you wanted to go downstairs without a girl?!" He threw up his hands, splashing some of his drink onto the landscape-sized upholstery.

Mr. Thug rolled his eyes, turning to Mr. Thin. "It's not like we're breaking some club rule or anything; no need to lose your cool."

A shadow suddenly covered them, and only Mr. Thin bothered to look up. Then he went pale. "C-Can I lose my cool now?" He pointed upwards with a shaky finger. Mr. Thug followed it...

...And they both let out a brief scream as a plump dino-butt crashed down onto them.

Said booty belonged to Sara. "Idiots, should have stayed upstairs. Can you girls believe those two?" She pointed down at her rump and scoffed, but couldn't help but smile, their struggles no doubt tickling her rear as it bounced and wiggled down on them as Sara bopped along to the thumping music.

Zoe and Pepper laughed at the whole scene before taking the chairs next to Sara, taking a second to check their seats for any more guys. "I'm surprised nobody sat on them until now!" Pepper chuckled, sipping from her soda. (Alcohol during egg-laying was just as bad an idea as a human pregnancy). "Normally I feel sorry for guys who end up as seat cushions, but anyone that stupid has it coming if you ask me. Kinda wish I could have done it."

"I saw them first," Sara corrected.

Taking a gulp of her daquari, Zoe giggled. "Harsh, girls! I've heard of...that...happening by accident; but, on purpose? Isn't that a bit mean, Sara?" She thought of poor Chris getting pancaked under her own rear, and winced. "And...I never thought you'd be into that kind of thing, Zoe."

At that Zoe spluttered, nearly spilling her drink. Sara let out a laugh at the parasaurolophus girl's expense as she fumbled for a napkin, coughing and sneezing. "I-I'm NOT 'into that kind of thing'!" She defended, looking quite embarrassed. "I'm just a bit envious that Sara got to give them what was coming to them, that's all..." Her eyes shifted a bit.

Zoe's smile turned devilish. "Oh? Remember last week, when you bought that issue of Dinosaur Woman's Weekly when we went shopping? The one with that article; '10 Ways to Go Prehistoric with your Man'?"

Pepper groaned, facepalming. "Don't do this, Zoe..."

"No, please do; this is gonna be good!" Sara countered, craning her long neck down and grinning.

"You seemed especially excited about one 'technique'," Zoe pressed on, Sara all but cackling now. "I could hear you mumbling about it the whole walk home: 'So a bikini IS safe!'; 'good thing I already have a soft chair', 'so THAT'S how you avoid far--'"

Sara broke into a full belly-laugh, even snorting a few times and slapping her knee. "Oh God, th-hahahaha-at's PRICELESS! Found tips in a magazine, you were worried about farting on him; oh-hohoho my sides!!" Her laughter even drowned out the music just for a second, as the DJ switched songs.

Pepper blushed lime green and threw up her hands. "GAH! Fine; it's my kink, okay?! I just picked the idea up online a while back, and it just...stuck with me. I'd wanted to try it out since before Frank and I got engaged, but I had no idea how to do it safely--or if there WAS a safe and...intimate, way of doing it. When I saw a magazine with a how-to, I just couldn't resist." She sighed and slumped into her chair, casting a glance at Zoe. "...Did I really say all that out loud?"

"To be fair, I was riding on your shoulder on the way home, so I could hear you mumbling pretty easy." Zoe couldn't resist a guffaw, even as Pepper gave her a playful punch in the shoulder. "And before you say it: no, I won't ask you for tips so I can try that with Chris."

"Not even for your honeymoon?" Pepper shot back, cocking an eyebrow.

"...Maybe I'll give that magazine a peek, if you still have it. Maybe."

Sara suddenly cleared her throat, catching her friends' attention. "Not to interrupt, but...you think I should get off the idiots? They're still struggling, but even dimwits need air. Ugh, I think one of them is even trying to literally bite my ass."


Before Zoe or Pepper could answer, though....
1221221112.title: Dinos on the Dance Floor

choices: At the moment, Bertha's more interested in Pepper...
Bertha gets right in Zoe's face, demanding Chris' whereabouts!
Bertha's actually there on good terms.
12212211122.content:
It was when a particular song began pumping from the speakers that Sara's head started rocking to the beat, her arms and legs joining in to begin a full-on dance. "Aw, hell yeah! Now it's a complete night!"

All the other girls followed suit as Sara got up from her seat, the urge to boogie starting to flow through their veins, but it was when they had just turned to step into the dance floor that it all went away, having noticed a scale wall of a dull gray make a fourth of itself in their party.

"Uh..." Sara uttered out, too distracted to notice that the formerly squashed patrons had broken free of her rump, and were now hugging one another in terror.

The dinosaur wasn't any bigger than any of the others in the bar, nor any fatter. She was utterly massive, of course, standing with could've been a full extra third of the trio's height, and owned a stomach that seemed like some leviathanic landmass that provided an immense barrier between her and them, but that wasn't particularly what made the three all pause at once, adding (if brief) a noticeable roadblock to their smoothly flowing night.

She wasn't even the only T-rex in the entire club, but it was only her firsthand demeanor that intimidated them. Rather than be endlessly gnashing and rampaging around for some imaginary meal that could truly sate her, she just stared them down with a judgmental look in her eyes, only baring her teeth by sharing them a curious pout.

"...Hello?" Pepper whispered, but it was barely audible over the music.

"Pardon me for being nosy," The T-Rex began, having not heard her. "But I think that you know somebody that I know."

Pepper's frown deepened, but Zoe stepped in the way, showing a defensive glare. "...what's it to you?"

The T-rex brought her hands in the air, giving a resigned smile "Sorry, I guess I'm just clinging to old times, specifically an old ex of mine. You wouldn't happen to know a 'Chris Harvey,' would you?"

At that, Pepper suddenly remembered how it felt to be shy in the face of a dinosaur, with even Zoe and Sara stepping back, the edge in their faces giving way to surprise.

"You..." Pepper began, starting to stumble over her own words. "You wouldn't happen to be...Bertha, would you?"

"Why, he did remember me!" She gushed mockingly, sending a chill down all their spines at once. "So, I take it that you're his new meat, then? What's your name?"

Anyplace else, "New meat" was an incredibly common phrase, but it was then that hearing it made Pepper cringe, if just for the emphasis that Bertha spoke it with.
12212211122.title: There's a commotion on the dance floor--It&...

1221222.content: This story is about a pair of Swiss scientists who invent a machine that can bring things or people from the past. Their first test runs brings in a saber tooth tiger, but the trip has somehow caused the tiger to become a tall, obese humanoid woman. Now the newly mutated woman must find a way to live in modern day Earth.
1221222.title: A Visitor from the Past

12212221.content:
Switzerland, 2015
Two scientists are standing in front of an odd looking device. It resembles a small blue metal shed with mutiple cables and antennea on it. The two scientists look proud.

<Is the device ready for use? Will we finally be able to bring objects from the past?> One of the scientists say.

<Hopefully. We've been working on this for months now. We need something or our funding will be pulled.> The other one replied.

< Then hit the button.> The first scientist says.

The second one nods and walks over to the device. He pushes a button on the side, and the machine comes to life. The scientist steps back and marvel at their work.
----------------
South America, 10,000 years ago
Two saber tooth tigers, one male and one female, are chasing prey through a thick brush. Before they can catch up, a strange blue vortex opens up in the front of them. The male panics and runs away, while the female is intrigued. Before she can do anything, the vortex sucks her up and closes, leaving no trace of the female saber tooth tiger behind. The male comes back and looks for it's mate, confused.
----------------
Time Corridor
The female saber tooth tiger is flying through the time corridor at high speeds. As it does, it feels an odd change come over it, almost as if it's becoming... humanoid.
-----------------
Switzerland, 2015
The time machine dings, indicating it's brought something back. The scientist are happy.

<This is it!> The first one says.

The doors open as the scientists look on. The sight that greets them is a bizarre one.

Inside the machine is a woman, but unlike any woman they had ever seen. She was covered in tan fur and had a long tail. Her canine teeth were incredibly long, reaching past her chin. She had long, unkempt tan hair. She stood at about 15 feet tall. She was also quite obese, with a 10 foot belly, 12 foot butt, and H cup breasts. Her orange eyes looked confused and scared.

<What is it?> The second scientist asked.

<Based on the fur and teeth, I believe it is a saber tooth tiger, but mutated into a humanoid form.> The first replied.

<But how?> The second asked.

The first shrugged. <We will need to run tests.> He said. Then he walked up to the woman. The woman backed away. The scientist made a gesture that tried to show he was friendly. That seemed to please the saber tooth woman, and she stepped out.

<This will be interesting.> The second scientist said.

Now, how does our mutated woman react to the modern day?
12212221.title: Past enters the Future

choices: Reprogram the Machine to Bring Her Mate to the Future
Build a Machine to Turn Animals into Amazons like Herself
122122211.content:
The tigress lowered her head and sniffed the first scientist as he looked in shock. She then repositioned her massive hulk and looked over the laboratory, at the computers and the machinery embedded in the walls, right before she spotted a mirror and looked at herself in surprise. She lifted up her 10ft wide belly to get a good look at her sharp and clawed toes and then she held her 12ft wide butt that was almost as tall as she was and tapped it to make it shake and jiggle. She gave a slight growl before she turned back to face the scientists. The first one grunted as the tiger woman picked him up and lifted him in the air. The second one gasped and backed into the corner in pure fear as the tigress showed her teeth.

However, from the looks of it, the saber-toothed giantess meant no harm. "<Interesting>," she said in a Native American accent. "<You look like humans, yet you dress differently and have less fur. You also look somewhat scrawnier>." Both scientists looked in surprise. "<It can talk?>" asked the first scientist. "<Some flaw in the time machine must've mutated the saber-toothed tiger in both body and brain.>" The tigress raised an eyebrow. "<It? That is very rude. It should be perfectly clear that I'm a female of my species. But I do feel different. For one, I walk like a human, I appear to understand human language. However...>" The tigress looked back at how fat she is. From the looks of it, she would have to weigh 4 tons. "<For some reason, I am the size of a mammoth.>" The tigress paused and licked her lips and fangs as she let out a purr. "<Speaking of which, I'm famished. With how big I am now, I'll bet I could easily bag a mammoth feast>." The cat woman put down the first scientist before he spoke to her.

"<I'm afraid that isn't possible.>" The tigress rose an eye and then noticed the time machine. "<What exactly is going on>" The second scientist then came forward. "<I think that there is a lot to explain. I am Dr. Cedar and this is my colleague, Dr. Edlund. We built that time machine to bring back creatures and objects of the past. We set it to teleport something from 10,000 years ago and you were what came out. Due to some flaw in the machine, you were mutated into an anthropomorphic form. We believe that there were some side effects.>" The tigress's eyes opened wide. "<10,000 years!? Where is my mate? What of mammoths?>" "<I'm afraid that the world you knew is long gone, ma'am,>" said Dr. Edlund. "<Mammoths and saber toothed tigers have all died out>."

The tigress gives a look of surprise and wags her tail. "<Oh my>," she thought. "<That's unfortunate. It seems I had better get used to this new world. I need to know all I can about the world of the future.>" Both scientists looked up at the tigress and then nodded their heads. It wasn't long before the tiger woman was brought to a library room and was browsing through several history books as she devoured several raw fishes. “<Are you sure this is a good idea, Edlund?>” asked Cedar. “<We need to know how much she has mutated and what it has done, Cedar. She has clearly been blessed with intelligence far beyond that of an ordinary animal, especially one from a much more primitive time.>” The tigress kept flipping through history books and nodded her head before devouring another herring. “Pyramids of Egypt,” thought the sabertooth. “The crusades, the Revolutionary War. A lot can happen in 10,000 years, but it doesn’t seem like humans have evolved. Yikes, this book on the 20th century alone frightens me.” 

As the tigress kept studying, she kept on eating and it wasn’t long before she was moved onto the literature section and browsed through the works of Shakespeare, all while under constant watch. “<This is it, Cedar.>” said Edlund. “<This will secure our funding. We took a creature from a primeval world and evolved her to human level intelligence. No. Beyond.>” However, Cedar bit his lip. “<What we’re doing is dangerous. But if we send her to the past in this state, who knows what damage will occur?>” Suddenly, there was a cracking sound and both scientists saw the floor cracking apart beneath the tiger woman’s feet. She seemed to be getting bigger and fatter as she was now 20ft tall with a 22ft wide stomach and 25ft wide butt. “<Is it just me, or is she getting bigger?>” “<Hmmm. Perhaps we need to look at the results.>” With that, the scientists left the saber tooth giantess who was evidently still growing to watch a television depicted human society. She had bloated so big she held the television on her stomach.

As the tiger woman kept on watching, she rubbed her chin and thought to herself. “Interesting. This world is new. Too new. Not only am I a being from a past, but I’m a mutant. Alone in this new world.” The tigress somehow turned off the television with her mind and then her eyes popped before she unconsciously caused several books behind her to levitate. The tigress then begun to float herself and rubbed her chin. “It seems as though there were side-effects with the transfer to the present. Hmm. I still feel out of place. I think I’ll keep my new psychic powers a secret from these scientist friends. Friends. That’s right. I’m alone in this unfamiliar world.” The tigress then looked back at the time machine and wondered to herself. “I have an idea.”

 What exactly was the obese giant sabertooth’s idea?
122122211.title: The Curious Cat

choices: Teach her about the modern world
122122212.content:
A little shakey, the saber-tooth woman took a few steps into the lab and looked around. The lights, machines, and boards seemed to worry her, since she had no idea what they were. All of a sudden, one of the machines beeped. The saber-tooth shrieked and ducked under a desk to hide, only barely fitting.

<Oh dear.> The first scientist replied. <Poor thing is terrified. A simple coffee machine freaked her out.> He walked over to the creature and bent down to look at her.

<It's ok.> He said gently. <The device won't hurt you.>

The mutated saber-tooth looked up at the scientist. To his surprise, she began to speak.

<R-really?> She said, nervous.

<You speak?> The scientist said.

<Yes. I speak. You sure thing won't hurt?> The woman replied. She seemed to still be getting used to speaking.

Nodding, the scientist gently led the woman from the desk. Standing up, the saber-tooth placed a hand on her huge belly.

<So big.> She said. <What happen?>

The second scientist pulled the first away as the saber-tooth checked her new body.

<We need to show this to the board.> He said. <This is an amazing discovery.>

<Shouldn't we help her get used to the modern world? You saw how she reacted to the coffee machine.> The first scientist replied.

What do they decide to do?
122122212.title: Scaredy Cat

1221222122.content:
<You're right. Forcing her into the modern world would be a terrible idea.> The second scientist said. <We should help her get used to the future first.>

The first scientist nodded, and walked up to the saber-toothed woman. She stepped back a little bit, scared, but the scientist just smiled.

<My name Johan.> Johan said. <This is Elias. We have no intention to harm you. We wish to help you. Do you have a name?>

The woman stared at him, confused. <Name?> She asked. <No name.>

Johan frowned. <Can you describe where you lived?> He asked.

The saber-tooth woman tried to think of her home. <Big ocean.> She said. <Big mountains. Big valley. Two-legged beings, like you. Take home. Fled with mate.> She then seemed to realize something, and looked around. <Where mate?>

<I'm afraid you were the only one who... arrived.> Johan said. <I'm sorry.>

The woman frowned. <Me and mate run.> She explained. <Saw strange things. Caves... but not caves. Wooden. Near river.>

<That sounds like Monte Verde.> Elias theorized. <So she must have been from Chile. Saber-tooth tiger fossils were found there.>

<Fos...sil?> The woman asked. <What fossil?>

Both Johan and Elias frowned. They didn't want to reveal this, but felt there was no hiding it forever.

<Your species, the saber tooth tiger. They are... extinct.> Johan said. <Died out nearly 10,000 years ago. Fossils are their bones. By all accounts, due to these circumstances, you are the last living saber tooth tiger in existence.>

The mutated tiger stared, utterly confused. <Died? Last living? I am... alone?> She asked.

<I'm sorry.> Johan said.

The tiger-woman fell to the ground, her weight making several items shake. Tears seemed to form in her eyes.

<My mate... gone. Others... gone. All alone.> She muttered. Johan walked up to her, and took her hand.

<Please, do not cry.> Johan said. <The saber tooth tiger may be gone, but it isn't forgotten. And you are here. If we can send you back, we don't know. And we are unsure of the mutations. But we'll at least try to make you comfortable.>

The woman looked at him, and smiled. <Thank you.> She replied.

<We need a name for you.> Elias said. <You're from Chile... why not Eva? From Johan's little talk, it fits, since it translates to life.>

<Eva... nice name. I am Eva.> Eva said, slowly getting up.

<Good.> Johan said. <Now, we need to help you understand the modern day. One of the first things is...>
1221222122.title: A gentle talk

12212222.content: In this tale, in the near future, a genetics scientist in an underwater base is researching ways to create human animal hybrids, when she is accidentally injected with shark DNA, transforming her into a tall, obese shark woman. She must now fight her growing shark instincts and growing body as she searches for a way to fix this, or at least get out of the base before she accidentally destroys it.
12212222.title: The Shark Woman

122122221.content:
The year is 2065. Scientists on Earth have made great leaps in robotics and space travel, but still have trouble understanding genetics, biology, and other related sciences. So bases were set up all over the world to find out more.

One such location was Atlantic Base 9, a large research base located deep under the Atlantic Ocean. The location was chosen so any accidents could be kept out of large civilizations. The base was state-of-the-art, with automated security systems and high-end research equipment. The base contained a crew of 500 scientists, engineers, and guards, with about 150 high-end androids.

One such scientists was in the genetics lab. This was Carrey Harker, a genetics researcher 6 years out of college. She was about 5'7'', had bright red hair, blue eyes, and an athletic build in lab gear. She was looking over some notes and a set of syringes when she heard foot steps. She turned and smiled at who walked in.

Walking through the door was a gold colored female android. It was about 6'5'', lacked anything resembling head hair, and had LED eyes and ruby red lips. She had an exaggerated hourglass figure, with N-cup breasts and a huge ass. She also had built in high heels. Despite appearing nude, she had the smooth features of a doll

This was SIA, Carrey's personal robotic assisstant. She was giving to Carrey as a graduation present. She was programmed to help Carrey with any and all work she did. She had a degree of sentience, and developed her own personality. And that personality was completely obssessed with her.

"Carrey, my beloved, I have those notes you wanted." SIA said in her musical British voice.

"Thank you, SIA. Just place them on the table." Carrey said, not looking up.

SIA complied, then took a seat next to Carrey. "So, my dear Carrey, how is your work coming along?"

Carrey grinned. "I think I've cracked the genetic code. With this, we can create human-animal hybrids. Heck, if this works right, I might try it myself."

"Oh splendid." SIA said. "I bet you'll look great. Then again, you make anything look amazing."

Carrey picked up a syringe. The lable read 'DNA: Great White Shark' "Just imagine it, SIA. All the good this can do."

Just then, a voice rang out.

"CARREY!"
Both Carrey and SIA jumped up and turned. Staring at them was the base leader, Dorian Scott. He was a 6', athleticaly built man in his 60's, bald and with a medium, grey beard and brown eyes. He was wearing a NAVY captain's uniform. He looked annoyed.

"Carrey, I have tried to contact you 12 times. I am having a meeting with the other genetics scientists. You are to report there now."

"Yes sir!" Carrey replied.

"May I come along? I get so lonely without Carrey." SIA asked.

"If you insist." Dorian replied.

Carrey and SIA thanked Dorian and left for the meeting. Unknown to either of them, when they jumped up, the syringe with the Great White Shark DNA pierced Carrey's arm, and injected the DNA into her.

Now, does Carrey start transforming during the meeting?
122122221.title: Welcome to Atlantic Base 9

122122222.content: In this tale, a treasure hunter is exploring a mysterious castle in Scotland when she comes across a suit of platinum armor. She decides to take it with her to both hopefully sell and to impress her girlfriend. When she gets home, she ends up putting the suit of armor on. The armor then fuses with her body, turning her entire body into solid, flexible platinum. It also causes her to somehow become giant and fat. Now a giant, obese, living suit of armor, the treasure hunter must find a way to reverse this.
122122222.title: Metal Head

1221222221.content:
Alright...” Karen puffed out. “If this doesn’t cut it for her, then it’s a divorce.”

Karen brushed aside a loose strand of hair that’s fallen over her eyes, staring right into the face of $15,000, the debacles of finding a Scottish passport on the secret, and the quest to find a shipment line big enough to lug a twenty-ton hunk of metal from the uncharted annals of Europe through the very door to her living room, the tip for the delivery men alone twice what she would’ve normally spent on presents for Amy, so often both the jewel and ire of her eye. So much she hoped that this would finally be the gift to satisfy her girlfriend’s extreme tastes, the present to end all the awkward smiles and dissatisfied glint in her eyes whenever she bought her something she really put effort into, no matter how much money it’d cost.

Just staring up at it was enough a price to pay for, to think she’d be looking at it any time she’d enter the living room. Maybe there was an audience for armor to collectors, historians with a fascination for war, likely, but imagining anything that could fit into this seemed more fit for something the characters in an epic fantasy novel would face, certainly not medieval Scotland. Unless whoever was using it was on stilts, it would’ve been impossible for any species alive to fit inside, the head looming on a perch standing ten feet into the air, supporting a set of shoulders each over a yard wide, immense barrels needed not just to carry the armor itself around, but, she assumed, the wearer itself. Against any earthling sense of logic or human anatomy, several feet of stomach bulged off of the suit that lay on the floor in a gigantic barrier, a massive, hollow sphere of metal big enough for her to live in, a breastplate laying on top comparable to a set of giant cannonballs bound together in a leather bra. Sticking out into view past either side were a ponderous set of thighs, both of them carrying the girths to birth a mini van.

Karen squinted at the head, a tall metal dome devoid of any facial features to give it any sense of humanity, or even any breathing holes; just a smooth, metal face with only two large, hollow eyes punched in.

“Dear, god, I hope somebody breaks in and steals this.”

“Karen? You home?”

Karen stiffened up at the voice, then ran to the window, seeing none other than the of the house herself at the front door, searching for her keys.

“Just a minute, Amy!” Karen yelled back, putting on as neutral a tone she could as she ran back into the room, searching for a way to hide herself. The couch, the closet, behind the TV...no. All to cliche.

Staring back at the mass of metal standing with her, she questioned why it wasn’t her first choice.

“There should be a key in the backyard, I...” She pulled upon the metal door, cringing at the scream of the thousand-year rusted hinges cracking open. “...I’m busy!”

“...okay?” Amy questioned.

Karen set foot into the spacious armor and gently pulled the door closed, sealing herself in darkness. Devoid of any seams between the metal plates, it was impossible to see the outside world through the armor, completely entrapping her in the deepest of black.

“Maybe through the eyes?” She thought aloud, and gave a small jump to grab onto the neck...

...but her fingers slipped on her sweat by a tint of red that flowed inside of the armor. She looked around for a source, but it seemed to bounce off the walls from wherever she looked, seemingly hovering in the air without a source.

“The hell?” She exhaled incredulously, reaching for the doors, but hadn’t noticed till her hand was trying to push it open that the opening was fusing shut on its own, the only evidence that it was ever there being a handle

“Amy?...Amy, Help!” She screamed as she pounded where the door once lay, wondering where she’d gone wrong. Amy, the armor, stepping inside, but no matter how hard she tried, she remained trapped. Hearing nothing outside, she feared her arm and punched at the metal as hard as she could...and her fist remained in place, fused to the wall.

Seeing the metal soften and contort like jelly around her hand, Karen grabbed her wrist and yanked, growing more frantic as her fist was swallowed. All around her, whatever joints once allowed the armor to flex fused together as the empty shell slowly transformed into but a metal block in its form.

“HELP!!!” She desperately screamed, seeing her other hand get entrapped as well. She couldn’t even struggle against their bonds; they didn’t even feel submerged, as though the nerves inside of hem had disappeared, bonding her with the soulless metal. Rocking back and forth, she soon realized her legs were fastened as well, already sinking knee-deep in the iron. “ANYBODY!!! HELP ME!!!”

The metal pressed against her back and bonded to her skin, denying her even the liberty of rocking back and forth. Left with only a beanbag’s chair worth of space, all she could do was watch and whimper as her arms were taken in, the floor rising up on her stomach. What movements she could make became less and less when the very last of her joints were taken, and once her chest was gone, she couldn’t even breath, the metal of the armor keeping her alive to see the metal approach her face.

She gave one last squeak of fear before the metal could suffocate her, but before it could, her nose sealed shut before flattening against her face, followed by her eyes, mouth, and ears all fusing shut before the very last tracts of her skin was absorbed...


.....



“....AGH!!!”

Locked in the same pose Karen was formerly trapped in, the armor’s eyes lit up with a pair of white, glowing pupils. It’s shoulders heaved up and down, despite having no mouth or nostrils to breath through, and yet her voice whistles in and out from where the head’s lips would’ve lay, only now it was filtered into a metallic echo.

Through muted colors, Karen could see the room of her death, still as it’d been left, but she felt...different. She felt tall, exhausted, but most of all, she get heavy.

“What just...” Karen laid a hand on her head, but froze up at a metallic clang from the touch. She opened up an eye to stare at her wrist, her arm shaking as she extended it to see the musculature of the armor instead, feeling the immense weight of the metal. She shot the other one out to see but the reverse of the same, its fingers flexing at their command.

Eyes wide, Karen pushed her arms down on her breastplate, the metal mounds somehow squishing like actual flesh, then traced her hands down along her new belly, the armor globe now filled with metal, its obscene weight keeping her pinned in place.

“Karen?” Amy’s voice called out. “Found the key. Need any help with anything?”

Karen’s eyes darted to the door, seeing the knob turn. “AMY, NO!!!”
1221222221.title: Sorry for the delay.

info.brief_description: Stories pertaining to weight gain and growth. (Anthro and human allowed)
info.description:
Rules:

-No fanfiction (Original content/characters only).

-Both weight gain and growth must be present (No growth without gain, and gain would be preferred with at least 7 feet in height.

-Any size/speed of growth is permitted.

-Furry/anthro TF is allowed (eh, why not?).

-Constant smut: If possible, I’d prefer legitimate attempts at character and plot, as well.

-Gainers/growers can only be above 20.

-No futa/underage/torture/necrophilia/rape/scat/watersports/hard vore/anal & nipple vore/vore involving children.

-No real-life celebrities/figures.

-No more than two short chapters (anything under ten lines, excluding breaks) in a row.

I reserve the right to edit or delete posts as I see fit.

Every time you make a new scenario, put "Alternate scenario" at the first chapter.

That's all! Go nuts.
